qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not using words; not speaking; silent; speechless.

qa_pairs.question: Word method
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A method of teaching reading in which words are first taken as single ideograms and later analyzed into their phonetic and alphabetic elements; -- contrasted with alphabet method and sentence method.

qa_pairs.question: Wordplay
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A more or less subtle playing upon the meaning of words.

qa_pairs.question: Wordsman
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who deals in words, or in mere words; a verbalist.

qa_pairs.question: Wordy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to words; consisting of words; verbal; as, a wordy war.

qa_pairs.question: Wore
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is (imp.) of Wear.

qa_pairs.question: Wore
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as (imp.) of Ware.

qa_pairs.question: Work
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Exertion of strength or faculties; physical or intellectual effort directed to an end; industrial activity; toil; employment; sometimes, specifically, physical labor.

qa_pairs.question: Work
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To exert one's self for a purpose; to put forth effort for the attainment of an object; to labor; to be engaged in the performance of a task, a duty, or the like.

qa_pairs.question: Work
qa_pairs.answer: It means To labor or operate upon; to give exertion and effort to; to prepare for use, or to utilize, by labor.

qa_pairs.question: Workable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Capable of being worked, or worth working; as, a workable mine; workable clay.

qa_pairs.question: Workaday
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Workyday.

qa_pairs.question: Workbag
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A bag for holding implements or materials for work; especially, a reticule, or bag for holding needlework, and the like.

qa_pairs.question: Workbasket
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A basket for holding materials for needlework, or the like.

qa_pairs.question: Workbench
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A bench on which work is performed, as in a carpenter's shop.

qa_pairs.question: Workbox
qa_pairs.answer: It means A box for holding instruments or materials for work.

qa_pairs.question: Workday
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A day on which work is performed, as distinguished from Sunday, festivals, etc., a working day.

qa_pairs.question: Worker
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who, or that which, works; a laborer; a performer; as, a worker in brass.

qa_pairs.question: Workfellow
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One engaged in the same work with another; a companion in work.

qa_pairs.question: Workfolk
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is People that labor.

qa_pairs.question: Workful
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Full of work; diligent.

qa_pairs.question: Workhouse
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A house where any manufacture is carried on; a workshop.

qa_pairs.question: Working
qa_pairs.answer: It means (a & n.) from Work.

qa_pairs.question: Working-day
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or characteristic of, working days, or workdays; everyday; hence, plodding; hard-working.

qa_pairs.question: Workingman
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A laboring man; a man who earns his daily support by manual labor.

qa_pairs.question: Workless
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Without work; not laboring; as, many people were still workless.

qa_pairs.question: Workman
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A man employed in labor, whether in tillage or manufactures; a worker.

qa_pairs.question: Workmanlike
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Becoming a workman, especially a skillful one; skillful; well performed.

qa_pairs.question: Workmanly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Becoming a skillful workman; skillful; well performed; workmanlike.

qa_pairs.question: Workmanly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In a skillful manner; in a manner becoming a skillful workman.

qa_pairs.question: Workmanship
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The art or skill of a workman; the execution or manner of making anything.

qa_pairs.question: Workmaster
qa_pairs.answer: It means The performer of any work; a master workman.

qa_pairs.question: Workmens compensation act
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A statute fixing the compensation that a workman may recover from an employer in case of accident, esp. the British act of 6 Edw. VII. c. 58 (1906) giving to a workman, except in certain cases of <ldquo/serious and willful misconduct,<rdquo/ a right against his employer to a certain compensation on the mere occurrence of an accident where the common law gives the right only for negligence of the employer.

qa_pairs.question: Workroom
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any room or apartment used especially for labor.

qa_pairs.question: Workship
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Workmanship.

qa_pairs.question: Workshop
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A shop where any manufacture or handiwork is carried on.

qa_pairs.question: Worktable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A table for holding working materials and implements; esp., a small table with drawers and other conveniences for needlework, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Workways
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In a working position or manner; as, a T rail placed workwise, i.e., resting on its base.

qa_pairs.question: Workwoman
qa_pairs.answer: It means A woman who performs any work; especially, a woman skilled in needlework.

qa_pairs.question: Workyday
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A week day or working day, as distinguished from Sunday or a holiday. Also used adjectively.

qa_pairs.question: World
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The earth and the surrounding heavens; the creation; the system of created things; existent creation; the universe.

qa_pairs.question: Worldliness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality of being worldly; a predominant passion for obtaining the good things of this life; covetousness; addictedness to gain and temporal enjoyments; worldly-mindedness.

qa_pairs.question: Worldling
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A person whose soul is set upon gaining temporal possessions; one devoted to this world and its enjoyments.

qa_pairs.question: Worldly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Relating to the world; human; common; as, worldly maxims; worldly actions.

qa_pairs.question: Worldly
qa_pairs.answer: It means With relation to this life; in a worldly manner.

qa_pairs.question: Worldly-minded
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Devoted to worldly interests; mindful of the affairs of the present life, and forgetful of those of the future; loving and pursuing this world's goods, to the exclusion of piety and attention to spiritual concerns.

qa_pairs.question: Worldly-wise
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Wise in regard to things of this world.

qa_pairs.question: World-wide
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Extended throughout the world; as, world-wide fame.

qa_pairs.question: world-wide web
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The collective total of all computer installations that are connected to the internet and provide access to other computers connected to the internet, using hypertext transfer protocol, to computer files called web pages, which may have text, graphics, audio or animated video data, as well as pages which may provide data or information in all those forms.

qa_pairs.question: Worm
qa_pairs.answer: It means A creeping or a crawling animal of any kind or size, as a serpent, caterpillar, snail, or the like.

qa_pairs.question: Worm
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To work slowly, gradually, and secretly.

qa_pairs.question: Worm
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To effect, remove, drive, draw, or the like, by slow and secret means; -- often followed by out.

qa_pairs.question: Wormal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Wormil.

qa_pairs.question: Worm-eaten
qa_pairs.answer: It means Eaten, or eaten into, by a worm or by worms; as, worm-eaten timber.

qa_pairs.question: Wormed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Penetrated by worms; injured by worms; worm-eaten; as, wormed timber.

qa_pairs.question: Wormhole
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A burrow made by a worm.

qa_pairs.question: Wormian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Discovered or described by Olanus Wormius, a Danish anatomist.

qa_pairs.question: Wormil
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any botfly larva which burrows in or beneath the skin of domestic and wild animals, thus producing sores. They belong to various species of *Hypoderma* and allied genera. Domestic cattle are often infested by a large species. See Gadfly. Called also also known as warble, and also known as worble.

qa_pairs.question: Wormling
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A little worm.

qa_pairs.question: Wormseed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any one of several plants, as Artemisia santonica, and Chenopodium anthelminticum, whose seeds have the property of expelling worms from the stomach and intestines.

qa_pairs.question: Worm-shaped
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Shaped like a worm; as, a worm-shaped root.

qa_pairs.question: Worm-shell
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any species of Vermetus.

qa_pairs.question: Wormul
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Wornil.

qa_pairs.question: Wormwood
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A composite plant (Artemisia Absinthium), having a bitter and slightly aromatic taste, formerly used as a tonic and a vermifuge, and to protect woolen garments from moths. It gives the peculiar flavor to the cordial called absinthe. The volatile oil is a narcotic poison. The term is often extended to other species of the same genus.

qa_pairs.question: Wormy
qa_pairs.answer: It means Containing a worm; abounding with worms.

qa_pairs.question: Worn
qa_pairs.answer: It means (p. p.) of Wear.

qa_pairs.question: Wornil
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Wormil.

qa_pairs.question: Worn-out
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Consumed, or rendered useless, by wearing; as, worn-out garments.

qa_pairs.question: Worral
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An Egyptian fork-tongued lizard, about four feet long when full grown.

qa_pairs.question: Worrier
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who worries.

qa_pairs.question: Worriment
qa_pairs.answer: It means Trouble; anxiety; worry.

qa_pairs.question: Worrisome
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Inclined to worry or fret; also, causing worry or annoyance.

qa_pairs.question: Worrit
qa_pairs.answer: It means To worry; to annoy.

qa_pairs.question: Worrit
qa_pairs.answer: It means Worry; anxiety.

qa_pairs.question: Worry
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To harass by pursuit and barking; to attack repeatedly; also, to tear or mangle with the teeth.

qa_pairs.question: Worry
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To feel or express undue care and anxiety; to manifest disquietude or pain; to be fretful; to chafe; as, the child worries; the horse worries.

qa_pairs.question: Worry
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A state of undue solicitude; a state of disturbance from care and anxiety; vexation; anxiety; fret; as, to be in a worry.

qa_pairs.question: Worryingly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In a worrying manner.

qa_pairs.question: Worse
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Bad, ill, evil, or corrupt, in a greater degree; more bad or evil; less good; specifically, in poorer health; more sick; -- used both in a physical and moral sense.

qa_pairs.question: Worse
qa_pairs.answer: It means Loss; disadvantage; defeat.

qa_pairs.question: Worse
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In a worse degree; in a manner more evil or bad.

qa_pairs.question: Worse
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To make worse; to put disadvantage; to discomfit; to worst. See Worst, (v.)

qa_pairs.question: Worsen
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To make worse; to deteriorate; to impair.

qa_pairs.question: Worsen
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To grow or become worse.

qa_pairs.question: Worser
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Worse.

qa_pairs.question: Worship
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Excellence of character; dignity; worth; worthiness.

qa_pairs.question: Worship
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To respect; to honor; to treat with civil reverence.

qa_pairs.question: Worship
qa_pairs.answer: It means To perform acts of homage or adoration; esp., to perform religious service.

qa_pairs.question: Worshipability
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality of being worthy to be worshiped.

qa_pairs.question: Worshipable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Capable of being worshiped; worthy of worship.

qa_pairs.question: Worshiper
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who worships; one who pays divine honors to any being or thing; one who adores.

qa_pairs.question: Worshipful
qa_pairs.answer: It means Entitled to worship, reverence, or high respect; claiming respect; worthy of honor; -- often used as a term of respect, sometimes ironically.

qa_pairs.question: Worst
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Bad, evil, or pernicious, in the highest degree, whether in a physical or moral sense. See Worse.

qa_pairs.question: Worst
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That which is most bad or evil; the most severe, pernicious, calamitous, or wicked state or degree.

qa_pairs.question: Worst
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To gain advantage over, in contest or competition; to get the better of; to defeat; to overthrow; to discomfit.

qa_pairs.question: Worst
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To grow worse; to deteriorate.

qa_pairs.question: Worsted
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Well-twisted yarn spun of long-staple wool which has been combed to lay the fibers parallel, used for carpets, cloth, hosiery, gloves, and the like.

qa_pairs.question: Wort
qa_pairs.answer: It means A plant of any kind.

qa_pairs.question: Wort
qa_pairs.answer: It means An infusion of malt which is unfermented, or is in the act of fermentation; the sweet infusion of malt, which ferments and forms beer; hence, any similar liquid in a state of incipient fermentation.

qa_pairs.question: Worth
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To be; to become; to betide; -- now used only in the phrases, woe worth the day, woe worth the man, etc., in which the verb is in the imperative, and the nouns day, man, etc., are in the dative. Woe be to the day, woe be to the man, etc., are equivalent phrases.

qa_pairs.question: Worth
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Valuable; of worthy; estimable; also, worth while.

qa_pairs.question: Worth
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is That quality of a thing which renders it valuable or useful; sum of valuable qualities which render anything useful and sought; value; hence, often, value as expressed in a standard, as money; equivalent in exchange; price.

qa_pairs.question: Worthful
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Full of worth; worthy; deserving.

qa_pairs.question: Worthily
qa_pairs.answer: It means In a worthy manner; excellently; deservedly; according to merit; justly; suitably; becomingly.

qa_pairs.question: Worthiness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality or state of being worthy; desert; merit; excellence; dignity; virtue; worth.

qa_pairs.question: Worthless
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Destitute of worth; having no value, virtue, excellence, dignity, or the like; undeserving; valueless; useless; vile; mean; as, a worthless garment; a worthless ship; a worthless man or woman; a worthless magistrate.

qa_pairs.question: worthwhile
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Worth the time or effort spent.

qa_pairs.question: Worthy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having worth or excellence; possessing merit; valuable; deserving; estimable; excellent; virtuous.

qa_pairs.question: Worthy
qa_pairs.answer: It means A man of eminent worth or value; one distinguished for useful and estimable qualities; a person of conspicuous desert; -- much used in the plural; as, the worthies of the church; political worthies; military worthies.

qa_pairs.question: Worthy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To render worthy; to exalt into a hero.

qa_pairs.question: Wost
qa_pairs.answer: It means (2d pers. sing. pres.) of Wit, to know.

qa_pairs.question: Wot
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is (1st & 3d pers. sing. pres.) of Wit, to know. See the Note under Wit, (v.)

qa_pairs.question: Wotest
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as (2d pers. sing. pres.) of Wit, to know.

qa_pairs.question: Woteth
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is (3d pers. sing. pres.) of Wit, to know.

qa_pairs.question: Woul
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To howl.

qa_pairs.question: Would
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Commonly used as an auxiliary verb, either in the past tense or in the conditional or optative present. See 2d & 3d Will.

qa_pairs.question: Would
qa_pairs.answer: It means See 2d Weld.

qa_pairs.question: Would-be
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Desiring or professing to be; vainly pretending to be; as, a would-be poet.

qa_pairs.question: Woulding
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Emotion of desire; inclination; velleity.

qa_pairs.question: Wouldingness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Willingness; desire.

qa_pairs.question: Woulfe bottle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A kind of wash bottle with two or three necks; -- so called after the inventor, Peter Woulfe, an English chemist.

qa_pairs.question: Wound
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as (imp. & p. p.) of Wind to twist, and Wind to sound by blowing.

qa_pairs.question: Wound
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A hurt or injury caused by violence; specifically, a breach of the skin and flesh of an animal, or in the substance of any creature or living thing; a cut, stab, rent, or the like.

qa_pairs.question: Wound
qa_pairs.answer: It means To hurt by violence; to produce a breach, or separation of parts, in, as by a cut, stab, blow, or the like.

qa_pairs.question: Woundable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Capable of being wounded; vulnerable.

qa_pairs.question: Wounder
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who, or that which, wounds.

qa_pairs.question: Woundily
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In a woundy manner; excessively; woundy.

qa_pairs.question: Woundless
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Free from wound or hurt; exempt from being wounded; invulnerable.

qa_pairs.question: Woundwort
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any one of certain plants whose soft, downy leaves have been used for dressing wounds, as the kidney vetch, and several species of the labiate genus *Stachys*.

qa_pairs.question: Woundy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Excessive.

qa_pairs.question: Woundy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Excessively; extremely.

qa_pairs.question: Wourali
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Curare.

qa_pairs.question: Wou-wou
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The agile, or silvery, gibbon; -- called also camper. See Gibbon.

qa_pairs.question: Wove
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as (p. pr. & rare vb. n.) of Weave.

qa_pairs.question: Woven
qa_pairs.answer: It means (p. p.) of Weave.

qa_pairs.question: Wowe
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To woo.

qa_pairs.question: Wowf
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Disordered or unsettled in intellect; deranged.

qa_pairs.question: Wowke
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Week.

qa_pairs.question: Wow-wow
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Wou-wou.

qa_pairs.question: Wox
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is (imp.) of Wax.

qa_pairs.question: Woxen
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is (p. p.) of Wax.

qa_pairs.question: Wrack
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A thin, flying cloud; a rack.

qa_pairs.question: Wrack
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To rack; to torment.

qa_pairs.question: Wrack
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Wreck; ruin; destruction.

qa_pairs.question: Wrack
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To wreck.

qa_pairs.question: Wrackful
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Ruinous; destructive.

qa_pairs.question: Wrain-bolt
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Wringbolt.

qa_pairs.question: Wraith
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An apparition of a person in his exact likeness, seen before death, or a little after; hence, an apparition; a specter; a vision; an unreal image.

qa_pairs.question: Wrangle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To argue; to debate; to dispute.

qa_pairs.question: Wrangle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To involve in a quarrel or dispute; to embroil.

qa_pairs.question: Wrangle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An angry dispute; a noisy quarrel; a squabble; an altercation.

qa_pairs.question: Wrangler
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An angry disputant; one who disputes with heat or peevishness.

qa_pairs.question: Wranglership
qa_pairs.answer: It means The honor or position of being a wrangler at the University of Cambridge, England.

qa_pairs.question: Wranglesome
qa_pairs.answer: It means Contentious; quarrelsome.

qa_pairs.question: Wrannock
qa_pairs.answer: It means The common wren.

qa_pairs.question: Wrap
qa_pairs.answer: It means To snatch up; transport; -- chiefly used in the p. p. wrapt.

qa_pairs.question: Wrap
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To wind or fold together; to arrange in folds.

qa_pairs.question: Wrap
qa_pairs.answer: It means A wrapper; -- often used in the plural for blankets, furs, shawls, etc., used in riding or traveling.

qa_pairs.question: Wrappage
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of wrapping.

qa_pairs.question: Wrapper
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who, or that which, wraps.

qa_pairs.question: Wraprascal
qa_pairs.answer: It means A kind of coarse upper coat, or overcoat, formerly worn.

qa_pairs.question: Wrasse
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any one of numerous edible, marine, spiny-finned fishes of the genus *Labrus*, of which several species are found in the Mediterranean and on the Atlantic coast of Europe. Many of the species are bright-colored.

qa_pairs.question: Wrastle
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To wrestle.

qa_pairs.question: Wrath
qa_pairs.answer: It means Violent anger; vehement exasperation; indignation; rage; fury; ire.

qa_pairs.question: Wrath
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Wroth.

qa_pairs.question: Wrath
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To anger; to enrage; -- also used impersonally.

qa_pairs.question: Wrathful
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Full of wrath; very angry; greatly incensed; ireful; passionate; as, a wrathful man.

qa_pairs.question: Wrathily
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In a wrathy manner; very angrily; wrathfully.

qa_pairs.question: Wrathless
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Free from anger or wrath.

qa_pairs.question: Wrathy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Very angry.

qa_pairs.question: Wraw
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Angry; vexed; wrathful.

qa_pairs.question: Wrawful
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Ill-tempered.

qa_pairs.question: Wrawl
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To cry, as a cat; to waul.

qa_pairs.question: Wrawness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Peevishness; ill temper; anger.

qa_pairs.question: Wray
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To reveal; to disclose.

qa_pairs.question: Wreak
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To reck; to care.

qa_pairs.question: Wreak
qa_pairs.answer: It means To revenge; to avenge.

qa_pairs.question: Wreak
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Revenge; vengeance; furious passion; resentment.

qa_pairs.question: Wreaken
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as (p. p.) of Wreak.

qa_pairs.question: Wreaker
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Avenger.

qa_pairs.question: Wreakful
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Revengeful; angry; furious.

qa_pairs.question: Wreakless
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Unrevengeful; weak.

qa_pairs.question: Wreath
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Something twisted, intertwined, or curled; as, a wreath of smoke; a wreath of flowers.

qa_pairs.question: Wreathe
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To cause to revolve or writhe; to twist about; to turn.

qa_pairs.question: Wreathe
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To be intewoven or entwined; to twine together; as, a bower of wreathing trees.

qa_pairs.question: Wreathen
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Twisted; made into a wreath.

qa_pairs.question: Wreathless
qa_pairs.answer: It means Destitute of a wreath.

qa_pairs.question: Wreath-shell
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A marine shell of the genus *Turbo*. See Turbo.

qa_pairs.question: Wreathy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Wreathed; twisted; curled; spiral; also, full of wreaths.

qa_pairs.question: Wrecche
qa_pairs.answer: It means A wretch.

qa_pairs.question: Wrecche
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Wretched.

qa_pairs.question: Wreche
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Wreak.

qa_pairs.question: Wreck
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See 2d & 3d Wreak.

qa_pairs.question: Wreck
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The destruction or injury of a vessel by being cast on shore, or on rocks, or by being disabled or sunk by the force of winds or waves; shipwreck.

qa_pairs.question: Wreck
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To destroy, disable, or seriously damage, as a vessel, by driving it against the shore or on rocks, by causing it to become unseaworthy, to founder, or the like; to shipwreck.

qa_pairs.question: Wreck
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To suffer wreck or ruin.

qa_pairs.question: Wreckage
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of wrecking, or state of being wrecked.

qa_pairs.question: Wrecker
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who causes a wreck, as by false lights, and the like.

qa_pairs.question: Wreckfish
qa_pairs.answer: It means A stone bass.

qa_pairs.question: Wreckful
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Causing wreck; involving ruin; destructive.

qa_pairs.question: Wrecking
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is (a. & n.) from Wreck, (v.)

qa_pairs.question: Wreck-master
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A person appointed by law to take charge of goods, etc., thrown on shore after a shipwreck.

qa_pairs.question: Wreke
qa_pairs.answer: It means See 2d Wreak.

qa_pairs.question: Wren
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any one of numerous species of small singing birds belonging to *Troglodytes* and numerous allied of the family Troglodytidae.

qa_pairs.question: Wrench
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Trick; deceit; fraud; stratagem.

qa_pairs.question: Wrench
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To pull with a twist; to wrest, twist, or force by violence.

qa_pairs.question: Wrest
qa_pairs.answer: It means To turn; to twist; esp., to twist or extort by violence; to pull of force away by, or as if by, violent wringing or twisting.

qa_pairs.question: Wrest
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of wresting; a wrench; a violent twist; hence, distortion; perversion.

qa_pairs.question: Wrester
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who wrests.

qa_pairs.question: Wrestle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To contend, by grappling with, and striving to trip or throw down, an opponent; as, they wrestled skillfully.

qa_pairs.question: Wrestle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To wrestle with; to seek to throw down as in wrestling.

qa_pairs.question: Wrestle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A struggle between two persons to see which will throw the other down; a bout at wrestling; a wrestling match; a struggle.

qa_pairs.question: Wrestler
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who wrestles; one who is skillful in wrestling.

qa_pairs.question: Wrestling
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Act of one who wrestles; specif., the sport consisting of the hand-to-hand combat between two unarmed contestants who seek to throw each other.

qa_pairs.question: Wretch
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A miserable person; one profoundly unhappy.

qa_pairs.question: Wretched
qa_pairs.answer: It means Very miserable; sunk in, or accompanied by, deep affliction or distress, as from want, anxiety, or grief; calamitous; woeful; very afflicting.

qa_pairs.question: Wretchedly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In a wretched manner; miserably; despicable.

qa_pairs.question: Wretchedness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being wretched; utter misery.

qa_pairs.question: Wretchful
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Wretched.

qa_pairs.question: Wretchless
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Reckless; hence, disregarded.

qa_pairs.question: Wrey
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Wray.

qa_pairs.question: Wrie
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Wry.

qa_pairs.question: Wrig
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To wriggle.

qa_pairs.question: Wriggle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To move the body to and fro with short, writhing motions, like a worm; to squirm; to twist uneasily or quickly about.

qa_pairs.question: Wriggle
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To move with short, quick contortions; to move by twisting and squirming; like a worm.

qa_pairs.question: Wriggle
qa_pairs.answer: It means Wriggling; frisky; pliant; flexible.

qa_pairs.question: Wriggle
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Act of wriggling; a short or quick writhing motion or contortion.

qa_pairs.question: Wriggler
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who, or that which, wriggles.

qa_pairs.question: Wright
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who is engaged in a mechanical or manufacturing business; an artificer; a workman; a manufacturer; a mechanic; esp., a worker in wood; -- now chiefly used in compounds, as in millwright, wheelwright, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Wrightine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A rare alkaloid found in the bark of an East Indian apocynaceous tree (Wrightia antidysenterica), and extracted as a bitter white crystalline substance. It was formerly used as a remedy for diarrh<oe/a. Called also also known as conessine, and also known as neriine.

qa_pairs.question: Wring
qa_pairs.answer: It means To twist and compress; to turn and strain with violence; to writhe; to squeeze hard; to pinch; as, to wring clothes in washing.

qa_pairs.question: Wring
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To writhe; to twist, as with anguish.

qa_pairs.question: Wring
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A writhing, as in anguish; a twisting; a griping.

qa_pairs.question: Wringbolt
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A bolt used by shipwrights, to bend and secure the planks against the timbers till they are fastened by bolts, spikes, or treenails; -- not to be confounded with ringbolt.

qa_pairs.question: Wringer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who, or that which, wrings; hence, an extortioner.

qa_pairs.question: Wringing
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is (a. & n.) from Wring, (v.)

qa_pairs.question: Wringstaff
qa_pairs.answer: It means A strong piece of plank used in applying wringbolts.

qa_pairs.question: Wrinkle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A winkle.

qa_pairs.question: Wrinkle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A small ridge, prominence, or furrow formed by the shrinking or contraction of any smooth substance; a corrugation; a crease; a slight fold; as, wrinkle in the skin; a wrinkle in cloth.

qa_pairs.question: Wrinkle
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To contract into furrows and prominences; to make a wrinkle or wrinkles in; to corrugate; as, wrinkle the skin or the brow.

qa_pairs.question: Wrinkle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To shrink into furrows and ridges.

qa_pairs.question: Wrinkly
qa_pairs.answer: It means Full of wrinkles; having a tendency to be wrinkled; corrugated; puckered.

qa_pairs.question: Wrist
qa_pairs.answer: It means The joint, or the region of the joint, between the hand and the arm; the carpus. See Carpus.

qa_pairs.question: Wristband
qa_pairs.answer: It means The band of the sleeve of a shirt, or other garment, which covers the wrist.

qa_pairs.question: Wrister
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A covering for the wrist.

qa_pairs.question: Wristlet
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An elastic band worn around the wrist, as for the purpose of securing the upper part of a glove.

qa_pairs.question: Writ
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is (3d pers. sing. pres.) of Write, for writeth.

qa_pairs.question: Writ
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is (imp. & p. p.) of Write.

qa_pairs.question: Writ
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That which is written; writing; scripture; -- applied especially to the Scriptures, or the books of the Old and New testaments; as, sacred writ.

qa_pairs.question: Writability
qa_pairs.answer: It means Ability or capacity to write.

qa_pairs.question: Writable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Capable of, or suitable for, being written down.

qa_pairs.question: Writative
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Inclined to much writing; -- correlative to talkative.

qa_pairs.question: Write
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To set down, as legible characters; to form the conveyance of meaning; to inscribe on any material by a suitable instrument; as, to write the characters called letters; to write figures.

qa_pairs.question: Write
qa_pairs.answer: It means To form characters, letters, or figures, as representative of sounds or ideas; to express words and sentences by written signs.

qa_pairs.question: Writer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who writes, or has written; a scribe; a clerk.

qa_pairs.question: Writership
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The office of a writer.

qa_pairs.question: Writhe
qa_pairs.answer: It means To twist; to turn; now, usually, to twist or turn so as to distort; to wring.

qa_pairs.question: Writhe
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To twist or contort the body; to be distorted; as, to writhe with agony. Also used figuratively.

qa_pairs.question: Writhen
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having a twisted distorted from.

qa_pairs.question: Writhle
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To wrinkle.

qa_pairs.question: Writing
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act or art of forming letters and characters on paper, wood, stone, or other material, for the purpose of recording the ideas which characters and words express, or of communicating them to others by visible signs.

qa_pairs.question: Written
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as (p. p.) of Write, (v.)

qa_pairs.question: Wrizzle
qa_pairs.answer: It means To wrinkle.

qa_pairs.question: Wroken
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as (p. p.) of Wreak.

qa_pairs.question: Wrong
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is (imp.) of Wring. Wrung.

qa_pairs.question: Wrong
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Twisted; wry; as, a wrong nose.

qa_pairs.question: Wrong
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In a wrong manner; not rightly; amiss; morally ill; erroneously; wrongly.

qa_pairs.question: Wrong
qa_pairs.answer: It means That which is not right.

qa_pairs.question: Wrong
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To treat with injustice; to deprive of some right, or to withhold some act of justice from; to do undeserved harm to; to deal unjustly with; to injure.

qa_pairs.question: Wrongdoer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who injures another, or who does wrong.

qa_pairs.question: Wrongdoing
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Evil or wicked behavior or action.

qa_pairs.question: Wronger
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who wrongs or injures another.

qa_pairs.question: Wrongful
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Full of wrong; injurious; unjust; unfair; as, a wrongful taking of property; wrongful dealing.

qa_pairs.question: Wronghead
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A person of a perverse understanding or obstinate character.

qa_pairs.question: Wronghead
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Wrongheaded.

qa_pairs.question: Wrongheaded
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Wrong in opinion or principle; having a perverse understanding; perverse.

qa_pairs.question: Wrongless
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not wrong; void or free from wrong.

qa_pairs.question: Wrongly
qa_pairs.answer: It means In a wrong manner; unjustly; erroneously; wrong; amiss; as, he judges wrongly of my motives.

qa_pairs.question: Wrongness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality or state of being wrong; wrongfulness; error; fault.

qa_pairs.question: Wrongous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Constituting, or of the nature of, a wrong; unjust; wrongful.

qa_pairs.question: Wrong-timed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Done at an improper time; ill-timed.

qa_pairs.question: Wroot
qa_pairs.answer: It means (imp.) of Write. Wrote.

qa_pairs.question: Wrote
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To root with the snout. See 1st Root.

qa_pairs.question: Wrote
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is (imp. & archaic p. p.) of Write.

qa_pairs.question: Wroth
qa_pairs.answer: It means Full of wrath; angry; incensed; much exasperated; wrathful.

qa_pairs.question: Wrought
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as (imp. & p. p.) of Work; as, What hath God wrought?.

qa_pairs.question: Wrought
qa_pairs.answer: It means Worked; elaborated; not rough or crude.

qa_pairs.question: Wrung
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as (imp. & p. p.) of Wring.

qa_pairs.question: Wry
qa_pairs.answer: It means To cover.

qa_pairs.question: Wry
qa_pairs.answer: It means Turned to one side; twisted; distorted; as, a wry mouth.

qa_pairs.question: Wry
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To twist; to writhe; to bend or wind.

qa_pairs.question: Wry
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To twist; to distort; to writhe; to wrest; to vex.

qa_pairs.question: Wrybill
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Crookbill.

qa_pairs.question: Wrymouth
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any one of several species of large, elongated, marine fishes of the genus *Cryptacanthodes*, especially Cryptacanthodes maculatus of the American coast. A whitish variety is called ghostfish.

qa_pairs.question: Wryneck
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A twisted or distorted neck; a deformity in which the neck is drawn to one side by a rigid contraction of one of the muscles of the neck; torticollis.

qa_pairs.question: Wrynecked
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having a distorted neck; having the deformity called wryneck{1}.

qa_pairs.question: Wryness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being wry, or distorted.

qa_pairs.question: Wrythen
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Writhen.

qa_pairs.question: Wulfenite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Native lead molybdate occurring in tetragonal crystals, usually tabular, and of a bright orange-yellow to red, gray, or brown color; -- also called also known as yellow lead ore.

qa_pairs.question: Wull
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See 2d Will.

qa_pairs.question: Wung-out
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having the sails set in the manner called wing-and-wing.

qa_pairs.question: Wurbagool
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A fruit bat (Pteropus medius) native of India. It is similar to the flying fox, but smaller.

qa_pairs.question: Wurmal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Wormil.

qa_pairs.question: Wurraluh
qa_pairs.answer: It means The Australian white-quilled honey eater (Entomyza albipennis).

qa_pairs.question: Wust
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is (imp.) of Wit.

qa_pairs.question: Wyandots
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Hurons.

qa_pairs.question: Wych-elm
qa_pairs.answer: It means A species of elm (Ulmus montana) found in Northern and Western Europe; Scotch elm.

qa_pairs.question: Wych-hazel
qa_pairs.answer: It means The wych-elm; -- so called because its leaves are like those of the hazel.

qa_pairs.question: Wyclifite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A follower of Wyclif, the English reformer; a Lollard.

qa_pairs.question: Wyd
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Wide.

qa_pairs.question: Wye
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The letter Y.

qa_pairs.question: Wyke
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Week.

qa_pairs.question: Wyla
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A helmeted Australian cockatoo (Calyptorhynchus funereus); -- called also also known as funeral cockatoo.

qa_pairs.question: Wyn
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of the runes (a. d. 1280 at first by _uu_, later by _w._

qa_pairs.question: Wynd
qa_pairs.answer: It means A narrow lane or alley.

qa_pairs.question: Wynkernel
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The European moor hen.

qa_pairs.question: Wynn
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A kind of timber truck, or carriage.

qa_pairs.question: Wype
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The wipe, or lapwing.

qa_pairs.question: Wys
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Wise.

qa_pairs.question: Wythe
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Withe, (n.), 4.

qa_pairs.question: Wyte
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is (pl. pres.) of Wit.

qa_pairs.question: Wyvern
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Wiver.

qa_pairs.question: U
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is the twenty-first letter of the English alphabet, is a cursive form of the letter V, with which it was formerly used interchangeably, both letters being then used both as vowels and consonants. U and V are now, however, differentiated, U being used only as a vowel or semivowel, and V only as a consonant. The true primary vowel sound of U, in Anglo-Saxon, was the sound which it still retains in most of the languages of Europe, that of long oo, as in tool, and short oo, as in wood, answering to the French ou in tour. Etymologically U is most closely related to o, y (vowel), w, and v; as in two, duet, dyad, twice; top, tuft; sop, sup; auspice, aviary. See V, also O and Y.

qa_pairs.question: Uakari
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Ouakari.

qa_pairs.question: Uberous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Fruitful; copious; abundant; plentiful.

qa_pairs.question: Uberty
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Fruitfulness; copiousness; abundance; plenty.

qa_pairs.question: Ubication
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or state of being in a place; local relation; position or location; whereness.

qa_pairs.question: Ubiquarian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Ubiquitous.

qa_pairs.question: Ubiquist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of a school of Lutheran divines which held that the body of Christ is present everywhere, and especially in the eucharist, in virtue of his omnipresence. Called also also known as ubiquitist, and also known as ubiquitary.

qa_pairs.question: Ubiquitariness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Quality or state of being ubiquitary, or ubiquitous.

qa_pairs.question: Ubiquitary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Ubiquitous.

qa_pairs.question: Ubiquitary
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who exists everywhere.

qa_pairs.question: Ubiquitist
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Ubiquist.

qa_pairs.question: Ubiquitous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Existing or being everywhere, or in all places, at the same time; omnipresent.

qa_pairs.question: Ubiquity
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Existence everywhere, or in all places, at the same time; omnipresence; as, the ubiquity of God is not disputed by those who admit his existence.

qa_pairs.question: Uchees
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A tribe of North American Indians belonging to the Creek confederation.

qa_pairs.question: Uckewallist
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of a sect of rigid Anabaptists, which originated in 1637, and whose tenets were essentially the same as those of the Mennonists. In addition, however, they held that Judas and the murderers of Christ were saved. So called from the founder of the sect, Ucke Wallis, a native of Friesland.

qa_pairs.question: Udal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Vars. of Odal, etc.; property held by udal, or allodial, right -- Obs. exc. in Shetland and the Orkney Islands, where udal designates a freehold, land held in fee simple without any charter and free of any feudal character.

qa_pairs.question: Udal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Allodial; -- a term used in Finland, Shetland, and Orkney. See Allodial.

qa_pairs.question: Udaler
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In the Shetland and Orkney Islands, one who holds property by udal, or allodial, right.

qa_pairs.question: Udder
qa_pairs.answer: It means The glandular organ in which milk is secreted and stored; -- popularly called the also known as bag in cows and other quadrupeds. See Mamma.

qa_pairs.question: Uddered
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having an udder or udders.

qa_pairs.question: Udderless
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Destitute or deprived of an udder.

qa_pairs.question: Udometer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A rain gauge.

qa_pairs.question: Ugh
qa_pairs.answer: It means An exclamation expressive of disgust, horror, or recoil. Its utterance is usually accompanied by a shudder.

qa_pairs.question: Uglesome
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Ugly.

qa_pairs.question: Uglify
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To disfigure; to make ugly.

qa_pairs.question: Uglily
qa_pairs.answer: It means In an ugly manner; with deformity.

qa_pairs.question: Ugliness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or state of being ugly.

qa_pairs.question: Ugly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Offensive to the sight; contrary to beauty; being of disagreeable or loathsome aspect; unsightly; repulsive; deformed.

qa_pairs.question: Ugly
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A shade for the face, projecting from the bonnet.

qa_pairs.question: Ugly
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To make ugly.

qa_pairs.question: Ugrian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A Mongolian race, ancestors of the Finns.

qa_pairs.question: Ugsome
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Ugly; offensive; loathsome.

qa_pairs.question: Uhlan
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of a certain description of militia among the Tartars.

qa_pairs.question: Uintatherium
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An extinct genus of large Eocene ungulates allied to Dinoceras. This name is sometimes used for nearly all the known species of the group. See Dinoceras.

qa_pairs.question: Uitlander
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A foreigner; an outlander.

qa_pairs.question: Ukase
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In Russia, a published proclamation or imperial order, having the force of law.

qa_pairs.question: Ulan
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Uhlan.

qa_pairs.question: Ularburong
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A large East Indian nocturnal tree snake (Dipsas dendrophila). It is not venomous.

qa_pairs.question: Ulcer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A solution of continuity in any of the soft parts of the body, discharging purulent matter, found on a surface, especially one of the natural surfaces of the body, and originating generally in a constitutional disorder; a sore discharging pus. It is distinguished from an abscess, which has its beginning, at least, in the depth of the tissues.

qa_pairs.question: Ulcer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To ulcerate.

qa_pairs.question: Ulcerable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Capable of ulcerating.

qa_pairs.question: Ulcerate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To be formed into an ulcer; to become ulcerous.

qa_pairs.question: Ulcerate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To affect with, or as with, an ulcer or ulcers.

qa_pairs.question: Ulcerated
qa_pairs.answer: It means Affected with, or as with, an ulcer or ulcers; as, an ulcerated sore throat.

qa_pairs.question: Ulceration
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The process of forming an ulcer, or of becoming ulcerous; the state of being ulcerated; also, an ulcer.

qa_pairs.question: Ulcerative
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to ulcers; as, an ulcerative process.

qa_pairs.question: Ulcered
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Ulcerous; ulcerated.

qa_pairs.question: Ulcerous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having the nature or character of an ulcer; discharging purulent or other matter.

qa_pairs.question: Ulcuscle
qa_pairs.answer: It means A little ulcer.

qa_pairs.question: Ule
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A Mexican and Central American tree (Castilloa elastica and Castilloa Markhamiana) related to the breadfruit tree. Its milky juice contains caoutchouc. Called also also known as ule tree.

qa_pairs.question: Ulema
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A college or body composed of the hierarchy (the imams, or ministers of religion, the muftis, or doctors of law, and the cadis, or administrators of justice). That of Turkey alone now has political power; its head is the sheik ul Islam.

qa_pairs.question: Ulexite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A mineral occurring in white rounded crystalline masses. It is a hydrous borate of lime and soda.

qa_pairs.question: Uliginose
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Muddy; oozy; slimy; also, growing in muddy places.

qa_pairs.question: ullage
qa_pairs.answer: It means The amount which a vessel, as a cask, of liquor lacks of being full; wantage; deficiency.

qa_pairs.question: ullet
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A European owl (Syrnium aluco) of a tawny color; -- called also also known as uluia.

qa_pairs.question: Ullmannite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A brittle mineral of a steel-gray color and metallic luster, containing antimony, arsenic, sulphur, and nickel.

qa_pairs.question: Ulluco
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Melluc<?/o.

qa_pairs.question: Ulmaceous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to a suborder of urticaceous plants, of which the elm is the type.

qa_pairs.question: Ulmate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A salt of ulmic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Ulmic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Pertaining to ulmin; designating an acid obtained from ulmin.

qa_pairs.question: Ulmin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A brown amorphous substance found in decaying vegetation. Cf. Humin.

qa_pairs.question: Ulmus
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of trees including the elm.

qa_pairs.question: Ulna
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The postaxial bone of the forearm, or brachium, corresponding to the fibula of the hind limb. See Radius.

qa_pairs.question: Ulnage
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Measurement by the ell; alnage.

qa_pairs.question: Ulnar
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the ulna, or the elbow; as, the ulnar nerve.

qa_pairs.question: Ulnare
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of the bones or cartilages of the carpus, which articulates with the ulna and corresponds to the cuneiform in man.

qa_pairs.question: Ulodendron
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of fossil trees.

qa_pairs.question: Uloid
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Resembling a scar; scarlike.

qa_pairs.question: Ulonata
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A division of insects nearly equivalent to the true Orthoptera.

qa_pairs.question: Ulotrichan
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to the Ulotrichi.

qa_pairs.question: Ulotrichi
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The division of mankind which embraces the races having woolly or crispy hair. Cf. Leiotrichi.

qa_pairs.question: Ulotrichous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having woolly or crispy hair; -- opposed to leiotrichous.

qa_pairs.question: Ulster
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A long, loose overcoat, worn by men and women, originally made of frieze from Ulster, Ireland.

qa_pairs.question: Ulterior
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Situated beyond, or on the farther side; thither; -- correlative with hither.

qa_pairs.question: Ulterior
qa_pairs.answer: It means Ulterior side or part.

qa_pairs.question: Ulteriorly
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is More distantly or remotely.

qa_pairs.question: Ultima
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Most remote; furthest; final; last.

qa_pairs.question: Ultima
qa_pairs.answer: It means The last syllable of a word.

qa_pairs.question: Ultimate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Farthest; most remote in space or time; extreme; last; final.

qa_pairs.question: Ultimate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To come or bring to an end or issue; to eventuate; to end.

qa_pairs.question: Ultimately
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is As a final consequence; at last; in the end; as, afflictions often tend to correct immoral habits, and ultimately prove blessings.

qa_pairs.question: Ultimation
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is State of being ultimate; that which is ultimate, or final; ultimatum.

qa_pairs.question: Ultimatum
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A final proposition, concession, or condition; especially, the final propositions, conditions, or terms, offered by either of the parties in a diplomatic negotiation; the most favorable terms that a negotiator can offer, the rejection of which usually puts an end to the hesitation.

qa_pairs.question: Ultime
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Ultimate; final.

qa_pairs.question: Ultimity
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The last stage or consequence; finality.

qa_pairs.question: Ultimo
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In the month immediately preceding the present; as, on the 1st ultimo; -- usually abbreviated to ult. Cf. Proximo.

qa_pairs.question: Ultion
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of taking vengeance; revenge.

qa_pairs.question: Ultra-
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A prefix from the Latin ultra beyond (see Ulterior), having in composition the signification beyond, on the other side, chiefly when joined with words expressing relations of place; as, ultramarine, ultramontane, ultramundane, ultratropical, etc. In other relations it has the sense of excessively, exceedingly, beyond what is common, natural, right, or proper; as, ultraconservative; ultrademocratic, ultradespotic, ultraliberal, ultraradical, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Ultra
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Going beyond others, or beyond due limit; extreme; fanatical; uncompromising; as, an ultra reformer; ultra measures.

qa_pairs.question: Ultra
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who advocates extreme measures; an ultraist; an extremist; a radical.

qa_pairs.question: Ultragaseous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having the properties exhibited by gases under very low pressures (one millionth of an atmosphere or less). Matter under this condition, which has been termed the fourth state of matter, is sometimes called radiant matter.

qa_pairs.question: Ultrage
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Outrage.

qa_pairs.question: Ultraism
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The principles of those who advocate extreme measures, as radical reform, and the like.

qa_pairs.question: Ultraist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who pushes a principle or measure to extremes; an extremist; a radical; an ultra.

qa_pairs.question: Ultramarine
qa_pairs.answer: It means Situated or being beyond the sea.

qa_pairs.question: Ultramarine
qa_pairs.answer: It means A blue pigment formerly obtained by powdering lapis lazuli, but now produced in large quantities by fusing together silica, alumina, soda, and sulphur, thus forming a glass, colored blue by the sodium polysulphides made in the fusion. Also used adjectively.

qa_pairs.question: Ultramontane
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Being beyond the mountains; specifically, being beyond the Alps, in respect to the one who speaks.

qa_pairs.question: Ultramontane
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who resides beyond the mountains, especially beyond the Alps; a foreigner.

qa_pairs.question: Ultramontanism
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The principles of those within the Roman Catholic Church who maintain extreme views favoring the pope's supremacy; -- so used by those living north of the Alps in reference to the Italians; -- rarely used in an opposite sense, as referring to the views of those living north of the Alps and opposed to the papal claims. Cf. Gallicanism.

qa_pairs.question: Ultramontanist
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who upholds ultramontanism.

qa_pairs.question: Ultramundane
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Being beyond the world, or beyond the limits of our system.

qa_pairs.question: Ultrared
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Situated beyond or below the red rays; as, the ultrated rays of the spectrum, which are less refrangible than the red.

qa_pairs.question: Ultratropical
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Situated beyond, or outside of, the tropics; extratropical; also, having an excessively tropical temperature; warmer than the tropics.

qa_pairs.question: Ultraviolet
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Lying outside the visible spectrum at its blue-violet end; -- said of light more refrangible (i. e. having a shorter wavelength) than the extreme violet rays of the visible spectrum. Electromagnetic radiation with wavelengths shorter than those of ultrviolet light are not usually considered as light waves, but are classified differently. The ultraviolet region of the electromagnetic spectrum is generally considered as comprising those electromagnetic emissions with wavelengths lying between those of visible light and those of X-rays, i. e. between 4000 Angstroms and 100 Angstroms.

qa_pairs.question: Ultra vires
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Beyond power; transcending authority; -- a phrase used frequently in relation to acts or enactments by corporations in excess of their chartered or statutory rights.

qa_pairs.question: Ultrazodiacal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Outside the zodiac; being in that part of the heavens that is more than eight degrees from the ecliptic; as, ultrazodiacal planets, that is, those planets which in part of their orbits go beyond the zodiac.

qa_pairs.question: Ultroneous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Spontaneous; voluntary.

qa_pairs.question: Ulula
qa_pairs.answer: It means A genus of owls including the great gray owl (Ulula cinerea) of Arctic America, and other similar species. See Illust. of Owl.

qa_pairs.question: Ululant
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Howling; wailing.

qa_pairs.question: Ululate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To howl, as a dog or a wolf; to wail; as, ululating jackals.

qa_pairs.question: Ululation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A howling, as of a dog or wolf; a wailing.

qa_pairs.question: Ulva
qa_pairs.answer: It means A genus of thin papery bright green seaweeds including the kinds called sea lettuce.

qa_pairs.question: Umbe
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is About.

qa_pairs.question: Umbecast
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To cast about; to consider; to ponder.

qa_pairs.question: Umbel
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A kind of flower cluster in which the flower stalks radiate from a common point, as in the carrot and milkweed. It is simple or compound; in the latter case, each peduncle bears another little umbel, called umbellet, or umbellule.

qa_pairs.question: Umbellar
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to an umbel; having the form of an umbel.

qa_pairs.question: Umbellate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Bearing umbels; pertaining to an umbel; umbel-like; as, umbellate plants or flowers.

qa_pairs.question: Umbellet
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A small or partial umbel; an umbellule.

qa_pairs.question: Umbellic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or obtained from, certain umbelliferous plants; as, umbellic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Umbellifer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A plant producing an umbel or umbels.

qa_pairs.question: Umbelliferone
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A tasteless white crystalline substance, C9H6O3, found in the bark of a certain plant (Daphne Mezereum), and also obtained by the distillation of certain gums from the Umbelliferae, as galbanum, asafetida, etc. It is analogous to coumarin. Called also also known as hydroxy-coumarin. Its strong fluorescence under ultraviolet light makes it useful in analytical biochemistry, as, for example, to detect phosphatase activity by hydrolysis of umbelliferyl phosphate.

qa_pairs.question: Umbelliferous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Producing umbels.

qa_pairs.question: Umbellularia
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus of deep-sea alcyonaria consisting of a cluster of large flowerlike polyps situated at the summit of a long, slender stem which stands upright in the mud, supported by a bulbous base.

qa_pairs.question: Umbellule
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An umbellet.

qa_pairs.question: Umber
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A brown or reddish pigment used in both oil and water colors, obtained from certain natural clays variously colored by the oxides of iron and manganese. It is commonly heated or burned before being used, and is then called burnt umber; when not heated, it is called raw umber. See Burnt umber, below.

qa_pairs.question: Umber
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to umber; resembling umber; olive-brown; dark brown; dark; dusky.

qa_pairs.question: Umber
qa_pairs.answer: It means To color with umber; to shade or darken; as, to umber over one's face.

qa_pairs.question: Umbery
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to umber; like umber; as, umbery gold.

qa_pairs.question: Umbilic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The navel; the center.

qa_pairs.question: Umbilic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Umbilical, 1.

qa_pairs.question: Umbilical
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to an umbilicus, or umbilical cord; umbilic.

qa_pairs.question: Umbilicate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Depressed in the middle, like a navel, as a flower, fruit, or leaf; navel-shaped; having an umbilicus; as, an umbilicated smallpox vesicle.

qa_pairs.question: Umbilication
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A slight, navel-like depression, or dimpling, of the center of a rounded body; as, the umbilication of a smallpox vesicle; also, the condition of being umbilicated.

qa_pairs.question: Umbilicus
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The depression, or mark, in the median line of the abdomen, which indicates the point where the umbilical cord separated from the fetus; the navel; the belly button, in humans.

qa_pairs.question: Umble pie
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A pie made of umbles. See To eat humble pie, under Humble.

qa_pairs.question: Umbles
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The entrails and coarser parts of a deer; hence, sometimes, entrails, in general.

qa_pairs.question: Umbo
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The boss of a shield, at or near the middle, and usually projecting, sometimes in a sharp spike.

qa_pairs.question: Umbonate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having a conical or rounded projection or protuberance, like a boss.

qa_pairs.question: Umbra
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The conical shadow projected from a planet or satellite, on the side opposite to the sun, within which a spectator could see no portion of the sun's disk; -- used in contradistinction from penumbra. See Penumbra.

qa_pairs.question: Umbraculiferous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Bearing something like an open umbrella.

qa_pairs.question: Umbraculiform
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having the form of anything that serves to shade, as a tree top, an umbrella, and the like; specifically (Bot.), having the form of an umbrella; umbrella-shaped.

qa_pairs.question: Umbrage
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Shade; shadow; obscurity; hence, that which affords a shade, as a screen of trees or foliage.

qa_pairs.question: umbrageous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Forming or affording a shade; shady; shaded; as, umbrageous trees or foliage.

qa_pairs.question: Umbrate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To shade; to shadow; to foreshadow.

qa_pairs.question: Umbratic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the shade or darkness; shadowy; unreal; secluded; retired.

qa_pairs.question: Umbratile
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Umbratic.

qa_pairs.question: Umbratious
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Suspicious; captious; disposed to take umbrage.

qa_pairs.question: Umbre
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Umber.

qa_pairs.question: Umbrel
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An umbrella.

qa_pairs.question: Umbrella
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A shade, screen, or guard, carried in the hand for sheltering the person from the rays of the sun, or from rain or snow. It is formed of silk, cotton, or other fabric, extended on strips of whalebone, steel, or other elastic material, inserted in, or fastened to, a rod or stick by means of pivots or hinges, in such a way as to allow of being opened and closed with ease. See Parasol.

qa_pairs.question: Umbrere
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In ancient armor, a visor, or projection like the peak of a cap, to which a face guard was sometimes attached. This was sometimes fixed, and sometimes moved freely upon the helmet and could be raised like the beaver. Called also also known as umber, and umbril.

qa_pairs.question: Umbrette
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Umber, 4.

qa_pairs.question: Umbriferous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Casting or making a shade; umbrageous.

qa_pairs.question: umbril
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An umbrere.

qa_pairs.question: umbrine
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Umbra, 2.

qa_pairs.question: Umbrose
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Shady; umbrageous.

qa_pairs.question: Umbrosity
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being umbrose; shadiness.

qa_pairs.question: umhofo
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An African two-horned rhinoceros (Atelodus simus or Rhinoceros simus); -- called also also known as chukuru, and also known as white rhinoceros.

qa_pairs.question: umlaut
qa_pairs.answer: It means The euphonic modification of a root vowel sound by the influence of _a_, _u_, or especially _i_, in the syllable which formerly followed.

qa_pairs.question: Umlauted
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having the umlaut; as, umlauted vowels.

qa_pairs.question: Umpirage
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The office of an umpire; the power, right, or authority of an umpire to decide.

qa_pairs.question: Umpire
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A person to whose sole decision a controversy or question between parties is referred; especially, one chosen to see that the rules of a game, as cricket, baseball, or the like, are strictly observed.

qa_pairs.question: Umpire
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To decide as umpire; to arbitrate; to settle, as a dispute.

qa_pairs.question: Umpire
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To act as umpire or arbitrator.

qa_pairs.question: Umpireship
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Umpirage; arbitrament.

qa_pairs.question: Umpress
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Female umpire.

qa_pairs.question: umpteen
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An indefinite number, usu. more than ten and less than one hundred; a lot. Often used hyperbolically, and usually expressing the notion of more than the usual number or more than I would like.

qa_pairs.question: umpteenth
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Ordinal of umpteen, with corresponding signification; as, for the umpteenth time, I'm telling you to stop.

qa_pairs.question: umquhile
qa_pairs.answer: It means Some time ago; formerly.

qa_pairs.question: Un-
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An inseparable verbal prefix or particle. It is prefixed: (a) To verbs to express the contrary, and not the simple negative, of the action of the verb to which it is prefixed; as in unbend, uncoil, undo, unfold. (b) To nouns to form verbs expressing privation of the thing, quality, or state expressed by the noun, or separation from it; as in unchild, unsex. Sometimes particles and participial adjectives formed with this prefix coincide in form with compounds of the negative prefix un- (see 2d Un-); as in undone (from undo), meaning unfastened, ruined; and undone (from 2d un- and done) meaning not done, not finished. Un- is sometimes used with an intensive force merely; as in unloose.

qa_pairs.question: Un-
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An inseparable prefix, or particle, signifying not; in-; non-. In- is prefixed mostly to words of Latin origin, or else to words formed by Latin suffixes; un- is of much wider application, and is attached at will to almost any adjective, or participle used adjectively, or adverb, from which it may be desired to form a corresponding negative adjective or adverb, and is also, but less freely, prefixed to nouns. Un- sometimes has merely an intensive force; as in unmerciless, unremorseless.

qa_pairs.question: Unabolishable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See abolishable.

qa_pairs.question: Undrainable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See drainable.

qa_pairs.question: Unhigh
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See high.

qa_pairs.question: Unobnoxious
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See obnoxious.

qa_pairs.question: Unabased
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See abased.

qa_pairs.question: Unaccommodating
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See accommodating.

qa_pairs.question: Unability
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Inability.

qa_pairs.question: Unable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not able; not having sufficient strength, means, knowledge, skill, or the like; impotent; weak; helpless; incapable; -- now usually followed by an infinitive or an adverbial phrase; as, unable for work; unable to bear fatigue.

qa_pairs.question: Unabled
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Disabled.

qa_pairs.question: Unableness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Inability.

qa_pairs.question: Una boat
qa_pairs.answer: It means The English name for a catboat; -- so called because Una was the name of the first boat of this kind taken to England.

qa_pairs.question: Unabridged
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not abridged, or shortened; full; complete; entire; whole.

qa_pairs.question: Unabsorbable
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not absorbable; specifically (Physiol.), not capable of absorption; unable to pass by osmosis into the circulating blood; as, the unabsorbable portion of food.

qa_pairs.question: Unacceptability
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality of being unacceptable; unacceptableness.

qa_pairs.question: Unacceptable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not acceptable; not pleasing; not welcome; unpleasant; disagreeable; displeasing; offensive.

qa_pairs.question: Unaccessible
qa_pairs.answer: It means Inaccessible.

qa_pairs.question: Unaccomplished
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not accomplished or performed; unfinished; also, deficient in accomplishment; unrefined.

qa_pairs.question: Unaccomplishment
qa_pairs.answer: It means The state of being unaccomplished.

qa_pairs.question: Unaccountability
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being unaccountable.

qa_pairs.question: Unaccountable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not accountable or responsible; free from control.

qa_pairs.question: Unaccurate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Inaccurate.

qa_pairs.question: Unaccurateness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Inaccuracy.

qa_pairs.question: Unaccustomed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not used; not habituated; unfamiliar; unused; -- with to.

qa_pairs.question: Unacquaintance
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality or state of being unacquainted; want of acquaintance; ignorance.

qa_pairs.question: Unacquainted
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not acquainted.

qa_pairs.question: Unacquaintedness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Unacquaintance.

qa_pairs.question: Unactive
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Inactive; listless.

qa_pairs.question: Unactive
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To render inactive or listless.

qa_pairs.question: Unactiveness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Inactivity.

qa_pairs.question: Unadmissible
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Inadmissible.

qa_pairs.question: Unadulterate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not adulterated; pure.

qa_pairs.question: Unadvisable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not advisable; inadvisable; inexpedient.

qa_pairs.question: Unadvised
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not prudent; not discreet; ill advised.

qa_pairs.question: Unaffected
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not affected or moved; destitute of affection or emotion; uninfluenced.

qa_pairs.question: Unafiled
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Undefiled.

qa_pairs.question: Unagreeable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Disagreeable.

qa_pairs.question: Unaidable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Incapable of being aided.

qa_pairs.question: Unalienable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Inalienable; as, unalienable rights.

qa_pairs.question: Unalist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An ecclesiastic who holds but one benefice; -- distinguished from pluralist.

qa_pairs.question: Unallied
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not allied; having no ally; having no connection or relation; as, unallied species or genera.

qa_pairs.question: Unalloyed
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not alloyed; not reduced by foreign admixture; unmixed; unqualified; pure; as, unalloyed metals; unalloyed happiness.

qa_pairs.question: Unalmsed
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not having received alms.

qa_pairs.question: Unambiguity
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Absence of ambiguity; clearness; perspicuity.

qa_pairs.question: Unambition
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The absence of ambition.

qa_pairs.question: Unamiability
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being unamiable; moroseness.

qa_pairs.question: Unamiable
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not amiable; morose; ill-natured; repulsive.

qa_pairs.question: Unanchor
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To loose from the anchor, as a ship.

qa_pairs.question: Unaneled
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not aneled; not having received extreme unction.

qa_pairs.question: Unanimate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Unanimous.

qa_pairs.question: Unanimity
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality or state of being unanimous.

qa_pairs.question: Unanimous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Being of one mind; agreeing in opinion, design, or determination; consentient; not discordant or dissentient; harmonious; as, the assembly was unanimous; the members of the council were unanimous.

qa_pairs.question: Unanswerability
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality of being unanswerable; unanswerableness.

qa_pairs.question: Unanswerable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not answerable; irrefutable; conclusive; decisive; as, he gave an unanswerable argument.

qa_pairs.question: Unanswered
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not answered; not replied to; as, an unanswered letter.

qa_pairs.question: Unappalled
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not appalled; not frightened; dauntless; undaunted.

qa_pairs.question: Unapparel

The letters are somewhat rounded, and the upstrokes and downstrokes usually have a slight inclination. These letters were used as early as the 1st century b. c., and were seldom used after the 10th century a. d., being superseded by the cursive style.

qa_pairs.question: Underfringe

qa_pairs.question: Underfurnish

qa_pairs.question: Undergod

qa_pairs.question: Undergrub
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To undermine.

qa_pairs.question: Underkeeper

qa_pairs.question: Underlie

qa_pairs.question: Underlip

qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To plant under;

qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of underplaying.

qa_pairs.question: Underpoise

qa_pairs.question: Underpraise
