qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To study, as another actor's part, in order to be his substitute in an emergency; to study another actor's part.

qa_pairs.question: Understudy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who studies another's part with a view to assuming it in an emergency.

qa_pairs.question: Undersuit
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A suit worn under another suit; a suit of underclothes.

qa_pairs.question: Undertakable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Capable of being undertaken; practicable.

qa_pairs.question: Undertake
qa_pairs.answer: It means To take upon one's self; to engage in; to enter upon; to take in hand; to begin to perform; to set about; to attempt.

qa_pairs.question: Undertake
qa_pairs.answer: It means To take upon one's self, or assume, any business, duty, or province.

qa_pairs.question: Undertaker
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who undertakes; one who engages in any project or business.

qa_pairs.question: Undertaking
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of one who undertakes, or engages in, any project or business.

qa_pairs.question: Undertapster
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Assistant to a tapster.

qa_pairs.question: Undertaxed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Taxed too little, or at a lower rate than others.

qa_pairs.question: Undertenancy
qa_pairs.answer: It means Tenancy or tenure under a tenant or lessee; the tenure of an undertenant.

qa_pairs.question: Undertenant
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The tenant of a tenant; one who holds lands or tenements of a tenant or lessee.

qa_pairs.question: Underthing
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Something that is inferior and of little worth.

qa_pairs.question: Undertide
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The under or after part of the day; undermeal; evening.

qa_pairs.question: Undertone
qa_pairs.answer: It means A low or subdued tone or utterance; a tone less loud than usual.

qa_pairs.question: Undertook
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is (imp.) of Undertake.

qa_pairs.question: Undertow
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The current that sets seaward near the bottom when waves are breaking upon the shore.

qa_pairs.question: Undertreasurer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An assistant treasurer.

qa_pairs.question: Underturn
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To turn upside down; to subvert; to upset.

qa_pairs.question: Undervaluation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of undervaluing; a rate or value not equal to the real worth.

qa_pairs.question: Undervalue
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To value, rate, or estimate below the real worth; to depreciate.

qa_pairs.question: Undervalue
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A low rate or price; a price less than the real worth; undervaluation.

qa_pairs.question: Undervaluer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who undervalues.

qa_pairs.question: Underverse
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The lower or second verse.

qa_pairs.question: Undervest
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An undershirt.

qa_pairs.question: Underviewer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Underlooker.

qa_pairs.question: Underwear
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That which is worn under the outside clothing; underclothes.

qa_pairs.question: Underween
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To undervalue.

qa_pairs.question: Underwent
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as (imp.) of Undergo.

qa_pairs.question: Underwhelm
qa_pairs.answer: It means To interest less than anticipated; to be dull to (a person).

qa_pairs.question: Underwhelming
qa_pairs.answer: It means Less interesting than expected; dull.

qa_pairs.question: Underwing
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of the posterior wings of an insect.

qa_pairs.question: Underwitted
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Weak in intellect; half-witted; silly.

qa_pairs.question: Underwood
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Small trees and bushes that grow among large trees; coppice; underbrush; -- formerly used in the plural.

qa_pairs.question: Underwork
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To injure by working secretly; to destroy or overthrow by clandestine measure; to undermine.

qa_pairs.question: Underwork
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To work or operate in secret or clandestinely.

qa_pairs.question: Underwork
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Inferior or subordinate work; petty business.

qa_pairs.question: Underworker
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who underworks.

qa_pairs.question: Underworld
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The lower of inferior world; the world which is under the heavens; the earth.

qa_pairs.question: Underwrite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To write under something else; to subscribe.

qa_pairs.question: Underwrite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To practice the business of insuring; to take a risk of insurance on a vessel or the like.

qa_pairs.question: Underwriter
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who underwrites his name to the conditions of an insurance policy, especially of a marine policy; an insurer.

qa_pairs.question: Underwriting
qa_pairs.answer: It means The business of an underwriter,

qa_pairs.question: Underyoke
qa_pairs.answer: It means To subject to the yoke; to make subject.

qa_pairs.question: Undeserve
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To fail to deserve.

qa_pairs.question: Undeserver
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of no merit; one who is nor deserving or worthy.

qa_pairs.question: Undesigning
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having no artful, ulterior, or fraudulent purpose; sincere; artless; simple.

qa_pairs.question: Undestroyable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Indestructible.

qa_pairs.question: Undeterminable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not determinable; indeterminable.

qa_pairs.question: Undeterminate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Nor determinate; not settled or certain; indeterminate.

qa_pairs.question: Undetermination
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Indetermination.

qa_pairs.question: Undevil
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To free from possession by a devil or evil spirit; to exorcise.

qa_pairs.question: Undevotion
qa_pairs.answer: It means Absence or want of devotion.

qa_pairs.question: Undid
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as (imp.) of Undo.

qa_pairs.question: Undifferentiated
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not differentiated; specifically (Biol.), homogenous, or nearly so; -- said especially of young or embryonic tissues which have not yet undergone differentiation (see Differentiation, 3), that is, which show no visible separation into their different structural parts.

qa_pairs.question: Undigenous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Generated by water.

qa_pairs.question: Undigestible
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Indigestible.

qa_pairs.question: Undight
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To put off; to lay aside, as a garment.

qa_pairs.question: Undigne
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Unworthy.

qa_pairs.question: Undine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One of a class of fabled female water spirits who might receive a human soul by intermarrying with a mortal.

qa_pairs.question: Undiocesed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Unprovided with a diocese; having no diocese.

qa_pairs.question: Undirect
qa_pairs.answer: It means To misdirect; to mislead.

qa_pairs.question: Undirect
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Indirect.

qa_pairs.question: Undirected
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not directed; not guided; left without direction.

qa_pairs.question: Undirectly
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Indirectly.

qa_pairs.question: Undiscerning
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Want of discernment.

qa_pairs.question: Undisclose
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To keep close or secret.

qa_pairs.question: Undiscreet
qa_pairs.answer: It means Indiscreet.

qa_pairs.question: Undispensable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Indispensable.

qa_pairs.question: Undispensed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not dispensed.

qa_pairs.question: Undisposedness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Indisposition; disinclination.

qa_pairs.question: Undisputable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Indisputable.

qa_pairs.question: Undistinctive
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Making no distinctions; not discriminating; impartial.

qa_pairs.question: Undistinctly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Indistinctly.

qa_pairs.question: Undivided
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not divided; not separated or disunited; unbroken; whole; continuous; as, plains undivided by rivers or mountains.

qa_pairs.question: Undividual
qa_pairs.answer: It means Indivisible.

qa_pairs.question: Undivisible
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Indivisible.

qa_pairs.question: Undo
qa_pairs.answer: It means To reverse, as what has been done; to annul; to bring to naught.

qa_pairs.question: Undock
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To take out of dock; as, to undock a ship.

qa_pairs.question: Undoer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who undoes anything; especially, one who ruins another.

qa_pairs.question: Undoing
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The reversal of what has been done.

qa_pairs.question: Undomesticate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To make wild or roving.

qa_pairs.question: Undone
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is (p. p.) of Undo.

qa_pairs.question: Undone
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not done or performed; neglected.

qa_pairs.question: Undouble
qa_pairs.answer: It means To unfold, or render single.

qa_pairs.question: Undoubtable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Indubitable.

qa_pairs.question: Undoubted
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not doubted; not called in question; indubitable; indisputable; as, undoubted proof; undoubted hero.

qa_pairs.question: Undrape
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To strip of drapery; to uncover or unveil.

qa_pairs.question: Undraw
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To draw aside or open; to draw back.

qa_pairs.question: Undreamed
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not dreamed, or dreamed of; not th<?/ught of; not imagined; -- often followed by of.

qa_pairs.question: Undress
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To divest of clothes; to strip.

qa_pairs.question: Undress
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A loose, negligent dress; ordinary dress, as distinguished from full dress.

qa_pairs.question: Undubitable
qa_pairs.answer: It means Indubitable; as, an undubitable principle.

qa_pairs.question: Undue
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not due; not yet owing; as, an undue debt, note, or bond.

qa_pairs.question: Undueness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality of being undue.

qa_pairs.question: Unduke
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To deprive of dukedom.

qa_pairs.question: Undulant
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Undulating.

qa_pairs.question: Undulary
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Moving like waves; undulatory.

qa_pairs.question: Undulate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Undulated.

qa_pairs.question: Undulate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To cause to move backward and forward, or up and down, in undulations or waves; to cause to vibrate.

qa_pairs.question: Undulate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To move in, or have, undulations or waves; to vibrate; to wave; as, undulating air.

qa_pairs.question: Undulated
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Resembling, or in the nature of, waves; having a wavy surface; undulatory.

qa_pairs.question: Undulating
qa_pairs.answer: It means Rising and falling like waves; resembling wave form or motion; undulatory; rolling; wavy; as, an undulating medium; undulating ground.

qa_pairs.question: Undulation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of undulating; a waving motion or vibration; as, the undulations of a fluid, of water, or of air; the undulations of sound.

qa_pairs.question: Undulationist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who advocates the undulatory theory of light.

qa_pairs.question: Undulative
qa_pairs.answer: It means Consisting in, or accompanied by, undulations; undulatory.

qa_pairs.question: Undulatory
qa_pairs.answer: It means Moving in the manner of undulations, or waves; resembling the motion of waves, which successively rise or swell rise or swell and fall; pertaining to a propagated alternating motion, similar to that of waves.

qa_pairs.question: Undull
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To remove the dullness of; to clear.

qa_pairs.question: Undulous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Undulating; undulatory.

qa_pairs.question: Unduly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In an undue manner.

qa_pairs.question: Undumpish
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To relieve from the dumps.

qa_pairs.question: Undust
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To free from dust.

qa_pairs.question: Undwellable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Uninhabitable.

qa_pairs.question: Undwelt
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not lived (in); -- with in.

qa_pairs.question: Undying
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not dying; imperishable; unending; immortal; as, the undying souls of men.

qa_pairs.question: Uneared
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not eared, or plowed.

qa_pairs.question: Unearned
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not earned; not gained by labor or service.

qa_pairs.question: Unearth
qa_pairs.answer: It means To drive or draw from the earth; hence, to uncover; to bring out from concealment; to bring to light; to disclose; as, to unearth a secret.

qa_pairs.question: Unearthly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not terrestrial; supernatural; preternatural; hence, weird; appalling; terrific; as, an unearthly sight or sound.

qa_pairs.question: Unease
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Want of ease; uneasiness.

qa_pairs.question: Uneasily
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In an easy manner.

qa_pairs.question: Uneasiness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being uneasy; restlessness; disquietude; anxiety.

qa_pairs.question: Uneasy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not easy; difficult.

qa_pairs.question: Uneath
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not easy; difficult; hard.

qa_pairs.question: Uneath
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not easily; hardly; scarcely.

qa_pairs.question: Unedge
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To deprive of the edge; to blunt.

qa_pairs.question: Unefectual
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Ineffectual.

qa_pairs.question: Unelastic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not elastic; inelastic.

qa_pairs.question: Unelasticity
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Inelasticity.

qa_pairs.question: Unelegant
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Inelegant.

qa_pairs.question: Uneligible
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Ineligible.

qa_pairs.question: Unembarrassed
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not embarrassed.

qa_pairs.question: Unembarrassment
qa_pairs.answer: It means Freedom from embarrassment.

qa_pairs.question: Unembodied
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Free from a corporeal body; disembodied; as, unembodied spirits.

qa_pairs.question: Unempirically
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not empirically; without experiment or experience.

qa_pairs.question: Unemployed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not employed in manual or other labor; having no regular work.

qa_pairs.question: Unemployment
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Quality or state of being not employed; -- used esp. in economics, of the condition of various social classes when temporarily thrown out of employment, as those engaged for short periods, those whose trade is decaying, and those least competent.

qa_pairs.question: Unencumber
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To free from incumbrance; to disencumber.

qa_pairs.question: Unendly
qa_pairs.answer: It means Unending; endless.

qa_pairs.question: Unentangle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To disentangle.

qa_pairs.question: Unequal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not equal; not matched; not of the same size, length, breadth, quantity, strength, talents, acquirements, age, station, or the like; as, the fingers are of unequal length; peers and commoners are unequal in rank.

qa_pairs.question: Unequalable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not capable of being equaled or paralleled.

qa_pairs.question: Unequaled
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not equaled; unmatched; unparalleled; unrivaled; exceeding; surpassing; -- in a good or bad sense; as, unequaled excellence; unequaled ingratitude or baseness.

qa_pairs.question: Unequally
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In an unequal manner.

qa_pairs.question: Unequalness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being unequal; inequality; unevenness.

qa_pairs.question: Unequitable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Inequitable.

qa_pairs.question: Unequity
qa_pairs.answer: It means Want of equity or uprightness; injustice; wickedness; iniquity.

qa_pairs.question: Unequivocal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not equivocal; not doubtful; not ambiguous; evident; sincere; plain; as, unequivocal evidence; unequivocal words.

qa_pairs.question: Unerring
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Committing no mistake; incapable or error or failure certain; sure; unfailing; as, the unerring wisdom of God.

qa_pairs.question: Unerringly
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In an unerring manner.

qa_pairs.question: Unessential
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not essential; not of prime importance; not indispensable; unimportant.

qa_pairs.question: Unessential
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Something not constituting essence, or something which is not of absolute necessity; as, forms are among the unessentials of religion.

qa_pairs.question: Unessentially
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In an unessential manner.

qa_pairs.question: Unestablish
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To disestablish.

qa_pairs.question: Uneth
qa_pairs.answer: It means With difficulty; scarcely. See Uneath.

qa_pairs.question: Uneven
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not even; not level; not uniform; rough; as, an uneven road or way; uneven ground.

qa_pairs.question: Unevitable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Inevitable.

qa_pairs.question: Unexact
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not exact; inexact.

qa_pairs.question: Unexampled
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having no example or similar case; being without precedent; unprecedented; unparalleled.

qa_pairs.question: Unexceptionable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not liable to any exception or objection; unobjectionable; faultless; good; excellent; as, a man of most unexceptionable character.

qa_pairs.question: Unexceptive
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not exceptive; not including, admitting, or being, an exception.

qa_pairs.question: Unexcusable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Inexcusable.

qa_pairs.question: Unexhaustible
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Inexhaustible.

qa_pairs.question: Unexpectation
qa_pairs.answer: It means Absence of expectation; want of foresight.

qa_pairs.question: Unexpected
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not expected; coming without warning; sudden.

qa_pairs.question: Unexpedient
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Inexpedient.

qa_pairs.question: Unexpensive
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Inexpensive.

qa_pairs.question: Unexperience
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Inexperience.

qa_pairs.question: Unexperienced
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not experienced; being without experience; inexperienced.

qa_pairs.question: Unexperient
qa_pairs.answer: It means Inexperienced.

qa_pairs.question: Unexpert
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not expert; inexpert.

qa_pairs.question: Unexpertly
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In an unexpert manner.

qa_pairs.question: Unexpressible
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Inexpressible.

qa_pairs.question: Unexpressive
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not expressive; not having the power of utterance; inexpressive.

qa_pairs.question: Unextinguishable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Inextinguishable.

qa_pairs.question: Unextricable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not extricable; inextricable.

qa_pairs.question: Unface
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To remove the face or cover from; to unmask; to expose.

qa_pairs.question: Unfailable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Infallible.

qa_pairs.question: Unfailing
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not failing; not liable to fail; inexhaustible; certain; sure.

qa_pairs.question: Unfair
qa_pairs.answer: It means To deprive of fairness or beauty.

qa_pairs.question: Unfair
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not fair; not honest; not impartial; disingenuous; using or involving trick or artifice; dishonest; unjust; unequal.

qa_pairs.question: Unfaith
qa_pairs.answer: It means Absence or want of faith; faithlessness; distrust; unbelief.

qa_pairs.question: Unfaithful
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not faithful; not observant of promises, vows, allegiance, or duty; violating trust or confidence; treacherous; perfidious; as, an unfaithful subject; an unfaithful agent or servant.

qa_pairs.question: Unfalcated
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not falcated, or hooked.

qa_pairs.question: Unfallible
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Infallible.

qa_pairs.question: Unfasten
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To loose; to unfix; to unbind; to untie.

qa_pairs.question: Unfathered
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having no father; fatherless; hence, born contrary to nature.

qa_pairs.question: Unfavorable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not favorable; not propitious; adverse; contrary; discouraging.

qa_pairs.question: Unfeather
qa_pairs.answer: It means To deprive of feathers; to strip.

qa_pairs.question: Unfeatured
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Wanting regular features; deformed.

qa_pairs.question: Unfeaty
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not feat; not dexterous; unskillful; clumsy.

qa_pairs.question: Unfeeling
qa_pairs.answer: It means Destitute of feeling; void of sensibility; insensible; insensate.

qa_pairs.question: Unfeigned
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not feigned; not counterfeit; not hypocritical; real; sincere; genuine; as, unfeigned piety; unfeigned love to man.

qa_pairs.question: Unfellow
qa_pairs.answer: It means To prevent from being a fellow or companion; to separate from one's fellows; to dissever.

qa_pairs.question: Unfellowed
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Being without a fellow; unmatched; unmated.

qa_pairs.question: Unfence
qa_pairs.answer: It means To strip of a fence; to remove a fence from.

qa_pairs.question: Unfertile
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not fertile; infertile; barren.

qa_pairs.question: Unfestlich
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Unfit for a feast; hence, jaded; worn.

qa_pairs.question: Unfetter
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To loose from fetters or from restraint; to unchain; to unshackle; to liberate; as, to unfetter the mind.

qa_pairs.question: Unfeudalize
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To free from feudal customs or character; to make not feudal.

qa_pairs.question: Unfile
qa_pairs.answer: It means To remove from a file or record.

qa_pairs.question: Unfiled
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not defiled; pure.

qa_pairs.question: Unfilial
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Unsuitable to a son or a daughter; undutiful; not becoming a child.

qa_pairs.question: Unfinished
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not finished, not brought to an end; imperfect; incomplete; left in the rough; wanting the last hand or touch; as, an unfinished house; an unfinished picture; an unfinished iron casting.

qa_pairs.question: Unfirm
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Infirm.

qa_pairs.question: Unfirmness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Infirmness.

qa_pairs.question: Unfit
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To make unsuitable or incompetent; to deprive of the strength, skill, or proper qualities for anything; to disable; to incapacitate; to disqualify; as, sickness unfits a man for labor; sin unfits us for the society of holy beings.

qa_pairs.question: Unfit
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not fit; unsuitable.

qa_pairs.question: Unfix
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To loosen from a fastening; to detach from anything that holds; to unsettle; as, to unfix a bayonet; to unfix the mind or affections.

qa_pairs.question: Unfledged
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not fledged; not feathered; hence, not fully developed; immature.

qa_pairs.question: Unflesh
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To deprive of flesh; to reduce a skeleton.

qa_pairs.question: Unfleshly
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not pertaining to the flesh; spiritual.

qa_pairs.question: Unflexible
qa_pairs.answer: It means Inflexible.

qa_pairs.question: Unflinching
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not flinching or shrinking; unyielding.

qa_pairs.question: Unflower
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To strip of flowers.

qa_pairs.question: Unfold
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To open the folds of; to expand; to spread out; as, to unfold a tablecloth.

qa_pairs.question: Unfold
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To open; to expand; to become disclosed or developed.

qa_pairs.question: Unfolder
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who, or that which, unfolds.

qa_pairs.question: Unfoldment
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The acct of unfolding, or the state of being unfolded.

qa_pairs.question: Unfool
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To restore from folly, or from being a fool.

qa_pairs.question: Unforesee
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To fail to foresee.

qa_pairs.question: Unforeseeable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Incapable of being foreseen.

qa_pairs.question: Unforeskinned
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Deprived of the foreskin; circumcised.

qa_pairs.question: Unforgettable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not forgettable; enduring in memory.

qa_pairs.question: Unform
qa_pairs.answer: It means To decompose, or resolve into parts; to destroy the form of; to unmake.

qa_pairs.question: Unformed
qa_pairs.answer: It means Decomposed, or resolved into parts; having the form destroyed.

qa_pairs.question: Unfortunate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not fortunate; unsuccessful; not prosperous; unlucky; attended with misfortune; unhappy; as, an unfortunate adventure; an unfortunate man; an unfortunate commander; unfortunate business.

qa_pairs.question: Unfounded
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not founded; not built or established.

qa_pairs.question: Unframe
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To take apart, or destroy the frame of.

qa_pairs.question: Unfrangible
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Infrangible.

qa_pairs.question: Unfrankable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not frankable; incapable of being sent free by public conveyance.

qa_pairs.question: Unfraught
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not fraught; not burdened.

qa_pairs.question: Unfree
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not free; held in bondage.

qa_pairs.question: Unfreeze
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To thaw.

qa_pairs.question: Unfrequency
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Infrequency.

qa_pairs.question: Unfrequent
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Infrequent.

qa_pairs.question: Unfrequent
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To cease to frequent.

qa_pairs.question: Unfrequented
qa_pairs.answer: It means Rarely visited; seldom or never resorted to by human beings; as, an unfrequented place or forest.

qa_pairs.question: Unfret
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To smooth after being fretted.

qa_pairs.question: Unfriend
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One not a friend; an enemy.

qa_pairs.question: Unfriended
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Wanting friends; not befriended; not countenanced or supported.

qa_pairs.question: Unfriendly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not friendly; not kind or benevolent; hostile; as, an unfriendly neighbor.

qa_pairs.question: Unfriendship
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The state or quality of being unfriendly; unfriendliness; enmity.

qa_pairs.question: Unfrock
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To deprive or divest or a frock; specifically, to deprive of priestly character or privilege; as, to unfrock a priest.

qa_pairs.question: Unfruitful
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not producing fruit or offspring; unproductive; infertile; barren; sterile; as, an unfruitful tree or animal; unfruitful soil; an unfruitful life or effort.

qa_pairs.question: Unfumed
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not exposed to fumes; not fumigated.

qa_pairs.question: Unfurl
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To loose from a furled state; to unfold; to expand; to open or spread; as, to unfurl sails; to unfurl a flag.

qa_pairs.question: Unfurnish
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To strip of furniture; to divest; to strip.

qa_pairs.question: Unfusible
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Infusible.

qa_pairs.question: Ungain
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Ungainly; clumsy; awkward; also, troublesome; inconvenient.

qa_pairs.question: Ungainliness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state or quality of being ungainly; awkwardness.

qa_pairs.question: Ungainly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not gainly; not expert or dexterous; clumsy; awkward; uncouth; as, an ungainly strut in walking.

qa_pairs.question: Ungainly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In an ungainly manner.

qa_pairs.question: Ungear
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To strip of gear; to unharness; to throw out of gear.

qa_pairs.question: Ungeld
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A person so far out of the protection of the law, that if he were murdered, no geld, or fine, should be paid, or composition made by him that killed him.

qa_pairs.question: Ungenerous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not generous; illiberal; ignoble; unkind; dishonorable.

qa_pairs.question: Ungenerously
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In an ungenerous manner.

qa_pairs.question: Ungenitured
qa_pairs.answer: It means Destitute of genitals; impotent.

qa_pairs.question: Ungentle
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not gentle; lacking good breeding or delicacy; harsh.

qa_pairs.question: Unget
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To cause to be unbegotten or unborn, or as if unbegotten or unborn.

qa_pairs.question: Ungifted
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Being without gifts, especially native gifts or endowments.

qa_pairs.question: Ungird
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To loose the girdle or band of; to unbind; to unload.

qa_pairs.question: Ungive
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To yield; to relax; to give way.

qa_pairs.question: Ungka
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The siamang; -- called also also known as ungka ape.

qa_pairs.question: Ungka-puti
qa_pairs.answer: It means The agile gibbon; -- called also also known as ungka-pati, and also known as ungka-etam. See Gibbon.

qa_pairs.question: Unglaze
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To strip of glass; to remove the glazing, or glass, from, as a window.

qa_pairs.question: Unglorify
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To deprive of glory.

qa_pairs.question: Unglorious
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Inglorious.

qa_pairs.question: Unglove
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To take off the glove or gloves of; as, to unglove the hand.

qa_pairs.question: Unglue
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To separate, part, or open, as anything fastened with glue.

qa_pairs.question: Ungod
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To deprive of divinity; to undeify.

qa_pairs.question: Ungodly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not godly; not having regard for God; disobedient to God; wicked; impious; sinful.

qa_pairs.question: Ungored
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not stained with gore; not bloodied.

qa_pairs.question: Ungored
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not gored or pierced.

qa_pairs.question: Ungot
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not gotten; not acquired.

qa_pairs.question: Ungovernable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not governable; not capable of being governed, ruled, or restrained; licentious; wild; unbridled; as, ungovernable passions.

qa_pairs.question: Ungown
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To strip of a gown; to unfrock.

qa_pairs.question: Ungowned
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Stripped of a gown; unfrocked.

qa_pairs.question: Ungraceful
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not graceful; not marked with ease and dignity; deficient in beauty and elegance; inelegant; awkward; as, ungraceful manners; ungraceful speech.

qa_pairs.question: Ungracious
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not gracious; showing no grace or kindness; being without good will; unfeeling.

qa_pairs.question: Ungrate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Displeasing; ungrateful; ingrate.

qa_pairs.question: Ungrateful
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not grateful; not thankful for favors; making no returns, or making ill return for kindness, attention, etc.; ingrateful.

qa_pairs.question: Ungrave
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To raise or remove from the grave; to disinter; to untomb; to exhume.

qa_pairs.question: Ungual
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to a nail, claw, talon, or hoof, or resembling one.

qa_pairs.question: Unguard
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To deprive of a guard; to leave unprotected.

qa_pairs.question: Ungueal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Ungual.

qa_pairs.question: Unguent
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A lubricant or salve for sores, burns, or the like; an ointment.

qa_pairs.question: Unguentary
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Like an unguent, or partaking of its qualities.

qa_pairs.question: Unguentous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Unguentary.

qa_pairs.question: Unguestlike
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In a manner not becoming to a guest.

qa_pairs.question: Unguical
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Ungual.

qa_pairs.question: Unguicular
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to a claw or a nail; ungual.

qa_pairs.question: Unguiculata
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An extensive division of Mammalia including those having claws or nails, as distinguished from the hoofed animals (Ungulata).

qa_pairs.question: Unguiculate
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of the Unguiculata.

qa_pairs.question: Unguiculate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Furnished with nails, claws, or hooks; clawed. See the Note under Nail, (n.), 1.

qa_pairs.question: Unguiferous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Producing, having, or supporting nails or claws.

qa_pairs.question: Unguiform
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having the form of a claw or claws.

qa_pairs.question: Unguinous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Consisting of, or resembling, fat or oil; oily; unctuous; oleaginous.

qa_pairs.question: Unguis
qa_pairs.answer: It means The nail, claw, talon, or hoof of a finger, toe, or other appendage.

qa_pairs.question: Ungula
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A hoof, claw, or talon.

qa_pairs.question: Ungular
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to a hoof, claw, or talon; ungual.

qa_pairs.question: Ungulata
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An extensive group of mammals including all those that have hoofs. It comprises the Artiodactyla and Perissodactyla.

qa_pairs.question: Ungulate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Shaped like a hoof.

qa_pairs.question: Ungulate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any hoofed quadruped; one of the Ungulata.

qa_pairs.question: Unguled
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Hoofed, or bearing hoofs; -- used only when these are of a tincture different from the body.

qa_pairs.question: Unguligrade
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having, or walking on, hoofs.

qa_pairs.question: Ungulous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Ungulate.

qa_pairs.question: Unhair
qa_pairs.answer: It means To deprive of hair, or of hairs; as, to unhair hides for leather.

qa_pairs.question: Unhallow
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To profane; to desecrate.

qa_pairs.question: Unhallowed
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not consecrated; hence, profane; unholy; impious; wicked.

qa_pairs.question: Unhand
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To loose from the hand; to let go.

qa_pairs.question: Unhandsome
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not handsome; not beautiful; ungraceful; not comely or pleasing; plain; homely.

qa_pairs.question: Unhandy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Clumsy; awkward; as, an Unhandy man.

qa_pairs.question: Unhang
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To divest or strip of hangings; to remove the hangings, as a room.

qa_pairs.question: Unhap
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Ill luck; misfortune.

qa_pairs.question: Unhappied
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Made unhappy.

qa_pairs.question: Unhappy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not happy or fortunate; unfortunate; unlucky; as, affairs have taken an unhappy turn.

qa_pairs.question: Unharbor
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To drive from harbor or shelter.

qa_pairs.question: Unharbored
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having no harbor or shelter; unprotected.

qa_pairs.question: Unharmonious
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Inharmonious; unsymmetrical; also, unmusical; discordant.

qa_pairs.question: Unharness
qa_pairs.answer: It means To strip of harness; to loose from harness or gear; as, to unharness horses or oxen.

qa_pairs.question: Unhasp
qa_pairs.answer: It means To unloose the hasp of; to unclose.

qa_pairs.question: Unhat
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To take off the hat of; to remove one's hat, especially as a mark of respect.

qa_pairs.question: Unhead
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To take out the head of; as, to unhead a cask.

qa_pairs.question: Unheal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Misfortune; calamity; sickness.

qa_pairs.question: Unheal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To uncover. See Unhele.

qa_pairs.question: Unhealth
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Unsoundness; disease.

qa_pairs.question: Unheard
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not heard; not perceived by the ear; as, words unheard by those present.

qa_pairs.question: Unheard-of
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is New; unprecedented; unparalleled.

qa_pairs.question: Unheart
qa_pairs.answer: It means To cause to lose heart; to dishearten.

qa_pairs.question: Unheedy
qa_pairs.answer: It means Incautious; precipitate; heedless.

qa_pairs.question: Unheired
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Destitute of an heir.

qa_pairs.question: Unhele
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Unheal, (n.)

qa_pairs.question: Unhele
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To uncover.

qa_pairs.question: Unhelm
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To deprive of the helm or helmet.

qa_pairs.question: Unhelmed
qa_pairs.answer: It means Divested or deprived of the helm or helmet.

qa_pairs.question: Unhelmet
qa_pairs.answer: It means To deprive of the helmet.

qa_pairs.question: Unhide
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To bring out from concealment; to discover.

qa_pairs.question: Unhinge
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To take from the hinges; as, to unhinge a door.

qa_pairs.question: Unhingement
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act unhinging, or the state of being unhinged.

qa_pairs.question: unhitch
qa_pairs.answer: It means To free from being hitched, or as if from being hitched; to unfasten; to loose; as, to unhitch a horse, or a trace.

qa_pairs.question: unhive
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To drive or remove from a hive.

qa_pairs.question: unhoard
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To take or steal from a hoard; to pilfer.

qa_pairs.question: unhold
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To cease to hold; to unhand; to release.

qa_pairs.question: unholy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not holy; unhallowed; not consecrated; hence, profane; wicked; impious.

qa_pairs.question: unhonest
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Dishonest; dishonorable.

qa_pairs.question: unhood
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To remove a hood or disguise from.

qa_pairs.question: Unhook
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To loose from a hook; to undo or open by loosening or unfastening the hooks of; as, to unhook a fish; to unhook a dress.

qa_pairs.question: Unhoop
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To strip or deprive of hoops; to take away the hoops of.

qa_pairs.question: Unhoped
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not hoped or expected.

qa_pairs.question: Unhoped-for
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Unhoped; unexpected.

qa_pairs.question: Unhorse
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To throw from a horse; to cause to dismount; also, to take a horse or horses from; as, to unhorse a rider; to unhorse a carriage.

qa_pairs.question: Unhosed
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Without hose.

qa_pairs.question: Unhospitable
qa_pairs.answer: It means Inhospitable.

qa_pairs.question: Unhouse
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To drive from a house or habitation; to dislodge; hence, to deprive of shelter.

qa_pairs.question: Unhoused
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Driven from a house; deprived of shelter.

qa_pairs.question: Unhouseled
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not having received the sacrament.

qa_pairs.question: Unhuman
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not human; inhuman.

qa_pairs.question: Unhumanize
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To render inhuman or barbarous.

qa_pairs.question: Unhusked
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not husked; having the husk on.

qa_pairs.question: Uni-
qa_pairs.answer: It means A prefix signifying one, once; as in uniaxial, unicellular.

qa_pairs.question: Uniat
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A member of the Greek Church, who nevertheless acknowledges the supremacy of the Pope of Rome; one of the United Greeks. Also used adjectively.

qa_pairs.question: Uniaxal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Uniaxial.

qa_pairs.question: Uniaxial
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having but one optic axis, or line of no double refraction.

qa_pairs.question: Uniaxially
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In a uniaxial manner.

qa_pairs.question: Unibranchiate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having but one gill, as certain molluscs.

qa_pairs.question: Unicameral
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having, or consisting of, a single chamber; -- said of a legislative assembly.

qa_pairs.question: Unicapsular
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having but one capsule to each flower.

qa_pairs.question: Unicarinated
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having one ridge or keel.

qa_pairs.question: Unicelled
qa_pairs.answer: It means Unicellular.

qa_pairs.question: Unicellular
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having, or consisting of, but a single cell; as, a unicellular organism.

qa_pairs.question: Unicentral
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having a single center of growth.

qa_pairs.question: Unicity
qa_pairs.answer: It means The condition of being united; quality of the unique; unification.

qa_pairs.question: Uniclinal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Nonoclinal.

qa_pairs.question: Unicolorous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having the surface of a uniform color.

qa_pairs.question: Unicorn
qa_pairs.answer: It means A fabulous animal with one horn; the monoceros; -- often represented in heraldry as a supporter.

qa_pairs.question: Unicornous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having but a single horn; -- said of certain insects.

qa_pairs.question: Unicostate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having a single rib or strong nerve running upward from the base; -- said of a leaf.

qa_pairs.question: Unicursal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That can be passed over in a single course; -- said of a curve when the coordinates of the point on the curve can be expressed as rational algebraic functions of a single parameter <theta/.

qa_pairs.question: Unideaed
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having no ideas; senseless; frivolous.

qa_pairs.question: Unideal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not ideal; real; unimaginative.

qa_pairs.question: Unidimensional
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having but one dimension. See Dimension.

qa_pairs.question: Unifacial
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having but one front surface; as, some foliaceous corals are unifacial, the polyp mouths being confined to one surface.

qa_pairs.question: Unific
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Making one or unity; unifying.

qa_pairs.question: Unification
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of unifying, or the state of being unified.

qa_pairs.question: Unifier
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who, or that which, unifies; as, a natural law is a unifier of phenomena.

qa_pairs.question: Unifilar
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having only one thread; involving the use of only one thread, wire, fiber, or the like; as, unifilar suspension.

qa_pairs.question: Uniflagellate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having but one flagellum; as, uniflagellate organisms.

qa_pairs.question: Uniflorous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Bearing one flower only; as, a uniflorous peduncle.

qa_pairs.question: Unifolliate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having only one leaf.

qa_pairs.question: Unifollilate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having only one leaflet, as the leaves of the orange tree.

qa_pairs.question: Uniform
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having always the same form, manner, or degree; not varying or variable; unchanging; consistent; equable; homogenous; as, the dress of the Asiatics has been uniform from early ages; the temperature is uniform; a stratum of uniform clay.

qa_pairs.question: Uniform
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A dress of a particular style or fashion worn by persons in the same service or order by means of which they have a distinctive appearance; as, the uniform of the artillery, of the police, of the Freemasons, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Uniform
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To clothe with a uniform; as, to uniform a company of soldiers.

qa_pairs.question: Uniformal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Uniform.

qa_pairs.question: Uniformism
qa_pairs.answer: It means The doctrine of uniformity in the geological history of the earth; -- in part equivalent to uniformitarianism, but also used, more broadly, as opposed to catastrophism.

qa_pairs.question: Uniformitarian
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of, pertaining to, or designating, the view or doctrine that existing causes, acting in the same manner and with essentially the same intensity as at the present time, are sufficient to account for all geological changes.

qa_pairs.question: Uniformitarian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who accepts uniformitarianism, or the uniformitarian doctrine.

qa_pairs.question: Uniformitarianism
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The uniformitarian doctrine.

qa_pairs.question: Uniformity
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being uniform; freedom from variation or difference; resemblance to itself at all times; sameness of action, effect, etc., under like conditions; even tenor; as, the uniformity of design in a poem; the uniformity of nature.

qa_pairs.question: Uniformly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In a uniform manner; without variation or diversity; by a regular, constant, or common ratio of change; with even tenor; as, a temper uniformly mild.

qa_pairs.question: Unifromness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being uniform; uniformity.

qa_pairs.question: Unify
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To cause to be one; to make into a unit; to unite; to view as one.

qa_pairs.question: Unigeniture
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The state of being the only begotten.

qa_pairs.question: Unigenous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Being of one kind; being of the same genus.

qa_pairs.question: Unijugate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having but one pair of leaflets; -- said of a pinnate leaf.

qa_pairs.question: Unilabiate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having one lip only; as, a unilabiate corolla.

qa_pairs.question: Unilateral
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Being on one side only; affecting but one side; one-sided.

qa_pairs.question: Uniliteral
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Consisting of one letter only; as, a uniliteral word or sign.

qa_pairs.question: Unilobar
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Consisting of a single lobe.

qa_pairs.question: Unilocular
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having one cell or cavity only; as, a unilocular capsule or shell.

qa_pairs.question: Unimitable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Inimitable.

qa_pairs.question: Unimpairable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as That can not be impaired.

qa_pairs.question: Unimpeachable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not impeachable; not to be called in question; exempt from liability to accusation; free from stain, guilt, or fault; irreproachable; blameless; as, an unimpeachable reputation; unimpeachable testimony.

qa_pairs.question: Unimplicate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not implicated.

qa_pairs.question: Unimportance
qa_pairs.answer: It means Want of importance; triviality.

qa_pairs.question: Unimproved
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not improved; not made better or wiser; not advanced in knowledge, manners, or excellence.

qa_pairs.question: Unimuscular
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having only one adductor muscle, and one muscular impression on each valve, as the oyster; monomyarian.

qa_pairs.question: Unincumbered
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not incumbered; not burdened.

qa_pairs.question: Uninfringible
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as That may not be infringed; as, an uninfringible monopoly.

qa_pairs.question: Unintelligence
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Absence or lack of intelligence; unwisdom; ignorance.

qa_pairs.question: Uninteressed
qa_pairs.answer: It means Uninterested; unaffected.

qa_pairs.question: Uninterested
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not interested; not having any interest or property in; having nothing at stake; as, to be uninterested in any business.

qa_pairs.question: Unintermission
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Want or failure of intermission.

qa_pairs.question: Uninucleated
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Possessed of but a single nucleus; as, a uninucleated cell.

qa_pairs.question: Unio
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any one of numerous species of fresh-water mussels belonging to *Unio* and many allied genera.

qa_pairs.question: Uniocular
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of, pertaining to, or seated in, one eye; monocular.

qa_pairs.question: Union
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of uniting or joining two or more things into one, or the state of being united or joined; junction; coalition; combination.

qa_pairs.question: Unionism
qa_pairs.answer: It means The sentiment of attachment to a federal union, especially to the federal union of the United States.

qa_pairs.question: Unionist
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who advocates or promotes union; especially a loyal supporter of a federal union, as that of the United States.

qa_pairs.question: Unionistic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to union or unionists; tending to promote or preserve union.

qa_pairs.question: Uniovulate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Containing but one ovule.

qa_pairs.question: Unipara
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A woman who has borne one child.

qa_pairs.question: Uniparous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Producing but one egg or young at a time.

qa_pairs.question: Uniped
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having only one foot.

qa_pairs.question: Unipersonal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Existing as one, and only one, person; as, a unipersonal God.

qa_pairs.question: Unipersonalist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who believes that the Deity is unipersonal.

qa_pairs.question: Uniphonous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having but one sound, as the drum.

qa_pairs.question: Uniplicate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having, or consisting of, but one fold.

qa_pairs.question: Unipolar
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having, or acting by means of, one pole only.

qa_pairs.question: Unique
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Being without a like or equal; unmatched; unequaled; unparalleled; single in kind or excellence; sole.

qa_pairs.question: Unique
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A thing without a like; something unequaled or unparalleled.

qa_pairs.question: Uniquity
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or state of being unique; uniqueness.

qa_pairs.question: Uniradiated
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having but one ray.

qa_pairs.question: Uniramous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having but one branch.

qa_pairs.question: Uniseptate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having but one septum, or partition; -- said of two-celled fruits, such as the silicles of cruciferous plants.

qa_pairs.question: Uniserial
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having only one row or series.

qa_pairs.question: Uniseriate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having one line or series; uniserial.

qa_pairs.question: Unisexual
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having one sex only, as plants which have the male and female flowers on separate individuals, or animals in which the sexes are in separate individuals; di<oe/cious; -- distinguished from bisexual, or hermaphrodite. See Di<oe/cious.

qa_pairs.question: Unisilicate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A salt of orthosilicic acid, H4SiO4; -- so called because the ratio of the oxygen atoms united to the basic metals and silicon respectively is 1:1; for example, Mg2SiO4 or 2MgO.SiO2.

qa_pairs.question: Unison
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Harmony; agreement; concord; union.

qa_pairs.question: Unison
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Sounding alone.

qa_pairs.question: Unisonal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Being in unison; unisonant.

qa_pairs.question: Unisonance
qa_pairs.answer: It means Accordance of sounds; unison.

qa_pairs.question: Unisonant
qa_pairs.answer: It means Being in unison; having the same degree of gravity or acuteness; sounded alike in pitch.

qa_pairs.question: Unisonous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Being in unison; unisonant.

qa_pairs.question: Unit
qa_pairs.answer: It means A single thing or person.

qa_pairs.question: Unitable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Capable of union by growth or otherwise.

qa_pairs.question: Unitarian
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who denies the doctrine of the Trinity, believing that God exists only in one person; a unipersonalist; also, one of a denomination of Christians holding this belief.

qa_pairs.question: Unitarian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to Unitarians, or their doctrines.

qa_pairs.question: Unitarianism
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The doctrines of Unitarians.

qa_pairs.question: Unitarianize
qa_pairs.answer: It means To change or turn to Unitarian views.

qa_pairs.question: Unitary
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to a unit or units; relating to unity; as, the unitary method in arithmetic.

qa_pairs.question: Unite
qa_pairs.answer: It means To put together so as to make one; to join, as two or more constituents, to form a whole; to combine; to connect; to join; to cause to adhere; as, to unite bricks by mortar; to unite iron bars by welding; to unite two armies.

qa_pairs.question: Unite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To become one; to be cemented or consolidated; to combine, as by adhesion or mixture; to coalesce; to grow together.

qa_pairs.question: Unite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is United; joint; as, unite consent.

qa_pairs.question: United
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Combined; joined; made one.

qa_pairs.question: Unitedly
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In an united manner.

qa_pairs.question: Uniter
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who, or that which, unites.

qa_pairs.question: Uniterable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not iterable; incapable of being repeated.

qa_pairs.question: Unition
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of uniting, or the state of being united; junction.

qa_pairs.question: Unitive
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having the power of uniting; causing, or tending to produce, union.

qa_pairs.question: Unitively
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In a unitive manner.

qa_pairs.question: Unitize
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To reduce to a unit, or one whole; to form into a unit; to unify.

qa_pairs.question: Unitude
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Unity.

qa_pairs.question: Unity
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state of being one; oneness.

qa_pairs.question: Univalence
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being univalent.

qa_pairs.question: Univalent
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having a valence of one; capable of combining with, or of being substituted for, one atom of hydrogen; monovalent; -- said of certain atoms and radicals.

qa_pairs.question: Univalve
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A shell consisting of one valve only; a mollusk whose shell is composed of a single piece, as the snails and conchs.

qa_pairs.question: Univalve
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having one valve; as, a univalve shell or pericarp.

qa_pairs.question: Univalvia
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Gastropoda.

qa_pairs.question: Univalvular
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Univalve, (a.)

qa_pairs.question: Univariant
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having one degree of freedom or variability.

qa_pairs.question: Universal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the universe; extending to, including, or affecting, the whole number, quantity, or space; unlimited; general; all-reaching; all-pervading; as, universal ruin; universal good; universal benevolence or benefice.

qa_pairs.question: Universal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The whole; the general system of the universe; the universe.

qa_pairs.question: Universal donor
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as a person belonging to the O blood group (of the ABO classification), who can safely donate blood to anyone.

qa_pairs.question: Universal grammar
qa_pairs.answer: It means the principles forming the basis for the human ability to understand language.

qa_pairs.question: Universalian
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to Universalism; Universalist.

qa_pairs.question: Universalism
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The doctrine or belief that all men will be saved, or made happy, in the future state.

qa_pairs.question: Universalist
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who believes in Universalism; one of a denomination of Christians holding this faith.

qa_pairs.question: Universalist
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to Unversalists of their doctrines.

qa_pairs.question: Universalistic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the whole; universal.

qa_pairs.question: Universality
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or state of being universal; unlimited extension or application; generality; -- distinguished from particularity; as, the unversality of a proposition; the unversality of sin; the unversality of the Deluge.

qa_pairs.question: Universalize
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To make universal; to generalize.

qa_pairs.question: Universally
qa_pairs.answer: It means In a universal manner; without exception; as, God's laws are universally binding on his creatures.

qa_pairs.question: Universalness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality or state of being universal; universality.

qa_pairs.question: Universe
qa_pairs.answer: It means All created things viewed as constituting one system or whole; the whole body of things, or of phenomena; the to~ pa^n of the Greeks, the mundus of the Latins; the world; creation.

qa_pairs.question: Universe of discourse
qa_pairs.answer: It means everything which may be considered, explicitly or implicitly, in a particular theory or discussion.

qa_pairs.question: University
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The universe; the whole.

qa_pairs.question: University extension
qa_pairs.answer: It means The extension of the advantages of university{3} instruction by means of lectures and classes at various centers.

qa_pairs.question: Universological
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to universology.

qa_pairs.question: Universologist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who is versed in universology.

qa_pairs.question: Universology
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The science of the universe, and the relations which it involves.

qa_pairs.question: Univocacy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality or state of being univocal.

qa_pairs.question: Univocal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having one meaning only; -- contrasted with Antonym: equivocal.

qa_pairs.question: Univocal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A generic term, or a term applicable in the same sense to all the species it embraces.

qa_pairs.question: Univocally
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In a univocal manner; in one term; in one sense; not equivocally.

qa_pairs.question: Univocation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Agreement of name and meaning.

qa_pairs.question: Unjoin
qa_pairs.answer: It means To disjoin.

qa_pairs.question: Unjoint
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To disjoint.

qa_pairs.question: Unjointed
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Disjointed; unconnected; hence, incoherent.

qa_pairs.question: Unjust
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Acting contrary to the standard of right; not animated or controlled by justice; false; dishonest; as, an unjust man or judge.

qa_pairs.question: Unjustice
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Want of justice; injustice.

qa_pairs.question: Unlisted
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not listed;

qa_pairs.question: Unkard
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Unked.

qa_pairs.question: Unke
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A European aquatic toad (Bombinator igneus). Its back is dark; its belly is marked with crimson. Called also also known as feuerkr<oum/te.

qa_pairs.question: Unked
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Odd; strange; ugly; old; uncouth.

qa_pairs.question: Unkemmed
qa_pairs.answer: It means Unkempt.

qa_pairs.question: Unkempt
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not combed; disheveled; as, an urchin with unkempt hair.

qa_pairs.question: Unkennel
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To drive from a kennel or hole; as, to unkennel a fox.

qa_pairs.question: Unkent
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Unknown; strange.

qa_pairs.question: Unketh
qa_pairs.answer: It means Uncouth.

qa_pairs.question: Unkind
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having no race or kindred; childless.

qa_pairs.question: Unkind
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not kind; contrary to nature, or the law of kind or kindred; unnatural.

qa_pairs.question: Unkindliness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Unkindness.

qa_pairs.question: Unkindly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not kindly; unkind; ungracious.

qa_pairs.question: Unkindred
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not kindred; not of the same kin.

qa_pairs.question: Unking
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To cause to cease to be a king.

qa_pairs.question: Unkingship
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or condition of being unkinged; abolition of monarchy.

qa_pairs.question: Unkiss
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To cancel or annul what was done or sealed by a kiss; to cancel by a kiss.

qa_pairs.question: Unkle
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Uncle.

qa_pairs.question: Unknight
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To deprive of knighthood.

qa_pairs.question: Unknit
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To undo or unravel what is knitted together.

qa_pairs.question: Unknot
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To free from knots; to untie.

qa_pairs.question: Unknow
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To cease to know; to lose the knowledge of.

qa_pairs.question: Unknow
qa_pairs.answer: It means Unknown.

qa_pairs.question: Unknowledged
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not acknowledged or recognized.

qa_pairs.question: Unknown
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not known; not apprehended.

qa_pairs.question: Unlabored
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not produced by labor or toil.

qa_pairs.question: Unlace
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To loose by undoing a lacing; as, to unlace a shoe.

qa_pairs.question: Unlade
qa_pairs.answer: It means To take the load from; to take out the cargo of; as, to unlade a ship or a wagon.

qa_pairs.question: Unlaid
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not laid or placed; not fixed.

qa_pairs.question: Unland
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To deprive of lands.

qa_pairs.question: Unlap
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To unfold.

qa_pairs.question: Unlash
qa_pairs.answer: It means To loose, as that which is lashed or tied down.

qa_pairs.question: Unlatch
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To open or loose by lifting the latch; as, to unlatch a door.

qa_pairs.question: Unlaugh
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To recall, as former laughter.

qa_pairs.question: Unlaw
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To deprive of the authority or character of law.

qa_pairs.question: Unlaw
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any transgression or offense against the law.

qa_pairs.question: Unlawed
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not having the claws and balls of the forefeet cut off; -- said of dogs.

qa_pairs.question: Unlawful
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not lawful; contrary to law.

qa_pairs.question: Unlawlike
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not according to law; being or done in violation of law; unlawful.

qa_pairs.question: Unlay
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To untwist; as, to unlay a rope.

qa_pairs.question: Unlearn
qa_pairs.answer: It means To forget, as what has been learned; to lose from memory; also, to learn the contrary of.

qa_pairs.question: Unlearned
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not learned; untaught; uneducated; ignorant; illiterate.

qa_pairs.question: Unleash
qa_pairs.answer: It means To free from a leash, or as from a leash; to let go; to release; as, to unleash dogs.

qa_pairs.question: Unleavened
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not leavened; containing no leaven; as, unleavened bread.

qa_pairs.question: Unless
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Upon any less condition than (the fact or thing stated in the sentence or clause which follows); if not; supposing that not; if it be not; were it not that; except; as, we shall fail unless we are industrious.

qa_pairs.question: Unlicked
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not licked; hence, not properly formed; ungainly. Cf. To lick into shape, under Lick, (v.)

qa_pairs.question: Unlike
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not like; dissimilar; diverse; having no resemblance; as, the cases are unlike.

qa_pairs.question: Unlikelihood
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Absence of likelihood.

qa_pairs.question: Unlikeliness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or state of being unlikely.

qa_pairs.question: Unlikely
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not likely; improbable; not to be reasonably expected; as, an unlikely event; the thing you mention is very unlikely.

qa_pairs.question: Unlikely
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In an unlikely manner.

qa_pairs.question: Unliken
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To make unlike; to dissimilate.

qa_pairs.question: Unlikeness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality or state of being unlike; want of resemblance; dissimilarity.

qa_pairs.question: Unlimber
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To detach the limber from; as, to unlimber a gun.

qa_pairs.question: Unlimitable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Illimitable.

qa_pairs.question: Unlimited
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not limited; having no bounds; boundless; as, an unlimited expanse of ocean.

qa_pairs.question: Unline
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To take the lining out of; hence, to empty; as, to unline one's purse.

qa_pairs.question: Unlink
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To separate or undo, as links; to uncoil; to unfasten.

qa_pairs.question: Unliquidated
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not liquidated; not exactly ascertained; not adjusted or settled.

qa_pairs.question: Unliquored
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not moistened or wet with liquor; dry.

qa_pairs.question: Unlive
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To <?/<?/ve in a contrary manner, as a life; to live in a manner contrary to.

qa_pairs.question: Unlived
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Bereft or deprived of life.

qa_pairs.question: Unload
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To take the load from; to discharge of a load or cargo; to disburden; as, to unload a ship; to unload a beast.

qa_pairs.question: Unload
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To perform the act of unloading anything; as, let unload now.

qa_pairs.question: Unloader
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who, or that which, unloads; a device for unloading, as hay from a wagon.

qa_pairs.question: Unlocated
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not located or placed; not fixed in a place.

qa_pairs.question: Unlock
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To unfasten, as what is locked; as, to unlock a door or a chest.

qa_pairs.question: Unlodge
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To dislodge; to deprive of lodgment.

qa_pairs.question: Unlook
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To recall or retract, as a look.

qa_pairs.question: Unlooked
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not observed or foreseen; unexpected; -- generally with for.

qa_pairs.question: Unlooked-for
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not looked for; unexpected; as, an unlooked-for event.

qa_pairs.question: Unloose
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To make loose; to loosen; to set free.

qa_pairs.question: Unloose
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To become unfastened; to lose all connection or union.

qa_pairs.question: Unloosen
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To loosen; to unloose.

qa_pairs.question: Unlord
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To deprive of the rank or position of a lord.

qa_pairs.question: Unlorded
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Deprived of the rank of a lord.

qa_pairs.question: Unlove
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To cease to love; to hate.

qa_pairs.question: Unlovely
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not lovely; not amiable; possessing qualities that excite dislike; disagreeable; displeasing; unpleasant.

qa_pairs.question: Unluckily
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In an unlucky manner.

qa_pairs.question: Unluckiness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Quality or state of being unlucky.

qa_pairs.question: Unlucky
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not lucky; not successful; unfortunate; ill-fated; unhappy; as, an unlucky man; an unlucky adventure; an unlucky throw of dice; an unlucky game.

qa_pairs.question: Unlust
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Listlessness; disinclination.

qa_pairs.question: Unlute
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To separate, as things cemented or luted; to take the lute or the clay from.

qa_pairs.question: Unmade
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not yet made or formed; as, an unmade grave.

qa_pairs.question: Unmagistrate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To divest of the office or authority of a magistrate.

qa_pairs.question: Unmaiden
qa_pairs.answer: It means To ravish; to deflower.

qa_pairs.question: Unmake
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To destroy the form and qualities of; to deprive of being; to uncreate.

qa_pairs.question: Unman
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To deprive of the distinctive qualities of a human being, as reason, or the like.

qa_pairs.question: Unmanacle
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To free from manacles.

qa_pairs.question: Unmanhood
qa_pairs.answer: It means Absence or lack of manhood.

qa_pairs.question: Unmanned
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Deprived of manly qualities; deficient in vigor, strength, courage, etc.; weak; effeminate.

qa_pairs.question: Unmannerly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not mannerly; ill-bred; rude.

qa_pairs.question: Unmantle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To divest of a mantle; to uncover.

qa_pairs.question: Unmarry
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To annul the marriage of; to divorce.

qa_pairs.question: Unmartyr
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To degrade from the rank of a martyr.

qa_pairs.question: Unmasculate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To emasculate.

qa_pairs.question: Unmask
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To strip of a mask or disguise; to lay open; to expose.

qa_pairs.question: Unmask
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To put off a mask.

qa_pairs.question: Unmasterable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Incapable of being mastered or subdued.

qa_pairs.question: Unmaterial
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not material; immaterial.

qa_pairs.question: Unmeaning
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having no meaning or signification; as, unmeaning words.

qa_pairs.question: Unmeant
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not meant or intended; unintentional.

qa_pairs.question: Unmeasurable
qa_pairs.answer: It means Immeasurable.

qa_pairs.question: Unmechanize
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To undo the mechanism of; to unmake; as, to unmechanize a structure.

qa_pairs.question: Unmerciless
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Utterly merciless.

qa_pairs.question: Unmew

qa_pairs.question: Unmingle

qa_pairs.question: Unmoralized

qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Immovable.

qa_pairs.question: Unmovably

qa_pairs.question: Unmoved
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not moved; fixed; firm; unshaken; calm; apathetic.

qa_pairs.question: Unmuffle
qa_pairs.answer: It means To take a covering from, as the face; to uncover.

qa_pairs.question: Unmutable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Immutable.

qa_pairs.question: Unnecessity

qa_pairs.question: Unnooked

qa_pairs.question: Unnumbered

qa_pairs.question: Unnumerable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Innumerable.

qa_pairs.question: Unnun

qa_pairs.question: Unobedience
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Disobedience.

qa_pairs.question: Unobedient
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Disobedient.

qa_pairs.question: Unobservance
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Want or neglect of observance; inobservance.

qa_pairs.question: Unobtrusive
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not obtrusive; not presuming; modest.

qa_pairs.question: Unoffensive
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Inoffensive.

qa_pairs.question: Unoften
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not often.

qa_pairs.question: Unoil
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To remove the oil from.

qa_pairs.question: Unoperative
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Producing no effect; inoperative.

qa_pairs.question: Unoperculated
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Destitute of an operculum, or cover.

qa_pairs.question: Unorder
qa_pairs.answer: It means To countermand an order for.

qa_pairs.question: Unorderly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Disorderly.

qa_pairs.question: Unordinate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Disorderly; irregular; inordinate.

qa_pairs.question: Unoriginately

qa_pairs.question: Unossified

qa_pairs.question: Unowed
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Ownerless.

qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not owned; having no owner.

qa_pairs.question: Unpaint

qa_pairs.question: Unpaired

qa_pairs.question: Unpalped

qa_pairs.question: Unpardonable

qa_pairs.question: Unparented

qa_pairs.question: Unparliamentary

qa_pairs.question: Unpartial

qa_pairs.question: Unpassable

qa_pairs.question: Unpassionate

qa_pairs.question: Unpastor

qa_pairs.question: Unpathed

qa_pairs.question: Unpathwayed

qa_pairs.question: Unpatience
