qa_pairs.question: Unpaved
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not paved; not furnished with a pavement.

qa_pairs.question: Unpay

qa_pairs.question: Unpeace

qa_pairs.question: Unpedigreed

qa_pairs.question: Unpeerable

qa_pairs.question: Unpeg
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To remove a peg or pegs from; to unfasten; to open.

qa_pairs.question: Unpen
qa_pairs.answer: It means To release from a pen or from confinement.

qa_pairs.question: Unpenetrable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Impenetrable.

qa_pairs.question: Unpenitent
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Impenitent.

qa_pairs.question: Unpeople
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To deprive of inhabitants; to depopulate.

qa_pairs.question: Unperegal

qa_pairs.answer: It means To mar or destroy the perfection of.

qa_pairs.question: Unperfect
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Imperfect.

qa_pairs.question: Unperishable

qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Imperishably.

qa_pairs.question: Unpick
qa_pairs.answer: It means To pick out; to undo by picking.

qa_pairs.question: Unpicked
qa_pairs.answer: It means Picked out; picked open.

qa_pairs.question: Unpinion

qa_pairs.question: Unpitied
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not pitied.

qa_pairs.question: Unpitious

qa_pairs.question: Unpitousty
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Impiety.

qa_pairs.question: Unpity
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Want of piety.

qa_pairs.question: Unplacable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Implacable.

qa_pairs.question: Unplaced
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not placed.

qa_pairs.question: Unplaid
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To deprive of a plaid.

qa_pairs.question: Unplained

qa_pairs.question: Unpleasantry

qa_pairs.question: Unplight

qa_pairs.question: Unpoised

qa_pairs.question: Unpolled

qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Impossible.

qa_pairs.question: Unpractical

qa_pairs.answer: It means Imprudent.

qa_pairs.answer: It means To smooth away the puckers or wrinkles of.

qa_pairs.question: Unpure
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not pure; impure.

qa_pairs.question: Unpursed

qa_pairs.question: Unquestioned

qa_pairs.question: Unquick
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not quick.

qa_pairs.question: Unquiet
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not quiet; restless; uneasy; agitated; disturbed.

qa_pairs.question: Uraniscoplasty
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The process of forming an artificial palate.

qa_pairs.question: Uraniscoraphy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Suture of the palate. See Staphyloraphy.

qa_pairs.question: Uranite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A general term for the uranium phosphates, autunite, or lime uranite, and torbernite, or copper uranite.

qa_pairs.question: Uranitic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to uranium; containing uranium.

qa_pairs.question: Uranium
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An element of the chromium group, found in certain rare minerals, as pitchblende, uranite, etc., and reduced as a heavy, hard, nickel-white metal which is quite permanent. Its yellow oxide is used to impart to glass a delicate greenish-yellow tint which is accompanied by a strong fluorescence, and its black oxide is used as a pigment in porcelain painting. Symbol U. Atomic weight 239.

qa_pairs.question: Uran-ocher
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A yellow, earthy incrustation, consisting essentially of the oxide of uranium, but more or less impure.

qa_pairs.question: Uranographic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to uranography; as, an uranographic treatise.

qa_pairs.question: Uranographist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One practiced in uranography.

qa_pairs.question: Uranography
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A description or plan of the heavens and the heavenly bodies; the construction of celestial maps, globes, etc.; uranology.

qa_pairs.question: Uranolite
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A meteorite or aerolite.

qa_pairs.question: Uranology
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A discourse or treatise on the heavens and the heavenly bodies; the study of the heavens; uranography.

qa_pairs.question: Uranometria
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A uranometry.

qa_pairs.question: Uranometry
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A chart or catalogue of fixed stars, especially of stars visible to the naked eye.

qa_pairs.question: Uranoplasty
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The plastic operation for closing a fissure in the hard palate.

qa_pairs.question: Uranoscopy
qa_pairs.answer: It means Observation of the heavens or heavenly bodies.

qa_pairs.question: Uranoso-
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A combining form (also used adjectively) from uranium; -- used in naming certain complex compounds; as in uranoso-uranic oxide, uranoso-uranic sulphate.

qa_pairs.question: Uranous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to, or containing, uranium; designating those compounds in which uranium has a lower valence as contrasted with the uranic compounds.

qa_pairs.question: Uranus
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The son or husband of Gaia (Earth), and father of Chronos (Time) and the Titans.

qa_pairs.question: Uran-utan
qa_pairs.answer: It means The orang-utang

qa_pairs.question: Uranyl
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The radical UO2, conveniently regarded as a residue of many uranium compounds.

qa_pairs.question: Urao
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Trona.

qa_pairs.question: Urare
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Curare.

qa_pairs.question: Urate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A salt of uric acid; as, sodium urate; ammonium urate.

qa_pairs.question: Uratic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or containing urates; as, uratic calculi.

qa_pairs.question: Urban
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or belonging to a city or town; as, an urban population.

qa_pairs.question: Urbane
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Courteous in manners; polite; refined; elegant.

qa_pairs.question: Urbaniste
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A large and delicious pear or Flemish origin.

qa_pairs.question: Urbanity
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being urbane; civility or courtesy of manners; politeness; refinement.

qa_pairs.question: Urbanize
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To render urban, or urbane; to refine; to polish.

qa_pairs.question: Urbicolae
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An extensive family of butterflies (Hesperidae), including those known as skippers.

qa_pairs.question: Urbicolous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to a city; urban.

qa_pairs.question: Urceolar
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Urceolate.

qa_pairs.question: Urceolate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Shaped like a pitcher or urn; swelling below, and contracted at the orifice, as a calyx or corolla.

qa_pairs.question: Urceole
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A vessel for water for washing the hands; also, one to hold wine or water.

qa_pairs.question: Urceolus
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any urn-shaped organ of a plant.

qa_pairs.question: Urchin
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A hedgehog.

qa_pairs.question: Urchin
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Rough; pricking; piercing.

qa_pairs.question: Urchon
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The urchin, or hedgehog.

qa_pairs.question: Urdu
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The language more generally called also known as Hindustanee.

qa_pairs.question: Ure
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Use; practice; exercise.

qa_pairs.question: Ure
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To use; to exercise; to inure; to accustom by practice.

qa_pairs.question: Urea
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A very soluble crystalline body which is the chief constituent of the urine in mammals and some other animals. It is also present in small quantity in blood, serous fluids, lymph, the liver, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Ureal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to urea; containing, or consisting of, urea; as, ureal deposits.

qa_pairs.question: Ureameter
qa_pairs.answer: It means An apparatus for the determination of the amount of urea in urine, in which the nitrogen evolved by the action of certain reagents, on a given volume of urine, is collected and measured, and the urea calculated accordingly.

qa_pairs.question: Urechitin
qa_pairs.answer: It means A glucoside extracted from the leaves of a certain plant (Urechitis suberecta) as a bitter white crystalline substance.

qa_pairs.question: Urechitoxin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A poisonous glucoside found accompanying urechitin, and extracted as a bitter white crystalline substance.

qa_pairs.question: Uredinales
qa_pairs.answer: It means An order of fungi of the phylum Basidiomycota, comprising the rust fungi.

qa_pairs.question: Uredo
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of the stages in the life history of certain rusts (order Uredinales), regarded at one time as a distinct genus. It is a summer stage preceding the teleutospore, or winter stage. See Uredinales, in the Supplement.

qa_pairs.question: Uredospore
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The thin-walled summer spore which is produced during the so-called Uredo stage of certain rusts. See (in the Supplement) Uredinales, Heter<oe/cious, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Ureide
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any one of the many complex derivatives of urea; thus, hydantoin, and, in an extended dense, guanidine, caffeine, et., are ureides.

qa_pairs.question: -uret
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A suffix with the same meaning as -ide. See -ide.

qa_pairs.question: Ureter
qa_pairs.answer: It means The duct which conveys the urine from the kidney to the bladder or cloaca. There are two ureters, one for each kidney.

qa_pairs.question: Ureteritis
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Inflammation of the ureter.

qa_pairs.question: Urethane
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A white crystalline substance, NH2.CO.OC2H5, produced by the action of ammonia on ethyl carbonate or by heating urea nitrate and ethyl alcohol. It is used as a hypnotic, antipyretic, and antispasmodic. Hence, any ester of carbamic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Urethra
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The canal by which the urine is conducted from the bladder and discharged.

qa_pairs.question: Urethral
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the urethra.

qa_pairs.question: Urethritis
qa_pairs.answer: It means Inflammation of the urethra.

qa_pairs.question: Urethroplasty
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An operation for the repair of an injury or a defect in the walls of the urethra.

qa_pairs.question: Urethroscope
qa_pairs.answer: It means An instrument for viewing the interior of the urethra.

qa_pairs.question: Urethroscopy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Examination of the urethra by means of the urethroscope.

qa_pairs.question: Urethrotome
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An instrument for cutting a urethral stricture.

qa_pairs.question: Urethrotomy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An incision of the urethra, esp. incision for relief of urethral stricture.

qa_pairs.question: Uretic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to the urine; diuretic; urinary; as, uretic medicine.

qa_pairs.question: Urge
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To press; to push; to drive; to impel; to force onward.

qa_pairs.question: Urge
qa_pairs.answer: It means To press onward or forward.

qa_pairs.question: Urgence
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Urgency.

qa_pairs.question: Urgency
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality or condition of being urgent; insistence; pressure; as, the urgency of a demand or an occasion.

qa_pairs.question: Urgent
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Urging; pressing; besetting; plying, with importunity; calling for immediate attention; instantly important.

qa_pairs.question: Urgently
qa_pairs.answer: It means In an urgent manner.

qa_pairs.question: Urger
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who urges.

qa_pairs.question: Uric
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to urine; obtained from urine; as, uric acid.

qa_pairs.question: Urim
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A part or decoration of the breastplate of the high priest among the ancient Jews, by which Jehovah revealed his will on certain occasions. Its nature has been the subject of conflicting conjectures.

qa_pairs.question: Urinal
qa_pairs.answer: It means A vessel for holding urine; especially, a bottle or tube for holding urine for inspection.

qa_pairs.question: Urinarium
qa_pairs.answer: It means A reservoir for urine, etc., for manure.

qa_pairs.question: Urinary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the urine; as, the urinary bladder; urinary excretions.

qa_pairs.question: Urinary
qa_pairs.answer: It means A urinarium; also, a urinal.

qa_pairs.question: Urinate
qa_pairs.answer: It means To discharge urine; to make water.

qa_pairs.question: Urination
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act or process of voiding urine; micturition.

qa_pairs.question: Urinative
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Provoking the flow of urine; uretic; diuretic.

qa_pairs.question: Urinator
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who dives under water in search of something, as for pearls; a diver.

qa_pairs.question: Urine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In mammals, a fluid excretion from the kidneys; in birds and reptiles, a solid or semisolid excretion.

qa_pairs.question: Urine
qa_pairs.answer: It means To urinate.

qa_pairs.question: Uriniferous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Bearing or conveying urine; as, uriniferous tubules.

qa_pairs.question: Uriniparous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Producing or preparing urine; as, the uriniparous tubes in the cortical portion of the kidney.

qa_pairs.question: Urinogenital
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining to the urinary and genital organs; genitourinary; urogenital; as, the urinogenital canal.

qa_pairs.question: Urinometer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A small hydrometer for determining the specific gravity of urine.

qa_pairs.question: Urinometry
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The estimation of the specific gravity of urine by the urinometer.

qa_pairs.question: Urinose
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to urine, or partaking of its qualities; having the character or odor of urine; similar to urine.

qa_pairs.question: Urite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One of the segments of the abdomen or post-abdomen of arthropods.

qa_pairs.question: Urith
qa_pairs.answer: It means The bindings of a hedge.

qa_pairs.question: Urn
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A vessel of various forms, usually a vase furnished with a foot or pedestal, employed for different purposes, as for holding liquids, for ornamental uses, for preserving the ashes of the dead after cremation, and anciently for holding lots to be drawn.

qa_pairs.question: Urn
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To inclose in, or as in, an urn; to inurn.

qa_pairs.question: Urnal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to an urn; effected by an urn or urns.

qa_pairs.question: Urnful
qa_pairs.answer: It means As much as an urn will hold; enough to fill an urn.

qa_pairs.question: Urn-shaped
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having the shape of an urn; as, the urn-shaped capsules of some mosses.

qa_pairs.question: Uro-
qa_pairs.answer: It means A combining form fr. Gr. o'y^ron, _urine_.

qa_pairs.question: Uro-
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A combining form from Gr. o'yra`, the tail, the caudal extremity.

qa_pairs.question: Urobilin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A yellow pigment identical with hydrobilirubin, abundant in the highly colored urine of fever, and also present in normal urine. See Urochrome.

qa_pairs.question: Urocele
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A morbid swelling of the scrotum due to extravasation of urine into it.

qa_pairs.question: Urocerata
qa_pairs.answer: It means A division of boring Hymenoptera, including Tremex and allied genera. See Illust. of Horntail.

qa_pairs.question: Urochord
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The central axis or cord in the tail of larval ascidians and of certain adult tunicates.

qa_pairs.question: Urochorda
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Tunicata.

qa_pairs.question: Urochordal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the Urochorda.

qa_pairs.question: Urochrome
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A yellow urinary pigment, considered by Thudichum as the only pigment present in normal urine. It is regarded by Maly as identical with urobilin.

qa_pairs.question: Urochs
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Aurochs.

qa_pairs.question: Urocord
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Urochord.

qa_pairs.question: Urocyst
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The urinary bladder.

qa_pairs.question: Urodela
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An order of amphibians having the tail well developed and often long. It comprises the salamanders, tritons, and allied animals.

qa_pairs.question: Urodele
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of the Urodela.

qa_pairs.question: Urodelian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the Urodela.

qa_pairs.question: Uroerythrin
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A reddish urinary pigment, considered as the substance which gives to the urine of rheumatism its characteristic color. It also causes the red color often seen in deposits of urates.

qa_pairs.question: Urogastric
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Behind the stomach; -- said of two lobes of the carapace of certain crustaceans.

qa_pairs.question: Urogenital
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Urinogenital.

qa_pairs.question: Uroglaucin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A body identical with indigo blue, occasionally found in the urine in degeneration of the kidneys. It is readily formed by oxidation or decomposition of indican.

qa_pairs.question: Urohaematin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Urinary haematin; -- applied to the normal coloring matter of the urine, on the supposition that it is formed either directly or indirectly (through bilirubin) from the haematin of the blood. See Urochrome, and Urobilin.

qa_pairs.question: Urohyal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to one or more median and posterior elements in the hyoidean arch of fishes.

qa_pairs.question: Urology
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Uronology.

qa_pairs.question: Uromere
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any one of the abdominal segments of an arthropod.

qa_pairs.question: Uronology
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That part of medicine which treats of urine.

qa_pairs.question: Uropod
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any one of the abdominal appendages of a crustacean, especially one of the posterior ones, which are often larger than the rest, and different in structure, and are used chiefly in locomotion. See Illust. of Crustacea, and Stomapoda.

qa_pairs.question: Uropodal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to a uropod.

qa_pairs.question: Uropoetic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Producing, or favoring the production of, urine.

qa_pairs.question: Uropygial
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the uropygium, or prominence at the base of the tail feathers, in birds.

qa_pairs.question: Uropygium
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The prominence at the posterior extremity of a bird's body, which supports the feathers of the tail; the rump; -- sometimes called pope's nose.

qa_pairs.question: Urosacral
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to both the caudal and sacral parts of the vertebral column; as, the urosacral vertebrae of birds.

qa_pairs.question: Uroscopy
qa_pairs.answer: It means The diagnosis of diseases by inspection of urine.

qa_pairs.question: Urosome
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The abdomen, or post-abdomen, of arthropods.

qa_pairs.question: Urostege
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of the plates on the under side of the tail of a serpent.

qa_pairs.question: Urosteon
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A median ossification back of the lophosteon in the sternum of some birds.

qa_pairs.question: Urosternite
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The sternal, or under piece, of any one of the uromeres of insects and other arthropods.

qa_pairs.question: Urostyle
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A styliform process forming the posterior extremity of the vertebral column in some fishes and amphibians.

qa_pairs.question: Urox
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The aurochs.

qa_pairs.question: Uroxanate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A salt of uroxanic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Uroxanic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or designating, an acid, C5H8N4O6, which is obtained, as a white crystalline substance, by the slow oxidation of uric acid in alkaline solution.

qa_pairs.question: Uroxanthin
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Indican.

qa_pairs.question: Urrhodin
qa_pairs.answer: It means Indigo red, a product of the decomposition, or oxidation, of indican. It is sometimes found in the sediment of pathological urines. It is soluble in ether or alcohol, giving the solution a beautiful red color. Also called also known as indigrubin.

qa_pairs.question: Urry
qa_pairs.answer: It means A sort of blue or black clay lying near a vein of coal.

qa_pairs.question: Ursa
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Either one of the Bears. See the Phrases below.

qa_pairs.question: Ursal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The ursine seal. See the Note under 1st Seal.

qa_pairs.question: Ursiform
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having the shape of a bear.

qa_pairs.question: Ursine
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to a bear; resembling a bear.

qa_pairs.question: Urson
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The Canada porcupine. See Porcupine.

qa_pairs.question: Ursuk
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The bearded seal.

qa_pairs.question: Ursula
qa_pairs.answer: It means A beautiful North American butterfly (Basilarchia astyanax syn. Limenitis astyanax). Its wings are nearly black with red and blue spots and blotches. Called also also known as red-spotted purple.

qa_pairs.question: Ursuline
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of an order of nuns founded by St. Angela Merici, at Brescia, in Italy, about the year 1537, and so called from St. Ursula, under whose protection it was placed. The order was introduced into Canada as early as 1639, and into the United States in 1727. The members are devoted entirely to education.

qa_pairs.question: Ursuline
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to St. Ursula, or the order of Ursulines; as, the Ursuline nuns.

qa_pairs.question: Ursus
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus of Carnivora including the common bears.

qa_pairs.question: Urtica
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of plants including the common nettles. See Nettle, (n.)

qa_pairs.question: Urticaceous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to a natural order (Urticaceae) of plants, of which the nettle is the type. The order includes also the hop, the elm, the mulberry, the fig, and many other plants.

qa_pairs.question: Urtical
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Resembling nettles; -- said of several natural orders allied to urticaceous plants.

qa_pairs.question: Urticaria
qa_pairs.answer: It means The nettle rash, a disease characterized by a transient eruption of red pimples and of wheals, accompanied with a burning or stinging sensation and with itching; uredo.

qa_pairs.question: Urticate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To sting with, or as with, nettles; to irritate; to annoy.

qa_pairs.question: Urtication
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act or process of whipping or stinging with nettles; -- sometimes used in the treatment of paralysis.

qa_pairs.question: Urubu
qa_pairs.answer: It means The black vulture (Catharista atrata). It ranges from the Southern United States to South America. See Vulture.

qa_pairs.question: Urus
qa_pairs.answer: It means A very large, powerful, and savage extinct bovine animal (Bos urus _or_ Bos primigenius) anciently abundant in Europe. It appears to have still existed in the time of Julius Caesar. It had very large horns, and was hardly capable of domestication. Called also, also known as ur, also known as ure, and also known as tur.

qa_pairs.question: Urva
qa_pairs.answer: It means The crab-eating ichneumon (Herpestes urva), native of India. The fur is black, annulated with white at the tip of each hair, and a white streak extends from the mouth to the shoulder.

qa_pairs.question: Us
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The persons speaking, regarded as an object; ourselves; -- the objective case of we. See We.

qa_pairs.question: Usable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Capable of being used.

qa_pairs.question: Usage
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of using; mode of using or treating; treatment; conduct with respect to a person or a thing; as, good usage; ill usage; hard usage.

qa_pairs.question: Usager
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who has the use of anything in trust for another.

qa_pairs.question: Usance
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Use; usage; employment.

qa_pairs.question: Usant
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Using; accustomed.

qa_pairs.question: Usbegs
qa_pairs.answer: It means A Turkish tribe which about the close of the 15th century conquered, and settled in, that part of Asia now called Turkestan.

qa_pairs.question: Use
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of employing anything, or of applying it to one's service; the state of being so employed or applied; application; employment; conversion to some purpose; as, the use of a pen in writing; his machines are in general use.

qa_pairs.question: Use
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To make use of; to convert to one's service; to avail one's self of; to employ; to put a purpose; as, to use a plow; to use a chair; to use time; to use flour for food; to use water for irrigation.

qa_pairs.question: Use
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To be wont or accustomed; to be in the habit or practice; as, he used to ride daily; -- now disused in the present tense, perhaps because of the similarity in sound, between <ldquo/use to,<rdquo/ and <ldquo/used to.<rdquo/

qa_pairs.question: Useful
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Full of use, advantage, or profit; producing, or having power to produce, good; serviceable for any end or object; helpful toward advancing any purpose; beneficial; profitable; advantageous; as, vessels and instruments useful in a family; books useful for improvement; useful knowledge; useful arts.

qa_pairs.question: Usefully
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In a useful manner.

qa_pairs.question: Usefulness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or state of being useful; utility; serviceableness; advantage.

qa_pairs.question: Useless
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having, or being of, no use; unserviceable; producing no good end; answering no valuable purpose; not advancing the end proposed; unprofitable; ineffectual; as, a useless garment; useless pity.

qa_pairs.question: User
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who uses.

qa_pairs.question: U-shaped
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having the form of the letter U;

qa_pairs.question: Usher
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An officer or servant who has the care of the door of a court, hall, chamber, or the like; hence, an officer whose business it is to introduce strangers, or to walk before a person of rank. Also, one who escorts persons to seats in a church, theater, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Usher
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To introduce or escort, as an usher, forerunner, or harbinger; to forerun; -- sometimes followed by in or forth; as, to usher in a stranger; to usher forth the guests; to usher a visitor into the room.

qa_pairs.question: Usherance
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of ushering, or the state of being ushered in.

qa_pairs.question: Usherdom
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The office or position of an usher; ushership; also, ushers, collectively.

qa_pairs.question: Usherless
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Destitute of an usher.

qa_pairs.question: Ushership
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The office of an usher; usherdom.

qa_pairs.question: Usitative
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Denoting usual or customary action.

qa_pairs.question: Usnea
qa_pairs.answer: It means A genus of lichens, most of the species of which have long, gray, pendulous, and finely branched fronds. Usnea barbata is the common bearded lichen which grows on branches of trees in northern forests.

qa_pairs.question: Usnic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or designating, a complex acid obtained, as a yellow crystalline substance, from certain genera of lichens (*Usnea*, *Parmelia*, etc.).

qa_pairs.question: Usquebaugh
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A compound distilled spirit made in Ireland and Scotland; whisky.

qa_pairs.question: Usself
qa_pairs.answer: It means Ourselves.

qa_pairs.question: Ustion
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of burning, or the state of being burned.

qa_pairs.question: Ustorious
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having the quality of burning.

qa_pairs.question: Ustulate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Blackened as if burned.

qa_pairs.question: Ustulation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of burning or searing.

qa_pairs.question: Usual
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Such as is in common use; such as occurs in ordinary practice, or in the ordinary course of events; customary; ordinary; habitual; common.

qa_pairs.question: Usucaption
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The acquisition of the title or right to property by the uninterrupted possession of it for a certain term prescribed by law; -- the same as also known as prescription in common law.

qa_pairs.question: Usufruct
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The right of using and enjoying the profits of an estate or other thing belonging to another, without impairing the substance.

qa_pairs.question: Usufructuary
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A person who has the use of property and reaps the profits of it.

qa_pairs.question: Usufructuary
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to a usufruct; having the nature of a usufruct.

qa_pairs.question: Usurarious
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Usurious.

qa_pairs.question: Usure
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To practice usury; to charge unlawful interest.

qa_pairs.question: Usure
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Usury.

qa_pairs.question: Usurer
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who lends money and takes interest for it; a money lender.

qa_pairs.question: Usurious
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Practicing usury; taking illegal or exorbitant interest for the use of money; as, a usurious person.

qa_pairs.question: Usurp
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To seize, and hold in possession, by force, or without right; as, to usurp a throne; to usurp the prerogatives of the crown; to usurp power; to usurp the right of a patron is to oust or dispossess him.

qa_pairs.question: Usurp
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To commit forcible seizure of place, power, functions, or the like, without right; to commit unjust encroachments; to be, or act as, a usurper.

qa_pairs.question: Usurpant
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Usurping; encroaching.

qa_pairs.question: Usurpation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of usurping, or of seizing and enjoying; an authorized, arbitrary assumption and exercise of power, especially an infringing on the rights of others; specifically, the illegal seizure of sovereign power; -- commonly used with of, also used with on or upon; as, the usurpation of a throne; the usurpation of the supreme power.

qa_pairs.question: Usurpatory
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Marked by usurpation; usurping.

qa_pairs.question: Usurpature
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Usurpation.

qa_pairs.question: Usurper
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who usurps; especially, one who seizes illegally on sovereign power; as, the usurper of a throne, of power, or of the rights of a patron.

qa_pairs.question: Usurpingly
qa_pairs.answer: It means In a usurping manner.

qa_pairs.question: Usury
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A premium or increase paid, or stipulated to be paid, for a loan, as of money; interest.

qa_pairs.question: Ut
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The first note in Guido's musical scale, now usually superseded by do. See Solmization.

qa_pairs.question: Utas
qa_pairs.answer: It means The eighth day after any term or feast; the octave; as, the utas of St. Michael.

qa_pairs.question: Utensil
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is That which is used; an instrument; an implement; especially, an instrument or vessel used in a kitchen, or in domestic and farming business.

qa_pairs.question: Uterine
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or instrument to the uterus, or womb.

qa_pairs.question: Uterogestation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Gestation in the womb from conception to birth; pregnancy.

qa_pairs.question: Uterovaginal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to both the uterus and the vagina.

qa_pairs.question: Uterus
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The organ of a female mammal in which the young are developed previous to birth; the womb.

qa_pairs.question: Utes
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An extensive tribe of North American Indians of the Shoshone stock, inhabiting Colorado, Utah, New Mexico, Arizona, and adjacent regions. They are subdivided into several subordinate tribes, some of which are among the most degraded of North American Indians.

qa_pairs.question: Utia
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any species of large West Indian rodents of the genus *Capromys*, or *Utia*. In general appearance and habits they resemble rats, but they are as large as rabbits.

qa_pairs.question: Utica
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of, pertaining to, or designating, a subdivision of the Trenton Period of the Lower Silurian, characterized in the State of New York by beds of shale.

qa_pairs.question: Utile
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Profitable; useful.

qa_pairs.question: Utilitarian
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to utility; consisting in utility; as, utilitarian narrowness; a utilitarian indifference to art.

qa_pairs.question: Utilitarian
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who holds the doctrine of utilitarianism.

qa_pairs.question: Utilitarianism
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The doctrine that the greatest happiness of the greatest number should be the end and aim of all social and political institutions.

qa_pairs.question: Utility
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being useful; usefulness; production of good; profitableness to some valuable end; as, the utility of manure upon land; the utility of the sciences; the utility of medicines.

qa_pairs.question: Utilizable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Capable of being utilized; as, the utilizable products of the gas works.

qa_pairs.question: Utilization
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of utilizing, or the state of being utilized.

qa_pairs.question: Utilize
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To make useful; to turn to profitable account or use; to make use of; as, to utilize the whole power of a machine; to utilize one's opportunities.

qa_pairs.question: Uti possidetis
qa_pairs.answer: It means The basis or principle of a treaty which leaves belligerents mutually in possession of what they have acquired by their arms during the war.

qa_pairs.question: Utis
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Utas.

qa_pairs.question: Utlary
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Outlawry.

qa_pairs.question: Utmost
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Situated at the farthest point or extremity; farthest out; most distant; extreme; as, the utmost limits of the land; the utmost extent of human knowledge.

qa_pairs.question: Utmost
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The most that can be; the farthest limit; the greatest power, degree, or effort; as, he has done his utmost; try your utmost.

qa_pairs.question: Utopia
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An imaginary island, represented by Sir Thomas More, in a work called Utopia, as enjoying the greatest perfection in politics, laws, and the like. See Utopia, in the Dictionary of Noted Names in Fiction.

qa_pairs.question: Utopian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to Utopia; resembling Utopia; hence, ideal; chimerical; fanciful; founded upon, or involving, imaginary perfections; as, Utopian projects; Utopian happiness.

qa_pairs.question: Utopian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An inhabitant of Utopia; hence, one who believes in the perfectibility of human society; a visionary; an idealist; an optimist.

qa_pairs.question: Utopianism
qa_pairs.answer: It means The ideas, views, aims, etc., of a Utopian; impracticable schemes of human perfection; optimism.

qa_pairs.question: Utopianist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An Utopian; an optimist.

qa_pairs.question: Utopical
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Utopian; ideal.

qa_pairs.question: Utopist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A Utopian.

qa_pairs.question: Utraquist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who receives the eucharist in both kinds; esp., one of a body of Hussites who in the 15th century fought for the right to do this. Called also also known as Calixtines.

qa_pairs.question: Utricle
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A little sac or vesicle, as the air cell of fucus, or seaweed.

qa_pairs.question: Utricular
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to a utricle, or utriculus; containing, or furnished with, a utricle or utricles; utriculate; as, a utricular plant.

qa_pairs.question: Utricularia
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus of aquatic flowering plants, in which the submersed leaves bear many little utricles, or ascidia. See Ascidium,

qa_pairs.question: Utriculate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Resembling a bladder; swollen like a bladder; inflated; utricular.

qa_pairs.question: Utriculoid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Resembling a bladder; utricular; utriculate.

qa_pairs.question: Utriculus
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A little sac, or bag; a utricle; especially, a part of the membranous labyrinth of the ear. See the Note under Ear.

qa_pairs.question: Utro-
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A combining form used in anatomy to indicate connection with, or relation to, the uterus; as in utro-ovarian.

qa_pairs.question: Utter
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Outer.

qa_pairs.question: Utter
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To put forth or out; to reach out.

qa_pairs.question: Utterable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Capable of being uttered.

qa_pairs.question: Utterance
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of uttering.

qa_pairs.question: Utterance
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The last extremity; the end; death; outrance.

qa_pairs.question: Utterer
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who utters.

qa_pairs.question: Utterest
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Uttermost.

qa_pairs.question: Utterless
qa_pairs.answer: It means Incapable of being uttered.

qa_pairs.question: Utterly
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In an utter manner; to the full extent; fully; totally; as, utterly ruined; it is utterly vain.

qa_pairs.question: Uttermore
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Further; outer; utter.

qa_pairs.question: Uttermost
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Extreme; utmost; being; in the farthest, greatest, or highest degree; as, the uttermost extent or end.

qa_pairs.question: Uttermost
qa_pairs.answer: It means The utmost; the highest or greatest degree; the farthest extent.

qa_pairs.question: Utterness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being utter, or extreme; extremity; utmost; uttermost.

qa_pairs.question: Uva
qa_pairs.answer: It means A small pulpy or juicy fruit containing several seeds and having a thin skin, as a grape.

qa_pairs.question: Uvate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A conserve made of grapes.

qa_pairs.question: Uva-ursi
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The bearberry.

qa_pairs.question: Uvea
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The posterior pigmented layer of the iris; -- sometimes applied to the whole iris together with the choroid coat.

qa_pairs.question: Uveous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Resembling a grape.

qa_pairs.question: Uvic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or obtained from, grapes; specifically, designating an organic acid, C7H8O3 (also called pyrotritartaric acid), obtained as a white crystalline substance by the decomposition of tartaric and pyrotartaric acids.

qa_pairs.question: Uvitic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or designating, an acid, CH3C6H3(CO2H)2, obtained as a white crystalline substance by the partial oxidation of mesitylene; -- called also mesitic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Uvitonic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or designating, an acid which is obtained as a white crystalline substance by the action of ammonia on pyrotartaric acid.

qa_pairs.question: Uvrou
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Euphroe.

qa_pairs.question: Uvula
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The pendent fleshy lobe in the middle of the posterior border of the soft palate.

qa_pairs.question: Uvular
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to a uvula.

qa_pairs.question: Uvulatome
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An instrument for removing the uvula.

qa_pairs.question: Uvulatomy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The operation of removing the uvula.

qa_pairs.question: Uvulitis
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Inflammation of the uvula.

qa_pairs.question: Uwarowite
qa_pairs.answer: It means Ouvarovite.

qa_pairs.question: Uxorial
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Dotingly fond of, or servilely submissive to, a wife; uxorious; also, becoming a wife; pertaining to a wife.

qa_pairs.question: Uxoricidal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to uxoricide; tending to uxoricide.

qa_pairs.question: Uxoricide
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The murder of a wife by her husband.

qa_pairs.question: Uxorious
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Excessively fond of, or submissive to, a wife; being a dependent husband.

qa_pairs.question: Uzema
qa_pairs.answer: It means A Burman measure of twelve miles.

qa_pairs.question: O
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is O, the fifteenth letter of the English alphabet, derives its form, value, and name from the Greek O, through the Latin. The letter came into the Greek from the Ph<oe/nician, which possibly derived it ultimately from the Egyptian. Etymologically, the letter _o_ is most closely related to _a_, _e_, and _u_; as in E. b_o_ne, AS. b_<amac/_n; E. st_o_ne, AS. st_<amac/_n; E. br_o_ke, AS. br_e_can to break; E. b_o_re, AS. b_e_ran to bear; E. d_o_ve, AS. d_<umac/_fe; E. t_o_ft, t_u_ft; t_o_ne, t_u_ne; n_u_mber, F. n_o_mbre.

qa_pairs.question: O
qa_pairs.answer: It means The letter O, or its sound.

qa_pairs.question: O
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A prefix to Irish family names, which signifies grandson or descendant of, and is a character of dignity; as, O'Neil, O'Carrol.

qa_pairs.question: O
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A shortened form of of or on.

qa_pairs.question: O
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One.

qa_pairs.question: O
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An exclamation used in calling or directly addressing a person or personified object; also, as an emotional or impassioned exclamation expressing pain, grief, surprise, desire, fear, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Oad
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Woad.

qa_pairs.question: Oaf
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Originally, an elf's child; a changeling left by fairies or goblins; hence, a deformed or foolish child; a simpleton; an idiot.

qa_pairs.question: Oafish
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Like an oaf; simple or clumsy.

qa_pairs.question: Oak
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any tree or shrub of the genus *Quercus*. The oaks have alternate leaves, often variously lobed, and staminate flowers in catkins. The fruit is a smooth nut, called an acorn, which is more or less inclosed in a scaly involucre called the cup or cupule. There are now recognized about three hundred species, of which nearly fifty occur in the United States, the rest in Europe, Asia, and the other parts of North America, a very few barely reaching the northern parts of South America and Africa. Many of the oaks form forest trees of grand proportions and live many centuries. The wood is usually hard and tough, and provided with conspicuous medullary rays, forming the silver grain.

qa_pairs.question: Oaken
qa_pairs.answer: It means Made or consisting of oaks or of the wood of oaks.

qa_pairs.question: Oaker
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Ocher.

qa_pairs.question: Oakling
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A young oak.

qa_pairs.question: Oakum
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The material obtained by untwisting and picking into loose fiber old hemp ropes; -- used for calking the seams of ships, stopping leaks, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Oaky
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Resembling oak; strong.

qa_pairs.question: Oar
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An implement for impelling a boat, being a slender piece of timber, usually ash or spruce, with a grip or handle at one end and a broad blade at the other. The part which rests in the rowlock is called the loom.

qa_pairs.question: Oar
qa_pairs.answer: It means To row.

qa_pairs.question: Oared
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Furnished with oars; -- chiefly used in composition; as, a four-oared boat.

qa_pairs.question: Oarfish
qa_pairs.answer: It means The ribbon fish.

qa_pairs.question: Oarfoot
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any crustacean of the genus *Remipes*.

qa_pairs.question: Oar-footed
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having feet adapted for swimming.

qa_pairs.question: Oarless
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Without oars.

qa_pairs.question: Oarlock
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The notch, fork, or other device on the gunwale of a boat, in which the oar rests, and that holds the oar in place and acts as a fulcrum for rowing. Certain oarlocks are designed for use with oars having attached swivels, which insert into the oarlock and provide a firm pivot. Same as Rowlock{1}.

qa_pairs.question: Oarsman
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who uses, or is skilled in the use of, an oar; a rower.

qa_pairs.question: oarsmanship
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is skill as an oarsman.

qa_pairs.question: Oarsweed
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any large seaweed of the genus *Laminaria*; tangle; kelp. See Kelp.

qa_pairs.question: oarswoman
qa_pairs.answer: It means a woman oarsman.

qa_pairs.question: Oary
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having the form or the use of an oar; as, the swan's oary feet.

qa_pairs.question: OAS
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The Organization of American States an international association of countries in the Western hemisphere. It was created in 1948 to promote military and economic and social and cultural cooperation.

qa_pairs.question: Oasis
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A fertile or green spot in a waste or desert, esp. in a sandy desert, where the water table approaches the surface.

qa_pairs.question: Oast
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A kiln to dry hops or malt; a cockle.

qa_pairs.question: Oat
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A well-known cereal grass (Avena sativa), and its edible grain, used as food and fodder; -- commonly used in the plural and in a collective sense.

qa_pairs.question: Oatcake
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A cake made of oatmeal.

qa_pairs.question: Oaten
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Consisting of an oat straw or stem; as, an oaten pipe.

qa_pairs.question: Oath
qa_pairs.answer: It means A solemn affirmation or declaration, made with a reverent appeal to God for the truth of what is affirmed.

qa_pairs.question: Oathable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Capable of having an oath administered to.

qa_pairs.question: Oathbreaking
qa_pairs.answer: It means The violation of an oath; perjury.

qa_pairs.question: Oatmeal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Meal made of oats.

qa_pairs.question: Ob-
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A prefix signifying to, toward, before, against, reversely, etc.; also, as a simple intensive; as in oblige, to bind to; obstacle, something standing before; object, lit., to throw against; obovate, reversely, or oppositely, ovate. Ob- is commonly assimilated before c, f, g, and p, to oc-, of-, og-, and op-.

qa_pairs.question: Obcompressed
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Compressed or flattened antero-posteriorly, or in a way opposite to the usual one.

qa_pairs.question: Obconic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Conical, but having the apex downward; inversely conical.

qa_pairs.question: Obcordate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Heart-shaped, with the attachment at the pointed end; inversely cordate; as, an obcordate petal or leaf.

qa_pairs.question: Obdiplostemonous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having twice as many stamens as petals, those of the outer set being opposite the petals; -- said of flowers.

qa_pairs.question: Obdiplostemony
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The condition of being obdiplostemonous.

qa_pairs.question: Obdormition
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Sleep.

qa_pairs.question: Obduce
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To draw over, as a covering.

qa_pairs.question: Obduct
qa_pairs.answer: It means To draw over; to cover.

qa_pairs.question: Obduction
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of drawing or laying over, as a covering.

qa_pairs.question: Obduracy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The duality or state of being obdurate; invincible hardness of heart; obstinacy.

qa_pairs.question: Obdurate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Hardened in feelings, esp. against moral or mollifying influences; unyielding; hard-hearted; stubbornly wicked.

qa_pairs.question: Obdurate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To harden.

qa_pairs.question: Obduration
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A hardening of the heart; hardness of heart.

qa_pairs.question: Obdure
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To harden.

qa_pairs.question: Obdure
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Obdurate; hard.

qa_pairs.question: Obdureness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Hardness.

qa_pairs.question: Obe
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Obi.

qa_pairs.question: Obeah
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Obi.

qa_pairs.question: obechi
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A large Western African tree (Triplochiton scleroxcylon) having large palmately lobed leaves and axillary cymose panicles of small white flowers and one-winged seeds; it yields soft white to pale yellow wood.

qa_pairs.question: Obedible
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Obedient.

qa_pairs.question: Obedience
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of obeying, or the state of being obedient; compliance with that which is required by authority; subjection to rightful restraint or control.

qa_pairs.question: Obedienciary
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One yielding obedience.

qa_pairs.question: Obedient
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Subject in will or act to authority; willing to obey; submissive to restraint, control, or command.

qa_pairs.question: Obediential
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as According to the rule of obedience.

qa_pairs.question: Obediently
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In an obedient manner; with obedience.

qa_pairs.question: Obeisance
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Obedience.

qa_pairs.question: Obeisancy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Obeisance.

qa_pairs.question: Obeisant
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Ready to obey; reverent; deferential; also, servilely submissive.

qa_pairs.question: Obelion
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The region of the skull between the two parietal foramina where the closure of the sagittal suture usually begins.

qa_pairs.question: Obeliscal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Formed like an obelisk.

qa_pairs.question: obelisk
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An upright, four-sided pillar, gradually tapering as it rises, and terminating in a pyramid called pyramidion. It is ordinarily monolithic. Egyptian obelisks are commonly covered with hieroglyphic writing from top to bottom.

qa_pairs.question: Obelisk
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To mark or designate with an obelisk.

qa_pairs.question: Obelize
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To designate with an obelus; to mark as doubtful or spirituous.

qa_pairs.question: Obelus
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A mark [thus <mdash/, or <divide/]; -- so called as resembling a needle. In old MSS. or editions of the classics, it marks suspected passages or readings.

qa_pairs.question: Obequitate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To ride about.

qa_pairs.question: Oberon
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The king of the fairies, and husband of Titania or Queen Mab.

qa_pairs.question: Oberration
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A wandering about.

qa_pairs.question: Obese
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Excessively corpulent; fat; fleshy.

qa_pairs.question: Obeseness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Quality of being obese; obesity.

qa_pairs.question: obesity
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The state or quality of being obese; excessive body weight; incumbrance of flesh.

qa_pairs.question: Obey
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To give ear to; to execute the commands of; to yield submission to; to comply with the orders of.

qa_pairs.question: Obey
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To give obedience.

qa_pairs.question: Obeyer
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who yields obedience.

qa_pairs.question: Obeyingly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Obediently; submissively.

qa_pairs.question: Obfirm
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To make firm; to harden in resolution.

qa_pairs.question: Obfirmation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Hardness of heart; obduracy.

qa_pairs.question: Obfuscate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Obfuscated; darkened; obscured.

qa_pairs.question: Obfuscate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To darken; to obscure; to becloud.

qa_pairs.question: Obfuscation
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of darkening or bewildering; the state of being darkened.

qa_pairs.question: Obi
qa_pairs.answer: It means A species of sorcery, probably of African origin, practiced among the negroes of the West Indies.

qa_pairs.question: Obi
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A sash, esp. the long belt-like broad sash of soft material worn by women aound the waist when wearing a traditional kimono, and usually having a large bow at the back.

qa_pairs.question: Obiism
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Belief in, or the practice of, the obi superstitions and rites.

qa_pairs.question: Obimbricate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Imbricated, with the overlapping ends directed downward.

qa_pairs.question: Obit
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Death; decease; the date of one's death.

qa_pairs.question: Obiter
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In passing; incidentally; by the way.

qa_pairs.question: obiter dictum
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An incidental and collateral opinion uttered by a judge. See Dictum, (n.), 2 (a).

qa_pairs.question: Obitual
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to obits, or days when obits are celebrated; as, obitual days.

qa_pairs.question: Obituarily
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In the manner of an obituary.

qa_pairs.question: Obituary
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the death of a person or persons; as, an obituary notice; obituary poetry.

qa_pairs.question: obituary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That which pertains to, or is called forth by, the obit or death of a person; esp., an account of a deceased person.

qa_pairs.question: Object
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To set before or against; to bring into opposition; to oppose.

qa_pairs.question: Object
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To make opposition in words or argument; to express one's displeasure; -- usually followed by to; as, she objected to his vulgar language.

qa_pairs.question: Object
qa_pairs.answer: It means That which is put, or which may be regarded as put, in the way of some of the senses; something visible or tangible and persists for an appreciable time; as, he observed an object in the distance; all the objects in sight; he touched a strange object in the dark.

qa_pairs.question: Object
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Opposed; presented in opposition; also, exposed.

qa_pairs.question: Objectable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Such as can be presented in opposition; that may be put forward as an objection.

qa_pairs.question: object file
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A computer program which has been translated into machine language by a compiler and assembler, but not yet linked into an executable program; sometimes called an also known as obj file, because its file name typically has the extension <ldquo/obj<rdquo/ .

qa_pairs.question: objectification
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as representing as an object.

qa_pairs.question: Objectify
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To cause to become an object; to cause to assume the character of an object; to represent or consider as an object; to render objective.

qa_pairs.question: Objection
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of objecting; as, to prevent agreement, or action, by objection.

qa_pairs.question: Objectionable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Liable to objection; likely to be objected to or disapproved of; offensive; as, objectionable words.

qa_pairs.question: Objectist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who adheres to, or is skilled in, the objective philosophy.

qa_pairs.question: Objectivate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To objectify.

qa_pairs.question: Objectivation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Converting into an object.

qa_pairs.question: Objective
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to an object.

qa_pairs.question: Objective
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The objective case.

qa_pairs.question: objective lens
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An object glass. See under Object, (n.)

qa_pairs.question: Objectively
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In the manner or state of an object; as, a determinate idea objectively in the mind.

qa_pairs.question: Objectiveness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Objectivity.

qa_pairs.question: Objectivity
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state, quality, or relation of being objective; character of the object or of the objective.

qa_pairs.question: Objectize
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To make an object of; to regard as an object; to place in the position of an object.

qa_pairs.question: Objectless
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having no object; purposeless.

qa_pairs.question: Objector
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who objects; one who offers objections to a proposition or measure.

qa_pairs.question: object-oriented
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Using data structures called objects, which encapsulate data and typically are accessed by passing messages, which in turn may trigger internal procedures within the object which are invisible outside the object.

qa_pairs.question: Objibways
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Chippeways.

qa_pairs.question: Objicient
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who makes objection; an objector.

qa_pairs.question: Objuration
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A binding by oath.

qa_pairs.question: Objurgate
qa_pairs.answer: It means To chide; to reprove.

qa_pairs.question: Objurgation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of objurgating; reproof.

qa_pairs.question: Objurgatory
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Designed to objurgate or chide; containing or expressing reproof; culpatory.

qa_pairs.question: Oblanceolate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Lanceolate in the reversed order, that is, narrowing toward the point of attachment more than toward the apex.

qa_pairs.question: Oblate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Flattened or depressed at the poles; as, the earth is an oblate spheroid.

qa_pairs.question: Oblate
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of an association of priests or religious women who have offered themselves to the service of the church. There are three such associations of priests, and one of women, called oblates.

qa_pairs.question: Oblateness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being oblate.

qa_pairs.question: Oblati
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Children dedicated in their early years to the monastic state.

qa_pairs.question: Oblation
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of offering, or of making an offering.

qa_pairs.question: Oblationer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who makes an offering as an act worship or reverence.

qa_pairs.question: Oblatrate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To bark or snarl, as a dog.

qa_pairs.question: Oblatration
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of oblatrating; a barking or snarling.

qa_pairs.question: Oblatum
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An oblate spheroid; a figure described by the revolution of an ellipse about its minor axis. Cf. Oblongum.

qa_pairs.question: Oblectate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To delight; to please greatly.

qa_pairs.question: Oblectation
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of pleasing highly; the state of being greatly pleased; delight.

qa_pairs.question: Obligable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Acknowledging, or complying with, obligation; trustworthy.

qa_pairs.question: Obligate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To bring or place under obligation, moral or legal; to hold by a constraining motive.

qa_pairs.question: obligated
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is under a moral obligation to someone.

qa_pairs.question: Obligation
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of obligating.

qa_pairs.question: obligational
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is relating or constituting or qualified to create a legal or financial obligation; as, obligational authority.

qa_pairs.question: Obligato
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Obbligato.

qa_pairs.question: Obligatorily
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In an obligatory manner; by reason of obligation.

qa_pairs.question: Obligatoriness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or state of being obligatory.

qa_pairs.question: Obligatory
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Binding in law or conscience; imposing duty or obligation; requiring performance or forbearance of some act; -- often followed by on or upon; as, obedience is obligatory on a soldier.

qa_pairs.question: Oblige
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To attach, as by a bond.

qa_pairs.question: obligee
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The person to whom another is bound, or the person to whom a bond is given.

qa_pairs.question: obligement
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Obligation.

qa_pairs.question: obliger
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who, or that which, obliges.

qa_pairs.question: obliging
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Putting under obligation; disposed to oblige or do favors; hence, helpful; civil; kind.

qa_pairs.question: Obligor
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The person who binds himself, or gives his bond to another.

qa_pairs.question: Obliquation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of becoming oblique; a turning to one side; obliquity; as, the obliquation of the eyes.

qa_pairs.question: Oblique
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not erect or perpendicular; neither parallel to, nor at right angles from, the base; slanting; inclined.

qa_pairs.question: Oblique
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An oblique line.

qa_pairs.question: Oblique
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To deviate from a perpendicular line; to move in an oblique direction.

qa_pairs.question: Oblique-angled
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having oblique angles; as, an oblique-angled triangle.

qa_pairs.question: Obliquely
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In an oblique manner; not directly; indirectly.

qa_pairs.question: Obliqueness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Quality or state of being oblique.

qa_pairs.question: Obliquity
qa_pairs.answer: It means The condition of being oblique; deviation from a right line; deviation from parallelism or perpendicularity; the amount of such deviation; divergence; as, the obliquity of the ecliptic to the equator.

qa_pairs.question: Oblite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Indistinct; slurred over.

qa_pairs.question: Obliterate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To erase or blot out; to efface; to render undecipherable, as a writing.

qa_pairs.question: Obliterate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Scarcely distinct; -- applied to the markings of insects.

qa_pairs.question: obliterated
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as destroyed so thoroughly as to be unrecognizable or imperceptible.

qa_pairs.question: obliterating
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is making undecipherable or imperceptible; as, obliterating mists.

qa_pairs.question: Obliteration
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of obliterating, or the state of being obliterated; extinction.

qa_pairs.question: Obliterative
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Tending or serving to obliterate.

qa_pairs.question: Oblivion
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of forgetting, or the state of being forgotten; cessation of remembrance; forgetfulness.

qa_pairs.question: Oblivious
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Promoting oblivion; causing forgetfulness.

qa_pairs.question: obliviousness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as total forgetfulness.

qa_pairs.question: Oblocutor
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A disputer; a gainsayer.

qa_pairs.question: Oblong
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having greater length than breadth, esp. when rectangular.

qa_pairs.question: Oblong
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A rectangular figure longer than it is broad; hence, any figure longer than it is broad.

qa_pairs.question: Oblongata
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The medulla oblongata.

qa_pairs.question: Oblongatal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to the medulla oblongata; medullar.

qa_pairs.question: Oblongish
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Somewhat oblong.

qa_pairs.question: Oblongly
qa_pairs.answer: It means In an oblong form.

qa_pairs.question: Oblongness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as State or quality of being oblong.

qa_pairs.question: Oblong-ovate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Between oblong and ovate, but inclined to the latter.

qa_pairs.question: Oblongum
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A prolate spheroid; a figure described by the revolution of an ellipse about its greater axis. Cf. Oblatum, and see Ellipsoid of revolution, under Ellipsoid.

qa_pairs.question: Obloquious
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Containing obloquy; reproachful

qa_pairs.question: Obloquy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Censorious speech; defamatory language; language that casts contempt on men or their actions; blame; reprehension.

qa_pairs.question: Obluctation
qa_pairs.answer: It means A struggle against; resistance; opposition.

qa_pairs.question: Obmutescence
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A becoming dumb; loss of speech.

qa_pairs.question: Obnoxious
qa_pairs.answer: It means Subject; liable; exposed; answerable; amenable; -- with to.

qa_pairs.question: Obnubilate
qa_pairs.answer: It means To cloud; to obscure.

qa_pairs.question: Oboe
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of the higher wind instruments in the modern orchestra, yet of great antiquity, having a penetrating pastoral quality of tone, somewhat like the clarinet in form, but more slender, and sounded by means of a double reed; a hautboy.

qa_pairs.question: Oboist
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A performer on the oboe.

qa_pairs.question: Obolary
qa_pairs.answer: It means Possessing only small coins; impoverished.

qa_pairs.question: Obole
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A weight of twelve grains; or, according to some, of ten grains, or half a scruple.

qa_pairs.question: Obolize
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Obelize.

qa_pairs.question: Obolo
qa_pairs.answer: It means A copper coin, used in the Ionian Islands, about one cent in value.

qa_pairs.question: Obolus
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A small silver coin of Athens, the sixth part of a drachma, about three cents in value.

qa_pairs.question: Obomegoid
qa_pairs.answer: It means Obversely omegoid.

qa_pairs.question: Oboval
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Obovate.

qa_pairs.question: Obovate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Inversely ovate; ovate with the narrow end downward; as, an obovate leaf.

qa_pairs.question: Obreption
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of creeping upon with secrecy or by surprise.

qa_pairs.question: Obreptitious
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Done or obtained by surprise; with secrecy, or by concealment of the truth.

qa_pairs.question: Obrogate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To annul indirectly by enacting a new and contrary law, instead of by expressly abrogating or repealing the old one.

qa_pairs.question: Obrok
qa_pairs.answer: It means A rent.

qa_pairs.question: Obscene
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Offensive to chastity or modesty; expressing or presenting to the mind or view something which delicacy, purity, and decency forbid to be exposed; impure; as, obscene language; obscene pictures.

qa_pairs.question: Obscenity
qa_pairs.answer: It means That quality in words or things which presents what is offensive to chastity or purity of mind; obscene or impure lanquage or acts; moral impurity; lewdness; obsceneness; as, the obscenity of a speech, or a picture.

qa_pairs.question: Obscurant
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who obscures; one who prevents enlightenment or hinders the progress of knowledge and wisdom.

qa_pairs.question: Obscurantism
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The system or the principles of the obscurants.

qa_pairs.question: Obscurantist
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Obscurant.

qa_pairs.question: Obscuration
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act or operation of obscuring; the state of being obscured; as, the obscuration of the moon in an eclipse.

qa_pairs.question: Obscure
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Covered over, shaded, or darkened; destitute of light; imperfectly illuminated; dusky; dim.

qa_pairs.question: Obscure
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To render obscure; to darken; to make dim; to keep in the dark; to hide; to make less visible, intelligible, legible, glorious, beautiful, or illustrious.

qa_pairs.question: Obscure
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To conceal one's self; to hide; to keep dark.

qa_pairs.question: Obscure
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Obscurity.

qa_pairs.question: Obscurely
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In an obscure manner.

qa_pairs.question: Obscurement
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of obscuring, or the state of being obscured; obscuration.

qa_pairs.question: Obscureness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Obscurity.

qa_pairs.question: Obscurer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who, or that which, obscures.

qa_pairs.question: obscurity
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality or state of being obscure.

qa_pairs.question: obsecrate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To beseech; to supplicate; to implore.

qa_pairs.question: obsecration
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of obsecrating or imploring; as, the obsecrations of the Litany, being those clauses beginning with

qa_pairs.question: Obsecratory
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Expressing, or used in, entreaty; supplicatory.

qa_pairs.question: Obsequent
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Obedient; submissive; obsequious.

qa_pairs.question: Obsequience
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Obsequiousness.

qa_pairs.question: Obsequies
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Obsequy.

qa_pairs.question: Obsequious
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Promptly obedient, or submissive, to the will of another; compliant; yielding to the desires of another; devoted.

qa_pairs.question: Obsequiously
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In an obsequious manner; compliantly; fawningly.

qa_pairs.question: Obsequiousness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality or state of being obsequious.

qa_pairs.question: Obsequy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The last duty or service to a person, rendered after his death; hence, a rite or ceremony pertaining to burial; -- now used only in the plural.

qa_pairs.question: Observable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Capable of being observed; discernible; noticeable.

qa_pairs.question: Observance
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act or practice of observing or noticing with attention; a heeding or keeping with care; performance; -- usually with a sense of strictness and fidelity; as, the observance of the Sabbath is general; the strict observance of duties.

qa_pairs.question: Observancy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Observance.

qa_pairs.question: Observandum
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A thing to be observed.

qa_pairs.question: Observant
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Taking notice; viewing or noticing attentively; watchful; carefully attentive; as, an observant spectator; observant habits.

qa_pairs.question: Observant
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who observes forms and rules.

qa_pairs.question: Observantine
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of a branch of the Order of Franciscans, who profess to adhere more strictly than the Conventuals to the intention of the founder, especially as to poverty; -- called also also known as Observants.

qa_pairs.question: Observantly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In an observant manner.

qa_pairs.question: Observation
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act or the faculty of observing or taking notice; the act of seeing, or of fixing the mind upon, anything.

qa_pairs.question: Observational
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to observation; consisting of, or containing, observations.

qa_pairs.question: Observation car
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A railway passenger car made so as to facilitate seeing the scenery en route; a car open, or with glass sides, or with a kind of open balcony at the rear.

qa_pairs.question: Observation deck
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A room or platform at a high point in a tall building with a broad view of the surrounding area. It is often an outdoor platform, but is sometimes indoors in a room with large windows to accommodate viewing.

qa_pairs.question: Observation post
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as a military outpost, usually at a height above the surrounding terrain, at or near the front line of a battle from which an observer may see the enemy's positions and direct artillery fire.

qa_pairs.question: Observative
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Observing; watchful.

qa_pairs.question: Observator
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who observes or takes notice.

qa_pairs.question: Observatory
qa_pairs.answer: It means A place or building for making observations on the heavenly bodies.

qa_pairs.question: Observe
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To take notice of by appropriate conduct; to conform one's action or practice to; to keep; to heed; to obey; to comply with; as, to observe rules or commands; to observe civility.

qa_pairs.question: Observe
qa_pairs.answer: It means To take notice; to give attention to what one sees or hears; to attend.

qa_pairs.question: observed
