qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as perceived with the eyes and sometimes with other senses; as, no explanation for the observed phenomena.

qa_pairs.question: Observer
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who observes, or pays attention to, anything; especially, one engaged in, or trained to habits of, close and exact observation; as, an astronomical observer.

qa_pairs.question: Observership
qa_pairs.answer: It means The office or work of an observer.

qa_pairs.question: Observing
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Giving particular attention; habitually attentive to what passes; observant{1}; as, an observing person; an observing mind.

qa_pairs.question: obsess
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To besiege; to beset.

qa_pairs.question: obsess
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To be excessively or persistently preoccupied with something; -- usually used with on or over; as, to obsess over an imagined insult.

qa_pairs.question: obsessed
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as having or showing excessive or compulsive concern; -- used with with.

qa_pairs.question: Obsession
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of besieging.

qa_pairs.question: obsessional
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Persistently and abnormally preoccupied with some unreasonable idea.

qa_pairs.question: obsidian
qa_pairs.answer: It means A kind of glass produced by volcanoes. It is usually of a black color, and opaque, except in thin splinters.

qa_pairs.question: Obsidional
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to a siege.

qa_pairs.question: Obsigillation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A sealing up.

qa_pairs.question: Obsign
qa_pairs.answer: It means To seal; to confirm, as by a seal or stamp.

qa_pairs.question: Obsignate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To seal; to ratify.

qa_pairs.question: Obsignation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of sealing or ratifying; the state of being sealed or confirmed; confirmation, as by the Holy Spirit.

qa_pairs.question: Obsignatory
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Ratifying; confirming by sealing.

qa_pairs.question: Obsolesce
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To become obsolescent.

qa_pairs.question: Obsolescence
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state of becoming obsolete.

qa_pairs.question: Obsolescent
qa_pairs.answer: It means Going out of use; becoming obsolete; passing into desuetude.

qa_pairs.question: Obsolete
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as No longer in use; gone into disuse; disused; neglected; as, an obsolete word; an obsolete statute; -- applied chiefly to words, writings, or observances.

qa_pairs.question: Obsolete
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To become obsolete; to go out of use.

qa_pairs.question: Obsoletely
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In an obsolete manner.

qa_pairs.question: Obsoleteness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The state of being obsolete, or no longer used; a state of desuetude.

qa_pairs.question: Obsoletism
qa_pairs.answer: It means A disused word or phrase; an archaism.

qa_pairs.question: Obstacle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That which stands in the way, or opposes; anything that hinders progress; a hindrance; an obstruction, physical or moral.

qa_pairs.question: Obstancy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Opposition; impediment; obstruction.

qa_pairs.question: Obstetric
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to childbirth, midwifery, or the period around the time of the birth of children; as, the obstetric art.

qa_pairs.question: Obstetricate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To perform the office of midwife.

qa_pairs.question: Obstetricate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To assist as a midwife.

qa_pairs.question: Obstetrication
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of assisting as a midwife; delivery.

qa_pairs.question: Obstetrician
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One skilled in obstetrics; an accoucheur; especially, a physician who specializes in obstetrics.

qa_pairs.question: Obstetricious
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Serving to assist childbirth; obstetric; hence, facilitating any bringing forth or deliverance.

qa_pairs.question: Obstetrics
qa_pairs.answer: It means The science of midwifery.

qa_pairs.question: Obstetricy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Obstetrics.

qa_pairs.question: Obstinacy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A fixedness in will, opinion, or resolution that can not be shaken at all, or only with great difficulty; firm and usually unreasonable adherence to an opinion, purpose, or system; unyielding disposition; stubborness; pertinacity; persistency; contumacy.

qa_pairs.question: Obstinate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Pertinaciously adhering to an opinion, purpose, or course; persistent; not yielding to reason, arguments, or other means; stubborn; pertinacious; -- usually implying unreasonableness.

qa_pairs.question: Obstination
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Obstinacy; stubbornness.

qa_pairs.question: Obstipation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of stopping up, as a passage.

qa_pairs.question: Obstreperous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Attended by, or making, a loud and tumultuous noise; clamorous; noisy; vociferous.

qa_pairs.question: Obstriction
qa_pairs.answer: It means The state of being constrained, bound, or obliged; that which constrains or obliges; obligation; bond.

qa_pairs.question: Obstringe
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To constrain; to put under obligation.

qa_pairs.question: Obstruct
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To block up; to stop up or close, as a way or passage; to place an obstacle in, or fill with obstacles or impediments that prevent or hinder passing; as, to obstruct a street; to obstruct the channels of the body.

qa_pairs.question: Obstructer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who obstructs or hinders.

qa_pairs.question: Obstruction
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of obstructing, or state of being obstructed.

qa_pairs.question: Obstructionism
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act or the policy of obstructing progress.

qa_pairs.question: Obstructionist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who deliberately hinders progress; one who obstructs business, as in a legislative body.

qa_pairs.question: Obstructive
qa_pairs.answer: It means Tending to obstruct; presenting obstacles; hindering; causing impediment.

qa_pairs.question: Obstructive
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An obstructive person or thing.

qa_pairs.question: Obstruent
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Causing obstruction; blocking up; hindering; as, an obstruent medicine.

qa_pairs.question: Obstruent
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Anything that obstructs or closes a passage; esp., that which obstructs natural passages in the body; as, a medicine which acts as an obstruent.

qa_pairs.question: Obstupefaction
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Stupefaction.

qa_pairs.question: Obstupefactive
qa_pairs.answer: It means Stupefactive.

qa_pairs.question: Obstupefy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Stupefy.

qa_pairs.question: Obtain
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To hold; to keep; to possess.

qa_pairs.question: Obtain
qa_pairs.answer: It means To gain or have a firm footing; to be recognized or established; to become prevalent or general; to prevail; as, the custom obtains of going to the seashore in summer.

qa_pairs.question: Obtainable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Capable of being obtained.

qa_pairs.question: Obtainer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who obtains.

qa_pairs.question: Obtainment
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act or process of obtaining; attainment.

qa_pairs.question: Obtected
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Covered; protected.

qa_pairs.question: Obtemper
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To obey (a judgment or decree).

qa_pairs.question: Obtemperate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To obey.

qa_pairs.question: Obtend
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To oppose; to hold out in opposition.

qa_pairs.question: Obtenebration
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of darkening; the state of being darkened; darkness.

qa_pairs.question: Obtension
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of obtending.

qa_pairs.question: Obtest
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To call to witness; to invoke as a witness.

qa_pairs.question: Obtest
qa_pairs.answer: It means To protest.

qa_pairs.question: Obtestation
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of obtesting; supplication; protestation.

qa_pairs.question: Obtrectation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Slander; detraction; calumny.

qa_pairs.question: Obtrude
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To thrust impertinently; to present to a person without warrant or solicitation; as, to obtrude one's self upon a company; to obtrude one's opinion on another.

qa_pairs.question: Obtrude
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To thrust one's self upon a company or upon attention; to intrude.

qa_pairs.question: Obtruder
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who obtrudes.

qa_pairs.question: Obtruncate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To deprive of a limb; to lop.

qa_pairs.question: Obtruncation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of lopping or cutting off.

qa_pairs.question: Obtrusion
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of obtruding; a thrusting upon others by force or unsolicited; as, the obtrusion of crude opinions on the world.

qa_pairs.question: Obtrusionist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who practices or excuses obtrusion.

qa_pairs.question: Obtrusive
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Disposed to obtrude; inclined to intrude or thrust one's self or one's opinions upon others, or to enter uninvited; forward; pushing; intrusive.

qa_pairs.question: Obtund
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To reduce the edge, pungency, or violent action of; to dull; to blunt; to deaden; to quell; as, to obtund the acrimony of the gall.

qa_pairs.question: Obtundent
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A substance which sheathes a part, or blunts irritation, usually some bland, oily, or mucilaginous matter; -- nearly the same as also known as demulcent.

qa_pairs.question: Obtunder
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is That which obtunds or blunts; especially, that which blunts sensibility.

qa_pairs.question: Obturate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To stop or close, as an opening;

qa_pairs.question: Obturation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of stopping up, or closing, an opening.

qa_pairs.question: Obturator
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That which closes or stops an opening.

qa_pairs.question: Obturator
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Serving as an obturator; closing an opening; pertaining to, or in the region of, the obturator foramen; as, the obturator nerve.

qa_pairs.question: Obtusangular
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Obstuseangular.

qa_pairs.question: Obtuse
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not pointed or acute; blunt; -- applied esp. to angles greater than a right angle, or containing more than ninety degrees.

qa_pairs.question: Obtuse-angled
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having an obtuse angle; as, an obtuse-angled triangle.

qa_pairs.question: Obtusely
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In an obtuse manner.

qa_pairs.question: Obtuseness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is State or quality of being obtuse.

qa_pairs.question: Obtusion
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act or process of making obtuse or blunt.

qa_pairs.question: Obtusity
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Obtuseness.

qa_pairs.question: Obumbrant
qa_pairs.answer: It means Overhanging; as, obumbrant feathers.

qa_pairs.question: Obumbrate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To shade; to darken; to cloud.

qa_pairs.question: Obumbration
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Act of darkening or obscuring.

qa_pairs.question: Obuncous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Hooked or crooked in an extreme degree.

qa_pairs.question: Obvention
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of happening incidentally; that which happens casually; an incidental advantage; an occasional offering.

qa_pairs.question: Obversant
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Conversant; familiar.

qa_pairs.question: Obverse
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having the base, or end next the attachment, narrower than the top, as a leaf.

qa_pairs.question: Obverse
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The face of a coin which has the principal image or inscription upon it; -- the other side being the Antonym: reverse.

qa_pairs.question: Obversely
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In an obverse manner.

qa_pairs.question: Obversion
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of turning toward or downward.

qa_pairs.question: Obvert
qa_pairs.answer: It means To turn toward.

qa_pairs.question: Obviate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To meet in the way.

qa_pairs.question: obviating
qa_pairs.answer: It means making impossible or unnecessary.

qa_pairs.question: Obviation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of obviating, or the state of being obviated.

qa_pairs.question: Obvious
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Opposing; fronting.

qa_pairs.question: Obvolute
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Overlapping; contorted; convolute; -- applied primarily, in botany, to two opposite leaves, each of which has one edge overlapping the nearest edge of the other, and secondarily to a circle of several leaves or petals which thus overlap.

qa_pairs.question: Oby
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Obi.

qa_pairs.question: Oca
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A Peruvian name for certain species of *Oxalis* (Oxalis crenata, and Oxalis tuberosa) which bear edible tubers.

qa_pairs.question: Ocarina
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A kind of small simple wind instrument.

qa_pairs.question: Occamy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An alloy imitating gold or silver.

qa_pairs.question: Occasion
qa_pairs.answer: It means A falling out, happening, or coming to pass; hence, that which falls out or happens; occurrence; incident; event.

qa_pairs.question: Occasion
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To give occasion to; to cause; to produce; to induce; as, to occasion anxiety.

qa_pairs.question: Occasionable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Capable of being occasioned or caused.

qa_pairs.question: Occasional
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Occuring at times, but not constant, regular, or systematic; made or happening as opportunity requires or admits; casual; incidental; as, occasional remarks, or efforts.

qa_pairs.question: Occasionalism
qa_pairs.answer: It means The system of occasional causes; -- a name given to certain theories of the Cartesian school of philosophers, as to the intervention of the First Cause, by which they account for the apparent reciprocal action of the soul and the body.

qa_pairs.question: Occasionality
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Quality or state of being occasional; occasional occurrence.

qa_pairs.question: Occasionally
qa_pairs.answer: It means In an occasional manner; on occasion; at times, as convenience requires or opportunity offers; not regularly.

qa_pairs.question: Occasionate
qa_pairs.answer: It means To occasion.

qa_pairs.question: Occasioner
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who, or that which, occasions, causes, or produces.

qa_pairs.question: Occasive
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the setting sun; falling; descending; western.

qa_pairs.question: Occecation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of making blind, or the state of being blind.

qa_pairs.question: Occident
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The part of the horizon where the sun last appears in the evening; that part of the earth towards the sunset; the west; -- opposed to Antonym: orient. Specifically, in former times, Europe as opposed to Asia; now, also, the Western hemisphere.

qa_pairs.question: Occidental
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of, pertaining to, or situated in, the occident, or west; western; -- opposed to Antonym: oriental; as, occidental climates, or customs; an occidental planet.

qa_pairs.question: Occidentals
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Western Christians of the Latin rite. See Orientals.

qa_pairs.question: Occiduous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Western; occidental.

qa_pairs.question: Occipital
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the occiput, or back part of the head, or to the occipital bone.

qa_pairs.question: Occipital
qa_pairs.answer: It means The occipital bone.

qa_pairs.question: Occipito-
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A combining form denoting relation to the occiput, or situation near the occiput; as, occipito-axial; occipito-mastoid.

qa_pairs.question: Occipitoaxial
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to the occipital bone and second vertebra, or axis.

qa_pairs.question: Occiput
qa_pairs.answer: It means The back, or posterior, part of the head or skull; the region of the occipital bone.

qa_pairs.question: Occision
qa_pairs.answer: It means A killing; the act of killing.

qa_pairs.question: Occlude
qa_pairs.answer: It means To shut up; to close.

qa_pairs.question: Occludent
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Serving to close; shutting up.

qa_pairs.question: Occluse
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Shut; closed.

qa_pairs.question: Occlusion
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of occluding, or the state of being occluded.

qa_pairs.question: Occrustate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To incrust; to harden.

qa_pairs.question: Occult
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Hidden from the eye or the understanding; invisible; secret; concealed; unknown.

qa_pairs.question: Occult
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To eclipse; to hide from sight.

qa_pairs.question: Occultation
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The hiding of a heavenly body from sight by the intervention of some other of the heavenly bodies; -- applied especially to eclipses of stars and planets by the moon, and to the eclipses of satellites of planets by their primaries.

qa_pairs.question: Occulted
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Hidden; secret.

qa_pairs.question: Occulting
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Occultation.

qa_pairs.question: Occultism
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A certain Oriental system of theosophy.

qa_pairs.question: Occultist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An adherent of occultism.

qa_pairs.question: Occultly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In an occult manner.

qa_pairs.question: Occultness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as State or quality of being occult.

qa_pairs.question: Occupancy
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of taking or holding possession, especially of real property or rental property; possession; occupation.

qa_pairs.question: Occupant
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who occupies, or takes possession; one who has the actual use or possession, or is in possession, of a thing; as, the occupant of the apartment is not at home.

qa_pairs.question: Occupate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To occupy.

qa_pairs.question: Occupation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act or process of occupying or taking possession; actual possession and control; the state of being occupied; a holding or keeping; tenure; use; as, the occupation of lands by a tenant.

qa_pairs.question: occupational
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to an occupation{3} or occupations{3}; caused by or incidental to an occupation{3}; as, occupational hazard; occupational illness.

qa_pairs.question: occupied
qa_pairs.answer: It means Engaged; in use; being used by a person and not free for use by someone else; as, the wc is occupied. Opposite of Antonym: free, Antonym: available, and Antonym: unoccupied.

qa_pairs.question: Occupier
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who occupies, or has possession.

qa_pairs.question: Occupy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To take or hold possession of; to hold or keep for use; to possess.

qa_pairs.question: Occupy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To hold possession; to be an occupant.

qa_pairs.question: occupying
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is the act of taking occupancy.

qa_pairs.question: Occur
qa_pairs.answer: It means To meet; to clash.

qa_pairs.question: Occurrence
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A coming or happening; as, the occurrence of a railway collision.

qa_pairs.question: Occurrent
qa_pairs.answer: It means Occurring or happening; hence, incidental; accidental.

qa_pairs.question: Occurrent
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who meets; hence, an adversary.

qa_pairs.question: Occurse
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Occursion.

qa_pairs.question: Occursion
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A meeting; a clash; a collision.

qa_pairs.question: Ocean
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The whole body of salt water which covers more than three fifths of the surface of the globe; -- called also the also known as sea, or also known as great sea.

qa_pairs.question: Ocean
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to the main or great sea; as, the ocean waves; an ocean stream.

qa_pairs.question: oceanfront
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Bordering an ocean; as, oceanfront property.

qa_pairs.question: oceanfront
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Land bordering an ocean.

qa_pairs.question: oceangoing
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as capable of crossing an ocean; used on the high seas; -- used mostly of ships; as, oceangoing vessels.

qa_pairs.question: Oceania
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A large group of islands in the south Pacific sometimes including Australasia and the Malay Archipelago.

qa_pairs.question: Oceanic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the ocean; found or formed in or about, or produced by, the ocean; frequenting the ocean, especially mid-ocean.

qa_pairs.question: Oceanica
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Oceania.

qa_pairs.question: Oceanid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A daughter of the Titans Oceanus and Tethys.

qa_pairs.question: oceanographer
qa_pairs.answer: It means A scientist who studies physical and biological aspects of the seas.

qa_pairs.question: Oceanography
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A description of the ocean.

qa_pairs.question: Oceanology
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as That branch of science which relates to the ocean.

qa_pairs.question: Oceanus
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The god of the great outer sea, or the river which was believed to flow around the whole earth.

qa_pairs.question: Ocellary
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to ocelli.

qa_pairs.question: Ocellate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Ocellated.

qa_pairs.question: Ocellated
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Resembling an eye.

qa_pairs.question: Ocellus
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A little eye; a minute simple eye found in many invertebrates.

qa_pairs.question: Oceloid
qa_pairs.answer: It means Resembling the ocelot.

qa_pairs.question: Ocelot
qa_pairs.answer: It means An American feline carnivore (Felis pardalis). It ranges from the Southwestern United States to Patagonia. It is covered with blackish ocellated spots and blotches, which are variously arranged. The ground color varies from reddish gray to tawny yellow.

qa_pairs.question: Ocher
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A impure earthy ore of iron or a ferruginous clay, usually red (hematite) or yellow (limonite), -- used as a pigment in making paints, etc. The name is also applied to clays of other colors.

qa_pairs.question: ocher mutation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A mutation in which the base sequence of one of the codons in the messenger RNA has been converted to UAA. Such a mutation may be conditionally suppressed, as can an amber mutation, by the presence of a special transfer RNA.

qa_pairs.question: Ocherous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to ocher; containing or resembling ocher; as, ocherous matter; ocherous soil.

qa_pairs.question: Ochery
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Ocherous.

qa_pairs.question: Ochimy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Occamy.

qa_pairs.question: Ochlesis
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A general morbid condition induced by the crowding together of many persons, esp. sick persons, under one roof.

qa_pairs.question: Ochlocracy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A form of government by the multitude; a mobocracy; also known as mob rule.

qa_pairs.question: Ochlocratic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to ochlocracy; having the form or character of an ochlocracy; mobocratic.

qa_pairs.question: Ochotonidae
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A natural family of mammals including pikas and extinct forms.

qa_pairs.question: Ochraceous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Ocherous.

qa_pairs.question: Ochre
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Ocher.

qa_pairs.question: Ochrea
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A greave or legging.

qa_pairs.question: Ochreate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Wearing or furnished with an ochrea or legging; wearing boots; booted.

qa_pairs.question: Ochreous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Ocherous.

qa_pairs.question: Ochrey
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Ochery.

qa_pairs.question: Ochroleucous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Yellowish white; having a faint tint of dingy yellow.

qa_pairs.question: Ochry
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Ochery.

qa_pairs.question: Ochymy
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Occamy.

qa_pairs.question: -ock
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A suffix used to form diminutives; as, bullock, hillock.

qa_pairs.question: Ocra
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Okra.

qa_pairs.question: Ocrea
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Ochrea.

qa_pairs.question: Ocreate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Ochreate, Ochreated.

qa_pairs.question: Octa-
qa_pairs.answer: It means A prefix meaning eight. See Octo-.

qa_pairs.question: Octachord
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An instrument of eight strings; a system of eight tones.

qa_pairs.question: Octad
qa_pairs.answer: It means An atom or radical which has a valence of eight, or is octavalent.

qa_pairs.question: Octaedral
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Octahedral.

qa_pairs.question: Octaemeron
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A fast of eight days before a great festival.

qa_pairs.question: Octagon
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A plane figure of eight sides and eight angles.

qa_pairs.question: octagonal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having eight sides and eight angles.

qa_pairs.question: octagynous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having eight pistils or styles; octogynous.

qa_pairs.question: octahedral
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having eight faces or sides; of, pertaining to, or formed in, octahedrons; as, octahedral cleavage; an octahedral crystal.

qa_pairs.question: octahedrite
qa_pairs.answer: It means Titanium dioxide occurring in acute octahedral crystals.

qa_pairs.question: octahedron
qa_pairs.answer: It means A solid bounded by eight faces. The regular octahedron is contained by eight equal equilateral triangles.

qa_pairs.question: octamer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A molecule composed of eight monomer units bound to each other, usually in a linear array; as, an octamer formed from eight nucleotides is called an octanucleotide.

qa_pairs.question: octamerous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having the parts in eights; as, an octamerous flower; octamerous mesenteries in polyps.

qa_pairs.question: Octameter
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of the Octandria.

qa_pairs.question: Octandria
qa_pairs.answer: It means A Linnaean class of plants, in which the flowers have eight stamens not united to one another or to the pistil.

qa_pairs.question: octandrian
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the Octandria; having eight distinct stamens.

qa_pairs.question: octane
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any one of a group of metametric hydrocarbons (C8H18) of the methane (paraffin) series. The most important is a colorless, volatile, inflammable liquid, found in petroleum, and a constituent of gasoline or ligroin.

qa_pairs.question: Octangular
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having eight angles; eight-angled.

qa_pairs.question: Octant
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The eighth part of a circle; an arc of 45 degrees.

qa_pairs.question: octanucleotide
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A molecule composed of eight nucleotide units bound to each other by phosphodiester bonds in a linear array; as, a partial digest of DNA or RNA may include octanucleotides. See octamer.

qa_pairs.question: octapeptide
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A molecule composed of eight amino acid units bound to each other by peptide bonds, usually in a linear array. See octamer.

qa_pairs.question: Octapla
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A portion of the Old Testament prepared by Origen in the 3d century, containing the Hebrew text and seven Greek versions of it, arranged in eight parallel columns.

qa_pairs.question: Octaroon
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Octoroon.

qa_pairs.question: Octastyle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Octostyle.

qa_pairs.question: Octateuch
qa_pairs.answer: It means A collection of eight books; especially, the first eight books of the Old Testament.

qa_pairs.question: Octavalent
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having a valence of eight; capable of being combined with, exchanged for, or compared with, eight atoms of hydrogen; -- said of certain atoms or radicals.

qa_pairs.question: Octave
qa_pairs.answer: It means The eighth day after a church festival, the festival day being included; also, the week following a church festival.

qa_pairs.question: Octave
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Consisting of eight; eight.

qa_pairs.question: Octavo
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A book composed of sheets each of which is folded into eight leaves; hence, indicating more or less definitely a size of book so made; -- usually written 8vo or 8<deg/.

qa_pairs.question: Octavo
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having eight leaves to a sheet; as, an octavo form, book, leaf, size, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Octene
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Octylene.

qa_pairs.question: Octennial
qa_pairs.answer: It means Happening every eighth year; also, lasting a period of eight years.

qa_pairs.question: octet
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A composition for eight parts, usually for eight solo instruments or voices.

qa_pairs.question: Octic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of the eighth degree or order.

qa_pairs.question: Octile
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Octant, 2.

qa_pairs.question: Octillion
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is According to the French method of numeration (which method is followed also in the United States) the number expressed by a unit with twenty-seven ciphers annexed. According to the English method, the number expressed by a unit with forty-eight ciphers annexed. See Numeration.

qa_pairs.question: Octo-
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A combining form meaning eight; as in octodecimal, octolocular.

qa_pairs.question: Octoate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A salt of an octoic acid; a caprylate.

qa_pairs.question: October
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The tenth month of the year, containing thirty-one days.

qa_pairs.question: Octocera
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Octocerata.

qa_pairs.question: Octocerata
qa_pairs.answer: It means A suborder of Cephalopoda including *Octopus*, *Argonauta*, and allied genera, having eight arms around the head; -- called also also known as Octopoda.

qa_pairs.question: Octochord
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Octachord.

qa_pairs.question: Octodecimo
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having eighteen leaves to a sheet; as, an octodecimo form, book, leaf, size, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Octodecimo
qa_pairs.answer: It means A book composed of sheets each of which is folded into eighteen leaves; hence; indicating more or less definitely a size of book, whose sheets are so folded; -- usually written 18mo or 18<deg/, and called also known as eighteenmo.

qa_pairs.question: Octodentate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having eight teeth.

qa_pairs.question: Octodont
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the Octodontidae, a family of rodents which includes the coypu, and many other South American species.

qa_pairs.question: Octoedrical
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Octahedral.

qa_pairs.question: Octofid
qa_pairs.answer: It means Cleft or separated into eight segments, as a calyx.

qa_pairs.question: Octogamy
qa_pairs.answer: It means A marrying eight times.

qa_pairs.question: Octogenarian
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A person eighty years, or more, of age.

qa_pairs.question: Octogenary
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of eighty years of age.

qa_pairs.question: Octogild
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A pecuniary compensation for an injury, of eight times the value of the thing.

qa_pairs.question: Octogonal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Octagonal.

qa_pairs.question: Octogynia
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A Linnaean order of plants having eight pistils.

qa_pairs.question: Octogynian
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having eight pistils; octagynous.

qa_pairs.question: Octoic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining to, derived from, or resembling, octane; -- used specifically, to designate any one of a group of acids, the most important of which is called caprylic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Octolocular
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having eight cells for seeds.

qa_pairs.question: Octonaphthene
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A colorless liquid hydrocarbon of the octylene series, occurring in Caucasian petroleum.

qa_pairs.question: Octonary
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to the number eight.

qa_pairs.question: Octonocular
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having eight eyes.

qa_pairs.question: Octopede
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An animal having eight feet, as a spider.

qa_pairs.question: Octopetalous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having eight petals or flower leaves.

qa_pairs.question: Octopod
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of the Octocerata.

qa_pairs.question: Octopoda
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Octocerata.

qa_pairs.question: Octopodia
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Octocerata.

qa_pairs.question: Octopus
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of eight-armed cephalopods, including numerous species, some of them of large size. See Devilfish.

qa_pairs.question: Octoradiated
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having eight rays.

qa_pairs.question: Octoroon
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The offspring of a quadroon and a white person; a mestee.

qa_pairs.question: Octospermous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Containing eight seeds.

qa_pairs.question: Octostichous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In eight vertical ranks, as leaves on a stem.

qa_pairs.question: Octostyle
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having eight columns in the front; -- said of a temple or portico. The Parthenon is octostyle, but most large Greek temples are hexastyle. See Hexastyle.

qa_pairs.question: Octosyllabic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Consisting of or containing eight syllables.

qa_pairs.question: Octosyllable
qa_pairs.answer: It means Octosyllabic.

qa_pairs.question: Octosyllable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A word of eight syllables.

qa_pairs.question: octothorp
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A typographic symbol (#) having two vertical lines intersected by two horizontal lines. It is also called the also known as crosshatch, also known as hash, also known as numeral sign and also known as number sign; in the U. S. it is commonly called the also known as pound sign, especially to designate the symbol as used on digital telephone dials, but this can be confusing to Europeans who think of the pound sign as the symbol for the British pound. It is commonly used as a symbol for the word number; as in #36 (meaning: number thirty-six).

qa_pairs.question: Octoyl
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A hypothetical radical (C7H15.CO.), regarded as the essential residue of octoic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Octroi
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A privilege granted by the sovereign authority, as the exclusive right of trade granted to a guild or society; a concession.

qa_pairs.question: Octuor
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Octet.

qa_pairs.question: Octuple
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Eightfold.

qa_pairs.question: Octyl
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A hypothetical hydrocarbon radical regarded as an essential residue of octane, and as entering into its derivatives; as, octyl alcohol.

qa_pairs.question: Octylene
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any one of a series of metameric hydrocarbons (C8H16) of the ethylene series. In general they are combustible, colorless liquids.

qa_pairs.question: Octylic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, derived from, or containing, octyl; as, octylic ether.

qa_pairs.question: Ocular
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Depending on, or perceived by, the eye; received by actual sight; personally seeing or having seen; as, ocular proof.

qa_pairs.question: Ocular
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The eyepiece of an optical instrument, as of a telescope or microscope.

qa_pairs.question: Ocularly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is By the eye, or by actual sight.

qa_pairs.question: Oculary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the eye; ocular; optic; as, oculary medicines.

qa_pairs.question: Oculate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Furnished with eyes.

qa_pairs.question: Oculiform
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In the form of an eye; resembling an eye; as, an oculiform pebble.

qa_pairs.question: Oculina
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of tropical corals, usually branched, and having a very volid texture.

qa_pairs.question: Oculinacea
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A suborder of corals including many reef-building species, having round, starlike calicles.

qa_pairs.question: Oculist
qa_pairs.answer: It means One skilled in treating diseases of the eye.

qa_pairs.question: Oculo-
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A combining form from L. _oculus_ the eye.

qa_pairs.question: Oculomotor
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to the movement of the eye; -- applied especially to the common motor nerves (or third pair of cranial nerves) which supply many of the muscles of the orbit.

qa_pairs.question: Oculonasal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the region of the eye and the nose; as, the oculonasal, or nasal, nerve, one of the branches of the ophthalmic.

qa_pairs.question: Oculus
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An eye.

qa_pairs.question: Ocypodian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of a tribe of crabs which live in holes in the sand along the seashore, and run very rapidly, -- whence the name.

qa_pairs.question: Od
qa_pairs.answer: It means An alleged force or natural power, supposed, by Reichenbach and others, to produce the phenomena of mesmerism, and to be developed by various agencies, as by magnets, heat, light, chemical or vital action, etc.; -- called also also known as odyle or the also known as odylic force.

qa_pairs.question: Odal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Among the early and medieval Teutonic peoples, esp. Scandinavians, the heritable land held by the various odalmen constituting a family or kindred of freeborn tribesmen; also, the ownership of such land. The odal was subject only to certain rights of the family or kindred in restricting the freedom of transfer or sale and giving certain rights of redemption in case of change of ownership by inheritance, etc., and perhaps to other rights of the kindred or the tribe. Survivals of the early odal estates and tenure exist in Orkney and Shetland, where it is usually called by the variant form also known as udal.

qa_pairs.question: Odal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Noting, or pert. to, odal land or ownership.

qa_pairs.question: Odalisque
qa_pairs.answer: It means A female slave or concubine in the harem of the Turkish sultan.

qa_pairs.question: Odalman
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A man or woman having odal, or able to share in it by inheritance.

qa_pairs.question: Odd
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not paired with another, or remaining over after a pairing; without a mate; unmatched; single; as, an odd shoe; an odd glove.

qa_pairs.question: oddball
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A person with an unusual or odd personality; an eccentric person.

qa_pairs.question: oddball
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Eccentric; very unusual; strange; bizarre; as, an oddball request.

qa_pairs.question: Odd Fellow
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A member of a secret order, or fraternity, styled the Independent Order of Odd Fellows, established for mutual aid and social enjoyment.

qa_pairs.question: oddity
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality or state of being odd; singularity; queerness; peculiarity; as, oddity of dress, manners, and the like.

qa_pairs.question: odd-job
qa_pairs.answer: It means varied and irregularly performed; -- of paid labor; as, he found only odd-job employment.

qa_pairs.question: Oddly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In an odd manner; unevenly.

qa_pairs.question: Oddment
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An odd thing, or one that is left over, disconnected, fragmentary, or the like; something that is separated or disconnected from its fellows;

qa_pairs.question: Oddness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The state of being odd, or not even.

qa_pairs.question: odd-pinnate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Pinnate with a single leaflet at the apex; -- of a leaf shape.

qa_pairs.question: Odds
qa_pairs.answer: It means Difference in favor of one and against another; excess of one of two things or numbers over the other; inequality; advantage; superiority; hence, excess of chances; probability. The odds are often expressed by a ratio; as, the odds are three to one that he will win, i. e. he will win three times out of four

qa_pairs.question: Ode
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A short poetical composition proper to be set to music or sung; a lyric poem; esp., now, a poem characterized by sustained noble sentiment and appropriate dignity of style.

qa_pairs.question: Odelet
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A little or short ode.

qa_pairs.question: Odelsthing
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The lower house of the Norwegian Storthing. See Legislature.

qa_pairs.question: Odeon
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A kind of theater in ancient Greece, smaller than the dramatic theater and roofed over, in which poets and musicians submitted their works to the approval of the public, and contended for prizes; -- hence, in modern usage, the name of a hall for musical or dramatic performances.

qa_pairs.question: Odeum
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Odeon.

qa_pairs.question: Odible
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Fitted to excite hatred; hateful; odious.

qa_pairs.question: Odic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to od. See Od.

qa_pairs.question: Odin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The supreme deity of the Scandinavians; -- the same as Woden, of the German tribes.

qa_pairs.question: Odinic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to Odin.

qa_pairs.question: Odinism
qa_pairs.answer: It means Worship of Odin; broadly, the Teutonic heathenism.

qa_pairs.question: Odious
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Hateful; deserving or receiving hatred; as, an odious name, system, vice.

qa_pairs.question: Odist
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A writer of an ode or odes.

qa_pairs.question: Odium
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Intense hatred or dislike; loathing; abhorrence.

qa_pairs.question: Odize
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To charge with od. See Od.

qa_pairs.question: Odmyl
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A volatile liquid obtained by boiling sulphur with linseed oil. It has an unpleasant garlic odor.

qa_pairs.question: Odocoileus
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of North American deer.

qa_pairs.question: odograph
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A machine for registering the distance traversed by a vehicle or pedestrain.

qa_pairs.question: odometer
qa_pairs.answer: It means An instrument attached to a vehicle or connected, as by a flexible cable, to the wheel of a vehicle, which measures the distance traversed.

qa_pairs.question: odometrical
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the odometer, or to measurements made with it.

qa_pairs.question: Odometrous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Serving to measure distance on a road.

qa_pairs.question: Odometry
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Measurement of distances by the odometer.

qa_pairs.question: Odonata
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The division of insects that includes the dragon flies.

qa_pairs.question: Odontalgia
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Toothache.

qa_pairs.question: Odontalgic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to odontalgia.

qa_pairs.question: Odontalgy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Odontalgia.

qa_pairs.question: Odontiasis
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Cutting of the teeth; dentition.

qa_pairs.question: Odonto-
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A combining form from Gr. 'odoy`s, 'odo`ntos, a tooth.

qa_pairs.question: Odontoblast
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of the more or less columnar cells on the outer surface of the pulp of a tooth; an odontoplast. They are supposed to be connected with the formation of dentine.

qa_pairs.question: Odontocete
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A subdivision of Cetacea, including the sperm whale, dolphins, etc.; the toothed whales.

qa_pairs.question: Odontogeny
qa_pairs.answer: It means Generation, or mode of development, of the teeth.

qa_pairs.question: Odontograph
qa_pairs.answer: It means An instrument for marking or laying off the outlines of teeth of gear wheels.

qa_pairs.question: Odontographic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to odontography.

qa_pairs.question: Odontography
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A description of the teeth.

qa_pairs.question: Odontoid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having the form of a tooth; toothlike.

qa_pairs.question: Odontolcae
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An extinct order of ostrichlike aquatic birds having teeth, which are set in a groove in the jaw. It includes *Hesperornis*, and allied genera. See Hesperornis.

qa_pairs.question: Odontolite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A fossil tooth colored a bright blue by phosphate of iron. It is used as an imitation of turquoise, and hence called also known as bone turquoise.

qa_pairs.question: Odontology
qa_pairs.answer: It means The science which treats of the teeth, their structure and development.

qa_pairs.question: Odontophora
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Cephalophora.

qa_pairs.question: Odontophore
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A special structure found in the mouth of most mollusks, except bivalves. It consists of several muscles and a cartilage which supports a chitinous radula, or lingual ribbon, armed with teeth. Also applied to the radula alone. See Radula.

qa_pairs.question: Odontophorous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having an odontophore.

qa_pairs.question: Odontoplast
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An odontoblast.

qa_pairs.question: Odontopteryx
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An extinct Eocene bird having the jaws strongly serrated, or dentated, but destitute of true teeth. It was found near London.

qa_pairs.question: Odontornithes
qa_pairs.answer: It means A group of Mesozoic birds having the jaws armed with teeth, as in most other vertebrates. They have been divided into three orders: Odontolcae, Odontotormae, and Saururae.

qa_pairs.question: Odontostomatous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having toothlike mandibles; -- applied to certain insects.

qa_pairs.question: Odontotormae
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An order of extinct toothed birds having the teeth in sockets, as in the genus *Ichthyornis*. See Ichthyornis.

qa_pairs.question: Odor
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any smell, whether fragrant or offensive; scent; perfume.

qa_pairs.question: Odorament
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A perfume; a strong scent.

qa_pairs.question: Odorant
qa_pairs.answer: It means Yielding odors; fragrant.

qa_pairs.question: odorant
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An odorous substance;

qa_pairs.question: Odorate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Odorous.

qa_pairs.question: Odorating
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Diffusing odor or scent; fragrant.

qa_pairs.question: Odoriferous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Bearing or yielding an odor; perfumed; usually, sweet of scent; fragrant; as, odoriferous spices, particles, fumes, breezes.

qa_pairs.question: Odorine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A pungent oily substance obtained by redistilling bone oil.

qa_pairs.question: Odorless
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Free from odor.

qa_pairs.question: Odorous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having or emitting an odor or scent, esp. a sweet odor; fragrant; sweet-smelling.

qa_pairs.question: Ods
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A corruption of God's; -- formerly used in oaths and ejaculatory phrases.

qa_pairs.question: Odyl
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Od. [Archaic].

qa_pairs.question: Odylic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to odyle; odic; as, odylic force.

qa_pairs.question: Odyssey
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An epic poem attributed to Homer, which describes the return of Ulysses to Ithaca after the siege of Troy.

qa_pairs.question: <OE/
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A diphthong, employed in the Latin language, and thence in the English language, as the representative of the Greek diphthong oi. In many words in common use, e alone stands instead of oe separate in Latin words.

qa_pairs.question: oecoid
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The colorless porous framework, or stroma, of red blood corpuscles from which the zooid, or hemoglobin and other substances of the corpuscles, may be dissolved out.

qa_pairs.question: oecology
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The various relations of animals and plants to one another and to the outer world; -- now more commonly spelled ecology.

qa_pairs.question: oeconomical
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Economical.

qa_pairs.question: oeconomics
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Economics.

qa_pairs.question: oeconomy
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Economy.

qa_pairs.question: oecumenical
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Ecumenical.

qa_pairs.question: oedema
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A swelling from effusion of watery fluid in the cellular tissue beneath the skin or mucous membrance; dropsy of the subcutaneous cellular tissue.

qa_pairs.question: oedematous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining to, or of the nature of, edema; affected with edema.

qa_pairs.question: oeil-de-boeuf
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A circular or oval window; -- generally used of architecture of the 17th and 18th centuries. A famous room in the palace of Versailles bears this name, from the oval window opening into it.

qa_pairs.question: oeil-de-perdrix
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Characterized by, or decorated with, small round points, spots, or rings; as, oeil-de-perdrix pattern.

qa_pairs.question: oeiliad
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A glance of the eye; an amorous look.

qa_pairs.question: oelet
qa_pairs.answer: It means An eye, bud, or shoot, as of a plant; an oilet.

qa_pairs.question: oenanthate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A salt or ester of oenanthic acid; as, testosterone oenanthate is sold as an anabolic steroid; also called also known as enanthate.

qa_pairs.question: oenanthic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having, or imparting, the odor characteristic of the bouquet of wine; specifically used, formerly, to designate an acid (oenanthic acid) whose ethereal salts were supposed to occasion the peculiar bouquet, or aroma, of old wine. Cf. oenanthylic.

qa_pairs.question: oenanthol
qa_pairs.answer: It means An oily substance (C6H15.CHO) obtained by the distillation of castor oil, recognized as the aldehyde of oenanthylic acid, and hence called also also known as oenanthaldehyde.

qa_pairs.question: oenanthone
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The ketone of oenanthic acid.

qa_pairs.question: oenanthyl
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A hydrocarbon radical formerly supposed to exist in oenanthic acid, now known to be identical with heptyl.

qa_pairs.question: oenanthylate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A salt of oenanthylic acid; as, potassium oenanthylate.

qa_pairs.question: oenanthylic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining to, derived from, or containing, oenanthyl; specifically, designating an acid formerly supposed to be identical with the acid in oenanthic ether, but now known to be identical with heptanoic acid.

qa_pairs.question: oenanthylidene
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A colorless liquid hydrocarbon, having a garlic odor; heptine.

qa_pairs.question: oenanthylous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of, pertaining to, or designating, an acid formerly supposed to be the acid of oenanthylic ether, but now known to be a mixture of higher acids, especially also known as capric acid.

qa_pairs.question: oenocyan
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The coloring matter of red wines.

qa_pairs.question: oenology
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Knowledge of wine, scientific or practical.

qa_pairs.question: oenomania
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Delirium tremens.

qa_pairs.question: oenomel
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Wine mixed with honey; mead.

qa_pairs.question: oenometer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Alcoholometer.

qa_pairs.question: oenophilist
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A lover of wine.

qa_pairs.question: oenothionic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to an acid now called also known as sulphovinic acid or also known as ethyl sulphuric acid.

qa_pairs.question: Oer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A contr. of Over.

qa_pairs.question: Oersted
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The C. G. S. unit of magnetic reluctance or resistance, equal to the reluctance of a centimeter cube of air (or vacuum) between parallel faces. Also, a reluctance in which unit magnetomotive force sets up unit flux.

qa_pairs.question: oesophagus
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Esophagus, Esophageal, etc.

qa_pairs.question: oestrian
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the gadflies.

qa_pairs.question: oestrual
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to sexual desire; -- mostly applied to brute animals; as, the oestrual period; oestrual influence.

qa_pairs.question: oestruation
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The state of being under oestrual influence, or of having sexual desire.

qa_pairs.question: oestrus
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of gadflies. The species which deposits its larvae in the nasal cavities of sheep is oestrus ovis.

qa_pairs.question: Of
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In a general sense, from, or out from; proceeding from; belonging to; relating to; concerning; -- used in a variety of applications; as:

qa_pairs.question: Off
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In a general sense, denoting from or away from; as:

qa_pairs.question: Off
qa_pairs.answer: It means Away; begone; -- a command to depart.

qa_pairs.question: Off
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not on; away from; as, to be off one's legs or off the bed; two miles off the shore.

qa_pairs.question: Off
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as On the farther side; most distant; on the side of an animal or a team farthest from the driver when he is on foot; in the United States, the right side; as, the off horse or ox in a team, in distinction from the Antonym: nigh or Antonym: near horse or ox; the off leg.

qa_pairs.question: Off
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The side of the field that is on the right of the wicket keeper.

qa_pairs.question: offal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The rejected or waste parts of any process, especially the inedible parts of a butchered animal, such as the viscera.

qa_pairs.question: off-and-on
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as discontinuous; not continuous. Opposite of Antonym: continuous.

qa_pairs.question: off-base
qa_pairs.answer: It means located outside a military base; as, off-base housing.

qa_pairs.question: off-Broadway
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the professional theaters in Manhattan not in the Broadway area; performed in off-Broadway{1}.

qa_pairs.question: off-Broadway
qa_pairs.answer: It means A group of low-budget theaters located outside the Broadway area in Manhattan.

qa_pairs.question: off-center
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is situated away from the center or axis.

qa_pairs.question: off-color
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is humorously vulgar; mildly obscene; risque; as, an off-color joke.

qa_pairs.question: Offcut
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as That which is cut off.

qa_pairs.question: off-day
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A day when things go poorly; as, I guess this is one of my off-days.

qa_pairs.question: off-duty
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is not performing or available for duties at the given moment; as, an off-duty policeman. Oposite of Antonym: on-duty, Antonym: working, and Antonym: on-the-job.

qa_pairs.question: Offence
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Offense.

qa_pairs.question: offenceless
qa_pairs.answer: It means incapable of offending or attacking; harmless.

qa_pairs.question: Offend
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To strike against; to attack; to assail.

qa_pairs.question: Offend
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To transgress the moral or divine law; to commit a crime; to stumble; to sin.

qa_pairs.question: Offendant
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An offender.

qa_pairs.question: Offender
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who offends; one who violates any law, divine or human; a wrongdoer.

qa_pairs.question: Offendress
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A woman who offends.

qa_pairs.question: Offense
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of offending in any sense; esp., a crime or a sin, an affront or an injury.

qa_pairs.question: Offenseful
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Causing offense; displeasing; wrong; as, an offenseful act.

qa_pairs.question: Offenseless
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Unoffending; inoffensive.

qa_pairs.question: Offensible
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as That may give offense.

qa_pairs.question: Offension
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Assault; attack.

qa_pairs.question: Offensive
qa_pairs.answer: It means Giving offense; causing displeasure or resentment; displeasing; annoying; as, offensive words.

qa_pairs.question: Offensive
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The state or posture of one who offends or makes attack; aggressive attitude; the act of the attacking party; -- opposed to Antonym: defensive.

qa_pairs.question: Offer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To present, as an act of worship; to immolate; to sacrifice; to present in prayer or devotion; -- often with up.

qa_pairs.question: Offer
qa_pairs.answer: It means To present itself; to be at hand.

qa_pairs.question: Offer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of offering, bringing forward, proposing, or bidding; a proffer; a first advance.

qa_pairs.question: Offerable
qa_pairs.answer: It means Capable of being offered; suitable or worthy to be offered.

qa_pairs.question: Offerer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who offers; esp., one who offers something to God in worship.

qa_pairs.question: Offering
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of an offerer; a proffering.

qa_pairs.question: Offertory
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of offering, or the thing offered.

qa_pairs.question: Offerture
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Offer; proposal; overture.

qa_pairs.question: off-guard
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as not watching for possible danger; not alert; as, caught in an off-guard moment.

qa_pairs.question: Offhand
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Instant; unprepared; ready; extemporaneous; unrehearsed; as, an offhand speech; offhand excuses; an offhand comment.

qa_pairs.question: offhanded
qa_pairs.answer: It means same as offhand and off-the-cuff.

qa_pairs.question: Office
qa_pairs.answer: It means That which a person does, either voluntarily or by appointment, for, or with reference to, others; customary duty, or a duty that arises from the relations of man to man; as, kind offices, pious offices.

qa_pairs.question: Office
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To perform, as the duties of an office; to discharge.

qa_pairs.question: office-bearer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A person who holds an office; an officeholder.

qa_pairs.question: Officeholder
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who holds an office; an officer, particularly one in the civil service; a placeman.

qa_pairs.question: Officer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who holds an office; a person lawfully invested with an office, whether civil, military, or ecclesiastical; as, a church officer; a police officer; a staff officer.

qa_pairs.question: Officer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To furnish with officers; to appoint officers over.

qa_pairs.question: Office wire
qa_pairs.answer: It means Copper wire with a strong but light insulation, used in wiring houses, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Official
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to an office or public trust; as, official duties, or routine.

qa_pairs.question: Official
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who holds an office; esp., a subordinate executive officer or attendant.

qa_pairs.question: officialdom
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The body of all people elected or appointed to administer a government, taken collectively.

qa_pairs.question: officialese
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as the formal and often obscure style of writing characteristic of some government officials; bureaucratese; -- it is characterized by euphemisms, circumlocutions, vague abstractions, and circumlocutions.

qa_pairs.question: Officialism
qa_pairs.answer: It means The state of being official; a system of official government; also, adherence to office routine; red-tapism.

qa_pairs.question: Officiality
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Officialty.

qa_pairs.question: officialize
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as to render official; as, we officialized our relationship.

qa_pairs.question: Officially
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is By the proper officer; by virtue of the proper authority; in pursuance of the special powers vested in an officer or office; as, accounts or reports officially verified or rendered; letters officially communicated; persons officially notified.

qa_pairs.question: Officialty
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The charge, office, court, or jurisdiction of an official.

qa_pairs.question: Officiant
qa_pairs.answer: It means The officer who officiates or performs an office, as the burial office.

qa_pairs.question: Officiary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to an office or an officer; official.

qa_pairs.question: Officiate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To act as an officer in performing a duty; to transact the business of an office or public trust; to conduct a public ceremony or service.

qa_pairs.question: Officiate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To discharge, perform, or supply, as an official duty or function.

qa_pairs.question: Officiator
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who officiates.

qa_pairs.question: Officinal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Used in a shop, or belonging to it.

qa_pairs.question: Officious
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or being in accordance with, duty.

qa_pairs.question: Offing
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as That part of the sea at a good distance from the shore, or where there is deep water and no need of a pilot; also, distance from the shore; as, the ship had ten miles offing; we saw a ship in the offing.

qa_pairs.question: Offish
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Shy or distant in manner; aloof; stand-offish.

qa_pairs.question: off-key
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Deviating from the proper pitch; -- of a musical note or series of notes; as, an off-key note; to sing off-key.

qa_pairs.question: Offlet
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A pipe to let off water.

qa_pairs.question: off-licence
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as a store that sells alcoholic beverages for consumption elsewhere.

qa_pairs.question: off-limits
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is barred to a designated group; as, the topless bar is off-lints to military personnel.

qa_pairs.question: off-line
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not connected; -- of computers or computer peripherals normally connected or intended to be connected to other computers by a communications line; as, we can't print the document because the printer is off-line.

qa_pairs.question: off-peak
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having less than maximal use or demand or activity; -- of a period of time occurring as a defined part of a time cycle; as, off-peak telepone rates are available at night and on weekends; off-peak fares.

qa_pairs.question: Offprint
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To reprint (as an excerpt); as, the articles of some magazines are offprinted from other magazines.

qa_pairs.question: Offprint
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A reprint or excerpt.

qa_pairs.question: off-putting
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as hard to deal with.

qa_pairs.question: off-road
qa_pairs.answer: It means designed for or used for or taking place on trails and beaches etc., instead of public roads; as, off-road vehicles; off-road sports such as snowmobiling.

qa_pairs.question: off-roader
qa_pairs.answer: It means a bicycle with a sturdy frame and fat tires; originally designed for riding in mountainous country; amountain bike.

qa_pairs.question: Offscouring
qa_pairs.answer: It means That which is scoured off; hence, refuse; rejected matter; that which is vile or despised.

qa_pairs.question: Offscum
qa_pairs.answer: It means Removed scum; refuse; dross.

qa_pairs.question: off-season
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as of or relating to a season of less than maximum demand; as, off-season hotel rates are lower.

qa_pairs.question: Offset
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In general, that which is set off, from, before, or against, something

qa_pairs.question: Offset
qa_pairs.answer: It means To set off; to place over against; to balance; as, to offset one account or charge against another.

qa_pairs.question: Offset
qa_pairs.answer: It means To make an offset.

qa_pairs.question: offset printing
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A printing technique in which a lithographic image on an inked metal or stone plate is transferred first to a rubber sheet (usually on a cylinder) before transfer to the paper. Called also also known as offset lithography.

qa_pairs.question: offsetting
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Compensating for.

qa_pairs.question: Offshoot
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as That which shoots off or separates from a main stem, channel, family, race, etc.; as, the offshoots of a tree.

qa_pairs.question: Offshore
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is From the shore; as, an offshore wind; an offshore signal.

qa_pairs.question: offside
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Illegally beyond a prescribed line or area or ahead of the ball or puck; -- in sports such as football or hockey; as, the touchdown was nullified because the left tackle was offside.

qa_pairs.question: off-site
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Taking place or located away from the specified site; as, an off-site waste treatment operation. Opposite to Antonym: on-site.

qa_pairs.question: Offskip
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That part of a landscape which recedes from the spectator into the distance.

qa_pairs.question: Offspring
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of production; generation.

qa_pairs.question: off-street
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not performed on the streets; as, off-street parking; off-street unloading of vehicles. Opposite of Antonym: on-street.

qa_pairs.question: Offtake
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Act of taking off; specif., the taking off or purchase of goods.

qa_pairs.question: off-the-cuff
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is with little or no preparation or forethought; unrehearsed; extemporaneous; offhand.

qa_pairs.question: off the hook
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is No longer considered responsible; as, Jack admitted breaking the vase, so Jill is off the hook. Used in various situations, with reference to responsibility to perform an action, or guilt for some misdeed.

qa_pairs.question: off-the-rack
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Intended to be worn without alterations; ready-to-wear; -- of clothing. Contrasted with Antonym: made-to-order, custom-made.

qa_pairs.question: off-the-shelf
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Made in large quantities and intended to be used without modifications; -- similar to off-the-rack, but not restricted to clothing. Opposite of Antonym: custom-made, Antonym: made-to-order, or Antonym: one-of-a-kind.

qa_pairs.question: Offuscate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Obfuscate, Obfuscation.

qa_pairs.question: off-white
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as tending toward white; not pure white.

qa_pairs.question: off-white
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is a grayish white.

qa_pairs.question: Oft
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Often; frequently; not rarely; many times.

qa_pairs.question: Oft
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Frequent; often; repeated.

qa_pairs.question: Often
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Frequently; many times; not seldom.

qa_pairs.question: Often
qa_pairs.answer: It means Frequent; common; repeated.

qa_pairs.question: Oftenness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Frequency.

qa_pairs.question: Oftensith
qa_pairs.answer: It means Frequently; often.

qa_pairs.question: Oftentide
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Frequently; often.

qa_pairs.question: Oftentimes
qa_pairs.answer: It means Frequently; often; many times.

qa_pairs.question: Ofter
qa_pairs.answer: It means (Compar.) of Oft.

qa_pairs.question: Ofttimes
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Frequently; often.

qa_pairs.question: Ogam
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Ogham.

qa_pairs.question: ogdoad
qa_pairs.answer: It means A thing made up of eight parts.

qa_pairs.question: Ogdoastich
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A poem of eight lines.

qa_pairs.question: Ogee
qa_pairs.answer: It means A molding, the section of which is the form of the letter S, with the convex part above; cyma reversa. See Illust. under Cyma.

qa_pairs.question: Ogeechee lime
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The acid, olive-shaped, drupaceous fruit of a species of tupelo (Nyssa capitata) which grows in swamps in Georgia and Florida.

qa_pairs.question: Ogganition
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Snarling; grumbling.

qa_pairs.question: Ogham
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A particular kind of writing practiced by the ancient Irish, and found in inscriptions on stones, metals, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Ogive
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The arch or rib which crosses a Gothic vault diagonally.

qa_pairs.question: Ogle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To view or look at with side glances, as in fondness, or with a design to attract notice.

qa_pairs.question: Ogle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An amorous side glance or look.

qa_pairs.question: Ogler
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who ogles.

qa_pairs.question: Oglio
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Olio.

qa_pairs.question: Ogre
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An imaginary monster, or hideous giant of fairy tales, who lived on human beings; hence, any frightful giant; a cruel monster.

qa_pairs.question: Ogreish
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Resembling an ogre; having the character or appearance of an ogre; suitable for an ogre.

qa_pairs.question: Ogreism
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The character or manners of an ogre.

qa_pairs.question: Ogress
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A female ogre.

qa_pairs.question: Ogygian
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to Ogyges, a mythical king of ancient Attica, or to a great deluge in Attica in his days; hence, primeval; of obscure antiquity.

qa_pairs.question: Oh
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An exclamation expressing various emotions, according to the tone and manner, especially surprise, pain, sorrow, anxiety, or a wish. See the Note under O.

qa_pairs.question: Ohioan
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A resident of Ohio.

qa_pairs.question: Ohm
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The standard unit in the measure of electrical resistance, being the resistance of a circuit in which a potential difference of one volt produces a current of one amp9 units of resistance of the C. G. S. system of electro-magnetic units, and is represented by the resistance offered to an unvarying electric current by a column of mercury at the temperature of melting ice 14.4521 grams in mass, of a constant cross-sectional area, and of the length of 106.3 centimeters. As thus defined it is called the international ohm.

qa_pairs.question: Ohmmeter
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An instrument for indicating directly the electrical resistance of a circuit in ohms.

qa_pairs.question: Oho
qa_pairs.answer: It means An exclamation of surprise, etc.

qa_pairs.question: -oid
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A suffix or combining form meaning like, resembling, in the form of; as in anthropoid, asteroid, spheroid.

qa_pairs.question: O<ium/dium
qa_pairs.answer: It means A genus of minute fungi which form a floccose mass of filaments on decaying fruit, etc. Many forms once referred to this genus are now believed to be temporary conditions of fungi of other genera, among them the vine mildew (O<ium/dium Tuckeri), which has caused much injury to grapes.

qa_pairs.question: Oil
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any one of a great variety of unctuous combustible substances, more viscous than and not miscible with water; as, olive oil, whale oil, rock oil, etc. They are of animal, vegetable, or mineral origin and of varied composition, and they are variously used for food, for solvents, for anointing, lubrication, illumination, etc. By extension, any substance of an oily consistency; as, oil of vitriol.

qa_pairs.question: Oil
qa_pairs.answer: It means To smear or rub over with oil; to lubricate with oil; to anoint with oil.

qa_pairs.question: oil-bearing
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is containing oils; -- of geological formations; as, oil-bearing shale.

qa_pairs.question: oilbird
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Guacharo.

qa_pairs.question: oilcan
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A small can with a long spout used to apply oil to machinery, for purposes of lubrication.

qa_pairs.question: oilcloth
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Cloth rendered waterproof by treatment with oil or paint, and used for marking garments, covering tables, shelves, floors, etc.

qa_pairs.question: oiled
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Covered or treated with oil; dressed with, or soaked in, oil.

qa_pairs.question: Oiler
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who deals in oils.

qa_pairs.question: Oilery
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The business, the place of business, or the goods, of a maker of, or dealer in, oils.

qa_pairs.question: oil-fired
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Using oil as a fuel; as, an oil-fired furnace.
