qa_pairs.question: oilfish
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A very large deep-water snake mackerel (Ruvettus pretiosus).

qa_pairs.question: oil heater
qa_pairs.answer: It means A heating or cooking device that burns oil (such as kerosine) as a fuel.

qa_pairs.question: Oiliness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality of being oily.

qa_pairs.question: Oillet
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A small opening or loophole, sometimes circular, used in mediaeval fortifications.

qa_pairs.question: Oilman
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who deals in oils; formerly, one who dealt in oils and pickles.

qa_pairs.question: Oilnut
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The buffalo nut. See Buffalo nut, under Buffalo.

qa_pairs.question: oil patch
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A geographical region from which petroleum is extracted.

qa_pairs.question: oil rig
qa_pairs.answer: It means A structure and associated machinery used in drilling for oil or gas; it is usually in the form of a tower. Called also also known as drilling rig.

qa_pairs.question: Oilseed
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Seed from which oil is expressed, as the castor bean; also, the plant yielding such seed. See Castor bean.

qa_pairs.question: oil-silk
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Silk treated with oil to make it water-tight; -- it is used to make raincoats.

qa_pairs.question: Oilskin
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Cloth made waterproof by oil.

qa_pairs.question: oil slick
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A layer of oil floating on water; -- usually petroleum or fuel oil which has leaked from a ship.

qa_pairs.question: oil spill
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A layer of oil floating on water or covering the shoreline of a body of water; -- usually petroleum which has leaked from an oil tanker.

qa_pairs.question: Oilstone
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A variety of hone slate, or whetstone, used for whetting tools when lubricated with oil.

qa_pairs.question: oilstove
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A stove that burns oil (such as kerosine) for heating or cooking.

qa_pairs.question: oil tanker
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A ship having large compartments, designed to transport crude oil over the ocean.

qa_pairs.question: oil well
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A well{3} from which petroleum is or has been extracted; a well{3} drilled deeply into an oil-bearing geological formation specifically for the purpose of obtaining petroleum.

qa_pairs.question: Oily
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Consisting of oil; containing oil; having the nature or qualities of oil; unctuous; oleaginous; as, oily matter or substance.

qa_pairs.question: Oinement
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Ointment.

qa_pairs.question: Oinomania
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See oenomania.

qa_pairs.question: Oint
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To anoint.

qa_pairs.question: Ointment
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as That which serves to anoint; any soft unctuous substance used for smearing or anointing; an unguent.

qa_pairs.question: Ojibways
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Chippeways.

qa_pairs.question: ojo
qa_pairs.answer: It means A spring, surrounded by rushes or rank grass; an oasis.

qa_pairs.question: okapi
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A peculiar mammal (Okapia johnstoni) closely related to the giraffe, discovered in the deep forests of Belgian Congo in 1900. It is smaller than an ox, and somewhat like a giraffe, except that the neck is much shorter. Like the giraffe, it has no dewclaws. There is a small prominence on each frontal bone of the male. The color of the body is chiefly reddish chestnut, the cheeks are yellowish white, and the fore and hind legs above the knees and the haunches are striped with purplish black and cream color.

qa_pairs.question: Okapia
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of mammals comprising the okapis.

qa_pairs.question: okay
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Satifactory; agreeable; pleasant; as, things are okay; he's an okay guy.

qa_pairs.question: okay
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An endorsement; approval; permission; as, they gave us the okay to go ahead.

qa_pairs.question: okay
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as to approve; as, the boss okayed my proposal.

qa_pairs.question: Oke
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A Turkish and Egyptian weight, equal to about 2<frac34/ pounds.

qa_pairs.question: okeh
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Variant spellings of okay.

qa_pairs.question: Okenite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A massive and fibrous mineral of a whitish color, chiefly hydrous silicate of lime.

qa_pairs.question: Oker
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Ocher.

qa_pairs.question: Okinawa
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as the largest island of the central Ryukyu Islands.

qa_pairs.question: Okra
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An annual plant (Abelmoschus esculentus syn. Hibiscus esculentus), whose green pods, abounding in nutritious mucilage, are much used for soups, stews, or pickles; gumbo.

qa_pairs.question: -ol
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A suffix denoting that the substance in the name of which it appears belongs to the series of alcohols or hydroxyl derivatives, as ethanol, carbinol, phenol, glycerol, etc. Such compounds contain the hydroxy radical (-OH).

qa_pairs.question: Olay
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Palm leaves, prepared for being written upon with a style pointed with steel.

qa_pairs.question: Old
qa_pairs.answer: It means Open country.

qa_pairs.question: Old
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not young; advanced far in years or life; having lived till toward the end of the ordinary term of living; as, an old man; an old age; an old horse; an old tree.

qa_pairs.question: Old Dominion
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Virginia; -- a name of uncertain origin, perh. from the old designation of the colony as <ldquo/the Colony and Dominion of Virginia.<rdquo/

qa_pairs.question: Olden
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Old; ancient; as, the olden time.

qa_pairs.question: Olden
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To grow old; to age.

qa_pairs.question: Old-fashioned
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Formed according to old or obsolete fashion or pattern; belonging to or characteristic of times past; adhering to old customs, styles, or ideas; as, an old-fashioned dress, girl; old-fashioned wire-rimmed glasses.

qa_pairs.question: old fashioned
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A cocktail consisting of whiskey, bitters, and sugar, garnished with with fruit slices and often a cherry.

qa_pairs.question: Old-gentlemanly
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining to an old gentleman, or like one.

qa_pairs.question: old-hat
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is same as old-fashioned, (a.), 2.

qa_pairs.question: Oldish
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Somewhat old.

qa_pairs.question: Old lang syne
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Auld lang syne.

qa_pairs.question: Old Line State
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Maryland; a nickname, alluding to the fact that its northern boundary is Mason and Dixon's line.

qa_pairs.question: old-maidish
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Like an old maid; prim; precise; particular; overly fastidious.

qa_pairs.question: Old-maidism
qa_pairs.answer: It means The condition or characteristics of an old maid.

qa_pairs.question: old-man-of-the-woods
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An edible mild-tasting mushroom (Strobilomyces floccopus) found in coniferous woodlands of eastern North America.

qa_pairs.question: Oldness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The state or quality of being old; old age.

qa_pairs.question: Oldster
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An old person.

qa_pairs.question: old-time
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is attractively old-fashioned.

qa_pairs.question: oldwife
qa_pairs.answer: It means The local name of various fishes, as the European black sea bream (Cantharus lineatus), the American alewife, etc.

qa_pairs.question: old-womanish
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Like an old woman; anile; primly fastidious; old-maidish.

qa_pairs.question: Old World
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The combined territories of Europe, Asia, and Africa. The Eastern Hemisphere, as distinguished from The Americas, Australia, and the Pacific Islands.

qa_pairs.question: old-world
qa_pairs.answer: It means Characteristic of former times especially in Europe; as, an old-world cottage.

qa_pairs.question: Olea
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of trees including the olive.

qa_pairs.question: Oleaceae
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A natural family of trees and shrubs having berries or drupes or capsules as fruits; the also known as olive family; sometimes placed in the order Oleales; it includes the olive; ash; jasmine; privet; and lilac.

qa_pairs.question: Oleaceous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of, pertaining to, or resembling, a natural family of plants (Oleaceae), mostly trees and shrubs, of which the olive is the type. It includes also the ash, the lilac, the true jasmine, and fringe tree.

qa_pairs.question: Oleaginous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having the nature or qualities of oil; oily; unctuous.

qa_pairs.question: Oleaginousness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Oiliness.

qa_pairs.question: Oleamen
qa_pairs.answer: It means A soft ointment prepared from oil.

qa_pairs.question: Oleander
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A beautiful evergreen shrub (Nerium oleander) of the Dogbane family, having clusters of fragrant red, white, or pink flowers. It is a native of the East Indies, but the red variety has become common in the south of Europe. Called also also known as rosebay, also known as rose laurel, and also known as South-sea rose.

qa_pairs.question: Oleandra
qa_pairs.answer: It means A genus of tropical epiphytic or terrestrial ferns; also classed as the family Polypodiaceae.

qa_pairs.question: Oleandraceae
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of a number of families into which Polypodiaceae has been subdivided in some classification systems.

qa_pairs.question: Oleandrin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of several cardiac glycosides (C32H48O9) found in oleander (Nerium oleander).

qa_pairs.question: Oleandrine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One of several alkaloids found in the leaves of the oleander (Nerium oleander).

qa_pairs.question: Olearia
qa_pairs.answer: It means A large genus of Australian evergreen shrubs or small trees with large daisylike flowers.

qa_pairs.question: Oleaster
qa_pairs.answer: It means The wild olive tree (Olea Europea, var. sylvestris).

qa_pairs.question: Oleate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A salt of oleic acid. Some oleates, as the oleate of mercury, are used in medicine by way of inunction.

qa_pairs.question: Olecranal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the olecranon.

qa_pairs.question: Olecranon
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The large process at the proximal end of the ulna which projects behind the articulation with the humerus and forms the bony prominence of the elbow.

qa_pairs.question: Olefiant
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Forming or producing an oil; specifically, designating a colorless gaseous hydrocarbon called ethylene (olefiant gas).

qa_pairs.question: olefin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Olefiant gas, or ethylene. See Ethylene.

qa_pairs.question: Oleic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Pertaining to, derived from, or contained in, oil; as, oleic acid, an acid of the acrylic acid series found combined with glyceryl in the form of olein in certain animal and vegetable fats and oils, such as sperm oil, olive oil, etc. At low temperatures the acid is crystalline, but melts to an oily liquid above 14<deg/ C.

qa_pairs.question: Oleiferous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Producing oil; as, oleiferous seeds.

qa_pairs.question: Olein
qa_pairs.answer: It means A fat, liquid at ordinary temperatures, but solidifying at temperatures below 0<deg/ C., found abundantly in both the animal and vegetable kingdoms (see Palmitin). It dissolves solid fats, especially at 30-40<deg/ C. Chemically, olein is a glyceride of oleic acid; and, as three molecules of the acid are united to one molecule of glycerol to form the fat, it is technically known as also known as triolein. It is also called also known as elain.

qa_pairs.question: Olent
qa_pairs.answer: It means Scented.

qa_pairs.question: Oleograph
qa_pairs.answer: It means The form or figure assumed by a drop of oil when placed upon water or some other liquid with which it does not mix.

qa_pairs.question: Oleography
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Art or process of producing the pictures known as oleographs.

qa_pairs.question: Oleomargarine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A liquid oil made from animal fats (esp. beef fat) by separating the greater portion of the solid fat or stearin, by crystallization. It is mainly a mixture of olein and palmitin with some little stearin.

qa_pairs.question: Oleometer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An instrument for ascertaining the weight and purity of oil; an elaiometer.

qa_pairs.question: Oleone
qa_pairs.answer: It means An oily liquid, obtained by distillation of calcium oleate, and probably consisting of the ketone of oleic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Oleo oil
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An oil expressed from certain animal fats (esp. beef suet), the greater portion of the solid fat, or stearin, being left behind. It is mixture of olein, palmitin, and a little stearin.

qa_pairs.question: Oleoptene
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Elaeoptene.

qa_pairs.question: Oleoresin
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A natural mixture of a terebinthinate oil and a resin.

qa_pairs.question: Oleose
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Oily.

qa_pairs.question: Oleosity
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The state or quality of being oily or fat; fatness.

qa_pairs.question: Oleraceous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Pertaining to pot herbs; of the nature or having the qualities of herbs for cookery; esculent.

qa_pairs.question: Olf
qa_pairs.answer: It means The European bullfinch.

qa_pairs.question: Olfaction
qa_pairs.answer: It means The sense by which the impressions made on the olfactory organs by the odorous particles in the atmosphere are perceived.

qa_pairs.question: Olfactive
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Olfactory, (a.)

qa_pairs.question: Olfactor
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A smelling organ; a nose.

qa_pairs.question: Olfactory
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of, pertaining to, or connected with, the sense of smell; as, the olfactory nerves; the olfactory cells.

qa_pairs.question: Olfactory
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An olfactory organ; also, the sense of smell; -- usually in the plural.

qa_pairs.question: Olfersia
qa_pairs.answer: It means genus consisting of one species; in some classification systems it is included in the genus *Polyboatrya*.

qa_pairs.question: Oliban
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Olibanum.

qa_pairs.question: Olibanum
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The fragrant gum resin of various species of *Boswellia*; Oriental frankincense.

qa_pairs.question: Olibene
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A colorless mobile liquid of a pleasant aromatic odor obtained by the distillation of olibanum, or frankincense, and regarded as a terpene; -- called also also known as conimene.

qa_pairs.question: Olid
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having a strong, disagreeable smell; fetid.

qa_pairs.question: Olifant
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An elephant.

qa_pairs.question: Oligandrous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having few stamens.

qa_pairs.question: Oliganthous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having few flowers.

qa_pairs.question: Oligarch
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A member of an oligarchy; one of the rulers in an oligarchical government.

qa_pairs.question: Oligarchal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Oligarchic.

qa_pairs.question: Oligarchic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to oligarchy, or government by a few.

qa_pairs.question: Oligarchist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An advocate or supporter of oligarchy.

qa_pairs.question: Oligarchy
qa_pairs.answer: It means A form of government in which the supreme power is placed in the hands of a few persons; also, those who form the ruling few.

qa_pairs.question: Oligist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Hematite or specular iron ore; -- prob. so called in allusion to its feeble magnetism, as compared with magnetite.

qa_pairs.question: Oligist
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to hematite.

qa_pairs.question: Oligo-
qa_pairs.answer: It means A combining form from Gr. 'oli`gos, few, little, small.

qa_pairs.question: Oligocene
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of, pertaining to, or designating, certain strata which occupy an intermediate position between the Eocene and Miocene periods.

qa_pairs.question: Oligochaeta
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An order of Annelida which includes the earthworms and related species, including some small freshwater species.

qa_pairs.question: oligochaete
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any of an order of hermaphroditic terrestrial and aquatic annelids (including the earthworms) having bristles borne singly along the length of the body; a member of the Oligochaeta.

qa_pairs.question: oligochaetous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to the Oligochaeta.

qa_pairs.question: oligochete
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the Oligochaeta.

qa_pairs.question: Oligoclase
qa_pairs.answer: It means A triclinic soda-lime feldspar. See Feldspar.

qa_pairs.question: oligomer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A molecule composed of a small number of linked monomer units; a short polymer; -- compounds called oligomers have less than one hundred monomer units and usually less than thirty. Oligomers of increasing length are called dimer, trimer, tetramer, pentamer, hexamer, heptamer, octamer, nonamer, decamer, etc. In colloquial laboratory jargon, they may also be referred to as nine-mer, ten-mer, eleven-mer, twelve-mer, etc., especially for oligomers of greater than eight units.

qa_pairs.question: Oligomerous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having few members in each set of organs; as, an oligomerous flower.

qa_pairs.question: Oligomyoid
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having few or imperfect syringeal muscles; -- said of some passerine birds (Oligomyodi).

qa_pairs.question: Oligopetalous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having few petals.

qa_pairs.question: Oligosepalous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having few sepals.

qa_pairs.question: Oligosiderite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A meteorite characterized by the presence of but a small amount of metallic iron.

qa_pairs.question: Oligospermous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having few seeds.

qa_pairs.question: Oligotokous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Producing few young.

qa_pairs.question: Olio
qa_pairs.answer: It means A dish of stewed meat of different kinds.

qa_pairs.question: Olitory
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to, or produced in, a kitchen garden; used for kitchen purposes; as, olitory seeds.

qa_pairs.question: Oliva
qa_pairs.answer: It means A genus of polished marine gastropod shells, chiefly tropical, and often beautifully colored.

qa_pairs.question: Olivaceous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Resembling the olive; of the color of the olive; olive-green.

qa_pairs.question: Olivary
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Like an olive.

qa_pairs.question: Olivaster
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of the color of the olive; tawny.

qa_pairs.question: Olive
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A tree (Olea Europaea) with small oblong or elliptical leaves, axillary clusters of flowers, and oval, one-seeded drupes. The tree has been cultivated for its fruit for thousands of years, and its branches are the emblems of peace. The wood is yellowish brown and beautifully variegated.

qa_pairs.question: Olive
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Approaching the color of the olive; of a peculiar dark brownish, yellowish, or tawny green.

qa_pairs.question: Olived
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Decorated or furnished with olive trees.

qa_pairs.question: Olivenite
qa_pairs.answer: It means An olive-green mineral, a hydrous arseniate of copper (Cu2(AsO4)(OH)); olive ore.

qa_pairs.question: Oliver
qa_pairs.answer: It means An olive grove.

qa_pairs.question: Oliver
qa_pairs.answer: It means A small tilt hammer, worked by the foot.

qa_pairs.question: Oliverian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An adherent of Oliver Cromwell.

qa_pairs.question: Olivewood
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The wood of the olive.

qa_pairs.question: Olivil
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A white crystalline substance, obtained from an exudation from the olive, and having a bitter-sweet taste and acid proporties.

qa_pairs.question: Olivin
qa_pairs.answer: It means A complex bitter gum, found on the leaves of the olive tree; -- called also also known as olivite.

qa_pairs.question: Olivine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A common name of the yellowish green mineral chrysolite, esp. the variety found in eruptive rocks. It is a silicate of magnesium and iron ((Mg,Fe)SiO4).

qa_pairs.question: Olivite
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Olivin.

qa_pairs.question: Olla
qa_pairs.answer: It means A pot or jar having a wide mouth; a cinerary urn, especially one of baked clay.

qa_pairs.question: Olla-podrida
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A favorite Spanish dish, consisting of a mixture of several kinds of meat chopped fine, and stewed with vegetables.

qa_pairs.question: olm
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A European cave-dwelling aquatic salamander (Proteus anguinus) with permanent external gills.

qa_pairs.question: Ology
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A colloquial or humorous name for any science or branch of knowledge.

qa_pairs.question: Olpe
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Originally, a leather flask or vessel for oils or liquids; afterward, an earthenware vase or pitcher without a spout.

qa_pairs.question: Olusatrum
qa_pairs.answer: It means An umbelliferous plant, the common Alexanders of Western Europe (Smyrnium Olusatrum).

qa_pairs.question: Olympiad
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A period of four years, by which the ancient Greeks reckoned time, being the interval from one celebration of the Olympic games to another, beginning with the victory of Corb. c.; as, the era of the olympiads.

qa_pairs.question: Olympian
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to Olympus, a mountain of Thessaly, fabled as the seat of the gods, or to Olympia, a small plain in Elis.

qa_pairs.question: Olympian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A god who dwells on Olympus.

qa_pairs.question: Olympian
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Pertaining to, characteristic of, or fitting for one of the gods on Olympus; grand, majestic, or aloof.

qa_pairs.question: Olympianism
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Worship of the Olympian gods, esp. as a dominant cult or religion.

qa_pairs.question: Olympic games
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The greatest of the national festivals of the ancient Greeks, consisting of athletic games and races, dedicated to Olympian Zeus, celebrated once in four years at Olympia, and continuing five days.

qa_pairs.question: Olympic games
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A modified revival of the ancient Olympian games, consisting of international athletic games, races, etc., now held once in four years, the first having been at Athens in 1896.

qa_pairs.question: Olympionic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An ode in honor of a victor in the Olympic games.

qa_pairs.question: Olympus
qa_pairs.answer: It means A mountain in Northeastern Greece; -- it was believed by ancient Greeks to be the dwelling place of the gods.

qa_pairs.question: Om
qa_pairs.answer: It means A mystic syllable or ejaculation used by Hindus and Buddhists in religious rites, -- orig. among the Hindus an exclamation of assent, like Amen, then an invocation, and later a symbol of the trinity formed by Vishnu, Siva, and Brahma.

qa_pairs.question: -oma
qa_pairs.answer: It means A suffix used in medical terms to denote a morbid condition of some part, usually some kind of tumor; as in fibroma, glaucoma.

qa_pairs.question: Omagra
qa_pairs.answer: It means Gout in the shoulder.

qa_pairs.question: Omahas
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A tribe of Indians who inhabited the south side of the Missouri River. They are now partly civilized and occupy a reservation in Nebraska.

qa_pairs.question: Omander wood
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The wood of Diospyros ebenaster, a kind of ebony found in Ceylon.

qa_pairs.question: Omani
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or relating to Oman or its people; as, Omani oil producers; Omani ports.

qa_pairs.question: Omani
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A native or inhabitant of Oman.

qa_pairs.question: Omasum
qa_pairs.answer: It means The third division of the stomach of ruminants. See Manyplies, and Illust. under Ruminant.

qa_pairs.question: Omber
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A game at cards, borrowed from the Spaniards, and usually played by three persons.

qa_pairs.question: Ombre
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A large Mediterranean food fish (Umbrina cirrhosa): -- called also also known as umbra, and also known as umbrine.

qa_pairs.question: Ombrometer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An instrument for measuring the rain that falls; a rain gauge.

qa_pairs.question: Omdurman
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A battle (1898) in which an Anglo-Egyptian army under Lord Kitchener defeated the Sudanese.

qa_pairs.question: omega
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The last letter of the Greek alphabet. See Alpha.

qa_pairs.question: Omegoid
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having the form of the Greek capital letter Omega (<OMEGA/).

qa_pairs.question: omelet
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A dish consisting of eggs beaten up with a little flour, etc., and cooked in a frying pan until just set into a semisolid consistency; it may be folded around e.g. ham or cheese or jelly; as, a plain omelet. When additional ingredients are mixed in, the names of the ingredients may be mentioned in the name of the omelet; as, a ham and cheese omelet; a bacon and cheese omelet

qa_pairs.question: Omen
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An occurrence supposed to portend, or show the character of, some future event; any indication or action regarded as a foreshowing; a foreboding; a presage; an augury.

qa_pairs.question: Omen
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To divine or to foreshow by signs or portents; to have omens or premonitions regarding; to predict; to augur; as, to omen ill of an enterprise.

qa_pairs.question: Omened
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Attended by, or containing, an omen or omens; as, happy-omened day; an ill-omened venture.

qa_pairs.question: Omental
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to an omentum or the omenta.

qa_pairs.question: Omentum
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A free fold of the peritoneum, or one serving to connect viscera, support blood vessels, etc.; an epiploon.

qa_pairs.question: Omer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A Hebrew measure, the tenth of an ephah. See Ephah.

qa_pairs.question: Omicron
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Lit., the little, or short, O, o; the fifteenth letter of the Greek alphabet.

qa_pairs.question: Omiletical
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Homiletical.

qa_pairs.question: Ominate
qa_pairs.answer: It means To presage; to foreshow; to foretoken.

qa_pairs.question: Omination
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of ominating; presaging.

qa_pairs.question: Ominous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to an omen or to omens; being or exhibiting an omen; significant; portentous; -- formerly used both in a favorable and unfavorable sense; now chiefly in the latter; foreboding or foreshowing evil; inauspicious; as, an ominous dread.

qa_pairs.question: Omissible
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Capable of being omitted; that may be omitted.

qa_pairs.question: Omission
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of omitting; neglect or failure to do something required by propriety or duty.

qa_pairs.question: Omissive
qa_pairs.answer: It means Leaving out; omitting.

qa_pairs.question: Omit
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To let go; to leave unmentioned; not to insert or name; to drop.

qa_pairs.question: Omittance
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of omitting, or the state of being omitted; forbearance; neglect.

qa_pairs.question: Omitter
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who omits.

qa_pairs.question: Ommateal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to an ommateum.

qa_pairs.question: Ommateum
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A compound eye, as of insects and crustaceans.

qa_pairs.question: Ommatidium
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of the single eyes forming the compound eyes of crustaceans, insects, and other invertebrates; one of the eyes of an ommateum.

qa_pairs.question: Omni-
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A combining form denoting all, every, everywhere; as in omnipotent, all-powerful; omnipresent; omnivorous.

qa_pairs.question: Omnibus
qa_pairs.answer: It means A long vehicle, having seats for many people; a bus.

qa_pairs.question: omnibus
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining to or dealing with a variety of topics at one time; as, omnibus legislation; an omnibus budget bill.

qa_pairs.question: Omnicorporeal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Comprehending or including all bodies; embracing all substance.

qa_pairs.question: Omniety
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That which is all-pervading or all-comprehensive; hence, the Deity.

qa_pairs.question: Omnifarious
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of all varieties, forms, or kinds.

qa_pairs.question: Omniferous
qa_pairs.answer: It means All-bearing; producing all kinds.

qa_pairs.question: Omnific
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as All-creating.

qa_pairs.question: Omniform
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having every form or shape.

qa_pairs.question: Omniformity
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The condition or quality of having every form.

qa_pairs.question: Omnify
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To render universal; to enlarge.

qa_pairs.question: Omnigenous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Consisting of all kinds.

qa_pairs.question: Omnigraph
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A pantograph.

qa_pairs.question: Omniparient
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Producing or bringing forth all things; all-producing.

qa_pairs.question: Omniparity
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Equality in every part; general equality.

qa_pairs.question: Omniparous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Producing all things; omniparient.

qa_pairs.question: Omnipatient
qa_pairs.answer: It means Capable of enduring all things.

qa_pairs.question: Omnipercipience
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Perception of everything.

qa_pairs.question: Omnipercipient
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Perceiving everything.

qa_pairs.question: Omnipotence
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state of being omnipotent; almighty power; hence, one who is omnipotent; the Deity.

qa_pairs.question: Omnipotent
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Able in every respect and for every work; unlimited in ability; all-powerful; almighty; as, the Being that can create worlds must be omnipotent.

qa_pairs.question: Omnipotently
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In an omnipotent manner.

qa_pairs.question: Omnipresence
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Presence in every place at the same time; unbounded or universal presence; ubiquity.

qa_pairs.question: Omnipresency
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Omnipresence.

qa_pairs.question: Omnipresent
qa_pairs.answer: It means Present in all places at the same time; ubiquitous; as, the omnipresent Jehovah.

qa_pairs.question: Omnipresential
qa_pairs.answer: It means Implying universal presence.

qa_pairs.question: Omniprevalent
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Prevalent everywhere or in all things.

qa_pairs.question: Omniscience
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being omniscient; the quality of knowing everything; -- an attribute peculiar to God.

qa_pairs.question: Omnisciency
qa_pairs.answer: It means Omniscience.

qa_pairs.question: Omniscient
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having universal knowledge; knowing all things; infinitely knowing or wise; as, the omniscient God.

qa_pairs.question: Omniscious
qa_pairs.answer: It means All-knowing.

qa_pairs.question: Omnispective
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Beholding everything; capable of seeing all things; all-seeing.

qa_pairs.question: Omnium
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The aggregate value of the different stocks in which a loan to government is now usually funded.

qa_pairs.question: Omnium-gatherum
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A miscellaneous collection of things or persons; a confused mixture; a medley; a hodgepodge.

qa_pairs.question: Omnivagant
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Wandering anywhere and everywhere.

qa_pairs.question: Omnivora
qa_pairs.answer: It means A group of ungulate mammals including the hog and the hippopotamus. The term is also sometimes applied to the bears, and to certain passerine birds.

qa_pairs.question: Omnivorous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is All-devouring; eating everything indiscriminately; as, omnivorous vanity; an omnivorous intellect.

qa_pairs.question: Omo-
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A combining form used in anatomy to indicate connection with, or relation to, the shoulder or the scapula.

qa_pairs.question: Omohyoid
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the shoulder and the hyoid bone; as, the omohyoid muscle.

qa_pairs.question: Omophagic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Eating raw flesh; using uncooked meat as food; as, omophagic feasts, rites.

qa_pairs.question: Omoplate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The shoulder blade, or scapula.

qa_pairs.question: Omostegite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The part of the carapace of a crustacean situated behind the cervical groove.

qa_pairs.question: Omosternal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to the omosternum.

qa_pairs.question: Omosternum
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The anterior element of the sternum which projects forward from between the clavicles in many batrachians and is usually tipped with cartilage.

qa_pairs.question: Omphacine
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of, pertaining to, or expressed from, unripe fruit; as, omphacine oil.

qa_pairs.question: Omphalic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to the umbilicus, or navel.

qa_pairs.question: Omphalo-
qa_pairs.answer: It means A combining form indicating connection with, or relation to, the umbilicus, or navel.

qa_pairs.question: Omphalocele
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A hernia at the navel.

qa_pairs.question: Omphalode
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The central part of the hilum of a seed, through which the nutrient vessels pass into the rhaphe or the chalaza; -- called also also known as omphalodium.

qa_pairs.question: Omphalomancy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Divination by means of a child's navel, to learn how many children the mother may have.

qa_pairs.question: Omphalomesaraic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Omphalomesenteric.

qa_pairs.question: Omphalomesenteric
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the umbilicus and mesentery; omphalomesaraic; as, the omphalomesenteric arteries and veins of a fetus.

qa_pairs.question: Omphalopsychite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A name of the Hesychasts, from their habit of gazing upon the navel.

qa_pairs.question: Omphalopter
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An optical glass that is convex on both sides.

qa_pairs.question: Omphalos
qa_pairs.answer: It means The navel.

qa_pairs.question: Omphalotomy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The operation of dividing the navel-string.

qa_pairs.question: Omy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Mellow, as land.

qa_pairs.question: On
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The general signification of on is situation, motion, or condition with respect to contact or support beneath

qa_pairs.question: On
qa_pairs.answer: It means Forward, in progression; onward; -- usually with a verb of motion; as, move on; go on; the beat goes on.

qa_pairs.question: Onager
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A military engine acting like a sling, which threw stones from a bag or wooden bucket, and was operated by machinery.

qa_pairs.question: Onagga
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The dauw.

qa_pairs.question: onagon
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A form of drum used by the Chippewa indians.

qa_pairs.question: Onagra
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as *Oenothera*, a genus of plants consisting of the evening primrose.

qa_pairs.question: onagra
qa_pairs.answer: It means The female of the onager.

qa_pairs.question: Onagraceous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to, or resembling, a natural order of plants (Onagraceae or Onagrarieae), which includes the fuchsia, the willow-herb (*Epilobium*), and the evening primrose (*<OE/nothera*).

qa_pairs.question: Onanism
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Self-pollution; masturbation.

qa_pairs.question: Onappo
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A nocturnal South American monkey (Callithrix discolor), noted for its agility; -- called also also known as ventriloquist monkey.

qa_pairs.question: Once
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The ounce.

qa_pairs.question: Once
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as For one time; by limitation to the number one; not twice nor any number of times more than one.

qa_pairs.question: once-over
qa_pairs.answer: It means a swift cursory examination or inspection; as, I gave him the once-over.

qa_pairs.question: onchocerciasis
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An infection with nematodes of the genus *Onchocerca*, especially Onchocerca volvulus. Untreated, such infections can cause serious dermatological problems, and in advanced cases may lead to blindness. In certain areas of tropical Africa the blindness caused by onchocerciasis is called river blindness.

qa_pairs.question: Onchorynchus
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A genus of fishes including the sockeye salmon; chinook salmon; and coho salmon.

qa_pairs.question: Oncidium
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of tropical orchidaceous plants, the flower of one species of which (Oncidium Papilio) resembles a butterfly.

qa_pairs.question: Oncograph
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An instrument for registering the changes observable with an oncometer.

qa_pairs.question: Oncometer
qa_pairs.answer: It means An instrument for measuring the variations in size of the internal organs of the body, as the kidney, spleen, etc.

qa_pairs.question: oncoming
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as moving toward one; approaching.

qa_pairs.question: oncoming
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is the beginning or early stages; the onset.

qa_pairs.question: Oncost
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In cost accounting, expenditure which is involved in the process of manufacture or the performance of work and which cannot be charged directly to any particular article manufactured or work done (as where different kinds of goods are produced), but must be allocated so that each kind of goods or work shall bear its proper share.

qa_pairs.question: oncotomy
qa_pairs.answer: It means The opening of an abscess, or the removal of a tumor, with a cutting instrument.

qa_pairs.question: Ondatra
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus of rodents including the muskrat (Ondatra zibethica).

qa_pairs.question: onde
qa_pairs.answer: It means Hatred; fury; envy.

qa_pairs.question: On dit
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as They say, or it is said.

qa_pairs.question: Ondogram
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The record of an ondograph.

qa_pairs.question: Ondograph
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An instrument for autographically recording the wave forms of varying currents, esp. rapidly varying alternating currents.

qa_pairs.question: Ondometer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An electric wave meter.

qa_pairs.question: Ondoyant
qa_pairs.answer: It means Wavy; having the surface marked by waves or slightly depressed furrows; as, ondoyant glass.

qa_pairs.question: on-duty
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as performing or available for duties; as, her on-duty hours were 11p.m. to 7 a.m.. Opposite of Antonym: off-duty.

qa_pairs.question: -one
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A suffix indicating that the substance, in the name of which it appears, is a ketone; as, acetone.

qa_pairs.question: -one
qa_pairs.answer: It means A termination indicating that the hydrocarbon to the name of which it is affixed belongs to the fourth series of hydrocarbons, or the third series of unsaturated hydrocarbons; as, nonone.

qa_pairs.question: One
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Being a single unit, or entire being or thing, and no more; not multifold; single; individual.

qa_pairs.question: One
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A single unit; as, one is the base of all numbers.

qa_pairs.question: One
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any person, indefinitely; a person or body; as, what one would have well done, one should do one's self.

qa_pairs.question: One
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To cause to become one; to gather into a single whole; to unite; to assimilite.

qa_pairs.question: Oneberry
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The herb Paris. See Herb Paris, under Herb.

qa_pairs.question: one-dimensional
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as having only one dimension; as, a line is a one-dimensional object; a one-dimensional array.

qa_pairs.question: one-eared
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Relating to or having or hearing with only one ear; monaural. Opposite of Antonym: binaural.

qa_pairs.question: one-edged
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having only one sharp edge; single-edged; -- of cutting instruments, mostly swords and razor blades. Opposed to Antonym: double-edged.

qa_pairs.question: one-eyed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is having or showing only one eye; as, one-eyed Jacks are wild; the three one-eyed Cyclopes of Greek myth.

qa_pairs.question: one-fifth
qa_pairs.answer: It means A fifth part.

qa_pairs.question: one-fourth
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A quarter; a fourth part.

qa_pairs.question: one-half
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as one of two equal parts of a divisible whole; a half; a century and one half.

qa_pairs.question: one-hand
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Employing one hand; as, the one-hand alphabet. See Dactylology.

qa_pairs.question: one-hitter
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A game in which a pitcher allows the opposing team only one hit.

qa_pairs.question: one-horse
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Drawn by one horse; having but a single horse; as, a one-horse carriage.

qa_pairs.question: Oneidas
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A tribe of Indians formerly inhabiting the region near Oneida Lake in the State of New York, and forming part of the Five Nations. Remnants of the tribe now live in New York, Canada, and Wisconsin.

qa_pairs.question: one-eighth
qa_pairs.answer: It means an eightht part.

qa_pairs.question: Oneirocritic
qa_pairs.answer: It means An interpreter of dreams.

qa_pairs.question: Oneirocritic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to the interpretation of dreams.

qa_pairs.question: Oneirocriticism
qa_pairs.answer: It means The art of interpreting dreams.

qa_pairs.question: Oneiromancy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Divination by means of dreams.

qa_pairs.question: Oneiroscopist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who interprets dreams.

qa_pairs.question: Oneiroscopy
qa_pairs.answer: It means The interpretation of dreams.

qa_pairs.question: Oneliness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The state of being one or single.

qa_pairs.question: Onely
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Only.

qa_pairs.question: Onement
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The state of being at one or reconciled.

qa_pairs.question: Oneness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The state of being one; singleness in number; individuality; unity.

qa_pairs.question: Onerary
qa_pairs.answer: It means Fitted for, or carrying, a burden.

qa_pairs.question: Onerate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To load; to burden.

qa_pairs.question: Oneration
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of loading.

qa_pairs.question: Onerous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Burdensome; oppressive.

qa_pairs.question: Onerously
qa_pairs.answer: It means In an onerous manner.

qa_pairs.question: Ones
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Once.

qa_pairs.question: Oneself
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A reflexive form of the indefinite pronoun one. Commonly written as two words, one's self.

qa_pairs.question: one-seventh
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as a seventh part.

qa_pairs.question: One-sided
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having one side only, or one side prominent.

qa_pairs.question: one-sixth
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as a sixth part.

qa_pairs.question: one-step
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is an early ballroom dance, precursor to the foxtrot.

qa_pairs.question: one-tenth
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is a tenth part.

qa_pairs.question: Onethe
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Scarcely. See Unnethe.

qa_pairs.question: one-third
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is one of three equal parts of a divisible whole.

qa_pairs.question: one-up
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Ahead of a friend or competitor in some competitive activity.

qa_pairs.question: one-upmanship
qa_pairs.answer: It means The attitude or practice of trying to keep one step ahead of a friend or competitor; vigorous competitiveness.

qa_pairs.question: one-way
qa_pairs.answer: It means Legally permitting movement or travel in one direction only; -- of paths, especially roads; as, one-way streets.

qa_pairs.question: one-woman
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Designed for or restricted to a single person; same as also known as one-man, but used when the person in question is female, or to avoid sexist language; as, a one-woman submarine; a one-woman show.

qa_pairs.question: one-year
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is completing its life cycle within a year.

qa_pairs.question: Ongoing
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of going forward; progress; (pl.) affairs; business; current events.

qa_pairs.question: ongoing
qa_pairs.answer: It means Occurring at present; progressing; in progress; continuing; not past, completed, or future; as, an ongoing petition drive; an ongoing effort.

qa_pairs.question: Onguent
qa_pairs.answer: It means An unguent.

qa_pairs.question: On-hanger
qa_pairs.answer: It means A hanger-on.

qa_pairs.question: Onion
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A liliaceous plant of the genus *Allium* (Allium cepa), having a strong-flavored bulb and long hollow leaves; also, its bulbous root, much used as an article of food. The name is often extended to other species of the genus.

qa_pairs.question: onion dome
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A dome with a pointed top, its width often extending beyond the width of the tower it covers; -- a style of architecture characteristic of Russian Orthodox churches.

qa_pairs.question: onionskin
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A kind of thin but strong translucent paper with a glossy finish.

qa_pairs.question: Onirocritic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Oneirocritic.

qa_pairs.question: Oniscus
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The type genus of the Oniscidae, consisting of woodlice that cannot roll into a ball.

qa_pairs.question: on-key
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In tune; striking or singing the proper notes. Opposite of Antonym: off-key.

qa_pairs.question: on-license
qa_pairs.answer: It means a license to sell liquor for consumption on the premises.

qa_pairs.question: online
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as connected by a communications line to a computer. Opposite of Antonym: off-line.

qa_pairs.question: Onliness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The state of being alone.

qa_pairs.question: Onloft
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Aloft; above ground.

qa_pairs.question: On-looker
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A person who observes an event; a looker-on; a spectator.

qa_pairs.question: On-looking
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Looking on or forward.

qa_pairs.question: Only
qa_pairs.answer: It means One alone; single; as, the only man present; his only occupation.

qa_pairs.question: Only
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In one manner or degree; for one purpose alone; simply; merely; barely.

qa_pairs.question: Only
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Save or except (that); -- an adversative used elliptically with or without that, and properly introducing a single fact or consideration.

qa_pairs.question: Onocerin
qa_pairs.answer: It means A white crystalline waxy substance extracted from the root of the leguminous plant Ononis spinosa.

qa_pairs.question: Onoclea
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus consisting of only species: the sensitive fern; in some classifications it is included in the Polypodiaceae.

qa_pairs.question: onology
qa_pairs.answer: It means Foolish discourse.

qa_pairs.question: onomancy
qa_pairs.answer: It means Divination by the letters of a name; nomancy.

qa_pairs.question: Onomantic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to onomancy.

qa_pairs.question: Onomastic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Applied to a signature when the body of the instrument is in another's handwriting.

qa_pairs.question: Onomasticon
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A collection of names and terms; a dictionary; specif., a collection of Greek names, with explanatory notes, made by Julius Pollux about a. d. 180.

qa_pairs.question: Onomatechny
qa_pairs.answer: It means Prognostication by the letters of a name.

qa_pairs.question: Onomatologist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One versed in the history of names.

qa_pairs.question: Onomatology
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The science of names or of their classification.

qa_pairs.question: Onomatope
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An imitative word; an onomatopoetic word.

qa_pairs.question: Onomatopoeia
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The formation of words in imitation of sounds; a figure of speech in which the sound of a word is imitative of the sound of the thing which the word represents; as, the buzz of bees; the hiss of a goose; the crackle of fire.

qa_pairs.question: Onomatopoeic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Onomatopoetic.

qa_pairs.question: Onomatopoetic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to onomatopoeia; characterized by onomatopoeia; imitative; as, an onomatopoetic writer or word.

qa_pairs.question: Onomatopy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Onomatopoeia.

qa_pairs.question: Onomomancy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Onomancy.

qa_pairs.question: Onondagas
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A tribe of Indians formerly inhabiting what is now a part of the State of New York. They were the central or head tribe of the Five Nations.

qa_pairs.question: Onrush
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A rushing onward.

qa_pairs.question: Onset
qa_pairs.answer: It means A rushing or setting upon; an attack; an assault; a storming; especially, the assault of an army.

qa_pairs.question: Onset
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To assault; to set upon.

qa_pairs.question: onshore
qa_pairs.answer: It means coming from the sea toward the land; -- of winds and weather; as, an onshore gale. Opposed to Antonym: offshore.

qa_pairs.question: onside
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not offside; being within the prescribed area of play.

qa_pairs.question: onside kick
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A kickoff in which the kicking team attempts to kick the ball only so far as is legally required (beyond the 50-yard line), so as to have a better chance to recover the kicked ball itself; -- it is a risky type of play used only when the kicking team is losing and there is little time left to play.

qa_pairs.question: on-site
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Taking place or located at the indicated site; as, on-site inspection. Opposed to Antonym: off-site.

qa_pairs.question: Onslaught
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An attack; an onset; esp., a furious or murderous attack or assault.

qa_pairs.question: Onstead
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A single farmhouse; a steading.

qa_pairs.question: on-street
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is at the sides of streets; as, on-street parking is prohibited at rush hour. Opposite of Antonym: off-street.

qa_pairs.question: on the fritz
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Malfunctioning or inoperable; -- of machinery and devices.

qa_pairs.question: on the rag
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Menstruating; -- of women.

qa_pairs.question: on-the-scene
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Being or occurring at the place or time in question; as, an on-the-scene newscast.

qa_pairs.question: Onto
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as On the top of; upon; on. See On to, under On, (prep.)

qa_pairs.question: Ontogenesis
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The history of the individual development of an organism; the sequence of events involved in the development of an organism; the history of the evolution of the germ; the development of an individual organism, -- in distinction from phylogeny, or evolution of the tribe. Called also also known as henogenesis, also known as henogeny.

qa_pairs.question: Ontogenetic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to ontogenesis; as, ontogenetic phenomena.

qa_pairs.question: Ontogenic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Ontogenetic.

qa_pairs.question: Ontologic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Ontological.

qa_pairs.question: Ontological
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to ontology.

qa_pairs.question: Ontologically
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In an ontological manner.

qa_pairs.question: Ontologist
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who is versed in or treats of ontology.

qa_pairs.question: Ontology
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as That department of the science of metaphysics which investigates and explains the nature and essential properties and relations of all beings, as such, or the principles and causes of being.

qa_pairs.question: Onus
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A burden; an obligation.

qa_pairs.question: Onward
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Moving in a forward direction; tending toward a contemplated or desirable end; forward; as, an onward course, progress, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Onward
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Toward a point before or in front; forward; progressively; as, to move onward.

qa_pairs.question: Onwardness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Progress; advancement.

qa_pairs.question: Onwards
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Onward.

qa_pairs.question: Ony
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any.

qa_pairs.question: Onycha
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An ingredient of the Mosaic incense, probably the operculum of some kind of strombus.

qa_pairs.question: Onychia
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A whitlow.

qa_pairs.question: Onychomancy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Divination by the nails.

qa_pairs.question: Onychophora
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Malacopoda.

qa_pairs.question: onychophoran
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any of numerous velvety-skinned wormlike carnivorous animals common in tropical forests having characteristics of both arthropods and annelid worms; a member of the Onychophora, also called Malacopoda. See Malacopoda.

qa_pairs.question: onymous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as bearing a name; as, articles in magazines are usually onymous. Opposite of Antonym: anonymous.

qa_pairs.question: Onyx
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Chalcedony in parallel layers of different shades of color. It is used for making cameos, the figure being cut in one layer with the next as a ground.

qa_pairs.question: onyx
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Deep, jet-black.

qa_pairs.question: Oo
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One.

qa_pairs.question: oo
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any of several beautiful birds of the genus *Moho*, including the extinct Moho nobilis. They are honey-eaters native to the Hawaiian Islands. It yields the brilliant yellow feathers formerly used in making the royal robes. Called also also known as yellow-tufted honeysucker.

qa_pairs.question: Ooecium
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of the special zooids, or cells, of Bryozoa, destined to receive and develop ova; an ovicell. See Bryozoa.

qa_pairs.question: Oogenesis
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The development, or mode of origin, of the ova.

qa_pairs.question: Oogonium
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A special cell in certain cryptogamous plants containing oospheres, as in the rockweeds (*Fucus*), and the orders Vaucherieae and Peronosporeae.

qa_pairs.question: Ooidal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Shaped like an egg.

qa_pairs.question: Ook
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Oak.

qa_pairs.question: Oolite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A variety of limestone, consisting of small round grains, resembling the roe of a fish. It sometimes constitutes extensive beds, as in the European Jurassic. See the Chart of Geology.

qa_pairs.question: Oolitic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to oolite; composed of, or resembling, oolite.

qa_pairs.question: Oological
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to oology.

qa_pairs.question: Oologist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One versed in oology.

qa_pairs.question: Oology
qa_pairs.answer: It means The science of eggs in relation to their coloring, size, shape, and number.

qa_pairs.question: Oolong
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A fragrant variety of black tea having somewhat the flavor of green tea.

qa_pairs.question: Oomiac
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A long, broad boat used by the Eskimos.

qa_pairs.question: Oon
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One.

qa_pairs.question: Oones
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Once.

qa_pairs.question: Oop
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To bind with a thread or cord; to join; to unite.

qa_pairs.question: Oopack
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A kind of black tea.

qa_pairs.question: Oophore
qa_pairs.answer: It means An alternately produced form of certain cryptogamous plants, as ferns, mosses, and the like, which bears antheridia and archegonia, and so has sexual fructification, as contrasted with the sporophore, which is nonsexual, but produces spores in countless number. In ferns the oophore is a minute prothallus; in mosses it is the leafy plant.

qa_pairs.question: Oophorectomy
qa_pairs.answer: It means Ovariotomy.

qa_pairs.question: Oophoric
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having the nature of, or belonging to, an oophore.

qa_pairs.question: Oophoridium
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The macrosporangium or case for the larger kind of spores in heterosporous flowerless plants.

qa_pairs.question: Oophoritis
qa_pairs.answer: It means Ovaritis.

qa_pairs.question: Oophyte
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any plant of a proposed class or grand division (collectively termed oophytes or Oophyta), which have their sexual reproduction accomplished by motile antherozoids acting on oospheres, either while included in their oogonia or after exclusion.

qa_pairs.question: Oophytic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to an oophyte.

qa_pairs.question: Oorial
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A wild, bearded sheep inhabiting the Ladakh mountains. It is reddish brown, with a dark beard from the chin to the chest.

qa_pairs.question: Oosperm
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The ovum, after fusion with the spermatozoon in impregnation.

qa_pairs.question: Oosphere
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An unfertilized, rounded mass of protoplasm, produced in an oogonium.

qa_pairs.question: Oosporangium
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An oogonium; also, a case containing oval or rounded spores of some other kind than oospores.

qa_pairs.question: Oospore
qa_pairs.answer: It means A special kind of spore resulting from the fertilization of an oosphere by antherozoids.

qa_pairs.question: Oosporic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to an oospore.

qa_pairs.question: Oostegite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of the plates which in some Crustacea inclose a cavity wherein the eggs are hatched.

qa_pairs.question: Ootheca
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An egg case, especially those of many kinds of mollusks, and of some insects, as the cockroach. Cf. Ooecium.

qa_pairs.question: Ooticoid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A half oviparous, or an oviparous, mammal; a marsupial or monotreme.

qa_pairs.question: Ootype
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The part of the oviduct of certain trematode worms in which the ova are completed and furnished with a shell.

qa_pairs.question: Ooze
qa_pairs.answer: It means Soft mud or slime; earth so wet as to flow gently, or easily yield to pressure.

qa_pairs.question: Ooze
qa_pairs.answer: It means To flow gently; to percolate, as a liquid through the pores of a substance or through small openings.

qa_pairs.question: Ooze
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To cause to ooze.

qa_pairs.question: Ooze leather
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Leather made from sheep and calf skins by mechanically forcing ooze through them; esp., such leather with a soft, finely granulated finish (called sometimes velvet finish) put on the flesh side for special purposes. Ordinary ooze leather is used for shoe uppers, in bookbinding, etc. Hence Ooze calf, Ooze finish, etc.

qa_pairs.question: O94zoa
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Acrita.

qa_pairs.question: oozing
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as leaking out slowly.

qa_pairs.question: Oozy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Miry; containing soft mud; resembling ooze; as, the oozy bed of a river.

qa_pairs.question: Opacate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To darken; to cloud.

qa_pairs.question: Opacity
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The state of being opaque; the quality of a body which renders it impervious to the rays of light; want of transparency; opaqueness.

qa_pairs.question: Opacous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Opaque.

qa_pairs.question: Opacular
qa_pairs.answer: It means Opaque.

qa_pairs.question: Opah
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A large oceanic fish (Lampris guttatus), inhabiting the Atlantic Ocean. It is remarkable for its brilliant colors, which are red, green, and blue, with tints of purple and gold, covered with round silvery spots. Called also also known as king of the herrings.

qa_pairs.question: Opake
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Opaque.

qa_pairs.question: Opal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A mineral consisting, like quartz, of silica, but inferior to quartz in hardness and specific gravity.

qa_pairs.question: Opalesce
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To give forth a play of colors, like the opal.

qa_pairs.question: Opalescence
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A reflection of a milky or pearly light from the interior of a mineral, as in the moonstone; the state or quality of being opalescent.

qa_pairs.question: Opalescent
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Reflecting a milky or pearly light from the interior; having an opaline play of colors.

qa_pairs.question: Opaline
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of, pertaining to, or like, opal in appearance; having changeable colors like those of the opal.

qa_pairs.question: Opaline
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An opaline variety of yellow chalcedony.

qa_pairs.question: Opalize
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To convert into opal, or a substance like opal.

qa_pairs.question: Opalotype
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A picture taken on <ldquo/milky<rdquo/ glass.

qa_pairs.question: Opaque
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Impervious to the rays of light; not transparent; as, an opaque substance.

qa_pairs.question: Opaque
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That which is opaque; opacity.

qa_pairs.question: Opaqueness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The state or quality of being impervious to light; opacity.

qa_pairs.question: Ope
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Open.

qa_pairs.question: Ope
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To open.

qa_pairs.question: Opeidoscope
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An instrument, consisting of a tube having one end open and the other end covered with a thin flexible membrance to the center of which is attached a small mirror. It is used for exhibiting upon a screen, by means of rays reflected from the mirror, the vibratory motions caused by sounds produced at the open end of the tube, as by speaking or singing into it.

qa_pairs.question: Opelet
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A bright-colored European actinian (Anemonia sulcata, syn. Anthea sulcata); -- so called because it does not retract its tentacles.

qa_pairs.question: Open
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Free of access; not shut up; not closed; affording unobstructed ingress or egress; not impeding or preventing passage; not locked up or covered over; -- applied to passageways; as, an open door, window, road, etc.; also, to inclosed structures or objects; as, open houses, boxes, baskets, bottles, etc.; also, to means of communication or approach by water or land; as, an open harbor or roadstead.

qa_pairs.question: Open
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Open or unobstructed space; clear land, without trees or obstructions; open ocean; open water.

qa_pairs.question: Open
qa_pairs.answer: It means To make or set open; to render free of access; to unclose; to unbar; to unlock; to remove any fastening or covering from; as, to open a door; to open a box; to open a room; to open a letter.

qa_pairs.question: Open
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To unclose; to form a hole, breach, or gap; to be unclosed; to be parted.

qa_pairs.question: Open-air
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Taking place in the open air; outdoor; as, an open-air game or meeting.

qa_pairs.question: Openbill
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A bird of the genus *Anastomus*, allied to the stork; -- so called because the two parts of the bill touch only at the base and tip. One species inhabits India, another Africa. Called also also known as open-beak. See Illust. (m), under Beak.

qa_pairs.question: opencast
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as same as opencut.

qa_pairs.question: open-chain
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is not cyclic; having no rings of atoms within the molecular structure; having an open chain structure. Opposite of Antonym: cyclic.

qa_pairs.question: open-collared
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as not buttoned at the neck; -- of a shirt; as, dressed casually in shorts and an open-collared shirt.

qa_pairs.question: opencut
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as worked from the exposed surface; -- of mines and mining; as, opencut mining.

qa_pairs.question: opened
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is having the covering skin pulled back; -- used of mouth or eyes; as, his mouth slightly opened. Opposite of Antonym: closed.

qa_pairs.question: Open door
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Open or free admission to all; hospitable welcome; free opportunity.

qa_pairs.question: open-ended
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as allowing for a spontaneous response; as, an open-ended question. Contrasted to multiple-choice.

qa_pairs.question: Opener
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who, or that which, opens.

qa_pairs.question: Open-eyed
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is With eyes widely open; alert to possible danger; watchful; vigilant.

qa_pairs.question: Open-handed
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Generous; liberal; munificent.

qa_pairs.question: Open-headed
qa_pairs.answer: It means Bareheaded.

qa_pairs.question: Open-hearted
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Candid; frank; generous.

qa_pairs.question: Open-hearth steel
qa_pairs.answer: It means See under Open.

qa_pairs.question: Opening
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act or process of opening; a beginning; commencement; first appearance; as, the opening of a speech.

qa_pairs.question: Openly
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In an open manner; publicly; not in private; without secrecy.

qa_pairs.question: open-minded
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Ready to entertain new ideas. Contrasted with closed-minded.

qa_pairs.question: Open-mouthed
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having the mouth open; gaping; hence, greedy; clamorous.

qa_pairs.question: Openness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being open.

qa_pairs.question: Open sea
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A sea open to all nations. See Mare clausum.

qa_pairs.question: Open verdict
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A verdict on a preliminary investigation, finding the fact of a crime but not stating the criminal, or finding the fact of a violent death without disclosing the cause.

qa_pairs.question: Openwork
qa_pairs.answer: It means Anything so constructed or manufactured (in needlework, carpentry, metal work, etc.) as to show openings through its substance; work that is perforated or pierced.

qa_pairs.question: opepe
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A large African forest tree (Nauclea diderrichii) yielding a strong hard yellow to golden brown lumber; sometimes placed in genus *Sarcocephalus*, and then called Sarcocephalus diderrichii.

qa_pairs.question: Opera
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A drama, either tragic or comic, of which music forms an essential part; a drama wholly or mostly sung, consisting of recitative, arias, choruses, duets, trios, etc., with orchestral accompaniment, preludes, and interludes, together with appropriate costumes, scenery, and action; a lyric drama.

qa_pairs.question: Operable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Practicable.

qa_pairs.question: Operameter
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An instrument or machine for measuring work done, especially for ascertaining the number of rotations made by a machine or wheel in manufacturing cloth; a counter.

qa_pairs.question: Operance
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of operating or working; operation.

qa_pairs.question: Operand
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The symbol, quantity, or thing upon which a mathematical operation is performed; -- called also also known as faciend.

qa_pairs.question: Operant
qa_pairs.answer: It means Operative.

qa_pairs.question: operant conditioning
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A process for causing animals to behave in a specific manner by rewarding or punishing the animal each time it performs a certain act; after a time, the animal comes to associate the reward or punishment with the act, and will increase or decrease the frequency of performing that act.

qa_pairs.question: Operate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To perform a work or labor; to exert power or strength, physical or mechanical; to act.

qa_pairs.question: Operate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To produce, as an effect; to cause.

qa_pairs.question: Operatic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the opera or to operas; characteristic of, suitable for, or resembling, the opera; as, an operatic voice.

qa_pairs.question: operating
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is (pr. p.) of operate; as, the operating conditions of the oxidation pond.

qa_pairs.question: Operation
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act or process of operating; agency; the exertion of power, physical, mechanical, or moral.

qa_pairs.question: operational
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as of or pertaining to operations; as, operational procedure.

qa_pairs.question: operationalism
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is the doctrine that the meaning of a proposition consists of the operations involved in defining, proving, or applying it.

qa_pairs.question: operationalist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to operationalism.

qa_pairs.question: operations
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as financial transactions at a brokerage; having to do with the execution of trades and keeping customer records.

qa_pairs.question: Operative
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having the power of acting; hence, exerting force, physical or moral; active in the production of effects; as, an operative motive; operative laws.

qa_pairs.question: Operative
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A skilled worker; an artisan; esp., one who operates a machine in a mill or manufactory.

qa_pairs.question: Operatively
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In an operative manner.

qa_pairs.question: Operator
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who, or that which, operates or produces an effect.

qa_pairs.question: Operatory
qa_pairs.answer: It means A laboratory.

qa_pairs.question: Opercle
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any one of the bony plates which support the gill covers of fishes; an opercular bone.

qa_pairs.question: Opercula
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Operculum.

qa_pairs.question: Opercular
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of, pertaining to, or like, an operculum.

qa_pairs.question: Opercular
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The principal opercular bone or operculum of fishes.

qa_pairs.question: Operculate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Closed by a lid or cover, as the capsules of the mosses.

qa_pairs.question: Operculiferous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Bearing an operculum.

qa_pairs.question: Operculiform
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having the form of a lid or cover.

qa_pairs.question: Operculigenous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Producing an operculum; -- said of the foot, or part of the foot, of certain mollusks.

qa_pairs.question: Operculum
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The lid of a pitcherform leaf.

qa_pairs.question: Operetta
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A short, light, musical drama.

qa_pairs.question: Operose
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Wrought with labor; requiring labor; hence, tedious; wearisome.

qa_pairs.question: Operosity
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Laboriousness.

qa_pairs.question: Operous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Operose.

qa_pairs.question: Opertaneous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Concealed; private.

qa_pairs.question: Opetide
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Open time; -- applied to different things

qa_pairs.question: Ophelic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of, pertaining to, or designating, a substance (called ophelic acid) extracted from a plant (*Ophelia*) of the Gentian family as a bitter yellowish sirup, used in India as a febrifuge and tonic.

qa_pairs.question: Ophicleide
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A large brass wind instrument, formerly used in the orchestra and in military bands, having a loud tone, deep pitch, and a compass of three octaves; -- now generally supplanted by bass and contrabass tubas. It developed from the older wooden instrument called the serpent.

qa_pairs.question: Ophidia
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The suborder of reptiles which includes the serpents; called also also known as Serpentes.

qa_pairs.question: Ophidian
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of the Ophidia; a snake or serpent.

qa_pairs.question: Ophidian
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the Ophidia; belonging to serpents.

qa_pairs.question: Ophidioid
