qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the Ophidiidae, a family of fishes which includes many slender species.

qa_pairs.question: Ophidion
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The typical genus of ophidioid fishes. also known as [Written also Ophidium.] See Illust. under Ophidioid.

qa_pairs.question: Ophidious
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Ophidian.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiodontidae
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A natural family of fishes closely related to greenlings (fish of the genus *Hexagrammos*).

qa_pairs.question: Ophioglossaceae
qa_pairs.answer: It means A natural family of succulent ferns cosmopolitan in distribution.

qa_pairs.question: Ophioglossales
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An order coextensive with the family Ophioglossaceae.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiolatry
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The worship of serpents.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiologic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to ophiology.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiologist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One versed in the natural history of serpents.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiology
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That part of natural history which treats of the ophidians, or serpents.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiomancy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Divination by serpents, as by their manner of eating, or by their coils.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiomorpha
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An order of tailless amphibians having a slender, wormlike body with regular annulations, and usually with minute scales imbedded in the skin. The limbs are rudimentary or lacking. It includes the caecilians. Called also also known as Gymnophiona and also known as Ophidobatrachia.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiomorphite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An ammonite.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiomorphous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having the form of a serpent.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiophagous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Feeding on serpents; -- said of certain birds and reptiles.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiophagus
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus of venomous East Indian snakes, which feed on other snakes. Ophiophagus elaps is said to be the largest and most deadly of poisonous snakes.

qa_pairs.question: Ophism
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Doctrines and rites of the Ophites.

qa_pairs.question: Ophite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to a serpent.

qa_pairs.question: Ophite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A greenish spotted porphyry, being a diabase whose pyroxene has been altered to uralite; -- first found in the Pyreness. So called from the colored spots which give it a mottled appearance.

qa_pairs.question: Ophite
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A mamber of a Gnostic serpent-worshiping sect of the second century.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiuchus
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A constellation in the Northern Hemisphere, delineated as a man holding a serpent in his hands; -- called also also known as Serpentarius.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiura
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of ophiurioid starfishes.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiuran
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the Ophiurioidea.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiurid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Ophiurioid.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiurida
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Ophiurioidea.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiurioid
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the Ophiurioidea.

qa_pairs.question: Ophiurioidea
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A class of star-shaped echinoderms having a disklike body, with slender, articulated arms, which are not grooved beneath and are often very fragile; -- called also also known as Ophiuroida and also known as Ophiuridea. See Illust. under Brittle star.

qa_pairs.question: Ophryon
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The supraorbital point.

qa_pairs.question: Ophthalmia
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An inflammation of the membranes or coats of the eye or of the eyeball.

qa_pairs.question: Ophthalmic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of, pertaining to, or in the region of, the eye; ocular; as the ophthalmic, or orbitonasal, nerve, a division of the trigeminal, which gives branches to the lachrymal gland, eyelids, nose, and forehead.

qa_pairs.question: Ophthalmite
qa_pairs.answer: It means An eyestalk; the organ which bears the compound eyes of decapod Crustacea.

qa_pairs.question: ophthalmitis
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is severe conjunctivitis; ophthalmia.

qa_pairs.question: Ophthalmological
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to ophthalmology.

qa_pairs.question: Ophthalmologist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One skilled in ophthalmology; an oculist.

qa_pairs.question: Ophthalmology
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The science which treats of the structure, functions, and diseases of the eye.

qa_pairs.question: Ophthalmometer
qa_pairs.answer: It means An instrument devised by Helmholtz for measuring the size of a reflected image on the convex surface of the cornea and lens of the eye, by which their curvature can be ascertained.

qa_pairs.question: Ophthalmoscope
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An instrument for viewing the interior of the eye, particularly the retina. Light is thrown into the eye by a mirror (usually concave) and the interior is then examined with or without the aid of a lens.

qa_pairs.question: Ophthalmoscopy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A branch of physiognomy which deduces the knowledge of a person's temper and character from the appearance of the eyes.

qa_pairs.question: Ophthalmy
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Ophthalmia.

qa_pairs.question: Opianic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of, pertaining to, or designating, an organic acid obtained by the oxidation of narcotine.

qa_pairs.question: opianine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An alkaloid (C22H23NO7) found in small quantity in opium. It is identical with also known as narcotine. It is present in amounts up to 11% in Papaver somniferum, and is used clinically as an antitussive.

qa_pairs.question: Opianyl
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Meconin.

qa_pairs.question: Opiate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Originally, a medicine of a thicker consistency than sirup, prepared with opium.

qa_pairs.question: Opiate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Inducing sleep; somniferous; narcotic; hence, anodyne; causing rest, dullness, or inaction; as, the opiate rod of Hermes.

qa_pairs.question: Opiate
qa_pairs.answer: It means To subject to the influence of an opiate; to put to sleep.

qa_pairs.question: Opiated
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Mixed with opiates.

qa_pairs.question: Opie
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Opium.

qa_pairs.question: Opiferous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Bringing help.

qa_pairs.question: Opifice
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Workmanship.

qa_pairs.question: Opificer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An artificer; a workman.

qa_pairs.question: Opinable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Capable of being opined or thought.

qa_pairs.question: Opination
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of thinking; a supposition.

qa_pairs.question: Opinative
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Obstinate in holding opinions; opinionated.

qa_pairs.question: Opinator
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One fond of his own opinions; one who holds an opinion.

qa_pairs.question: Opine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To have an opinion; to judge; to think; to suppose.

qa_pairs.question: Opiner
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who opines.

qa_pairs.question: Opiniaster
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Opinionated.

qa_pairs.question: Opiniastrous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Opiniaster. [Obs.].

qa_pairs.question: Opiniate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To hold or maintain persistently.

qa_pairs.question: Opiniated
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Opinionated.

qa_pairs.question: Opiniative
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Opinionative.

qa_pairs.question: Opiniator
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who is opinionated.

qa_pairs.question: Opiniatre
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Opiniaster.

qa_pairs.question: Opiniatrety
qa_pairs.answer: It means Obstinacy in opinions.

qa_pairs.question: Opinicus
qa_pairs.answer: It means An imaginary animal borne as a charge, having wings, an eagle's head, and a short tail; -- sometimes represented without wings.

qa_pairs.question: Opining
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Opinion.

qa_pairs.question: Opinion
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is That which is opined; a notion or conviction founded on probable evidence; belief stronger than impression, less strong than positive knowledge; settled judgment in regard to any point of knowledge or action.

qa_pairs.question: Opinion
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To opine.

qa_pairs.question: Opinionable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Being, or capable of being, a matter of opinion; that can be thought; not positively settled; as, an opinionable doctrine.

qa_pairs.question: Opinionate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Opinionated.

qa_pairs.question: Opinionated
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Stiff in opinion; firmly or unduly adhering to one's own opinion or to preconceived notions; obstinate in opinion.

qa_pairs.question: Opinionately
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Conceitedly.

qa_pairs.question: Opinionatist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An opinionist.

qa_pairs.question: Opinionative
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Unduly attached to one's own opinions; opinionated.

qa_pairs.question: Opinionator
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An opinionated person; one given to conjecture.

qa_pairs.question: Opinioned
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Opinionated; conceited.

qa_pairs.question: Opinionist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One fond of his own notions, or unduly attached to his own opinions.

qa_pairs.question: Opiparous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Sumptuous.

qa_pairs.question: Opisometer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An instrument with a revolving wheel for measuring a curved line, as on a map.

qa_pairs.question: Opisthion
qa_pairs.answer: It means The middle of the posterior, or dorsal, margin of the great foramen of the skull.

qa_pairs.question: Opisthobranchia
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A division of gastropod Mollusca, in which the breathing organs are usually situated behind the heart. It includes the tectibranchs and nudibranchs.

qa_pairs.question: Opisthobranchiate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to the Opisthobranchiata.

qa_pairs.question: Opisthocoelian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Concave behind; -- applied especially to vertebrae in which the anterior end of the centrum is convex and the posterior concave.

qa_pairs.question: Opisthodome
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A back chamber; especially, that part of the naos, or cella, farthest from the main entrance, sometimes having an entrance of its own, and often used as a treasury.

qa_pairs.question: Opisthoglypha
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A division of serpents which have some of the posterior maxillary teeth grooved for fangs.

qa_pairs.question: Opisthography
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A writing upon the back of anything, as upon the back of a leaf or sheet already written upon on one side.

qa_pairs.question: Opisthomi
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An order of eellike fishes having the scapular arch attached to the vertebrae, but not connected with the skull.

qa_pairs.question: Opisthopulmonate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having the pulmonary sac situated posteriorly; -- said of certain air-breathing Mollusca.

qa_pairs.question: Opisthotic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The inferior and posterior of the three elements forming the periotic bone.

qa_pairs.question: Opisthotonos
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A tetanic spasm in which the body is bent backwards and stiffened.

qa_pairs.question: Opitulation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of helping or aiding; help.

qa_pairs.question: Opium
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The inspissated juice of the Papaver somniferum, or white poppy.

qa_pairs.question: Ople tree
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The witch-hazel.

qa_pairs.question: Opobalsam
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The old name of the aromatic resinous juice of the Balsamodendron opobalsamum, now commonly called also known as balm of Gilead. See under Balm.

qa_pairs.question: Opodeldoc
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A kind of plaster, said to have been invented by Mindererus, -- used for external injuries.

qa_pairs.question: Opolchenie
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Army organization, above.

qa_pairs.question: Opopanax
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The inspissated juice of an umbelliferous plant (the Opoponax Chironum), brought from Turkey and the East Indies in loose granules, or sometimes in larger masses, of a reddish yellow color, with specks of white. It has a strong smell and acrid taste, and was formerly used in medicine as an emmenagogue and antispasmodic.

qa_pairs.question: Opoterodonta
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An older division of the suborder Ophidia of serpents; it includes those snakes in which the mouth is not dilatable.

qa_pairs.question: Opossum
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any American marsupial of the genera *Didelphys* and *Chironectes*; called also also known as possum. The common species of the United States is Didelphys Virginiana.

qa_pairs.question: Oppidan
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to a town.

qa_pairs.question: Oppidan
qa_pairs.answer: It means An inhabitant of a town.

qa_pairs.question: Oppignerate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To pledge; to pawn.

qa_pairs.question: Oppilate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To crowd together; to fill with obstructions; to block up.

qa_pairs.question: Oppilation
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of filling or crowding together; a stopping by redundant matter; obstruction, particularly in the lower intestines.

qa_pairs.question: Oppilative
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Obstructive.

qa_pairs.question: Opplete
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Filled; crowded.

qa_pairs.question: Oppletion
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of filling up, or the state of being filled up; fullness.

qa_pairs.question: Oppone
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To oppose.

qa_pairs.question: Opponency
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of opening an academical disputation; the proposition of objections to a tenet, as an exercise for a degree.

qa_pairs.question: Opponent
qa_pairs.answer: It means Situated in front; opposite; hence, opposing; adverse; antagonistic.

qa_pairs.question: Opponent
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who opposes; an adversary; an antagonist; a foe.

qa_pairs.question: Opportune
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Convenient; ready; hence, seasonable; timely.

qa_pairs.question: Opportune
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To suit.

qa_pairs.question: Opportunism
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The art or practice of taking advantage of opportunities or circumstances, or of seeking immediate advantage with little regard for ultimate consequences.

qa_pairs.question: Opportunist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who advocates or practices opportunism.

qa_pairs.question: opportunistic
qa_pairs.answer: It means taking immediate advantage, often unethically, of any circumstance of possible benefit; practising opportunism.

qa_pairs.question: Opportunity
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Fit or convenient time or situation; a time or place permitting or favorable for the execution of a purpose; a suitable combination of conditions; suitable occasion; chance.

qa_pairs.question: Opposability
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The condition or quality of being opposable.

qa_pairs.question: Opposable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Capable of being opposed or resisted.

qa_pairs.question: Opposal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Opposition.

qa_pairs.question: Oppose
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To place in front of, or over against; to set opposite; to exhibit.

qa_pairs.question: Oppose
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To be set opposite.

qa_pairs.question: opposed
qa_pairs.answer: It means characterized by active opposition; as, two bitterly opposing schools of thought.

qa_pairs.question: Opposeless
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not to be effectually opposed; irresistible.

qa_pairs.question: opposer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who opposes; an opponent; an antagonist; an adversary.

qa_pairs.question: opposite
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Placed over against; standing or situated over against or in front; facing; -- often with to; as, a house opposite to the Exchange; the concert hall and the state theater stood opposite each other on the plaza.

qa_pairs.question: Opposite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who opposes; an opponent; an antagonist.

qa_pairs.question: Oppositely
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In a situation to face each other; in an opposite manner or direction; adversely.

qa_pairs.question: Oppositeness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality or state of being opposite.

qa_pairs.question: Oppositifolious
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Placed at the same node with a leaf, but separated from it by the whole diameter of the stem; as, an oppositifolious peduncle.

qa_pairs.question: Opposition
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of opposing; an attempt to check, restrain, or defeat; resistance.

qa_pairs.question: Oppositionist
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who belongs to the opposition party.

qa_pairs.question: Oppositipetalous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Placed in front of a petal.

qa_pairs.question: Oppositisepalous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Placed in front of a sepal.

qa_pairs.question: Oppositive
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Capable of being put in opposition.

qa_pairs.question: Oppress
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To impose excessive burdens upon; to overload; hence, to treat with unjust rigor or with cruelty.

qa_pairs.question: oppressed
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as having excessive or unfair burdens imposed.

qa_pairs.question: Oppression
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of oppressing, or state of being oppressed.

qa_pairs.question: Oppressive
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Unreasonably burdensome; unjustly severe, rigorous, or harsh; as, oppressive taxes; oppressive exactions of service; an oppressive game law.

qa_pairs.question: Oppressor
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who oppresses; one who imposes unjust burdens on others; one who harasses others with unjust laws or unreasonable severity.

qa_pairs.question: Oppressure
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Oppression.

qa_pairs.question: Opprobrious
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Expressive of opprobrium; attaching disgrace; reproachful; scurrilous; as, opprobrious language.

qa_pairs.question: Opprobrium
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A state of disgrace; infamy; reproach mingled with contempt; odium{3}.

qa_pairs.question: Opprobry
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Opprobrium.

qa_pairs.question: Oppugn
qa_pairs.answer: It means To fight against; to attack; to be in conflict with; to oppose; to resist.

qa_pairs.question: Oppugnancy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of oppugning; opposition; resistance.

qa_pairs.question: Oppugnant
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Tending to awaken hostility; hostile; opposing; warring.

qa_pairs.question: Oppugnation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Opposition.

qa_pairs.question: Oppugner
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who opposes or attacks; that which opposes.

qa_pairs.question: Opsimathy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Education late in life.

qa_pairs.question: Opsiometer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An instrument for measuring the limits of distinct vision in different individuals, and thus determiming the proper focal length of a lens for correcting imperfect sight.

qa_pairs.question: Opsonation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A catering; a buying of provisions.

qa_pairs.question: Optable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That may be chosen; desirable.

qa_pairs.question: Optate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To choose; to wish for; to desire.

qa_pairs.question: Optation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of optating; a wish.

qa_pairs.question: Optative
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Expressing desire or wish.

qa_pairs.question: Optative
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Something to be desired.

qa_pairs.question: Optatively
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In an optative manner; with the expression of desire.

qa_pairs.question: Optic
qa_pairs.answer: It means The organ of sight; an eye.

qa_pairs.question: Optic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of, pertaining to, or using vision or sight; as, optical illusions.

qa_pairs.question: optical activity
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is the ability of a chemical compound to rotate the plane of plane-polarized light. This is found only in chemicals whose molecular structure does not have a plane of symmetry, and is common in biochemical compounds.

qa_pairs.question: optical cable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as a cable containing multiple optical fibers.

qa_pairs.question: optical fiber
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A thin fiber of very pure glass used to carry signals transmitted by means of light. It has much greater information-carrying capacity than a copper wire, and in the 1990's became a dominant means of transmitting telephone communications over long distances.

qa_pairs.question: Optically
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is By optics or sight.

qa_pairs.question: Optician
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One skilled in optics.

qa_pairs.question: Optics
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is That branch of physical science which treats of the nature and properties of light, the laws of its modification by opaque and transparent bodies, and the phenomena of vision.

qa_pairs.question: Optigraph
qa_pairs.answer: It means A telescope with a diagonal eyepiece, suspended vertically in gimbals by the object end beneath a fixed diagonal plane mirror. It is used for delineating landscapes, by means of a pencil at the eye end which leaves the delineation on paper.

qa_pairs.question: Optimacy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Government by the nobility.

qa_pairs.question: optimal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Best possible; most desirable; optimum; as, the optimal concentration of a drug.

qa_pairs.question: Optimate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the nobility or aristocracy.

qa_pairs.question: Optimates
qa_pairs.answer: It means The nobility or aristocracy of ancient Rome, as opposed to the populares.

qa_pairs.question: Optime
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of those who stand in the second rank of honors, immediately after the wranglers, in the University of Cambridge, England. They are divided into senior and junior optimes.

qa_pairs.question: optimise
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as optimize.

qa_pairs.question: Optimism
qa_pairs.answer: It means The opinion or doctrine that everything in nature, being the work of God, is ordered for the best, or that the ordering of things in the universe is such as to produce the highest good.

qa_pairs.question: Optimist
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who holds the opinion that all events are ordered for the best.

qa_pairs.question: Optimistic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to optimism; tending, or conforming, to the opinion that all events are ordered for the best.

qa_pairs.question: optimize
qa_pairs.answer: It means To make as useful, effective, or functional as possible; as, to optimize the speed of a computer program.

qa_pairs.question: Optimity
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The state of being best.

qa_pairs.question: optimum
qa_pairs.answer: It means Best possible or most desirable; -- usually under a restriction expressed or implied; as, an optimum return on capital; optimum concentration of a drug; an optimum result.

qa_pairs.question: optimum
qa_pairs.answer: It means The most favorable condition, greatest degree, or largest amount possible under given circumstances.

qa_pairs.question: Option
qa_pairs.answer: It means The power of choosing; the right of choice or election; an alternative.

qa_pairs.question: Optional
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Involving an option; depending on the exercise of an option; left to one's discretion or choice; allowed but not compulsory; as, optional studies; it is optional with you to go or stay.

qa_pairs.question: Optionally
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In an optional manner.

qa_pairs.question: optionee
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A person who holds an option to buy or sell a financial instrument. See option.

qa_pairs.question: Optocoele
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The cavity of one of the optic lobes of the brain in many animals.

qa_pairs.question: Optogram
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An image of external objects fixed on the retina by the photochemical action of light on the visual purple. See Optography.

qa_pairs.question: Optography
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The production of an optogram on the retina by the photochemical action of light on the visual purple; the fixation of an image in the eye. The object so photographed shows white on a purple or red background. See Visual purple, under Visual.

qa_pairs.question: Optometer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An instrument for measuring the distance of distinct vision, mainly for the selection of eveglasses.

qa_pairs.question: Optometrist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who is skilled in or practices optometry, especially one who examines the eyes for defects in vision and prescribes the proper lenses to correct any defects discovered.

qa_pairs.question: Optometry
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Measurement of the range of vision, esp. by means of the optometer.

qa_pairs.question: Opulence
qa_pairs.answer: It means Wealth; riches; affluence.

qa_pairs.question: Opulency
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Opulence.

qa_pairs.question: Opulent
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having a large estate or property; wealthy; rich; affluent; as, an opulent city; an opulent citizen.

qa_pairs.question: Opuntia
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus of cactaceous plants; the prickly pear, or Indian fig.

qa_pairs.question: Opuntiales
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An order of plants coextensive with the family Cactaceae, comprising the cactuses.

qa_pairs.question: Opus
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A work;

qa_pairs.question: Opuscle
qa_pairs.answer: It means A small or petty work.

qa_pairs.question: Opusculum
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An opuscule.

qa_pairs.question: Opye
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Opium.

qa_pairs.question: Oquassa
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A small, handsome trout (Salvelinus oquassa), found in some of the lakes in Maine; -- called also also known as blueback trout.

qa_pairs.question: -or
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A noun suffix denoting an act; a state or quality; as in error, fervor, pallor, candor, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Or
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A particle that marks an alternative; as, you may read or may write, -- that is, you may do one of the things at your pleasure, but not both. It corresponds to either. You may ride either to London or to Windsor. It often connects a series of words or propositions, presenting a choice of either; as, he may study law, or medicine, or divinity, or he may enter into trade.

qa_pairs.question: Or
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Ere; before; sooner than.

qa_pairs.question: Or
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Yellow or gold color, -- represented in drawing or engraving by small dots.

qa_pairs.question: Ora
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A money of account among the Anglo-Saxons, valued, in the Domesday Book, at twenty pence sterling.

qa_pairs.question: Orabassu
qa_pairs.answer: It means A South American monkey of the genus *Callithrix*, esp. Callithrix Moloch.

qa_pairs.question: Orach
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A genus (*Atriplex*) of herbs or low shrubs of the Goosefoot family, most of them with a mealy surface.

qa_pairs.question: Oracle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The answer of a god, or some person reputed to be a god, to an inquiry respecting some affair or future event, as the success of an enterprise or battle.

qa_pairs.question: Oracle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To utter oracles.

qa_pairs.question: Oracular
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to an oracle; uttering oracles; forecasting the future; as, an oracular tongue.

qa_pairs.question: Oraculous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Oracular; of the nature of an oracle.

qa_pairs.question: Oragious
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Stormy.

qa_pairs.question: Oraison
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Orison.

qa_pairs.question: Oral
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Uttered by the mouth, or in words; spoken, not written; verbal; as, oral traditions; oral testimony; oral law.

qa_pairs.question: Orally
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In an oral manner.

qa_pairs.question: oral surgery
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Surgery performed within the mouth cavity, especially that performed around the gums and teeth as an expedient for the purpose of preservation or replacement of teeth.

qa_pairs.question: Orang
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Orang-outang.

qa_pairs.question: Orange
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The fruit of a tree of the genus *Citrus* (Citrus Aurantium). It is usually round, and consists of pulpy carpels, commonly ten in number, inclosed in a leathery rind, which is easily separable, and is reddish yellow when ripe.

qa_pairs.question: orange
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to an orange; of the color of an orange; reddish yellow; as, an orange ribbon.

qa_pairs.question: Orangeade
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A drink made of orange juice and water, corresponding to lemonade; orange sherbet.

qa_pairs.question: Orangeat
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Candied orange peel; also, orangeade.

qa_pairs.question: Orangeism
qa_pairs.answer: It means Attachment to the principles of the society of Orangemen; the tenets or practices of the Orangemen.

qa_pairs.question: Orangeman
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of a secret society, organized in the north of Ireland in 1795, the professed objects of which are the defense of the reigning sovereign of Great Britain, the support of the Protestant religion, the maintenance of the laws of the kingdom, etc.; -- so called in honor of William, Prince of Orange, who became William III. of England.

qa_pairs.question: Orangeroot
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An American ranunculaceous plant (Hidrastis Canadensis), having a yellow tuberous root; -- also called also known as yellowroot, also known as golden seal, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Orangery
qa_pairs.answer: It means A place for raising oranges; a plantation of orange trees.

qa_pairs.question: Orangetawny
qa_pairs.answer: It means Deep orange-yellow; dark yellow.

qa_pairs.question: Orangite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An orange-yellow variety of the mineral thorite, found in Norway.

qa_pairs.question: Orang-outang
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An arboreal anthropoid ape (Pongo pygmaeus, formerly Simia satyrus), which inhabits Borneo and Sumatra. Often called simply also known as orang. It is now an endangered species.

qa_pairs.question: Orarian
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to a coast.

qa_pairs.question: Oration
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An elaborate discourse, delivered in public, treating an important subject in a formal and dignified manner; especially, a discourse having reference to some special occasion, as a funeral, an anniversary, a celebration, or the like; -- distinguished from an argument in court, a popular harangue, a sermon, a lecture, etc.; as, Webster's oration at Bunker Hill.

qa_pairs.question: Oration
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To deliver an oration.

qa_pairs.question: Orator
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A public speaker; one who delivers an oration; especially, one distinguished for his skill and power as a public speaker; one who is eloquent.

qa_pairs.question: Oratorial
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Oratorical.

qa_pairs.question: Oratorian
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Oratorical.

qa_pairs.question: Oratorian
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Fathers of the Oratory, under Oratory.

qa_pairs.question: Oratorical
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to an orator or to oratory; characterized by oratory; rhetorical; becoming to an orator; as, an oratorical triumph; an oratorical essay.

qa_pairs.question: Oratorio
qa_pairs.answer: It means A more or less dramatic text or poem, founded on some Scripture nerrative, or great divine event, elaborately set to music, in recitative, arias, grand choruses, etc., to be sung with an orchestral accompaniment, but without action, scenery, or costume, although the oratorio grew out of the Mysteries and the Miracle and Passion plays, which were acted.

qa_pairs.question: Oratorious
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Oratorical.

qa_pairs.question: Oratorize
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To play the orator.

qa_pairs.question: Oratory
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A place of orisons, or prayer; especially, a chapel or small room set apart for private devotions.

qa_pairs.question: Oratory
qa_pairs.answer: It means The art of an orator; the art of public speaking in an eloquent or effective manner; the exercise of rhetorical skill in oral discourse; eloquence.

qa_pairs.question: Oratress
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A woman who makes public addresses.

qa_pairs.question: Oratrix
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A woman plaintiff, or complainant, in equity pleading.

qa_pairs.question: Orb
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A blank window or panel.

qa_pairs.question: Orb
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A spherical body; a globe; especially, one of the celestial spheres; a sun, planet, or star.

qa_pairs.question: Orb
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To form into an orb or circle.

qa_pairs.question: Orb
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To become round like an orb.

qa_pairs.question: Orbate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Bereaved; fatherless; childless.

qa_pairs.question: Orbation
qa_pairs.answer: It means The state of being orbate, or deprived of parents or children; privation, in general; bereavement.

qa_pairs.question: Orbed
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having the form of an orb; round.

qa_pairs.question: Orbic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Spherical; orbicular; orblike; circular.

qa_pairs.question: Orbicle
qa_pairs.answer: It means A small orb, or sphere.

qa_pairs.question: Orbicula
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Discina.

qa_pairs.question: Orbicular
qa_pairs.answer: It means Resembling or having the form of an orb; spherical; circular; orbiculate.

qa_pairs.question: Orbiculate
qa_pairs.answer: It means That which is orbiculate; especially, a solid the vertical section of which is oval, and the horizontal section circular.

qa_pairs.question: Orbiculate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Made, or being, in the form of an orb; having a circular, or nearly circular, or a spheroidal, outline.

qa_pairs.question: Orbiculation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state or quality of being orbiculate; orbicularness.

qa_pairs.question: Orbit
qa_pairs.answer: It means The path described by a heavenly body in its periodical revolution around another body; as, the orbit of Jupiter, of the earth, of the moon.

qa_pairs.question: Orbital
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to an orbit.

qa_pairs.question: Orbitar
qa_pairs.answer: It means Orbital.

qa_pairs.question: Orbitary
qa_pairs.answer: It means Situated around the orbit; as, the orbitary feathers of a bird.

qa_pairs.question: Orbitelae
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A division of spiders, including those that make geometrical webs, as the garden spider, or Epeira.

qa_pairs.question: Orbitolites
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of living Foraminifera, forming broad, thin, circular disks, containing numerous small chambers.

qa_pairs.question: Orbitonasal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the orbit and the nose; as, the orbitonasal, or ophthalmic, nerve.

qa_pairs.question: Orbitosphenoid
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to the sphenoid bone and the orbit, or to the orbitosphenoid bone.

qa_pairs.question: Orbitosphenoidal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the orbitosphenoid bone; orbitosphenoid.

qa_pairs.question: Orbituary
qa_pairs.answer: It means Orbital.

qa_pairs.question: Orbitude
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Orbation.

qa_pairs.question: Orbulina
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus of minute living Foraminifera having a globular shell.

qa_pairs.question: orb weaver
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any spider of the family Araneidae (called also Argiopidae) that spins a web with a pattern of lines spiraling outward from the center. They have eight similar eyes. The golden orb weaver, Mephila clavipes, is known for the remarkable dragline silk it produces for use as a frame for its web and as a line on which it can plummet down and nab prey. This silk has a high tensile strength and is stronger than the toughest current synthetic polymer (Kevlar).

qa_pairs.question: Orby
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Orblike; having the course of an orb; revolving.

qa_pairs.question: orc
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any of several cetaceans, especialy the also known as grampus (Grampus griseus) of the dolphin family.

qa_pairs.question: Orca
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The killer whale (Orcinus orca).

qa_pairs.question: Orcadian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to the Orkney Islands.

qa_pairs.question: Orcein
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A reddish brown amorphous dyestuff, C7H7NO3, obtained from orcin, and forming the essential coloring matter of cudbear and archil. It is closely related to litmus.

qa_pairs.question: Orchal
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Archil.

qa_pairs.question: Orchanet
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Alkanet, 2.

qa_pairs.question: Orchard
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A garden.

qa_pairs.question: Orcharding
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The cultivation of orchards.

qa_pairs.question: Orchardist
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who cultivates an orchard.

qa_pairs.question: Orchel
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Archil.

qa_pairs.question: Orchesography
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A treatise upon dancing.

qa_pairs.question: Orchester
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Orchestra.

qa_pairs.question: Orchestian
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any species of amphipod crustacean of the genus *Orchestia*, or family Orchestidae. See Beach flea, under Beach.

qa_pairs.question: Orchestra
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The space in a theater between the stage and the audience; -- originally appropriated by the Greeks to the chorus and its evolutions, afterward by the Romans to persons of distinction, and by the moderns to a band of instrumental musicians. Now commonly called also known as orchestra pit, to distinguish it from the section of the main floor occupied by spectators.

qa_pairs.question: Orchestral
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to an orchestra; suitable for, or performed in or by, an orchestra.

qa_pairs.question: orchestrate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as to write an orchestra score for; -- of a musical composition.

qa_pairs.question: orchestrated
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Arranged for performance by an orchestra; -- of a musical composition.

qa_pairs.question: Orchestration
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The arrangement of music for an orchestra; orchestral treatment of a composition; -- called also also known as instrumentation.

qa_pairs.question: Orchestre
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Orchestra.

qa_pairs.question: Orchestric
qa_pairs.answer: It means Orchestral.

qa_pairs.question: Orchestrion
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A large music box imitating a variety of orchestral instruments.

qa_pairs.question: Orchid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any plant of the order Orchidaceae. See Orchidaceous.

qa_pairs.question: Orchidaceous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining to, or resembling, a natural order (Orchidaceae) of endogenous plants of which the genus *Orchis* is the type. They are mostly perennial herbs having the stamens and pistils united in a single column, and normally three petals and three sepals, all adherent to the ovary. The flowers are curiously shaped, often resembling insects, the odd or lower petal (called the lip) being unlike the others, and sometimes of a strange and unexpected appearance. About one hundred species occur in the United States, but several thousand in the tropics.

qa_pairs.question: Orchidales
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An order of plants with irregular flowers having minute seeds, and including the families Orchidaceae and Burmanniaceae.

qa_pairs.question: Orchidean
qa_pairs.answer: It means Orchidaceous.

qa_pairs.question: Orchideous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Orchidaceous.

qa_pairs.question: Orchidologist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One versed in orchidology.

qa_pairs.question: Orchidology
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The branch of botany which treats of orchids.

qa_pairs.question: Orchil
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Archil.

qa_pairs.question: Orchilla weed
qa_pairs.answer: It means The lichen from which archil is obtained. See Archil.

qa_pairs.question: Orchis
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A genus of endogenous plants growing in the North Temperate zone, and consisting of about eighty species. They are perennial herbs growing from a tuber (beside which is usually found the last year's tuber also), and are valued for their showy flowers. See Orchidaceous.

qa_pairs.question: Orchitis
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Inflammation of the testicles.

qa_pairs.question: Orchotomy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The operation of cutting out or removing a testicle by the knife; castration.

qa_pairs.question: Orcin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A colorless crystalline substance, C6H3.CH3.(OH)2, which is obtained from certain lichens (Roccella, Lecanora, etc.), also from extract of aloes, and artificially from certain derivatives of toluene. It changes readily into orcein.

qa_pairs.question: Orcus
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The god of the underworld; counterpart of Greek Pluto.

qa_pairs.question: Ord
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An edge or point; also, a beginning.

qa_pairs.question: Ordain
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To set in order; to arrange according to rule; to regulate; to set; to establish.

qa_pairs.question: Ordainable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Capable of being ordained; worthy to be ordained or appointed.

qa_pairs.question: Ordainer
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who ordains.

qa_pairs.question: Ordainment
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Ordination.

qa_pairs.question: Ordal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Ordeal.

qa_pairs.question: Ordalian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to trial by ordeal.

qa_pairs.question: Ordeal
qa_pairs.answer: It means An ancient form of test to determine guilt or innocence, by appealing to a supernatural decision, -- once common in Europe, and still practiced in the East and by savage tribes.

qa_pairs.question: Ordeal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to trial by ordeal.

qa_pairs.question: Order
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Regular arrangement; any methodical or established succession or harmonious relation; method; system

qa_pairs.question: Order
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To put in order; to reduce to a methodical arrangement; to arrange in a series, or with reference to an end. Hence, to regulate; to dispose; to direct; to rule.

qa_pairs.question: Order
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To give orders; to issue commands.

qa_pairs.question: Orderable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Capable of being ordered; tractable.

qa_pairs.question: ordered
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is having or evincing a systematic arrangement; especially, having elements succeeding in order according to rule; as, an ordered sequence; an ordered pair. Opposite of Antonym: disordered or Antonym: unordered.

qa_pairs.question: Orderer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who puts in order, arranges, methodizes, or regulates.

qa_pairs.question: Ordering
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Disposition; distribution; management.

qa_pairs.question: Orderless
qa_pairs.answer: It means Being without order or regularity; disorderly; out of rule.

qa_pairs.question: Orderliness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The state or quality of being orderly.

qa_pairs.question: Orderly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Conformed to order; in order; regular; as, an orderly course or plan.

qa_pairs.question: Orderly
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as According to due order; regularly; methodically; duly.

qa_pairs.question: Orderly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A noncommissioned officer or soldier who attends a superior officer to carry his orders, or to render other service.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinability
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Capability of being ordained or appointed.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Capable of being ordained or appointed.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Indicating order or succession; as, the ordinal numbers, first, second, third, etc. Contrasted to cardinal.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A word or number denoting order or succession.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinalism
qa_pairs.answer: It means The state or quality of being ordinal.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinance
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Orderly arrangement; preparation; provision.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinand
qa_pairs.answer: It means One about to be ordained.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinant
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Ordaining; decreeing.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinant
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who ordains.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinarily
qa_pairs.answer: It means According to established rules or settled method; as a rule; commonly; usually; in most cases; as, a winter more than ordinarily severe.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is According to established order; methodical; settled; regular.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinary
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An officer who has original jurisdiction in his own right, and not by deputation.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinaryship
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state of being an ordinary.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Well-ordered; orderly; regular; methodical.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinate
qa_pairs.answer: It means The distance of any point in a curve or a straight line, measured on a line called the axis of ordinates or on a line parallel to it, from another line called the axis of abscissas, on which the corresponding abscissa of the point is measured.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To appoint, to regulate; to harmonize.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinately
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In an ordinate manner; orderly.

qa_pairs.question: Ordination
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of ordaining, appointing, or setting apart; the state of being ordained, appointed, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinative
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Tending to ordain; directing; giving order.

qa_pairs.question: Ordinator
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who ordains or establishes; a director.

qa_pairs.question: Ordnance
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Heavy weapons of warfare; cannon, or great guns, mortars, and howitzers; artillery; sometimes, a general term for all weapons, ammunitiion, and appliances used in war.

qa_pairs.question: Ordonnance
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The disposition of the parts of any composition with regard to one another and the whole.

qa_pairs.question: Ordonnant
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to ordonnance.

qa_pairs.question: Ordovian
qa_pairs.answer: It means Ordovician.

qa_pairs.question: Ordovician
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to a division of the Silurian formation, corresponding in general to the Lower Silurian of most authors, exclusive of the Cambrian.

qa_pairs.question: Ordure
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Dung; excrement; faeces.

qa_pairs.question: Ordurous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to ordure; filthy.

qa_pairs.question: Ore
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Honor; grace; favor; mercy; clemency; happy augury.

qa_pairs.question: Ore
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The native form of a metal, whether free and uncombined, as gold, copper, etc., or combined, as iron, lead, etc. Usually the ores contain the metals combined with oxygen, sulphur, arsenic, etc. (called mineralizers).

qa_pairs.question: Oread
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of the nymphs of mountains and grottoes.

qa_pairs.question: Oreades
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A group of butterflies which includes the satyrs. See Satyr, 2.

qa_pairs.question: Orectic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to the desires; hence, impelling to gratification; appetitive.

qa_pairs.question: Oregon grape
qa_pairs.answer: It means An evergreen species of barberry (Berberis Aquifolium), of Oregon and California; also, its roundish, blue-black berries.

qa_pairs.question: Oregonian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A resident of Oregon.

qa_pairs.question: Oreide
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Oroide.

qa_pairs.question: oreo
qa_pairs.answer: It means A confection consisting of a white cream filling sandwiched between two chocolate cookies.

qa_pairs.question: Oreodon
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of extinct herbivorous mammals, abundant in the Tertiary formation of the Rocky Mountains. It is more or less related to the camel, hog, and deer.

qa_pairs.question: Oreodont
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Resembling, or allied to, the genus *Oreodon*.

qa_pairs.question: Oreographic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to oreography.

qa_pairs.question: Oreography
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The science of mountains; orography.

qa_pairs.question: Oreopteris
qa_pairs.answer: It means A genus of ferns having species, formerly included in genus *Dryopteris* or *Thelypteris*.

qa_pairs.question: Oreortyx
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus of birds including the mountain quail of the western U. S.

qa_pairs.question: Oreoselin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A white crystalline substance which is obtained indirectly from the root of an umbelliferous plant (Imperatoria Oreoselinum), and yields resorcin on decomposition.

qa_pairs.question: Oreosoma
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus of small oceanic fishes, remarkable for the large conical tubercles which cover the under surface.

qa_pairs.question: Oreweed
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Oarweed.

qa_pairs.question: Orewood
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Oarweed.

qa_pairs.question: Orf
qa_pairs.answer: It means A bright-colored domesticated variety of the id. See Id.

qa_pairs.question: Orfgild
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Restitution for cattle; a penalty for taking away cattle.

qa_pairs.question: Orfray
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The osprey.

qa_pairs.question: Orfrays
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Orphrey.

qa_pairs.question: Orgal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Argol.

qa_pairs.question: Organ
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An instrument or medium by which some important action is performed, or an important end accomplished; as, legislatures, courts, armies, taxgatherers, etc., are organs of government.

qa_pairs.question: Organ
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To supply with an organ or organs; to fit with organs; to organize.

qa_pairs.question: Organdie
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A kind of transparent light but stiff muslin.

qa_pairs.question: organelle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as a specialized part of a cell performing a specific function, usually visible under the microscope as a distinct object; it is analogous to an organ{2}, but on a microscopic scale.

qa_pairs.question: Organic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to an organ or its functions, or to objects composed of organs; consisting of organs, or containing them; as, the organic structure of animals and plants; exhibiting characters peculiar to living organisms; as, organic bodies, organic life, organic remains. Cf. Inorganic.

qa_pairs.question: Organical
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Organic.

qa_pairs.question: Organically
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In an organic manner; by means of organs or with reference to organic functions; hence, fundamentally.

qa_pairs.question: Organicalness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or state of being organic.

qa_pairs.question: Organicism
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The doctrine of the localization of disease, or which refers it always to a material lesion of an organ.

qa_pairs.question: Organific
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Making an organic or organized structure; producing an organism; acting through, or resulting from, organs.

qa_pairs.question: organise
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as organize.

qa_pairs.question: Organism
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Organic structure; organization.

qa_pairs.question: organismal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is of or pertaining to organism (definition 2).

qa_pairs.question: Organist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who plays on the organ.

qa_pairs.question: Organista
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any one of several South American wrens, noted for the sweetness of their song.

qa_pairs.question: Organity
qa_pairs.answer: It means Organism.

qa_pairs.question: Organizability
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Quality of being organizable; capability of being organized.

qa_pairs.question: Organizable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Capable of being organized; esp. (Biol.), capable of being formed into living tissue; as, organizable matter.

qa_pairs.question: Organization
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of organizing; the act of arranging in a systematic way for use or action; as, the organization of an army, or of a deliberative body.

qa_pairs.question: organizational
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to organization; as, organizational structure.

qa_pairs.question: Organize
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To furnish with organs; to give an organic structure to; to endow with capacity for the functions of life; as, an organized being; organized matter; -- in this sense used chiefly in the past participle.

qa_pairs.question: organized
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as arranged; as, an organized tour.

qa_pairs.question: organized crime
qa_pairs.answer: It means Groups of persons organized for illegal purposes, such as bootlegging, conducting illegal gambling, loansharking, extortion, etc.; -- a general term encompassing most forms of criminal groups, but especially those that are consolidated into <ldquo/families<rdquo/ more or less recognizing each other's different regions of operation; sometimes considered synonymous with the also known as mafia or the also known as syndicate.

qa_pairs.question: Organizer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who organizes.

qa_pairs.question: Organling
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A large kind of sea fish; the orgeis.

qa_pairs.question: Organo-
qa_pairs.answer: It means A combining form denoting relation to, or connection with, an organ or organs.

qa_pairs.question: Organogen
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A name given to any one of the four elements, carbon, hydrogen, oxygen, and nitrogen, which are especially characteristic ingredients of organic compounds; also, by extension, to other elements sometimes found in the same connection; as sulphur, phosphorus, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Organogenesis
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The origin and development of organs in animals and plants.

qa_pairs.question: Organogenic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to organogenesis.

qa_pairs.question: Organogeny
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Organogenesis.

qa_pairs.question: Organographic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to organography.

qa_pairs.question: Organographist
qa_pairs.answer: It means One versed in organography.

qa_pairs.question: Organography
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A description of the organs of animals or plants.

qa_pairs.question: Organoleptic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Making an impression upon an organ; plastic; -- said of the effect or impression produced by any substance on the organs of touch, taste, or smell, and also on the organism as a whole.

qa_pairs.question: Organological
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or relating to organology.

qa_pairs.question: Organology
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The science of organs or of anything considered as an organic structure.

qa_pairs.question: organometallic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to, or denoting, any one of a series of compounds of certain metallic elements bound to organic radicals; such as, methylmercury, zinc methyl, sodium ethyl, etc.; formerly refered to as also known as metalorganic.

qa_pairs.question: Organon
qa_pairs.answer: It means An organ or instrument; hence, a method by which philosophical or scientific investigation may be conducted; -- a term adopted from the Aristotelian writers by Lord Bacon, as the title (<ldquo/Novum Organon<rdquo/) of part of his treatise on philosophical method.

qa_pairs.question: Organonymy
qa_pairs.answer: It means The designation or nomenclature of organs.

qa_pairs.question: Organophyly
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The tribal history of organs, -- a branch of morphophyly.

qa_pairs.question: Organoplastic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having the property of producing the tissues or organs of animals and plants; as, the organoplastic cells.

qa_pairs.question: Organoscopy
qa_pairs.answer: It means Phrenology.

qa_pairs.question: Organotrophic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Relating to the creation, organization, and nutrition of living organs or parts.

qa_pairs.question: Organule
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One of the essential cells or elements of an organ. See Sense organule, under Sense.

qa_pairs.question: Organy
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Origan.

qa_pairs.question: organzine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A kind of double thrown silk of very fine texture, that is, silk twisted like a rope with different strands, so as to increase its strength.

qa_pairs.question: orgasm
qa_pairs.answer: It means Eager or immoderate excitement or action; the state of turgescence of any organ; erethism.

qa_pairs.question: Orgeat
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A sirup in which, formerly, a decoction of barley entered, but which is now prepared with an emulsion of almonds, -- used to flavor beverages or edibles.

qa_pairs.question: Orgeis
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Organling.

qa_pairs.question: Orgiastic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or of the nature of, orgies.

qa_pairs.question: Orgy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A sacrifice accompanied by certain ceremonies in honor of some pagan deity; especially, the ceremonies observed by the Greeks and Romans in the worship of Dionysus, or Bacchus, which were characterized by wild and dissolute revelry. Usually in the plural form.

qa_pairs.question: Orgillous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Proud; haughty.

qa_pairs.question: Orgue
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any one of a number of long, thick pieces of timber, pointed and shod with iron, and suspended, each by a separate rope, over a gateway, to be let down in case of attack.

qa_pairs.question: Orgulous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Orgillous.

qa_pairs.question: Orgy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A frantic revel; drunken revelry. See Orgies

qa_pairs.question: Orgyia
qa_pairs.answer: It means A genus of bombycid moths whose caterpillars (esp. those of Orgyia leucostigma) are often very injurious to fruit trees and shade trees. The female is wingless. Called also also known as vaporer moth.

qa_pairs.question: Oricalche
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Orichalch.

qa_pairs.question: Orichalceous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Pertaining to, or resembling, orichalch; having a color or luster like that of brass.

qa_pairs.question: Orichalch
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A metallic substance, resembling gold in color, but inferior in value; a mixed metal of the ancients, resembling brass; -- called also also known as aurichalcum, also known as orichalcum, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Oriel
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A gallery for minstrels.

qa_pairs.question: Oriency
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Brightness or strength of color.

qa_pairs.question: Orient
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Rising, as the sun.

qa_pairs.question: Orient
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The part of the horizon where the sun first appears in the morning; the east.

qa_pairs.question: Orient
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To define the position of, in relation to the orient or east; hence, to ascertain the bearings of.

qa_pairs.question: Oriental
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the orient or east; eastern; concerned with the East or Orientalism; -- opposed to Antonym: occidental; as, Oriental countries.

qa_pairs.question: Oriental
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A native or inhabitant of the Orient or some Eastern part of the world; an Asiatic.

qa_pairs.question: Orientalism
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any system, doctrine, custom, expression, etc., peculiar to Oriental people.

qa_pairs.question: Orientalist
qa_pairs.answer: It means An inhabitant of the Eastern parts of the world; an Oriental.

qa_pairs.question: Orientality
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being oriental or eastern.

qa_pairs.question: Orientalize
qa_pairs.answer: It means to render Oriental; to cause to conform to Oriental manners or conditions.

qa_pairs.question: Orientate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To place or turn toward the east; to cause to assume an easterly direction, or to veer eastward.

qa_pairs.question: Orientate
qa_pairs.answer: It means To move or turn toward the east; to veer from the north or south toward the east.

qa_pairs.question: orientated
qa_pairs.answer: It means Adjusted or aligned to surroundings or circumstances; sometimes used in combination; as, to get oriented on one's first day at a new job.

qa_pairs.question: orientating
qa_pairs.answer: It means aligning; positioning; setting into proper alignment.

qa_pairs.question: Orientation
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act or process of orientating; determination of the points of the compass, or the east point, in taking bearings.

qa_pairs.question: Orientness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being orient or bright; splendor.

qa_pairs.question: Orifice
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A mouth or aperture, as of a tube, pipe, etc.; an opening; as, the orifice of an artery or vein; the orifice of a wound.

qa_pairs.question: Oriflamb
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The ancient royal standard of France.

qa_pairs.question: Origan
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus of aromatic labiate plants, including the sweet marjoram (Origanum Marjorana) and the wild marjoram (Origanum vulgare).

qa_pairs.question: Origenism
qa_pairs.answer: It means The opinions of Origen of Alexandria, who lived in the 3d century, one of the most learned of the Greek Fathers. Prominent in his teaching was the doctrine that all created beings, including Satan, will ultimately be saved.

qa_pairs.question: Origenist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A follower of Origen of Alexandria.

qa_pairs.question: Origin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The first existence or beginning of anything; the birth.

qa_pairs.question: Originable
qa_pairs.answer: It means Capable of being originated.

qa_pairs.question: Original
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to the origin or beginning; preceding all others; first in order; primitive; primary; pristine; as, the original state of man; the original laws of a country; the original inventor of a process.

qa_pairs.question: Original
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Origin; commencement; source.

qa_pairs.question: Originalist
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who is original.

qa_pairs.question: Originality
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being original.

qa_pairs.question: Originally
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In the original time, or in an original manner; primarily; from the beginning or origin; not by derivation, or imitation.

qa_pairs.question: Originalness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality of being original; originality.

qa_pairs.question: Originant
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Originating; original.

qa_pairs.question: Originary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Causing existence; productive.

qa_pairs.question: Originate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To give an origin or beginning to; to cause to be; to bring into existence; to produce as new.

qa_pairs.question: Originate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To take first existence; to have origin or beginning; to begin to exist or act; as, the scheme originated with the governor and council.

qa_pairs.question: Origination
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act or process of bringing or coming into existence; first production.

qa_pairs.question: Originative
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having power, or tending, to originate, or bring into existence; originating.

qa_pairs.question: Originator
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who originates.

qa_pairs.question: Orillon
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A semicircular projection made at the shoulder of a bastion for the purpose of covering the retired flank, -- found in old fortresses.

qa_pairs.question: Oriol
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Oriel.

qa_pairs.question: Oriole
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any one of various species of Old World singing birds of the family Oriolidae. They are usually conspicuously colored with yellow and black. The European or golden oriole (Oriolus galbula, or Oriolus oriolus) has a very musical flutelike note.

qa_pairs.question: Oriolidae
qa_pairs.answer: It means A natural family of Old World orioles.

qa_pairs.question: Oriolus
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The type genus of the Oriolidae.

qa_pairs.question: Orion
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A large and bright constellation on the equator, between the stars Aldebaran and Sirius. It contains a remarkable nebula visible to the naked eye.

qa_pairs.question: Oriskany
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Designating, or pertaining to, certain beds, chiefly limestone, characteristic of the latest period of the Silurian age.

qa_pairs.question: Orismological
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to orismology.

qa_pairs.question: Orismology
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is That department of natural history which treats of technical terms; the science of defining technical terms.

qa_pairs.question: Orison
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A prayer; a supplication.

qa_pairs.question: Orisont
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Horizon.

qa_pairs.question: Ork
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Orc.

qa_pairs.question: Orkneyan
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to the Orkney islands.

qa_pairs.question: Orle
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A bearing, in the form of a fillet, round the shield, within, but at some distance from, the border.

qa_pairs.question: Orleans
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A cloth made of worsted and cotton, -- used for wearing apparel.

qa_pairs.question: Orlo
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A wind instrument of music in use among the Spaniards.

qa_pairs.question: Orlop
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The lowest deck of a vessel, esp. of a ship of war, consisting of a platform laid over the beams in the hold, on which the cables are coiled.

qa_pairs.question: Ormazd
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The supreme deity, the embodiment of the principle of good, creator of the world, source of light, and guardian of mankind. He is the opponent of Ahriman, the spirit of evil, both being sprung from Eternity, or, according to another version, Ahriman being the offspring of a moment of doubt on the part of Ormazd. Ormazd is attended by angels and archangels. He is represented as a bearded man inclosed in a winged circle, a conception probably derived from the Assyrian representations of Ashur.

qa_pairs.question: Ormer
qa_pairs.answer: It means An abalone.

qa_pairs.question: ormolu
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A variety of brass made to resemble gold by the use of less zinc and more copper in its composition than ordinary brass contains. Its golden color is often heightened by means of lacquer of some sort, or by use of acids. Called also also known as mosaic gold.

qa_pairs.question: Ormosia
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of tropical shrubs and trees having usually odd-pinnate leaves with large leaflets and pink to reddish wood.

qa_pairs.question: Ormuzd
qa_pairs.answer: It means The good principle, or being, of the ancient Persian religion; same as Ormazd. See also Ahriman.

qa_pairs.question: orn
qa_pairs.answer: It means To ornament; to adorn.

qa_pairs.question: ornament
qa_pairs.answer: It means That which embellishes or adorns; that which adds grace or beauty; embellishment; decoration; adornment.

qa_pairs.question: ornament
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To adorn; to deck; to embellish; to beautify; as, to ornament a room, or a city.

qa_pairs.question: ornamental
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Serving to ornament; characterized by ornament; beautifying; embellishing.

qa_pairs.question: ornamentally
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as By way of ornament.

qa_pairs.question: Ornamentation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act or art of ornamenting, or the state of being ornamented.

qa_pairs.question: Ornamenter
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who ornaments; a decorator.

qa_pairs.question: Ornate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Elaborately adorned or decorated; beautifully sumptuous.

qa_pairs.question: Ornate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To adorn; to honor.

qa_pairs.question: Ornately
qa_pairs.answer: It means In an ornate manner.

qa_pairs.question: Ornateness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality of being ornate.

qa_pairs.question: Ornature
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Decoration; ornamentation.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to birds; as, ornithic fossils.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithichnite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The footmark of a bird occurring in strata of stone.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithichnology
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The branch of science which treats of ornithichnites.

qa_pairs.question: Ornitho-
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A combining form fr. Gr. 'o`rnis, 'o`rniqos, a bird.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithodelphia
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Monotremata.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithoidichnite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A fossil track resembling that of a bird.

qa_pairs.question: Ornitholite
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The fossil remains of a bird.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithologic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to ornithology; as, her ornithological interests.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithologist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One skilled in ornithology; a student of ornithology; one who describes birds.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithology
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That branch of Zoology which treats of the natural history of birds and their classification.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithomancy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Divination by means of birds, their flight, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithon
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An aviary; a poultry house.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithopappi
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An extinct order of birds. It includes only the Archaeopteryx.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithopoda
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An order of herbivorous dinosaurs with birdlike characteristics in the skeleton, esp. in the pelvis and hind legs, which in some genera had only three functional toes, and supported the body in walking as in Iguanodon. See Illust. in Appendix.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithorhynchidae
qa_pairs.answer: It means The natural family of monotremes including the platypus (duckbill) (Ornithorhyncus anatinus).

qa_pairs.question: Ornithorhynchus
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A genus of monotremes including the platypus (Ornithorhyncus anatinus). See Duck mole, under Duck.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithosauria
qa_pairs.answer: It means An order of extinct flying reptiles; -- called also also known as Pterosauria.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithoscelida
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A group of extinct Reptilia, intermediate in structure (especially with regard to the pelvis) between reptiles and birds.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithoscopy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Observation of birds and their habits.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithotomical
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to ornithotomy.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithotomist
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who is skilled in ornithotomy.

qa_pairs.question: Ornithotomy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The anatomy or dissection of birds.

qa_pairs.question: Orograph
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A machine for use in making topographical maps. It is operated by being pushed across country, and not only records distances, like the perambulator, but also elevations.

qa_pairs.question: Orographic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to orography.

qa_pairs.question: Orography
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That branch of science which treats of mountains and mountain systems; orology; as, the orography of Western Europe.

qa_pairs.question: Oroheliograph
qa_pairs.answer: It means A camera for obtaining a circular panoramic view of the horizon. The photographic plate is placed horizontally with a vertical lens above. A mirror of peculiar shape reflects light from the entire horizon to the lens, by means of which it is focused upon the plate.

qa_pairs.question: Orohippus
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of American Eocene mammals allied to the horse, but having four toes in front and three behind.

qa_pairs.question: Oroide
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An alloy, chiefly of copper and zinc or tin, resembling gold in color and brilliancy.

qa_pairs.question: Orological
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to orology.

qa_pairs.question: Orologist
