qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One versed in orology.

qa_pairs.question: Orology
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The science or description of mountains.

qa_pairs.question: Orometer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An aneroid barometer having a second scale that gives the approximate elevation above sea level of the place where the observation is made.

qa_pairs.question: Orotund
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Characterized by fullness, clearness, strength, and smoothness; ringing and musical; -- said of the voice or manner of utterance.

qa_pairs.question: Orotundity
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The orotund mode of intonation.

qa_pairs.question: Orphaline
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Orpheline.

qa_pairs.question: Orphan
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A child bereaved of both father and mother; sometimes, also, a child who has but one parent living.

qa_pairs.question: Orphan
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Bereaved of parents, or (sometimes) of one parent.

qa_pairs.question: Orphan
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To cause to become an orphan; to deprive of parents.

qa_pairs.question: Orphanage
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state of being an orphan; orphanhood; orphans, collectively.

qa_pairs.question: Orphancy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Orphanhood.

qa_pairs.question: Orphanet
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A little orphan.

qa_pairs.question: Orphanhood
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The state or condition of being an orphan; orphanage.

qa_pairs.question: Orphanism
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Orphanhood.

qa_pairs.question: Orphanotrophism
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The care and support of orphans.

qa_pairs.question: Orphanotrophy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A hospital for orphans.

qa_pairs.question: Orpharion
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An old instrument of the lute or cittern kind.

qa_pairs.question: Orphean
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to Orpheus, the mythic poet and musician; as, Orphean strains.

qa_pairs.question: Orpheline
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An orphan.

qa_pairs.question: Orpheus
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The famous mythic Thracian poet, son of the Muse Calliope, and husband of Eurydice. He is reputed to have had power to entrance beasts and inanimate objects by the music of his lyre.

qa_pairs.question: Orphic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to Orpheus; Orphean; as, Orphic hymns.

qa_pairs.question: Orphrey
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A band of rich embroidery, wholly or in part of gold, affixed to vestments, especially those of ecclesiastics.

qa_pairs.question: Orpiment
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Arsenic sesquisulphide, produced artificially as an amorphous lemon-yellow powder, and occurring naturally as a yellow crystalline mineral; -- formerly called also known as auripigment. It is used in king's yellow, in white Indian fire, and in certain technical processes, as indigo printing.

qa_pairs.question: Orpin
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A yellow pigment of various degrees of intensity, approaching also to red.

qa_pairs.question: orpine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A low plant with fleshy leaves (Sedum telephium), having clusters of purple flowers. It is found on dry, sandy places, and on old walls, in England, and has become naturalized in America. Called also also known as stonecrop, and also known as live-forever.

qa_pairs.question: Orrach
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Orach.

qa_pairs.question: Orrery
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An apparatus which illustrates, by the revolution of balls moved by wheelwork, the relative size, periodic motions, positions, orbits, etc., of bodies in the solar system.

qa_pairs.question: Orris
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A plant of the genus *Iris* (Iris Florentina); a kind of flower-de-luce. Its rootstock has an odor resembling that of violets.

qa_pairs.question: Orris
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A sort of gold or silver lace.

qa_pairs.question: Orsedew
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Leaf metal of bronze; Dutch metal. See under Dutch.

qa_pairs.question: Orseille
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Archil.

qa_pairs.question: Orsellic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to, or designating, an acid found in certain lichens, and called also lecanoric acid.

qa_pairs.question: Orsellinic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or designating, an organic acid obtained by a partial decomposition of orsellic acid as a white crystalline substance, and related to protocatechuic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Ort
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A morsel left at a meal; a fragment; refuse; -- commonly used in the plural.

qa_pairs.question: Ortalidian
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any one of numerous small two-winged flies of the family Ortalidae. The larvae of many of these flies live in fruit; those of others produce galls on various plants.

qa_pairs.question: Orthid
qa_pairs.answer: It means A brachiopod shell of the genus *Orthis*, and allied genera, of the family Orthidae.

qa_pairs.question: Orthis
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An extinct genus of Brachiopoda, abundant in the Paleozoic rocks.

qa_pairs.question: Orthite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A variety of allanite occurring in slender prismatic crystals.

qa_pairs.question: Ortho-
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A combining form signifying straight, right, upright, correct, regular; as, orthodromy, orthodiagonal, orthodox, orthographic.

qa_pairs.question: Orthocarbonic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Designating a complex ether, C.(OC2H5)4, which is obtained as a liquid of a pleasant ethereal odor by means of chlorpicrin, and is believed to be a derivative of the hypothetical normal carbonic acid, C.(OH)4.

qa_pairs.question: Orthocenter
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as That point in which the three perpendiculars let fall from the angles of a triangle upon the opposite sides, or the sides produced, mutually intersect.

qa_pairs.question: Orthoceras
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An extinct genus of Paleozoic Cephalopoda, having a long, straight, conical shell. The interior is divided into numerous chambers by transverse septa.

qa_pairs.question: Orthoceratite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An orthoceras; also, any fossil shell allied to Orthoceras.

qa_pairs.question: Orthoclase
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Common or potash feldspar crystallizing in the monoclinic system and having two cleavages at right angles to each other. See Feldspar.

qa_pairs.question: Orthoclastic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Breaking in directions at right angles to each other; -- said of the monoclinic feldspars.

qa_pairs.question: Orthodiagonal
qa_pairs.answer: It means The diagonal or lateral axis in a monoclinic crystal which is at right angles with the vertical axis.

qa_pairs.question: Orthodome
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See the Note under Dome, 4.

qa_pairs.question: orthodontia
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The treatment of the teeth so as to make the teeth align properly within the mouth, usually involving the wearing of braces and sometimes oral surgery.

qa_pairs.question: orthodontic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to orthodontics or orthodontia.

qa_pairs.question: orthodontics
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A branch of dentistry specializing in the treatment of the teeth so as to make the teeth align properly within the mouth; it usually involves fitting a patient with braces and sometimes oral surgery.

qa_pairs.question: orthodontist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as a dentist specializing in the prevention or correction of irregularities of the teeth; one specializing in orthodontics.

qa_pairs.question: Orthodox
qa_pairs.answer: It means Sound in opinion or doctrine, especially in religious doctrine; hence, holding the Christian faith; believing the doctrines taught in the Scriptures; -- opposed to Antonym: heretical and Antonym: heterodox; as, an orthodox Christian.

qa_pairs.question: Orthodoxal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to, or evincing, orthodoxy; orthodox.

qa_pairs.question: Orthodoxality
qa_pairs.answer: It means Orthodoxness.

qa_pairs.question: Orthodoxally
qa_pairs.answer: It means Orthodoxly.

qa_pairs.question: Orthodoxastical
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Orthodox.

qa_pairs.question: Orthodoxical
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Pertaining to, or evincing, orthodoxy; orthodox.

qa_pairs.question: Orthodoxly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In an orthodox manner; with soundness of faith.

qa_pairs.question: Orthodoxness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality or state of being orthodox; orthodoxy.

qa_pairs.question: Orthodoxy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Soundness of faith; a belief in the doctrines taught in the Scriptures, or in some established standard of faith; -- opposed to Antonym: heterodoxy or to Antonym: heresy.

qa_pairs.question: Orthodromic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to orthodromy.

qa_pairs.question: Orthodromics
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The art of sailing in a direct course, or on the arc of a great circle, which is the shortest distance between any two points on the surface of the globe; great-circle sailing; orthodromy.

qa_pairs.question: Orthodromy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act or art of sailing on a great circle.

qa_pairs.question: Orthoepic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to orthoepy, or correct pronunciation.

qa_pairs.question: orthoepist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who is skilled in orthoepy.

qa_pairs.question: orthoepy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The art of uttering words correctly; a correct pronunciation of words; also, mode of pronunciation.

qa_pairs.question: orthogamy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Direct fertilization in plants, as when the pollen fertilizing the ovules comes from the stamens of the same blossom; -- opposed to heterogamy.

qa_pairs.question: Orthognathic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Orthognathous.

qa_pairs.question: Orthognathism
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality or state of being orthognathous.

qa_pairs.question: Orthognathous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having the front of the head, or the skull, nearly perpendicular, not retreating backwards above the jaws; -- opposed to Antonym: prognathous. See Gnathic index, under Gnathic.

qa_pairs.question: Orthogon
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A rectangular figure.

qa_pairs.question: Orthogonal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Right-angled; rectangular; as, an orthogonal intersection of one curve with another.

qa_pairs.question: Orthogonally
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Perpendicularly; at right angles; as, a curve cuts a set of curves orthogonally.

qa_pairs.question: Orthograph
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An orthographic projection, sometimes partly in section, esp. of a building.

qa_pairs.question: Orthographer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One versed in orthography; one who spells words correctly.

qa_pairs.question: Orthographic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to orthography, or right spelling; also, correct in spelling; as, orthographical rules; the letter was orthographic.

qa_pairs.question: Orthographically
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In an orthographical manner

qa_pairs.question: Orthographist
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who spells words correctly; an orthographer.

qa_pairs.question: Orthographize
qa_pairs.answer: It means To spell correctly or according to usage; to correct in regard to spelling.

qa_pairs.question: Orthography
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The art or practice of writing words with the proper letters, according to standard usage; conventionally correct spelling; also, mode of spelling; as, his orthography is vicious.

qa_pairs.question: Orthology
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The right description of things.

qa_pairs.question: Orthometric
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having the axes at right angles to one another; -- said of crystals or crystalline forms.

qa_pairs.question: Orthometry
qa_pairs.answer: It means The art or practice of constructing verses correctly; the laws of correct versification.

qa_pairs.question: Orthomorphic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having the right form.

qa_pairs.question: orthopaedic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See otrthopedic and orthopedics.

qa_pairs.question: Orthopedic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of, pertaining to, or employed in, orthopedics; relating to the prevention or cure of deformities of children, or, in general, of the human body at any age; as, orthopedic surgery; an orthopedic hospital.

qa_pairs.question: orthopedics
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The art or practice of correcting disorders or deformities of the spine and joints, or, by extension, any deformities of the human body.

qa_pairs.question: Orthopedist
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who prevents, cures, or remedies deformities, esp. in children.

qa_pairs.question: Orthopedy
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as orthopedics.

qa_pairs.question: Orthophony
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The art of correct articulation; voice training.

qa_pairs.question: Orthopinacoid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A name given to the two planes in the monoclinic system which are parallel to the vertical and orthodiagonal axes.

qa_pairs.question: Orthopn<oe/a
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Specifically, a morbid condition in which respiration can be performed only in an erect posture; by extension, any difficulty of breathing.

qa_pairs.question: orthopod
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An orthopedist.

qa_pairs.question: Orthopoda
qa_pairs.answer: It means An extinct order of reptiles which stood erect on the hind legs, and resembled birds in the structure of the feet, pelvis, and other parts.

qa_pairs.question: Orthopraxy
qa_pairs.answer: It means The treatment of deformities in the human body by mechanical appliances.

qa_pairs.question: Orthoptera
qa_pairs.answer: It means An order of mandibulate insects including grasshoppers, locusts, cockroaches, mantids, crickets, katydids, etc. See Illust. under Insect.

qa_pairs.question: Orthopteran
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of the Orthoptera.

qa_pairs.question: Orthopterous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the Orthoptera.

qa_pairs.question: Orthorhombic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Noting the system of crystallization which has three unequal axes at right angles to each other; trimetric. See Crystallization.

qa_pairs.question: Orthoscope
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An instrument designed to show the condition of the superficial portions of the eye.

qa_pairs.question: Orthoscopic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Giving an image in correct or normal proportions; giving a flat field of view; as, an orthoscopic eyepiece.

qa_pairs.question: Orthosilicic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Designating the form of silicic acid having the normal or highest number of hydroxyl groups.

qa_pairs.question: Orthospermous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having the seeds straight, as in the fruits of some umbelliferous plants; -- opposed to coelospermous.

qa_pairs.question: Orthostade
qa_pairs.answer: It means A chiton, or loose, ungirded tunic, falling in straight folds.

qa_pairs.question: Orthostichy
qa_pairs.answer: It means A longitudinal rank, or row, of leaves along a stem.

qa_pairs.question: Orthotomic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Cutting at right angles.

qa_pairs.question: Orthotomous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having two cleavages at right angles with one another.

qa_pairs.question: Orthotomy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The property of cutting at right angles.

qa_pairs.question: Orthotone
qa_pairs.answer: It means Retaining the accent; not enclitic; -- said of certain indefinite pronouns and adverbs when used interrogatively, which, when not so used, are ordinarilly enclitic.

qa_pairs.question: Orthotropal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having the axis of an ovule or seed straight from the hilum and chalaza to the orifice or the micropyle; atropous.

qa_pairs.question: Orthotropic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having the longer axis vertical; -- said of erect stems.

qa_pairs.question: Orthoxylene
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as That variety of xylene (C6H4(CH3)2) in which the two methyl groups are in the ortho position; a colorless, liquid, combustible hydrocarbon resembling benzene.

qa_pairs.question: Ortive
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or relating to the time or act of rising; eastern; as, the ortive amplitude of a planet.

qa_pairs.question: Ortolan
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A European singing bird (Emberiza hortulana), about the size of the lark, with black wings. It is esteemed delicious food when fattened. Called also also known as bunting.

qa_pairs.question: Ortygan
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of several species of East Indian birds of the genera *Ortygis* and *Hemipodius*. They resemble quails, but lack the hind toe. See Turnix.

qa_pairs.question: Orval
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A kind of sage (Salvia Horminum).

qa_pairs.question: Orvet
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The blindworm.

qa_pairs.question: Orvietan
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A kind of antidote for poisons; a counter poison formerly in vogue.

qa_pairs.question: -ory
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An adjective suffix meaning of or pertaining to, serving for; as in auditory, pertaining to or serving for hearing; prohibitory, amendatory, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Oryal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Oriel.

qa_pairs.question: Oryctere
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The aard-vark (Orycteropus afer).

qa_pairs.question: Orycterope
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Oryctere (the aardvark, Orycteropus afer).

qa_pairs.question: Oryctognosy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Mineralogy.

qa_pairs.question: Oryctography
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Description of fossils.

qa_pairs.question: Oryctological
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to oryctology.

qa_pairs.question: Oryctologist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One versed in oryctology.

qa_pairs.question: Oryctology
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An old name for paleontology.

qa_pairs.question: Oryx
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of African antelopes which includes the gemsbok, the leucoryx, the bisa antelope (Oryx beisa), and the beatrix antelope (Oryx beatrix) of Arabia.

qa_pairs.question: Oryza
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of grasses including the rice plant; rice.

qa_pairs.question: Oryzomys
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A genus of rodents including the rice rats.

qa_pairs.question: Oryzopsis
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of grasses incluiding rice grass.

qa_pairs.question: orzo
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Pasta shaped like pearls of barley; frequently prepared with lamb in Greek cuisine.

qa_pairs.question: Os
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A bone.

qa_pairs.question: Os
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A mouth; an opening; an entrance.

qa_pairs.question: Os
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of the ridges of sand or gravel found in Sweden, etc., supposed by some to be of marine origin, but probably formed by subglacial waters. The osar are similar to the kames of Scotland and the eschars of Ireland. See Eschar.

qa_pairs.question: Os
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The chemical symbol for the element osmium.

qa_pairs.question: Osage
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A tributary of the Missouri River.

qa_pairs.question: Osage
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A member of the Osages, a tribe of North American Indians formerly living in western Missouri.

qa_pairs.question: Osage orange
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An ornamental tree of the genus *Maclura* (Maclura aurantiaca), closely allied to the mulberry (*Morus*); also, its fruit. The tree was first found in the country of the Osage Indians, and bears a hard and inedible fruit of an orangelike appearance. See Bois d'arc.

qa_pairs.question: Osages
qa_pairs.answer: It means A tribe of southern Sioux Indians, now living in the Indian Territory.

qa_pairs.question: Osanne
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Hosanna.

qa_pairs.question: Osar
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See 3d Os.

qa_pairs.question: Oscan
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to the Osci, a primitive people of Campania, a province of ancient Italy.

qa_pairs.question: Oscillancy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The state of oscillating; a seesaw kind of motion.

qa_pairs.question: Oscillaria
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of dark green, or purplish black, filamentous, fresh-water algae, the threads of which have an automatic swaying or crawling motion. Called also also known as Oscillatoria.

qa_pairs.question: Oscillate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To move backward and forward; to vibrate like a pendulum; to swing; to sway.

qa_pairs.question: Oscillating
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as That oscillates; vibrating; swinging.

qa_pairs.question: Oscillating current
qa_pairs.answer: It means A current alternating in direction.

qa_pairs.question: Oscillation
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of oscillating; a swinging or moving backward and forward, like a pendulum; vibration.

qa_pairs.question: Oscillative
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Tending to oscillate; vibratory.

qa_pairs.question: oscillator
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One that oscillates

qa_pairs.question: Oscillatoria
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Oscillaria.

qa_pairs.question: Oscillatory
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Moving, or characterized by motion, backward and forward like a pendulum; swinging; oscillating; vibratory; as, oscillatory motion.

qa_pairs.question: Oscillogram
qa_pairs.answer: It means An autographic record made by an oscillograph.

qa_pairs.question: oscillograph
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is a device for making a record of the wave forms of fluctuating .

qa_pairs.question: Oscillograph
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An apparatus for recording or indicating alternating-current wave forms or other electrical oscillations, especially of voltages or currents; it usually consists of a galvanometer with strong field, in which the mass of the moving part is very small and frequency of vibration very high.

qa_pairs.question: Oscillometer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An instrument for measuring the angle through which a ship rolls or pitches at sea.

qa_pairs.question: oscilloscope
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An electronic measuring instrument which provides a visual representation of the time variation of electrical quantities, such as voltage or current. It may be used to measure the shape of a voltage pulse or the frequency of an oscillating voltage. It can also be used to measure properties of other physical variables, such as sound or light intensity, if they can be translated into electrical voltage or current.

qa_pairs.question: Oscine
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Relating to the Oscines.

qa_pairs.question: Oscines
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Singing birds; a group of the Passeres, having numerous syringeal muscles, conferring musical ability.

qa_pairs.question: Oscinian
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of the Oscines, or singing birds.

qa_pairs.question: Oscinian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any one of numerous species of dipterous flies of the family Oscinidae.

qa_pairs.question: Oscinine
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the Oscines.

qa_pairs.question: Oscitancy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of gaping or yawning.

qa_pairs.question: Oscitant
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Yawning; gaping.

qa_pairs.question: Oscitantly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In an oscitant manner.

qa_pairs.question: Oscitate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To gape; to yawn.

qa_pairs.question: Oscitation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of yawning or gaping.

qa_pairs.question: Osculant
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Kissing; hence, meeting; clinging.

qa_pairs.question: Osculate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To kiss.

qa_pairs.question: Osculate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To kiss one another; to kiss.

qa_pairs.question: Osculation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of kissing; a kiss.

qa_pairs.question: Osculatory
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to kissing; kissing.

qa_pairs.question: Osculatory
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Pax, 2.

qa_pairs.question: Osculatrix
qa_pairs.answer: It means A curve whose contact with a given curve, at a given point, is of a higher order (or involves the equality of a greater number of successive differential coefficients of the ordinates of the curves taken at that point) than that of any other curve of the same kind.

qa_pairs.question: Oscule
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One of the excurrent apertures of sponges.

qa_pairs.question: Osculum
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Oscule.

qa_pairs.question: -ose
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A suffix denoting full of, containing, having the qualities of, like; as in verbose, full of words; pilose, hairy; globose, like a globe.

qa_pairs.question: Osier
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A kind of willow (Salix viminalis) growing in wet places in Europe and Asia, and introduced into North America. It is considered the best of the willows for basket work. The name is sometimes given to any kind of willow.

qa_pairs.question: Osier
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Made of osiers; composed of, or containing, osiers.

qa_pairs.question: Osiered
qa_pairs.answer: It means Covered or adorned with osiers; as, osiered banks.

qa_pairs.question: Osiery
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An osier bed.

qa_pairs.question: Osiris
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One of the principal divinities of Egypt, the brother and husband of Isis. He was figured as a mummy wearing the royal cap of Upper Egypt, and was symbolized by the sacred bull, called Apis. Cf. Serapis.

qa_pairs.question: Osmanli
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A Turkish official; one of the dominant tribe of Turks; loosely, any Turk.

qa_pairs.question: Osmate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A salt of osmic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Osmaterium
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One of a pair of scent organs which the larvae of certain butterflies emit from the first body segment, either above or below.

qa_pairs.question: Osmazome
qa_pairs.answer: It means A substance formerly supposed to give to soup and broth their characteristic odor, and probably consisting of one or several of the class of nitrogenous substances which are called extractives.

qa_pairs.question: Osmiamate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A salt of osmiamic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Osmiamic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of, pertaining to, or designating, a nitrogenous acid of osmium, H2N2Os2O5, forming a well-known series of yellow salts.

qa_pairs.question: Osmic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining to, derived from, or containing, osmium; specifically, designating those compounds in which it has a valence higher than in other lower compounds; as, osmic oxide.

qa_pairs.question: Osmidrosis
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The secretion of fetid sweat.

qa_pairs.question: Osmious
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Denoting those compounds of osmium in which the element has a valence relatively lower than in the osmic compounds; as, osmious chloride.

qa_pairs.question: osmite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A salt of osmious acid.

qa_pairs.question: osmium
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A rare metallic element of the platinum group with atomic number 76. It is found native as an alloy in platinum ore, and in iridosmine. It is a hard, infusible, bluish or grayish white metal, and the heaviest substance known. Its tetroxide is used in histological experiments to stain tissues. Symbol Os. Atomic weight 190.2. Specific gravity 22.477.

qa_pairs.question: osmogene
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An apparatus, consisting of a number of cells whose sides are of parchment paper, for conducting the process of osmosis. It is used especially in sugar refining to remove potassium salts from the molasses.

qa_pairs.question: osmograph
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An instrument for recording the height of the liquid in an endosmometer or for registering osmotic pressures.

qa_pairs.question: osmometer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An instrument for measuring the amount of osmotic action in different liquids.

qa_pairs.question: Osmometry
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The study of osmosis by means of the osmometer.

qa_pairs.question: Osmose
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The tendency in fluids to mix, or become equably diffused, when in contact. Same as osmosis, which see.

qa_pairs.question: osmosis
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The tendency in fluids to mix, or become equably diffused, when in contact. It was first observed between fluids of differing densities, and as taking place through a membrane or an intervening porous structure. An older term for the phenomenon was also known as Osmose.

qa_pairs.question: osmotic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or having the property of, osmosis; as, osmotic force.

qa_pairs.question: osmotic pressure
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The pressure which a solution of a substance in a liquid exerts on a semipermeable membrane, through which the solvent can diffuse but the dissolved substance (the solute) cannot diffuse, when separated across the membrane from the pure solvent. In general, the osmotic pressure will depend almost proportionally up to certain concentrations upon the molal concentration of the solute.

qa_pairs.question: Osmund
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A fern of the genus *Osmunda*, or flowering fern. The most remarkable species is the osmund royal, or royal fern (Osmunda regalis), which grows in wet or boggy places, and has large bipinnate fronds, often with a panicle of capsules at the top. The rootstock contains much starch, and has been used in stiffening linen.

qa_pairs.question: Osnaburg
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A species of coarse linen, originally made in Osnaburg, Germany.

qa_pairs.question: Oso-berry
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The small, blueblack, drupelike fruit of the Nuttallia cerasiformis, a shrub of Oregon and California, belonging to the Cherry tribe of Rosaceae.

qa_pairs.question: Osphradium
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The olfactory organ of some Mollusca. It is connected with the organ of respiration.

qa_pairs.question: Osprey
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The fishhawk (Pandion haliaetus).

qa_pairs.question: Oss
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To prophesy; to presage.

qa_pairs.question: Osse
qa_pairs.answer: It means A prophetic or ominous utterance.

qa_pairs.question: Ossean
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A fish having a bony skeleton; a teleost.

qa_pairs.question: Ossein
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The organic basis of bone tissue; the residue after removal of the mineral matters from bone by dilute acid; in embryonic tissue, the substance in which the mineral salts are deposited to form bone; bone collagen; -- called also also known as ostein. Chemically it is the same as collagen.

qa_pairs.question: Osselet
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A little bone.

qa_pairs.question: Osseous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Composed of bone; resembling bone; capable of forming bone; bony; ossific.

qa_pairs.question: Osseter
qa_pairs.answer: It means A species of sturgeon.

qa_pairs.question: Ossianic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to, or characteristic of, Ossian, a legendary Erse or Celtic bard.

qa_pairs.question: Ossicle
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A little bone; as, the auditory ossicles in the tympanum of the ear.

qa_pairs.question: ossicular
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to an ossicle.

qa_pairs.question: ossiculate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to an ossicle.

qa_pairs.question: Ossiculated
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having small bones.

qa_pairs.question: Ossiculum
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Ossicle.

qa_pairs.question: Ossiferous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Containing or yielding bone.

qa_pairs.question: Ossific
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Capable of producing bone; having the power to change cartilage or other tissue into bone.

qa_pairs.question: Ossification
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The formation of bone; the process, in the growth of an animal, by which inorganic material (mainly lime salts) is deposited in cartilage or membrane, forming bony tissue; ostosis.

qa_pairs.question: Ossified
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Changed to bone or something resembling bone; hardened by deposits of mineral matter of any kind; -- said of tissues.

qa_pairs.question: Ossifrage
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The lammergeir.

qa_pairs.question: Ossifragous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Serving to break bones; bone-breaking.

qa_pairs.question: Ossify
qa_pairs.answer: It means To form into bone; to change from a soft animal substance into bone, as by the deposition of lime salts.

qa_pairs.question: Ossify
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To become bone; to change from a soft tissue to a hard bony tissue.

qa_pairs.question: Ossifying
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Changing into bone; becoming bone; as, the ossifying process.

qa_pairs.question: Ossivorous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Feeding on bones; eating bones; as, ossivorous quadrupeds.

qa_pairs.question: Osspringer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The osprey.

qa_pairs.question: Ossuarium
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A charnel house; an ossuary.

qa_pairs.question: Ossuary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A place where the bones of the dead are deposited; a charnel house.

qa_pairs.question: Ost
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Oast.

qa_pairs.question: Osteal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Osseous.

qa_pairs.question: Ostein
qa_pairs.answer: It means Ossein.

qa_pairs.question: Osteitis
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Inflammation of bone.

qa_pairs.question: Osteler
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Hosteler.

qa_pairs.question: Ostend
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To exhibit; to manifest.

qa_pairs.question: Ostensibility
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or state of being ostensible.

qa_pairs.question: Ostensible
qa_pairs.answer: It means Capable of being shown; proper or intended to be shown.

qa_pairs.question: Ostensibly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In an ostensible manner; avowedly; professedly; apparently.

qa_pairs.question: Ostension
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The showing of the sacrament on the altar in order that it may receive the adoration of the communicants.

qa_pairs.question: Ostensive
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Showing; exhibiting.

qa_pairs.question: Ostensively
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In an ostensive manner.

qa_pairs.question: Ostensorium
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Monstrance.

qa_pairs.question: Ostent
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Appearance; air; mien.

qa_pairs.question: Ostentate
qa_pairs.answer: It means To make an ambitious display of; to show or exhibit boastingly.

qa_pairs.question: Ostentation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of ostentating or of making an ambitious display; unnecessary show; pretentious parade; -- usually in a detractive sense.

qa_pairs.question: Ostentatious
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Fond of, or evincing, ostentation; unduly conspicuous; pretentious; boastful.

qa_pairs.question: Ostentator
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One fond of display; a boaster.

qa_pairs.question: Ostentive
qa_pairs.answer: It means Ostentatious.

qa_pairs.question: Ostentous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Ostentatious.

qa_pairs.question: osteo-
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A combining form of Gr. 'oste`on a bone.

qa_pairs.question: Osteoblast
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of the protoplasmic cells which occur in the osteogenetic layer of the periosteum, and from or around which the matrix of the bone is developed; an osteoplast.

qa_pairs.question: osteoclasis
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The operation of breaking a bone in order to correct deformity.

qa_pairs.question: osteoclast
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as myeloplax, a large multinucleate cell within the bone, which functions in the absroption and removal of bone tissue.

qa_pairs.question: osteocolla
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A kind of glue obtained from bones.

qa_pairs.question: Osteocomma
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A metamere of the vertebrate skeleton; an osteomere; a vertebra.

qa_pairs.question: Osteocope
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pain in the bones; a violent fixed pain in any part of a bone.

qa_pairs.question: Osteocranium
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The bony cranium, as distinguished from the cartilaginous cranium.

qa_pairs.question: Osteodentine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A hard substance, somewhat like bone, which is sometimes deposited within the pulp cavity of teeth.

qa_pairs.question: Osteogen
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The soft tissue, or substance, which, in developing bone, ultimately undergoes ossification.

qa_pairs.question: Osteogenesis
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The formation or growth of bone.

qa_pairs.question: Osteogenetic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Connected with osteogenesis, or the formation of bone; producing bone; as, osteogenetic tissue; the osteogenetic layer of the periosteum.

qa_pairs.question: Osteogenic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Osteogenetic.

qa_pairs.question: Osteographer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An osteologist.

qa_pairs.question: Osteography
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The description of bones; osteology.

qa_pairs.question: Osteoid
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Resembling bone; bonelike.

qa_pairs.question: Osteolite
qa_pairs.answer: It means A massive impure apatite, or calcium phosphate.

qa_pairs.question: Osteologer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One versed in osteology; an osteologist.

qa_pairs.question: Osteologic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to osteology.

qa_pairs.question: Osteologist
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who is skilled in osteology; an osteologer.

qa_pairs.question: Osteology
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The science which treats of the bones of the vertebrate skeleton.

qa_pairs.question: Osteolysis
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Softening and absorption of bone.

qa_pairs.question: Osteoma
qa_pairs.answer: It means A tumor composed mainly of bone; a tumor of a bone.

qa_pairs.question: Osteomalacia
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A disease of the bones, in which they lose their earthy material, and become soft, flexible, and distorted. Also called also known as malacia.

qa_pairs.question: Osteomanty
qa_pairs.answer: It means Divination by means of bones.

qa_pairs.question: Osteomere
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An osteocomma.

qa_pairs.question: Osteopath
qa_pairs.answer: It means A practitioner of osteopathy.

qa_pairs.question: Osteopathic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to osteopathy.

qa_pairs.question: Osteopathist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who practices osteopathy; an osteopath.

qa_pairs.question: osteopathy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any disease of the bones.

qa_pairs.question: Osteoperiostitis
qa_pairs.answer: It means Inflammation of a bone and its periosteum.

qa_pairs.question: Osteophone
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An instrument for transmission of auditory vibrations through the bones of the head, so as to be appreciated as sounds by persons deaf from causes other than those affecting the nervous apparatus of hearing.

qa_pairs.question: Osteoplast
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An osteoblast.

qa_pairs.question: Osteoplastic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Producing bone; as, osteoplastic cells.

qa_pairs.question: Osteoplasty
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An operation or process by which the total or partial loss of a bone is remedied.

qa_pairs.question: Osteoporosis
qa_pairs.answer: It means An absorption of bone so that the bone tissue becomes unusually porous. It occurs especially in elderly men and postmenopausal women, and predisposes the elderly to fractures of the bones.

qa_pairs.question: Osteopterygious
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having bones in the fins, as certain fishes.

qa_pairs.question: Osteosarcoma
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A tumor having the structure of a sarcoma in which there is a deposit of bone; sarcoma connected with bone.

qa_pairs.question: Osteosclerosis
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Abnormal hardness and density of bone.

qa_pairs.question: Osteotome
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Strong nippers or a chisel for dividing bone.

qa_pairs.question: Osteotomist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One skilled in osteotomy.

qa_pairs.question: Osteotomy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The dissection or anatomy of bones; osteology.

qa_pairs.question: Osteozoa
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Vertebrata.

qa_pairs.question: Ostiary
qa_pairs.answer: It means The mouth of a river; an estuary.

qa_pairs.question: Ostic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to, or applied to, the language of the Tuscaroras, Iroquois, Wyandots, Winnebagoes, and a part of the Sioux Indians.

qa_pairs.question: Ostiole
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The exterior opening of a stomate. See Stomate.

qa_pairs.question: Ostitis
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Osteitis.

qa_pairs.question: Ostium
qa_pairs.answer: It means An opening; a passage.

qa_pairs.question: Ostler
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Hostler.

qa_pairs.question: Ostleress
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A female ostler.

qa_pairs.question: Ostlery
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Hostelry.

qa_pairs.question: Ostmen
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is East men; Danish settlers in Ireland, formerly so called.

qa_pairs.question: Ostosis
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Bone formation; ossification. See Ectostosis, and Endostosis.

qa_pairs.question: Ostracea
qa_pairs.answer: It means A division of bivalve mollusks including the oysters and allied shells.

qa_pairs.question: Ostracean
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any one of a family of bivalves, of which the oyster is the type.

qa_pairs.question: Ostracion
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A genus of plectognath fishes of the family Ostraciontidae having the body covered with solid, immovable, bony plates. It includes the trunkfishes (also called boxfish).

qa_pairs.question: Ostraciont
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A fish of the genus *Ostracion* and allied genera.

qa_pairs.question: ostracise
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as ostracize.

qa_pairs.question: ostracism
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Banishment by popular vote, -- a means adopted at Athens to rid the city of a person whose talent and influence gave umbrage.

qa_pairs.question: Ostracite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A fossil oyster.

qa_pairs.question: Ostracize
qa_pairs.answer: It means To exile by ostracism; to banish by a popular vote, as at Athens.

qa_pairs.question: ostracod
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A member of the Ostracoda, an order of tiny marine and freshwater crustaceans with a shrimplike body enclosed in a bivalve shell.

qa_pairs.question: Ostracoda
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An order of Entomostraca possessing shrimplike bodies enclosed in hard bivalve shells; called also also known as seed shrimp and also known as mussel shrimp. They were formerly referred to as also known as Ostracoidea. They are of small size, and swim freely about; many are less than 1 mm in length. Microfossils of certain extinct orders have been found extending back to the Cambrian age.

qa_pairs.question: ostracodan
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as ostracod.

qa_pairs.question: ostracoderm
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any of several extinct fishlike jawless vertebrates having a heavily armored body; of the Paleozoic.

qa_pairs.question: Ostracodermi
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A suborder of fishes of which *Ostracion* is the type.

qa_pairs.question: ostracoid
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the Ostracoidea (now Ostracoda).

qa_pairs.question: Ostracoidea
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An order of Entomostraca possessing hard bivalve shells. They are of small size, and swim freely about. Now usually written Ostracoda.

qa_pairs.question: Ostrea
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A genus of bivalve Mollusca which includes the true oysters.

qa_pairs.question: Ostreaceous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to an oyster, or to a shell; shelly.

qa_pairs.question: Ostreaculture
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The artificial cultivation of oysters.

qa_pairs.question: Ostreophagist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who feeds on oysters.

qa_pairs.question: ostrich
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A large bird of the genus *Struthio*, of which Struthio camelus of Africa is the best known species. It has long and very strong legs, adapted for rapid running; only two toes; a long neck, nearly bare of feathers; and short wings incapable of flight. The adult male is about eight feet high.

qa_pairs.question: Ostriferous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Producing oysters; containing oysters.

qa_pairs.question: Ostrogoth
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of the Eastern Goths. See Goth.

qa_pairs.question: Ostrogothic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the Ostrogoths.

qa_pairs.question: Oswego tea
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An American aromatic herb (Monarda didyma), with showy, bright red, labiate flowers.

qa_pairs.question: otacoustic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Assisting the sense of hearing; as, an otacoustic instrument.

qa_pairs.question: otacoustic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An instrument to facilitate hearing, as an ear trumpet.

qa_pairs.question: Otaheite apple
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The fruit of a Polynesian anacardiaceous tree (Spondias dulcis), also called also known as vi-apple. It is rather larger than an apple, and the rind has a flavor of turpentine, but the flesh is said to taste like pineapples.

qa_pairs.question: Otalgia
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pain in the ear; earache.

qa_pairs.question: Otalgic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to otalgia.

qa_pairs.question: Otalgy
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pain in the ear; otalgia.

qa_pairs.question: Otary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any eared seal.

qa_pairs.question: Otheoscope
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An instrument for exhibiting the repulsive action produced by light or heat in an exhausted vessel; a modification of the radiometer.

qa_pairs.question: Other
qa_pairs.answer: It means Either; -- used with other or or for its correlative (as either . . . or are now used).

qa_pairs.question: Other
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Different from that which, or the one who, has been specified; not the same; not identical; additional; second of two.

qa_pairs.question: Other
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Otherwise.

qa_pairs.question: Othergates
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In another manner.

qa_pairs.question: Otherguise
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of another kind or sort; in another way.

qa_pairs.question: Otherness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or state of being other or different; alterity; oppositeness.

qa_pairs.question: Otherways
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Otherwise.

qa_pairs.question: Otherwhere
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In or to some other place, or places; elsewhere.

qa_pairs.question: Otherwhile
qa_pairs.answer: It means At another time, or other times; sometimes; occasionally.

qa_pairs.question: Otherwise
qa_pairs.answer: It means In a different manner; in another way, or in other ways; differently; contrarily.

qa_pairs.question: otherworldly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is existing outside of or not in accordance with nature.

qa_pairs.question: Othman
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Ottoman.

qa_pairs.question: othonna
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A South African plant of the genus *Othonna* having smooth often fleshy leaves and heads of yellow flowers.

qa_pairs.question: Otic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of, pertaining to, or in the region of, the ear; auricular; auditory.

qa_pairs.question: Otides
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A suborder of terrestrial game birds of the Old World and Australia, including the bustards.

qa_pairs.question: Otididae
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A family of birds related to the cranes, most of which are large and ground-running, and comprising the bustards.

qa_pairs.question: Otiose
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Being at leisure or ease; unemployed; indolent; idle.

qa_pairs.question: Otiosity
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Leisure; indolence; idleness; ease.

qa_pairs.question: Otis
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of birds including certain of the bustards.

qa_pairs.question: Otitis
qa_pairs.answer: It means Inflammation of the ear.

qa_pairs.question: Oto-
qa_pairs.answer: It means A combining form denoting relation to the ear, or situation near the ear or in the ear.

qa_pairs.question: Otoba fat
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A colorless buttery substance obtained from the fruit of Myristica otoba, a species of nutmeg tree.

qa_pairs.question: Otoconite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A mass of otoliths.

qa_pairs.question: Otocrane
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The cavity in the skull in which the parts of the internal ear are lodged.

qa_pairs.question: Otocranial
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to the otocrane.

qa_pairs.question: Otocyst
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An auditory cyst or vesicle; one of the simple auditory organs of many invertebrates, containing a fluid and otoliths; also, the embryonic vesicle from which the parts of the internal ear of vertebrates are developed.

qa_pairs.question: Otography
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A description of the ear.

qa_pairs.question: Otolith
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of the small bones or particles of calcareous or other hard substance in the internal ear of vertebrates, and in the auditory organs of many invertebrates; an ear stone. Collectively, the otoliths are called ear sand and otoconite.

qa_pairs.question: Otolithic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to otoliths.

qa_pairs.question: Otological
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to otology.

qa_pairs.question: Otologist
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One skilled in otology; an aurist.

qa_pairs.question: Otology
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The branch of science which treats of the ear and its diseases.

qa_pairs.question: Otopathy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A diseased condition of the ear.

qa_pairs.question: Otorrh<oe/a
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A flow or running from the ear, esp. a purulent discharge.

qa_pairs.question: Otoscope
qa_pairs.answer: It means An instrument for examining the condition of the ear.

qa_pairs.question: Otoscopeic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the otoscope or to otoscopy.

qa_pairs.question: Otoscopy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The examination of the ear; the art of using the otoscope.

qa_pairs.question: Otosteal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An auditory ossicle.

qa_pairs.question: Otozoum
qa_pairs.answer: It means An extinct genus of huge vertebrates, probably dinosaurs, known only from four-toed tracks in Triassic sandstones.

qa_pairs.question: Ottar
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Attar.

qa_pairs.question: Ottava rima
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A stanza of eight lines of heroic verse, with three rhymes, the first six lines rhyming alternately and the last two forming a couplet. It was used by Byron in <ldquo/Don Juan,<rdquo/ by Keats in <ldquo/Isabella,<rdquo/ by Shelley in <ldquo/The Witch of Atlas,<rdquo/ etc.

qa_pairs.question: Ottawas
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A tribe of Indians who, when first known, lived on the Ottawa River. Most of them subsequently migrated to the southwestern shore of Lake Superior.

qa_pairs.question: Otter
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any carnivorous animal of the genera *Lutra*, *Enhydra*, and related genera of the family Mustelidae. Several species are described. They have large, flattish heads, short ears, and webbed toes. They are aquatic, and feed on fish. The sea otter (Enhydra lutris) also eats clams, crabs, starfish, abalone, and other marine animals; they may come to the surface, and lying on their backs using the stomach as a table, may be seen cracking open the shell of its prey with a rock. The common otter of Europe is Lutra vulgaris; the North American otter (or American otter) is Lutra Canadensis, which inhabits marshes, streams and rivers; other species inhabit South America and Asia. The North American otter adult is about three to four feet long (including the tail) and weighs from 10 to 30 pounds; the sea otter is commonly four feet long and 45 pounds (female) or 60 pounds (male). Their fur is soft and valuable, and in the nineteenth century they were hunted extensively. The sea otter was hunted to near extinction by 1900, and is now protected. Fewer than 3,000 sea otters are believed to live along the central California coast.

qa_pairs.question: Otter
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A corruption of Annotto.

qa_pairs.question: otterhound
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A small hardy British hound having long pendulous ears and a thick coarse shaggy coat with an oily undercoat; bred in England for hunting otters. Called also also known as otter dog.

qa_pairs.question: Otto
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Attar.

qa_pairs.question: Otto cycle
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A four-stroke cycle for internal-combustion engines consisting of the following operations: First stroke, suction into cylinder of explosive charge, as of gas and air; second stroke, compression, ignition, and explosion of this charge; third stroke (the working stroke), expansion of the gases; fourth stroke, expulsion of the products of combustion from the cylinder. This is the cycle invented by Beau de Rochas in 1862 and applied by Dr. Otto in 1877 in the Otto-Crossley gas engine, the first commercially successful internal-combustion engine made.

qa_pairs.question: Otto engine
qa_pairs.answer: It means An engine using the Otto cycle.

qa_pairs.question: Ottoman
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to the Turks; as, the Ottoman power or empire.

qa_pairs.question: Ottoman
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A Turk.

qa_pairs.question: Ottomite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An Ottoman.

qa_pairs.question: Ottrelite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A micaceous mineral occurring in small scales. It is characteristic of certain crystalline schists.

qa_pairs.question: Ouakari
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any South American monkey of the genus *Brachyurus*, especially Brachyurus ouakari.

qa_pairs.question: Ouananiche
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A small landlocked variety of the Atlantic salmon (Salmo salar ounaniche) of Lake St. John, Canada, and neighboring waters, noted for its vigor and activity, and habit of leaping from the water when hooked.

qa_pairs.question: Ouanderoo
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The wanderoo.

qa_pairs.question: Ouarine
qa_pairs.answer: It means A Brazilian monkey of the genus *Mycetes*.

qa_pairs.question: Oubliette
qa_pairs.answer: It means A dungeon with an opening only at the top, found in some old castles and other strongholds, into which persons condemned to perpetual imprisonment, or to perish secretly, were thrust, or lured to fall.

qa_pairs.question: Ouch
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A socket or bezel holding a precious stone; hence, a jewel or ornament worn on the person.

qa_pairs.question: Oughne
qa_pairs.answer: It means Own.

qa_pairs.question: Ought
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Aught.

qa_pairs.question: Ought
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Was or were under obligation to pay; owed.

qa_pairs.question: Oughtness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state of being as a thing ought to be; rightness.

qa_pairs.question: Oughwhere
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Anywhere; somewhere. See Owher.

qa_pairs.question: Ouistiti
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Wistit.

qa_pairs.question: Oul
qa_pairs.answer: It means An awl.

qa_pairs.question: Oul
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An owl.

qa_pairs.question: Oulachan
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Eulachon.

qa_pairs.question: Ounce
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A unit of mass or weight, the sixteenth part of a pound avoirdupois, and containing 28.35 grams or 437<frac12/ grains.

qa_pairs.question: Ounce
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A feline quadruped (Felis irbis syn. Felis uncia) resembling the leopard in size, and somewhat in color, but it has longer and thicker fur, which forms a short mane on the back. The ounce is pale yellowish gray, with irregular dark spots on the neck and limbs, and dark rings on the body. It inhabits the lofty mountain ranges of Asia. Called also also known as once.

qa_pairs.question: Ounded
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Wavy; waving; curly.

qa_pairs.question: Ounding
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Waving.

qa_pairs.question: Ouphe
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A fairy; a goblin; an elf.

qa_pairs.question: Ouphen
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Elfish.

qa_pairs.question: Our
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to us; belonging to us; as, our country; our rights; our troops; our endeavors. See I.

qa_pairs.question: -our
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See -or.

qa_pairs.question: Ourang
qa_pairs.answer: It means The orang-outang.

qa_pairs.question: Ourang-outang
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Orang-outang.

qa_pairs.question: Ouranographist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Uranographist.

qa_pairs.question: Ouranography
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Uranography.

qa_pairs.question: Ourebi
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A small, graceful, and swift African antelope, allied to the klipspringer.

qa_pairs.question: Ouretic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Uric.

qa_pairs.question: Ourology
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Urology.

qa_pairs.question: Ouroscopy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Ourology.

qa_pairs.question: Ours
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Note under Our.

qa_pairs.question: Ourselves
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An emphasized form of the pronoun of the first person plural; -- used as a subject, usually with we; also, alone in the predicate, in the nominative or the objective case.

qa_pairs.question: -ous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An adjective suffix meaning full of, abounding in, having, possessing the qualities of, like; as in gracious, abounding in grace; arduous, full of ardor; bulbous, having bulbs, bulblike; riotous, poisonous, piteous, joyous, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Ouse
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Ooze.

qa_pairs.question: Ousel
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of several species of European thrushes, especially the blackbird (Merula merula, or Turdus merula), and the mountain or ring ousel (Turdus torquatus).

qa_pairs.question: Oust
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Oast.

qa_pairs.question: Oust
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To take away; to remove.

qa_pairs.question: Ouster
qa_pairs.answer: It means A putting out of possession; dispossession; disseizin; -- of a person.

qa_pairs.question: ousting
qa_pairs.answer: It means the act of ejecting someone or forcing them out; ouster.

qa_pairs.question: Out
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In its original and strict sense, out means from the interior of something; beyond the limits or boundary of somethings; in a position or relation which is exterior to something; -- opposed to Antonym: in or Antonym: into. The something may be expressed after of, from, etc. (see Out of, below); or, if not expressed, it is implied; as, he is out; or, he is out of the house, office, business, etc.; he came out; or, he came out from the ship, meeting, sect, party, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Out
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who, or that which, is out; especially, one who is out of office; -- generally in the plural.

qa_pairs.question: Out
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To cause to be out; to eject; to expel.

qa_pairs.question: Out
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To come or go out; to get out or away; to become public.

qa_pairs.question: Out
qa_pairs.answer: It means Expressing impatience, anger, a desire to be rid of; -- with the force of command; go out; begone; away; off.

qa_pairs.question: Outact
qa_pairs.answer: It means To do or beyond; to exceed in acting.

qa_pairs.question: Outagamies
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See 1st Fox, 7.

qa_pairs.question: Outargue
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To surpass or conquer in argument.

qa_pairs.question: out-and-out
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Without any reservation or disguise; downright; plain; unqualified; absolute; as, an out and out villain; an out-and-out lie.

qa_pairs.question: out-and-out
qa_pairs.answer: It means Completely; wholly; openly.

qa_pairs.question: Outbabble
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To utter foolishly or excessively; to surpass in babbling.

qa_pairs.question: outback
qa_pairs.answer: It means The remote bush country of Australia; as, they hunted kangaroo in the outback.

qa_pairs.question: outback
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is same as out-of-the-way.

qa_pairs.question: Outbalance
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To outweight; to exceed in weight or effect.

qa_pairs.question: Outbar
qa_pairs.answer: It means To bar out.

qa_pairs.question: Outbeg
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To surpass in begging.

qa_pairs.question: Outbid
qa_pairs.answer: It means To exceed or surpass in bidding; to bid a higher price.

qa_pairs.question: Outbidder
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who outbids.

qa_pairs.question: Outbleat
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To surpass in bleating.

qa_pairs.question: Outblown
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Inflated with wind.

qa_pairs.question: Outblush
qa_pairs.answer: It means To exceed in blushing; to surpass in rosy color.

qa_pairs.question: Outboard
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Beyond or outside of the lines of a vessel's bulwarks or hull; in a direction from the hull or from the keel; -- opposed to inboard; as, outboard rigging; swing the davits outboard.

qa_pairs.question: Outborn
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Foreign; not native.

qa_pairs.question: Outbound
qa_pairs.answer: It means Outward bound.

qa_pairs.question: Outbounds
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The farthest or exterior bounds; extreme limits; boundaries.

qa_pairs.question: Outbow
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To excel in bowing.

qa_pairs.question: Outbowed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Convex; curved outward.

qa_pairs.question: Outbrag
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To surpass in bragging; hence, to make appear inferior.

qa_pairs.question: Outbrave
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To excel in bravery or in insolence; to defy with superior courage or audacity.

qa_pairs.question: Outbray
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To exceed in braying.

qa_pairs.question: Outbrazen
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To bear down with a brazen face; to surpass in impudence.

qa_pairs.question: outbreak
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A bursting forth; eruption; insurrection; mutiny; revolt.

qa_pairs.question: Outbreaking
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of breaking out.

qa_pairs.question: Outbreast
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To surpass in singing. See Breast, (n.), 6.

qa_pairs.question: Outbreathe
qa_pairs.answer: It means To breathe forth.

qa_pairs.question: Outbreathe
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To issue, as breath; to be breathed out; to exhale.

qa_pairs.question: Outbribe
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To surpass in bribing.

qa_pairs.question: Outbring
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To bring or bear out.

qa_pairs.question: Outbud
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To sprout.

qa_pairs.question: Outbuild
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To exceed in building, or in durability of building.

qa_pairs.question: Outbuilding
qa_pairs.answer: It means A building separate from, and subordinate to, the main house; an outhouse.

qa_pairs.question: Outburn
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To exceed in burning.

qa_pairs.question: Outburst
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A bursting forth; as, an outburst of laughter.

qa_pairs.question: Outcant
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To surpass in canting.

qa_pairs.question: Outcast
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Cast out; degraded.

qa_pairs.question: Outcast
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who is cast out or expelled; an exile; one driven from home, society, or country; hence, often, a degraded person; a vagabond.

qa_pairs.question: Outcasting
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That which is cast out.

qa_pairs.question: Outcept
qa_pairs.answer: It means Except.

qa_pairs.question: Outcheat
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To exceed in cheating.

qa_pairs.question: Outclimb
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To climb beyond; to surpass in climbing.

qa_pairs.question: Outcome
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as That which comes out of, or follows from, something else; issue; result; consequence; upshot.

qa_pairs.question: Outcompass
qa_pairs.answer: It means To exceed the compass or limits of.

qa_pairs.question: Outcourt
qa_pairs.answer: It means An outer or exterior court.

qa_pairs.question: Outcrafty
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To exceed in cunning.

qa_pairs.question: Outcrier
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who cries out or proclaims; a herald or crier.

qa_pairs.question: Outcrop
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The coming out of a stratum to the surface of the ground.

qa_pairs.question: Outcrop
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To come out to the surface of the ground; -- said of strata.

qa_pairs.question: Outcry
qa_pairs.answer: It means A vehement or loud cry; a cry of distress, alarm, opposition, or detestation; clamor.

qa_pairs.question: Outdare
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To surpass in daring; to overcome by courage; to brave.

qa_pairs.question: Outdated
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Being out of date; antiquated; outmoded; unfashionable.

qa_pairs.question: Outdazzle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To surpass in dazzing.

qa_pairs.question: Outdo
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To go beyond in performance; to excel; to surpass.

qa_pairs.question: outdone
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is defeated.

qa_pairs.question: Outdoor
qa_pairs.answer: It means Being, or done, in the open air; being or done outside of certain buildings, as poorhouses, hospitals, etc.; as, outdoor exercise; outdoor relief; outdoor patients.

qa_pairs.question: Outdoors
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Out of the house; out of doors; in the open air; abroad.

qa_pairs.question: Outdraw
qa_pairs.answer: It means To draw out; to extract.

qa_pairs.question: Outdream
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To pass, or escape, while dreaming.

qa_pairs.question: Outdrink
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To exceed in drinking.

qa_pairs.question: Outdure
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To outlast.

qa_pairs.question: Outdwell
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To dwell or stay beyond.

qa_pairs.question: Outdweller
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who holds land in a parish, but lives elsewhere.

qa_pairs.question: Outer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Being on the outside; external; farthest or farther from the interior, from a given station, or from any space or position regarded as a center or starting place; -- opposed to Antonym: inner; as, the outer wall; the outer court or gate; the outer stump in cricket; the outer world.

qa_pairs.question: Outer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The part of a target which is beyond the circles surrounding the bull's-eye.

qa_pairs.question: Outer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who puts out, ousts, or expels; also, an ouster; dispossession.

qa_pairs.question: Outerly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Utterly; entirely.

qa_pairs.question: Outermost
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Being on the extreme external part; farthest outward; as, the outermost row.

qa_pairs.question: outerwear
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as clothing for use outdoors.

qa_pairs.question: Outface
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To face or look (one) out of countenance; to resist or bear down by bold looks or effrontery; to brave.

qa_pairs.question: Outfall
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The mouth of a river; the lower end of a water course; the open end of a drain, culvert, etc., where the discharge occurs.

qa_pairs.question: outfangthef
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A thief from without or abroad, taken within a lord's fee or liberty.

qa_pairs.question: Outfawn
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To exceed in fawning.

qa_pairs.question: Outfeast
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To exceed in feasting.

qa_pairs.question: Outfeat
qa_pairs.answer: It means To surpass in feats.

qa_pairs.question: Outfield
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Arable land which has been or is being exhausted. See Infield, 1.

qa_pairs.question: outfield
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To surpass in performing the tasks of fielding; as, both teams got ten hits, but the Red Sox outfielded the Yankees.

qa_pairs.question: outfielder
qa_pairs.answer: It means A person who plays in the outfield.

qa_pairs.question: outfight
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To exceed in fighting; fight more competently; as, He outfought his challengers; the boxer outfought his opponent for eight rounds but lost the bout in the ninth on a knockout.

qa_pairs.question: Outfit
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A fitting out, or equipment, as of a ship for a voyage, or of a person for an expedition in an unoccupied region or residence in a foreign land; the expense of, or allowance made for, equipment, as by the government of the United States to a diplomatic agent going abroad.

qa_pairs.question: outfitted
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is furnished with essential equipment for a particular occupation or undertaking occupation; as, a well-outfitted expedition to the South Pole.

qa_pairs.question: Outfitter
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who furnishes outfits for a voyage, a journey, or a business.

qa_pairs.question: outfitting
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as the act of renovating and fitting out a ship.

qa_pairs.question: Outflank
qa_pairs.answer: It means To go beyond, or be superior to, on the flank; to pass around or turn the flank or flanks of.

qa_pairs.question: Outflatter
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To exceed in flattering.

qa_pairs.question: Outfling
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A gibe; a contemptuous remark.

qa_pairs.question: Outflow
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A flowing out; efflux.

qa_pairs.question: Outflow
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To flow out.

qa_pairs.question: Outfly
qa_pairs.answer: It means To surpass in flying; to fly beyond or faster than.

qa_pairs.question: Outfool
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To exceed in folly.

qa_pairs.question: Outfoot
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To outrun or outwalk; hence, of a vessel, to outsail.

qa_pairs.question: Outform
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as External appearance.

qa_pairs.question: outfox
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To defeat or gain an advantage over (an antagonist) by clever stratagems; to outwit; to outmaneuver; to outsmart.

qa_pairs.question: Outfrown
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To frown down; to overbear by frowning.

qa_pairs.question: Outgate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An outlet.

qa_pairs.question: Outgaze
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To gaze beyond; to exceed in sharpness or persistence of seeing or of looking; hence, to stare out of countenance.

qa_pairs.question: Outgeneral
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To exceed in generalship; to gain advantage over by superior military skill or executive ability; to outmaneuver.

qa_pairs.question: Outgive
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To surpass in giving.

qa_pairs.question: Outgo
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To go beyond; to exceed in swiftness; to surpass; to outdo.

qa_pairs.question: Outgo
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as That which goes out, or is paid out; outlay; expenditure; -- the opposite of Antonym: income; as, when one's outgo exceeds one's income, distress follows quickly.

qa_pairs.question: Outgoer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who goes out or departs.

qa_pairs.question: Outgoing
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act or the state of going out.

qa_pairs.question: outgoing
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Going out; departing; leaving; as, the outgoing administration; an outgoing steamer.

qa_pairs.question: Outground
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Ground situated at a distance from the house; outlying land.

qa_pairs.question: Outgrow
qa_pairs.answer: It means To surpass in growing; to grow more than.

qa_pairs.question: Outgrowth
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as That which grows out of, or proceeds from, anything; an excrescence; an offshoot; hence, a result or consequence.

qa_pairs.question: Outguard
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A guard or small body of troops at a distance from the main body of an army, to watch for the approach of an enemy; hence, anything for defense placed at a distance from the thing to be defended.

qa_pairs.question: Outgush
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A pouring out; an outburst.

qa_pairs.question: Outgush
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To gush out; to flow forth.

qa_pairs.question: Outhaul
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A rope used for hauling out a sail upon a spar; -- opposite of Antonym: inhaul.

qa_pairs.question: Outhees
qa_pairs.answer: It means Outcry; alarm.

qa_pairs.question: Outher
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Other.

qa_pairs.question: Out-Herod
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To surpass (Herod) in violence or wickedness; to exceed in any vicious or offensive particular. Compare outpope the Pope.

qa_pairs.question: Outhire
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To hire out.

qa_pairs.question: outhouse
qa_pairs.answer: It means A small house or building at a little distance from the main house; an outbuilding.

qa_pairs.question: Outing
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of going out; an airing; an excursion; as, a summer outing.

qa_pairs.question: Outjest
