qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To surpass in jesting; to drive out, or away, by jesting.

qa_pairs.question: Outjet
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as That which jets out or projects from anything.

qa_pairs.question: Outjuggle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To surpass in juggling.

qa_pairs.question: Outkeeper
qa_pairs.answer: It means An attachment to a surveyor's compass for keeping tally in chaining.

qa_pairs.question: Outknave
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To surpass in knavery.

qa_pairs.question: Outlabor
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To surpass in laboring.

qa_pairs.question: Outland
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Foreign; outlandish.

qa_pairs.question: outland
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The regions of a country or territory remote from the main cities; the outlying provinces.

qa_pairs.question: Outlander
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A foreigner.

qa_pairs.question: Outlandish
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Foreign; not native.

qa_pairs.question: outlandishness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality of being strikingly out of the ordinary; the quality of being outlandish{2}.

qa_pairs.question: Outlast
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To exceed in duration; to survive; to endure longer than.

qa_pairs.question: Outlaugh
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To surpass or outdo in laughing.

qa_pairs.question: Outlaw
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A person excluded from the benefit of the law, or deprived of its protection.

qa_pairs.question: Outlaw
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To deprive of the benefit and protection of law; to declare to be an outlaw.

qa_pairs.question: outlawed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is contrary to or forbidden by law; banned; illicit; as, a member of an outlawed political party.

qa_pairs.question: Outlawry
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of outlawing; the putting a man out of the protection of law, or the process by which a man (as an absconding criminal) is deprived of that protection.

qa_pairs.question: Outlay
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To lay out; to spread out; to display.

qa_pairs.question: Outlay
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A laying out or expending.

qa_pairs.question: Outleap
qa_pairs.answer: It means To surpass in leaping.

qa_pairs.question: Outleap
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A sally.

qa_pairs.question: Outlearn
qa_pairs.answer: It means To excel or surpass in learing.

qa_pairs.question: Outlet
qa_pairs.answer: It means The place or opening by which anything is let out; a passage out; an exit; a vent.

qa_pairs.question: Outlet
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To let out; to emit.

qa_pairs.question: Outlie
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To exceed in lying.

qa_pairs.question: Outlier
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who does not live where his office, or business, or estate, is.

qa_pairs.question: Outlimb
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An extreme member or part of a thing; a limb.

qa_pairs.question: Outline
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The line which marks the outer limits of an object or figure; the exterior line or edge; contour.

qa_pairs.question: Outline
qa_pairs.answer: It means To draw the outline of.

qa_pairs.question: Outlinear
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to an outline; being in, or forming, an outline.

qa_pairs.question: Outlive
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To live beyond, or longer than; to survive.

qa_pairs.question: Outliver
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who outlives.

qa_pairs.question: Outlook
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To face down; to outstare.

qa_pairs.question: Outlook
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of looking out; watch.

qa_pairs.question: Outloose
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A loosing from; an escape; an outlet; an evasion.

qa_pairs.question: Outlope
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An excursion.

qa_pairs.question: Outluster
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To excel in brightness or luster.

qa_pairs.question: Outlying
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Lying or being at a distance from the central part, or the main body; being on, or beyond, the frontier; exterior; remote; detached.

qa_pairs.question: Outmaneuver
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To surpass, or get an advantage of, in maneuvering; to outwit or frustrate by clever stratagems; to outgeneral.

qa_pairs.question: Outmantle
qa_pairs.answer: It means To excel in mantling; hence, to excel in splendor, as of dress.

qa_pairs.question: Outmarch
qa_pairs.answer: It means To surpass in marching; to march faster than, or so as to leave behind.

qa_pairs.question: Outmeasure
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To exceed in measure or extent; to measure more than.

qa_pairs.question: out-migration
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is migration out of country or territory; emigration.

qa_pairs.question: outmoded
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as same as old-fashioned, (a.), 3.

qa_pairs.question: Outmost
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Farthest from the middle or interior; farthest outward; outermost.

qa_pairs.question: Outmount
qa_pairs.answer: It means To mount above.

qa_pairs.question: Outname
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To exceed in naming or describing.

qa_pairs.question: Outness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state of being out or beyond; separateness.

qa_pairs.question: Outnoise
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To exceed in noise; to surpass in noisiness.

qa_pairs.question: Outnumber
qa_pairs.answer: It means To exceed in number; as, the garrison was badly outnumbered by the attacking forces.

qa_pairs.question: out-of-bounds
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is outside the delimited playing field.

qa_pairs.question: out-of-breath
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is breathing laboriously or convulsively.

qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A portion of a recorded performance which is eliminated in the editing process and is not included in the final commercial presentation. The recording may be audio or visual or both, but is usually of a film or television performance. Outtakes often include mistakes or lower quality performances, and sometimes blunders. The latter type are occasionally presented separately to the public for amusement.

qa_pairs.question: Overshadowy

qa_pairs.question: Overshake
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To shake over or away; to drive away; to disperse.

qa_pairs.question: Overshine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To shine over or upon; to illumine.

qa_pairs.question: Overshoe
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A shoe that is worn over another for protection from wet or for extra warmth; esp., an India-rubber shoe; a galosh.

qa_pairs.question: Overshoot
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To shoot over or beyond; to miss; as, to overshoot a mark; to overshoot the green in golf.

qa_pairs.question: Overshoot
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To fly beyond the mark.

qa_pairs.question: Overshot
qa_pairs.answer: It means From Overshoot, (v. t.)

qa_pairs.question: Overshot
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having the upper teeth projecting beyond the lower; -- said of the jaws of some dogs.

qa_pairs.question: Oversight
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Watchful care; superintendence; general supervision.

qa_pairs.question: oversimplified
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as simplified excessively so as to distort or misrepresent; -- of facts, assertions, or communications. Contrasted with Antonym: overcomplicated.

qa_pairs.question: oversimplify
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is to simplify excessively so as to distort or misrepresent; -- of facts, assertions, or communications; as, Don't oversimplify the rules.

qa_pairs.question: Oversize
qa_pairs.answer: It means To surpass in size.

qa_pairs.question: Oversize
qa_pairs.answer: It means To cover with viscid matter.

qa_pairs.question: Overskip
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To skip or leap over; to treat with indifference.

qa_pairs.question: Overskirt
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An upper skirt, shorter than the dress, and usually draped.

qa_pairs.question: Overslaugh
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A bar in a river; as, the overslaugh in the Hudson River.

qa_pairs.question: Overslaugh
qa_pairs.answer: It means To hinder or stop, as by an overslaugh or an impediment; as, to overslaugh a bill in a legislative body; to overslaugh a military officer, that is, to hinder his promotion or employment.

qa_pairs.question: Oversleep
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To sleep beyond; as, to oversleep one's self or one's usual hour of rising.

qa_pairs.question: Oversleep
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To sleep too long.

qa_pairs.question: Overslide
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To slide over or by.

qa_pairs.question: Overslip
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To slip or slide over; to pass easily or carelessly beyond; to omit; to neglect; as, to overslip time or opportunity.

qa_pairs.question: Overslop
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An outer garment, or slop.

qa_pairs.question: Overslow
qa_pairs.answer: It means To render slow; to check; to curb.

qa_pairs.question: Overslow
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Too slow.

qa_pairs.question: Oversman
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An overseer; a superintendent.

qa_pairs.question: Oversnow
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To cover with snow, or as with snow.

qa_pairs.question: Oversoon
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Too soon.

qa_pairs.question: Oversorrow
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To grieve or afflict to excess.

qa_pairs.question: Oversoul
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The all-containing soul.

qa_pairs.question: Oversow
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To sow where something has already been sown.

qa_pairs.question: Overspan
qa_pairs.answer: It means To reach or extend over.

qa_pairs.question: Overspeak
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To exceed in speaking; to speak too much; to use too many words.

qa_pairs.question: Overspin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To spin out to too great length; to protract unduly.

qa_pairs.question: Overspread
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To spread over; to cover; as, the deluge overspread the earth.

qa_pairs.question: Overspread
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To be spread or scattered over.

qa_pairs.question: Overspring
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To spring or leap over.

qa_pairs.question: Overstand
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To stand on the price or conditions of, so as to lose a sale; to lose by an extravagant price or hard conditions.

qa_pairs.question: Overstare
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To outstare.

qa_pairs.question: Overstare
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To stare wildly.

qa_pairs.question: Overstate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To state in too strong terms; to exaggerate.

qa_pairs.question: overstated
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as represented as greater than is true or reasonable; exaggerated; as, They made overstated accusations of corruption.

qa_pairs.question: Overstatement
qa_pairs.answer: It means An exaggerated statement or account.

qa_pairs.question: Overstay
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To stay beyond the time or the limits of; as, to overstay the appointed time; to overstay one's welcome.

qa_pairs.question: Overstep
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To step over or beyond; to transgress; as, to overstep the bounds of propriety.

qa_pairs.question: Overstock
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Stock in excess.

qa_pairs.question: Overstock
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To fill too full; to supply in excess; as, to overstock a market with goods, or a farm with cattle.

qa_pairs.question: Overstore
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To overstock.

qa_pairs.question: Over-story
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The clearstory, or upper story, of a building.

qa_pairs.question: Overstrain
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To strain one's self to excess.

qa_pairs.question: Overstrain
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To stretch or strain too much; as, to overstrain one's nerves.

qa_pairs.question: Overstraitly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Too straitly or strictly.

qa_pairs.question: Overstraw
qa_pairs.answer: It means To overstrew.

qa_pairs.question: Overstrew
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To strew or scatter over.

qa_pairs.question: Overstrict
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Excessively strict.

qa_pairs.question: Overstride
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To stride over or beyond.

qa_pairs.question: Overstrike
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To strike beyond.

qa_pairs.question: Overstrow
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Overstrew.

qa_pairs.question: Overstudious
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Too studious.

qa_pairs.question: Oversubtile
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Excessively subtle.

qa_pairs.question: Oversum
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A sum or quantity over; surplus.

qa_pairs.question: Oversupply
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To supply in excess.

qa_pairs.question: Oversupply
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An excessive supply; a supply in excess of demand.

qa_pairs.question: Oversure
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Excessively sure.

qa_pairs.question: Oversway
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To bear sway over.

qa_pairs.question: Overswell
qa_pairs.answer: It means To swell or rise above; to overflow.

qa_pairs.question: overt
qa_pairs.answer: It means Open to view; public; apparent; manifest. Opposite of Antonym: hidden.

qa_pairs.question: Overtake
qa_pairs.answer: It means To come up with in a race, pursuit, progress, or motion;

qa_pairs.question: Overtalk
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To talk to excess.

qa_pairs.question: Overtask
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To task too heavily.

qa_pairs.question: Overtax
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To tax or to task too heavily; as, a job that overtaxed his physical energies.

qa_pairs.question: Overtedious
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Too tedious.

qa_pairs.question: Overtempt
qa_pairs.answer: It means To tempt exceedingly, or beyond the power of resistance.

qa_pairs.question: over-the-counter
qa_pairs.answer: It means able to be sold legally without a doctor's prescription; -- of medicinal drugs. Contrasted with Antonym: prescription.

qa_pairs.question: over-the-counter
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Grossly excessive; outlandish; well beyond normal; as, over-the-top action films.

qa_pairs.question: Overthrow
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To throw over; to overturn; to upset; to turn upside down.

qa_pairs.question: Overthrow
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of overthrowing; the state of being overthrown; ruin.

qa_pairs.question: Overthwart
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having a transverse position; placed or situated across; hence, opposite.

qa_pairs.question: Overthwart
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Across; crosswise; transversely.

qa_pairs.question: Overthwart
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Across; from alde to side of.

qa_pairs.question: Overthwart
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is That which is overthwart; an adverse circumstance; opposition.

qa_pairs.question: Overthwart
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To cross; to oppose.

qa_pairs.question: Overthwartly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In an overthwart manner; across; also, perversely.

qa_pairs.question: Overthwartness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The state of being overthwart; perverseness.

qa_pairs.question: Overtilt
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To tilt over; to overturn.

qa_pairs.question: Overtime
qa_pairs.answer: It means Time beyond, or in excess of, a limit; esp., extra working time.

qa_pairs.question: Overtire
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To tire to excess; to exhaust.

qa_pairs.question: Overtire
qa_pairs.answer: It means To become too tired.

qa_pairs.question: Overtitle
qa_pairs.answer: It means To give too high a title to.

qa_pairs.question: Overtly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Publicly; openly.

qa_pairs.question: Overtoil
qa_pairs.answer: It means To overwork.

qa_pairs.question: Overtoil
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To weary excessively; to exhaust.

qa_pairs.question: Overtone
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of the harmonics faintly heard with and at a higher frequency than a fundamental tone as it dies away, produced by some aliquot portion of the vibrating sting or column of air which yields the fundamental tone; one of the natural harmonic scale of tones, as the octave, twelfth, fifteenth, etc.; an aliquot or <ldquo/partial<rdquo/ tone; a harmonic. See Harmonic, and Tone.

qa_pairs.question: Overtop
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To rise above the top of; to exceed in height; to tower above.

qa_pairs.question: Overtower
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To tower over or above.

qa_pairs.question: Overtower
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To soar too high.

qa_pairs.question: Overtrade
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To trade beyond one's capital; to buy goods beyond the means of paying for or selling them; to overstock the market.

qa_pairs.question: Overtrading
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act or practice of buying goods beyond the means of payment; a glutting of the market.

qa_pairs.question: Overtread
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To tread over or upon.

qa_pairs.question: Overtrip
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To trip over nimbly.

qa_pairs.question: Overtroubled
qa_pairs.answer: It means Excessively troubled.

qa_pairs.question: Overtrow
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To be too trustful or confident; to trust too much.

qa_pairs.question: Overtrust
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Excessive confidence.

qa_pairs.question: Overtrust
qa_pairs.answer: It means To trust too much.

qa_pairs.question: Overture
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An opening or aperture; a recess; a chamber.

qa_pairs.question: Overture
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To make an overture to; as, to overture a religious body on some subject.

qa_pairs.question: Overturn
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To turn or throw from a basis, foundation, or position; to overset; as, to overturn a carriage or a building.

qa_pairs.question: Overturn
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act off overturning, or the state of being overturned or subverted; overthrow; as, an overturn of parties.

qa_pairs.question: Overturnable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Capable of being, or liable to be, overturned or subverted.

qa_pairs.question: Overturner
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who overturns.

qa_pairs.question: overuse
qa_pairs.answer: It means To use excessively; to use too often; as, scientists tend to overuse technical terms.

qa_pairs.question: overuse
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Excessive use.

qa_pairs.question: overutilise
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as overutilize.

qa_pairs.question: overutilisation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as overutilization.

qa_pairs.question: overutilization
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as exploitation to the point of diminishing returns.

qa_pairs.question: overutilize
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To exploit to the point of diminishing returns; to use excessively.

qa_pairs.question: Overvail
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Overveil.

qa_pairs.question: overvaliant
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having or showing undue valor or boldness; as, they stepped with overvaliant airs.

qa_pairs.question: Overvaluation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Excessive valuation; overestimate.

qa_pairs.question: Overvalue
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To value excessively; to rate at too high a price.

qa_pairs.question: Overveil
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To veil or cover.

qa_pairs.question: Overview
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An inspection or overlooking.

qa_pairs.question: Overvote
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To outvote; to outnumber in votes given.

qa_pairs.question: Overwalk
qa_pairs.answer: It means To walk over or upon.

qa_pairs.question: Overwar
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To defeat.

qa_pairs.question: Overwary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Too wary; too cautious.

qa_pairs.question: Overwash
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To overflow.

qa_pairs.question: Overwasted
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Wasted or worn out; consumed; spent

qa_pairs.question: Overwatch
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To watch too much.

qa_pairs.question: Overwax
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To wax or grow too rapidly or too much.

qa_pairs.question: Overweak
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Too weak; too feeble.

qa_pairs.question: Overwear
qa_pairs.answer: It means To wear too much; to wear out.

qa_pairs.question: Overwear
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Clothing worn over the ordinary indoor clothing, as overcoats, wraps, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Overweary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To weary too much; to tire out.

qa_pairs.question: overweary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Excessively weary; very tired; exhausted.

qa_pairs.question: Overweather
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To expose too long to the influence of the weather.

qa_pairs.question: Overween
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To think too highly or arrogantly; to regard one's own thinking or conclusions too highly; hence, to be egotistic, arrogant, or rash, in opinion; to think conceitedly; to presume.

qa_pairs.question: Overweener
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who overweens.

qa_pairs.question: Overweening
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Unduly confident; arrogant; presumptuous; conceited.

qa_pairs.question: Overweening
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Conceit; arrogance.

qa_pairs.question: Overweigh
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To exceed in weight; to overbalance; to weigh down.

qa_pairs.question: Overweight
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Weight over and above what is required by law or custom.

qa_pairs.question: Overweight
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Overweighing; excessive.

qa_pairs.question: Overwell
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To overflow.

qa_pairs.question: Overwet
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Excessive wetness.

qa_pairs.question: Overwhelm
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To cover over completely, as by a great wave; to overflow and bury beneath; to ingulf; hence, figuratively, to immerse and bear down; to overpower; to crush; to bury; to oppress, etc., overpoweringly.

qa_pairs.question: Overwhelm
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of overwhelming.

qa_pairs.question: overwhelmed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is same as overpowered.

qa_pairs.question: Overwhelming
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Overpowering; irresistible.

qa_pairs.question: Overwind
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To wind too tightly, as a spring, or too far, as a hoisting rope on a drum.

qa_pairs.question: Overwing
qa_pairs.answer: It means To outflank.

qa_pairs.question: Overwise
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Too wise; affectedly wise.

qa_pairs.question: Overwit
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To outwit.

qa_pairs.question: Overword
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To say in too many words; to express verbosely.

qa_pairs.question: Overwork
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To work beyond the strength; to cause to labor too much or too long; to tire excessively; as, to overwork a horse.

qa_pairs.question: Overwork
qa_pairs.answer: It means To work too much, or beyond one's strength.

qa_pairs.question: Overwork
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Work in excess of the usual or stipulated time or quantity; extra work; also, excessive labor.

qa_pairs.question: Overworn
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Worn out or subdued by toil; worn out so as to be trite.

qa_pairs.question: Overwrest
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To wrest or force from the natural or proper position.

qa_pairs.question: Overwrestle
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To subdue by wrestling.

qa_pairs.question: Overwrought
qa_pairs.answer: It means Wrought upon excessively; overworked.

qa_pairs.question: Overzeal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Excess of zeal.

qa_pairs.question: Overzealous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Too zealous.

qa_pairs.question: Ovicapsule
qa_pairs.answer: It means The outer layer of a Graafian follicle.

qa_pairs.question: Ovicell
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One of the dilatations of the body wall of Bryozoa in which the ova sometimes undergo the first stages of their development. See Illust. of Chilostoma.

qa_pairs.question: Ovicular
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to an egg.

qa_pairs.question: Ovicyst
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The pouch in which incubation takes place in some Tunicata.

qa_pairs.question: Ovidian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to the Latin poet Ovid; resembling the style of Ovid.

qa_pairs.question: Oviducal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to oviducts; as, oviducal glands.

qa_pairs.question: Oviduct
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A tube, or duct, for the passage of ova from the ovary to the exterior of the animal or to the part where further development takes place. In mammals the oviducts are also called also known as Fallopian tubes.

qa_pairs.question: Oviferous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Egg-bearing; -- applied particularly to certain receptacles, as in Crustacea, that retain the eggs after they have been excluded from the formative organs, until they are hatched.

qa_pairs.question: Oviform
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having the form or figure of an egg; egg-shaped; as, an oviform leaf.

qa_pairs.question: Ovigerous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Bearing eggs; oviferous.

qa_pairs.question: Ovile
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Ovine.

qa_pairs.question: Ovine
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to sheep; consisting of sheep.

qa_pairs.question: Ovipara
qa_pairs.answer: It means An artificial division of vertebrates, including those that lay eggs; -- opposed to Vivipara.

qa_pairs.question: Oviparity
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Generation by means of ova. See Generation.

qa_pairs.question: Oviparous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Producing young from eggs; as, an oviparous animal, in which the egg is generally separated from the animal, and hatched after exclusion; -- opposed to viviparous.

qa_pairs.question: Oviposit
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To lay or deposit eggs; -- said esp. of insects.

qa_pairs.question: Oviposit
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To deposit or lay (an egg).

qa_pairs.question: Ovipositing
qa_pairs.answer: It means The depositing of eggs, esp. by insects.

qa_pairs.question: Ovipositor
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The organ with which many insects and some other animals deposit their eggs. Some ichneumon files have a long ovipositor fitted to pierce the eggs or larvae of other insects, in order to lay their own eggs within the same.

qa_pairs.question: Ovisac
qa_pairs.answer: It means A Graafian follicle; any sac containing an ovum or ova.

qa_pairs.question: Ovism
qa_pairs.answer: It means The old theory that the egg contains the whole embryo of the future organism and the germs of all subsequent offsprings and is merely awakened to activity by the spermatozoon; -- opposed to spermism or animalculism.

qa_pairs.question: Ovist
qa_pairs.answer: It means A believer in ovism. Same as Ovulist.

qa_pairs.question: Ovococcus
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A germinal vesicle.

qa_pairs.question: ovoflavin
qa_pairs.answer: It means An uncommon name for riboflavin, also called also known as vitamin B2.

qa_pairs.question: Ovoid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Resembling an egg in shape; egg-shaped; ovate; as, an ovoidal apple.

qa_pairs.question: Ovoid
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A solid resembling an egg in shape.

qa_pairs.question: Ovolo
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A round, convex molding. See Illust. of Column.

qa_pairs.question: Ovology
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That branch of natural history which treats of the origin and functions of eggs.

qa_pairs.question: Ovoplasma
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Yolk; egg yolk.

qa_pairs.question: Ovotesttis
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An organ which produces both ova and spermatozoids; an hermaphrodite gland.

qa_pairs.question: Ovoviviparous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Oviparous, but hatching the egg while it is within the body, as some fishes and reptiles.

qa_pairs.question: Ovular
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Relating or belonging to an ovule; as, an ovular growth.

qa_pairs.question: Ovulary
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to ovules.

qa_pairs.question: Ovulate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Containing an ovule or ovules.

qa_pairs.question: ovulate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To produce ova and discharge them from an ovary or ovarian follicle.

qa_pairs.question: ovulation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The formation of ova or eggs in the ovary, and the discharge of the same. In the human female the discharge occurs about halfway between menstruation times.

qa_pairs.question: Ovule
qa_pairs.answer: It means The rudiment of a seed. It grows from a placenta, and consists of a soft nucleus within two delicate coatings. The attached base of the ovule is the hilum, the coatings are united with the nucleus at the chalaza, and their minute orifice is the foramen.

qa_pairs.question: Ovuliferous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Producing ovules.

qa_pairs.question: Ovulist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A believer in the theory (called encasement theory), current during the last century, that the egg was the real animal germ, and that at the time of fecundation the spermatozoa simply gave the impetus which caused the unfolding of the egg, in which all generations were inclosed one within the other. Also called also known as ovist.

qa_pairs.question: Ovulite
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A fossil egg.

qa_pairs.question: Ovulum
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An ovule.

qa_pairs.question: Ovum
qa_pairs.answer: It means A more or less spherical and transparent cell, which by a process of multiplication and growth develops into a mass of cells, constituting a new individual like the parent; an egg, spore, germ, or germ cell. See Illust. of Mycropyle.

qa_pairs.question: Owch
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Ouch.

qa_pairs.question: Owe
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To possess; to have, as the rightful owner; to own.

qa_pairs.question: Owel
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Equal.

qa_pairs.question: Owelty
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Equality; -- sometimes written ovelty and ovealty.

qa_pairs.question: Owen
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Own.

qa_pairs.question: Owenite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A follower of Robert Owen, who tried to reorganize society on a socialistic basis, and established an industrial community on the Clyde, Scotland, and, later, a similar one in Indiana.

qa_pairs.question: Owher
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Anywhere.

qa_pairs.question: Owing
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Had or held under obligation of paying; due.

qa_pairs.question: Owl
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any species of raptorial birds of the family Strigidae. They have large eyes and ears, and a conspicuous circle of feathers around each eye. They are mostly nocturnal in their habits.

qa_pairs.question: Owl
qa_pairs.answer: It means To pry about; to prowl.

qa_pairs.question: Owler
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who owls; esp., one who conveys contraband goods. See Owling, (n.)

qa_pairs.question: Owlery
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An abode or a haunt of owls.

qa_pairs.question: Owlet
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A small owl; especially, the European species (Athene noctua), and the California flammulated owlet (Megascops flammeolus).

qa_pairs.question: Owl-eyed
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having eyes like an owl's.

qa_pairs.question: Owling
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The offense of transporting wool or sheep out of England contrary to the statute formerly existing.

qa_pairs.question: Owlish
qa_pairs.answer: It means Resembling, or characteristic of, an owl.

qa_pairs.question: Owlism
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Affected wisdom; pompous dullness.

qa_pairs.question: Owllight
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Glimmering or imperfect light.

qa_pairs.question: Own
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To grant; to acknowledge; to admit to be true; to confess; to recognize in a particular character; as, we own that we have forfeited your love.

qa_pairs.question: Own
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Belonging to; belonging exclusively or especially to; peculiar; -- most frequently following a possessive pronoun, as my, our, thy, your, his, her, its, their, in order to emphasize or intensify the idea of property, peculiar interest, or exclusive ownership; as, my own father; my own composition; my own idea; at my own price.

qa_pairs.question: Own
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To hold as property; to have a legal or rightful title to; to be the proprietor or possessor of; to possess; as, to own a house.

qa_pairs.question: owned
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as having an owner; often used in combination; as, state-owned railways. Opposite of Antonym: unowned.

qa_pairs.question: Owner
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who owns; a rightful proprietor; one who has the legal or rightful title, whether he is the possessor or not.

qa_pairs.question: owner-driver
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as a motorist who owns the vehicle that he/she drives.

qa_pairs.question: Ownerless
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Without an owner.

qa_pairs.question: owner-occupied
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as lived in by the owner; -- of dwellings.

qa_pairs.question: owner-occupier
qa_pairs.answer: It means a occupant who owns the home that he/she lives in.

qa_pairs.question: Ownership
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state of being an owner; the right to own; exclusive right of possession; legal or just claim or title; proprietorship.

qa_pairs.question: Owre
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The aurochs.

qa_pairs.question: Owse
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Tanner's ooze. See Ooze, 3.

qa_pairs.question: Ox
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The male of bovine quadrupeds, especially the domestic animal when castrated and grown to its full size, or nearly so. The word is also applied, as a general name, to any species of bovine animals, male and female.

qa_pairs.question: Oxacid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Oxyacid.

qa_pairs.question: oxalacetate
qa_pairs.answer: It means a salt or ester of oxalacetic acid.

qa_pairs.question: oxalacetic acid
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A dicarboxylic acid (HO.CO.CO.CH2.CO.OH).

qa_pairs.question: Oxalan
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A complex nitrogenous substance C3N3H5O3 obtained from alloxan (or when urea is fused with ethyl oxamate), as a stable white crystalline powder; -- called also also known as oxaluramide.

qa_pairs.question: Oxalantin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A white crystalline nitrogenous substance (C6H4N4O5) obtained by the reduction of parabanic acid; -- called also also known as leucoturic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Oxalate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A salt of oxalic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Oxaldehyde
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Glyoxal.

qa_pairs.question: Oxalethyline
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A poisonous nitrogenous base (C6H10N2) obtained indirectly from oxamide as a thick transparent oil which has a strong narcotic odor, and a physiological action resembling that of atropine. It is probably related to pyridine.

qa_pairs.question: Oxalic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to, derived from, or contained in, sorrel, or oxalis; specifically, designating an acid found in, and characteristic of, oxalis, and also certain plant of the Buckwheat family.

qa_pairs.question: Oxaline
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Glyoxaline.

qa_pairs.question: Oxalis
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of plants, mostly herbs, with acid-tasting trifoliolate or multifoliolate leaves; -- called also also known as wood sorrel.

qa_pairs.question: Oxalite
qa_pairs.answer: It means A yellow mineral consisting of oxalate of iron.

qa_pairs.question: Oxaluramide
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Oxalan.

qa_pairs.question: Oxalurate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A salt of oxaluric acid.

qa_pairs.question: Oxaluric
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining to, or designating, a complex nitrogenous acid related to the ureids, and obtained from parabanic acid as a white silky crystalline substance.

qa_pairs.question: Oxalyl
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A hydrocarbon radical (C2O2) regarded as a residue of oxalic acid and occurring in derivatives of it.

qa_pairs.question: Oxamate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A salt of oxamic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Oxamethane
qa_pairs.answer: It means Ethyl oxamate, obtained as a white scaly crystalline powder.

qa_pairs.question: Oxamethylane
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Methyl oxamate, obtained as a pearly white crystalline substance.

qa_pairs.question: Oxamic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to, or designating, an acid NH2.CO.CO.HO obtained as a fine crystalline powder, intermediate between oxalic acid and oxamide. Its ammonium salt is obtained by boiling oxamide with ammonia.

qa_pairs.question: Oxamide
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A white crystalline neutral substance (C2O2(NH2)2) obtained by treating ethyl oxalate with ammonia. It is the acid amide of oxalic acid. Formerly called also also known as oxalamide.

qa_pairs.question: Oxamidine
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of a series of bases containing the amido and the isonitroso groups united to the same carbon atom.

qa_pairs.question: Oxanilamide
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A white crystalline nitrogenous substance, obtained indirectly by the action of cyanogen on aniline, and regarded as an anilide of oxamic acid; -- called also also known as phenyl oxamide.

qa_pairs.question: Oxanilate
qa_pairs.answer: It means A salt of oxanilic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Oxanilic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining to, or derived from, oxalic acid and aniline; -- used to designate an acid obtained in white crystalline scales by heating these substances together.

qa_pairs.question: Oxanilide
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A white crystalline substance, resembling oxanilamide, obtained by heating aniline oxalate, and regarded as a double anilide of oxalic acid; -- called also also known as diphenyl oxamide.

qa_pairs.question: Oxbane
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A poisonous bulbous plant (Buphane toxicaria) of the Cape of Good Hope.

qa_pairs.question: Oxbird
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The dunlin.

qa_pairs.question: Oxbiter
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The cow blackbird.

qa_pairs.question: Oxbow
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A frame of wood, bent into the shape of the letter U, and embracing an ox's neck as a kind of collar, the upper ends passing through the bar of the yoke; also, anything so shaped, as a bend in a river.

qa_pairs.question: Oxeye
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The oxeye daisy. See under Daisy.

qa_pairs.question: Oxeyed
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having large, full eyes, like those of an ox.

qa_pairs.question: Oxfly
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The gadfly of cattle.

qa_pairs.question: Oxford
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to the city or university of Oxford, England.

qa_pairs.question: Oxgang
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Bovate.

qa_pairs.question: Oxgoad
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A goad for driving oxen.

qa_pairs.question: Oxhead
qa_pairs.answer: It means Literally, the head of an ox (emblem of cuckoldom); hence, a dolt; a blockhead.

qa_pairs.question: Oxheal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Bear's-foot.

qa_pairs.question: Oxheart
qa_pairs.answer: It means A large heart-shaped cherry, either black, red, or white.

qa_pairs.question: Oxhide
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The skin of an ox, or leather made from it.

qa_pairs.question: Oxid
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Oxide.

qa_pairs.question: Oxidability
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Capability of being converted into an oxide.

qa_pairs.question: Oxidable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Capable of being converted into an oxide.

qa_pairs.question: Oxidate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To oxidize.

qa_pairs.question: Oxidation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act or process of oxidizing, or the state or result of being oxidized.

qa_pairs.question: oxidative
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as of or pertaining to oxidation; accompanied by oxidation.

qa_pairs.question: Oxidator
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An oxidizer.

qa_pairs.question: Oxide
qa_pairs.answer: It means A binary compound of oxygen with an atom or radical, or a compound which is regarded as binary; as, iron oxide, ethyl oxide, nitrogen oxide, etc.

qa_pairs.question: oxidise
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as oxidize and oxidized.

qa_pairs.question: Oxidizable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Capable of being oxidized.

qa_pairs.question: oxidization
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The process of oxidizing; the addition of oxygen to a compound with a loss of electrons. The process always occurs accompanied by reduction.

qa_pairs.question: Oxidize
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To combine with oxygen, or subject to the action of oxygen, or of an oxidizing agent.

qa_pairs.question: oxidized
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as combined with or having undergone a chemical reaction with oxygen; as, the oxidized form of iodine.

qa_pairs.question: Oxidizement
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Oxidation.

qa_pairs.question: Oxidizer
qa_pairs.answer: It means An agent employed in oxidation, or which facilitates or brings about combination with oxygen; as, nitric acid, chlorine, bromine, etc., are strong oxidizers.

qa_pairs.question: Oxidulated
qa_pairs.answer: It means Existing in the state of a protoxide; -- said of an oxide.

qa_pairs.question: Oxime
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of a series of isonitroso derivatives obtained by the action of hydroxylamine on aldehydes or ketones.

qa_pairs.question: Oxindol
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A white crystalline nitrogenous substance (C8H7NO) of the indol group, obtained by the reduction of dioxindol. It is a so-called lactam compound.

qa_pairs.question: Oxiodic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Pertaining to, or designating, certain compounds of iodine and oxygen.

qa_pairs.question: Oxlike
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Characteristic of, or like, an ox.

qa_pairs.question: Oxlip
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The great cowslip (Primula veris, var. elatior).

qa_pairs.question: Oxonate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A salt of oxonic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Oxonian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or relating to the city or the university of Oxford, England.

qa_pairs.question: Oxonian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A student or graduate of Oxford University, in England.

qa_pairs.question: Oxonic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to, or designating, a complex nitrogenous acid (C4H5N3O4) not known in the free state, but obtained, in combination with its salts, by a slow oxidation of uric acid, to which it is related.

qa_pairs.question: Oxpecker
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An African bird of the genus *Buphaga*; the beefeater.

qa_pairs.question: Oxshoe
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A shoe for oxen, consisting of a flat piece of iron nailed to the hoof.

qa_pairs.question: Oxter
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The armpit; also, the arm.

qa_pairs.question: oxtongue
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A widespread European weed (Picris echioides formerly Helminthia echioides) with spiny tongue-shaped leaves and yellow flowers. The name is applied to several plants, from the shape and roughness of their leaves; as, Anchusa officinalis, a kind of bugloss, and Helminthia echioides, both European herbs. It has been naturalized in the U. S.

qa_pairs.question: Oxy-
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A prefix, also used adjectively

qa_pairs.question: oxyacetic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Hydroxyacetic; designating an acid called also glycolic acid.

qa_pairs.question: oxyacetylene
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to a mixture of oxygen and actylene; as, an oxyacetylene torch.

qa_pairs.question: oxyacetylene torch
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A torch designed to mix oxygen and actylene at its tip, to create a very hot flame for welding, cutting steel, and other metal working.

qa_pairs.question: Oxyacid
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An acid containing oxygen, as chloric acid or sulphuric acid; -- contrasted with the hydracids, which contain no oxygen, as hydrochloric acid. See Acid, and Hydroxy-.

qa_pairs.question: Oxyammonia
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Hydroxylamine.

qa_pairs.question: Oxybenzene
qa_pairs.answer: It means Hydroxy benzene. Same as Phenol.

qa_pairs.question: Oxybenzoic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Hydroxybenzoic; pertaining to, or designating, any one of several hydroxyl derivatives of benzonic acid, of which the commonest is salicylic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Oxybromic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or designating, certain compounds of oxygen and bromine.

qa_pairs.question: Oxybutyric
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Hydroxybutyric; designating any one of a group of metameric acids ((C3H6.OH).CO2H).

qa_pairs.question: Oxycalcium
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to oxygen and calcium; as, the oxycalcium light. See Drummond light.

qa_pairs.question: Oxycaproic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Leucic.

qa_pairs.question: Oxychloric
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of, pertaining to, or designating in general, certain compounds containing oxygen and chlorine.

qa_pairs.question: Oxychloride
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A ternary compound of oxygen and chlorine; as, plumbic oxychloride.

qa_pairs.question: Oxycrate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A Mixture of water and vinegar.

qa_pairs.question: Oxycymene
qa_pairs.answer: It means Hydroxy cymene. Same as Carvacrol.

qa_pairs.question: Oxygen
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A colorless, tasteless, odorless, gaseous element of atomic number 8, occurring in the free state in the atmosphere, of which it forms about 23 per cent by weight and about 21 per cent by volume, being slightly heavier than nitrogen. Symbol O. Atomic weight 15.9994.

qa_pairs.question: Oxygenate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To unite, or cause to combine, with oxygen; to treat with oxygen; to oxidize; as, oxygenated water (hydrogen dioxide).

qa_pairs.question: Oxygenation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act or process of combining or of treating with oxygen; oxidation.

qa_pairs.question: Oxygenator
qa_pairs.answer: It means An oxidizer.

qa_pairs.question: Oxygenic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to, containing, or resembling, oxygen; producing oxygen.

qa_pairs.question: Oxygenium
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The technical name of oxygen.

qa_pairs.question: Oxygenizable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Oxidizable.

qa_pairs.question: Oxygenize
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To oxidize.

qa_pairs.question: Oxygenizement
qa_pairs.answer: It means Oxidation.

qa_pairs.question: Oxygenous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Oxygenic.

qa_pairs.question: Oxygon
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A triangle having three acute angles.

qa_pairs.question: Oxygonal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having acute angles.

qa_pairs.question: Oxyhaemacyanin
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Haemacyanin.

qa_pairs.question: Oxyhaemoglobin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Hemoglobin.

qa_pairs.question: Oxyhydrogen
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of, pertaining to, or consisting of, a mixture of oxygen and hydrogen at over 5000<deg/ F.

qa_pairs.question: Oxyhydrogen light
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A light produced by the incandescence of some substances, esp. lime, in the oxyhydrogen flame. Coal gas (producing the oxygas light), or the vapor of ether (oxyether light) or methylated spirit (oxyspirit light), may be substituted for hydrogen.

qa_pairs.question: Oxymel
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A mixture of honey, water, vinegar, and spice, boiled to a sirup.

qa_pairs.question: Oxymethylene
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Formic aldehyde, regarded as a methylene derivative.

qa_pairs.question: Oxymoron
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A figure in which an epithet of a contrary signification is added to a word; e. g., cruel kindness; laborious idleness.

qa_pairs.question: Oxymuriate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A salt of the supposed oxymuriatic acid; a chloride.

qa_pairs.question: Oxymuriatic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to, or consisting of, oxygen and muriatic acid, that is, hydrochloric acid.

qa_pairs.question: Oxyneurine
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Betaine.

qa_pairs.question: Oxyntic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Acid; producing acid; -- applied especially to certain glands and cells in the stomach.

qa_pairs.question: Oxyopia
qa_pairs.answer: It means Excessive acuteness of sight.

qa_pairs.question: Oxyphenic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or designating, the phenol formerly called oxyphenic acid, and now oxyphenol and pyrocatechin. See Pyrocatechin.

qa_pairs.question: Oxyphenol
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A phenol, C6H4(OH)2, produced by the distillation of catechin; called also also known as oxyphenic acid, and now also known as pyrocatechin.

qa_pairs.question: Oxyphony
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Acuteness or shrillness of voice.

qa_pairs.question: Oxyquinoline
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Hydroxy quinoline; a phenol derivative of quinoline, -- called also also known as carbostyril.

qa_pairs.question: Oxyrhyncha
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The maioid crabs.

qa_pairs.question: Oxyrrhodine
qa_pairs.answer: It means A mixture of two parts of the oil of roses with one of the vinegar of roses.

qa_pairs.question: Oxysalt
qa_pairs.answer: It means A salt of an oxyacid, as a sulphate.

qa_pairs.question: Oxysulphide
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A ternary compound of oxygen and sulphur.

qa_pairs.question: Oxysulphuret
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An oxysulphide.

qa_pairs.question: Oxytocic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Promoting uterine contractions, or parturition.

qa_pairs.question: Oxytoluene
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of three hydroxy derivatives of toluene, called the cresols. See Cresol.

qa_pairs.question: Oxytone
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having an acute sound; (Gr. Gram.), having an acute accent on the last syllable.

qa_pairs.question: Oxytone
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An acute sound.

qa_pairs.question: Oxytonical
qa_pairs.answer: It means Oxytone.

qa_pairs.question: Oyer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A hearing or an inspection, as of a deed, bond, etc., as when a defendant in court prays oyer of a writing.

qa_pairs.question: Oyez
qa_pairs.answer: It means Hear; attend; -- a term used by criers of courts to secure silence before making a proclamation. It is repeated three times.

qa_pairs.question: Oylet
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Eyelet.

qa_pairs.question: Oynoun
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Onion.

qa_pairs.question: Oyster
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any marine bivalve mollusk of the genus Ostrea. They are usually found adhering to rocks or other fixed objects in shallow water along the seacoasts, or in brackish water in the mouth of rivers. The common European oyster (Ostrea edulis), and the American oyster (Ostrea Virginiana), are the most important species.

qa_pairs.question: oystercatcher
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any one of several species of wading birds of the genus *Haematopus* having stout legs and bill and mostly black-and-white plumage, which frequent seashores and feed upon oysters and other shellfish. The European species (Haematopus ostralegus), the common American species (Haematopus palliatus), and the California, or black, oyster catcher (Haematopus Bachmani) are the best known.

qa_pairs.question: Oyster-green
qa_pairs.answer: It means A green membranous seaweed (*Ulva*) often found growing on oysters but common on stones, piles, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Oystering
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Gathering, or dredging for, oysters.

qa_pairs.question: Oysterling
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A young oyster.

qa_pairs.question: ozena
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A discharge of fetid matter from the nostril, particularly if associated with ulceration of the soft parts and disease of the bones of the nose.

qa_pairs.question: ozocerite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A waxlike mineral resin; -- sometimes called also known as native paraffin, and also known as mineral wax.

qa_pairs.question: Ozonation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of treating with ozone; also, the act of converting into, or producing, ozone; ozonization.

qa_pairs.question: ozone
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A colorless gaseous substance (O3) obtained (as by the silent discharge of electricity in oxygen) as an allotropic form of oxygen, containing three atoms in the molecule. It is a strong oxidizer, and probably exists in the air, though by the ordinary tests it is liable to be confused with certain other substances, as hydrogen dioxide, or certain oxides of nitrogen. It derives its name from its peculiar odor, which resembles that of weak chlorine.

qa_pairs.question: ozone paper
qa_pairs.answer: It means Paper coated with starch and potassium iodine, also called also known as starch-iodide paper. It turns blue when exposed to ozone.

qa_pairs.question: ozonic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, resembling, or containing, ozone.

qa_pairs.question: ozonification
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act or process of producing, or of subjecting to the action of, ozone.

qa_pairs.question: ozonization
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Ozonation.

qa_pairs.question: Ozonize
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To convert into ozone, as oxygen.

qa_pairs.question: Ozonizer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An apparatus or agent for the production or application of ozone.

qa_pairs.question: Ozonometer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An instrument for ascertaining the amount of ozone in the atmosphere, or in any gaseous mixture.

qa_pairs.question: Ozonometric
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Pertaining to, or used for, the determination of the amount of ozone; of or relating to ozonometry.

qa_pairs.question: Ozonometry
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The measurement or determination of the quantity of ozone.

qa_pairs.question: Ozonoscope
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An apparatus employed to indicate the presence, or the amount, of ozone.

qa_pairs.question: Ozonoscopic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Serving to indicate the presence or the amount of ozone.

qa_pairs.question: ozonous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to or containing, ozone.

qa_pairs.question: N
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is the fourteenth letter of English alphabet, is a vocal consonent, and, in allusion to its mode of formation, is called the dentinasal or linguanasal consonent. Its commoner sound is that heard in ran, done; but when immediately followed in the same word by the sound of g hard or k (as in single, sink, conquer), it usually represents the same sound as the digraph ng in sing, bring, etc. This is a simple but related sound, and is called the gutturo-nasal consonent. See Guide to Pronunciation, <sect/<sect/ 243-246.

qa_pairs.question: N
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A measure of space equal to half an M (or em); an en.

qa_pairs.question: Na
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is No, not. See No.

qa_pairs.question: Nab
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The summit of an eminence.

qa_pairs.question: Nab
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To catch or seize suddenly or unexpectedly.

qa_pairs.question: Nabit
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pulverized sugar candy.

qa_pairs.question: Nabk
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The edible berries of the Zizyphys Lotus, a tree of Northern Africa, and Southwestern Europe.

qa_pairs.question: Nabob
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A deputy or viceroy in India; a governor of a province of the ancient Mogul empire.

qa_pairs.question: Nacarat
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A pale red color, with a cast of orange.

qa_pairs.question: Nacelle
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A small boat.

qa_pairs.question: nacho
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A tortilla chip topped with cheese and often chili-pepper or beans and then broiled; -- eaten as a snack or light meal.

qa_pairs.question: Nacker
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Nacre.

qa_pairs.question: Nacre
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A pearly substance which lines the interior of many shells, and is most perfect in the mother-of-pearl.

qa_pairs.question: Nacr<eacute/
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having the peculiar iridescence of nacre, or mother-of-pearl, or an iridescence resembling it; as, nacr ware.

qa_pairs.question: Nacreous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Consisting of, or resembling, nacre; pearly.

qa_pairs.question: Nad
qa_pairs.answer: It means Had not.

qa_pairs.question: nada
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Nothing.

qa_pairs.question: Nadder
qa_pairs.answer: It means An adder.

qa_pairs.question: Na-dene
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A family of North American Indian languages including Tlingit, the Athabascan language family, and Haida.

qa_pairs.question: Nadir
qa_pairs.answer: It means That point of the heavens, or lower hemisphere, directly opposite the zenith; the inferior pole of the horizon; the point of the celestial sphere directly under the place where we stand.

qa_pairs.question: Naenia
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Nenia.

qa_pairs.question: Naeve
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A naevus.

qa_pairs.question: Naevoid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Resembling a naevus or naevi; as, naevoid elephantiasis.

qa_pairs.question: Naevose
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Spotted; freckled.

qa_pairs.question: Naevus
qa_pairs.answer: It means A spot or mark on the skin of children when born; a birthmark; -- the term includes moles as wells a other types of birthmark, and is most commonly applied to reddish or brownish raised vascular areas of the skin, i. e., those consisting mainly of blood vessels, as dilated arteries, veins, or capillaries.

qa_pairs.question: Nag
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A small horse; a pony; hence, any horse, especially one that is of inferior breeding or useless.

qa_pairs.question: Nag
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To tease in a petty way; to scold habitually; to annoy; to fret pertinaciously.

qa_pairs.question: Nag
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A person who nags, especially habitually; called also also known as nagger.

qa_pairs.question: nagami
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A shrub (Fortunella margarita) bearing oval-fruited kumquats. See also kumquat.

qa_pairs.question: Nagana
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A disease of horses and other domestic animals, transmitted by the tsetse fly; any trypanosomiasis, especially the variety caused by Trypanosoma brucei.

qa_pairs.question: Nageia
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A small genus of Asian evergreen trees having columnar crowns and distinguished by leaves lacking a midrib; eastern Asia including India and Philippines and New Guinea.

qa_pairs.question: nagger
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Someone (especially a woman) who constantly finds fault.

qa_pairs.question: Nagging
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Fault-finding; teasing; persistently annoying; as, a nagging toothache.

qa_pairs.question: Naggy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Irritable; touchy.

qa_pairs.question: Nagor
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A West African gazelle (Gazella redunca).

qa_pairs.question: Nagyagite
qa_pairs.answer: It means A mineral of blackish lead-gray color and metallic luster, generally of a foliated massive structure; foliated tellurium. It is a telluride of lead and gold.

qa_pairs.question: Naiad
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A water nymph; one of the lower female divinities, fabled to preside over some body of fresh water, as a lake, river, brook, or fountain.

qa_pairs.question: Naiadaceae
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A monotypic family of aquatic plants having narrow leaves and small flowers.

qa_pairs.question: naiant
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Natant.

qa_pairs.question: naid
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any one of numerous species of small, fresh-water, chaetopod annelids of the tribe Naidina. They belong to the Oligochaeta.

qa_pairs.question: Na<ium/f
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having a true natural luster without being cut; -- applied by jewelers to a precious stone.

qa_pairs.question: Naik
qa_pairs.answer: It means A chief; a leader; a Sepoy corporal.

qa_pairs.question: Nail
qa_pairs.answer: It means the horny scale of plate of epidermis at the end of the fingers and toes of man and many apes.

qa_pairs.question: Nail
qa_pairs.answer: It means To fasten with a nail or nails; to close up or secure by means of nails; as, to nail boards to the beams.

qa_pairs.question: Nailbrush
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A brush for cleaning the nails.

qa_pairs.question: Nailer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One whose occupation is to make nails; a nail maker.

qa_pairs.question: Naileress
qa_pairs.answer: It means A woman who makes nails.

qa_pairs.question: Nailery
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A factory where nails are made.

qa_pairs.question: Nail-headed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having a head like that of a nail; formed so as to resemble the head of a nail.

qa_pairs.question: Nailless
qa_pairs.answer: It means Without nails; having no nails.

qa_pairs.question: Nainsook
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A thick sort of jaconet muslin, plain or striped, formerly made in India.

qa_pairs.question: Nais
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Naiad.

qa_pairs.question: Naissant
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Jessant.

qa_pairs.question: naive
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having native or unaffected simplicity; ingenuous; artless; frank; as, na manners; a na person; na and unsophisticated remarks.

qa_pairs.question: na<ium/vely
qa_pairs.answer: It means In a na<ium/ve manner.

qa_pairs.question: Na<ium/vet<eacute/
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The state or quality of being naive; lack of sophistication or worldliness.

qa_pairs.question: naivety
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Na<ium/vet<eacute/.

qa_pairs.question: Naja
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of cobras.

qa_pairs.question: Najadaceae
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A monotypic family of aquatic plants having narrow leaves and small flowers; same as Naiadaceae; the naiad family.

qa_pairs.question: Najas
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The sole genus of the family Naiadaceae.

qa_pairs.question: Nake
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To make naked.

qa_pairs.question: Naked
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having no clothes on; uncovered; nude; bare; as, a naked body; a naked limb; a naked sword.

qa_pairs.question: Nakedly
qa_pairs.answer: It means In a naked manner; without covering or disguise; manifestly; simply; barely.

qa_pairs.question: Nakedness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The condition of being naked.

qa_pairs.question: Naker
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Nacre.

qa_pairs.question: Naker
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A kind of kettledrum.

qa_pairs.question: Nakoo
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The gavial.

qa_pairs.question: Nale
qa_pairs.answer: It means Ale; also, an alehouse.

qa_pairs.question: Nall
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An awl.

qa_pairs.question: Nam
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Am not.

qa_pairs.question: Nam
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is (imp.) of Nim.

qa_pairs.question: Namable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Capable of being named.

qa_pairs.question: Namation
qa_pairs.answer: It means A distraining or levying of a distress; an impounding.

qa_pairs.question: Namaycush
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A large North American lake trout (Salvelinus namaycush). It is usually spotted with red, and sometimes weighs over forty pounds. Called also also known as Mackinaw trout, also known as lake trout, also known as lake salmon, also known as salmon trout, also known as togue, and also known as tuladi.

qa_pairs.question: Namby-pamby
qa_pairs.answer: It means Talk or writing which is weakly sentimental or affectedly pretty.

qa_pairs.question: Namby-pamby
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Affectedly pretty; weakly sentimental; finical; insipid.

qa_pairs.question: Name
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The title by which any person or thing is known or designated; a distinctive specific appellation, whether of an individual or a class.

qa_pairs.question: Name
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To give a distinctive name or appellation to; to entitle; to denominate; to style; to call.

qa_pairs.question: named
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as given or having a specified name; as, an actor named Harold Lloyd; a building in Cardiff named the Temple of Peace. Contrasted to Antonym: unnamed.

qa_pairs.question: namedrop
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To refer to people that one assumes one's interlocutors admire so as to impress them; same as to drop names.

qa_pairs.question: namedropper
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Someone who pretends that famous people are his/her friends. Someone who namedrops.

qa_pairs.question: name-dropping
qa_pairs.answer: It means The practice of casually mentioning important people in order to impress one's listener.

qa_pairs.question: nameko
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as one of the most important fungi (Pholiota nameko) cultivated in Japan.

qa_pairs.question: Nameless
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Without a name; not having been given a name; as, a nameless star.

qa_pairs.question: Namelessly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In a nameless manner.

qa_pairs.question: Namely
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as By name; by particular mention; specifically; especially; expressly.

qa_pairs.question: Namer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who names, or calls by name.

qa_pairs.question: Namesake
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One that has the same name as another; especially, one called after, or named out of regard to, another.

qa_pairs.question: Nammu
qa_pairs.answer: It means The Sumerian goddess personifying the primeval sea; mother of the gods and of heaven and earth.

qa_pairs.question: Namo
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is No more.

qa_pairs.question: Namtar
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A demon personifying death; messenger of the underworld goddess Ereshkigal bringing death to mankind.

qa_pairs.question: Nan
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Anan.

qa_pairs.question: Nana
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Grandmother.

qa_pairs.question: Nandine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An African carnivore (Nandinia binotata), allied to the civets. It is spotted with black.

qa_pairs.question: Nandou
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any one of three species of South American ostriches of the genera *Rhea* and *Pterocnemia*, especially the smallest, Pterocnemia pennata (formerly Rhea Americana), called also the also known as common rhea. They are tall fast-running flightless birds similar to ostriches but three-toed, found from Peru to the Straits of Magellan. See Rhea.

qa_pairs.question: Nanism
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The condition of being abnormally small in stature; dwarfism; dwarfishness; -- opposed to gigantism.

qa_pairs.question: Nanjing
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is a former capital of China.

qa_pairs.question: Nankeen
qa_pairs.answer: It means A species of cloth, of a firm texture, originally brought from China, made of a species of cotton (Gossypium religiosum) that is naturally of a brownish yellow color quite indestructible and permanent.

qa_pairs.question: Nanna
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The wife of Balder.

qa_pairs.question: Nanny
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A diminutive of Ann or Anne, the proper name.

qa_pairs.question: Nanny
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as a caretaker for a child; a child's nurse; a nursemaid.

qa_pairs.question: Nannyberry
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Sheepberry.

qa_pairs.question: nano-
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A prefix meaning one-billionth; as, a nanogram is one-thousandth of a microgram.

qa_pairs.question: nanotechnology
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The manipulation or construction of objects with sizes in the nanometer range or smaller.

qa_pairs.question: Nanpie
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The magpie.

qa_pairs.question: Nantua
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A white sauce with whipping cream and shrimp butter.

qa_pairs.question: Naos
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A term used by modern archaeologists instead of cella. See Cella.

qa_pairs.question: Nap
qa_pairs.answer: It means To have a short sleep; to be drowsy; to doze.

qa_pairs.question: Nap
qa_pairs.answer: It means A short sleep; a doze; a siesta.

qa_pairs.question: Nap
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Woolly or villous surface of felt, cloth, plants, etc.; an external covering of down, of short fine hairs or fibers forming part of the substance of anything, and lying smoothly in one direction; the pile; as, the nap of cotton flannel or of broadcloth.

qa_pairs.question: Nap
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To raise, or put, a nap on.

qa_pairs.question: Nap
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Napoleon, 1, below.

qa_pairs.question: napa
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A plant (Brassica rapa pekinensis) with an elongated celerylike head of broadstalked leaves used as a vegetable in east Asia; called also also known as Chinese cabbage.

qa_pairs.question: Napaea
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus consisting of only one species, the glade mallow.

qa_pairs.question: napalm
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A highly incediary liquid consisting of gasoline jelled with aluminum soaps, used as a weapon of war in fire bombs and flame throwers.

qa_pairs.question: Nape
qa_pairs.answer: It means The back part of the neck.

qa_pairs.question: Nape-crest
qa_pairs.answer: It means An African bird of the genus *Schizorhis*, related to the plantain eaters.

qa_pairs.question: Napery
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Table linen; also, linen clothing, or linen in general.

qa_pairs.question: Napha water
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A perfume distilled from orange flowers.

qa_pairs.question: Naphew
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Navew.

qa_pairs.question: naprapathy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A drugless method of treatment based on the belief that disease symptoms arise from problems with ligaments and connective tissues.

qa_pairs.question: Naphtha
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The complex mixture of volatile, liquid, inflammable hydrocarbons, occurring naturally, and usually called also known as crude petroleum, also known as mineral oil, or also known as rock oil.

qa_pairs.question: Naphthalate
qa_pairs.answer: It means A salt of naphthalic acid; a phthalate.

qa_pairs.question: Naphthalene
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A white crystalline aromatic hydrocarbon, C10H8, analogous to benzene, and obtained by the distillation of certain bituminous materials, such as the heavy oil of coal tar. It is the type and basis of a large number of derivatives among organic compounds. Formerly called also also known as naphthaline.

qa_pairs.question: Naphthalenic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to , or derived from, naphthalene; -- used specifically to designate a yellow crystalline substance, called naphthalenic acid and also hydroxy quinone, and obtained from certain derivatives of naphthol.

qa_pairs.question: Naphthalic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining to, derived from, or related to, naphthalene; -- formerly used to denote any one of a series of acids derived from naphthalene, and called naphthalene acids, now specifically referring to 1,8-naphthalenedicaboxylic acid, C12H8O4.

qa_pairs.question: Naphthalidine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Naphthylamine.

qa_pairs.question: Naphthalin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Naphthalene.

qa_pairs.question: Naphthalize
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To mingle, saturate, or impregnate, with naphtha.

qa_pairs.question: Naphthazarin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A dyestuff, resembling alizarin, obtained from naphthoquinone as a red crystalline substance with a bright green, metallic luster; -- called also also known as naphthalizarin.

qa_pairs.question: Naphthene
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A peculiar hydrocarbon fraction occuring as an ingredient of some crude petroleums, mostly mixtures of derivatives of the five- and six-membered saturated cyclic alkanes, cyclopentane and cyclohexane, having the general formula CnH2n.

qa_pairs.question: Naphthide
qa_pairs.answer: It means A compound of naphthalene or its radical with a metallic element; as, mercuric naphthide.

qa_pairs.question: Naphthoic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining to, derived from, or related to, naphthalene; -- used to designate any one of a series of carboxyl derivatives, called naphthoic acids of the general formula C10H7.COOH, such as 1-naphthoic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Naphthol
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any one of a series of hydroxyl derivatives of naphthalene, analogous to phenol. In general they are crystalline substances with a phenol (carbolic) odor.

qa_pairs.question: Naphthoquinone
qa_pairs.answer: It means A yellow crystalline substance, C10H6O2, analogous to quinone, obtained by oxidizing naphthalene with chromic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Naphthyl
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A hydrocarbon radical regarded as the essential residue of naphthalene.

qa_pairs.question: Naphthylamine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of two basic amido derivatives of naphthalene, C10H7.NH2, forming crystalline solids.

qa_pairs.question: Napierian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of, pertaining to, or discovered by, Napier, or Naper.

qa_pairs.question: Napiers bones
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A set of rods, made of bone or other material, each divided into nine spaces, and containing the numbers of a column of the multiplication table; -- a contrivance of Baron Napier, the inventor of logarithms, for facilitating the operations of multiplication and division.

qa_pairs.question: Napiform
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Turnip-shaped; large and round in the upper part, and very slender below.

qa_pairs.question: Napkin
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A little towel, made of cloth or paper, esp. one for wiping the fingers and mouth at table.

qa_pairs.question: Napless
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Without nap; threadbare.

qa_pairs.question: Naples yellow
