qa_pairs.answer: It means See under Yellow.

qa_pairs.question: Napoleon
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Napoleon Bonaparte (or Buonaparte), Born at Ajaccio, Corsica, Aug. 15, 1766, or, according to some, at Corte, Jan. 7, 1768; died at Longwood, St. Helena, May 5, 1821. Emperor of the French 1804-14.

qa_pairs.question: Napoleon
qa_pairs.answer: It means A French gold coin of twenty francs, no longer minted or circulated. It bore the portrait of Napoleon I. or Napoleon III.

qa_pairs.question: Napoleonic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to Napoleon I., or his family; resembling, or having the qualities of, Napoleon I.

qa_pairs.question: Napoleonist
qa_pairs.answer: It means A supporter of the dynasty of the Napoleons.

qa_pairs.question: Nappe
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Sheet; surface; all that portion of a surface that is continuous in such a way that it is possible to pass from any one point of the portion to any other point of the portion without leaving the surface. Thus, some hyperboloids have one nappe, and some have two.

qa_pairs.question: Nappiness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality of having a nap; abundance of nap, as on cloth.

qa_pairs.question: Napping
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act or process of raising a nap, as on cloth.

qa_pairs.question: Nappy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Inclined to sleep; sleepy; as, to feel nappy.

qa_pairs.question: Nappy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having a nap or pile; downy; shaggy.

qa_pairs.question: Nappy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A round earthen dish, with a flat bottom and sloping sides.

qa_pairs.question: nappy
qa_pairs.answer: It means A diaper{4}.

qa_pairs.question: Nap-taking
qa_pairs.answer: It means A taking by surprise; an unexpected onset or attack.

qa_pairs.question: Napu
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A very small chevrotain (Tragulus Javanicus), native of Java. It is about the size of a hare, and is noted for its agility in leaping. Called also also known as Java musk deer, also known as pygmy musk deer, and also known as deerlet.

qa_pairs.question: Napus
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A kind of turnip. See Navew.

qa_pairs.question: Narceine
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An alkaloid found in small quantities in opium, and extracted as a white crystalline substance of a bitter astringent taste. It is a narcotic. Called also also known as narceia.

qa_pairs.question: Narcissine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to Narcissus.

qa_pairs.question: narcissism
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An exceptional interest in and admiration for oneself.

qa_pairs.question: narcissist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Someone in love with hisself or herself.

qa_pairs.question: narcissistic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having an excessive love of oneself; egocentric; egoistic.

qa_pairs.question: Narcissus
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A genus of endogenous bulbous plants with handsome flowers, having a cup-shaped crown within the six-lobed perianth, and comprising the daffodils and jonquils of several kinds.

qa_pairs.question: narcist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Someone in love with themselves; a narcissist.

qa_pairs.question: Narcosis
qa_pairs.answer: It means Privation of sense or consciousness, due to a narcotic.

qa_pairs.question: Narcotic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having the properties of a narcotic; operating as a narcotic.

qa_pairs.question: Narcotic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A drug which, in medicinal doses, generally allays morbid susceptibility, relieves pain, and produces sleep; but which, in poisonous doses, produces stupor, coma, or convulsions, and, when given in sufficient quantity, causes death. The best examples are opium (with morphine), belladonna (with atropine), and conium.

qa_pairs.question: Narcotical
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Narcotic.

qa_pairs.question: Narcotine
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An alkaloid found in opium, and extracted as a white crystalline substance, tasteless and less poisonous than morphine; -- called also also known as narcotia.

qa_pairs.question: Narcotinic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Pertaining to narcotine.

qa_pairs.question: Narcotism
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Narcosis; the state of being narcotized.

qa_pairs.question: Narcotize
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To imbue with, or subject to the influence of, a narcotic; to put into a state of narcosis.

qa_pairs.question: narcotized
qa_pairs.answer: It means under the influence of narcotics.

qa_pairs.question: narcotizing
qa_pairs.answer: It means Inducing stupor or narcosis.

qa_pairs.question: Nard
qa_pairs.answer: It means An East Indian plant (Nardostachys Jatamansi) of the Valerian family, used from remote ages in Oriental perfumery.

qa_pairs.question: Nardine
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to nard; having the qualities of nard.

qa_pairs.question: Nardoo
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An Australian name for Marsilea Drummondii, a four-leaved cryptogamous plant, sometimes used for food.

qa_pairs.question: Nare
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A nostril.

qa_pairs.question: Nares
qa_pairs.answer: It means The nostrils or nasal openings, -- the anterior nares being the external or proper nostrils, and the posterior nares, the openings of the nasal cavities into the mouth or pharynx.

qa_pairs.question: Nargile
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An apparatus for smoking tobacco. It has a long flexible tube, and the smoke is drawn through water. Also called hoookah and also known as water pipe. Functionally similar to the hubble-bubble, a simplified form.

qa_pairs.question: Narica
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The brown coati. See Coati.

qa_pairs.question: Nariform
qa_pairs.answer: It means Formed like the nose.

qa_pairs.question: narine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or belonging to the nostrils.

qa_pairs.question: nark
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A law enforcement agent specializing in narcotics law violations.

qa_pairs.question: narrable
qa_pairs.answer: It means Capable of being narrated or told.

qa_pairs.question: Narragansetts
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A tribe of Indians who formerly inhabited the shores of Narragansett Bay.

qa_pairs.question: narrate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To tell, rehearse, or recite, as a story; to relate the particulars of; to go through with in detail, as an incident or transaction; to give an account of.

qa_pairs.question: narration
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of telling or relating the particulars of an event; a recital of certain events, usually in chronological order; rehearsal.

qa_pairs.question: Narrative
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to narration; relating to the particulars of an event or transaction.

qa_pairs.question: Narrative
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That which is narrated; the recital of a story; a continuous account of the particulars of an event or transaction; a story.

qa_pairs.question: Narratively
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In the style of narration.

qa_pairs.question: Narrator
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who narrates; one who relates a series of events or transactions.

qa_pairs.question: Narratory
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Giving an account of events; narrative; as, narratory letters.

qa_pairs.question: Narre
qa_pairs.answer: It means Nearer.

qa_pairs.question: Narrow
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of little breadth; not wide or broad; having little distance from side to side; as, a narrow board; a narrow street; a narrow hem.

qa_pairs.question: Narrow
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A narrow passage; esp., a contracted part of a stream, lake, or sea; a strait connecting two bodies of water; -- usually in the plural; as, The Narrows of New York harbor.

qa_pairs.question: Narrow
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To lessen the breadth of; to contract; to draw into a smaller compass; to reduce the width or extent of.

qa_pairs.question: Narrow
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To become less broad; to contract; to become narrower; as, the sea narrows into a strait.

qa_pairs.question: narrowed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is reduced in size as if by being squeezed.

qa_pairs.question: Narrower
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who, or that which, narrows or contracts.

qa_pairs.question: Narrowing
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of contracting, or of making or becoming less in breadth or extent.

qa_pairs.question: Narrowly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is With little breadth; in a narrow manner.

qa_pairs.question: Narrow-minded
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of narrow mental scope; lacking tolerance or breadth of view; illiberal; mean. Opposite of Antonym: broad-minded, Antonym: open-minded, Antonym: liberal.

qa_pairs.question: Narrowness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The condition or quality of being narrow.

qa_pairs.question: Nart
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Art not.

qa_pairs.question: Narthex
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A tall umbelliferous plant (Ferula communis). See Giant fennel, under Fennel.

qa_pairs.question: Narwal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Narwhal.

qa_pairs.question: Narwe
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Narrow.

qa_pairs.question: Narwhal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An arctic cetacean (Monodon monocerous), about twenty feet long. The male usually has one long, twisted, pointed canine tooth, or tusk, projecting forward from the upper jaw like a horn, whence it is called also also known as sea unicorn, also known as unicorn fish, and also known as unicorn whale. Sometimes two horns are developed, side by side.

qa_pairs.question: Nas
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Was not.

qa_pairs.question: Nas
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Has not.

qa_pairs.question: Nasal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the nose.

qa_pairs.question: Nasal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An elementary sound which is uttered through the nose, or through both the nose and the mouth simultaneously.

qa_pairs.question: Nasalis
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of mammals comprising the proboscis monkeys.

qa_pairs.question: nasalise
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as nasalize.

qa_pairs.question: Nasality
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality or state of being nasal.

qa_pairs.question: Nasalization
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of nasalizing, or the state of being nasalized.

qa_pairs.question: Nasalize
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To render nasal, as sound; to insert a nasal or sound in.

qa_pairs.question: Nasalize
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To utter words or letters with a nasal sound; to speak through the nose; to pronounce with a lowered velum.

qa_pairs.question: Nasally
qa_pairs.answer: It means In a nasal manner; by the nose.

qa_pairs.question: Nascal
qa_pairs.answer: It means A kind of pessary of medicated wool or cotton, formerly used.

qa_pairs.question: Nascency
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is State of being nascent; birth; beginning; origin.

qa_pairs.question: Nascent
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Commencing, or in process of development; beginning to exist or to grow; coming into being; as, a nascent germ.

qa_pairs.question: Naseberry
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A tropical fruit. See Sapodilla.

qa_pairs.question: Nash
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Firm; stiff; hard; also, chilly.

qa_pairs.question: Nasicornous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Bearing a horn, or horns, on the nose, as the rhinoceros.

qa_pairs.question: Nasiform
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having the shape of a nose.

qa_pairs.question: Nasion
qa_pairs.answer: It means The middle point of the nasofrontal suture.

qa_pairs.question: Naso-
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A combining form denoting pertaining to the nose, or connected with the nose; as, nasofrontal.

qa_pairs.question: Nasobuccal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Connected with both the nose and the mouth; as, the nasobuccal groove in the skate.

qa_pairs.question: Nasofrontal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the nose and the front of the head; as, the embryonic nasofrontal process which forms the anterior boundary of the mouth.

qa_pairs.question: Nasolachrymal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Connected with the lachrymal apparatus and the nose; as, the nasolachrymal, or lachrymal duct.

qa_pairs.question: Nasopalatal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Connected with both the nose and the palate; as, the nasopalatine or incisor, canal connecting the mouth and the nasal chamber in some animals; the nasopalatine nerve.

qa_pairs.question: Nasopharyngeal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to both throat and nose; as, a nasopharyngeal polypus.

qa_pairs.question: Nasoseptal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the internasal septum.

qa_pairs.question: Nasoturbinal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Connected with, or near, both the turbinal and the nasal bones; as, the nasoturbinal bone, made up of the uppermost lammelae of the ethmoturbinal, and sometimes united with the nasal.

qa_pairs.question: Nassa
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any species of marine gastropods, of the genera *Nassa*, *Tritia*, and other allied genera of the family Nassidae; a dog whelk. See Illust. under Gastropoda.

qa_pairs.question: Nastily
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In a nasty manner.

qa_pairs.question: Nastiness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality or state of being nasty; extreme filthness; dirtiness; also, indecency; obscenity.

qa_pairs.question: Nasturtion
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Nasturtium.

qa_pairs.question: Nasturtium
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus of cruciferous plants, having white or yellowish flowers, including several species of cress. They are found chiefly in wet or damp grounds, and have a pungent biting taste.

qa_pairs.question: Nasty
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Offensively filthy; very dirty, foul, or defiled; disgusting; nauseous.

qa_pairs.question: Nasute
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having a nice sense of smell.

qa_pairs.question: Nasutness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Quickness of scent; hence, nice discernment; acuteness.

qa_pairs.question: Nat
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not.

qa_pairs.question: Nat
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not at; nor at.

qa_pairs.question: Natal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to one's birth; accompying or dating from one's birth; native.

qa_pairs.question: Natal boil
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is same as Aleppo boil.

qa_pairs.question: Natalitial
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to one's birth or birthday, or one's nativity.

qa_pairs.question: Nataloin
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A bitter crystalline substance constituting the essential principle of Natal aloes. Cf. Aloon.

qa_pairs.question: Natal plum
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The drupaceous fruit of two South African shrubs of the genus *Carissa* (formerly *Arduina*) (Carissa bispinosa and Carissa grandiflora). It is also called also known as amatungulu.

qa_pairs.question: Natals
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One's birth, or the circumstances attending it.

qa_pairs.question: Natant
qa_pairs.answer: It means Floating in water, as the leaves of water lilies, or submersed, as those of many aquatic plants.

qa_pairs.question: Natantly
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In a floating manner; swimmingly.

qa_pairs.question: Natation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of floating on the water; swimming.

qa_pairs.question: Natatores
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The swimming birds.

qa_pairs.question: Natatorial
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Inclined or adapted to swim; swimming; as, natatorial birds.

qa_pairs.question: Natatorious
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Adapted for swimming; -- said of the legs of certain insects.

qa_pairs.question: Natatorium
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A swimming bath.

qa_pairs.question: Natatory
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Adapted for swimming or floating; as, natatory organs.

qa_pairs.question: Natch
qa_pairs.answer: It means The rump of beef; esp., the lower and back part of the rump.

qa_pairs.question: Natchez
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A tribe of Indians who formerly lived near the site of the city of Natchez, Mississippi. In 1729 they were subdued by the French; the survivors joined the Creek Confederacy.

qa_pairs.question: Natchnee
qa_pairs.answer: It means An annual grass (Eleusine coracona), cultivated in India as a food plant.

qa_pairs.question: Nates
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The buttocks.

qa_pairs.question: Nath
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is hath not.

qa_pairs.question: Nathless
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Nevertheless.

qa_pairs.question: Nathmore
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not the more; never the more.

qa_pairs.question: natica
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any one of numerous species of marine gastropods belonging to *Natica*, *Lunatia*, *Neverita*, and other allied genera (family Naticidae.) They burrow beneath the sand, or mud, and drill other shells.

qa_pairs.question: Naticoid
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Like or belonging to *Natica*, or the family Naticidae.

qa_pairs.question: Nation
qa_pairs.answer: It means A part, or division, of the people of the earth, distinguished from the rest by common descent, language, or institutions; a race; a stock.

qa_pairs.question: National
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to a nation; common to a whole people or race; public; general; as, a national government, language, dress, custom, calamity, etc.

qa_pairs.question: national
qa_pairs.answer: It means A citizen (of a particular country); as, U. S. nationals are advised to contact their embassy when abroad.

qa_pairs.question: nationalisation
qa_pairs.answer: It means same as nationalization.

qa_pairs.question: Nationalism
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The state of being national; national attachment; nationality.

qa_pairs.question: nationalist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who advocates national unity and independence; -- as, for example, one of a party favoring Irish independence before 1918.

qa_pairs.question: nationalistic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Fanatically patriotic; chauvinistic.

qa_pairs.question: Nationality
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality of being national, or strongly attached to one's own nation; patriotism.

qa_pairs.question: Nationalization
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of nationalizing, or the state of being nationalized.

qa_pairs.question: nationalize
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To make national; to make a nation of; to endow with the character and habits of a nation, or the peculiar sentiments and attachment of citizens of a nation.

qa_pairs.question: Nationally
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In a national manner or way; as a nation.

qa_pairs.question: Nationalness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being national; nationality.

qa_pairs.question: Nationalrath
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Legislature.

qa_pairs.question: Native
qa_pairs.answer: It means Arising by birth; having an origin; born.

qa_pairs.question: Native
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who, or that which, is born in a place or country referred to; a denizen by birth; an animal, a fruit, or vegetable, produced in a certain region; as, a native of France; the natives are restless.

qa_pairs.question: Natively
qa_pairs.answer: It means By natural or original condition; naturally; originally.

qa_pairs.question: Nativeness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being native.

qa_pairs.question: Native steel
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A sort of steel which has been found where a burning coal seam had reduced and carbonized adjacent iron ore.

qa_pairs.question: Nativism
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The disposition to favor the native inhabitants of a country, in preference to immigrants from foreign countries.

qa_pairs.question: Nativist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An advocate of nativism.

qa_pairs.question: Nativistic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Relating to nativism.

qa_pairs.question: Nativity
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The coming into life or into the world; birth; also, the circumstances attending birth, as time, place, manner, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Natka
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A species of shrike.

qa_pairs.question: Natrium
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The technical name for also known as sodium.

qa_pairs.question: Natrolite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A zeolite occuring in groups of glassy acicular crystals, and in masses which often have a radiated structure. It is a hydrous silicate of alumina and soda.

qa_pairs.question: Natron
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Native sodium carbonate.

qa_pairs.question: Natter
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To find fault; to be peevish.

qa_pairs.question: Natterjack
qa_pairs.answer: It means A European toad (Bufo calamita), having a yellow line along its back.

qa_pairs.question: Natty
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Neatly dressed; smart; trim; tidy; spruce.

qa_pairs.question: Natural
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Fixed or determined by nature; pertaining to the constitution of a thing; belonging to native character; according to nature; essential; characteristic; innate; not artificial, foreign, assumed, put on, or acquired; as, the natural growth of animals or plants; the natural motion of a gravitating body; natural strength or disposition; the natural heat of the body; natural color.

qa_pairs.question: Natural
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A native; an aboriginal.

qa_pairs.question: natural family
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is a group of living organisms classed as a also known as family in a toxonomic classification.

qa_pairs.question: natural gas
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The combustible gas found associated with petroleum deposits, and also in other geological formations, comprised predominantly of methane plus variable other constitutents. It is an important source of energy, and is transported long distances by pipelines, or in a liquefied state in tankers, for commercial distribution. Some natural gas deposits contain helium, and comprise the primary source of that rare element.

qa_pairs.question: Naturalism
qa_pairs.answer: It means A state of nature; conformity to nature.

qa_pairs.question: naturalist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One versed in natural science; a student of natural history, esp. of the natural history of plants or animals; a botanist or zoologist.

qa_pairs.question: Naturalistic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Belonging to the doctrines of naturalism.

qa_pairs.question: Naturality
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Nature; naturalness.

qa_pairs.question: Naturalization
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act or process of naturalizing, esp. of investing an alien with the rights and privileges of a native or citizen; also, the state of being naturalized.

qa_pairs.question: Naturalize
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To make natural; as, custom naturalizes labor or study.

qa_pairs.question: Naturalize
qa_pairs.answer: It means To become as if native.

qa_pairs.question: naturalized
qa_pairs.answer: It means Acclimated to a new environment; introduced from another region and persisting without cultivation; -- of plants or animals not native to a location.

qa_pairs.question: Naturally
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In a natural manner or way; according to the usual course of things; spontaneously.

qa_pairs.question: Naturalness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The state or quality of being natural; conformity to nature.

qa_pairs.question: Natural product
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A chemical substance produced by a living organism; -- a term used commonly in reference to chemical substances found in nature that have distinctive pharmacological effects. Such a substance is considered a natural product even if it can be prepared by total synthesis.

qa_pairs.question: Natural product chemistry
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is That branch of chemistry which deals with the isolation, identification, structure elucidation, and study of the chemical characteristics of chemical substances produced by living organisms.

qa_pairs.question: Natural steel
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Steel made by the direct refining of cast iron in a finery, or, as wootz, by a direct process from the ore.

qa_pairs.question: Nature
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The existing system of things; the universe of matter, energy, time and space; the physical world; all of creation. Contrasted with the world of mankind, with its mental and social phenomena.

qa_pairs.question: Nature
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To endow with natural qualities.

qa_pairs.question: Natured
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having (such) a nature, temper, or disposition; disposed; -- used in composition; as, good-natured, ill-natured, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Natureless
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not in accordance with nature; unnatural.

qa_pairs.question: Naturism
qa_pairs.answer: It means The belief or doctrine that attributes everything to nature as a sanative agent.

qa_pairs.question: Naturist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who believes in, or conforms to, the theory of naturism.

qa_pairs.question: Naturity
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality or state of being produced by nature.

qa_pairs.question: Naturize
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To endow with a nature or qualities; to refer to nature.

qa_pairs.question: nauch
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is an intricate traditional dance in India performed by professional dancing girls.

qa_pairs.question: Nauclea
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A small genus of evergreen tropical shrubs or trees with smooth leathery leaves.

qa_pairs.question: Naufrage
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Shipwreck; ruin.

qa_pairs.question: Naufragous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as causing shipwreck.

qa_pairs.question: Naught
qa_pairs.answer: It means Nothing.

qa_pairs.question: Naught
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In no degree; not at all.

qa_pairs.question: Naught
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of no value or account; worthless; bad; useless.

qa_pairs.question: Naughtily
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In a naughty manner; wickedly; perversely.

qa_pairs.question: Naughtiness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being naughty; perverseness; badness; wickedness.

qa_pairs.question: Naughtly
qa_pairs.answer: It means Naughtily; wrongly.

qa_pairs.question: Naughty
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having little or nothing.

qa_pairs.question: Nauheim treatment
qa_pairs.answer: It means Orig., a method of therapeutic treatment administered, esp. for chronic diseases of the curculatory system, at Bad Nauheim, Germany, by G. Schott, consisting in baths in the natural mineral waters of that place, which are charged with carbonic acid, and the use of a graduated course of rest, physical exercises, massage, etc.; hence, any similar treatment using waters artificially charged with the essential ingredients of the natural mineral waters of Bad Nauheim. Hence, Nauheim bath, etc.

qa_pairs.question: naumachia
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as naumachy.

qa_pairs.question: Naumachy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A naval battle; esp., a mock sea fight put on by the ancient Romans.

qa_pairs.question: Nauplius
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A crustacean larva having three pairs of locomotive organs (corresponding to the antennules, antennae, and mandibles), a median eye, and little or no segmentation of the body.

qa_pairs.question: Nauropometer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An instrument for measuring the amount which a ship heels at sea.

qa_pairs.question: Nauruan
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to Nauru; as, Nauruan artifacts.

qa_pairs.question: Nauscopy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The power or act of discovering ships or land at considerable distances.

qa_pairs.question: Nausea
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Seasickness; hence, any similar sickness of the stomach accompanied with a propensity to vomit; qualm; squeamishness of the stomach; loathing.

qa_pairs.question: Nauseant
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A substance which produces nausea; an emetic.

qa_pairs.question: Nauseate
qa_pairs.answer: It means To become squeamish; to feel nausea; to turn away with disgust.

qa_pairs.question: Nauseate
qa_pairs.answer: It means To affect with nausea; to sicken; to cause to feel loathing or disgust.

qa_pairs.question: Nauseation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of nauseating, or the state of being nauseated.

qa_pairs.question: Nauseative
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Causing nausea; nauseous.

qa_pairs.question: Nauseous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Causing, or fitted to cause, nausea; sickening; loathsome; disgusting; exciting abhorrence; as, a nauseous drug or medicine.

qa_pairs.question: Nautch
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An entertainment consisting chiefly of dancing by professional dancing (or Nautch) girls.

qa_pairs.question: Nautic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Nautical.

qa_pairs.question: Nautical
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to seamen, to the art of navigation, or to ships; as, nautical skill.

qa_pairs.question: Nautically
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In a nautical manner; with reference to nautical affairs.

qa_pairs.question: Nautiform
qa_pairs.answer: It means Shaped like the hull of a ship.

qa_pairs.question: Nautilidae
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A natural family of spiral-shelled cephalopods.

qa_pairs.question: Nautilite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A fossil nautilus.

qa_pairs.question: Nautiloid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Like or pertaining to the nautilus; shaped like a nautilus shell.

qa_pairs.question: Nautilus
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The only existing genus of tetrabranchiate cephalopods. About four species are found living in the tropical Pacific, but many other species are found fossil. The shell is spiral, symmetrical, and chambered, or divided into several cavities by simple curved partitions, which are traversed and connected together by a continuous and nearly central tube or siphuncle. See Tetrabranchiata.

qa_pairs.question: Navajoes
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A tribe of Indians inhabiting New Mexico and Arizona, allied to the Apaches. They are now largely engaged in agriculture.

qa_pairs.question: Naval
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having to do with shipping; of or pertaining to ships or a navy; consisting of ships; as, naval forces, successes, stores, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Navals
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Naval affairs.

qa_pairs.question: Navarch
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The commander of a fleet.

qa_pairs.question: navarchy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Nautical skill or experience.

qa_pairs.question: Navarino
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The name of a naval battle in the War of Greek Independence (1827), at which the Turkish and Egyptian fleet was defeated by the allied fleet.

qa_pairs.question: Navarrese
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to Navarre.

qa_pairs.question: nave
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The block in the center of a wheel, from which the spokes radiate, and through which the axle passes; -- called also also known as hub or also known as hob.

qa_pairs.question: Nave
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The middle or body of a church, extending from the transepts to the principal entrances, or, if there are no transepts, from the choir to the principal entrance, but not including the aisles.

qa_pairs.question: Navel
qa_pairs.answer: It means A mark or depression in the middle of the abdomen; the umbilicus; called also also known as belly button in humans. See Umbilicus.

qa_pairs.question: navel orange
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A type of orange in which the fruit incloses a small secondary fruit, the rind showing on the exterior a navel-like pit or depression at the apex. There are several varieties; they are usually seedless, or nearly so, and are much grown in California.

qa_pairs.question: Navel-string
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The also known as umbilical cord.

qa_pairs.question: Navelwort
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A European perennial succulent herb (Cotyledon umbilicus), having round, peltate leaves with a central depression; -- also called also known as pennywort, and also known as kidneywort.

qa_pairs.question: Navew
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A kind of small turnip, a variety of Brassica campestris. See Brassica.

qa_pairs.question: Navicular
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of, pertaining to, or resembling, a boat or ship.

qa_pairs.question: Navicular
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The navicular bone.

qa_pairs.question: Navigability
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or condition of being navigable; navigableness.

qa_pairs.question: Navigable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Capable of being navigated; deep enough and wide enough to afford passage to vessels; as, a navigable river.

qa_pairs.question: Navigate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To journey by water; to go in a vessel or ship; to perform the duties of a navigator; to use the waters as a highway or channel for commerce or communication; to sail.

qa_pairs.question: Navigate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To pass over in ships; to sail over or on; as, to navigate the Atlantic.

qa_pairs.question: Navigation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of navigating; the act of passing on water in ships or other vessels; the state of being navigable.

qa_pairs.question: navigational
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is of or pertaining to navigation; used in navigation; as, navigational aids.

qa_pairs.question: Navigator
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who navigates or sails; esp., one who direct the course of a ship, or one who is skillful in the art of navigation; also, a book which teaches the art of navigation; as, Bowditch's Navigator.

qa_pairs.question: Navigerous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Bearing ships; capable of floating vessels.

qa_pairs.question: Navvy
qa_pairs.answer: It means Originally, a laborer on canals for internal navigation; hence, a laborer on other public works, as in building railroads, embankments, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Navy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A fleet of ships; an assemblage of merchantmen, or so many as sail in company.

qa_pairs.question: Navy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having a color of navy blue.

qa_pairs.question: Navy blue
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A dark grayish blue. Also called also known as navy.

qa_pairs.question: Nawab
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A deputy ruler or viceroy in India; also, a title given by courtesy to other persons of high rank in the East.

qa_pairs.question: Nawl
qa_pairs.answer: It means An awl.

qa_pairs.question: nay
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is No; -- a negative answer to a question asked, or a request made, now superseded by also known as no. Opposed to Antonym: aye or Antonym: yea. See also Yes.

qa_pairs.question: Nay
qa_pairs.answer: It means Denial; refusal.

qa_pairs.question: Nay
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To refuse.

qa_pairs.question: Nayaur
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A specied of wild sheep (Ovis Hodgsonii), native of Nepal and Tibet. It has a dorsal mane and a white ruff beneath the neck.

qa_pairs.question: Nayt
qa_pairs.answer: It means To refuse; to deny.

qa_pairs.question: Nayward
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The negative side.

qa_pairs.question: Nayword
qa_pairs.answer: It means A byword; a proverb; also, a watchword.

qa_pairs.question: Nazarene
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A native or inhabitant of Nazareth; -- a term of contempt applied to Christ and the early Christians.

qa_pairs.question: Nazarite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A Jew bound by a vow to leave the hair uncut, to abstain from wine and strong drink, and to practice extraordinary purity of life and devotion, the obligation being for life, or for a certain time. The word is also used adjectively.

qa_pairs.question: Nazariteship
qa_pairs.answer: It means The state of a Nazarite.

qa_pairs.question: Nazaritic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to a Nazarite, or to Nazarites.

qa_pairs.question: Nazaritism
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The vow and practice of a Nazarite.

qa_pairs.question: naze
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A promontory or headland.

qa_pairs.question: Nazirite
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A Nazarite.

qa_pairs.question: ne
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not; never.

qa_pairs.question: ne
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Nor.

qa_pairs.question: Neaf
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See 2d Neif.

qa_pairs.question: Neal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To anneal.

qa_pairs.question: Neal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To be tempered by heat.

qa_pairs.question: neanderthal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as uncouth in manners or appearance.

qa_pairs.question: Neanderthal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of, pertaining to, or named from, the Neanderthal, a valley in the Rhine Province, in which were found parts of a skeleton of an early type of man. The skull is characterized by extreme dolichocephaly, flat, retreating forehead, with closed frontal sutures, and enormous superciliary ridges. The cranial capacity is estimated at about 1,220 cubic centimeters, being about midway between that of the *Pithecanthropus* and modern man.

qa_pairs.question: Neanderthal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A neanderthal human being; a member of the race Homo sapiens neanderthalensis; as, neanderthals were shorter than modern humans.

qa_pairs.question: Neanderthalian
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as same as Neanderthal{1}.

qa_pairs.question: Neanderthaloid
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Like, or pertaining to, the Neanderthal skull, or the type of man it represents.

qa_pairs.question: Neap
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The tongue or pole of a cart or other vehicle drawn by two animals.

qa_pairs.question: Neap
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Low.

qa_pairs.question: Neap
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A neap tide.

qa_pairs.question: Neaped
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Left aground on the height of a spring tide, so that it will not float till the next spring tide; -- called also also known as beneaped.

qa_pairs.question: Neapolitan
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of of pertaining to Naples in Italy.

qa_pairs.question: Neapolitan ice
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An ice or ice cream containing eggs as well as cream.

qa_pairs.question: Near
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as At a little distance, in place, time, manner, or degree; not remote; nigh.

qa_pairs.question: Near
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not far distant in time, place, or degree; not remote; close at hand; adjacent; neighboring; nigh.

qa_pairs.question: Near
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Adjacent to; close by; not far from; nigh; as, the ship sailed near the land. See the Note under near, (a.)

qa_pairs.question: Near
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To approach; to come nearer; as, the ship neared the land.

qa_pairs.question: Near
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To draw near; to approach.

qa_pairs.question: Nearctic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to a region of the earth's surface including all of temperate and arctic North America and Greenland. In the geographical distribution of animals, this region is marked off as the habitat certain species.

qa_pairs.question: Near beer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any of various malt liquors (see Citation below).

qa_pairs.question: nearby
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is situated near; as, the nearby towns. Opposite of Antonym: far away.

qa_pairs.question: nearer
qa_pairs.answer: It means less distant in space; as, we walked to the nearer house.

qa_pairs.question: Nearhand
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Near; near at hand; closely.

qa_pairs.question: Near-legged
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having the feet so near together that they interfere in traveling.

qa_pairs.question: Nearly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In a near manner; not remotely; closely; intimately; almost; as, he nearly lost his life in the accident.

qa_pairs.question: Nearness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The state or quality of being near; -- used in the various senses of the adjective.

qa_pairs.question: Nearsighted
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Seeing distinctly at short distances only; myopic; shortsighted.

qa_pairs.question: Nearsightedness
qa_pairs.answer: It means An eyesight abnormality resulting from the eye's faulty refractive ability, such that one can see only close objects distinctly; the condition of being nearsighted. See Myopic, and Myopia.

qa_pairs.question: Neat
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Cattle of the genus *Bos*, as distinguished from horses, sheep, and goats; an animal of the genus *Bos*; as, a neat's tongue; a neat's foot.

qa_pairs.question: Neat
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to the genus *Bos*, or to cattle of that genus; as, neat cattle.

qa_pairs.question: Neat
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Free from that which soils, defiles, or disorders; clean; cleanly; tidy.

qa_pairs.question: Neath
qa_pairs.answer: It means An abbreviation of Beneath.

qa_pairs.question: Neatherd
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A person who has the care of neat cattle; a cowherd.

qa_pairs.question: Neathouse
qa_pairs.answer: It means A building for the shelter of neat cattle.

qa_pairs.question: Neatify
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To make neat.

qa_pairs.question: Neatly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In a neat manner; tidily; tastefully.

qa_pairs.question: neatness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state or quality of being neat.

qa_pairs.question: Neatress
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A woman who takes care of cattle.

qa_pairs.question: Neb
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The nose; the snout; the mouth; the beak of a bird; a nib, as of a pen.

qa_pairs.question: Nebalia
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of small marine Crustacea, considered the type of a distinct order (Nebaloidea, or Phyllocarida.)

qa_pairs.question: Nebbish
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A person who is ineffectual, timid, and often luckless; a person of no significance.

qa_pairs.question: Neb-neb
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Bablh.

qa_pairs.question: Nebo
qa_pairs.answer: It means The Babylonian god of wisdom and agriculture and patron of scribes and schools.

qa_pairs.question: Nebraskan
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A resident of the state of Nebraska.

qa_pairs.question: Nebula
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A faint, cloudlike, self-luminous mass of matter situated beyond the solar system among the stars. The term was originally applied to any diffuse luminous region. Now, technically, it is applied to interstellar clouds of dust and gases (also known as diffuse nebula). However distant galaxies and very distant star clusters often appear like them in the telescope, such as the spiral nebula in Andromeda, known now to be a distant galaxy.

qa_pairs.question: Nebular
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to nebulae; of the nature of, or resembling, a nebula.

qa_pairs.question: nebulated
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Clouded with indistinct color markings, as an animal.

qa_pairs.question: nebulation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The condition of being nebulated; also, a clouded, or ill-defined, color mark.

qa_pairs.question: nebule
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A little cloud; a cloud.

qa_pairs.question: N<eacute/bul<eacute/
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Composed of successive short curves supposed to resemble a cloud; -- said of a heraldic line by which an ordinary or subordinary may be bounded.

qa_pairs.question: Nebulization
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act or process of nebulizing; atomization.

qa_pairs.question: Nebulize
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To reduce (as a liquid) to a fine spray or vapor; to atomize.

qa_pairs.question: Nebulizer
qa_pairs.answer: It means An atomizer.

qa_pairs.question: Nebulose
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Nebulous; cloudy.

qa_pairs.question: Nebulosity
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The state or quality of being nebulous; cloudiness; haziness; mistiness; nebulousness.

qa_pairs.question: Nebulous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Cloudy; hazy; misty.

qa_pairs.question: Nebuly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A line or a decoration composed of successive short curves or waves supposed to resemble a cloud. See N<eacute/bul<eacute/

qa_pairs.question: Necessarian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An advocate of the doctrine of philosophical necessity; a necessitarian.

qa_pairs.question: Necessarian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to necessarianism.

qa_pairs.question: Necessarianism
qa_pairs.answer: It means The doctrine of philosophical necessity; necessitarianism.

qa_pairs.question: Necessarily
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In a necessary manner; by necessity; unavoidably; indispensably.

qa_pairs.question: Necessariness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality of being necessary.

qa_pairs.question: Necessary
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Such as must be; impossible to be otherwise; not to be avoided; inevitable.

qa_pairs.question: Necessary
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A thing that is necessary or indispensable to some purpose; something that one can not do without; a requisite; an essential; -- used chiefly in the plural; as, the necessaries of life.

qa_pairs.question: Necessitarian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the doctrine of philosophical necessity in regard to the origin and existence of things, especially as applied to the actings or choices of the will; -- opposed to libertarian.

qa_pairs.question: Necessitarian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who holds to the doctrine of necessitarianism.

qa_pairs.question: Necessitarianism
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The doctrine of philosophical necessity; the doctrine that results follow by invariable sequence from causes, and esp. that the will is not free, but that human actions and choices result inevitably from motives; determinism.

qa_pairs.question: Necessitate
qa_pairs.answer: It means To make necessary or indispensable; to render unavoidable.

qa_pairs.question: Necessitattion
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of making necessary, or the state of being made necessary; compulsion.

qa_pairs.question: Necessitied
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In a state of want; necessitous.

qa_pairs.question: Necessitous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Very needy or indigent; pressed with poverty.

qa_pairs.question: Necessitude
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Necessitousness; want.

qa_pairs.question: Necessity
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being necessary, unavoidable, or absolutely requisite; inevitableness; indispensableness.

qa_pairs.question: Neck
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The part of an animal which connects the head and the trunk, and which, in man and many other animals, is more slender than the trunk.

qa_pairs.question: Neck
qa_pairs.answer: It means To reduce the diameter of (an object) near its end, by making a groove around it; -- used with down; as, to neck down a shaft.

qa_pairs.question: neck
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To kiss and caress amorously.

qa_pairs.question: Neckar nut
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Nicker nut.

qa_pairs.question: Neckband
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A band which goes around the neck; often, the part at the top of a garment.

qa_pairs.question: Neckcloth
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A piece of any fabric worn around the neck.

qa_pairs.question: Necked
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having (such) a neck; -- chiefly used in composition; as, stiff-necked.

qa_pairs.question: Neckerchief
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A kerchief for the neck; -- called also also known as neck handkerchief.

qa_pairs.question: Necking
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Neckmold.

qa_pairs.question: necklace
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A string of beads, etc., or any continuous band or chain, worn around the neck as an ornament.

qa_pairs.question: necklaced
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Wearing a necklace; marked as with a necklace.

qa_pairs.question: neckland
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A neck of land.

qa_pairs.question: neckless
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is lacking or apparently lacking a neck; -- of a garment; as, a neckless gown.

qa_pairs.question: necklet
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A necklace.

qa_pairs.question: Neckmold
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A small convex molding surrounding a column at the junction of the shaft and capital.

qa_pairs.question: Neckplate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Gorget, 1 and 2.

qa_pairs.question: Necktie
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A scarf, band, or kerchief of silk, etc., passing around the neck or collar and tied in front; a bow of silk, etc., fastened in front of the neck.

qa_pairs.question: Neckwear
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A collective term for cravats, collars, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Neckweed
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An American annual weed (veronica peregrina), with small white flowers and a roundish pod.

qa_pairs.question: Necrobiosis
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The death of a part of an organism by molecular disintegration and without loss of continuity, as in the processes of degeneration and atrophy; a normal dying out of cells in a tissue, in contrast to necrosis.

qa_pairs.question: Necrobiotic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to necrobiosis; as, a necrobiotic metamorphosis.

qa_pairs.question: Necrolatry
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The worship of the dead; manes worship.

qa_pairs.question: Necrolite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Necronite.

qa_pairs.question: Necrologic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to necrology; of the nature of necrology; relating to, or giving, an account of the dead, or of deaths.

qa_pairs.question: Necrologist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who gives an account of deaths.

qa_pairs.question: Necrology
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An account of deaths, or of the dead; a register of deaths; a collection of obituary notices.

qa_pairs.question: Necromancer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who practices necromancy; a sorcerer; a wizard.

qa_pairs.question: Necromancy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The art of revealing future events by means of a pretended communication with the dead; the black art; hence, magic in general; conjuration; enchantment. See Black art.

qa_pairs.question: necromania
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An abnormal attraction to dead bodies.

qa_pairs.question: Necromantic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Conjuration.

qa_pairs.question: Necromantic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to necromancy; performed by necromancy.

qa_pairs.question: Necronite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Fetid feldspar, a mineral which, when struck, exhales a fetid odor.

qa_pairs.question: Necrophagan
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Eating carrion.

qa_pairs.question: Necrophagous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the Necrophaga; eating carrion. See Necrophagan.

qa_pairs.question: Necrophobia
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An exaggerated fear of death or horror of dead bodies.

qa_pairs.question: Necrophore
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any one of numerous species of beetles of the genus *Necrophorus* and allied genera; -- called also also known as burying beetle, also known as carrion beetle, also known as sexton beetle.

qa_pairs.question: Necropolis
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A city of the dead; a name given by the ancients to their cemeteries, and sometimes applied to modern burial places; a graveyard.

qa_pairs.question: Necropsy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A post-mortem examination or inspection; an autopsy. See Autopsy.

qa_pairs.question: Necroscopic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Or or relating to post-mortem examinations.

qa_pairs.question: Necrose
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To affect with necrosis; to undergo necrosis.

qa_pairs.question: Necrosed
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Affected by necrosis; dead; as, a necrosed bone.

qa_pairs.question: Necrosis
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The pathologic death of part of a tissue due to irreversible damage. Contrast to necrobiosis, which is a normal death of cells in a tissue. Formerly, applied primarily to death of bone tissue.

qa_pairs.question: Necrotic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Affected with necrosis; as, necrotic tissue; characterized by, or producing, necrosis; as, a necrotic process.

qa_pairs.question: Necrotomy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The dissection of dead bodies; also, excision of necrosed bone.

qa_pairs.question: Nectar
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The drink of the gods (as ambrosia was their food); hence, any delicious or inspiring beverage.

qa_pairs.question: Nectareal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Nectareous.

qa_pairs.question: Nectarean
qa_pairs.answer: It means Resembling nectar; very sweet and pleasant.

qa_pairs.question: Nectared
qa_pairs.answer: It means Imbued with nectar; mingled with nectar; abounding with nectar.

qa_pairs.question: Nectareous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of, pertaining to, containing, or resembling nectar; delicious; nectarean.

qa_pairs.question: Nectarial
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the nectary of a plant.

qa_pairs.question: Nectaried
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having a nectary.

qa_pairs.question: Nectariferous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Secreting nectar; -- said of blossoms or their parts.

qa_pairs.question: Nectarine
qa_pairs.answer: It means Nectareous.

qa_pairs.question: Nectarine
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A smooth-skinned variety of peach.

qa_pairs.question: Nectarize
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To mingle or infuse with nectar; to sweeten.

qa_pairs.question: Nectarous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Nectareous.

qa_pairs.question: Nectary
qa_pairs.answer: It means That part of a blossom which secretes nectar, usually the base of the corolla or petals; also, the spur of such flowers as the larkspur and columbine, whether nectariferous or not. See the Illustration of Nasturtium.

qa_pairs.question: Nectocalyx
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The swimming bell or umbrella of a jellyfish of medusa.

qa_pairs.question: Nectosac
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The cavity of a nectocalyx.

qa_pairs.question: Nectostem
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as That portion of the axis which bears the nectocalyces in the Siphonophora.

qa_pairs.question: Nedder
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An adder.

qa_pairs.question: Neddy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A pet name for a donkey.

qa_pairs.question: Nee
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Born; -- a term sometimes used in introducing the name of the family to which a married woman belongs by birth (i.e. her maiden name); as, Madame de Stael, n Necker.

qa_pairs.question: Need
qa_pairs.answer: It means A state that requires supply or relief; pressing occasion for something; necessity; urgent want.

qa_pairs.question: Need
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To be in want of; to have cause or occasion for; to lack; to require, as supply or relief.

qa_pairs.question: Need
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To be wanted; to be necessary.

qa_pairs.question: Need
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of necessity. See Needs.

qa_pairs.question: needed
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as necessary; as, provided them with all needed equipment. Opposite of Antonym: unnecessary.

qa_pairs.question: Needer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who needs anything.

qa_pairs.question: Needful
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Full of need; in need or want; needy; distressing.

qa_pairs.question: Needily
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In a needy condition or manner; necessarily.

qa_pairs.question: Neediness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The state or quality of being needy; want; poverty; indigence.

qa_pairs.question: Needle
qa_pairs.answer: It means A small instrument of steel, sharply pointed at one end, with an eye to receive a thread, -- used in sewing.

qa_pairs.question: Needle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To form in the shape of a needle; as, to needle crystals.

qa_pairs.question: Needle
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To form needles; to crystallize in the form of needles.

qa_pairs.question: Needlebook
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A book-shaped needlecase, having leaves of cloth into which the needles are stuck.

qa_pairs.question: needlebush
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A shrub (Hakea lissosperma) of eastern Australia, with pungent rigid needle-shaped leaves and white flowers.

qa_pairs.question: Needlecase
qa_pairs.answer: It means A case to keep needles.

qa_pairs.question: needlecraft
qa_pairs.answer: It means An article or articles created or assembled by needle and thread; needlework.

qa_pairs.question: Needlefish
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The European great pipefish (Siphostoma acus or Syngnathus acus); -- called also also known as earl, and also known as tanglefish.

qa_pairs.question: needleful
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is As much thread as is used in a needle at one time.

qa_pairs.question: Needle-pointed
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Pointed as needles.

qa_pairs.question: Needler
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who makes or uses needles; also, a dealer in needles.

qa_pairs.question: Needless
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having no need.

qa_pairs.question: Needlestone
qa_pairs.answer: It means Natrolite; -- called also also known as needle zeolite.

qa_pairs.question: Needlewoman
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A woman who does needlework; a seamstress.

qa_pairs.question: needlewood
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A large bushy shrub (Hakea leucoptera) of central and eastern Australia, with pungent pointed leaves and creamy white flowers.

qa_pairs.question: Needlework
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Work executed with a needle; sewed work; sewing; embroidery, crocheting, quilting, or tapestry, etc.; also, the art, process, or occupation of creating objects with needles.

qa_pairs.question: Needly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Like a needle or needles; as, a needly horn; a needly beard.

qa_pairs.question: Needly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Necessarily; of necessity.

qa_pairs.question: Needment
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Something needed or wanted.

qa_pairs.question: Needs
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of necessity; necessarily; indispensably; -- often with must, and equivalent to of need.

qa_pairs.question: Needscost
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of necessity.

qa_pairs.question: Needsly
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of necessity.

qa_pairs.question: Needy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Distressed by want of the means of living; very poor; indigent; necessitous.

qa_pairs.question: Neeld
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A needle.

qa_pairs.question: Neelghau
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Nylghau.

qa_pairs.question: Neem tree
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An Asiatic name for Melia Azadirachta, and Melia Azedarach. See Margosa.

qa_pairs.question: neencephalon
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The most recently evolved part of the brain of higher animals. It includes the cerebral cortex and related structures.

qa_pairs.question: Neer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Nearer.

qa_pairs.question: Neer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is a contraction of Never.

qa_pairs.question: Neer-do-well
qa_pairs.answer: It means A person who never does, or fares, well; a good for nothing.

qa_pairs.question: Neese
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To sneeze.

qa_pairs.question: Neesing
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Sneezing.

qa_pairs.question: Ne exeat
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A writ to restrain a person from leaving the country, or the jurisdiction of the court. The writ was originally applicable to purposes of state, but is now an ordinary process of courts of equity, resorted to for the purpose of obtaining bail, or security to abide a decree.

qa_pairs.question: Nef
qa_pairs.answer: It means The nave of a church.

qa_pairs.question: Nefand
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Unfit to speak of; unmentionable; impious; execrable.

qa_pairs.question: Nefarious
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Wicked in the extreme; abominable; iniquitous; atrociously villainous; execrable; detestably vile.

qa_pairs.question: Nefasch
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any fish of the genus *Distichodus*. Several large species inhabit the Nile.

qa_pairs.question: Nefast
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Wicked.

qa_pairs.question: Negaprion
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of lemon sharks.

qa_pairs.question: Negation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of denying; assertion of the nonreality or untruthfulness of anything; declaration that something is not, or has not been, or will not be; denial; -- the opposite of Antonym: affirmation.

qa_pairs.question: Negative
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Denying; implying, containing, or asserting denial, negation or refusal; returning the answer no to an inquiry or request; refusing assent; as, a negative answer; a negative opinion; -- opposed to Antonym: affirmative.

qa_pairs.question: Negative
qa_pairs.answer: It means A proposition by which something is denied or forbidden; a conception or term formed by prefixing the negative particle to one which is positive; an opposite or contradictory term or conception.

qa_pairs.question: Negative
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To prove unreal or untrue; to disprove.

qa_pairs.question: Negatively
qa_pairs.answer: It means In a negative manner; with or by denial.

qa_pairs.question: Negativeness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being negative.

qa_pairs.question: Negatory
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Expressing denial; belonging to negation; negative.

qa_pairs.question: Negev
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A desert in Southern Israel.

qa_pairs.question: neginoth
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Stringed instruments.

qa_pairs.question: Neglect
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not to attend to with due care or attention; to forbear one's duty in regard to; to allow to pass unimproved, unheeded, undone, etc.; to omit; to disregard; to slight; as, to neglect duty or business; to neglect to pay debts.

qa_pairs.question: Neglect
qa_pairs.answer: It means Omission of proper attention; avoidance or disregard of duty, from heedlessness, indifference, or willfulness; failure to do, use, or heed anything; culpable disregard; as, neglect of business, of health, of economy.

qa_pairs.question: Neglectedness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The state of being neglected.

qa_pairs.question: Neglecter
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who neglects.

qa_pairs.question: Neglectful
qa_pairs.answer: It means Full of neglect; heedless; careless; negligent; inattentive; indifferent.

qa_pairs.question: Neglectingly
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Carelessly; heedlessly.

qa_pairs.question: Neglection
qa_pairs.answer: It means The state of being negligent; negligence.

qa_pairs.question: Neglective
qa_pairs.answer: It means Neglectful.

qa_pairs.question: neglige
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An easy, unceremonious attire; undress.

qa_pairs.question: Negligence
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being negligent; lack of due diligence or care; omission of duty; habitual neglect; heedlessness.

qa_pairs.question: Negligent
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Apt to neglect; customarily neglectful; characterized by negligence; careless; heedless; culpably careless; showing lack of attention; as, disposed in negligent order.

qa_pairs.question: Negligently
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In a negligent manner.

qa_pairs.question: Negligible
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is That may be neglected, disregarded, or left out of consideration; too small or unimportant to be worthy of notice.

qa_pairs.question: Negoce
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Business; occupation.

qa_pairs.question: Negotiability
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality of being negotiable or transferable by indorsement.

qa_pairs.question: Negotiable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Capable of being negotiated; transferable by assignment or indorsement to another person; as, a negotiable note or bill of exchange.

qa_pairs.question: Negotiant
qa_pairs.answer: It means A negotiator.

qa_pairs.question: Negotiate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To transact business; to carry on trade.

qa_pairs.question: Negotiate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To carry on negotiations concerning; to procure or arrange for by negotiation; as, to negotiate peace, or an exchange.

qa_pairs.question: Negotiation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act or process of negotiating; a treating with another respecting sale or purchase. etc.

qa_pairs.question: Negotiator
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who negotiates; a person who treats with others, either as principal or agent, in respect to purchase and sale, or public or private compacts.

qa_pairs.question: Negotiatory
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to negotiation.

qa_pairs.question: Negotiatrix
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A woman who negotiates.

qa_pairs.question: Negotiosity
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The state of being busy; multitude of business.

qa_pairs.question: Negotious
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Very busy; attentive to business; active.

qa_pairs.question: Negotiousness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state of being busily occupied; activity.

qa_pairs.question: Negress
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A black woman; a female negro.

qa_pairs.question: Negrita
qa_pairs.answer: It means A blackish fish (Hypoplectrus nigricans), of the Sea-bass family. It is a native of the West Indies and Florida.

qa_pairs.question: Negritic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to negroes; composed of negroes.

qa_pairs.question: Negritos
qa_pairs.answer: It means A degraded Papuan race, inhabiting Luzon and some of the other east Indian Islands. They resemble negroes, but are smaller in size. They are mostly nomads.

qa_pairs.question: Negro
qa_pairs.answer: It means A black man; especially, one of a race of black or very dark persons who inhabit the greater part of tropical Africa, and are distinguished by crisped or curly hair, flat noses, and thick protruding lips; also, any black person of unmixed African blood, wherever found.

qa_pairs.question: Negro
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to negroes; black.

qa_pairs.question: Negrohead
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An inferior commercial variety of India rubber made up into round masses.

qa_pairs.question: Negroid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Characteristic of the negro.

qa_pairs.question: Negroid
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A member of any one of several East African tribes whose physical characters show an admixture with other races.

qa_pairs.question: Negroloid
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Negroid.

qa_pairs.question: Negus
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A beverage made of wine, water, sugar, nutmeg, and lemon juice; -- so called, it is said, from its first maker, Colonel Negus.

qa_pairs.question: Nehiloth
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A term supposed to mean, perforated wind instruments of music, as pipes or flutes.

qa_pairs.question: Nehushtan
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A thing of brass; -- the name under which the Israelites worshiped the brazen serpent made by Moses.

qa_pairs.question: Neif
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A woman born in the state of villeinage; a female serf.

qa_pairs.question: Neif
qa_pairs.answer: It means The fist.

qa_pairs.question: Neigh
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To utter the cry of the horse; to whinny.

qa_pairs.question: Neigh
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The cry of a horse; a whinny.

qa_pairs.question: Neighbor
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A person who lives near another; one whose abode is not far off.

qa_pairs.question: Neighbor
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Near to another; adjoining; adjacent; next; neighboring.

qa_pairs.question: neighbor
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To adjoin; to border on; to be near to.

qa_pairs.question: Neighbor
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To dwell in the vicinity; to be a neighbor, or in the neighborhood; to be near.

qa_pairs.question: Neighborhood
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or condition of being a neighbor; the state of being or dwelling near; proximity.

qa_pairs.question: Neighboring
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Living or being near; adjacent; as, the neighboring nations or countries.

qa_pairs.question: Neighborliness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or state of being neighborly.

qa_pairs.question: Neighborly
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Appropriate to the relation of neighbors; having frequent or familiar intercourse; kind; civil; social; friendly.

qa_pairs.question: Neighborship
qa_pairs.answer: It means The state of being neighbors.

qa_pairs.question: neighbour
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as neighbor, neighboring, neighborhood, neighborly.

qa_pairs.question: Neishout
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The mahogany-like wood of the South African tree Pteroxylon utile, the sawdust of which causes violent sneezing (whence the name). Also called also known as sneezewood.

qa_pairs.question: Neither
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not either; not the one or the other.

qa_pairs.question: Neither
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not either; generally used to introduce the first of two or more coordinate clauses of which those that follow begin with nor.

qa_pairs.question: nekton
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The aggregate of actively swimming animals in a body of water ranging from microscopic organisms to whales.

qa_pairs.question: Nelumbo
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of great water lilies. The North American species is Nelumbo lutea, the Asiatic is the sacred lotus, Nelumbo speciosa.

qa_pairs.question: Nemaline
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having the form of threads; fibrous.

qa_pairs.question: Nemalite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A fibrous variety of brucite.

qa_pairs.question: Nematelmia
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Nemathelminthes.

qa_pairs.question: Nemathecium
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A peculiar kind of fructification on certain red algae, consisting of an external mass of filaments at length separating into tetraspores.

qa_pairs.question: Nemathelminthes
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An order of helminths, including the Nematoidea and Gordiacea; the roundworms.

qa_pairs.question: nemato-
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A combining form from Gr. nh^ma, nh`matos, a thread.

qa_pairs.question: nematoblast
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A spermatocyte or spermoblast.

qa_pairs.question: Nematocalyx
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of a peculiar kind of cups, or calicles, found upon hydroids of the family Plumularidae. They contain nematocysts. See Plumularia.

qa_pairs.question: Nematocera
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A suborder of dipterous insects, having long antennae, as the mosquito, gnat, and crane fly; -- called also also known as Nemocera.

qa_pairs.question: nematocidal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having the property of killing nematodes; lethal to nematodes.

qa_pairs.question: nematocide
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A substance that kills nematodes, especially one used in medicine or to kill plant pathogens.

qa_pairs.question: Nematocyst
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A lasso cell, or thread cell. See Lasso cell, under Lasso.

qa_pairs.question: Nematoda
qa_pairs.answer: It means A phylum of worms, having a long, round, and generally smooth body; the roundworms. They are mostly parasites, in plants and animals, but some are free-living in soil or water. Also called also known as Nematoidea.

qa_pairs.question: nematode
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Nematoid.

qa_pairs.question: nematode
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any worm of the phylum Nematoda; a roundworm; -- they are unsegmented worms having a cylindrical elongated body. They may live freely in soil or water, or as parasites in plants or animals.

qa_pairs.question: Nematogene
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of the dimorphic forms of the species of Dicyemata, which produced vermiform embryos; -- opposed to Antonym: rhombogene.

qa_pairs.question: Nematognath
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of the Nematognathi.

qa_pairs.question: Nematognathi
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An order of fishes having barbels on the jaws. It includes the catfishes, or siluroids. See Siluroid.

qa_pairs.question: Nematoid
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the Nematoda.

qa_pairs.question: Nematoidea
qa_pairs.answer: It means A phylum of worms, having a long, round, and generally smooth body; the roundworms. Called also also known as Nematodea, and more commonly also known as Nematoda. Formerly, it was classed as a taxonomic order.

qa_pairs.question: Nematoidean
qa_pairs.answer: It means Nematoid.

qa_pairs.question: Nematophora
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Coelenterata.

qa_pairs.question: Nemean
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to Nemea, in Argolis, where the ancient Greeks celebrated games, and Hercules killed a lion.

qa_pairs.question: Nemertean
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to the Nemertina.

qa_pairs.question: Nemertes
qa_pairs.answer: It means A genus of Nemertina.

qa_pairs.question: Nemertian
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Nemertean.

qa_pairs.question: Nemertid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Nemertean.

qa_pairs.question: Nemertida
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Nemertina.

qa_pairs.question: Nemertina
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An order of helminths usually having a long, slender, smooth, often bright-colored body, covered with minute vibrating cilia; -- called also also known as Nemertea, also known as Nemertida, and also known as Rhynchocoela.

qa_pairs.question: nemertine
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any of an order (Nemertina) of soft unsegmented marine worms having an eversible threadlike proboscis and the ability to stretch and contract.

qa_pairs.question: Nemesis
qa_pairs.answer: It means The goddess of retribution or vengeance; hence, retributive justice personified; divine vengeance.

qa_pairs.question: Nemophilist
