It is chemically very inert in the free state, and as such is incapable of supporting life (hence the name also known as azote still used by French chemists); but it forms many important compounds, such as ammonia, nitric acid, the cyanides, etc, and is a constituent of all organized living tissues, animal or vegetable. Symbol N. Atomic weight 14.007. It was formerly regarded as a permanent noncondensible gas, but was liquefied in 1877 by Cailletet of Paris, and Pictet of Geneva, and boils at -195.8 <deg/ C at atmospheric pressure. Liquid nitrogen is used as a refrigerant to store delicate materials, such as bacteria, cells, and other biological materials.

qa_pairs.question: Nitrogenize
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To combine, or impregnate, with nitrogen or its compounds.

qa_pairs.question: Nitrogenous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of, pertaining to, or resembling, nitrogen; as, a nitrogenous principle; nitrogenous compounds.

qa_pairs.question: Nitroglycerin
qa_pairs.answer: It means A liquid appearing like a heavy oil, colorless or yellowish, and consisting of a mixture of several glycerin salts of nitric acid, and hence more properly called also known as glycerin nitrate; also called also known as trinitroglycerin and also known as glyceryl trinitrate. It is made by the action of nitric acid on glycerin in the presence of sulphuric acid. It is extremely unstable and terribly explosive. A very dilute solution is used in medicine as a neurotic under the name of also known as glonion.

qa_pairs.question: Nitrohydrochloric
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of, pertaining to, or containing, nitric and hydrochloric acids.

qa_pairs.question: Nitrol
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any one of a series of hydrocarbons containing the nitro and the nitroso or isonitroso group united to the same carbon atom.

qa_pairs.question: Nitroleum
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Nitroglycerin.

qa_pairs.question: Nitrolic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of, derived from, or designating, a nitrol; as, a nitrolic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Nitromagnesite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Nitrate of magnesium, a saline efflorescence closely resembling nitrate of calcium.

qa_pairs.question: Nitrometer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An apparatus for determining the amount of nitrogen or some of its compounds in any substance subjected to analysis; an azotometer.

qa_pairs.question: Nitromethane
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A nitro derivative of methane (CH3.NO2), obtained as a mobile liquid; -- called also also known as nitrocarbol. It has been used as a rocket fuel and as a gasoline additive to add power to the fuel, especially in racing cars.

qa_pairs.question: Nitromuriatic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of, pertaining to, or composed of, nitric acid and muriatic acid; nitrohydrochloric. See Nitrohydrochloric.

qa_pairs.question: Nitrophnol
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any one of a series of nitro derivatives of phenol. They are yellow oily or crystalline substances and have well-defined acid properties, as picric acid.

qa_pairs.question: Nitroprussic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, derived from, or designating, a complex acid called nitroprussic acid, obtained indirectly by the action of nitric acid on potassium ferrocyanide (yellow prussiate), as a red crystalline unstable substance. It forms salts called nitroprussides, which give a rich purple color with alkaline sulphides.

qa_pairs.question: Nitroprusside
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Nitroprussic.

qa_pairs.question: Nitroquinol
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A hypothetical nitro derivative of quinol or hydroquinone, not known in the free state, but forming a well defined series of derivatives.

qa_pairs.question: Nitrosaccharin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An explosive nitro derivative of certain sugars, analogous to nitroglycerin, gun cotton, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Nitrosalicylic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of, pertaining to, or designating, a nitro derivative of salicylic acid, called also also known as anilic _acid_.

qa_pairs.question: Nitrose
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Nitrous.

qa_pairs.question: Nitroso-
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as (. (Chem.) A prefix (also used adjectively) designating the group or radical -NO, called the nitroso group, or its compounds.

qa_pairs.question: Nitrosyl
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The radical -NO, called also the also known as nitroso group. The term is sometimes loosely used to designate certain nitro compounds; as, nitrosyl sulphuric acid. Used also adjectively.

qa_pairs.question: Nitrosylic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of, pertaining to, or containing, nitrosyl; as, nitrosylic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Nitrous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of, pertaining to, or containing, niter; of the quality of niter, or resembling it.

qa_pairs.question: Nitroxyl
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The group -NO2, usually called the also known as nitro group.

qa_pairs.question: Nitrum
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Niter.

qa_pairs.question: Nitry
qa_pairs.answer: It means Nitrous.

qa_pairs.question: Nitryl
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A name sometimes given to the nitro group or radical.

qa_pairs.question: Nitter
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The horse louse; an insect that deposits nits on horses.

qa_pairs.question: Nittily
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Lousily.

qa_pairs.question: Nittings
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The refuse of good ore.

qa_pairs.question: Nitty
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Full of nits.

qa_pairs.question: Nitty
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Shining; elegant; spruce.

qa_pairs.question: Nival
qa_pairs.answer: It means Abounding with snow; snowy.

qa_pairs.question: Niveous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Snowy; resembling snow; partaking of the qualities of snow.

qa_pairs.question: Nivose
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The fourth month of the French republican calendar [1792-1806]. It commenced December 21, and ended January 19. See Vend<eacute/miaire.

qa_pairs.question: Nix
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of a class of water spirits, commonly described as of a mischievous disposition.

qa_pairs.question: Nixie
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Nix.

qa_pairs.question: Nixie clerk
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A post-office clerk in charge of the nixies.

qa_pairs.question: Nizam
qa_pairs.answer: It means The title of the native sovereigns of Hyderabad, in India, since 1719.

qa_pairs.question: Nizam
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A regular soldier of the Turkish army. See Army organization, above.

qa_pairs.question: Njord
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Chief of the Vanir; god of the sea and winds and prosperity; father of Frey and Freya; sometimes subsumes Teutonic Nerthus.

qa_pairs.question: NNE
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is north northeast; the compass point that is midway between north and northeast.

qa_pairs.question: NNW
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as north northwest; the compass point that is midway between north and northwest.

qa_pairs.question: No
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not any; not one; none; as, yes, we have no bananas; -- often used as a quantifier.

qa_pairs.question: No
qa_pairs.answer: It means Nay; not; not at all; not in any respect or degree; -- a word expressing negation, denial, or refusal. Before or after another negative, no is emphatic.

qa_pairs.question: No
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A refusal by use of the word no; a denial.

qa_pairs.question: no.
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Number; -- the number designating place in an ordered sequence; as, no. 2.

qa_pairs.question: Noachian
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to the patriarch Noah, or to his time.

qa_pairs.question: Noah
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A patriarch of Biblical history, in the time of the Deluge.

qa_pairs.question: Noahs ark
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The ship built by Noah according to God's command, as related in the bible.

qa_pairs.question: Nob
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The head.

qa_pairs.question: Nob
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A person in a superior position in life; a nobleman.

qa_pairs.question: Nobbily
qa_pairs.answer: It means In a nobby manner.

qa_pairs.question: Nobbler
qa_pairs.answer: It means A dram of spirits.

qa_pairs.question: Nobby
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Stylish; modish; elegant; showy; aristocratic; fashionable.

qa_pairs.question: Nobel prize
qa_pairs.answer: It means Prizes for the encouragement of men and women who work for the interests of humanity, established by the will of Alfred B. Nobel (1833-1896), the Swedish inventor of dynamite, who left his entire estate for this purpose. They are awarded yearly for what is regarded as the most important work during the year in physics, chemistry, medicine or physiology, idealistic literature, and service in the interest of peace. The prizes, averaging $40,000 each, were first awarded in 1901. The monetary value of the awards have increased each year, to near one million U. S. dollars by the end of the 20th century.

qa_pairs.question: Noberts lines
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Fine lines ruled on glass in a series of groups of different closeness of line, and used to test the power of a microscope.

qa_pairs.question: Nobiliary
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the nobility.

qa_pairs.question: Nobiliary
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A history of noble families.

qa_pairs.question: Nobilify
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To make noble; to nobiliate.

qa_pairs.question: Nobilis rings
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Colored rings formed upon a metal plate by the electrolytic disposition of copper, lead peroxide, etc. They may be produced by touching with a pointed zinc rod a silver plate on which is a solution of copper sulphate.

qa_pairs.question: Nobilitate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To make noble; to ennoble; to exalt.

qa_pairs.question: Nobilitation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of making noble.

qa_pairs.question: Nobility
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being noble; superiority of mind or of character; commanding excellence; eminence.

qa_pairs.question: Noble
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Possessing eminence, elevation, dignity, etc.; above whatever is low, mean, degrading, or dishonorable; magnanimous; as, a noble nature or action; a noble heart.

qa_pairs.question: Noble
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A person of rank above a commoner; a nobleman; a peer.

qa_pairs.question: Noble
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To make noble; to ennoble.

qa_pairs.question: Nobleman
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One of the nobility; a noble; a peer; one who enjoys rank above a commoner, either by virtue of birth, by office, or by patent.

qa_pairs.question: Noble-minded
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having a noble mind; of high moral or intellectual character; honorable; magnanimous.

qa_pairs.question: noble-mindedness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as elevated ideals or conduct.

qa_pairs.question: Nobleness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being noble; greatness; dignity; magnanimity; elevation of mind, character, or station; nobility; grandeur; stateliness.

qa_pairs.question: Nobless
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Dignity; greatness; noble birth or condition.

qa_pairs.question: Noblewoman
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A female of noble rank; a peeress.

qa_pairs.question: Nobley
qa_pairs.answer: It means The body of nobles; the nobility.

qa_pairs.question: Nobly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of noble extraction; as, nobly born or descended.

qa_pairs.question: Nobody
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as No person; no one; not anybody.

qa_pairs.question: Nocake
qa_pairs.answer: It means Indian corn parched, and beaten to powder, -- used for food by the Northern American Indians.

qa_pairs.question: Nocent
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Doing hurt, or having a tendency to hurt; hurtful; mischievous; noxious; as, nocent qualities.

qa_pairs.question: Nocent
qa_pairs.answer: It means A criminal.

qa_pairs.question: Nocently
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Hurtfully; injuriously.

qa_pairs.question: Nocive
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Hurtful; injurious.

qa_pairs.question: Nock
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A notch.

qa_pairs.question: Nock
qa_pairs.answer: It means To notch; to fit to the string, as an arrow; to string, as a bow.

qa_pairs.question: Noctambulation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Somnambulism; sleepwalking; walking in one's sleep.

qa_pairs.question: Noctambulism
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Somnambulism.

qa_pairs.question: Noctambulist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A somnambulist; a sleepwalker.

qa_pairs.question: Noctambulo
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A noctambulist; a sleepwalker.

qa_pairs.question: Noctidial
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Comprising a night and a day; as, a noctidial day.

qa_pairs.question: Noctiferous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Bringing night.

qa_pairs.question: Noctilionid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A South American bat of the genus *Noctilio*, having cheek pouches and large incisor teeth.

qa_pairs.question: Noctiluca
qa_pairs.answer: It means That which shines at night; -- a fanciful name for phosphorus.

qa_pairs.question: Noctilucin
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A fatlike substance in certain marine animals, to which they owe their phosphorescent properties.

qa_pairs.question: Noctilucine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to *Noctiluca*.

qa_pairs.question: Noctilucous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Shining in the night.

qa_pairs.question: Noctivagant
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Going about in the night; night-wandering.

qa_pairs.question: Noctivagation
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A roving or going about in the night.

qa_pairs.question: Noctivagous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Noctivagant.

qa_pairs.question: Noctograph
qa_pairs.answer: It means A kind of writing frame for the blind.

qa_pairs.question: Noctuary
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A record of what passes in the night; a nightly journal; -- distinguished from diary.

qa_pairs.question: Noctuid
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any one of numerous moths of the family Noctuidae, or Noctuaelitae, as the cutworm moths, and armyworm moths; -- so called because they fly at night.

qa_pairs.question: Noctule
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A large European bat (Vespertilio altivolans syn. Noctulina altivolans).

qa_pairs.question: Nocturn
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An office of devotion, or act of religious service, by night.

qa_pairs.question: Nocturnal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of, pertaining to, done or occuring in, the night; as, nocturnal darkness, cries, expedition, etc.; -- opposed to Antonym: diurnal.

qa_pairs.question: Nocturnal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An instrument formerly used for taking the altitude of the stars, etc., at sea.

qa_pairs.question: Nocturnally
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is By night; nightly.

qa_pairs.question: Nocturne
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A night piece, or serenade. The name is now used for a certain graceful and expressive form of instrumental composition, as the nocturne for orchestra in Mendelsohn's <ldquo/Midsummer-Night's Dream<rdquo/ music.

qa_pairs.question: Nocument
qa_pairs.answer: It means Harm; injury; detriment.

qa_pairs.question: Nocuous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Hurtful; noxious.

qa_pairs.question: Nod
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To bend or incline the upper part, with a quick motion; as, nodding plumes.

qa_pairs.question: Nod
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To incline or bend, as the head or top; to make a motion of assent, of salutation, or of drowsiness with; as, to nod the head.

qa_pairs.question: Nod
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A dropping or bending forward of the upper part or top of anything.

qa_pairs.question: Nodal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of the nature of, or relating to, a node; as, a nodal point.

qa_pairs.question: Nodated
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Knotted.

qa_pairs.question: Nodation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Act of making a knot, or state of being knotted.

qa_pairs.question: Nodder
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who nods; a drowsy person.

qa_pairs.question: Nodding
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Curved so that the apex hangs down; having the top bent downward.

qa_pairs.question: Noddle
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The head; also, also known as noodle; -- used jocosely or contemptuously.

qa_pairs.question: Noddy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A simpleton; a fool.

qa_pairs.question: Node
qa_pairs.answer: It means A knot, a knob; a protuberance; a swelling.

qa_pairs.question: Nodical
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to the nodes; from a node to the same node again; as, the nodical revolutions of the moon.

qa_pairs.question: Nodosarine
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Resembling in form or structure a foraminiferous shell of the genus *Nodosaria*.

qa_pairs.question: Nodose
qa_pairs.answer: It means Knotty; having numerous or conspicuous nodes.

qa_pairs.question: Nodosity
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality of being knotty or nodose; resemblance to a node or swelling; knottiness.

qa_pairs.question: Nodosous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Nodose; knotty; knotted.

qa_pairs.question: Nodular
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to a nodule or knot.

qa_pairs.question: nodulated
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having nodules or occurring in the form of nodules.

qa_pairs.question: Nodule
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A rounded mass or irregular shape; a little knot or lump.

qa_pairs.question: Noduled
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having little knots or lumps.

qa_pairs.question: Nodulose
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having small nodes or knots; diminutively nodose.

qa_pairs.question: Noel
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Nowel.

qa_pairs.question: Noematachograph
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An instrument for determining and registering the duration of more or less complex operations of the mind.

qa_pairs.question: Noematic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to the understanding.

qa_pairs.question: Noemics
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The science of the understanding; intellectual science.

qa_pairs.question: Noetian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of the followers of Noetus, who lived in the third century. He denied the distinct personality of the Father, Son, and Holy Ghost.

qa_pairs.question: Noetic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the intellect; intellectual.

qa_pairs.question: Nof
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not of; nor of.

qa_pairs.question: Nog
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A noggin.

qa_pairs.question: Nog
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A wooden block, of the size of a brick, built into a wall, as a hold for the nails of woodwork.

qa_pairs.question: Nog
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To fill in, as between scantling, with brickwork.

qa_pairs.question: Noggen
qa_pairs.answer: It means Made of hemp; hence, hard; rough; harsh.

qa_pairs.question: Noggin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A small mug or cup.

qa_pairs.question: Nogging
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Rough brick masonry used to fill in the interstices of a wooden frame, in building.

qa_pairs.question: Noght
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not.

qa_pairs.question: no-go
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not functioning properly or in suitable condition for proceeding; as, the space launch was no-go. Opposite of Antonym: go, (a.)

qa_pairs.question: no-goal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as a nonexistent goal; as, he lived without a reason progressing toward no-goal.

qa_pairs.question: no-good
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is without merit; useless; as, the car was a no-good piece of junk.

qa_pairs.question: nogoodnik
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A worthless, disreputable, or malicious person.

qa_pairs.question: no-hit
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is having no hits; characterized by one team scoring no hits; -- of a baseball game (or the pitching) in which a pitcher allows the opponent no hits; as, he pitched no-hit ball for seven innings. A no-hit game is usually referred to as a no-hitter; as, His no-hit pitching.

qa_pairs.question: no-hitter
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A game in which a pitcher allows the opposing team no hits.

qa_pairs.question: Noiance
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Annoyance.

qa_pairs.question: Noie
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To annoy. See Noy.

qa_pairs.question: Noier
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An annoyer.

qa_pairs.question: Noil
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A short or waste piece or knot of wool separated from the longer staple by combing; also, a similar piece or shred of waste silk.

qa_pairs.question: Noils
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Waste and knots of wool removed by the comb; combings.

qa_pairs.question: Noint
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To anoint.

qa_pairs.question: Noious
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Annoying; troublesome.

qa_pairs.question: Noise
qa_pairs.answer: It means Sound of any kind.

qa_pairs.question: Noise
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To sound; to make a noise.

qa_pairs.question: Noise
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To spread by rumor or report.

qa_pairs.question: Noiseful
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Loud; clamorous.

qa_pairs.question: Noiseless
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Making, or causing, no noise or bustle; without noise; silent; as, the noiseless foot of time.

qa_pairs.question: noisemaker
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any device (such as a clapper or bell or horn) used to make a loud noise at a celebration.

qa_pairs.question: Noisette
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A hybrid rose produced in 1817, by a French gardener, Noisette, of Charleston, South Carolina, from the China rose and the musk rose. It has given rise to many fine varieties, as the Lamarque, the Marechal (or Marshal) Niel, and the Cloth of gold. Most roses of this class have clustered flowers and are of vigorous growth.

qa_pairs.question: Noisily
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In a noisy manner.

qa_pairs.question: Noisiness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The state or quality of being noisy.

qa_pairs.question: Noisome
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Noxious to health; hurtful; mischievous; unwholesome; insalubrious; destructive; as, noisome effluvia.

qa_pairs.question: Noisy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Making a noise, esp. a loud sound; clamorous; vociferous; turbulent; boisterous; as, the noisy crowd.

qa_pairs.question: Nolde
qa_pairs.answer: It means Would not.

qa_pairs.question: Nole
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The head.

qa_pairs.question: Noli-me-tangere
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any plant of a genus of herbs (*Impatiens*) having capsules which, if touched when ripe, discharge their seeds. -- See Impatiens.

qa_pairs.question: Nolition
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Adverse action of will; unwillingness; -- opposed to Antonym: volition.

qa_pairs.question: Noll
qa_pairs.answer: It means The head; the noodle.

qa_pairs.question: Nolleity
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The state of being unwilling; nolition.

qa_pairs.question: Nolle prosequi
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Will not prosecute; -- an entry on the record, denoting that a plaintiff discontinues his suit, or the attorney for the public a prosecution; either wholly, or as to some count, or as to some of several defendants.

qa_pairs.question: Nolo contendere
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A plea, by the defendant, in a criminal prosecution, which, without admitting guilt, subjects him to all the consequences of a plea of guilty.

qa_pairs.question: Nol. pros.
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An abbrev. of Nolle prosequi.

qa_pairs.question: Nol-pros
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To discontinue by entering a nolle prosequi; to decline to prosecute.

qa_pairs.question: Nolt
qa_pairs.answer: It means Neat cattle.

qa_pairs.question: Nom
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Name.

qa_pairs.question: Noma
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Canker, (n.), 1.

qa_pairs.question: Nomad
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of a race or tribe that has no fixed location, but wanders from place to place in search of pasture or game.

qa_pairs.question: Nomad
qa_pairs.answer: It means Roving; nomadic.

qa_pairs.question: Nomade
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Nomad, (n.)

qa_pairs.question: Nomadian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A nomad.

qa_pairs.question: Nomadic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to nomads, or their way of life; wandering; moving from place to place for subsistence; as, a nomadic tribe.

qa_pairs.question: Nomadism
qa_pairs.answer: It means The state of being a nomad.

qa_pairs.question: Nomadize
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To lead the life of a nomad; to wander with flocks and herds for the sake of finding pasturage.

qa_pairs.question: Nomancy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The art or practice of divining the destiny of persons by the letters which form their names.

qa_pairs.question: No-mans land
qa_pairs.answer: It means A space amidships used to keep blocks, ropes, etc.; a space on a ship belonging to no one in particular to care for.

qa_pairs.question: Nomarch
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The chief magistrate of a nome or nomarchy.

qa_pairs.question: Nomarchy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A province or territorial division of a kingdom, under the rule of a nomarch, as in modern Greece; a nome.

qa_pairs.question: Nombles
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The entrails of a deer; the umbles.

qa_pairs.question: Nombril
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A point halfway between the fess point and the middle base point of an escutcheon; -- called also also known as navel point. See Escutcheon.

qa_pairs.question: Nome
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A province or political division, as of modern Greece or ancient Egypt; a nomarchy.

qa_pairs.question: Nome
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Term.

qa_pairs.question: Nome
qa_pairs.answer: It means (p. p.) of Nim.

qa_pairs.question: Nomenclator
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who calls persons or things by their names.

qa_pairs.question: Nomenclatress
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A female nomenclator.

qa_pairs.question: Nomenclatural
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining or according to a nomenclature.

qa_pairs.question: Nomenclature
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A name.

qa_pairs.question: Nomial
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A name or term.

qa_pairs.question: Nomic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Customary; ordinary; -- applied to the usual English spelling, in distinction from strictly phonetic methods.

qa_pairs.question: Nominal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to a name or names; having to do with the literal meaning of a word; verbal; as, a nominal definition.

qa_pairs.question: Nominal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A nominalist.

qa_pairs.question: Nominalism
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The principles or philosophy of the Nominalists.

qa_pairs.question: Nominalist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of a sect of philosophers in the Middle Ages, who adopted the opinion of Roscelin, that general conceptions, or universals, exist in name only.

qa_pairs.question: Nominalistic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the Nominalists.

qa_pairs.question: Nominalize
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To convert into a noun; as, a nominalized sentence; a nominalized adjective or verb.

qa_pairs.question: Nominally
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In a nominal manner; by name; in name only; not in reality.

qa_pairs.question: Nominate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To mention by name; to name.

qa_pairs.question: Nominately
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as By name; particularly; namely.

qa_pairs.question: Nomination
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of naming or nominating; designation of a person as a candidate for office; the power of nominating; the state of being nominated; as, to win the nomination.

qa_pairs.question: Nominatival
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the nominative case.

qa_pairs.question: Nominative
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Giving a name; naming; designating; -- said of that case or form of a noun which stands as the subject of a finite verb.

qa_pairs.question: Nominatively
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In the manner of a nominative; as a nominative.

qa_pairs.question: Nominator
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who nominates.

qa_pairs.question: Nominee
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A person named, or designated, by another, to any office, duty, or position; one nominated, or proposed, by others for office or for election to office. One remains a nominee until one has been elected or has assumed the office.

qa_pairs.question: Nominor
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A nominator.

qa_pairs.question: Nomocracy
qa_pairs.answer: It means Government in accordance with a system of law.

qa_pairs.question: Nomography
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A treatise on laws; an exposition of the form proper for laws.

qa_pairs.question: Nomology
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The science of law; legislation.

qa_pairs.question: Nomopelmous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having a separate and simple tendon to flex the first toe, or hallux, as do passerine birds.

qa_pairs.question: Nomothete
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A lawgiver.

qa_pairs.question: Nomothetic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Legislative; enacting laws; as, a nomothetical power.

qa_pairs.question: Non
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is No; not. See No, (a.)

qa_pairs.question: Non-
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A prefix used in the sense of not; un-; in-; as in nonattention, or non-attention, nonconformity, nonmetallic, nonsuit.

qa_pairs.question: Nona
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The Fate who spins the thread of life; counterpart of Greek Clotho.

qa_pairs.question: Nonability
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Want of ability.

qa_pairs.question: nonabsorbent
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is not capable of absorbing or soaking up (liquids). Opposite of Antonym: absorbent.

qa_pairs.question: Nonacceptance
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A neglect or refusal to accept.

qa_pairs.question: Nonacid
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Destitute of acid properties; hence, basic; metallic; positive; -- said of certain atoms and radicals.

qa_pairs.question: Nonacquaintance
qa_pairs.answer: It means Want of acquaintance; the state of being unacquainted.

qa_pairs.question: Nonacquiescence
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Refusal of acquiescence; failure to yield or comply.

qa_pairs.question: Nonadmission
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Failure to be admitted.

qa_pairs.question: nonadsorbent
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is lacking capacity to adsorb or cause to accumulate on a surface. Opposite of Antonym: adsorbent.

qa_pairs.question: Nonadult
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not adult; immature.

qa_pairs.question: Nonaerobiotic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Capable of living without atmospheric oxygen; anaerobic.

qa_pairs.question: Nonage
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The ninth part of movable goods, formerly payable to the clergy on the death of persons in their parishes.

qa_pairs.question: Nonage
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Time of life before a person becomes of age; legal immaturity; minority.

qa_pairs.question: Nonaged
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having the quality of nonage; being a minor; immature.

qa_pairs.question: Nonagenarian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A person ninety years old.

qa_pairs.question: Nonagesimal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the ninetieth degree or to a nonagesimal.

qa_pairs.question: Nonagesimal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The middle or highest point of the part of the ecliptic which is at any given moment above the horizon. It is the ninetieth degree of the ecliptic, reckoned from the points in which it is intersected by the horizon.

qa_pairs.question: Nonagon
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A plane figure or polygon having nine sides and nine angles.

qa_pairs.question: Nonagrian
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any moth of the genus *Nonagria* and allied genera, as the spindleworm and stalk borer.

qa_pairs.question: Nonalienation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Failure to alienate; also, the state of not being alienated.

qa_pairs.question: Nonane
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of a group of metameric hydrocarbons C9H20 of the paraffin series; -- so called because of the nine carbon atoms in the molecule. Normal nonane is a colorless volatile liquid, an ingredient of ordinary kerosene.

qa_pairs.question: Nonappearance
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Default of appearance, as in court, to prosecute or defend; failure to appear.

qa_pairs.question: Nonappointment
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Neglect of making appointment; failure to receive an appointment.

qa_pairs.question: nonarboreal
qa_pairs.answer: It means not arboreal; not living in trees; -- of animals. Opposite of Antonym: arboreal.

qa_pairs.question: Nonarrival
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Failure to arrive.

qa_pairs.question: nonassociative
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not associative. Opposite of Antonym: associative.

qa_pairs.question: Non assumpsit
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The general plea or denial in an action of assumpsit.

qa_pairs.question: nonastringent
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is noncontractive. Opposite of Antonym: astringent.

qa_pairs.question: Nonattendance
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A failure to attend; omission of attendance; nonappearance.

qa_pairs.question: Nonattention
qa_pairs.answer: It means Inattention.

qa_pairs.question: non-automatic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as same as hand-operated.

qa_pairs.question: nonbearing
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is supporting no vertical weight other than its own; -- of a structural member; as, a non-bearing wall.

qa_pairs.question: nonbelligerent
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not directly at war; as, nonbelligerent nations.

qa_pairs.question: nonbelligerent
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A country which is not involved in a war.

qa_pairs.question: Nonbituminous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Containing no bitumen; not bituminous.

qa_pairs.question: noncarbonated
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is not having supersaturated carbon dioxide in solution; not carbonated; -- of beverages.

qa_pairs.question: non-Catholic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not Roman Catholic; not adhering to the Catholic religion.

qa_pairs.question: non-Catholic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A person who is not a Roman Catholic.

qa_pairs.question: noncausal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as not causal.

qa_pairs.question: noncausative
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not causative. Opposite of Antonym: causative.

qa_pairs.question: Nonce
qa_pairs.answer: It means The one or single occasion; the present call or purpose; -- chiefly used in the phrase for the nonce, i. e. for the present time.

qa_pairs.question: noncellular
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not made up of or divided into cells. Opposite of Antonym: cellular.

qa_pairs.question: Nonchalance
qa_pairs.answer: It means Indifference; carelessness; coolness.

qa_pairs.question: Nonchalant
qa_pairs.answer: It means Indifferent; careless; cool.

qa_pairs.question: Nonchalantly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In a nonchalant, indifferent, or careless manner; coolly.

qa_pairs.question: Nonclaim
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A failure to make claim within the time limited by law; omission of claim.

qa_pairs.question: Noncohesion
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Want of cohesion.

qa_pairs.question: Noncoincidence
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Lack of coincidence.

qa_pairs.question: Noncoincident
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not coincident.

qa_pairs.question: noncollapsable
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is not able to be folded into a compact form. Opposite of Antonym: collapsible.

qa_pairs.question: noncolumned
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is not having columns.

qa_pairs.question: noncom
qa_pairs.answer: It means A noncommissioned officer; a military officer appointed from enlisted personnel.

qa_pairs.question: Noncombatant
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any person connected with an army, or within the lines of an army, who does not make it his business to fight, as any one of the medical officers and their assistants, chaplains, and others; also, any of the citizens of a place occupied by an army; also, any one holding a similar position with respect to the navy.

qa_pairs.question: noncombinative
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as not combinative. Opposite of Antonym: combinative.

qa_pairs.question: noncombining
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is not able to combine.

qa_pairs.question: noncombustible
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not combustible; not able to burn; as, drapery should be made of noncombustible materials. Opposite of Antonym: combustible.

qa_pairs.question: noncommercial
qa_pairs.answer: It means not connected with or engaged in commercial enterprises. Opposite of Antonym: commercial.

qa_pairs.question: Noncommissioned
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not having a commission.

qa_pairs.question: Noncommittal
qa_pairs.answer: It means A state of not being committed or pledged; forbearance or refusal to commit one's self. Also used adjectively.

qa_pairs.question: noncommital
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not expressing a preference; as, although favoring European unity he was noncommittal about the form it should take.

qa_pairs.question: Noncommunion
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Neglect or failure of communion.

qa_pairs.question: Noncompletion
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Lack of completion; failure to complete.

qa_pairs.question: Noncompliance
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Neglect of compliance; failure to comply.

qa_pairs.question: Noncomplying
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Neglecting or refusing to comply.

qa_pairs.question: Non compos
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not of sound mind; not having the regular use of reason; hence, also, as a noun, an idiot; a lunatic; one devoid of reason, either by nature or from accident.

qa_pairs.question: Noncon.
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Noncontent.

qa_pairs.question: Nonconcluding
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not concluding.

qa_pairs.question: Nonconcur
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To dissent or refuse to concur.

qa_pairs.question: Nonconcurrence
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Refusal to concur.

qa_pairs.question: Noncondensible
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not condensible; incapable of being liquefied; -- said of gases.

qa_pairs.question: Noncondensing
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not condensing; discharging the steam from the cylinder at a pressure nearly equal to or above that of the atmosphere and not into a condenser.

qa_pairs.question: Nonconducting
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not conducting; nonconductive; not transmitting a fluid or force; -- used especially of electric current; thus, in electricity, wax is a nonconducting substance.

qa_pairs.question: Nonconduction
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality of not being able to conduct or transmit; failure to conduct.

qa_pairs.question: Nonconductor
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A substance which does not conduct, that is, convey or transmit, heat, electricity, sound, vibration, or the like, or which transmits them with difficulty; an insulator; as, wool is a nonconductor of heat; glass and dry wood are nonconductors of electricity.

qa_pairs.question: Nonconforming
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not conforming; declining conformity; especially, not conforming to the established church of a country.

qa_pairs.question: Nonconformist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who does not conform to an established church; especially, one who does not conform to the established church of England; a dissenter.

qa_pairs.question: Nonconformity
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Neglect or failure of conformity; especially, in England, the neglect or refusal to unite with the established church in its rites and modes of worship.

qa_pairs.question: Nonconstat
qa_pairs.answer: It means It does not appear; it is not plain or clear; it does not follow.

qa_pairs.question: Noncontagious
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not contagious; not catching; not communicable by contact.

qa_pairs.question: Noncontent
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who gives a negative vote; -- sometimes abridged into noncon. or non con.

qa_pairs.question: Noncontributing
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not contributing.

qa_pairs.question: noncurrent
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not current or belonging to the present time. Opposite of Antonym: current.

qa_pairs.question: noncyclic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not occurring in cycles; not cyclic. Opposite of Antonym: cyclic.

qa_pairs.question: Nonda
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The edible plumlike fruit of the Australian tree, Parinarium Nonda.

qa_pairs.question: Nondecane
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A hydrocarbon of the paraffin series, a white waxy substance, C19H40; -- so called from the number of carbon atoms in the molecule.

qa_pairs.question: Nondeciduate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Characterized by the absence of a decidua; indeciduate.

qa_pairs.question: nondecisive
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as not crucial; not comprising a decisive factor in a result. Opposite of Antonym: crucial and Antonym: decisive.

qa_pairs.question: nondeductible
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is not allowable as a tax deduction; as, political contributions are nondeductible. Opposite of Antonym: deductible.

qa_pairs.question: Nondelivery
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A neglect or failure of delivery; omission of delivery.

qa_pairs.question: nondenominational
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not restricted to a particular religious denomination; as, a nondenominational school.

qa_pairs.question: Nondeposition
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A failure to deposit or throw down.

qa_pairs.question: nondescript
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not hitherto described;

qa_pairs.question: Nondescript
qa_pairs.answer: It means A thing not yet described; that of which no account or explanation has been given; something abnormal, or hardly classifiable.

qa_pairs.question: Nondevelopment
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Failure or lack of development.

qa_pairs.question: Nondiscovery
qa_pairs.answer: It means Want or failure of discovery.

qa_pairs.question: nondiscrimination
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Fairness in treating people without prejudice; -- used mostly in reference to discrimination based on race, religion, and nationality.

qa_pairs.question: non-discriminatory
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Fair and unbiased; not discriminating; not biased against a particular group or type of person.

qa_pairs.question: Nondo
qa_pairs.answer: It means A coarse umbelliferous plant (Ligusticum actaeifolium) with a large aromatic root. It is found chiefly in the Alleghany region. Also called also known as Angelico.

qa_pairs.question: None
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is No one; not one; not anything; -- frequently used also partitively, or as a plural, not any.

qa_pairs.question: None
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Nones, 2.

qa_pairs.question: Noneffective
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not effective; ineffective.

qa_pairs.question: Non-ego
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The union of being and relation as distinguished from, and contrasted with, the ego. See Ego.

qa_pairs.question: Nonelastic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not having elasticity; not able to be stretched reversibly.

qa_pairs.question: Nonelect
qa_pairs.answer: It means A person or persons not elected, or chosen, to salvation.

qa_pairs.question: Nonelection
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Failure of election.

qa_pairs.question: Nonelectric
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not electric; conducting electricity.

qa_pairs.question: Nonelectric
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A substance that is not an insulator (i. e., an electric); that which transmits electricity, as a metal; a conductor.

qa_pairs.question: Nonemphatic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having no emphasis; unemphatic.

qa_pairs.question: non-engagement
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Withdrawal from the activities of a group.

qa_pairs.question: Nonentity
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Nonexistence; the negation of being.

qa_pairs.question: Non-Episcopal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not Episcopal; not pertaining to the Episcopal church or system.

qa_pairs.question: nonequivalent
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not equal or interchangeable in value, quantity, or significance.

qa_pairs.question: Nones
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The fifth day of the months January, February, April, June, August, September, November, and December, and the seventh day of March, May, July, and October. The nones were nine days before the ides, reckoning inclusively, according to the Roman method.

qa_pairs.question: Nonessential
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not essential.

qa_pairs.question: Nonessential
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A thing not essential.

qa_pairs.question: Non est factum
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The plea of the general issue in an action of debt on bond.

qa_pairs.question: Non est inventus
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The return of a sheriff on a writ, when the defendant is not found in his county.

qa_pairs.question: Nonesuch
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A person or thing of a sort that there is no other such; something extraordinary; a thing that has not its equal. It is given as a name to various objects, as to a choice variety of apple, a species of medic (Medicago lupulina), a variety of pottery clay, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Nonet
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A composition for nine instruments, rarely for nine voices.

qa_pairs.question: Nonett
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The titmouse.

qa_pairs.question: Nonexecution
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Neglect or failure of execution; nonperformance.

qa_pairs.question: nonexempt
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not exempt; subject to (some specified) rule. Opposite of Antonym: exempt.

qa_pairs.question: Nonexistence
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The state of not existing; absence of existence; the negation of being; -- usually used with reference to existince in the real world, or logical possiblity; as, the nonexistence of vaporware does not go unnoticed long.

qa_pairs.question: Nonexistent
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not having existence.

qa_pairs.question: nonexploratory
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is not exploratory. Opposite of Antonym: exploratory.

qa_pairs.question: nonexplosive
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not explosive.

qa_pairs.question: Nonexportation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A failure of exportation; a not exporting of commodities.

qa_pairs.question: nonextant
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is No longer existing; inaccessible through loss or destruction.

qa_pairs.question: Nonextensile
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not extensile; incapable of being stretched.

qa_pairs.question: Non-feasance
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An omission or neglect to do something, esp. that which ought to have been done. Cf. Malfeasance.

qa_pairs.question: non-finite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Infinitive, uninflected; -- of verbs. Opposite of Antonym: finite.

qa_pairs.question: nonfissile
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not fissile. Opposite of Antonym: fissile.

qa_pairs.question: nonfissionable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is not capable of undergoing fission{4}; -- of atoms or chemical elements. Opposite of Antonym: fissionable.

qa_pairs.question: nonflammable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not easily ignited, and burning only slowly if ignited.

qa_pairs.question: Nonfulfillment
qa_pairs.answer: It means Neglect or failure to fulfill.

qa_pairs.question: nonfunctional
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not having or performing a function.

qa_pairs.question: nonglutenous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is not sticky or viscous.

qa_pairs.question: nongregarious
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not growing or living in groups or colonies; -- of plants and animals.

qa_pairs.question: nonhereditary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not inheritable through genetic transmission. Opposite of Antonym: inheritable, and Antonym: heritable.

qa_pairs.question: nonhierarchic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not arranged in a hierarchy. Opposite of Antonym: hierarchical.

qa_pairs.question: nonhuman
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not human. Opposite of Antonym: human.

qa_pairs.question: Nonillion
qa_pairs.answer: It means According to the French and American notation, a thousand octillions, or a unit with thirty ciphers annexed; according to the English notation, a million octillions, or a unit with fifty-four ciphers annexed. See the Note under Numeration.

qa_pairs.question: nonimitative
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as not marked by or given to imitation. Opposite of Antonym: imitative.

qa_pairs.question: nonimmune
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not having immunity; susceptible; likely to be affected with, if exposed.

qa_pairs.question: Nonimportation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Want or failure of importation; a not importing of commodities.

qa_pairs.question: Nonimporting
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not importing; not bringing from foreign countries.

qa_pairs.question: nonindulgent
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as not indulgent.

qa_pairs.question: nonindustrial
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is not industrial; -- used of societies. Opposite of Antonym: industrial and Antonym: industrialized.

qa_pairs.question: noninfectious
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is not infectious; --of diseases. Opposite of Antonym: infectious.

qa_pairs.question: noninflammatory
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is not inflammatory.

qa_pairs.question: Noninflectional
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not admitting of, or characterized by, inflection.

qa_pairs.question: Noninhabitant
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who is not an inhabitant; a stranger; a foreigner; a nonresident.

qa_pairs.question: noninheritable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as not capable of transmission by heredity. Opposite of Antonym: inheritable.

qa_pairs.question: noninstitutional
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is not institutional. Opposite of Antonym: institutional.

qa_pairs.question: noninstitutionalized
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is not committed to an institution; -- op people. Opposite of Antonym: institutionalized.

qa_pairs.question: nonintegrated
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is not integrated. Opposite of Antonym: integrated.

qa_pairs.question: nonintellectual
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not intellectual. Opposite of Antonym: intellectual.

qa_pairs.question: noninterchangeable
qa_pairs.answer: It means not able to be interchanged without changing the truth value.

qa_pairs.question: noninterference
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is a foreign policy of staying out of other countries' disputes; nonintervention.

qa_pairs.question: nonintersecting
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as not sharing a common point; -- of lines, planes, or surfaces.

qa_pairs.question: Nonintervention
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The state or habit of not intervening or interfering; as, the nonintervention of one state in the affairs of another.

qa_pairs.question: non-involvement
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as withdrawing from the activities of a group.

qa_pairs.question: non-issue
qa_pairs.answer: It means the state of something that has outlived its relevance.

qa_pairs.question: Nonius
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A vernier.

qa_pairs.question: non-Jew
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A person who is not Jewish.

qa_pairs.question: Nonjoinder
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The omission of some person who ought to have been made a plaintiff or defendant in a suit, or of some cause of action which ought to be joined.

qa_pairs.question: Nonjurant
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Nonjuring.

qa_pairs.question: Nonjuring
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not swearing allegiance; -- applied to the party in Great Britain that would not swear allegiance to William and Mary, or their successors.

qa_pairs.question: Nonjuror
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of those adherents of James II. who refused to take the oath of allegiance to William and Mary, or to their successors, after the revolution of 1688; a Jacobite.

qa_pairs.question: Nonjurorism
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The doctrines, or action, of the Nonjurors.

qa_pairs.question: nonlethal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as not capable of causing death.

qa_pairs.question: nonlexical
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not lexical; as, nonlexical morphemes.

qa_pairs.question: Nonlimitation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Want of limitation; failure to limit.

qa_pairs.question: nonlinear
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not depictable graphically as a straight line; not changing by a constant amount for each unit of time, distance, or other independent variable. Opposite of Antonym: linear.

qa_pairs.question: Non liquet
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is It is not clear; -- a verdict given by a jury when a matter is to be deferred to another day of trial.

qa_pairs.question: nonliterary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Characteristic of or appropriate to everyday language.

qa_pairs.question: nonliterate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not using a writing system; -- of societies, cultures, or tribes.

qa_pairs.question: nonliving
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not endowed with life; same as inanimate. Opposite of Antonym: living and Antonym: animate.

qa_pairs.question: Nonmalignant
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not malignant, as a disease; -- used especially of tumors; as, a nonmalignant growth on the liver.

qa_pairs.question: Nonmanufacturing
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not carrying on manufactures.

qa_pairs.question: nonmechanical
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not using a mechanism. Opposite of Antonym: mechanical.

qa_pairs.question: nonmechanistic
qa_pairs.answer: It means not determined by a mechanical process; partly resulting from a creative process.

qa_pairs.question: Nonmedullated
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not medullated;

qa_pairs.question: Nonmember
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who is not a member; as, nonmembers are not allowed in the club reading room.

qa_pairs.question: Nonmembership
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as State of not being a member.

qa_pairs.question: Nonmetal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any one of the set of elements which, as contrasted with the metals, possess, produce, or receive, acid rather than basic properties; a metalloid; as, oxygen, sulphur, and chlorine are nonmetals.

qa_pairs.question: Nonmetallic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not metallic.

qa_pairs.question: nonmetamorphic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is not metamorphic. Opposite of Antonym: metamorphic.

qa_pairs.question: nonmigratory
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not participating in migrations; -- used of animals that do not migrate. Opposite of Antonym: migratory.

qa_pairs.question: nonmodern
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is not modern; of or characteristic of an earlier time. Opposite of Antonym: modern.

qa_pairs.question: nonmonotonic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not monotonic; -- of relations between variables. Opposite of Antonym: monotonic.

qa_pairs.question: Nonmoral
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Neither moral nor immoral; having no connection with morals; not within the sphere of morals or ethics; not ethical; as, imagination is of its nature nonmoral; infants are nonmoral.

qa_pairs.question: nonmoving
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not moving. Opposite of Antonym: moving.

qa_pairs.question: nonnative
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as not being or composed of aborigines; as, the nonnative population of South Africa. Opposite of Antonym: native.

qa_pairs.question: Nonnatural
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not natural; unnatural.

qa_pairs.question: Nonne
qa_pairs.answer: It means A nun.

qa_pairs.question: Nonnecessity
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Absence of necessity; the quality or state of being unnecessary.

qa_pairs.question: Nonnitrogenous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Devoid of nitrogen; as, a nonnitrogenous principle; a nonnitrogenous food. See the Note under Food, (n.), 1.

qa_pairs.question: Nonnucleated
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Without a nucleus; anucleate.

qa_pairs.question: Nonny
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A silly fellow; a ninny.

qa_pairs.question: no-no
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Something improper, unethical, inadvisable, or illegal; as, salt is a no-no for someone after a heart attack.

qa_pairs.question: Nonobedience
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Neglect of obedience; failure to obey.

qa_pairs.question: Nonobservance
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Neglect or failure to observe or fulfill.

qa_pairs.question: Non obstante
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Notwithstanding; in opposition to, or in spite of, what has been stated, or is to be stated or admitted.

qa_pairs.question: Nonoic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Pertaining to, derived from, or resembling, nonane; as, nonoic acid, which is also called pelargonic acid. Cf. Pelargonic.

qa_pairs.question: Nonone
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any one of several metameric unsaturated hydrocarbons (C9H14) of the valylene series.

qa_pairs.question: no-nonsense
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not tolerating irrelevant or frivolous distractions; businesslike; serious; as, the no-nonsense tones of a stern parent; the chairman adopted a no-nonsense attitude.

qa_pairs.question: nonoxygenated
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not oxygenated.

qa_pairs.question: Nonoxygenous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Without oxygen; characterized by the absence of oxygen; as, a nonoxygenous alkaloid.

qa_pairs.question: nonparallel
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as not parallel; -- of lines or linear objects. Opposite of Antonym: parallel.

qa_pairs.question: nonparasitic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not parasitic.

qa_pairs.question: Nonpareil
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Something of unequaled excellence; a peerless thing or person; a nonesuch; -- often used as a name.

qa_pairs.question: Nonpareil
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having no equal; peerless.

qa_pairs.question: nonparticipation
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is withdrawing from the activities of a group.

qa_pairs.question: nonparticulate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is not particulate. Opposite of Antonym: particulate.

qa_pairs.question: nonpartisan
qa_pairs.answer: It means free from party affiliation or bias. Opposite of Antonym: partisan.

qa_pairs.question: nonpartisanship
qa_pairs.answer: It means An inclination to weigh both views or opinions equally; absence of bias toward any particular party.

qa_pairs.question: nonpartizan
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is same as nonpartisan, 1.

qa_pairs.question: nonparty
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not based upon or representing political parties; as, a nonparty regime.

qa_pairs.question: Nonpayment
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Neglect or failure to pay.

qa_pairs.question: Nonperformance
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Neglect or failure to perform.

qa_pairs.question: nonphilosophic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not philosophical. Opposite of Antonym: philosophical.

qa_pairs.question: Nonphotobiotic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Capable of living without light; as, nonphotobiotic plant cells, or cells which habitually live in darkness.

qa_pairs.question: Nonplane
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not lying in one plane; not planar; -- said of certain curves.

qa_pairs.question: Nonplus
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A state or condition which baffles reason or confounds judgment; insuperable difficulty; inability to proceed or decide; puzzle; quandary.

qa_pairs.question: Nonplus
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To puzzle; to confound; to perplex; to cause to stop by embarrassment.

qa_pairs.question: nonpolitical
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is not political. Opposite of Antonym: political.

qa_pairs.question: nonporous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not porous; especially, not having vessels that appear as pores; as, nonporous wood. Opposite of Antonym: porous.

qa_pairs.question: nonpregnant
qa_pairs.answer: It means not pregnant; as, a drug approved only for use in nonpregnant females. Opposite of Antonym: pregnant.

qa_pairs.question: nonprehensile
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not prehensile; as, cats have a nonprehensile tail. Opposite of Antonym: prehensile.

qa_pairs.question: Nonpreparation
qa_pairs.answer: It means Neglect or failure to prepare; want of preparation.

qa_pairs.question: nonprescription
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as able to be sold legally without a doctor's prescription; over-the-counter; -- of medicinal drugs; as, Aspirin is a nonprescription antiinflammatory drug. Opposite of Antonym: prescription.

qa_pairs.question: Nonpresentation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Neglect or failure to present; state of not being presented.

qa_pairs.question: Nonproduction
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A failure to produce or exhibit.

qa_pairs.question: nonproductive
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not directly productive; as, nonproductive labor.

qa_pairs.question: Nonprofessional
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not belonging to a profession.

qa_pairs.question: Nonproficiency
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Want of proficiency; failure to make progress.

qa_pairs.question: nonproficient
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not proficient.

qa_pairs.question: Nonproficient
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who has failed to become proficient.

qa_pairs.question: non-profit-making
qa_pairs.answer: It means not commercially motivated; not profit-making; nonprofit; not for profit.

qa_pairs.question: Non pros.
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An abbreviation of Non prosequitur.

qa_pairs.question: Non-pros
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To decline or fail to prosecute; to allow to be dropped (said of a suit); to enter judgment against (a plaintiff who fails to prosecute); as, the plaintiff was non-prossed.

qa_pairs.question: Non prosequitur
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A judgment entered against the plaintiff in a suit where he does not appear to prosecute. See Nolle prosequi.

qa_pairs.question: nonreciprocating
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is not reciprocating.

qa_pairs.question: nonrecombinant
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is not produced by genetic recombination.

qa_pairs.question: nonrecreational
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is involving gainful employment in something often done as a hobby; as, nonrecreational footbal.

qa_pairs.question: Nonrecurrent
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not recurring.

qa_pairs.question: Nonrecurring
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Nonrecurrent; as, the costs of a layoff are considered as a nonrecurring expense.

qa_pairs.question: nonreflecting
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is not capable of total reflection of light; not polished or shiny; as, It is complicated to create realistic shading effects on nonreflecting surfaces.

qa_pairs.question: Nonregardance
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Want of due regard; disregard; slight.

qa_pairs.question: Nonregent
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A master of arts whose regency has ceased. See Regent.

qa_pairs.question: nonremittal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of failing to meet a financial obligation.

qa_pairs.question: Nonrendition
qa_pairs.answer: It means Neglect of rendition; the not rendering what is due.

qa_pairs.question: nonrenewable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as That can not be renewed; as, a nonrenewable option; books on that shelf are nonrenewable. Opposite of Antonym: renewable.

qa_pairs.question: nonrepresentational
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not intended to realistically represent a physical object; -- of visual art work. Opposite of Antonym: representational.

qa_pairs.question: nonrepresentative
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not standing for something else. Opposite of Antonym: representative.

qa_pairs.question: Nonresemblance
qa_pairs.answer: It means Want of resemblance; unlikeness; dissimilarity.

qa_pairs.question: Nonresidence
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The state or condition of being nonresident,

qa_pairs.question: Nonresident
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not residing in a particular place, on one's own estate, or in one's proper place; as, a nonresident clergyman or proprietor of lands.

qa_pairs.question: Nonresident
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A nonresident person; one who does not reside in the State or jurisdiction.

qa_pairs.question: nonresilient
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not rebounding with the normal or expected velocity.

qa_pairs.question: Nonresistance
qa_pairs.answer: It means The principles or practice of a nonresistant; passive obedience; submission to authority, power, oppression, or violence without opposition.

qa_pairs.question: Nonresistant
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Making no resistance.

qa_pairs.question: Nonresistant
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who maintains that no resistance should be made to constituted authority, even when unjustly or oppressively exercised; one who advocates or practices absolute submission.

qa_pairs.question: Nonresisting
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not making resistance.

qa_pairs.question: nonretractable
qa_pairs.answer: It means not able to be drawn into the main body; -- of claws and other extensile parts of animals or objects; as, a bear's claws, unlike a cat's, are nonretractile. Opposite of Antonym: retractile.

qa_pairs.question: nonreturnable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That may not be returned for a refund; -- of purchased goods, or containers for purchased items; as, nonreturnable bottles. Opposite of Antonym: returnable.

qa_pairs.question: nonreversible
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not reversible or capable of having either side out; -- used mostly of clothing. Opposite of Antonym: reversible.

qa_pairs.question: nonrhythmic
qa_pairs.answer: It means not rhythmic.

qa_pairs.question: nonrigid
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not rigid; especially, designating an airship having a shape maintained only by internal gas pressure and without a supporting structure. Opposite of Antonym: rigid.

qa_pairs.question: Nonruminant
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not ruminating; as, a nonruminant animal.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsane
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Unsound; not perfect; as, a person of nonsane memory.

qa_pairs.question: nonsectarian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not restricted to one sect or school or party; as, religious training in a nonsectarian atmosphere; public funding is restricted to nonsectarian colleges. Opposite of Antonym: sectarian.

qa_pairs.question: nonsegregated
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is integrated. Opposite of Antonym: segregated.

qa_pairs.question: nonself
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is That which is not oneself.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsense
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That which is not sense, or has no sense; words, or language, which have no meaning, or which convey no intelligible ideas; absurdity.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsensical
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Without sense; unmeaning; absurd; foolish; irrational; preposterous.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsensitive
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not sensitive; wanting sense or perception; not easily affected.

qa_pairs.question: Non sequitur
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An inference which does not follow from the premises.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsexual
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having no distinction of sex; sexless; neuter.

qa_pairs.question: Nonslaveholding
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not possessing or holding slaves; as, a nonslaveholding State.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsolution
qa_pairs.answer: It means Failure of solution or explanation.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsolvency
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Inability to pay debts; insolvency.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsolvent
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not solvent; insolvent.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsolvent
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An insolvent.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsonant
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not sonant.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsparing
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Sparing none.

qa_pairs.question: nonstandard
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is varying from or not adhering to a standard; as, nonstandard windows; envelopes of nonstandard sizes; non-standard lengths of board cost more per foot. Opposite of Antonym: standard.

qa_pairs.question: nonstarter
qa_pairs.answer: It means a person with a record of failing.

qa_pairs.question: nonstick
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is permitting easy removal of adherent food particles; -- of surfaces, especially of cooking utensils; as, a frying pan with a nonstick surface.

qa_pairs.question: nonstop
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is without an intermediate stop; -- of trips in public conveyances, especially of a flight.

qa_pairs.question: nonstop
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A flight made without intermediate landings between source and destination; as, how many nonstops are there to Dallas?.

qa_pairs.question: Nonstriated
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Without striations; unstriped; as, nonstriated muscle fibers.

qa_pairs.question: nonsubjective
qa_pairs.answer: It means undistorted by emotion or personal bias; based on observable phenomena; objective. Opposite of Antonym: subjective.

qa_pairs.question: nonsubmergible
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is not submersible or submergible. Opposite of Antonym: submersible.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsubmission
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Want of submission; failure or refusal to submit.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsubmissive
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not submissive.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsuch
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Nonesuch.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsuit
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A neglect or failure by the plaintiff to follow up his suit; a stopping of the suit; a renunciation or withdrawal of the cause by the plaintiff, either because he is satisfied that he can not support it, or upon the judge's expressing his opinion. A compulsory nonsuit is a nonsuit ordered by the court on the ground that the plaintiff on his own showing has not made out his case.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsuit
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To determine, adjudge, or record (a plaintiff) as having dropped his suit, upon his withdrawal or failure to follow it up.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsuit
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Nonsuited.

qa_pairs.question: Nonsurety
qa_pairs.answer: It means Insecurity.

qa_pairs.question: nontaxable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not subject to taxation; -- of goods imported into a country or sold at retail outlets; as, most laws imposing sales taxes make food nontaxable. Opposite of Antonym: taxable.

qa_pairs.question: nontechnical
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not characteristic of or skilled in applied arts and sciences; as, nontechnical aspects of the job; nontechnical training. Opposite of Antonym: technical.

qa_pairs.question: nontelescopic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not able to be contracted by a telescoping action; as, a nontelescoping tripod would be awkward to carry.

qa_pairs.question: Nontenure
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A plea of a defendant that he did not hold the land, as affirmed.

qa_pairs.question: Nonterm
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A vacation between two terms of a court.

qa_pairs.question: nonterritorial
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is not displaying territoriality; -- of animals; as, a nonterritorial species. Opposite of Antonym: territorial.

qa_pairs.question: nonthematic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as having no theme. Opposite of Antonym: thematic.

qa_pairs.question: Nontoxic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Not toxic.

qa_pairs.question: Nontronite
qa_pairs.answer: It means A greenish yellow or green mineral, consisting chiefly of the hydrous silicate of iron.

qa_pairs.question: non-U
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not characteristic of the upper classes especially in language use.

qa_pairs.question: Nonuniformist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who believes that past changes in the structure of the earth have proceeded from cataclysms or causes more violent than are now operating; -- called also also known as nonuniformitarian.

qa_pairs.question: Nonunion
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not belonging to, or affiliated with, a trades union; as, a nonunion carpenter.

qa_pairs.question: Nonunionist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who does not belong, or refuses to belong, to a trades union.

qa_pairs.question: Nonusance
qa_pairs.answer: It means Neglect of using; failure to use.

qa_pairs.question: Nonuser
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A not using; failure to use.

qa_pairs.question: Nonvascular
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Destitute of vessels; extravascular.

qa_pairs.question: nonverbal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Involving little or no use of language; as, gestures are a form of nonverbal communication.

qa_pairs.question: Nonvernacular
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Not vernacular.

qa_pairs.question: nonviolence
qa_pairs.answer: It means The theory, doctrine, or practice of peaceful resistance to a government by fasting or refusing to cooperate.

qa_pairs.question: nonviolent
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is peacefully resistant in response to injustice; not using violence; -- used of protests and demonstrations; as, nonviolent resistance. Opposite of Antonym: violent.

qa_pairs.question: nonviscid
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as same as nonglutenous.

qa_pairs.question: Nonvocal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not vocal; destitute of tone.

qa_pairs.question: nonvocalic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is not vocalic; not having vowel character; -- used of liquids and nasals. Opposite of Antonym: vocalic.

qa_pairs.question: nonvolatile
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as not readily evaporated. Opposite of Antonym: volatile.

qa_pairs.question: nonvolatilizable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as not able to be volatilized.

qa_pairs.question: nonwashable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as not washable; damaged by washing; -- used mostly of clothing, especially clothing that must be cleaned by a dry-cleaning process. Opposite of Antonym: washable.

qa_pairs.question: nonwoody
