qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The ornament of woodwork upon the gable of a house, used extensively in the 15th century. It was generally suspended from the edge of the projecting roof (see Verge, (n.), 4), and in a position parallel to the gable wall. Called also bargeboard.

qa_pairs.question: Vergency
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of verging or approaching; tendency; approach.

qa_pairs.question: Verger
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who carries a verge, or emblem of office.

qa_pairs.question: Verger
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A garden or orchard.

qa_pairs.question: Vergett<eacute/
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Divided by pallets, or pales; paly.

qa_pairs.question: Vergette
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A small pale.

qa_pairs.question: Veridical
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Truth-telling; truthful; veracious.

qa_pairs.question: Verifiable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Capable of being verified; confirmable.

qa_pairs.question: Verification
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of verifying, or the state of being verified; confirmation; authentication.

qa_pairs.question: Verificative
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Serving to verify; verifying; authenticating; confirming.

qa_pairs.question: Verifier
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who, or that which, verifies.

qa_pairs.question: Verify
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To prove to be true or correct; to establish the truth of; to confirm; to substantiate.

qa_pairs.question: Veriloquent
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Speaking truth; truthful.

qa_pairs.question: Verily
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In very truth; beyond doubt or question; in fact; certainly.

qa_pairs.question: Verine
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An alkaloid obtained as a yellow amorphous substance by the decomposition of veratrine.

qa_pairs.question: Verisimilar
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having the appearance of truth; probable; likely.

qa_pairs.question: Verisimilitude
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being verisimilar; the appearance of truth; probability; likelihood.

qa_pairs.question: Verisimility
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Verisimilitude.

qa_pairs.question: Verisimilous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Verisimilar.

qa_pairs.question: Veritable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Agreeable to truth or to fact; actual; real; true; genuine.

qa_pairs.question: Veritas
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The Bureau Veritas. See under Bureau.

qa_pairs.question: Verity
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or state of being true, or real; consonance of a statement, proposition, or other thing, with fact; truth; reality.

qa_pairs.question: Verjuice
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The sour juice of crab apples, of green or unripe grapes, apples, etc.; also, an acid liquor made from such juice.

qa_pairs.question: Vermeil
qa_pairs.answer: It means Vermilion; also, the color of vermilion, a bright, beautiful red.

qa_pairs.question: Vermeologist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who treats of vermes, or worms; a helminthologist.

qa_pairs.question: Vermeology
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A discourse or treatise on worms; that part of Zoology which treats of worms; helminthology.

qa_pairs.question: Vermes
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An extensive artificial division of the animal kingdom, including the parasitic worms, or helminths, together with the nemerteans, annelids, and allied groups. By some writers the branchiopods, the bryzoans, and the tunicates are also included. The name was used in a still wider sense by Linnaeus and his followers.

qa_pairs.question: Vermetid
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any species of vermetus.

qa_pairs.question: Vermetus
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any one of many species of marine gastropods belonging to *Vermetus* and allied genera, of the family Vermetidae. Their shells are regularly spiral when young, but later in life the whorls become separate, and the shell is often irregularly bent and contorted like a worm tube.

qa_pairs.question: Vermicelli
qa_pairs.answer: It means The flour of a hard and small-grained wheat made into dough, and forced through small cylinders or pipes till it takes a slender, wormlike form, whence the Italian name. When the paste is made in larger tubes, it is called macaroni.

qa_pairs.question: Vermicide
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A medicine which destroys intestinal worms; a worm killer.

qa_pairs.question: Vermicious
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to worms; wormy.

qa_pairs.question: Vermicular
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to a worm or worms; resembling a worm; shaped like a worm; especially, resembling the motion or track of a worm; as, the vermicular, or peristaltic, motion of the intestines. See Peristaltic.

qa_pairs.question: Vermiculate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To form or work, as by inlaying, with irregular lines or impressions resembling the tracks of worms, or appearing as if formed by the motion of worms.

qa_pairs.question: Vermiculate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Wormlike in shape; covered with wormlike elevations; marked with irregular fine lines of color, or with irregular wavy impressed lines like worm tracks; as, a vermiculate nut.

qa_pairs.question: Vermiculated
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Made or marked with irregular wavy lines or impressions; vermiculate.

qa_pairs.question: Vermiculation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act or operation of moving in the manner of a worm; continuation of motion from one part to another; as, the vermiculation, or peristaltic motion, of the intestines.

qa_pairs.question: Vermicule
qa_pairs.answer: It means A small worm or insect larva; also, a wormlike body.

qa_pairs.question: Vermiculite
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A group of minerals having, a micaceous structure. They are hydrous silicates, derived generally from the alteration of some kind of mica. So called because the scales, when heated, open out into wormlike forms.

qa_pairs.question: Vermiculose
qa_pairs.answer: It means Containing, or full of, worms; resembling worms.

qa_pairs.question: Vermiform
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Resembling a worm in form or motions; vermicular; as, the vermiform process of the cerebellum.

qa_pairs.question: Vermiformia
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A tribe of worms including Phoronis. See Phoronis.

qa_pairs.question: Vermifugal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Tending to prevent, destroy, or expel, worms or vermin; anthelmintic.

qa_pairs.question: Vermifuge
qa_pairs.answer: It means A medicine or substance that expels worms from animal bodies; an anthelmintic.

qa_pairs.question: Vermil
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Vermeil.

qa_pairs.question: Vermilinguia
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A tribe of edentates comprising the South American ant-eaters. The tongue is long, slender, exsertile, and very flexible, whence the name.

qa_pairs.question: Vermilion
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A bright red pigment consisting of mercuric sulphide, obtained either from the mineral cinnabar or artificially. It has a fine red color, and is much used in coloring sealing wax, in printing, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Vermilion
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To color with vermilion, or as if with vermilion; to dye red; to cover with a delicate red.

qa_pairs.question: Vermily
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Vermeil.

qa_pairs.question: Vermin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An animal, in general.

qa_pairs.question: Verminate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To breed vermin.

qa_pairs.question: Vermination
qa_pairs.answer: It means The generation or breeding of vermin.

qa_pairs.question: Verminly
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Resembling vermin; in the manner of vermin.

qa_pairs.question: Verminous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Tending to breed vermin; infested by vermin.

qa_pairs.question: Verminously
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In a verminous manner.

qa_pairs.question: Vermiparous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Producing or breeding worms.

qa_pairs.question: Vermivorous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Devouring worms; feeding on worms; as, vermivorous birds.

qa_pairs.question: Vermuth
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A liqueur made of white wine, absinthe, and various aromatic drugs, used to excite the appetite.

qa_pairs.question: Vernacle
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Veronica, 1.

qa_pairs.question: Vernacular
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Belonging to the country of one's birth; one's own by birth or nature; native; indigenous; -- now used chiefly of language; as, English is our vernacular language.

qa_pairs.question: Vernacular
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The vernacular language; one's mother tongue; often, the common forms of expression in a particular locality, opposed to literary or learned forms.

qa_pairs.question: Vernacularism
qa_pairs.answer: It means A vernacular idiom.

qa_pairs.question: Vernacularization
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act or process of making vernacular, or the state of being made vernacular.

qa_pairs.question: Vernacularly
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In a vernacular manner; in the vernacular.

qa_pairs.question: Vernaculous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Vernacular.

qa_pairs.question: Vernage
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A kind of sweet wine from Italy.

qa_pairs.question: vernal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the spring; appearing in the spring; as, vernal bloom.

qa_pairs.question: Vernant
qa_pairs.answer: It means Flourishing, as in spring; vernal.

qa_pairs.question: Vernate
qa_pairs.answer: It means To become young again.

qa_pairs.question: Vernation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The arrangement of the leaves within the leaf bud, as regards their folding, coiling, rolling, etc.; prefoliation.

qa_pairs.question: Verners law
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A statement, propounded by the Danish philologist Karl Verner in 1875, which explains certain apparent exceptions to Grimm's law by the original position of the accent. Primitive Indo-European k, t, p, became first in Teutonic h, th, f, and appear without further change in old Teutonic, if the accent rested on the preceding syllable; but these sounds became voiced and produced g, d, b, if the accent was originally on a different syllable. Similarly s either remained unchanged, or it became z and later r. Example: Skt. sa_p_t'e`pta, Gothic si_b_un (seven). Examples in English are dead by the side of death, to rise and to rear.

qa_pairs.question: Vernicle
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A Veronica. See Veronica, 1.

qa_pairs.question: Vernicose
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having a brilliantly polished surface, as some leaves.

qa_pairs.question: Vernier
qa_pairs.answer: It means A short scale made to slide along the divisions of a graduated instrument, as the limb of a sextant, or the scale of a barometer, for indicating parts of divisions. It is so graduated that a certain convenient number of its divisions are just equal to a certain number, either one less or one more, of the divisions of the instrument, so that parts of a division are determined by observing what line on the vernier coincides with a line on the instrument.

qa_pairs.question: Vernile
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Suiting a slave; servile; obsequious.

qa_pairs.question: Vernility
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Fawning or obsequious behavior; servility.

qa_pairs.question: Vernine
qa_pairs.answer: It means An alkaloid extracted from the shoots of the vetch, red clover, etc., as a white crystalline substance.

qa_pairs.question: Vernish
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Varnish.

qa_pairs.question: Vernonin
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A glucoside extracted from the root of a South African plant of the genus *Vernonia*, as a deliquescent powder, and used as a mild heart tonic.

qa_pairs.question: Veronese
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to Verona, in Italy.

qa_pairs.question: Veronica
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A portrait or representation of the face of our Savior on the alleged handkerchief of Saint Veronica, preserved at Rome; hence, a representation of this portrait, or any similar representation of the face of the Savior. Formerly called also also known as Vernacle, and also known as Vernicle.

qa_pairs.question: Verray
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Very; true.

qa_pairs.question: Verrayment
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Verily; truly.

qa_pairs.question: Verrel
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Ferrule.

qa_pairs.question: Verriculate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having thickset tufts of parallel hairs, bristles, or branches.

qa_pairs.question: Verruca
qa_pairs.answer: It means A wart.

qa_pairs.question: Verruciform
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Shaped like a wart or warts.

qa_pairs.question: Verrucose
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Covered with wartlike elevations; tuberculate; warty; verrucous; as, a verrucose capsule.

qa_pairs.question: Verrucous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Verrucose.

qa_pairs.question: Verruculose
qa_pairs.answer: It means Minutely verrucose; as, a verruculose leaf or stalk.

qa_pairs.question: Verrugas
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An endemic disease occurring in the Andes in Peru, characterized by warty tumors which ulcerate and bleed. It is probably due to a special bacillus, and is often fatal.

qa_pairs.question: Vers
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A verse or verses. See Verse, (n.)

qa_pairs.question: Versability
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being versable.

qa_pairs.question: Versable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Capable of being turned.

qa_pairs.question: Versableness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Versability.

qa_pairs.question: Versal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Universal.

qa_pairs.question: Versant
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Familiar; conversant.

qa_pairs.question: Versant
qa_pairs.answer: It means The slope of a side of a mountain chain; hence, the general slope of a country; aspect.

qa_pairs.question: Versatile
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Capable of being turned round.

qa_pairs.question: Versatility
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality or state of being versatile; versatileness.

qa_pairs.question: Vers de soci<eacute/t<eacute/
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Society verses, under Society.

qa_pairs.question: Verse
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A line consisting of a certain number of metrical feet (see Foot, (n.), 9) disposed according to metrical rules.

qa_pairs.question: Verse
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To tell in verse, or poetry.

qa_pairs.question: Verse
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To make verses; to versify.

qa_pairs.question: Versed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Acquainted or familiar, as the result of experience, study, practice, etc.; skilled; practiced; knowledgeable; expert.

qa_pairs.question: Versed
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Turned.

qa_pairs.question: Verseman
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Versemonger.

qa_pairs.question: Versemonger
qa_pairs.answer: It means A writer of verses; especially, a writer of commonplace poetry; a poetaster; a rhymer; -- used humorously or in contempt.

qa_pairs.question: Verser
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A versifier.

qa_pairs.question: Verset
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A verse.

qa_pairs.question: Versicle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A little verse; especially, a short verse or text said or sung in public worship by the priest or minister, and followed by a response from the people.

qa_pairs.question: Versicolor
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having various colors; changeable in color.

qa_pairs.question: Versicular
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to verses; designating distinct divisions of a writing.

qa_pairs.question: Versification
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act, art, or practice, of versifying, or making verses; the construction of poetry; metrical composition.

qa_pairs.question: Versificator
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A versifier.

qa_pairs.question: Versifier
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who versifies, or makes verses; as, not every versifier is a poet.

qa_pairs.question: Versify
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To make verses.

qa_pairs.question: Versify
qa_pairs.answer: It means To relate or describe in verse; to compose in verse.

qa_pairs.question: Version
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A change of form, direction, or the like; transformation; conversion; turning.

qa_pairs.question: Versionist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who makes or favors a version; a translator.

qa_pairs.question: Verso
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The reverse, or left-hand, page of a book or a folded sheet of paper; -- opposed to Antonym: recto.

qa_pairs.question: Versor
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The turning factor of a quaternion.

qa_pairs.question: Verst
qa_pairs.answer: It means A Russian measure of length containing 3,500 English feet.

qa_pairs.question: Versual
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to a verse.

qa_pairs.question: Versus
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Against; as, John Doe versus Richard Roe; -- chiefly used in legal language, and abbreviated to v. or vs.

qa_pairs.question: Versute
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Crafty; wily; cunning; artful.

qa_pairs.question: Vert
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Everything that grows, and bears a green leaf, within the forest; as, to preserve vert and venison is the duty of the verderer.

qa_pairs.question: Verteber
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A vertebra.

qa_pairs.question: Vertebra
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of the serial segments of the spinal column.

qa_pairs.question: Vertebral
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to a vertebra, vertebrae, or the vertebral column; spinal; rachidian.

qa_pairs.question: Vertebral
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A vertebrate.

qa_pairs.question: Vertebrally
qa_pairs.answer: It means At or within a vertebra or vertebrae; -- distinguished from interverterbrally.

qa_pairs.question: Vertebrarterial
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to a vertebra or vertebrae and an artery; -- said of the foramina in the transverse processes of cervical vertebrae and of the canal which they form for the vertebral artery and vein.

qa_pairs.question: Vertebrata
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of the grand divisions of the animal kingdom, comprising all animals that have a backbone composed of bony or cartilaginous vertebrae, together with Amphioxus in which the backbone is represented by a simple undivided notochord. The Vertebrata always have a dorsal, or neural, cavity above the notochord or backbone, and a ventral, or visceral, cavity below it. The subdivisions or classes of Vertebrata are Mammalia, Aves, Reptilia, Amphibia, Pisces, Marsipobranchia, and Leptocardia.

qa_pairs.question: Vertebrate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of the Vertebrata.

qa_pairs.question: Vertebrate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having a backbone, or vertebral column, containing the spinal marrow, as man, quadrupeds, birds, amphibia, and fishes.

qa_pairs.question: Vertebre
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A vertebra.

qa_pairs.question: Vertebro-
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A combining form used in anatomy to indicate connection with, or relation to, a vertebra, vertebrae, or the vertebral column; as in vertebrocostal.

qa_pairs.question: Vertebro-iliac
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Iliolumbar.

qa_pairs.question: Vertex
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A turning point; the principal or highest point; top; summit; crown; apex.

qa_pairs.question: Vertical
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the vertex; situated at the vertex, or highest point; directly overhead, or in the zenith; perpendicularly above one.

qa_pairs.question: Vertical
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Vertical position; zenith.

qa_pairs.question: Verticality
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality or state of being vertical; verticalness.

qa_pairs.question: Vertically
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In a vertical manner, position, or direction; perpendicularly; as, to look down vertically; to raise a thing vertically.

qa_pairs.question: Verticalness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Quality or state of being vertical.

qa_pairs.question: Verticil
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A circle either of leaves or flowers about a stem at the same node; a whorl.

qa_pairs.question: Verticillaster
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A whorl of flowers apparently of one cluster, but composed of two opposite axillary cymes, as in mint. See Illust. of Whorl.

qa_pairs.question: Verticillate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Arranged in a transverse whorl or whorls like the rays of a wheel; as, verticillate leaves of a plant; a verticillate shell.

qa_pairs.question: Verticillus
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A whorl; a verticil.

qa_pairs.question: Verticity
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or power of turning; revolution; rotation.

qa_pairs.question: Verticle
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An axis; a hinge; a turning point.

qa_pairs.question: Vertiginate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Turned round; giddy.

qa_pairs.question: Vertiginous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Turning round; whirling; rotary; revolving; as, a vertiginous motion.

qa_pairs.question: Vertigo
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Dizziness or swimming of the head; an affection of the head in which objects, though stationary, appear to move in various directions, and the person affected finds it difficult to maintain an erect posture; giddiness.

qa_pairs.question: Vertilinear
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Straight; rectilinear.

qa_pairs.question: Vertu
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Virtue; power. See Virtue.

qa_pairs.question: Vertuous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Virtuous; powerful.

qa_pairs.question: Verumontanum
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An elevation, or crest, in the wall of the urethra where the seminal ducts enter it.

qa_pairs.question: Vervain
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any plant of the genus *Verbena*.

qa_pairs.question: Verve
qa_pairs.answer: It means Excitement of imagination such as animates a poet, artist, or musician, in composing or performing; rapture; enthusiasm; spirit; energy.

qa_pairs.question: Vervel
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Varvel.

qa_pairs.question: Vervet
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A South African monkey (Cercopithecus pygerythrus syn. Cercopithecus Lelandii). The upper parts are grayish green, finely specked with black. The cheeks and belly are reddish white.

qa_pairs.question: Very
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is True; real; actual; veritable.

qa_pairs.question: Very
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In a high degree; to no small extent; exceedingly; excessively; extremely; as, a very great mountain; a very bright sun; a very cold day; the river flows very rapidly; he was very much hurt.

qa_pairs.question: Verys night signals
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A system of signaling in which balls of red and green fire are fired from a pistol, the arrangement in groups denoting numbers having a code significance. The pistol used to fire the signal flare is called a Very pistol.

qa_pairs.question: Vesbium
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A rare metallic element of which little is known. It is said by Scacchi to have been extracted from a yellowish incrustation from the cracks of a Vesuvian lava erupted in 1631.

qa_pairs.question: Vese
qa_pairs.answer: It means Onset; rush; violent draught or wind.

qa_pairs.question: Vesica
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A bladder.

qa_pairs.question: Vesical
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the bladder.

qa_pairs.question: Vesicant
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A vesicatory.

qa_pairs.question: Vesicate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To raise little bladders or blisters upon; to inflame and separate the cuticle of; to blister.

qa_pairs.question: Vesication
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The process of vesicating, or of raising blisters.

qa_pairs.question: Vesicatory
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Tending, or having power, to raise a blister.

qa_pairs.question: Vesicle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A bladderlike vessel; a membranous cavity; a cyst; a cell.

qa_pairs.question: Vesico-
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A combining form used in anatomy to indicate connection with, or relation to, the bladder; as in vesicoprostatic, vesicovaginal.

qa_pairs.question: Vesicoprostatic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the bladder and the prostate gland.

qa_pairs.question: Vesicouterine
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the bladder and the uterus.

qa_pairs.question: Vesicovaginal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the bladder and the vagina.

qa_pairs.question: Vesicula
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A vesicle.

qa_pairs.question: Vesicular
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to vesicles; esp., of or pertaining to the air vesicles, or air cells, of the lungs; as, vesicular breathing, or normal breathing, in which the air enters freely the air vesicles of the lungs.

qa_pairs.question: Vesicularia
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any one of numerous species of marine Bryozoa belonging to *Vesicularia* and allied genera. They have delicate tubular cells attached in clusters to slender flexible stems.

qa_pairs.question: Vesiculata
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The campanularian medusae.

qa_pairs.question: Vesiculate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Bladdery; full of, or covered with, bladders; vesicular.

qa_pairs.question: Vesiculate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To form vesicles in, as lava.

qa_pairs.question: Vesiculation
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The state of containing vesicles, or the process by which vesicles are formed.

qa_pairs.question: Vesiculitis
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Inflammation of a vesicle.

qa_pairs.question: Vesiculose
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Bladdery; vesicular; vesiculate; composed of vesicles; covered with vesicles; as, a vesiculose shell.

qa_pairs.question: Vespa
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus of Hymenoptera including the common wasps and hornets.

qa_pairs.question: Vesper
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The evening star; Hesper; Venus, when seen after sunset; hence, the evening.

qa_pairs.question: Vesper
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the evening, or to the service of vespers; as, a vesper hymn; vesper bells.

qa_pairs.question: Vesperal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Vesper; evening.

qa_pairs.question: Vespers
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One of the little hours of the Breviary.

qa_pairs.question: Vespertilio
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus of bats including some of the common small insectivorous species of North America and Europe.

qa_pairs.question: Vespertiliones
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A tribe of bats including the common insectivorous bats of America and Europe, belonging to *Vespertilio* and allied genera. They lack a nose membrane.

qa_pairs.question: Vespertilionine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the Vespertiliones.

qa_pairs.question: Vespertinal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Vespertine.

qa_pairs.question: Vespertine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the evening; happening or being in the evening.

qa_pairs.question: Vespiary
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A nest, or habitation, of insects of the wasp kind.

qa_pairs.question: Vespillo
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who carried out the dead bodies of the poor at night for burial.

qa_pairs.question: Vessel
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A hollow or concave utensil for holding anything; a hollow receptacle of any kind, as a hogshead, a barrel, a firkin, a bottle, a kettle, a cup, a bowl, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Vessel
qa_pairs.answer: It means To put into a vessel.

qa_pairs.question: Vesselful
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is As much as a vessel will hold; enough to fill a vessel.

qa_pairs.question: Vesses
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A kind of worsted; also, a worsted cloth.

qa_pairs.question: Vessicnon
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A soft swelling on a horse's leg; a windgall.

qa_pairs.question: Vest
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An article of clothing covering the person; an outer garment; a vestment; a dress; a vesture; a robe.

qa_pairs.question: Vest
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To clothe with, or as with, a vestment, or garment; to dress; to robe; to cover, surround, or encompass closely.

qa_pairs.question: Vest
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To come or descend; to be fixed; to take effect, as a title or right; -- followed by in; as, upon the death of the ancestor, the estate, or the right to the estate, vests in the heir at law.

qa_pairs.question: Vesta
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of the great divinities of the ancient Romans, identical with the Greek _Hestia_. She was a virgin, and the goddess of the hearth; hence, also, of the fire on it, and the family round it.

qa_pairs.question: Vestal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to Vesta, the virgin goddess of the hearth; hence, pure; chaste.

qa_pairs.question: Vestal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A virgin consecrated to Vesta, and to the service of watching the sacred fire, which was to be perpetually kept burning upon her altar.

qa_pairs.question: Vestales
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A group of butterflies including those known as virgins, or gossamer-winged butterflies.

qa_pairs.question: Vested
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Clothed; robed; wearing vestments.

qa_pairs.question: Vested interest
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is a special personal interest, usually financial, in an existing system, law, or institution, which hinders a person from making objective decisions regarding that system, law, or institution. A vested interest may be one which benefits a relative, or, in an extended sense, one which defends a person's own reputation or previously expressed views.

qa_pairs.question: Vested school
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In Ireland, a national school which has been built by the aid of grants from the board of Commissioners of National Education and is secured for educational purposes by leases to the commissioners themselves, or to the commissioners and the trustees.

qa_pairs.question: Vestiarian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to a vestiary or vestments.

qa_pairs.question: Vestiary
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A wardrobe; a robing room; a vestry.

qa_pairs.question: Vestiary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Pertaining to clothes, or vestments.

qa_pairs.question: Vestibular
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to a vestibule; like a vestibule.

qa_pairs.question: Vestibule
qa_pairs.answer: It means The porch or entrance into a house; a hall or antechamber next the entrance; a lobby; a porch; a hall.

qa_pairs.question: Vestibule
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To furnish with a vestibule or vestibules.

qa_pairs.question: Vestibuled train
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Vestibule train, under Vestibule.

qa_pairs.question: Vestibulum
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A cavity into which, in certain bryozoans, the esophagus and anus open.

qa_pairs.question: Vestigate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To investigate.

qa_pairs.question: Vestige
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The mark of the foot left on the earth; a track or footstep; a trace; a sign; hence, a faint mark or visible sign left by something which is lost, or has perished, or is no longer present; remains; as, the vestiges of ancient magnificence in Palmyra; vestiges of former population.

qa_pairs.question: Vestigial
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to a vestige or remnant; like a vestige.

qa_pairs.question: Vesting
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Cloth for vests; a vest pattern.

qa_pairs.question: Vestiture
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Investiture.

qa_pairs.question: Vestlet
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any one of several species of actinians belonging to the genus *Cerianthus*. These animals have a long, smooth body tapering to the base, and two separate circles of tentacles around the mouth. They form a tough, flexible, feltlike tube with a smooth internal lining, in which they dwell, whence the name.

qa_pairs.question: Vestment
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A covering or garment; some part of clothing or dress

qa_pairs.question: Vestry
qa_pairs.answer: It means A room appendant to a church, in which sacerdotal vestments and sacred utensils are sometimes kept, and where meetings for worship or parish business are held; a sacristy; -- formerly called revestiary.

qa_pairs.question: Vestryman
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A member of a vestry; especially (Prot. Epis. Ch.), a member other than a warden. See Vestry.

qa_pairs.question: Vesture
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A garment or garments; a robe; clothing; dress; apparel; vestment; covering; envelope.

qa_pairs.question: Vestured
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Covered with vesture or garments; clothed; enveloped.

qa_pairs.question: Vesuvian
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to Vesuvius, a volcano near Naples.

qa_pairs.question: Vesuvian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Vesuvianite.

qa_pairs.question: Vesuvianite
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A mineral occurring in tetragonal crystals, and also massive, of a brown to green color, rarely sulphur yellow and blue. It is a silicate of alumina and lime with some iron magnesia, and is common at Vesuvius. Also called also known as idocrase.

qa_pairs.question: Vesuvine
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A trade name for a brown dyestuff obtained from certain basic azo compounds of benzene; -- called also also known as Bismarck brown, also known as Manchester brown, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Vetch
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any leguminous plant of the genus *Vicia*, some species of which are valuable for fodder. The common species is Vicia sativa.

qa_pairs.question: Vetchling
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any small leguminous plant of the genus *Lathyrus*, especially Lathyrus Nissolia.

qa_pairs.question: Vetchy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Consisting of vetches or of pea straw.

qa_pairs.question: Veteran
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Long exercised in anything, especially in military life and the duties of a soldier; long practiced or experienced; as, a veteran officer or soldier; veteran skill.

qa_pairs.question: Veteran
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who has been long exercised in any service or art, particularly in war; one who has had much experience, or has grown old or decrepit in service.

qa_pairs.question: Veteranize
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To reenlist for service as a soldier.

qa_pairs.question: veterinarian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One skilled in the treatment of diseases of cattle or domestic animals; a veterinary surgeon. Often abbreviated to also known as vet.

qa_pairs.question: Veterinary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the art of healing or treating the diseases of domestic animals, as oxen, horses, sheep, various pets, etc.; as, a veterinary writer or school.

qa_pairs.question: Vetiver
qa_pairs.answer: It means An East Indian grass (Andropogon muricatus); also, its fragrant roots which are much used for making mats and screens. Also called also known as kuskus, and also known as khuskhus.

qa_pairs.question: Veto
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An authoritative prohibition or negative; a forbidding; an interdiction.

qa_pairs.question: Veto
qa_pairs.answer: It means To prohibit; to negative; also, to refuse assent to, as a legislative bill, and thus prevent its enactment; as, to veto an appropriation bill.

qa_pairs.question: Vetoist
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who uses, or sustains the use of, the veto.

qa_pairs.question: Vettura
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An Italian four-wheeled carriage, esp. one let for hire; a hackney coach.

qa_pairs.question: Vetturino
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who lets or drives a vettura.

qa_pairs.question: Vetust
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Venerable from antiquity; ancient; old.

qa_pairs.question: Vex
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To toss back and forth; to agitate; to disquiet.

qa_pairs.question: Vex
qa_pairs.answer: It means To be irritated; to fret.

qa_pairs.question: Vexation
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of vexing, or the state of being vexed; agitation; disquiet; trouble; irritation.

qa_pairs.question: Vexatious
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Causing vexation; agitating; afflictive; annoying; as, a vexatious controversy; a vexatious neighbor.

qa_pairs.question: Vexed
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Annoyed; harassed; troubled.

qa_pairs.question: Vexer
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who vexes or troubles.

qa_pairs.question: Vexil
qa_pairs.answer: It means A vexillum.

qa_pairs.question: Vexillar
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to an ensign or standard.

qa_pairs.question: Vexillary
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A standard bearer.

qa_pairs.question: Vexillation
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A company of troops under one vexillum.

qa_pairs.question: Vexillum
qa_pairs.answer: It means A flag or standard.

qa_pairs.question: Vexingly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In a vexing manner; so as to vex, tease, or irritate.

qa_pairs.question: V hook
qa_pairs.answer: It means A gab at the end of an eccentric rod, with long jaws, shaped like the letter V.

qa_pairs.question: Via
qa_pairs.answer: It means A road or way.

qa_pairs.question: Via
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is By the way of; as, to send a letter via Queenstown to London.

qa_pairs.question: Viability
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or state of being viable.

qa_pairs.question: Viable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Capable of living; born alive and with such form and development of organs as to be capable of living; -- said of a newborn, or a prematurely born, infant.

qa_pairs.question: Viaduct
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A structure of considerable magnitude, usually with arches or supported on trestles, for carrying a road, as a railroad, high above the ground or water; a bridge; especially, one for crossing a valley or a gorge. Cf. Trestlework.

qa_pairs.question: Viage
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A voyage; a journey.

qa_pairs.question: Vial
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A small bottle, usually of glass; a little glass vessel with a narrow aperture intended to be closed with a stopper; as, a vial of medicine.

qa_pairs.question: Vial
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To put in a vial or vials.

qa_pairs.question: Viameter
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An odometer; -- called also also known as viatometer.

qa_pairs.question: Viand
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An article of food; provisions; food; victuals; -- used chiefly in the plural.

qa_pairs.question: Viander
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A feeder; an eater; also, one who provides viands, or food; a host.

qa_pairs.question: Vi-apple
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Otaheite apple.

qa_pairs.question: Viary
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to roads; happening on roads.

qa_pairs.question: Viatecture
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The art of making roads or ways for traveling, including the construction of bridges, canals, viaducts, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Viatic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to a journey or traveling.

qa_pairs.question: Viaticum
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An allowance for traveling expenses made to those who were sent into the provinces to exercise any office or perform any service.

qa_pairs.question: Viatometer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A viameter.

qa_pairs.question: Vibices
qa_pairs.answer: It means More or less extensive patches of subcutaneous extravasation of blood.

qa_pairs.question: Vibraculum
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of the movable, slender, spinelike organs or parts with which certain bryozoans are furnished. They are regarded as specially modified zooids, of nearly the same nature as Avicularia.

qa_pairs.question: Vibrancy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state of being vibrant; resonance.

qa_pairs.question: Vibrant
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Vibrating; tremulous; resonant; as, vibrant drums.

qa_pairs.question: Vibrate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To brandish; to move to and fro; to swing; as, to vibrate a sword or a staff.

qa_pairs.question: Vibrate
qa_pairs.answer: It means To move to and fro, or from side to side, as a pendulum, an elastic rod, or a stretched string, when disturbed from its position of rest; to swing; to oscillate.

qa_pairs.question: Vibratile
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Adapted to, or used in, vibratory motion; having the power of vibrating; vibratory; as, the vibratile organs of insects.

qa_pairs.question: Vibratility
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality or state of being vibratile; disposition to vibration or oscillation.

qa_pairs.question: Vibration
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of vibrating, or the state of being vibrated, or in vibratory motion; quick motion to and fro; oscillation, as of a pendulum or musical string.

qa_pairs.question: Vibratiuncle
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A small vibration.

qa_pairs.question: Vibrative
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Vibrating; vibratory.

qa_pairs.question: Vibrator
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One that vibrates, or causes vibration or oscillation of any kind;

qa_pairs.question: Vibratory
qa_pairs.answer: It means Consisting in, or causing, vibration, or oscillation; vibrating; as, a vibratory motion; a vibratory power.

qa_pairs.question: Vibrio
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of motile bacteria characterized by short, slightly sinuous filaments and an undulatory motion; also, an individual of this genus.

qa_pairs.question: Vibrissa
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One of the specialized or tactile hairs which grow about the nostrils, or on other parts of the face, in many animals, as the so-called whiskers of the cat, and the hairs of the nostrils of man.

qa_pairs.question: Vibrograph
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An instrument to observe and record vibrations.

qa_pairs.question: Vibroscope
qa_pairs.answer: It means An instrument for observing or tracing vibrations.

qa_pairs.question: Viburnum
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of shrubs having opposite, petiolate leaves and cymose flowers, several species of which are cultivated as ornamental plants, as the laurestine and the guelder-rose.

qa_pairs.question: Vicar
qa_pairs.answer: It means One deputed or authorized to perform the functions of another; a substitute in office; a deputy.

qa_pairs.question: Vicarage
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The benefice of a vicar.

qa_pairs.question: Vicarial
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to a vicar; as, vicarial tithes.

qa_pairs.question: Vicarian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A vicar.

qa_pairs.question: Vicariate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having delegated power, as a vicar; vicarious.

qa_pairs.question: Vicariate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Delegated office or power; vicarship; the office or oversight of a vicar.

qa_pairs.question: Vicarious
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to a vicar, substitute, or deputy; deputed; delegated; as, vicarious power or authority.

qa_pairs.question: Vicariously
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In a vicarious manner.

qa_pairs.question: Vicarship
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The office or dignity of a vicar.

qa_pairs.question: Vicary
qa_pairs.answer: It means A vicar.

qa_pairs.question: Vice
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A defect; a fault; an error; a blemish; an imperfection; as, the vices of a political constitution; the vices of a horse.

qa_pairs.question: Vice
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A kind of instrument for holding work, as in filing. Same as Vise.

qa_pairs.question: Vice
qa_pairs.answer: It means To hold or squeeze with a vice, or as if with a vice.

qa_pairs.question: Vice
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In the place of; in the stead; as, A. B. was appointed postmaster vice C. D. resigned.

qa_pairs.question: Vice
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Denoting one who in certain cases may assume the office or duties of a superior; designating an officer or an office that is second in rank or authority; as, vice president; vice agent; vice consul, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Viced
qa_pairs.answer: It means Vicious; corrupt.

qa_pairs.question: Vicegerency
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The office of a vicegerent.

qa_pairs.question: Vicegerent
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having or exercising delegated power; acting by substitution, or in the place of another.

qa_pairs.question: Vicegerent
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An officer who is deputed by a superior, or by proper authority, to exercise the powers of another; a lieutenant; a vicar.

qa_pairs.question: Viceman
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A smith who works at the vice instead of at the anvil.

qa_pairs.question: Vicenary
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to twenty; consisting of twenty.

qa_pairs.question: Vicennial
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Lasting or comprising twenty years.

qa_pairs.question: Vice-regal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to a viceroy or viceroyalty.

qa_pairs.question: Viceroy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The governor of a country or province who rules in the name of the sovereign with regal authority, as the king's substitute; as, the viceroy of India.

qa_pairs.question: Viceroyalty
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The dignity, office, or jurisdiction of a viceroy.

qa_pairs.question: Viceroyship
qa_pairs.answer: It means Viceroyalty.

qa_pairs.question: Vicety
qa_pairs.answer: It means Fault; defect; coarseness.

qa_pairs.question: Vichy water
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A mineral water found at Vichy, France. It is essentially an effervescent aqueous solution of sodium, calcium, and magnesium carbonates, with sodium and potassium chlorides; also, by extension, any artificial or natural water resembling in composition the Vichy water proper. Called also, colloquially, also known as Vichy.

qa_pairs.question: Viciate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Vitiate.

qa_pairs.question: Vicinage
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The place or places adjoining or near; neighborhood; vicinity; as, a jury must be of the vicinage.

qa_pairs.question: Vicinal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Near; vicine.

qa_pairs.question: Vicine
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Near; neighboring; vicinal.

qa_pairs.question: Vicine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An alkaloid extracted from the seeds of the vetch (Vicia sativa) as a white crystalline substance.

qa_pairs.question: Vicinity
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality or state of being near, or not remote; nearness; propinquity; proximity; as, the value of the estate was increased by the vicinity of two country seats.

qa_pairs.question: Viciosity
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Vitiosity.

qa_pairs.question: Vicious
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Characterized by vice or defects; defective; faulty; imperfect.

qa_pairs.question: Vicissitude
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Regular change or succession from one thing to another; alternation; mutual succession; interchange.

qa_pairs.question: Vicissitudinary
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Subject to vicissitudes.

qa_pairs.question: Vicissitudinous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Full of, or subject to, changes.

qa_pairs.question: Vicissy duck
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A West Indian duck, sometimes domesticated.

qa_pairs.question: Vickers gun
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of a system of guns manufactured by the firm of Vickers' Sons, at Sheffield, Eng. now included in Vickers-Maxim guns.

qa_pairs.question: Vickers-Maxim automatic machine gun
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An automatic machine gun in which the mechanism is worked by the recoil, assisted by the pressure of gases from the muzzle, which expand in a gas chamber against a disk attached to the end of the barrel, thus moving the latter to the rear with increased recoil, and against the front wall of the gas chamber, checking the recoil of the system.

qa_pairs.question: Vickers-Maxim gun
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of a system of ordnance, including machine, quick-fire, coast, and field guns, of all calibers, manufactured by the combined firms of Vickers' Sons of Sheffield and Maxim of Birmingham and elsewhere, England.

qa_pairs.question: Vicontiel
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the viscount or sheriff of a county.

qa_pairs.question: Vicontiels
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Things belonging to the sheriff; especially, farms (called also also known as vicontiel rents) for which the sheriff used to pay rent to the king.

qa_pairs.question: Vicount
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Viscount.

qa_pairs.question: Victim
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A living being sacrificed to some deity, or in the performance of a religious rite; a creature immolated, or made an offering of.

qa_pairs.question: Victimate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To make a victim of; to sacrifice; to immolate.

qa_pairs.question: Victimize
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To make a victim of, esp. by deception; to dupe; to cheat.

qa_pairs.question: Victor
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The winner in a contest; one who gets the better of another in any struggle; esp., one who defeats an enemy in battle; a vanquisher; a conqueror; -- often followed by at, rarely by of.

qa_pairs.question: Victor
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Victorious.

qa_pairs.question: Victoress
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A victress.

qa_pairs.question: Victoria
qa_pairs.answer: It means A genus of aquatic plants named in honor of Queen Victoria. The Victoria regia is a native of Guiana and Brazil. Its large, spreading leaves are often over five feet in diameter, and have a rim from three to five inches high; its immense rose-white flowers sometimes attain a diameter of nearly two feet.

qa_pairs.question: Victoria crape
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A kind of cotton crape.

qa_pairs.question: Victorian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to the reign of Queen Victoria of England; as, the Victorian poets.

qa_pairs.question: Victorine
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A woman's fur tippet.

qa_pairs.question: Victorious
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to victory, or a victor; being a victor; bringing or causing a victory; conquering; winning; triumphant; as, a victorious general; victorious troops; a victorious day.

qa_pairs.question: Victorium
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A probable chemical element discovered by Sir William Crookes in 1898. Its nitrate is obtained byy practical decomposition and crystallization of yttrium nitrate. At. wt., about 117.

qa_pairs.question: Victory
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The defeat of an enemy in battle, or of an antagonist in any contest; a gaining of the superiority in any struggle or competition; conquest; triumph; -- the opposite of Antonym: defeat.

qa_pairs.question: Victress
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A woman who wins a victory; a female victor.

qa_pairs.question: Victrice
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A victress.

qa_pairs.question: Victrix
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A victress.

qa_pairs.question: Victual
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Food; -- now used chiefly in the plural. See Victuals.

qa_pairs.question: Victual
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To supply with provisions for subsistence; to provide with food; to store with sustenance; as, to victual an army; to victual a ship.

qa_pairs.question: Victualage
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Victuals; food.

qa_pairs.question: Victualer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who furnishes victuals.

qa_pairs.question: Victualing
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to victuals, or provisions; supplying provisions; as, a victualing ship.

qa_pairs.question: Victuals
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Food for human beings, esp. when it is cooked or prepared for the table; that which supports human life; provisions; sustenance; meat; viands.

qa_pairs.question: Victus
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Food; diet.

qa_pairs.question: Vicu<ntil/a
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A South American mammal (Auchenia vicunna) native of the elevated plains of the Andes, allied to the llama but smaller. It has a thick coat of very fine reddish brown wool, and long, pendent white hair on the breast and belly. It is hunted for its wool and flesh.

qa_pairs.question: Vida finch
qa_pairs.answer: It means The whidah bird.

qa_pairs.question: Vidame
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of a class of temporal officers who originally represented the bishops, but later erected their offices into fiefs, and became feudal nobles.

qa_pairs.question: Vide
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is (imperative sing.) of L. videre, to see; -- used to direct attention to something; as, vide supra, see above.

qa_pairs.question: Videlicet
qa_pairs.answer: It means To wit; namely; -- often abbreviated to viz.

qa_pairs.question: videocasette
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is a casette containing magnetic tape, which can be used in a videocasette recorder to record and play back electronic signals, such as from television programs. The long magnetic tape in the videocasette is moved between two spindles, and a small portion of the tape at any one time is passed over a recording or playback head.

qa_pairs.question: videocasette recorder
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is an electronic device which can record electronic signals, as from a television program, on magnetic tape contained in a videocassette, and can also play back the recording. It is used, for example, to record television programs broadcast at some particular time, which can then be viewed at any subsequent time by attaching the videocasette recorder to a television receiver and playing the signals throught the television receiver. Also called also known as VCR.

qa_pairs.question: videotape
qa_pairs.answer: It means a video recording made on magnetic tape.

qa_pairs.question: Vidette
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Vedette.

qa_pairs.question: Vidonia

qa_pairs.question: Viduage

qa_pairs.question: Vidual
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the state of a widow; widowed.

qa_pairs.question: Viduation
qa_pairs.answer: It means The state of being widowed or bereaved; loss; bereavement.

qa_pairs.question: Viduity
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Widowhood.

qa_pairs.question: Vie

qa_pairs.question: Vie
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To stake; to wager.

qa_pairs.question: Vie

qa_pairs.question: Vielle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An old stringed instrument played upon with a wheel; a hurdy-gurdy.

qa_pairs.question: Vienna paste

qa_pairs.question: Viennese
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to Vienna, or the people of Vienna.

qa_pairs.question: Vierkleur
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The four-colored flag of the South African Republic, or Transvaal, -- red, white, blue, and green.

qa_pairs.question: View

qa_pairs.question: View
qa_pairs.answer: It means To see; to behold; especially, to look at with attention, or for the purpose of examining; to examine with the eye; to inspect; to explore.

qa_pairs.question: Viewer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who views or examines.

qa_pairs.question: Viewiness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality or state of being viewy, or of having unpractical views.

qa_pairs.question: Viewless

qa_pairs.question: Viewly

qa_pairs.question: Viewy

qa_pairs.question: Vigesimal

qa_pairs.question: Vigesimation
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of putting to death every twentieth man.

qa_pairs.question: Vigesimo-quarto
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having twenty-four leaves to a sheet; as, a vigesimo-quarto form, book, leaf, size, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Vigilance
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or state of being vigilant; forbearance of sleep; wakefulness.

qa_pairs.question: Vigilancy
qa_pairs.answer: It means Vigilance.

qa_pairs.question: Vigilant

qa_pairs.question: Vigilantly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In a vigilant manner.

qa_pairs.question: Vigily
qa_pairs.answer: It means A vigil.

qa_pairs.question: Vigintivirate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The office of the vigintiviri, a body of officers of government consisting of twenty men; also, the vigintiviri.

qa_pairs.question: Vignette

qa_pairs.question: Vignette

qa_pairs.question: Vigonia

qa_pairs.question: Vigor

qa_pairs.question: Vigor
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To invigorate.

qa_pairs.question: Vigorite

qa_pairs.question: Vigoroso
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Vigorous; energetic; with energy; -- a direction to perform a passage with energy and force.

qa_pairs.question: Vigorous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Possessing vigor; full of physical or mental strength or active force; strong; lusty; robust; as, a vigorous youth; a vigorous plant.

qa_pairs.question: Viking

qa_pairs.question: Vilany
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Villainy.

qa_pairs.question: Vilayet
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One of the chief administrative divisions or provinces of the Ottoman Empire; -- formerly called eyalet.

qa_pairs.question: Vild
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Vile.

qa_pairs.question: Vile
qa_pairs.answer: It means Low; base; worthless; mean; despicable.

qa_pairs.question: Viled
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Abusive; scurrilous; defamatory; vile.

qa_pairs.question: Vileyns
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Villainous.

qa_pairs.question: Vilification
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of vilifying or defaming; abuse.

qa_pairs.question: Vilifier
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who vilifies or defames.

qa_pairs.question: Vilify
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To make vile; to debase; to degrade; to disgrace.

qa_pairs.question: Vilipend

qa_pairs.question: Vilipendency

qa_pairs.question: Vility
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Vileness; baseness.

qa_pairs.question: Vill
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A small collection of houses; a village.

qa_pairs.question: Villa
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A country seat; a country or suburban residence of some pretensions to elegance.

qa_pairs.question: Village
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A small assemblage of houses in the country, less than a town or city.

qa_pairs.question: Villager
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An inhabitant of a village.

qa_pairs.question: Villagery
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Villages; a district of villages.

qa_pairs.question: Villain
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who holds lands by a base, or servile, tenure, or in villenage; a feudal tenant of the lowest class, a bondman or servant.

qa_pairs.question: Villain
qa_pairs.answer: It means Villainous.

qa_pairs.question: Villain
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To debase; to degrade.

qa_pairs.question: Villainous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Base; vile; mean; depraved; as, a villainous person or wretch.

qa_pairs.question: Villainy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being a villain, or villainous; extreme depravity; atrocious wickedness; as, the villainy of the seducer.

qa_pairs.question: Villakin
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A little villa.

qa_pairs.question: Villan
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A villain.

qa_pairs.question: Villanage
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The state of a villain, or serf; base servitude; tenure on condition of doing the meanest services for the lord.

qa_pairs.question: Villanel
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A ballad.

qa_pairs.question: Villanella
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An old rustic dance, accompanied with singing.

qa_pairs.question: Villanelle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A poem written in tercets with but two rhymes, the first and third verse of the first stanza alternating as the third verse in each successive stanza and forming a couplet at the close.

qa_pairs.question: Villanette
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A small villa.

qa_pairs.question: Villanize
qa_pairs.answer: It means To make vile; to debase; to degrade; to revile.

qa_pairs.question: Villanizer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who villanizes.

qa_pairs.question: Villanous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Villainous, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Villany
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Villainy.

qa_pairs.question: Villatic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to a farm or a village; rural.

qa_pairs.question: Villein
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Villain, 1.

qa_pairs.question: Villenage
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Villanage.

qa_pairs.question: Villenous

qa_pairs.question: Villi

qa_pairs.question: Villiform
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having the form or appearance of villi; like close-set fibers, either hard or soft; as, the teeth of perch are villiform.

qa_pairs.question: Villose
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Villous.

qa_pairs.question: Villosity
qa_pairs.answer: It means State of being villous.

qa_pairs.question: Villous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Abounding in, or covered with, fine hairs, or a woolly substance; shaggy with soft hairs; nappy.

qa_pairs.question: Villus
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of the minute papillary processes on certain vascular membranes; a villosity; as, villi cover the lining of the small intestines of many animals and serve to increase the absorbing surface.

qa_pairs.question: Vim
qa_pairs.answer: It means Power; force; energy; spirit; activity; vigor.

qa_pairs.question: Vimen
qa_pairs.answer: It means A long, slender, flexible shoot or branch.

qa_pairs.question: Viminal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to twigs; consisting of twigs; producing twigs.

qa_pairs.question: Vimineous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to twigs; made of pliant twigs.

qa_pairs.question: Vinaceous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Belonging to, or like, wine or grapes.

qa_pairs.question: Vinaigrette
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A sauce, made of vinegar, oil, and other ingredients, -- used esp. for cold meats.

qa_pairs.question: Vinaigrous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Resembling vinegar; sour.

qa_pairs.question: Vinasse
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The waste liquor remaining in the process of making beet sugar, -- used in the manufacture of potassium carbonate.

qa_pairs.question: Vinatico
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Madeira mahogany; the coarse, dark-colored wood of the Persea Indica.

qa_pairs.question: Vincentian
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to Saint Vincent de Paul, or founded by him.

qa_pairs.question: Vincentian

qa_pairs.question: Vincetoxin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A glucoside extracted from the root of the white swallowwort (Vincetoxicum officinale, a plant of the Asclepias family) as a bitter yellow amorphous substance; -- called also also known as asclepiadin, and also known as cynanchin.

qa_pairs.question: Vincibility
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or state of being vincible, vincibleness.

qa_pairs.question: Vincible
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Capable of being overcome or subdued; conquerable.

qa_pairs.question: Vincibleness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being vincible.

qa_pairs.question: Vincture
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A binding.

qa_pairs.question: Vinculum
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A bond of union; a tie.

qa_pairs.question: Vindemial
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to a vintage, or grape harvest.

qa_pairs.question: Vindemiate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To gather the vintage.

qa_pairs.question: Vindemiation
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The operation of gathering grapes.

qa_pairs.question: Vindicable
qa_pairs.answer: It means Capable of being vindicated.

qa_pairs.question: Vindicate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To lay claim to; to assert a right to; to claim.

qa_pairs.question: Vindication
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of vindicating, or the state of being vindicated; defense; justification against denial or censure; as, the vindication of opinions; his vindication is complete.

qa_pairs.question: Vindicative
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Tending to vindicate; vindicating; as, a vindicative policy.

qa_pairs.question: Vindicator

qa_pairs.question: Vindicatory

qa_pairs.question: Vindictive

qa_pairs.question: Vine

qa_pairs.question: Vineal

qa_pairs.question: Vine-clad

qa_pairs.question: Vined

qa_pairs.question: Vinedresser

qa_pairs.question: Vinegar

qa_pairs.question: Vinegar
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To convert into vinegar; to make like vinegar; to render sour or sharp.

qa_pairs.question: Vinegarette
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Vinaigrette, (n.), 2.

qa_pairs.question: Vinegar fly

qa_pairs.question: Vinegarroon

qa_pairs.question: Vinegary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having the nature of vinegar; sour; unamiable.

qa_pairs.question: Viner
qa_pairs.answer: It means A vinedresser.

qa_pairs.question: Vinery

qa_pairs.question: Vinette
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A sprig or branch.

qa_pairs.question: Vinewed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Vinnewed.

qa_pairs.question: Vineyard

qa_pairs.question: Vineyardist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who cultivates a vineyard.

qa_pairs.question: Vingt et un
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A game at cards, played by two or more persons. The fortune of each player depends upon obtaining from the dealer such cards that the sum of their pips, or spots, is twenty-one, or a number near to it; -- also called also known as blackjack, or also known as twenty-one.

qa_pairs.question: Vingtun
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Contraction for Vingt et un.

qa_pairs.question: Vinic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to wine; as, vinic alcohol.

qa_pairs.question: Viniculture

qa_pairs.question: Vinification

qa_pairs.question: Vinnewed

qa_pairs.question: Vinny

qa_pairs.question: Vinolency

qa_pairs.question: Vinolent

qa_pairs.question: Vinometer

qa_pairs.question: Vin ordinaire

qa_pairs.question: Vinose
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Vinous.

qa_pairs.question: Vinosity
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality or state of being vinous.

qa_pairs.question: Vinous

qa_pairs.question: Vinquish
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Vanquish, (n.)

qa_pairs.question: Vintage

qa_pairs.question: Vintager
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who gathers the vintage.

qa_pairs.question: Vintaging

qa_pairs.question: Vintner
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who deals in wine; a wine seller, or wine merchant.

qa_pairs.question: Vintry

qa_pairs.question: Viny
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to vines; producing, or abounding in, vines.

qa_pairs.answer: It means Violescent.

qa_pairs.question: Violation

qa_pairs.question: Violative

qa_pairs.question: Violent

qa_pairs.question: Violently

qa_pairs.question: Violet-tip
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A very handsome American butterfly (Polygonia interrogationis). Its wings are mottled with various shades of red and brown and have violet tips.

qa_pairs.question: Violin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A small instrument with four strings, played with a bow; a fiddle.

qa_pairs.question: Violine
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A pale yellow amorphous substance of alkaloidal nature and emetic properties, said to have been extracted from the root and foliage of the violet (*Viola*).

qa_pairs.question: Violinist
qa_pairs.answer: It means A player on the violin.

qa_pairs.question: Violist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A player on the viol.

qa_pairs.question: Violoncellist
qa_pairs.answer: It means A player on the violoncello.

qa_pairs.question: Violoncello
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A stringed instrument of music; a bass viol of four strings, or a bass violin with long, large strings, giving sounds an octave lower than the viola, or tenor or alto violin.

qa_pairs.question: Violone
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The largest instrument of the bass-viol kind, having strings tuned an octave below those of the violoncello; the contrabasso; -- called also also known as double bass.

qa_pairs.question: Violous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Violent.

qa_pairs.question: Violuric
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of, pertaining to, or designating, a complex nitroso derivative of barbituric acid. It is obtained as a white or yellow crystalline substance, and forms characteristic yellow, blue, and violet salts.

qa_pairs.question: VIOXX
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A trade name for rofecoxib.

qa_pairs.question: viper
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any one of numerous species of Old World venomous snakes belonging to *Vipera*, *Clotho*, *Daboia*, and other genera of the family Viperidae.

qa_pairs.question: Viperina
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Viperoidea.

qa_pairs.question: Viperine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to a viper or vipers; resembling a viper.

qa_pairs.question: Viperish
qa_pairs.answer: It means Somewhat like a viper; viperous.

qa_pairs.question: Viperoid
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Like or pertaining to the vipers.

qa_pairs.question: Viperoidea
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A division of serpents which includes the true vipers of the Old World and the rattlesnakes and moccasin snakes of America; -- called also also known as Viperina.

qa_pairs.question: Viperous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having the qualities of a viper; malignant; venomous; as, a viperous tongue.

qa_pairs.question: Viraginian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to a virago; having the qualities of a virago.

qa_pairs.question: Viraginity
qa_pairs.answer: It means The qualities or characteristics of a virago.

qa_pairs.question: Virago
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A woman of extraordinary stature, strength, and courage; a woman who has the robust body and masculine mind of a man; a female warrior.

qa_pairs.question: Vire
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An arrow, having a rotary motion, formerly used with the crossbow. Cf. Vireton.

qa_pairs.question: Virelay
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An ancient French song, or short poem, wholly in two rhymes, and composed in short lines, with a refrain.

qa_pairs.question: Virent
qa_pairs.answer: It means Green; not withered.

qa_pairs.question: Vireo
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any one of numerous species of American singing birds belonging to *Vireo* and allied genera of the family Vireonidae. In many of the species the back is greenish, or olive-colored. Called also also known as greenlet.

qa_pairs.question: Virescence
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act or state of becoming green through the formation of chlorophyll.

qa_pairs.question: Virescent
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Beginning to be green; slightly green; greenish.

qa_pairs.question: Vireton
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An arrow or bolt for a crossbow having feathers or brass placed at an angle with the shaft to make it spin in flying.

qa_pairs.question: Virgalieu
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A valuable kind of pear, of an obovate shape and with melting flesh of delicious flavor; -- more properly called White Doyenn<eacute/.

qa_pairs.question: Virgate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having the form of a straight rod; wand-shaped; straight and slender.

qa_pairs.question: Virgate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A yardland, or measure of land varying from fifteen to forty acres.

qa_pairs.question: Virgated
qa_pairs.answer: It means Striped; streaked.

qa_pairs.question: Virge
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A wand. See Verge.

qa_pairs.question: Virger
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Verger.

qa_pairs.question: Virgilian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to Virgil, the Roman poet; resembling the style of Virgil.

qa_pairs.question: Virgin
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A woman who has had no carnal knowledge of man; a maid.

qa_pairs.question: Virgin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Being a virgin; chaste; of or pertaining to a virgin; becoming a virgin; maidenly; modest; indicating modesty; as, a virgin blush.

qa_pairs.question: Virgin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To act the virgin; to be or keep chaste; -- followed by it. See It, 5.

qa_pairs.question: Virginal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to a virgin; becoming a virgin; maidenly.

qa_pairs.question: Virginal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An instrument somewhat resembling the spinet, but having a rectangular form, like the small piano. It had strings and keys, but only one wire to a note. The instrument was used in the sixteenth century, but is now wholly obsolete. It was sometimes called a pair of virginals.

qa_pairs.question: Virginal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To play with the fingers, as if on a virginal; to tap or pat.

qa_pairs.question: Virginhood
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Virginity; maidenhood.

qa_pairs.question: Virginia
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One of the States of the United States of America.

qa_pairs.question: Virginity
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality or state of being a virgin; undefiled purity or chastity; maidenhood.

qa_pairs.question: Virgo
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A sign of the zodiac which the sun enters about the 21st of August, marked thus [<Virgo/] in almanacs.

qa_pairs.question: Virgouleuse
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An old French variety of pear, of little value.

qa_pairs.question: Virgularian
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any one of numerous species of long, slender Alcyonaria belonging to *Virgularia* and allied genera of the family Virgularidae. These corals are allied to the sea-pens, but have a long rodlike rhachis inclosing a slender, round or square, calcareous axis. The polyps are arranged in transverse rows or clusters along each side of the rhachis.

qa_pairs.question: Virgulate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Shaped like a little twig or rod.

qa_pairs.question: Virgule
qa_pairs.answer: It means A comma.

qa_pairs.question: Virial
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A certain function relating to a system of forces and their points of application, -- first used by Clausius in the investigation of problems in molecular physics.

qa_pairs.question: Virid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Green.

qa_pairs.question: Viridescence
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Quality or state of being viridescent.

qa_pairs.question: Viridescent
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Slightly green; greenish.

qa_pairs.question: Viridine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A greenish, oily, nitrogenous hydrocarbon, C12H19N7, obtained from coal tar, and probably consisting of a mixture of several metameric compounds which are higher derivatives of the base pyridine.
