qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In a vulgar manner.

qa_pairs.question: Vulgarness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The quality of being vulgar.

qa_pairs.question: Vulgate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An ancient Latin version of the Scripture, and the only version which the Roman Church admits to be authentic; -- so called from its common use in the Latin Church.

qa_pairs.question: Vulgate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the Vulgate, or the old Latin version of the Scriptures.

qa_pairs.question: Vulnerability
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being vulnerable; vulnerableness.

qa_pairs.question: Vulnerable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Capable of being wounded; susceptible of wounds or external injuries; as, a vulnerable body.

qa_pairs.question: Vulnerableness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality or state of being vulnerable; vulnerability.

qa_pairs.question: Vulnerary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Useful in healing wounds; adapted to the cure of external injuries; as, vulnerary plants or potions.

qa_pairs.question: Vulnerate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To wound; to hurt.

qa_pairs.question: Vulneration
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act of wounding, or the state of being wounded.

qa_pairs.question: Vulnerose
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Full of wounds; wounded.

qa_pairs.question: Vulnific
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Causing wounds; inflicting wounds; wounding.

qa_pairs.question: Vulnose
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having wounds; vulnerose.

qa_pairs.question: Vulpes
qa_pairs.answer: It means A genus of Carnivora including the foxes.

qa_pairs.question: Vulpic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining to, derived from, or designating, an acid obtained from a lichen (Cetraria vulpina) as a yellow or red crystalline substance which on decomposition yields pulvinic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Vulpicide
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who kills a fox, except in hunting; also, the act of so killing a fox.

qa_pairs.question: Vulpine
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the fox; resembling the fox; foxy; cunning; crafty; artful.

qa_pairs.question: Vulpinic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Vulpic.

qa_pairs.question: Vulpinism
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality of being cunning like the fox; craft; artfulness.

qa_pairs.question: Vulpinite
qa_pairs.answer: It means A scaly granular variety of anhydrite of a grayish white color, used for ornamental purposes.

qa_pairs.question: Vultern
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The brush turkey (Talegallus Lathami) of Australia. See Brush turkey.

qa_pairs.question: Vulture
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any one of numerous species of rapacious birds belonging to *Vultur*, *Cathartes*, *Catharista*, and various other genera of the family Vulturidae.

qa_pairs.question: Vulturine
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to a vulture; resembling a vulture in qualities or looks; as, the vulturine sea eagle (Gypohierax Angolensis); vulturine rapacity.

qa_pairs.question: Vulturish
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Vulturous.

qa_pairs.question: Vulturism
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being like a vulture; rapaciousness.

qa_pairs.question: Vulturous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Like a vulture; rapacious.

qa_pairs.question: Vulva
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The external parts of the female genital organs; sometimes, the opening between the projecting parts of the external organs.

qa_pairs.question: Vulviform
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Like a cleft with projecting edges.

qa_pairs.question: Vulvitis
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Inflammation of the vulva.

qa_pairs.question: Vulvo-uterine
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Pertaining both to the vulva and the uterus.

qa_pairs.question: Vulvovaginal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining both to the vulva and the vagina.

qa_pairs.question: Vyce
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A kind of clamp with gimlet points for holding a barrel head while the staves are being closed around it.

qa_pairs.question: Vying
qa_pairs.answer: It means (a. & n.) from Vie.

qa_pairs.question: K
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is the eleventh letter of the English alphabet, is nonvocal consonant. The form and sound of the letter K are from the Latin, which used the letter but little except in the early period of the language. It came into the Latin from the Greek, which received it from a PhK is most nearly related to _c_, _g_, _h_ (which see).

qa_pairs.question: K2
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A mountain in Northern Kashmir; it is one of the highest in the world, 28,250 feet high.

qa_pairs.question: Ka
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An unknown god; an epithet of Prajapati and Brahma.

qa_pairs.question: ka
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A spiritual aspect of the individual, living within the body during life, and surviving the body after death. It was believed to be one of two spirits inhabiting the body, the other being the ba, which deserts teh body at death.

qa_pairs.question: Kaaba
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The small and nearly cubical stone building, in the court of the Great Mosque at Mecca, toward which all Muslims must pray. It contains a sacred black stone, believed by Muslims to be one of the precious stones of paradise, and to have been brought to Abraham when he was contructing the Kaaba, by the Angel Gabriel. The Kaaba itself predates Mohammed, having been a pantheon which contained Arab idols, which were destroyed by Mohammed.

qa_pairs.question: Kaama
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The hartbeest.

qa_pairs.question: Kabala
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Cabala.

qa_pairs.question: Kabassou
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Cabassou.

qa_pairs.question: Kabob
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Cabob, (n. & v. t.)

qa_pairs.question: Kabook
qa_pairs.answer: It means A clay ironstone found in Ceylon.

qa_pairs.question: Kabyle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A Berber, as in Algiers or Tunis. See Berber.

qa_pairs.question: Kadder
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The jackdaw.

qa_pairs.question: Kadi
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A Turkish judge. See Cadi.

qa_pairs.question: Kafal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The Arabian name of two trees of the genus *Balsamodendron*, which yield a gum resin and a red aromatic wood.

qa_pairs.question: Kaffir
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of a race which, with the Hottentots and Bushmen, inhabit South Africa. They inhabit the country north of Cape Colony, the name being now specifically applied to the tribes living between Cape Colony and Natal, including the Ponda, Xosa, and Tembu; but the Zulus of Natal are true Kaffirs.

qa_pairs.question: Kaffle
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Coffle.

qa_pairs.question: Kafilah
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Cafila.

qa_pairs.question: kafir
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Kaffir.

qa_pairs.question: Kafka
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Franz Kafka, a writer, b. 1883, d. 1924.

qa_pairs.question: Kafkaesque
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Frightening, threating, and bewildering in a vague and unexplicable way; -- of situations or regulations. Often used to describe illogical bureaucratic entanglements with no reasonable solution.

qa_pairs.question: Kaftan
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Caftan.

qa_pairs.question: Kage
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A chantry chapel inclosed with lattice or screen work.

qa_pairs.question: Kagu
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A singular, crested, grallatorial bird (Rhinochetos jubatus), native of New Caledonia. It is gray above, paler beneath, and the feathers of the wings and tail are handsomely barred with brown, black, and gray. It is allied to the sun bittern.

qa_pairs.question: Kaguan
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The colugo.

qa_pairs.question: Kahani
qa_pairs.answer: It means A kind of notary public, or attorney, in the Levant.

qa_pairs.question: Kahau
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A long-nosed monkey (Nasalis larvatus, formerly Semnopithecus nasalis), native of Borneo. The general color of the body is bright chestnut, with the under parts, shoulders, and sides of the head, golden yellow, and the top of the head and upper part of the back brown. Called also also known as proboscis monkey. It is now an endangered species.

qa_pairs.question: Kail
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A kind of headless cabbage. Same as Kale, 1.

qa_pairs.question: Kaimacam
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Caimacam.

qa_pairs.question: Kain
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Poultry, etc., required by the lease to be paid in kind by a tenant to his landlord.

qa_pairs.question: Kainit
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Salts of potassium used in the manufacture of fertilizers.

qa_pairs.question: Kainite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A compound salt consisting chiefly of potassium chloride and magnesium sulphate, occurring at the Stassfurt salt mines in Prussian Saxony.

qa_pairs.question: Kainozoic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Cenozoic.

qa_pairs.question: Kaique
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Caique.

qa_pairs.question: Kairine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A pale buff or white crystalline alkaloid derived from quinoline, and used as an antipyretic in medicine.

qa_pairs.question: Kairoline
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An organic base obtained from quinoline. It is used as a febrifuge, and resembles kairine.

qa_pairs.question: Kaiser
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The ancient title of emperors of Germany assumed by King William of Prussia when crowned sovereign of the new German empire in 1871.

qa_pairs.question: Kaka
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A New Zealand parrot of the genus *Nestor*, especially the brown parrot (Nestor meridionalis).

qa_pairs.question: Kakapo
qa_pairs.answer: It means A singular nocturnal parrot (Strigops habroptilus), native of New Zealand. It lives in holes during the day, but is active at night. It resembles an owl in its colors and general appearance. It has large wings, but can fly only a short distance. Called also also known as owl parrot, also known as night parrot, and also known as night kaka.

qa_pairs.question: Kakaralli
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A kind of wood common in Demerara, durable in salt water, because not subject to the depredations of the sea worm and barnacle.

qa_pairs.question: Kakistocracy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Government by the worst men.

qa_pairs.question: Kakoxene
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Cacoxene.

qa_pairs.question: Kalahari
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A desert in Southwestern Africa, most of which is located in the country of Botswana.

qa_pairs.question: Kalan
qa_pairs.answer: It means The sea otter.

qa_pairs.question: kalantas
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A Philippine timber tree (Toona calantas or Cedrela calantas) having hard red fragrant wood.

qa_pairs.question: Kalasie
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A long-tailed monkey of Borneo (Semnopithecus rubicundus). It has a tuft of long hair on the head.

qa_pairs.question: Kale
qa_pairs.answer: It means A variety of cabbage in which the leaves do not form a head, being nearly the original or wild form of the species.

qa_pairs.question: Kaleege
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of several species of large, crested, Asiatic pheasants, belonging to the genus *Euplocamus*, and allied to the firebacks.

qa_pairs.question: Kaleidophon
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An instrument invented by Professor Wheatstone, consisting of a reflecting knob at the end of a vibrating rod or thin plate, for making visible, in the motion of a point of light reflected from the knob, the paths or curves corresponding with the musical notes produced by the vibrations.

qa_pairs.question: Kaleidoscope
qa_pairs.answer: It means An instrument invented by Sir David Brewster, which contains loose fragments of colored glass, etc., and reflecting surfaces so arranged that changes of position exhibit its contents in an endless variety of beautiful colors and symmetrical forms. It has been much employed in arts of design.

qa_pairs.question: Kaleidoscopic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of, pertaining to, or formed by, a kaleidoscope; variegated.

qa_pairs.question: Kalendar
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Calendar.

qa_pairs.question: Kalendarial
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Calendarial.

qa_pairs.question: Kalender
qa_pairs.answer: It means See 3d Calender.

qa_pairs.question: Kalends
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Calends.

qa_pairs.question: Kali
qa_pairs.answer: It means The last and worst of the four ages of the world; -- considered to have begun B. C. 3102, and to last 432,000 years.

qa_pairs.question: Kali
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The black, destroying goddess; -- called also also known as Doorga, also known as Anna Purna.

qa_pairs.question: Kali
qa_pairs.answer: It means The glasswort (Salsola Kali).

qa_pairs.question: kalian
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A pipe with a long flexible tube connected to a container where the smoke is cooled by passing through water. See also hookah.

qa_pairs.question: Kalif
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Caliph.

qa_pairs.question: Kaliform
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Formed like kali, or glasswort.

qa_pairs.question: Kaligenous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Forming alkalies with oxygen, as some metals.

qa_pairs.question: Kalium
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Potassium; -- so called by the German chemists.

qa_pairs.question: Kalki
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The name of Vishnu in his tenth and last avatar.

qa_pairs.question: Kalmia
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of North American shrubs with poisonous evergreen foliage and corymbs of showy flowers. Called also also known as mountain laurel, also known as ivy bush, also known as lamb kill, also known as calico bush, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Kalmuck
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Calmucks.

qa_pairs.question: Kalong
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A fruit bat, esp. the Indian edible fruit bat (Pteropus edulis).

qa_pairs.question: Kaloyer
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Caloyer.

qa_pairs.question: Kalpa
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of the Brahmanic eons, a period of 4,320,000,000 years. At the end of each Kalpa the world is annihilated.

qa_pairs.question: Kalsomine
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Calcimine.

qa_pairs.question: Kam
qa_pairs.answer: It means Crooked; awry.

qa_pairs.question: Kama
qa_pairs.answer: It means The Hindu Cupid. He is represented as a beautiful youth, with a bow of sugar cane or flowers.

qa_pairs.question: Kamala
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The red dusty hairs of the capsules of an East Indian tree (Mallotus Philippinensis) used for dyeing silk. It is violently emetic, and is used in the treatment of tapeworm.

qa_pairs.question: Kame
qa_pairs.answer: It means A low ridge.

qa_pairs.question: Kamet
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A mountain in India and Tibet, 25,447 feet high.

qa_pairs.question: Kami
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A title given to the celestial gods of the first mythical dynasty of Japan and extended to the demigods of the second dynasty, and then to the long line of spiritual princes still represented by the mikado.

qa_pairs.question: Kamichi
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A curious South American bird (Anhima _or_ Palamedea cornuta), often domesticated by the natives and kept with poultry, which it defends against birds of prey. It has a long, slender, hornlike ornament on its head, and two sharp spurs on each wing. Although its beak, feet, and legs resemble those of gallinaceous birds, it is related in anatomical characters to the ducks and geese (Anseres). Called also also known as horned screamer. The name is sometimes applied also to the also known as chaja. See Chaja, and Screamer.

qa_pairs.question: Kamptulicon
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A kind of elastic floor cloth, made of India rubber, gutta-percha, linseed oil, and powdered cork.

qa_pairs.question: Kampylite
qa_pairs.answer: It means A variety of mimetite or arseniate of lead in hexagonal prisms of a fine orange yellow.

qa_pairs.question: Kamsin
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A hot southwesterly wind in Egypt, coming from the Sahara.

qa_pairs.question: Kamtschadales
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An aboriginal tribe inhabiting the southern part of the Kamchatka peninsula; called also also known as Kamchadals and also known as Itelmen.

qa_pairs.question: Kan
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To know; to ken.

qa_pairs.question: Kan
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Khan.

qa_pairs.question: Kanacka
qa_pairs.answer: It means A native of the Sandwich Islands.

qa_pairs.question: Kanawha
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The Kanawha River, a tributary of the Ohio River.

qa_pairs.question: kanchil
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A small chevrotain of the genus *Tragulus*, esp. Tragulus pygm<ae/us, or Tragulus kanchil, inhabiting Java, Sumatra, and adjacent islands; a deerlet. It is noted for its agility and cunning.

qa_pairs.question: Kanchanjanga
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as same as Kanchenjunga.

qa_pairs.question: Kanchenjunga
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A mountain in India and Nepal, 28,146 feet high.

qa_pairs.question: kand
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Fluor spar; -- so called by Cornish miners.

qa_pairs.question: kangaroo
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any one of numerous species of jumping marsupials of the family Macropodid. They inhabit Australia, New Guinea, and adjacent islands, They have long and strong hind legs and a large tail, while the fore legs are comparatively short and feeble. The giant kangaroo (Macropus major) is the largest species, sometimes becoming twelve or fourteen feet in total length. The tree kangaroos, belonging to the genus *Dendrolagus*, live in trees; the rock kangaroos, of the genus *Petrogale*, inhabit rocky situations; and the brush kangaroos, of the genus *Halmaturus*, inhabit wooded districts. See Wallaby.

qa_pairs.question: kangaroo rat
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A jumping rodent of the genus *Dipodomys* of the family Heteromyidae, which lives in arid regions of Mexico and the western U. S.

qa_pairs.question: kangaroos-foot
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A sedgelike spring-flowering herb (Anigozanthus manglesii) of Australia, having clustered flowers covered with woolly hairs.

qa_pairs.question: Kansan
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as of or pertaining to Kansas.

qa_pairs.question: Kansan
qa_pairs.answer: It means a resident of Kansas.

qa_pairs.question: Kansas
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A state of the central United States, bordering the Mississippi River to the west.

qa_pairs.question: Kansas
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A tribe of Indians allied to the Winnebagoes and Osages. They formerly inhabited the region which is now the State of Kansas, but were removed to the Indian Territory.

qa_pairs.question: Kant
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Immanuel Kant, a German philosopher (1724-1804).

qa_pairs.question: Kantian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to Immanuel Kant, the German philosopher; conformed or relating to any or all of the philosophical doctrines of Immanuel Kant.

qa_pairs.question: Kantian
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A follower of Kant; a Kantist.

qa_pairs.question: Kantianism
qa_pairs.answer: It means The doctrine or theory of Kant; the Kantian philosophy.

qa_pairs.question: Kantist
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A disciple or follower of Kant.

qa_pairs.question: Kanttry
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Cantred.

qa_pairs.question: Kaolin
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A very pure white clay, ordinarily in the form of an impalpable powder, and used to form the paste of porcelain; China clay; porcelain clay. It is chiefly derived from the decomposition of common feldspar.

qa_pairs.question: Kaolinization
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The process by which feldspar is changed into kaolin.

qa_pairs.question: Kaolinize
qa_pairs.answer: It means To convert into kaolin.

qa_pairs.question: Kapelle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A chapel; hence, the choir or orchestra of a prince's chapel; now, a musical establishment, usually orchestral.

qa_pairs.question: Kapellmeister
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Capellmeister.

qa_pairs.question: Kapia
qa_pairs.answer: It means The fossil resin of the kauri tree of New Zealand.

qa_pairs.question: Kapnomar
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Capnomor.

qa_pairs.question: Kapok
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A silky wool derived from the seeds of Ceiba pentandra (syn. Eriodendron anfractuosum), a bombaceous tree of the East and West Indies.

qa_pairs.question: Karagane
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A species of gray fox found in Russia.

qa_pairs.question: Karaism
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Doctrines of the Karaites.

qa_pairs.question: Karaite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A sect of Jews who adhere closely to the letter of the Scriptures, rejecting the oral law, and allowing the Talmud no binding authority; -- opposed to the Rabbinists.

qa_pairs.question: Karakul
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A type of Astrakhan, esp. in fine grades, obtained from the Karakul sheep. See sense 2 and cf. Caracul.

qa_pairs.question: Karat
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as the unit of measurement for the proportion of gold in an alloy; 18-karat gold is 75 2.122e-314old; 24-karat gold is pure gold.

qa_pairs.question: Karatas
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A West Indian plant of the Pineapple family (Nidularium Karatas).

qa_pairs.question: karate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as a traditional Japanese system of unarmed combat; sharp blows and kicks are given to pressure-sensitive points on the body of the opponent.

qa_pairs.question: Karen
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A language spoken in the Thai-Burmese borderlands.

qa_pairs.question: Karma
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One's acts considered as fixing one's lot in the future existence.

qa_pairs.question: Karmathian
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of an Islamic sect founded in the ninth century by Karmat.

qa_pairs.question: Karn
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A pile of rocks; sometimes, the solid rock. See Cairn.

qa_pairs.question: Karob
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The twenty-fourth part of a grain; -- a weight used by goldsmiths.

qa_pairs.question: Kaross
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A native garment or rug of skin sewed together in the form of a square.

qa_pairs.question: Karpholite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A fibrous mineral occurring in tufts of a straw-yellow color. It is a hydrous silicate of alumina and manganese.

qa_pairs.question: Karroo
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of the dry table-lands of South Africa, which often rise terracelike to considerable elevations.

qa_pairs.question: Karstenite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Anhydrite.

qa_pairs.question: Karvel
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Carvel, and Caravel.

qa_pairs.question: Karyokinesis
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The indirect division of cells in which, prior to division of the cell protoplasm, complicated changes take place in the nucleus, attended with movement of the nuclear fibrils; -- opposed to karyostenosis. The nucleus becomes enlarged and convoluted, and finally the threads are separated into two groups which ultimately become disconnected and constitute the daughter nuclei. Called also also known as mitosis. See Cell development, under Cell.

qa_pairs.question: Karyokinetic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to karyokinesis; as, karyokinetic changes of cell division.

qa_pairs.question: Karyomiton
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The reticular network of fine fibers, of which the nucleus of a cell is in part composed; -- in opposition to kytomiton, or the network in the body of the cell.

qa_pairs.question: karyoplasm
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The protoplasmic substance of the nucleus of a cell; nucleoplasm; -- in opposition to cytoplasm, the protoplasm of the cell.

qa_pairs.question: Karyostenosis
qa_pairs.answer: It means Direct cell division (in which there is first a simple division of the nucleus, without any changes in its structure, followed by division of the protoplasm of the cell); -- in opposition to karyokinesis.

qa_pairs.question: Karyostenotic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to, or connected with, karyostenosis; as, the karyostenotic mode of nuclear division.

qa_pairs.question: Kasack
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Cossack.

qa_pairs.question: Kat
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An Arabian shrub (Catha edulis) the leaves of which are used as tea by the Arabs.

qa_pairs.question: katabolic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to catabolism; same as catabolic.

qa_pairs.question: Katabolism
qa_pairs.answer: It means Destructive or downward metabolism; regressive metamorphism; same as catabolism (now the more common spelling); -- opposed to anabolism. See Disassimilation.

qa_pairs.question: Katastate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A substance formed by a catabolic process; -- opposed to anastate. See catabolic.

qa_pairs.question: Kate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The brambling finch.

qa_pairs.question: katharsis
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is purging of emotional tensions; -- usually spelled catharsis.

qa_pairs.question: Kathetal
qa_pairs.answer: It means Making a right angle; perpendicular, as two lines or two sides of a triangle, which include a right angle.

qa_pairs.question: Kathetometer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Cathetometer.

qa_pairs.question: Katsuwonidae
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A natural family of fish which in some classifications is considered a separate family comprising the oceanic bonitos.

qa_pairs.question: Katsuwonus
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of oceanic bonitos; in some classifications it is placed in its own family Katsuwonidae.

qa_pairs.question: Kattimundoo
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A caoutchouc-like substance obtained from the milky juice of the East Indian Euphorbia Kattimundoo. It is used as a cement.

qa_pairs.question: Katydid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A large, green, arboreal, orthopterous insect (Cyrtophyllus concavus) of the family Locustid, common in the United States. The males have stridulating organs at the bases of the front wings. During the summer and autumn, in the evening, the males make a peculiar, loud, shrill sound, resembling the combination Katy-did, whence the name.

qa_pairs.question: Kauri
qa_pairs.answer: It means A tall coniferous tree of New Zealand Agathis australis, _or_ Dammara australis), having white straight-grained wood furnishing valuable timber and also yielding one kind of dammar resin.

qa_pairs.question: Kauri
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Kauri resin.

qa_pairs.question: Kauri resin
qa_pairs.answer: It means A resinous product of the kauri, found in the form of yellow or brown lumps in the ground where the trees have grown. It is used for making varnish, and as a substitute for amber.

qa_pairs.question: kaury
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as kauri.

qa_pairs.question: Kava
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A species of *Macropiper* (Macropiper methysticum), the long pepper, from the root of which an intoxicating beverage is made by the Polynesians, by a process of mastication; also, the beverage itself.

qa_pairs.question: Kavass
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An armed constable; also, a government servant or courier.

qa_pairs.question: Kaw
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Caw.

qa_pairs.question: Kawaka
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is a New Zealand tree, the Cypress cedar (Libocedrus Doniana), having a valuable, fine-grained, reddish wood.

qa_pairs.question: Kawn
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An inn.

qa_pairs.question: Kayak
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A light canoe, made of skins stretched over a frame, and usually capable of carrying but one person, who sits amidships and uses a double-bladed paddle. It is peculiar to the Eskimos and other Arctic tribes.

qa_pairs.question: Kayaker
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who uses a kayak.

qa_pairs.question: Kayko
qa_pairs.answer: It means The dog salmon.

qa_pairs.question: Kayles
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A game; ninepins.

qa_pairs.question: Kaynard
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A lazy or cowardly person; a rascal.

qa_pairs.question: kazoo
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A kind of toy or rude musical instrument, as a tube inside of which is a stretched string or membrane made to vibrate by singing or humming into the tube.

qa_pairs.question: Kea
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A large New Zealand parrot (Nestor notabilis), notorious for having acquired the habit of killing sheep; -- called also also known as mountain parrot.

qa_pairs.question: kebab
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See kabab and kabob.

qa_pairs.question: Keck
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To heave or to retch, as in an effort to vomit.

qa_pairs.question: Keck
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An effort to vomit; queasiness.

qa_pairs.question: Keckle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Keck, (v. i. & n.)

qa_pairs.question: Keckle
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To wind old rope around, as a cable, to preserve its surface from being fretted, or to wind iron chains around, to defend from the friction of a rocky bottom, or from the ice.

qa_pairs.question: Keckling
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Old rope or iron chains wound around a cable. See Keckle, (v. t.)

qa_pairs.question: Kecklish
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Inclined to vomit; squeamish.

qa_pairs.question: Kecksy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The hollow stalk of an umbelliferous plant, such as the cow parsnip or the hemlock.

qa_pairs.question: Kecky
qa_pairs.answer: It means Resembling a kecksy.

qa_pairs.question: Keddah
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An inclosure constructed to entrap wild elephants; an elephant trap.

qa_pairs.question: Kedge
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To move (a vessel) by carrying out a kedge in a boat, dropping it overboard, and hauling the vessel up to it.

qa_pairs.question: Kedge
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A small anchor used whenever a large one can be dispensed with. See Kedge, (v. t.), and Anchor, (n.)

qa_pairs.question: Kedger
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A small anchor; a kedge.

qa_pairs.question: Kedlock
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Charlock.

qa_pairs.question: Kee
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Kie, Ky, and Kine.

qa_pairs.question: Keech
qa_pairs.answer: It means A mass or lump of fat rolled up by the butcher.

qa_pairs.question: Keel
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To cool; to skim or stir.

qa_pairs.question: Keel
qa_pairs.answer: It means A brewer's cooling vat; a keelfat.

qa_pairs.question: Keel
qa_pairs.answer: It means A longitudinal timber, or series of timbers scarfed together, extending from stem to stern along the bottom of a vessel. It is the principal timber of the vessel, and, by means of the ribs attached on each side, supports the vessel's frame. In an iron vessel, a combination of plates supplies the place of the keel of a wooden ship. See Illust. of Keelson.

qa_pairs.question: Keel
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To traverse with a keel; to navigate.

qa_pairs.question: Keelage
qa_pairs.answer: It means The right of demanding a duty or toll for a ship entering a port; also, the duty or toll.

qa_pairs.question: Keeled
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Keel-shaped; having a longitudinal prominence on the back; as, a keeled leaf.

qa_pairs.question: Keeler
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One employed in managing a Newcastle keel; -- called also also known as keelman.

qa_pairs.question: Keelfat
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A cooler; a vat for cooling wort, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Keelhaul
qa_pairs.answer: It means To haul under the keel of a ship, by ropes attached to the yardarms on each side. It was formerly practiced as a punishment in the Dutch and English navies.

qa_pairs.question: Keeling
qa_pairs.answer: It means A cod.

qa_pairs.question: Keelivine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A pencil of black or red lead; -- called also also known as keelyvine pen.

qa_pairs.question: Keelman
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Keeler, 1.

qa_pairs.question: keel over
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To drop down in a faint, or as if dead; to die.

qa_pairs.question: Keelrake
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Keelhaul.

qa_pairs.question: Keels
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Ninepins. See Kayles.

qa_pairs.question: Keelson
qa_pairs.answer: It means A piece of timber in a ship laid on the middle of the floor timbers over the keel, and binding the floor timbers to the keel; in iron vessels, a structure of plates, situated like the keelson of a timber ship.

qa_pairs.question: Keelvat
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Keelfat.

qa_pairs.question: Keen
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Sharp; having a fine edge or point; as, a keen razor, or a razor with a keen edge.

qa_pairs.question: Keen
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To sharpen; to make cold.

qa_pairs.question: Keen
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A prolonged wail for a deceased person. Cf. Coranach.

qa_pairs.question: Keen
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To wail as a keener does.

qa_pairs.question: Keener
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A professional mourner who wails at a funeral.

qa_pairs.question: Keenly
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In a keen manner.

qa_pairs.question: Keenness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality or state of being keen.

qa_pairs.question: Keep
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To care; to desire.

qa_pairs.question: Keep
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To remain in any position or state; to continue; to abide; to stay; as, to keep at a distance; to keep aloft; to keep near; to keep in the house; to keep before or behind; to keep in favor; to keep out of company, or out reach.

qa_pairs.question: Keep
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act or office of keeping; custody; guard; care; heed; charge.

qa_pairs.question: Keeper
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who, or that which, keeps; one who, or that which, holds or has possession of anything.

qa_pairs.question: Keepership
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The office or position of a keeper.

qa_pairs.question: Keeping
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A holding; restraint; custody; guard; charge; care; preservation.

qa_pairs.question: Keepsake
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Anything kept, or given to be kept, for the sake of the giver; a token of friendship.

qa_pairs.question: Keesh
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Kish.

qa_pairs.question: Keeve
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A vat or tub in which the mash is made; a mash tub.

qa_pairs.question: Keeve
qa_pairs.answer: It means To set in a keeve, or tub, for fermentation.

qa_pairs.question: Keever
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Keeve, (n.)

qa_pairs.question: Keffe-kil
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Kiefekil.

qa_pairs.question: Kefir
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An effervescent liquor like kumiss, made from fermented milk, used as a food and as a medicine in the northern Caucasus.

qa_pairs.question: Kefir grains
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Small hard yellowish aggregations found in the Caucasus region, and containing various yeasts and bacteria. They are used as a ferment in preparing kefir.

qa_pairs.question: Keg
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A small cask or barrel.

qa_pairs.question: Keilhauite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A mineral of a brownish black color, related to titanite in form. It consists chiefly of silica, titanium dioxide, lime, and yttria.

qa_pairs.question: Keir
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Kier.

qa_pairs.question: Keitloa
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A black, two-horned, African rhinoceros (Atelodus keitloa). It has the posterior horn about as long as the anterior one, or even longer.

qa_pairs.question: Keld
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having a kell or covering; webbed.

qa_pairs.question: Kele
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To cool.

qa_pairs.question: Kell
qa_pairs.answer: It means A kiln.

qa_pairs.question: Kell
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A sort of pottage; kale. See Kale, 2.

qa_pairs.question: Kell
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The caul; that which covers or envelops as a caul; a net; a fold; a film.

qa_pairs.question: Keloid
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Applied to a variety of tumor forming hard, flat, irregular excrescences upon the skin, or to keloid scar tissue.

qa_pairs.question: Keloid
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A keloid tumor.

qa_pairs.question: Kelotomy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Celotomy.

qa_pairs.question: Kelp
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The calcined ashes of seaweed, -- formerly much used in the manufacture of glass, now used in the manufacture of iodine.

qa_pairs.question: Kelpfish
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A small California food fish (Heterostichus rostratus), living among kelp. The name is also applied to species of the genus *Platyglossus*.

qa_pairs.question: Kelpie
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An imaginary spirit of the waters, horselike in form, vulgarly believed to warn, by preternatural noises and lights, those who are to be drowned.

qa_pairs.question: Kelpware
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Kelp, 2.

qa_pairs.question: Kelson
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Keelson.

qa_pairs.question: Kelt
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Kilt, (n.)

qa_pairs.question: Kelt
qa_pairs.answer: It means Cloth with the nap, generally of native black wool.

qa_pairs.question: Kelt
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A salmon after spawning.

qa_pairs.question: Kelt
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Celt, one of Celtic race.

qa_pairs.question: Kelter
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Regular order or proper condition.

qa_pairs.question: Keltic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Celtic, (a. & n.)

qa_pairs.question: Kelvin
qa_pairs.answer: It means The SI unit of temperature, defined as being 1/273.16 of the triple point of water; abbreviated K. The melting point of water at 760 mm pressure is 273.15 Kelvins, and the boiling point 373.15 Kelvins. One degree Kelvin is equal to one degree Centigrade, and <frac95/ degrees Fahrenheit.

qa_pairs.question: Kemb
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To comb.

qa_pairs.question: Kemelin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A tub; a brewer's vessel.

qa_pairs.question: Kemp
qa_pairs.answer: It means Coarse, rough hair in wool or fur, injuring its quality.

qa_pairs.question: Kempe
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Rough; shaggy.

qa_pairs.question: Kemps
qa_pairs.answer: It means The long flower stems of the ribwort plantain (Plantago Lanceolata).

qa_pairs.question: Kempt
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is (p. p.) of Kemb; combed.

qa_pairs.question: Ken
qa_pairs.answer: It means A house; esp., one which is a resort for thieves.

qa_pairs.question: Ken
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To know; to understand; to take cognizance of.

qa_pairs.question: Ken
qa_pairs.answer: It means To look around.

qa_pairs.question: Ken
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Cognizance; view; especially, reach of sight or knowledge.

qa_pairs.question: Kendal green
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A cloth colored green by dye obtained from the woad-waxen, formerly used by Flemish weavers at Kendal, in Westmoreland, England.

qa_pairs.question: Kennedia
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A genus of Australian woody vines having showy red or purplish flowers.

qa_pairs.question: Kennel
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The water course of a street; a little canal or channel; a gutter; also, a puddle.

qa_pairs.question: Kennel
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A house for a dog or for dogs, or for a pack of hounds.

qa_pairs.question: Kennel
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To lie or lodge; to dwell, as a dog or a fox.

qa_pairs.question: Kennel
qa_pairs.answer: It means To put or keep in a kennel.

qa_pairs.question: Kennel coal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Cannel coal.

qa_pairs.question: Kenning
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Range of sight.

qa_pairs.question: Keno
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A gambling game, a variety of the game of lotto, played with balls or knobs, numbered, and cards also numbered.

qa_pairs.question: Kenogenesis
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Modified evolution, in which nonprimitive characters make their appearance in consequence of a secondary adaptation of the embryo to the peculiar conditions of its environment; -- distinguished from palingenesis.

qa_pairs.question: Kenogenetic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to kenogenesis; as, kenogenetic processes.

qa_pairs.question: Kenspeckle
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having so marked an appearance as easily to be recognized.

qa_pairs.question: Kent bugle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A curved bugle, having six finger keys or stops, by means of which the performer can play upon every key in the musical scale; -- called also also known as keyed bugle, and also known as key bugle.

qa_pairs.question: Kentle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A hundred weight; a quintal.

qa_pairs.question: Kentledge
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pigs of iron used for ballast.

qa_pairs.question: Kentucky
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of the United States.

qa_pairs.question: Kenya
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A country in East Africa, formerly a British colony.

qa_pairs.question: Kenyan
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A native or inhabitant of Kenya.

qa_pairs.question: Kenyan
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to Kenya; as, Kenyan mountains; Kenyan coffee.

qa_pairs.question: Kenyapithecus
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of extinct primates having powerful chewing muscles along with large molars and small incisors; its fossils were found in Maboko in Kenya.

qa_pairs.question: kephalin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of a group of phospholipids (nitrogenous phosphorized fatty substances), present in all living cells and particularly noticeable in nervous tissue. Same as cephalin, which see.

qa_pairs.question: kepi
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A military cap having a close-fitting band, a round flat top sloping toward the front, and a visor. As originally worn by the French in Algeria about 1830 it was tall and stiff with a straight visor. It is now lower, has a curved visor, and is frequently soft.

qa_pairs.question: kept
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as (imp. & p. p.) of Keep.

qa_pairs.question: K<eacute/pvisel<oum/h<aacute/z
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Legislature.

qa_pairs.question: keramic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as ceramic.

qa_pairs.question: Keramics
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Ceramics.

qa_pairs.question: Keramographic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Suitable to be written upon; capable of being written upon, as a slate; -- said especially of a certain kind of globe.

qa_pairs.question: Kerana
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A kind of long trumpet, used among the Persians.

qa_pairs.question: Kerargyrite
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Cerargyrite.

qa_pairs.question: Kerasin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A nitrogenous substance free from phosphorus, supposed to be present in the brain; a body closely related to cerebrin.

qa_pairs.question: Kerasine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Resembling horn; horny; corneous.

qa_pairs.question: keratin
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A sulfur-containing fibrous protein constituting the main structural protein of hard epidermal tissues, such as horn, hair, feathers, nails, claws, hoofs, and the like. It is an insoluble substance, and, unlike elastin, is not dissolved even by gastric or pancreatic juice. By decomposition with sulphuric acid it yields leucine and tyrosine plus various other acid-stable amino acids. The amino acid composition varies, but it usually has a high percentage of cystine, which stabilizes and insolubilizes the protein by forming intrachain linkages. A softer form of keratin is present in the epidermis and whalebone. Called also also known as epidermose.

qa_pairs.question: Keratitis
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Inflammation of the cornea.

qa_pairs.question: Keratode
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Keratose.

qa_pairs.question: Keratogenous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Producing horn; as, the keratogenous membrane within the horny hoof of the horse.

qa_pairs.question: Keratoidea
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Keratosa.

qa_pairs.question: Keratome
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An instrument for dividing the cornea in operations for cataract.

qa_pairs.question: Keratonyxis
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The operation of removing a cataract by thrusting a needle through the cornea of the eye, and breaking up the opaque mass.

qa_pairs.question: Keratophyte
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A gorgonian coral having a horny axis.

qa_pairs.question: Keratosa
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An order of sponges having a skeleton composed of hornlike fibers. It includes the commercial sponges.

qa_pairs.question: Keratose
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A tough, horny animal substance entering into the composition of the skeleton of sponges, and other invertebrates; -- called also also known as keratode.

qa_pairs.question: Keratose
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Containing hornlike fibers or fibers of keratose; belonging to the Keratosa.

qa_pairs.question: Keraunograph
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A figure or picture impressed by lightning upon the human body or elsewhere.

qa_pairs.question: Kerb
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Curb.

qa_pairs.question: Kerbstone
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Curbstone.

qa_pairs.question: Kercher
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A kerchief.

qa_pairs.question: Kerchered
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Covered, or bound round, with a kercher.

qa_pairs.question: Kerchief
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A square of fine linen worn by women as a covering for the head; hence, anything similar in form or material, worn for ornament on other parts of the person; -- mostly used in compounds; as, neckerchief; breastkerchief; and later, handkerchief.

qa_pairs.question: Kerchiefed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Dressed; hooded; covered; wearing a kerchief.

qa_pairs.question: Kerf
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A notch, channel, or slit made in any material by cutting or sawing.

qa_pairs.question: Kerite
qa_pairs.answer: It means A compound in which tar or asphaltum combined with animal or vegetable oils is vulcanized by sulphur, the product closely resembling rubber; -- used principally as an insulating material in telegraphy.

qa_pairs.question: Kerl
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Carl.

qa_pairs.question: Kermes
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The dried bodies of the females of a scale insect (Kermes ilices formerly Coccus ilicis), allied to the cochineal insect, and found on several species of oak near the Mediterranean; also, the dye obtained from them. They are round, about the size of a pea, contain coloring matter analogous to carmine, and are used in dyeing. They were anciently thought to be of a vegetable nature, and were used in medicine.

qa_pairs.question: Kermesse
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Kirmess.

qa_pairs.question: Kern
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A light-armed foot soldier of the ancient militia of Ireland and Scotland; -- distinguished from gallowglass, and often used as a term of contempt.

qa_pairs.question: Kern
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A part of the face of a type which projects beyond the body, or shank, such as in certain italic letters.

qa_pairs.question: Kern
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To form with a kern. See 2d Kern.

qa_pairs.question: Kern
qa_pairs.answer: It means A churn.

qa_pairs.question: Kern
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A hand mill. See Quern.

qa_pairs.question: Kern
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To harden, as corn in ripening.

qa_pairs.question: Kern
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Kernel; corn; grain.

qa_pairs.question: Kern baby
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A doll or image decorated with corn (grain) flowers, etc., carried in the festivals of a kern, or harvest-home. Called also also known as harvest queen.

qa_pairs.question: Kerned
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having part of the face projecting beyond the body or shank; -- said of type.

qa_pairs.question: Kernel
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The essential part of a seed; all that is within the seed walls; the edible substance contained in the shell of a nut; hence, anything included in a shell, husk, or integument; as, the kernel of a nut. See Illust. of Endocarp.

qa_pairs.question: Kernel
qa_pairs.answer: It means To harden or ripen into kernels; to produce kernels.

qa_pairs.question: Kerneled
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having a kernel.

qa_pairs.question: Kernelly
qa_pairs.answer: It means Full of kernels; resembling kernels; of the nature of kernels.

qa_pairs.question: Kernish
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Clownish; boorish.

qa_pairs.question: Kerolite
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Cerolite.

qa_pairs.question: Kerosene
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An oil used for illuminating purposes, formerly obtained from the distillation of mineral wax, bituminous shale, etc., and hence called also also known as coal oil. It is now produced in immense quantities, chiefly by the distillation and purification of petroleum. It consists chiefly of several hydrocarbons of the methane series, having from 10 to 16 carbon atoms in each molecule, and having a higher boiling point (175 - 325<deg/ C) than gasoline or the petroleum ethers, and a lower boling point than the oils.

qa_pairs.question: Kers
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A cress.

qa_pairs.question: Kersey
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A kind of coarse, woolen cloth, usually ribbed, woven from wool of long staple.

qa_pairs.question: Kerseymere
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Cassimere.

qa_pairs.question: Kerseynette
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Cassinette.

qa_pairs.question: Kerseys
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Varieties of kersey; also, trousers made of kersey.

qa_pairs.question: Kerve
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To carve.

qa_pairs.question: Kerver
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A carver.

qa_pairs.question: Kesar
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Kaiser.

qa_pairs.question: Keslop
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The stomach of a calf, prepared for rennet.

qa_pairs.question: Kess
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To kiss.

qa_pairs.question: Kest
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as of Cast.

qa_pairs.question: Kestrel
qa_pairs.answer: It means A small, slender European hawk (Falco alaudarius), allied to the sparrow hawk. Its color is reddish fawn, streaked and spotted with white and black. Also called also known as windhover and also known as stannel. The name is also applied to other allied species.

qa_pairs.question: Ket
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Carrion; any filth.

qa_pairs.question: Keta
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A small salmon (Oncorhynchus keta) of inferior value, which in the autumn runs up all the larger rivers between San Francisco and Kamchatka.

qa_pairs.question: Ketch
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An almost obsolete form of sailing vessel, with a mainmast and a mizzenmast, -- usually from one hundred to two hundred and fifty tons burden.

qa_pairs.question: Ketch
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A hangman. See Jack Ketch.

qa_pairs.question: Ketch
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To catch.

qa_pairs.question: ketchup
qa_pairs.answer: It means A pureed table sauce made predominantly from tomatoes, flavored with onions, sugar, salt and spices; called also also known as tomato ketchup. The term is also applied to pureed sauces containing mushrooms, walnuts, etc., being called in such cases also known as mushroom ketchup, also known as walnut ketchup, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Ketine
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of a series of organic bases obtained by the reduction of certain isonitroso compounds of the ketones. In general they are unstable oily substances having a pungent aromatic odor.

qa_pairs.question: Ketmie
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The name of certain African species of *Hibiscus*, cultivated for the acid of their mucilage.

qa_pairs.question: Ketol
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of a series of series of complex nitrogenous substances, represented by methyl ketol and related to indol.

qa_pairs.question: Ketone
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of a large class of organic substances resembling the aldehydes, obtained by the distillation of certain salts of organic acids and consisting of carbonyl (CO) united with two hydrocarbon radicals. In general the ketones are colorless volatile liquids having a pungent ethereal odor.

qa_pairs.question: Ketonic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Pertaining to, or derived from, a ketone; as, a ketonic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Kettle
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A metallic vessel, with a wide mouth, often without a cover, used for heating and boiling water or other liguids.

qa_pairs.question: Kettledrum
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A drum made of thin copper in the form of a hemispherical kettle, with parchment stretched over the mouth of it.

qa_pairs.question: Kettledrummer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who plays on a kettledrum.

qa_pairs.question: Keuper
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The upper division of the European Triassic. See Chart of Geology.

qa_pairs.question: Kevel
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A strong cleat to which large ropes are belayed.

qa_pairs.question: Kevel
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The gazelle.

qa_pairs.question: Kever
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To cover.

qa_pairs.question: Keverchief
qa_pairs.answer: It means A kerchief.

qa_pairs.question: Kex
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A weed; a kecksy.

qa_pairs.question: Key
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An instrument by means of which the bolt of a lock is shot or drawn; usually, a removable metal instrument fitted to the mechanism of a particular lock and operated by turning in its place.

qa_pairs.question: Key
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To fasten or secure firmly; to fasten or tighten with keys or wedges.

qa_pairs.question: key
qa_pairs.answer: It means Essential; most important; as, the key fact in the inquiry; the president was the key player inthe negotiations.

qa_pairs.question: Keyage
qa_pairs.answer: It means Wharfage; quayage.

qa_pairs.question: Keyboard
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The whole arrangement, or one range, of the keys{3} of an organ, piano, typewriter, etc.; that part of a device containing the keys{3} used to operate it.

qa_pairs.question: Key-cold
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Cold as a metallic key; lifeless.

qa_pairs.question: Keyed
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Furnished with keys; as, a keyed instrument; also, set to a key, as a tune.

qa_pairs.question: Key fruit
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A samara.

qa_pairs.question: Keyhole
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A hole or apertupe in a door or lock, for receiving a key.

qa_pairs.question: keyless
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as lacking or not requiring a key; as, a keyless lock operated by a series of pushbuttons. Opposite of Antonym: keyed.

qa_pairs.question: Keynes
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is John Maynard Keynes, the british economist (1883-1946) whose book <ldquo/The General Theory of Employment, Interest, and Money<rdquo/ (Macmillan, 1936) had a strong influence on views of the government's role in the economy through the 1970's. See Keynesian.

qa_pairs.question: Keynesian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to John Maynard Keynes; conforming to the theories of Keynesianism; -- especially, the term is used to refer to the macroeconomic theories and politico-economic policies proposed by Keynes and his followers, especially in regards to their advocacy of governmental action to maintain low unemployment through government spending. Keynes's book <ldquo/The General Theory of Employment, Interest, and Money<rdquo/ (Macmillan, 1936) had a strong influence on views of the government's role in the economy through the 1970's.

qa_pairs.question: Keynesianism
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is the macroeconomic theories and politico-economic policies of British economist John Maynard Keynes (1883-1946) and his followers; -- used especially in reference to their advocacy of governmental action to maintain low unemployment through government spending. See Keynes.

qa_pairs.question: Keynote
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The tonic or first tone of the scale in which a piece or passage is written; the fundamental tone of the chord, to which all the modulations of the piece are referred; -- called also also known as key tone.

qa_pairs.question: Keyseat
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To form a key seat, as by cutting. See Key seat, under Key.

qa_pairs.question: Keystone
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The central or topmost stone of an arch. This in some styles is made different in size from the other voussoirs, or projects, or is decorated with carving. See Illust. of Arch.

qa_pairs.question: Keystone State
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pennsylvania; -- a nickname alluding to its having been the central one of the 13 original United States, at the time of formation of the Constitution.

qa_pairs.question: Key tone
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Keynote.

qa_pairs.question: Keyway
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Key way, under Key.

qa_pairs.question: keyword
qa_pairs.answer: It means A word used as an entry point into an index which serves to identify files, records, texts, or other data containing the keyword or some related word, such as a synonym. It is a type of key{15}; as, a boolean combination of keywords is more effective for information retrieval than a single key{15}.

qa_pairs.question: Khaki
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of a dull brownish yellow, or drab color; -- applied to cloth, originally to a stout brownish cotton cloth, used in making uniforms in the Anglo-Indian army.

qa_pairs.question: Khaki
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any kind of khaki cloth; hence, a uniform of khaki or, rarely, a soldier clad in khaki. In the United States and British armies khaki or cloth of a very similar color is almost exclusively used for service in the field.

qa_pairs.question: Khaliff
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Caliph.

qa_pairs.question: Khalka
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is the dialect of Mongolian that is the official language of the Mongolian People's Republic.

qa_pairs.question: Khamsin
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Kamsin.

qa_pairs.question: Khan
qa_pairs.answer: It means A king; a prince; a chief; a governor; -- so called among the Tartars, Turks, and Persians, and in countries now or formerly governed by them.

qa_pairs.question: Khan
qa_pairs.answer: It means An Eastern inn or caravansary.

qa_pairs.question: Khanate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Dominion or jurisdiction of a khan.

qa_pairs.question: Kharkov
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A city in Ukraine; -- its former capital.

qa_pairs.question: Khaya
qa_pairs.answer: It means A lofty West African tree (Khaya Senegalensis), related to the mahogany, which it resembles in the quality of the wood. The bark is used as a febrifuge.

qa_pairs.question: Khedive
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A governor or viceroy; -- a title granted in 1867 by the sultan of Turkey to the ruler of Egypt.

qa_pairs.question: Khenna
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Henna.

qa_pairs.question: Kholah
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The Indian jackal.

qa_pairs.question: Kholsun
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The dhole.

qa_pairs.question: Khond
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A Dravidian of a group of tribes of Orissa, India, a section of whom were formerly noted for their cruel human sacrifices to the earth goddess, murder of female infants, and marriage by capture.

qa_pairs.question: Khutbah
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An address or public prayer read from the steps of the pulpit in Muslim mosques, offering glory to God, praising Mohammed and his descendants, and the ruling princes.

qa_pairs.question: Ki
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The Sumerian goddess personifying earth; the counterpart of Akkadian Aruru.

qa_pairs.question: kiaat
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as a deciduous South African tree (Pterocarpus angolensis) having large odd-pinnate leaves and profuse fragrant orange-yellow flowers; it yields a red juice and heavy strong durable wood.

qa_pairs.question: Kiabooca wood
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Kyaboca wood.

qa_pairs.question: Kiang
qa_pairs.answer: It means The dziggetai.

qa_pairs.question: Kibble
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To bruise; to grind coarsely; as, kibbled oats.

qa_pairs.question: Kibble
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A large iron bucket used in Cornwall and Wales for raising ore out of mines.

qa_pairs.question: Kibblings
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Portions of small fish used for bait on the banks of Newfoundland.

qa_pairs.question: kibbutz
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as an Israeli communal{2} form of agricultural settlement. Originally it was predominantly agricultural and practiced a very high level of sharing, including collective rearing of children. More recently (by 1998) industries have taken over a significant role in the Kibbutz economy, and the level of sharing has dropped significantly.

qa_pairs.question: kibbutznik
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is a member of a kibbutz.

qa_pairs.question: Kibe
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A chap or crack in the flesh occasioned by cold; an ulcerated chilblain.

qa_pairs.question: Kibed
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Chapped; cracked with cold; affected with chilblains; as, kibed heels.

qa_pairs.question: Kibitka
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A tent used by the Kirghiz Tartars.

qa_pairs.question: Kiblah
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Keblah.

qa_pairs.question: Kibosh
qa_pairs.answer: It means Nonsense; stuff; also, fashion; style.

qa_pairs.question: Kiby
qa_pairs.answer: It means Affected with kibes.

qa_pairs.question: Kichil
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Kechil.

qa_pairs.question: Kick
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To strike, thrust, or hit violently with the foot; as, a horse kicks a groom; a man kicks a dog.

qa_pairs.question: Kick
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To thrust out the foot or feet with violence; to strike out with the foot or feet, as in defense or in bad temper; esp., to strike backward, as a horse does, or to have a habit of doing so.

qa_pairs.question: Kick
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A blow with the foot or feet; a striking or thrust with the foot.

qa_pairs.question: Kickable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Capable or deserving of being kicked.

qa_pairs.question: Kickapoos
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A tribe of Indians which formerly occupied the region of Northern Illinois, allied in language to the Sacs and Foxes.

qa_pairs.question: kickback
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is recoil, of a gun or machine, as in older automobile engines when started by turning a crank.

qa_pairs.question: kick back
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To recoil; -- of guns and machines.

qa_pairs.question: kick back
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To pay (a kickback); as, they kicked back five percent of the sales price.

qa_pairs.question: Kicker
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who, or that which, kicks.

qa_pairs.question: kicking
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of delivering a blow with the foot.

qa_pairs.question: kickoff
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A kick from the center of the field to start a football game or to resume it after a score.

qa_pairs.question: kick off
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To kick the football from the center of the field to start a football game or to resume it after a score; as, they kicked off at two o'clock.

qa_pairs.question: kick off
qa_pairs.answer: It means to begin; to commence; as, they kicked off the rally with a playing of the national anthem.

qa_pairs.question: Kickshaw
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Kickshaws, the correct singular.

qa_pairs.question: Kickshaws
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Something fantastical; any trifling, trumpery thing; a toy.

qa_pairs.question: Kickshoe
qa_pairs.answer: It means A kickshaws.

qa_pairs.question: Kicksy-wicksy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That which is restless and uneasy.

qa_pairs.question: Kicksy-wicksy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Fantastic; restless; as, kicksy-wicksy flames.

qa_pairs.question: Kickup
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The water thrush or accentor.

qa_pairs.question: Kid
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A young goat.

qa_pairs.question: Kid
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To bring forth a young goat.

qa_pairs.question: Kid
qa_pairs.answer: It means Made of kidskin; as, kid gloves.

qa_pairs.question: Kid
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To talk with in a joking or jesting manner; as, she kidded him about his freckles. Often used with around; as, he was just kidding around about the fire

qa_pairs.question: Kid
qa_pairs.answer: It means To tell a false story, as a jest; as, he was kidding about being a pilot.

qa_pairs.question: Kid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A fagot; a bundle of heath and furze.

qa_pairs.question: Kid
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is of Kythe.

qa_pairs.question: Kid
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Kiddy, (v. t.)

qa_pairs.question: Kidde
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is (imp.) of Kythe.

qa_pairs.question: Kidderminster
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A kind of ingrain carpeting, named from the English town where formerly most of it was manufactured.

qa_pairs.question: Kiddier
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A huckster; a cadger.

qa_pairs.question: Kiddle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A kind of basketwork weir in a river, for catching fish.

qa_pairs.question: Kiddow
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The guillemot.

qa_pairs.question: Kiddy
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To deceive; to outwit; to hoax.

qa_pairs.question: Kiddy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A young fellow; formerly, a low thief.

qa_pairs.question: Kiddyish
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Frolicsome; sportive.

qa_pairs.question: Kid fox
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A young fox.

qa_pairs.question: Kidling
qa_pairs.answer: It means A young kid.

qa_pairs.question: Kidnap
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To take (any one) by force or fear, and against one's will, with intent to carry to another place.

qa_pairs.question: Kidnaper
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who steals or forcibly carries away a human being; a manstealer.

qa_pairs.question: kidnapping
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as the unlawful act of capturing and carrying away a person against their will and holding them in false imprisonment.

qa_pairs.question: Kidney
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A glandular organ which excretes urea and other waste products from the animal body; a urinary gland.

qa_pairs.question: Kidney-form
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having the form or shape of a kidney; reniform; as, a kidney-shaped leaf; a kidney-shaped swimming pool.

qa_pairs.question: Kidneywort
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A kind of saxifrage (Saxifrage stellaris).

qa_pairs.question: kidskin
qa_pairs.answer: It means A soft smooth leather from the hide of a young goat; kid{3}.

qa_pairs.question: Kie
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Kine; cows.

qa_pairs.question: Kiefekil
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A species of clay; meerschaum.

qa_pairs.question: Kier
qa_pairs.answer: It means A large tub or vat in which goods are subjected to the action of hot lye or bleaching liquor; -- also called also known as keeve.

qa_pairs.question: Kieselguhr
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Siliceous earth; diatomaceous earth; specifically, porous infusorial earth, used as an absorbent of nitroglycerin in the manufacture of dynamite.

qa_pairs.question: Kieserite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Hydrous sulphate of magnesia found at the salt mines of Stassfurt, Prussian Saxony.

qa_pairs.question: Kieve
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Keeve, (n.)

qa_pairs.question: Kiggelaria
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A small genus of South African shrubs or small trees.

qa_pairs.question: Kike
qa_pairs.answer: It means To gaze; to stare.

qa_pairs.question: Kike
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To kick.

qa_pairs.question: kike
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A derogatory name for a jew, usually intended and taken as disparaging and offensive.

qa_pairs.question: kildeer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as killdeer.

qa_pairs.question: Kilderkin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A small barrel; an old liquid measure containing eighteen English beer gallons, or nearly twenty-two gallons, United States measure.

qa_pairs.question: Kilerg
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A unit of work equal to one thousand ergs.

qa_pairs.question: kiley
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An Australian boomerang, having one side flat and the other convex.

qa_pairs.question: Kilkenny cats
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Two cats fabled, in an Irish story, to have fought till nothing was left but their tails. It is probably a parable of a local contest between Kilkenny and Irishtown, which impoverished both towns.

qa_pairs.question: Kill
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A kiln.

qa_pairs.question: Kill
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A channel or arm of the sea; a river; a stream; as, the channel between Staten Island and Bergen Neck is the Kill van Kull, or the Kills; -- used also in composition; as, Schuylkill, Catskill, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Kill
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To deprive of life, animal or vegetable, in any manner or by any means; to render inanimate; to put to death; to slay.

qa_pairs.question: Kill
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of killing.

qa_pairs.question: killable
qa_pairs.answer: It means fit to kill, especially for food.

qa_pairs.question: Killdee
qa_pairs.answer: It means A small American plover (Charadrius vociferus, formerly Aegialitis vocifera) of inland waters and fields having a distinctive cry. The adult has two black bands around the neck and upper breast, but the young chick has only the breast band. It ranges from Canada to Mexico and the West Indies.

qa_pairs.question: Killer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who deprives of life; one who, or that which, kills.

qa_pairs.question: Killer whale
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as see killer{2}.

qa_pairs.question: Killesse
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A gutter, groove, or channel.

qa_pairs.question: Killifish
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any one of several small American cyprinodont fishes of the genus *Fundulus* and allied genera. They live equally well in fresh and brackish water, or even in the sea. They are usually striped or barred with black. Called also also known as minnow, and also known as brook fish. See Minnow.

qa_pairs.question: Killigrew
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The Cornish chough. See under Chough.

qa_pairs.question: Killikinick
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Kinnikinic.

qa_pairs.question: Killing
qa_pairs.answer: It means Literally, that kills; having power to kill; fatal; in a colloquial sense, conquering; captivating; irresistible.

qa_pairs.question: killing
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act or process of causing a living organism to die.

qa_pairs.question: Kill-joy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who causes gloom or grief; a dispiriting person; a spoilsport.

qa_pairs.question: Killock
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A small anchor; also, a kind of anchor formed by a stone inclosed by pieces of wood fastened together.

qa_pairs.question: Killow
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An earth of a blackish or deep blue color.

qa_pairs.question: Kiln
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A large stove or oven; a furnace of brick or stone, or a heated chamber, for the purpose of hardening, burning, or drying anything; as, a kiln for baking or hardening earthen vessels; a kiln for drying grain, meal, lumber, etc.; a kiln for calcining limestone.

qa_pairs.question: Kiln-dry
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To dry in a kiln; as, to kiln-dry meal or grain.

qa_pairs.question: Kilnhole
qa_pairs.answer: It means The mouth or opening of an oven or kiln.

qa_pairs.question: Kilo
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An abbreviation of Kilogram.

qa_pairs.question: Kilo-
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A combining form used to signify thousand in forming the names of units of measurement; as, kilogram, kilometer, kilowatt, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Kilogram
qa_pairs.answer: It means A measure of mass and weight, being a thousand grams, equal to 2.2046226 pounds avoirdupois (15,432.34 grains). It is nearly equal to the mass of a cubic decimeter of distilled water at the temperature of maximum density, or 39<deg/ Fahrenheit. See 3rd gram.

qa_pairs.question: Kilogrammeter
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A measure of energy or work done, being the amount expended in raising one kilogram through the height of one meter, in the latitude of Paris.

qa_pairs.question: Kiloliter
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A measure of capacity equal to a cubic meter, or a thousand liters. It is equivalent to 35.315 cubic feet, and to 220.04 imperial gallons, or 264.18 American gallons of 321 cubic inches.

qa_pairs.question: Kilometer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A measure of length, being a thousand meters. It is equal to 3,280.84 feet, or 0.62137119 of a mile.

qa_pairs.question: Kilostere
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A cubic measure containing 1000 cubic meters, and equivalent to 35,315 cubic feet.

qa_pairs.question: Kilovolt
qa_pairs.answer: It means A unit of electromotive force equal to one thousand volts.

qa_pairs.question: Kilowatt
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One thousand watts.

qa_pairs.question: Kilowatt hour
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A unit of work or energy equal to that done by one kilowatt acting for one hour; -- approximately equal to 1.34 horse-power hour.

qa_pairs.question: Kilt
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as (p. p.) from Kill.

qa_pairs.question: Kilt
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A kind of short petticoat, reaching from the waist to the knees, worn in the Highlands of Scotland by men, and in the Lowlands by young boys; a filibeg.

qa_pairs.question: Kilt
qa_pairs.answer: It means To tuck up; to truss up, as the clothes.

qa_pairs.question: Kilted
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having on a kilt.

qa_pairs.question: kilter
