qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Regular order or proper condition. Same as kelter, but kilter is the more common spelling in the U. S. Used chiefly in the phrase out of kilter, meaning out of order or irregular in some manner.

qa_pairs.question: Kilting
qa_pairs.answer: It means A perpendicular arrangement of flat, single plaits, each plait being folded so as to cover half the breadth of the preceding one.

qa_pairs.question: Kimbo
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Crooked; arched; bent.

qa_pairs.question: Kimmerian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Cimmerian.

qa_pairs.question: Kimnel
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A tub. See Kemelin.

qa_pairs.question: kimono
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A kind of loose robe or gown tied with a sash, worn as a traditional outer garment by Japanese women and men. Women may wear it with a broad sash called an obi, having a large bow in the back. At present (1998), most Japanese wear it only at home or on ceremonial occasions, western-style clothing being more common in the workplace.

qa_pairs.question: Kimry
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Cymry.

qa_pairs.question: -kin
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A diminutive suffix; as, manikin; lambkin.

qa_pairs.question: Kin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A primitive Chinese instrument of the cittern kind, with from five to twenty-five silken strings.

qa_pairs.question: Kin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Relationship, consanguinity, or affinity; connection by birth or marriage; kindred; near connection or alliance, as of those having common descent.

qa_pairs.question: Kin
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The unit velocity in the C. G. S. system -- a velocity of one centimeter per second.

qa_pairs.question: Kin
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of the same nature or kind; kinder.

qa_pairs.question: Kin<ae/sodic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Kinesodic.

qa_pairs.question: kinaesthesia
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The perception attendant upon the movements of the muscles; the sensation accompanying movement of the muscles.

qa_pairs.question: Kin<ae/sthetic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of, pertaining to, or involving, kinaesthesia.

qa_pairs.question: kinase
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One of a class of enzymes that catalyze transfer of a phosphate group from ATP to another molecule; it is a type of phosphorylase.

qa_pairs.question: Kinate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Quinate.

qa_pairs.question: Kinchinjunga
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as same as Kanchenjunga.

qa_pairs.question: Kincob
qa_pairs.answer: It means India silk brocaded with flowers in silver or gold.

qa_pairs.question: Kind
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Characteristic of the species; belonging to one's nature; natural; native.

qa_pairs.question: Kind
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Nature; natural instinct or disposition.

qa_pairs.question: Kind
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To beget.

qa_pairs.question: Kindergarten
qa_pairs.answer: It means A class within a primary school or a separate school for young children, usually between the ages of four and six years, designed to adapt children to the classroom environment before beginning academic training, on the theory that education should be begun by gratifying and cultivating the normal aptitude for exercise, play, observation, imitation, and construction; -- a name given by Friedrich Froebel, a German educator, who introduced this method of training, in rooms opening on a garden.

qa_pairs.question: Kindergartner
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who teaches in a kindergarten.

qa_pairs.question: Kind-hearted
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having kindness of nature; sympathetic; characterized by a humane disposition; as, a kind-hearted landlord.

qa_pairs.question: Kind-heartedness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The state or quality of being kind-hearted; benevolence.

qa_pairs.question: Kindle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To bring forth young.

qa_pairs.question: Kindle
qa_pairs.answer: It means To set on fire; to cause to burn with flame; to ignite; to cause to begin burning; to start; to light; as, to kindle a match, or shavings.

qa_pairs.question: Kindle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To take fire; to begin to burn with flame; to start as a flame.

qa_pairs.question: Kindler
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who, or that which, kindles, stirs up, or sets on fire.

qa_pairs.question: Kindless
qa_pairs.answer: It means Destitute of kindness; unnatural.

qa_pairs.question: Kindliness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Natural inclination; natural course.

qa_pairs.question: Kindling
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act of causing to burn, or of exciting or inflaming the passions.

qa_pairs.question: Kindly
qa_pairs.answer: It means According to the kind or nature; natural.

qa_pairs.question: Kindly
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Naturally; fitly.

qa_pairs.question: Kindness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state or quality of being kind, in any of its various senses; manifestation of kind feeling or disposition beneficence.

qa_pairs.question: Kindred
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Relationship by birth or marriage; consanguinity; affinity; kin.

qa_pairs.question: Kindred
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Related; congenial; of the like nature or properties; as, kindred souls; kindred skies; kindred propositions.

qa_pairs.question: Kine
qa_pairs.answer: It means Cows.

qa_pairs.question: Kinematic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to kinematics.

qa_pairs.question: Kinematics
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The science which treats of motions considered in themselves, or apart from their causes; the comparison and relation of motions.

qa_pairs.question: Kinepox
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Cowpox.

qa_pairs.question: Kinesiatrics
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A mode of treating disease by appropriate muscular movements; -- also termed also known as kinesitherapy, also known as kinesipathy, also known as lingism, and the also known as movement cure.

qa_pairs.question: Kinesipathy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Kinesiatrics.

qa_pairs.question: Kinesitherapy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Kinesiatrics.

qa_pairs.question: Kinesodic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Conveying motion; as, kinesodic substance; -- applied esp. to the spinal cord, because it is capable of conveying doth voluntary and reflex motor impulses, without itself being affected by motor impulses applied to it directly.

qa_pairs.question: kinetic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Moving or causing motion; motory; active, as opposed to latent.

qa_pairs.question: kinesthesia
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See kinaesthesia, kinaesthesis, and kinaesthetic.

qa_pairs.question: kinesthetics
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The ability to feel movements of the limbs and body.

qa_pairs.question: kinetics
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Dynamics.

qa_pairs.question: kinetogenesis
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The doctrine or hypothesis that animal structures have been produced, directly or indirectly, by animal movements.

qa_pairs.question: kinetoscope
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An instrument for producing curves by the combination of circular movements; -- called also also known as kinescope.

qa_pairs.question: kinetograph
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A camera for making chronophotographs.

qa_pairs.question: kinetophone
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A machine combining a kinetoscope and a phonograph synchronized so as to reproduce a scene and its accompanying sounds. It has been superseded by recording techniques allowing the sounds to be recorded directly on the motion-picture film.

qa_pairs.question: Kinetoscope
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An obsolete form of moving picture viewer, in which a film carrying successive instantaneous views of a moving scene travels uniformly through the field of a magnifying glass. The observer sees each picture, momentarily, through a slit in a revolving disk, and these glimpses, blended by persistence of vision, give the impression of continuous motion. It has been superseded by more recent versions of movie projector and electronic video viewers.

qa_pairs.question: kinfolk
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Relatives; kindred; kin; kinsfolk; persons of the same family or closely related families.

qa_pairs.question: King
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A Chinese musical instrument, consisting of resonant stones or metal plates, arranged according to their tones in a frame of wood, and struck with a hammer.

qa_pairs.question: King
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A chief ruler; a sovereign; one invested with supreme authority over a nation, country, or tribe, usually by hereditary succession; a monarch; a prince.

qa_pairs.question: King
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To supply with a king; to make a king of; to raise to royalty.

qa_pairs.question: King, Martin Luther, jr.
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A small American bird (Tyrannus tyrannus, or Tyrannus Carolinensis), noted for its courage in attacking larger birds, even hawks and eagles, especially when they approach its nest in the breeding season. It is a typical tyrant flycatcher, taking various insects upon the wing. It is dark ash above, and blackish on the bead and tail. The quills and wing coverts are whitish at the edges. It is white beneath, with a white terminal band on the tail. The feathers on the head of the adults show a bright orange basal spot when erected. Called also also known as bee bird, and also known as bee martin. Several Southern and Western species of *Tyrannus* are also called king birds.

qa_pairs.question: Kingbolt
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A vertical iron bolt, by which the forward axle and wheels of a vehicle or the trucks of a railroad car are connected with the other parts.

qa_pairs.question: King Charles spaniel
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A variety of small pet dogs, having, drooping ears, a high, dome-shaped forehead, pug nose, large, prominent eyes, and long, wavy hair. The color is usually black and tan.

qa_pairs.question: Kingcraft
qa_pairs.answer: It means The craft of kings; the art of governing as a sovereign; royal policy.

qa_pairs.question: Kingcup
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The common buttercup.

qa_pairs.question: Kingdom
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The rank, quality, state, or attributes of a king; royal authority; sovereign power; rule; dominion; monarchy.

qa_pairs.question: Kingdomed
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having a kingdom or the dignity of a king; like a kingdom.

qa_pairs.question: Kingfish
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An American marine food fish of the genus *Menticirrus*, especially Menticirrus saxatilis, or Menticirrus nebulosos, of the Atlantic coast; -- called also also known as whiting, also known as surf whiting, and also known as barb.

qa_pairs.question: Kingfisher
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any one of numerous species of birds constituting the family Alcedinid. Most of them feed upon fishes which they capture by diving and seizing them with the beak; others feed only upon reptiles, insects, etc. About one hundred and fifty species are known. They are found in nearly all parts of the world, but are particularly abundant in the East Indies.

qa_pairs.question: Kinghood
qa_pairs.answer: It means The state of being a king; the attributes of a king; kingship.

qa_pairs.question: Kingless
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having no king.

qa_pairs.question: Kinglet
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A little king; a weak or insignificant king.

qa_pairs.question: Kinglihood
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as King-liness.

qa_pairs.question: Kingliness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The state or quality of being kingly.

qa_pairs.question: Kingling
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Kinglet, 1.

qa_pairs.question: Kingly
qa_pairs.answer: It means Belonging to, suitable to, or becoming, a king; characteristic of, or resembling, a king; directed or administered by a king; monarchical; royal; sovereign; regal; august; noble; grand.

qa_pairs.question: Kingly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In a kingly or kinglike manner.

qa_pairs.question: King-post
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A member of a common form of truss, as a roof truss. It is strictly a tie, intended to prevent the sagging of the tiebeam in the middle. If there are struts, supporting the main rafters, they often bear upon the foot of the king-post. Called also also known as crown-post.

qa_pairs.question: Kings Bench
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Formerly, the highest court of common law in England; -- so called because the king used to sit there in person. It consisted of a chief justice and four puisne, or junior, justices. During the reign of a queen it was called the also known as Queen's Bench. Its jurisdiction was transferred by the judicature acts of 1873 and 1875 to the high court of justice created by that legislation.

qa_pairs.question: Kingship
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state, office, or dignity of a king; royalty.

qa_pairs.question: king-size
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as extra large; as, a king-size bed.

qa_pairs.question: Kingston
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The black angel fish. See Angel fish, under Angel.

qa_pairs.question: Kingston metal
qa_pairs.answer: It means An alloy of tin, copper, and mercury, sometimes used for the bearings and packings of machinery.

qa_pairs.question: Kingston valve
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A conical valve, opening outward, to close the mouth of a pipe which passes through the side of a vessel below the water line.

qa_pairs.question: Kingtruss
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A truss, framed with a king-post; -- used in roofs, bridges, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Kinic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Quinic.

qa_pairs.question: Kink
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A twist or loop in a rope or thread, caused by a spontaneous doubling or winding upon itself; a close loop or curl; a doubling in a cord.

qa_pairs.question: Kink
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To wind into a kink; to knot or twist spontaneously upon itself, as a rope or thread.

qa_pairs.question: Kink
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A fit of coughing; also, a convulsive fit of laughter.

qa_pairs.question: Kinkajou
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A nocturnal carnivorous mammal (Cercoleptes caudivolvulus) of South America, about as large as a full-grown cat. It has a prehensile tail and lives in trees. It is the only representative of a distinct family (Cercoleptid) allied to the raccoons. Called also also known as potto, and also known as honey bear.

qa_pairs.question: Kinkhaust
qa_pairs.answer: It means Whooping cough.

qa_pairs.question: Kinkle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as 3d Kink.

qa_pairs.question: Kinky
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Full of kinks; liable to kink or curl; as, kinky hair.

qa_pairs.question: Kinnikinic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Prepared leaves or bark of certain plants; -- used by the Indians of the Northwest for smoking, either mixed with tobacco or as a substitute for it. Also, a plant so used, as the osier cornel (Cornus stolonijra), and the bearberry (Arctostaphylus Uva-ursi).

qa_pairs.question: Kinit
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A unit of force equal to the force which, acting for one second, will give a pound a velocity of one foot per second; -- proposed by J. D. Everett, an English physicist.

qa_pairs.question: Kino
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The dark red dried juice of certain plants, used variously in tanning, in dyeing, and as an astringent in medicine.

qa_pairs.question: Kinology
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as That branch of physics which treats of the laws of motion, or of moving bodies.

qa_pairs.question: Kinone
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Quinone.

qa_pairs.question: Kinoyl
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Quinoyl.

qa_pairs.question: Kinrede
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Kindred.

qa_pairs.question: Kinsfolk
qa_pairs.answer: It means Relatives; kindred; kin; kinfolk; persons of the same family or closely related families.

qa_pairs.question: Kinshasa
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is the capital city of Zaire, formerly named also known as Leopoldville.

qa_pairs.question: Kinship
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Family relationship.

qa_pairs.question: Kinsman
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A man of the same race or family; one related by blood.

qa_pairs.question: Kinsmanship
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Kinship.

qa_pairs.question: Kinswoman
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A female relative.

qa_pairs.question: Kintlidge
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Kentledge.

qa_pairs.question: Kiosk
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A Turkish open summer house or pavilion, supported by pillars.

qa_pairs.question: Kioways
qa_pairs.answer: It means A tribe of Indians distantly related to the Shoshones. They formerly inhabited the region about the head waters of the North Platte.

qa_pairs.question: Kip
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The hide of a young or small beef creature, or leather made from it; kipskin.

qa_pairs.question: Kip
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A sharp-pointed hill; a projecting point, as on a hill.

qa_pairs.question: Kipe
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An osier basket used for catching fish.

qa_pairs.question: Kipling
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Rudyard Kipling, English author (1865-1936). He was born at Bombay, India in 1865, the son of John Lockwood Kipling, who was formerly head of the Lahore School of Industrial Art. He was educated in England and returned to India in 1880 as editor of the <ldquo/Lahore Civil and Military Gazette.<rdquo/ He returned to England about 1889, and lived several years in the United States. While in India he published stories, sketches, and poems descriptive of India and Anglo-Indian military and civil life: <ldquo/ Departmental Ditties, etc.<rdquo/, <ldquo/Plain Tales from the Hills<rdquo/, <ldquo/Mine Own People<rdquo/, <ldquo/Soldiers Three<rdquo/, <ldquo/Barrack-room Ballads, etc.<rdquo/, and others. After leaving India he published <ldquo/The Light That Failed,<rdquo/ <ldquo/Naulahka<rdquo/ (with Balestier), <ldquo/Many Inventions,<rdquo/ <ldquo/The Jungle Book,<rdquo/ <ldquo/The Second Jungle Book,<rdquo/ <ldquo/The Seven Seas,<rdquo/ <ldquo/Captains Courageous,<rdquo/ <ldquo/The White Man's Burden,<rdquo/ <ldquo/Kim,<rdquo/ <ldquo/The Man Who Would Be King and Other Stories,<rdquo/ and others.

qa_pairs.question: Kiplingesque
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of, pertaining to, or in the style of Rudyard Kipling.

qa_pairs.question: Kipper
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A salmon after spawning.

qa_pairs.question: Kipper
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To cure, by splitting, salting, and smoking.

qa_pairs.question: Kipper
qa_pairs.answer: It means Amorous; also, lively; light-footed; nimble; gay; sprightly.

qa_pairs.question: Kippernut
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A name given to earthnuts of several kinds.

qa_pairs.question: Kipskin
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Leather prepared from the skin of young or small cattle, intermediate in grade between calfskin and cowhide.

qa_pairs.question: Kirghizia
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A country in Central Asia, formerly an Asian Soviet. It borders on Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, China, and Tajikistan.

qa_pairs.question: Kirk
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A church or the church, in the various senses of the word; esp., the Church of Scotland as distinguished from other reformed churches, or from the Roman Catholic Church.

qa_pairs.question: Kirked
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Turned upward; bent.

qa_pairs.question: Kirkman
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A clergyman or officer in a kirk.

qa_pairs.question: Kirkyard
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A churchyard.

qa_pairs.question: Kirmess
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In Europe, particularly in Belgium and Holland, and outdoor festival and fair; in the United States, generally an indoor entertainment and fair combined.

qa_pairs.question: Kish

qa_pairs.question: Kislev
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is the third month of the Jewish civil year; the ninth month of the ecclesiastical year in the Jewish calendar, occupying a part of November and a part of December.

qa_pairs.question: Kismet
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Destiny; fate.

qa_pairs.question: Kiss
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To salute with the lips, as a mark of affection, reverence, submission, forgiveness, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Kisser

qa_pairs.answer: It means Any one of several species of blood-sucking, venomous Hemiptera that sometimes bite the lip or other parts of the human body, causing painful sores, as the cone-nose (Conorhinus sanguisuga).

qa_pairs.question: kissing cousin
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A cousin sufficiently well acquainted to be greeted with a kiss; a type of kissing kin.

qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The portion of the upper crust of a loaf which has touched another loaf in baking.

qa_pairs.question: kissing kin

qa_pairs.question: Kissing strings
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Cap or bonnet strings made long to tie under the chin.

qa_pairs.question: kiss-me-over-the-garden-gate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An annual (Polygonum orientale) with broadly ovate leaves and slender drooping spikes of crimson flowers; it is native to Southeastern Asia and Australia, and naturalized in North America.

qa_pairs.question: Kist
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A chest; hence, a coffin.

qa_pairs.question: Kist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A stated payment, especially a payment of rent for land; hence, the time for such payment.

qa_pairs.question: kistvaen
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A Celtic monument, commonly known as a also known as dolmen.

qa_pairs.question: kit
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To cut.

qa_pairs.question: kit
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A kitten.

qa_pairs.question: Kit
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A small violin.

qa_pairs.question: Kit
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A large bottle.

qa_pairs.question: kitambilla
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A small shrubby spiny tree (Dovyalis hebecarpa) cultivated for its maroon-purple fruit with sweet purple pulp tasking like gooseberries; it is native to Sri Lanka and India.

qa_pairs.question: kitbag
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as a knapsack (usually for a soldier).

qa_pairs.question: Kitcat
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Designating a club in London, to which Addison and Steele belonged; -- so called from Christopher Cat, a pastry cook, who served the club with mutton pies.

qa_pairs.question: Kitcat
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A game played by striking with a stick small piece of wood, called a cat, shaped like two cones united at their bases; tipcat.

qa_pairs.question: Kitchen
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A room equipped for cooking food; the room of a house, restaurant, or other building appropriated to cookery.

qa_pairs.question: Kitchen
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To furnish food to; to entertain with the fare of the kitchen.

qa_pairs.question: Kitchener
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A kitchen servant; a cook.

qa_pairs.question: Kitchenette
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A room combining a very small kitchen and a pantry, with the kitchen conveniences compactly arranged, sometimes so that they fold up out of sight and allow the kitchen to be made a part of the adjoining room by opening folding doors.

qa_pairs.question: Kitchenmaid
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A woman employed in the kitchen.

qa_pairs.question: Kitchen middens
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Relics of neolithic man found on the coast of Denmark, consisting of shell mounds, some of which are ten feet high, one thousand feet long, and two hundred feet wide. The name is applied also to similar mounds found on the American coast from Canada to Florida, made by the North American Indians.

qa_pairs.question: Kitchenry
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The body of servants employed in the kitchen; the staff of a kitchen.

qa_pairs.question: kitchenware
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Implements for use in a kitchen, or for cooking, such as pots, pans, ladles, measuring cups, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Kite

qa_pairs.question: Kite
qa_pairs.answer: It means To raise money by as, kiting transactions. See Kite, 6.

qa_pairs.question: Kite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The belly.

qa_pairs.question: Kiteflying
qa_pairs.answer: It means A mode of raising money, or sustaining one's credit, by the use of paper which is merely nominal; -- called also also known as kiting.

qa_pairs.question: Kith
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Acquaintance; kindred.

qa_pairs.question: Kithara
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Cithara.

qa_pairs.question: Kithe
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Kythe.

qa_pairs.question: Kitish

qa_pairs.question: Kitling
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A young kitten; a whelp.

qa_pairs.question: Kitte

qa_pairs.question: Kittel

qa_pairs.question: Kitten
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A young cat.

qa_pairs.question: Kitten
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To bring forth young, as a cat; to bring forth, as kittens.

qa_pairs.question: kittenish
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Resembling a kitten; playful; as, a kittenish disposition.

qa_pairs.question: kitten-tails
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is a plant of the genus *Besseya* having fluffy spikes of flowers.

qa_pairs.question: Kittiwake
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A northern gull (Rissa tridactyla), inhabiting the coasts of Europe and America. It is white, with black tips to the wings, and has only three toes.

qa_pairs.question: Kittle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To bring forth young, as a cat; to kitten; to litter.

qa_pairs.answer: It means To tickle.

qa_pairs.question: Kittle

qa_pairs.question: Kittlish

qa_pairs.question: Kitty
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A kitten; also, a pet name or calling name for the cat.

qa_pairs.question: Kittysol
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The Chinese paper parasol.

qa_pairs.question: Kiva
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A large chamber built under, or in, the houses of a Pueblo village, used as an assembly room in religious rites or as a men's dormitory. It is commonly lighted and entered from an opening in the roof.

qa_pairs.question: Kive
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A mash vat. See Keeve.

qa_pairs.question: Kiver
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To cover.

qa_pairs.question: Kjoekken moeddings
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Kitchen middens.

qa_pairs.question: Klamaths
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A collective name for the Indians of several tribes formerly living along the Klamath river, in California and Oregon, but now restricted to a reservation at Klamath Lake; -- called also also known as Clamets and also known as Hamati.

qa_pairs.question: Klansman
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as a member of the Ku Klux Klan.

qa_pairs.question: klatch
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An informal group that gathers more or less frequently, especially for conversation; as, a coffee klatsch; a sewing klatsch.

qa_pairs.question: klavern

qa_pairs.question: klavier

qa_pairs.question: klaxon
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A kind of loud horn formerly used on motor vehicles.

qa_pairs.question: kleagle
qa_pairs.answer: It means An officer, especially an attorney, of the Ku Klux Klan.

qa_pairs.question: Kleeneboc
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An antelope (Cerphalopus pygm<ae/us), found in South Africa. It is of very small size, being but one foot high at the shoulder. It is remarkable for its activity, and for its mild and timid disposition. Called also also known as guevi, and also known as pygmy antelope.

qa_pairs.question: Kleenex
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A piece of soft absorbent tissue paper (usually two or more thin layers) used as a disposable handkerchief; -- still a current trademark, but often used generically.

qa_pairs.question: Kleptomania
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A propensity to steal, claimed to be irresistible. This does not constitute legal irresponsibility.

qa_pairs.question: Kleptomaniac
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A person affected with kleptomania.

qa_pairs.question: Klick
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Click.

qa_pairs.question: Klicket
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A small postern or gate in a palisade, for the passage of sallying parties.

qa_pairs.question: Klinkstone
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Clinkstone.

qa_pairs.question: Klinometer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Clinometer.

qa_pairs.question: Klipdas
qa_pairs.answer: It means A small mammal (Hyrax Capensis), found in South Africa. It is of about the size of a rabbit, and closely resembles the daman. Called also also known as rock rabbit.

qa_pairs.question: Klipfish
qa_pairs.answer: It means Dried cod, exported from Norway.

qa_pairs.question: Klipspringer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A small, graceful South African antelope (Nanotragus oreotragus), which, like the chamois, springs from one crag to another with great agility; -- called also also known as kainsi.

qa_pairs.question: Kloof
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A glen; a ravine closed at its upper end.

qa_pairs.question: Klopemania
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Kleptomania.

qa_pairs.question: Knab
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To seize with the teeth; to gnaw.

qa_pairs.question: Knabble
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To bite or nibble.

qa_pairs.question: Knack
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To crack; to make a sharp, abrupt noise to chink.

qa_pairs.question: Knack
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A petty contrivance; a toy; a plaything; a knickknack.

qa_pairs.question: Knacker
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who makes knickknacks, toys, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Knacker
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as a harness maker.

qa_pairs.question: Knackish
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Trickish; artful.

qa_pairs.question: Knack-kneed
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Knock-kneed.

qa_pairs.question: Knacky
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having a knack; cunning; crafty; trickish.

qa_pairs.question: Knag
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A knot in wood; a protuberance.

qa_pairs.question: Knagged
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Full of knots; knaggy.

qa_pairs.question: Knaggy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Knotty; rough; figuratively, rough in temper.

qa_pairs.question: Knap
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A protuberance; a swelling; a knob; a button; hence, rising ground; a summit. See Knob, and Knop.

qa_pairs.question: Knap
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To bite; to bite off; to break short.

qa_pairs.question: Knap
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To make a sound of snapping.

qa_pairs.question: Knap
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A sharp blow or slap.

qa_pairs.question: Knapbottle
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The bladder campion (Silene inflata).

qa_pairs.question: Knappish
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Snappish; peevish.

qa_pairs.question: Knapple
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To break off with an abrupt, sharp noise; to bite; to nibble.

qa_pairs.question: Knappy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having knaps; full of protuberances or humps; knobby.

qa_pairs.question: Knapsack
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A case of canvas, leather, nylon, or other sturdy fabric, fitted with straps, for carrying on the back the food, clothing, or other supplies for a soldier or a traveler; as, to hike up the mountain with lunch in a knapsack.

qa_pairs.question: Knapweed
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The black centaury (Centaurea nigra); -- so called from the knoblike heads of flowers. Called also also known as bullweed.

qa_pairs.question: Knar
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Gnar.

qa_pairs.question: Knarl
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A knot in wood. See Gnarl.

qa_pairs.question: Knarled
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Knotted. See Gnarled.

qa_pairs.question: Knarred
qa_pairs.answer: It means Knotty; gnarled.

qa_pairs.question: Knarry
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Knotty; gnarled.

qa_pairs.question: Knave
qa_pairs.answer: It means A boy; especially, a boy servant.

qa_pairs.question: Knavery
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The practices of a knave; petty villainy; fraud; trickery; a knavish action.

qa_pairs.question: Knaveship
qa_pairs.answer: It means A small due, in meal, established by usage, which is paid to the under miller.

qa_pairs.question: Knavess
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A knavish woman.

qa_pairs.question: Knavish
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Like or characteristic of a knave{3}; given to knavery; trickish; fraudulent; dishonest; villainous; as, a knavish fellow, or a knavish trick.

qa_pairs.question: Knavishly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In a knavish manner; dishonestly; fraudulently.

qa_pairs.question: knavishness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality or state of being knavish; knavery; dishonesty.

qa_pairs.question: Knaw
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Gnaw.

qa_pairs.question: Knawel
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A low, spreading weed (Scleranthus annuus), common in sandy soil.

qa_pairs.question: Knead
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To work and press into a mass, usually with the hands; esp., to work, as by repeated pressure with the knuckles, into a well mixed mass, as the materials of bread, cake, etc.; as, to knead dough.

qa_pairs.question: knead
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To perform movements like kneading, with the paws; -- said of cats, which may knead{3} a master's body when stroked, presumably a sign of contentment; as, a cat kneading and purring in his master's lap.

qa_pairs.question: Kneadable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as That may be kneaded; capable of being worked into a mass.

qa_pairs.question: Kneader
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who kneads.

qa_pairs.question: Kneadingly
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In the manner of one kneading.

qa_pairs.question: Knebelite
qa_pairs.answer: It means A mineral of a gray, red, brown, or green color, and glistening luster. It is a silicate of iron and manganese.

qa_pairs.question: Kneck
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The twisting of a rope or cable, as it is running out.

qa_pairs.question: Knee
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In man, the joint in the middle part of the leg.

qa_pairs.question: Knee
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To supplicate by kneeling.

qa_pairs.question: Kneebrush
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A tuft or brush of hair on the knees of some species of antelopes and other animals; -- chiefly used in the plural.

qa_pairs.question: kneecap
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A roundish, flattened, sesamoid bone in the tendon in front of the knee joint; the patella; the kneepan.

qa_pairs.question: kneecap
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is to break the knees of, especially by shooting in the kneecap; -- often done by criminal or terrorist groups as a warning or punishment.

qa_pairs.question: Knee-crooking
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Obsequious; fawning; cringing.

qa_pairs.question: Kneed
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having knees;- used chiefly in composition; as, in-kneed; out-kneed; weak-kneed.

qa_pairs.question: Knee-deep
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Rising to the knees; knee-high; as, water or snow knee-deep.

qa_pairs.question: Knee-high
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Rising or reaching upward to the knees; as, the water is knee-high.

qa_pairs.question: Knee jerk
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A jerk or forward kick of the lower part of the leg produced by a blow or sudden strain upon the patellar tendon of the knee, which causes a sudden contraction of the quadriceps muscle; the patellar reflex.

qa_pairs.question: Knee jerk
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as emotional and predictable; -- of certain people and their reactions to events.

qa_pairs.question: Knee jerk liberal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as a person of strong liberal convictions who reacts predictably and emotionally to certain events.

qa_pairs.question: Knee jerk reaction
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as an immediate unthinking emotional reaction produced by an event or statement to which the reacting person is highly sensitive; -- in persons with strong feelings on a topic, it may be very predictable.

qa_pairs.question: Kneejoint
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The joint of the knee.

qa_pairs.question: Kneejointed
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Geniculate; kneed. See Kneed, (a.), 2.

qa_pairs.question: Kneel
qa_pairs.answer: It means To bend the knee; to fall or rest on the knees; -- sometimes with down.

qa_pairs.question: Kneeler
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who kneels or who worships by or while kneeling.

qa_pairs.question: Kneelingly
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In a kneeling position.

qa_pairs.question: Kneepan
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A roundish, flattened, sesamoid bone in the tendon in front of the knee joint; the patella; the kneecap.

qa_pairs.question: Kneepiece
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A piece shaped like a knee; as, the kneepieces or ears of a boat.

qa_pairs.question: Kneippism
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Treatment of disease by forms of hydrotherapy, as walking barefoot in the morning dew, baths, wet compresses, cold affusions, etc.; -- so called from its originator, Sebastian Kneipp (1821-97), a German priest.

qa_pairs.question: Knell
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The stroke of a bell tolled at a funeral or at the death of a person; a death signal; a passing bell;

qa_pairs.question: Knell
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To sound as a knell; especially, to toll at a death or funeral; hence, to sound as a warning or evil omen.

qa_pairs.question: Knell
qa_pairs.answer: It means To summon, as by a knell.

qa_pairs.question: Knelt
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as (imp. & p. p.) of Kneel.

qa_pairs.question: Knew
qa_pairs.answer: It means (imp.) of Know.

qa_pairs.question: Knicker
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A small ball of clay, baked hard and oiled, used as a marble by boys in playing.

qa_pairs.question: Knickerbocker
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A linsey-woolsey fabric having a rough knotted surface on the right side; used for women's dresses.

qa_pairs.question: Knickerbocker
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A descendent of the early Dutch colonists of the New York City area; -- used mostly as a nickname for an inhabitant of New York state or especially New York City.

qa_pairs.question: Knickerbockers
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The name for a style of short breeches; smallclothes; called also also known as knickers.

qa_pairs.question: knickers
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The name for a style of loose-fitting short trousers, gathered in and ending at the knees; smallclothes; called also also known as knickerbockers.

qa_pairs.question: Knickknack
qa_pairs.answer: It means A trifle or toy; a bawble; a gewgaw; a tchotchke.

qa_pairs.question: Knickknackatory
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A collection of knickknacks.

qa_pairs.question: Knickknackery
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Knickknacks.

qa_pairs.question: Knife
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An instrument consisting of a thin blade, usually of steel and having a sharp edge for cutting, fastened to a handle, but of many different forms and names for different uses; as, table knife, drawing knife, putty knife, pallet knife, pocketknife, penknife, chopping knife, etc..

qa_pairs.question: Knife
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To prune with the knife.

qa_pairs.question: Knifeboard
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A board on which knives are cleaned or polished.

qa_pairs.question: Knife-edge
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A piece of steel sharpened to an acute edge or angle, and resting on a smooth surface, serving as the axis of motion of a pendulum, scale beam, or other piece required to oscillate with the least possible friction.

qa_pairs.question: Knife switch
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A switch consisting of one or more knifelike pieces hinged at one end and making contact near the other with flat gripping springs.

qa_pairs.question: Knight
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A young servant or follower; a military attendant.

qa_pairs.question: Knight
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To dub or create (one) a knight; -- done in England by the sovereign only, who taps the kneeling candidate with a sword, saying: Rise, Sir ---.

qa_pairs.question: Knightage
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The body of knights, taken collectively.

qa_pairs.question: Knight bachelor
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A knight of the most ancient, but lowest, order of English knights, and not a member of any order of chivalry. See Bachelor, 4.

qa_pairs.question: Knight banneret
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A knight who carried a banner, who possessed fiefs to a greater amount than the knight bachelor, and who was obliged to serve in war with a greater number of attendants. The dignity was sometimes conferred by the sovereign in person on the field of battle.

qa_pairs.question: Knight baronet
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Baronet.

qa_pairs.question: Knight-errant
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A wandering knight; a knight who traveled in search of adventures, for the purpose of exhibiting military skill, prowess, and generosity.

qa_pairs.question: Knight-errantry
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The character or actions of wandering knights; the practice of wandering in quest of adventures; chivalry; a quixotic or romantic adventure or scheme.

qa_pairs.question: Knight-er-ratic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to a knight-errant or to knight-errantry.

qa_pairs.question: Knighthead
qa_pairs.answer: It means A bollard timber. See under Bollard.

qa_pairs.question: Knighthood
qa_pairs.answer: It means The character, dignity, or condition of a knight, or of knights as a class; hence, chivalry.

qa_pairs.question: Knightless
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Unbecoming a knight.

qa_pairs.question: Knightliness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The character or bearing suitable for a knight; chivalry.

qa_pairs.question: Knightly
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to a knight; becoming a knight; chivalrous; as, a knightly combat; a knightly spirit.

qa_pairs.question: Knightly
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In a manner becoming a knight.

qa_pairs.question: Knight marshal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An officer in the household of the British sovereign, who has cognizance of transgressions within the royal household and verge, and of contracts made there, a member of the household being one of the parties.

qa_pairs.question: Knight service
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The military service by rendering which a knight held his lands.

qa_pairs.question: Knights fee
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The fee of a knight; specif., the amount of land the holding of which imposed the obligation of knight service, being sometimes a hide{1}(b) or less, sometimes six or more hides.

qa_pairs.question: Knight Templar
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Commandery, (n.), 3, and also Templar, (n.), 1 and 3.

qa_pairs.question: knish
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A fried, or sometimes baked, turnover made from a round or square sheet of dough containing a filling, usually of meat or potatoes.

qa_pairs.question: Knit
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To form into a knot, or into knots; to tie together, as cord; to fasten by tying.

qa_pairs.question: Knit
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To form a fabric by interlacing yarn or thread; to weave by making knots or loops.

qa_pairs.question: Knit
qa_pairs.answer: It means Union knitting; texture.

qa_pairs.question: Knitback
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The plant comfrey; -- so called from its use as a restorative.

qa_pairs.question: Knitch
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A number of things tied or knit together; a bundle; a fagot.

qa_pairs.question: Knits
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Small particles of ore.

qa_pairs.question: Knitster
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A woman who knits.

qa_pairs.question: Knitter
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who, or that which, knits, joins, or unites; a knitting machine.

qa_pairs.question: Knitting
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The work of a knitter; the network formed by knitting; knitwork.

qa_pairs.question: Knittle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A string that draws together a purse or bag.

qa_pairs.question: knitwear
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is knitted clothing.

qa_pairs.question: knitwork
qa_pairs.answer: It means A network of yarn created by interlacing threads of yarn in a series of connected loops using straight eyeless needles or by machine; knitting.

qa_pairs.question: Knives
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is (n. pl.) of Knife. See Knife.

qa_pairs.question: Knob
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A hard protuberance; a hard swelling or rising; a bunch; a lump; as, a knob in the flesh, or on a bone.

qa_pairs.question: Knob
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To grow into knobs or bunches; to become knobbed.

qa_pairs.question: Knobbed
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Containing knobs; full of knobs; ending in a nob. See Illust of Antenna.

qa_pairs.question: Knobber
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Knobbler.

qa_pairs.question: Knobbing
qa_pairs.answer: It means Rough dressing by knocking off knobs or projections.

qa_pairs.question: Knobbler
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The hart in its second year; a young deer.

qa_pairs.question: Knobbling fire
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A bloomery fire. See Bloomery.

qa_pairs.question: Knobby
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Full of, or covered with, knobs or hard protuberances.

qa_pairs.question: knobkerrie
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A short wooden club with a knobbed end used as a missile weapon by Kafir and other native tribes of South Africa.

qa_pairs.question: Knobstick
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who refuses to join, or withdraws from, a trade union.

qa_pairs.question: Knock
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To drive or be driven against something; to strike against something; to clash; as, one heavy body knocks against another.

qa_pairs.question: Knock
qa_pairs.answer: It means To strike with something hard or heavy; to move by striking; to drive (a thing) against something; as, to knock a ball with a bat; to knock the head against a post; to knock a lamp off the table.

qa_pairs.question: Knock
qa_pairs.answer: It means A blow; a stroke with something hard or heavy; a jar.

qa_pairs.question: Knockabout
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A small yacht, generally from fifteen to twenty-five feet in length, having a mainsail and a jib; a sloop with a simplified rig and no bowsprit. All knockabouts have ballast and either a keel or centerboard. The original type was twenty-one feet in length. The next larger type is called a raceabout.

qa_pairs.question: knockabout
qa_pairs.answer: It means Marked by knocking about or roughness.

qa_pairs.question: Knock down
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To strike down; to fell; to prostrate by a blow or by blows; as, to knock down an assailant.

qa_pairs.question: Knockdown
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as That which knocks one down; something that overpowers or overwhelms, as strong liquor; specif., a kind of ale or beer that is very strong.

qa_pairs.question: Knockdown
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of force sufficient to fell or completely overthrow; as, a knockdown blow; a knockdown argument..

qa_pairs.question: knock-down-and-drag-out
qa_pairs.answer: It means marked by extreme violence; -- of fights; also used metaphorically of fierce contests; as, a knock-down-and-drag-out fight; a knockdown-dragout competition for the browser market.

qa_pairs.question: knocked-out
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as damaged; -- not used of persons; as, the gym has some of the most knocked-out equipment since Vic Tanny. Opposite of Antonym: undamaged.

qa_pairs.question: knocker
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who, or that which, knocks; specifically, an instrument, or kind of hammer, fastened to a door, to be used in seeking for admittance.

qa_pairs.question: Knocking
qa_pairs.answer: It means A beating; a rap; a series of raps.

qa_pairs.question: Knockings
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Large lumps picked out of the sieve, in dressing ore.

qa_pairs.question: knock-knee
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A condition in which the knees are bent in so as to touch each other in walking; inknee.

qa_pairs.question: knock-kneed
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having the legs bent inward so that the knees touch in walking.

qa_pairs.question: knock-knees
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as knock-knee.

qa_pairs.question: knock off
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as a device in a knitting machine to remove loops from the needles.

qa_pairs.question: knock off
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as to quit (working).

qa_pairs.question: knockoff
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A cheap imitation of something popular, produced illegally without a license from the trademark owner, and of inferior materials.

qa_pairs.question: Knock-off
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Act or place of knocking off; that which knocks off;

qa_pairs.question: Knock-off
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That knocks off; of or pertaining to knocking off.

qa_pairs.question: Knock-out
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is That knocks out; characterized by knocking out; as, a knock-out blow; a knock-out key for knocking out a drill from a collet.

qa_pairs.question: knockout
qa_pairs.answer: It means Act of knocking out, or state of being knocked out; the act of rendering a person unconscious by a blow.

qa_pairs.question: knockout drops
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Drops of any drug, used to a person to fall asleep or become unconscious or stupefied for the purpose of robbery, etc.; they are usually mixed into a drink so that the person consuming it does so unknowingly. One compound used for this purpose is chloral hydrate.

qa_pairs.question: Knockstone
qa_pairs.answer: It means A block upon which ore is broken up.

qa_pairs.question: Knoll
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A little round hill; a mound; a small elevation of earth; the top or crown of a hill.

qa_pairs.question: Knoll
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To ring, as a bell; to strike a knell upon; to toll; to proclaim, or summon, by ringing.

qa_pairs.question: Knoll
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To sound, as a bell; to knell.

qa_pairs.question: Knoll
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The tolling of a bell; a knell.

qa_pairs.question: Knoller
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who tolls a bell.

qa_pairs.question: Knop
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A knob; a bud; a bunch; a button.

qa_pairs.question: Knopped
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having knops or knobs; fastened as with buttons.

qa_pairs.question: Knoppern
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A kind of gall produced by a gallfly on the cup of an acorn, -- used in tanning and dyeing.

qa_pairs.question: Knopweed
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Knapweed.

qa_pairs.question: Knor
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Knur.

qa_pairs.question: Knosp
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Knop, 2.

qa_pairs.question: Knot
qa_pairs.answer: It means A fastening together of the parts or ends of one or more threads, cords, ropes, etc., by any one of various ways of tying or entangling.

qa_pairs.question: Knot
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To tie in or with, or form into, a knot or knots; to form a knot on, as a rope; to entangle.

qa_pairs.question: Knot
qa_pairs.answer: It means To form knots or joints, as in a cord, a plant, etc.; to become entangled.

qa_pairs.question: Knotberry
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The cloudberry (Rudus Cham<ae/morus); -- so called from its knotted stems.

qa_pairs.question: Knotgrass
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as a common weed with jointed stems (Polygonum aviculare); knotweed.

qa_pairs.question: Knotless
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Free from knots; without knots.

qa_pairs.question: Knotted
qa_pairs.answer: It means Full of knots; having knots; knurled; as, a knotted cord; the knotted oak.

qa_pairs.question: Knottiness
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality or state of being knotty or full of knots.

qa_pairs.question: Knotty
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Full of knots; knotted; having many knots; as, knotty timber; a knotty rope.

qa_pairs.question: Knotweed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Knotgrass.

qa_pairs.question: Knotwort
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A small, herbaceous, trailing plant, of the genus *Illecebrum* (Illecebrum verticillatum).

qa_pairs.question: Knout
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A kind of whip for flogging criminals, formerly much used in Russia. The lash is a tapering bundle of leather thongs twisted with wire and hardened, so that it mangles the flesh.

qa_pairs.question: Knout
qa_pairs.answer: It means To punish with the knout.

qa_pairs.question: Know
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Knee.

qa_pairs.question: Know
qa_pairs.answer: It means To perceive or apprehend clearly and certainly; to understand; to have full information of; as, to know one's duty.

qa_pairs.question: Know
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To have knowledge; to have a clear and certain perception; to possess wisdom, instruction, or information; -- often with of.

qa_pairs.question: Knowable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as That may be known; capable of being discovered, understood, or ascertained.

qa_pairs.question: Knowa bleness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The state or quality of being knowable.

qa_pairs.question: Know-all
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who knows everything; hence, one who makes pretension to great knowledge; a wiseacre; a know-it-all; -- usually ironical.

qa_pairs.question: Knower
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who knows.

qa_pairs.question: knowhow
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is the knowledge and skill required to do something; practical knowledge for a specific task.

qa_pairs.question: Knowing
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Skilful; well informed; intelligent; as, a knowing man; a knowing dog.

qa_pairs.question: Knowing
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Knowledge; hence, experience.

qa_pairs.question: Knowingly
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as With knowledge; in a knowing manner; intelligently; consciously; deliberately; as, he would not knowingly offend.

qa_pairs.question: Knowingness
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The state or quality of being knowing or intelligent; shrewdness; skillfulness.

qa_pairs.question: Know-it-all
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who knows everything;

qa_pairs.question: Knowleche
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Knowledge.

qa_pairs.question: Knowleching
qa_pairs.answer: It means Knowledge.

qa_pairs.question: Knowledge
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act or state of knowing; clear perception of fact, truth, or duty; certain apprehension; familiar cognizance; cognition.

qa_pairs.question: Knowledge
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To acknowledge.

qa_pairs.question: knowledgeable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is thoroughly acquainted with and skilled in something through study or experience; as, knowledgeable in classical languages. Opposite of Antonym: unversed, Antonym: unacquainted, and Antonym: unfamiliar.

qa_pairs.question: knowledge engineering
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The application of computerized data and text manipulation to manage and interpret large bodies of knowledge, or find useful information in large bodies of data. The study of methods for knowledge engineering is generally considered as a branch of artificial intelligence.

qa_pairs.question: knowledge-intensive
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Requiring access to and manipulation of large quantities of knowledge; as, knowledge-intensive labor.

qa_pairs.question: knowledge worker
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A person whose occupation is predominantly concerned with generating or interpreting information, as contrasted with manual labor.

qa_pairs.question: Known
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is of Know.

qa_pairs.question: Know-nothing
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A member of a secret political organization in the United States, the chief objects of which were the proscription of foreigners by the repeal of the naturalization laws, and the exclusive choice of native Americans for office.

qa_pairs.question: Know-nothingism
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The doctrines, principles, or practices, of the Know-nothings.

qa_pairs.question: Knubs
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Waste silk formed in winding off the threads from a cocoon.

qa_pairs.question: Knuckle
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The joint of a finger, particularly when made prominent by the closing of the fingers.

qa_pairs.question: Knuckle
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To yield; to submit; -- used with down, to, or under.

qa_pairs.question: Knuckle
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To beat with the knuckles; to pummel.

qa_pairs.question: Knuckled
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Jointed.

qa_pairs.question: knuckle under
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To yield; to submit; -- usually used with to.

qa_pairs.question: knuckles
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as a small metal weapon, worn over the knuckles on the back of the hand; called also also known as brass knuckles and also known as knuckle duster.

qa_pairs.question: knucks
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as same as knuckles.

qa_pairs.question: Knuff
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A lout; a clown.

qa_pairs.question: Knur
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A knurl.

qa_pairs.question: Knurl
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A contorted knot in wood; a crossgrained protuberance; a nodule; a boss or projection.

qa_pairs.question: Knurl
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To provide with ridges, to assist the grasp, as in the edge of a flat knob, or coin; to mill.

qa_pairs.question: Knurled
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Full of knots; gnarled.

qa_pairs.question: Knurly
qa_pairs.answer: It means Full of knots; hard; tough; hence, capable of enduring or resisting much.

qa_pairs.question: Knurry
qa_pairs.answer: It means Full of knots.

qa_pairs.question: KO
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is a knockout; a blow that renders the opponent unconscious; -- used especially in boxing.

qa_pairs.question: KO
qa_pairs.answer: It means To knock out; to deliver a blow that renders (the opponent) unconscious; -- used especially in boxing.

qa_pairs.question: Koaita
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Coaita.

qa_pairs.question: Koala
qa_pairs.answer: It means A tailless furry marsupial (Phascolarctos cinereus), found in Australia. The female carries her young on the back of her neck. Called also also known as Australian bear, also known as koala bear, also known as native bear, and also known as native sloth. The koala lives almost all of its life in trees, moves sluggishly like a sloth, and eats eucalyptus leaves almost exclusively.

qa_pairs.question: Kob
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any one of several species of African antelopes of the genus *Kobus*, esp. the species Kobus sing-sing.

qa_pairs.question: Kobalt
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Cobalt.

qa_pairs.question: Kobellite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A blackish gray mineral, a sulphide of antimony, bismuth, and lead.

qa_pairs.question: Kobold
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A kind of domestic spirit in German mythology, corresponding to the Scottish brownie and the English Robin Goodfellow.

qa_pairs.question: KOd
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as rendered unconscious, usually by a blow.

qa_pairs.question: Kodachrome
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A brand of photographic transparency bearing a positive color image.

qa_pairs.question: Kodagu
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A Dravidian language.

qa_pairs.question: Kodak
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A kind of portable photographic camera, esp. adapted for snapshot work, in which a succession of negatives is made upon a continuous roll of sensitized film; -- originally a trademark name of the Eastman Kodak Company, but from early 1900's through the 1930's it was popularly applied to almost any hand camera.

qa_pairs.question: Kodak
qa_pairs.answer: It means To photograph with a kodak; hence, to describe or characterize briefly and vividly.

qa_pairs.question: Kodiak
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Kodiak bear.

qa_pairs.question: Kodiak bear
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A large brown bear (Ursus middendorffi syn. Ursus arctos middendorffi) of coastal Alaska and British Columbia related to the grizzly bear; called also also known as Kodiak bear.

qa_pairs.question: Koel
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any one of several species of cuckoos of the genus *Eudynamys*, found in India, the East Indies, and Australia. They deposit their eggs in the nests of other birds.

qa_pairs.question: Koellia
qa_pairs.answer: It means The genus comprising the American mountain mint, synonymous with *Pycnanthemum*.

qa_pairs.question: Koff
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A two-masted Dutch vessel.

qa_pairs.question: Koftgari
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Ornamental work produced by inlaying steel with gold, -- a variety of damascening much used in the arts of India.

qa_pairs.question: Kogia
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The genus comprising the pygmy sperm whales.

qa_pairs.question: Kohinoor
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A famous diamond, surrendered to the British crown on the annexation of the Punjab. According to Hindu legends, it was found in a Golconda mine, and has been the property of various Hindu and Persian rulers.

qa_pairs.question: Kohl
qa_pairs.answer: It means A mixture of soot and other ingredients, used by Egyptian and other Eastern women to darken the edges of the eyelids.

qa_pairs.question: Kohl-rabi
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A variety of cabbage, in which the edible part is a large, turnip-shaped swelling of the stem, above the surface of the ground.

qa_pairs.question: Kokama
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The gemsbok.

qa_pairs.question: Koklass
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any pheasant of the genus *Pucrasia*. The birds of this genus inhabit India and China, and are distinguished by having a long central and two lateral crests on the head. Called also also known as pucras.

qa_pairs.question: Kokoon
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The gnu.

qa_pairs.question: Kola
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Cola, Cola nut.

qa_pairs.question: Kolarian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An individual of one of the races of aboriginal inhabitants which survive in Hindustan.

qa_pairs.question: Kolinsky
qa_pairs.answer: It means Among furriers, any of several Asiatic minks; esp., Putorius sibiricus, the yellowish brown pelt of which is valued, esp. for the tail, used for making artists' brushes. Trade names for the fur are also known as red sable and also known as Tatar sable.

qa_pairs.question: kolkhoz
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A collective farm owned by the communist state, in the former USSR.

qa_pairs.question: kolkhoznik
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is a member of a kolkhoz.

qa_pairs.question: Koluschan
qa_pairs.answer: It means Designating, or pertaining to, a linguistic stock of North American Indians comprising the Tlinkit tribes of the Alexander Archipelago of southeastern Alaska and adjacent coast lands. Their language bears some affinity to Mexican tongues.

qa_pairs.question: Kolkwitzia
qa_pairs.answer: It means A Chinese genus having only one species, the beauty bush.

qa_pairs.question: Komenic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to, or designating, an acid derived from meconic acid.

qa_pairs.question: komondor
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A Hungarian breed of large powerful shaggy-coated white dog, used also as guard dog.

qa_pairs.question: Komtok
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An African freshwater fish (Protopterus annectens), belonging to the Dipnoi. It can breathe air by means of its lungs, and when waters dry up, it encases itself in a nest of hard mud, where it remains till the rainy season. It is used as food.

qa_pairs.question: Kon
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To know. See Can, and Con.

qa_pairs.question: konini
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An erect deciduous shrub or tree (Fuchsia excorticata), native to New Zealand, growing up to 10 feet, with maroon-flushed flowers.

qa_pairs.question: Konite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Conite.

qa_pairs.question: Konseal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A form of capsule for inclosing a dose of medicine that is offensive, caustic, or the like.

qa_pairs.question: Konze
qa_pairs.answer: It means A large African antelope (Alcelaphus Lichtensteini), allied to the hartbeest, but having shorter and flatter horns, and lacking a black patch on the face.

qa_pairs.question: Koodoo
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A large South African antelope (Strepsiceros kudu). The males have graceful spiral horns, sometimes four feet long. The general color is reddish or grayish brown, with eight or nine white bands on each side, and a pale dorsal stripe. The old males become dark bluish gray, due to the skin showing through the hair. The females are hornless. Called also also known as nellut.

qa_pairs.question: Kookoom
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The oryx or gemsbok.

qa_pairs.question: Koolokamba
qa_pairs.answer: It means A west African anthropoid ape (Troglodytes koolokamba, or Troglodytes Aubryi), allied to the chimpanzee and gorilla, and, in some respects, intermediate between them.

qa_pairs.question: Koolslaa
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Coleslaw.

qa_pairs.question: Koord
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Kurd.

qa_pairs.question: Koordish
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Kurdish.

qa_pairs.question: Koorilian
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Kurilian.

qa_pairs.question: Kop
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Hill; mountain.

qa_pairs.question: kopeck
qa_pairs.answer: It means A small Russian coin, continued as a unit of currency within the Soviet Union. One hundred kopecks make a ruble. The ruble was worth about sixty cents (U. S.) in 1910; in 1991 a two-kopeck coin could be used for a local telephone call at a pay telephone. After the breakup of the Soviet Union in 1993, the exchange value of the ruble declined rapidly and by the end of 1994 the ruble was worth three hundredths of a cent, and by 1997 two hundredths of a cent. By 1993, the kopek had become of such small value that it was obsolete and no longer minted.

qa_pairs.question: kopje
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A hillock; a small kop, especially a small hill rising up from the African veld.

qa_pairs.question: kor
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A Hebrew unit of capacity.

qa_pairs.question: Koran
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The Scriptures of the Muslims, containing the professed revelations to Mohammed; -- called also also known as Alcoran.

qa_pairs.question: Korea
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An Asian peninsula off Manchuria.

qa_pairs.question: Korean
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to Korea; as, Korean handicrafts; the Korean war.

qa_pairs.question: Korin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The gazelle.

qa_pairs.question: Korinthos
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A city in Greece, called also known as Corinth in English; the modern city is near the site of the ancient city that was 2nd only to Athens in size and power in ancient Greece.

qa_pairs.question: Korrigum
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A West African antelope (Damalis Senegalensis), allied to the sassaby. It is reddish gray, with a black face, and a black stripe on the outside of the legs above the knees.

qa_pairs.question: kos
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is an Indian unit of length having different values in different localities.

qa_pairs.question: Kosher
qa_pairs.answer: It means Ceremonially clean, according to Jewish law; -- applied to food, esp. to meat of animals slaughtered according to the requirements of Jewish law. Opposed to Antonym: tref. For food to be officially kosher, it must be certified fit to eat by a Rabbi, according to Jewish ritual law; as, kosher food.

qa_pairs.question: Kosher
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Kosher food; also, a kosher shop.

qa_pairs.question: Kosher
qa_pairs.answer: It means To prepare in conformity with the requirements of the Jewish law, as meat.

qa_pairs.question: Kosmos
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Cosmos.

qa_pairs.question: Kosteletzya
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A small genus of herbs of the Southeastern U. S. and tropical America and Africa.

qa_pairs.question: Kotow
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as kowtow, the more common spellings.

qa_pairs.question: Kotow
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To perform the kotow. Now usually spelled kowtow.

qa_pairs.question: Koulan
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A wild horse (Equus onager _or_ Asinus onager) inhabiting the plains of Central Asia; -- called also also known as gour, also known as khur, and also known as onager.

qa_pairs.question: Koumiss
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An intoxicating fermented or distilled liquor originally made by the Tartars of central Asia from mare's or camel's milk. It can be obtained from any kind of milk, and is now largely made in Europe.

qa_pairs.question: Kousso
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An Abyssinian rosaceous tree (Brayera anthelmintica), the flowers of which are used as a vermifuge.

qa_pairs.question: kowhai
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A shrub or small tree (Sophora tetraptera) of New Zealand and Chile having pendulous racemes of tubular golden-yellow flowers; it yields a hard strong wood.

qa_pairs.question: Kowtow
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The prostration made by mandarins and others to their superiors, either as homage or worship, by knocking the forehead on the ground; same as Kotow. There are degrees in the rite, the highest being expressed by three knockings.

qa_pairs.question: Kowtow
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To perform the kowtow. Same as Kotow

qa_pairs.question: Kr
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The chemical symbol for the element krypton, one of the six noble gases.

qa_pairs.question: Kra
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A long-tailed ape (Macacus cynomolgus) of India and Sumatra. It is reddish olive, spotted with black, and has a black tail.

qa_pairs.question: Kraal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A collection of huts within a stockade; a village; sometimes, a single hut.

qa_pairs.question: Krait
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A very venomous snake of India (Bungarus coeruleus), allied to the cobra. Its upper parts are bluish or brownish black, often with narrow white streaks; the belly is whitish.

qa_pairs.question: Kraken
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A fabulous Scandinavian sea monster, often represented as resembling an island, but sometimes as resembling an immense octopus.

qa_pairs.question: Krakowiak
qa_pairs.answer: It means A lively Polish dance. See Cracovienne.

qa_pairs.question: Krameria
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of spreading shrubs with many stems, from one species of which (Krameria triandra), found in Peru, rhatany root, used as a medicine, is obtained.

qa_pairs.question: Krameric
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or derived from, *Krameria* (rhatany); as, krameric acid, usually called ratanhia-tannic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Krang
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The carcass of a whale after the blubber has been removed.

qa_pairs.question: Kranging hook
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A hook for holding the blubber while cutting it away.

qa_pairs.question: Kreatic
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Creatic.

qa_pairs.question: Kreatin
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Creatin.

qa_pairs.question: Kreatinin
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Creatinin.

qa_pairs.question: Kreel
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Creel.

qa_pairs.question: Kremlin
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The citadel of a town or city; especially, the citadel of Moscow, a large inclosure which contains imperial palaces, cathedrals, churches, an arsenal, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Krems
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A variety of white lead. See Krems lead, under Lead, (n.)

qa_pairs.question: Kreng
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Krang.

qa_pairs.question: Kreosote
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Creosote.

qa_pairs.question: Kreutzer
qa_pairs.answer: It means A small copper coin formerly used in South Germany; also, a small Austrian copper coin.

qa_pairs.question: Kriegsspiel
qa_pairs.answer: It means A game of war, played for practice, on maps.

qa_pairs.question: Kris
qa_pairs.answer: It means A Malay dagger. See Creese.

qa_pairs.question: Krishna
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The most popular of the Hindu divinities, usually held to be the eighth incarnation of the god Vishnu.

qa_pairs.question: Kritarchy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The rule of the judges over Israel.

qa_pairs.question: Krokidolite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Crocidolite.

qa_pairs.question: Krone
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A coin of Denmark, Norway, and Sweden, of the value of about twenty-eight cents (in 1913). See Crown, (n.), 9.

qa_pairs.question: Krooman
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of a negro tribe of Liberia and the adjacent coast, whose members are much employed on shipboard.

qa_pairs.question: Kruller
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Cruller.

qa_pairs.question: Krummhorn
qa_pairs.answer: It means A reed instrument of music of the cornet kind, now obsolete (see Cornet, 1, (a.)).

qa_pairs.question: Krupp gun
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A breech-loading steel cannon manufactured at the works of Friedrich Krupp, at Essen in Prussia. Guns of over eight-inch bore are made up of several concentric cylinders; those of a smaller size are forged solid.

qa_pairs.question: Kruppize
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To treat by, or subject to, the Krupp process.

qa_pairs.question: Krupp process
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A process practiced by Friedrich Krupp, Essen, Germany, for washing pig iron, differing from the Bell process in using manganese as well as iron oxide, and performed in a Pernot furnace. Called also the also known as Bell-Krupp process.

qa_pairs.question: Kryolite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Cryolite.

qa_pairs.question: Krypton
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An inert gaseous element of the argon (noble gas) group, of atomic number 36, occurring in air to the extent of about one volume in a million. It was discovered by Ramsay and Travers in 1898. Boiling point, -152.3<deg/ C.; melting point, -156.6<deg/ C.; symbol, _Kr_; atomic weight, 83.8.

qa_pairs.question: Ksar
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Czar.

qa_pairs.question: Kshatriya
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The military caste, the second of the four great Hindu castes; also, a member of that caste. See Caste.

qa_pairs.question: Kuda
