qa_pairs.question: Quietist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of a sect of mystics originated in the seventeenth century by Molinos, a Spanish priest living in Rome. See Quietism.

qa_pairs.question: Quietistic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to the Quietists, or to Quietism.

qa_pairs.question: Quietly
qa_pairs.answer: It means In a quiet state or manner; without motion; in a state of rest; as, to lie or sit quietly.

qa_pairs.question: Quietness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being quiet; freedom from noise, agitation, disturbance, or excitement; stillness; tranquillity; calmness.

qa_pairs.question: Quietsome
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Calm; still.

qa_pairs.question: Quietude
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Rest; repose; quiet; tranquillity.

qa_pairs.question: Quietus
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Final discharge or acquittance, as from debt or obligation; that which silences claims; (Fig.) rest; death.

qa_pairs.question: Quill
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of the large feathers of a bird's wing, or one of the rectrices of the tail; also, the stock of such a feather.

qa_pairs.question: Quill
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To plaint in small cylindrical ridges, called quillings; as, to quill a ruffle.

qa_pairs.question: Quillaia bark
qa_pairs.answer: It means The bark of a rosaceous tree (Quillaja Saponaria), native of Chile. The bark is finely laminated, and very heavy with alkaline substances, and is used commonly by the Chileans instead of soap. Also called also known as soap bark.

qa_pairs.question: Quillback
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An American fresh-water fish (Ictiobus cyprinus syn. Carpiodes cyprinus); -- called also also known as carp sucker, also known as sailfish, also known as spearfish, and also known as skimback.

qa_pairs.question: Quilled
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Furnished with quills; also, shaped like quills.

qa_pairs.question: Quillet
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Subtilty; nicety; quibble.

qa_pairs.question: Quilling
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A band of linen, muslin, or the like, fluted, folded, or plaited so as somewhat to resemble a row of quills.

qa_pairs.question: Quillwort
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any plant or species of the genus *Isoetes*, cryptogamous plants with a cluster of elongated four-tubed rushlike leaves, rising from a corm, and containing spores in their enlarged and excavated bases. There are about seventeen American species, usually growing in the mud under still, shallow water. So called from the shape of the shape of the leaves.

qa_pairs.question: Quilt
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Anything that is quilted; esp., a quilted bed cover, or a skirt worn by women; any cover or garment made by putting wool, cotton, etc., between two cloths and stitching them together; also, any outer bed cover.

qa_pairs.question: Quilt
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To stitch or sew together at frequent intervals, in order to confine in place the several layers of cloth and wadding of which a garment, comforter, etc., may be made; as, to quilt a coat.

qa_pairs.question: Quilter
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who, or that which, quilts.

qa_pairs.question: Quilting
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act of stitching or running in patterns, as in making a quilt.

qa_pairs.question: Quin
qa_pairs.answer: It means A European scallop (Pecten opercularis), used as food.

qa_pairs.question: Quinaldine
qa_pairs.answer: It means A colorless liquid of a slightly pungent odor, C9H6N.CH3, first obtained as a condensation product of aldehyde and aniline, and regarded as a derivative of quinoline; -- called also also known as methyl quinoline.

qa_pairs.question: Quinary
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Consisting of five; arranged by fives.

qa_pairs.question: Quinate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Growing in sets of five; -- said especially of leaves composed of five leaflets set at the end of a common petiole.

qa_pairs.question: Quinate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A salt of quinic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Quinazol
qa_pairs.answer: It means A complex nitrogenous base related to cinnoline.

qa_pairs.question: Quince
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The fruit of a shrub (Cydonia vulgaris) belonging to the same tribe as the apple. It somewhat resembles an apple, but differs in having many seeds in each carpel. It has hard flesh of high flavor, but very acid, and is largely used for marmalade, jelly, and preserves.

qa_pairs.question: Quincewort
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The squinancy. Called also also known as quinsywort.

qa_pairs.question: Quinch
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To stir; to wince.

qa_pairs.question: Quincuncial
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having the form of a quincunx.

qa_pairs.question: Quincuncially
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In the manner or order of a quincunx.

qa_pairs.question: Quincunx
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An arrangement of things by fives in a square or a rectangle, one being placed at each corner and one in the middle; especially, such an arrangement of trees repeated indefinitely, so as to form a regular group with rows running in various directions.

qa_pairs.question: Quindecagon
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A plane figure with fifteen angles, and consequently fifteen sides.

qa_pairs.question: Quindecemvir
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One of a sacerdotal college of fifteen men whose chief duty was to take care of the Sibylline books.

qa_pairs.question: Quindecemvirate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The body or office of the quindecemviri.

qa_pairs.question: Quindecone
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An unsaturated hydrocarbon, C15H26, of the valylene series, produced artificially as an oily liquid.

qa_pairs.question: Quindecylic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Pertaining to, or designating, an acid of the fatty acid series, containing fifteen atoms of carbon; called also also known as pentadecylic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Quindem
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A fifteenth part.

qa_pairs.question: Quindism
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A fifteenth.

qa_pairs.question: Quinhydrone
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A green crystalline substance formed by the union of quinone with hydroquinone, or as an intermediate product in the oxidation of hydroquinone or the reduction of quinone.

qa_pairs.question: Quinia
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Quinine.

qa_pairs.question: Quinible
qa_pairs.answer: It means An interval of a fifth; also, a part sung with such intervals.

qa_pairs.question: Quinic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Pertaining to, derived from, or connected with, quinine and related compounds; specifically, designating a nonnitrogenous acid obtained from cinchona bark, coffee, beans, etc., as a white crystalline substance.

qa_pairs.question: Quinicine
qa_pairs.answer: It means An uncrystallizable alkaloid obtained by the action of heat from quinine, with which it is isomeric.

qa_pairs.question: Quinidine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An alkaloid isomeric with, and resembling, quinine, found in certain species of cinchona, from which it is extracted as a bitter white crystalline substance; conchinine. It is used somewhat as a febrifuge.

qa_pairs.question: Quinine
qa_pairs.answer: It means An alkaloid extracted from the bark of several species of cinchona (esp. Cinchona Calisaya) as a bitter white crystalline substance, C20H24N2O2. Hence, by extension (Med.), any of the salts of this alkaloid, as the acetate, chloride, sulphate, etc., employed as a febrifuge or antiperiodic. Called also also known as quinia, also known as quinina, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Quininic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or designating, a nitrogenous acid obtained as a yellow crystalline substance by the oxidation of quinine.

qa_pairs.question: Quininism
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Cinchonism.

qa_pairs.question: Quinizarin
qa_pairs.answer: It means A yellow crystalline substance produced artificially. It is isomeric with alizarin.

qa_pairs.question: Quinizine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as any one of a series of nitrogenous bases, certain of which are used as antipyretics.

qa_pairs.question: Quinnat
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The California salmon (Oncorhynchus choicha); -- called also also known as chouicha, also known as king salmon, also known as chinnook salmon, and also known as Sacramento salmon. It is of great commercial importance.

qa_pairs.question: Quinoa
qa_pairs.answer: It means The seeds of a kind of goosewort (Chenopodium Quinoa), used in Chili and Peru for making porridge or cakes; also, food thus made.

qa_pairs.question: Quinogen
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A hypothetical radical of quinine and related alkaloids.

qa_pairs.question: Quinoidine
qa_pairs.answer: It means A brownish resinous substance obtained as a by-product in the treatment of cinchona bark. It consists of a mixture of several alkaloids.

qa_pairs.question: Quinoline
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A nitrogenous base, C9H7N obtained as a pungent colorless liquid by the distillation of alkaloids, bones, coal tar, etc. It the nucleus of many organic bodies, especially of certain alkaloids and related substances; hence, by extension, any one of the series of alkaloidal bases of which quinoline proper is the type.

qa_pairs.question: Quinologist
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who is versed in quinology.

qa_pairs.question: Quinology
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The science which treats of the cultivation of the cinchona, and of its use in medicine.

qa_pairs.question: Quinone
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A crystalline substance, C6H4O2 (called also also known as benzoketone), first obtained by the oxidation of quinic acid and regarded as a double ketone; also, by extension, any one of the series of which quinone proper is the type.

qa_pairs.question: Quinovic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to, or designating, a crystalline acid obtained from some varieties of cinchona bark.

qa_pairs.question: Quinovin
qa_pairs.answer: It means An amorphous bitter glucoside derived from cinchona and other barks. Called also also known as quinova bitter, and also known as quinova.

qa_pairs.question: Quinoxaline
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any one of a series of complex nitrogenous bases obtained by the union of certain aniline derivatives with glyoxal or with certain ketones.

qa_pairs.question: Quinoxyl
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The hypothetical radical of certain quinone derivatives related to rhodizonic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Quinoyl
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A radical of which quinone is the hydride, analogous to phenyl.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquagesima
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Fiftieth.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquangular
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having five angles or corners.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquarticular
qa_pairs.answer: It means Relating to the five articles or points; as, the quinquarticular controversy between Arminians and Calvinists.

qa_pairs.question: Quinque-
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A combining form meaning five, five times, fivefold; as, quinquefid, five-cleft; quinquedentate, five-toothed.

qa_pairs.question: Quinqueangled
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having five angles; quinquangular.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquedentate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Five-toothed; as, a quinquedentate leaf.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquefarious
qa_pairs.answer: It means Arranged in five vertical rows; pentastichous.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquefid
qa_pairs.answer: It means Sharply cut about halfway to the middle or base into five segments; as, a quinquefid leaf or corolla.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquefoliate
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having five leaves or leaflets.

qa_pairs.question: Quinque foliolate
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having five leaflets.

qa_pairs.question: Quinqueliteral
qa_pairs.answer: It means Consisting of five letters.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquelobate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Cut less than halfway into portions, usually somewhat rounded; five-lobed; as, a quinquelobate leaf or corolla.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquelobed
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Quinquelobate.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquelocular
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having five cells or loculi; five-celled; as, a quinquelocular pericarp.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquenerved
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having five nerves; -- said of a leaf with five nearly equal nerves or ribs rising from the end of the petiole.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquennalia
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Public games celebrated every five years.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquennial
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Occurring once in five years, or at the end of every five years; also, lasting five years. A quinquennial event.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquennium
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Space of five years.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquepartite
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Consisting of five parts.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquereme
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A galley having five benches or banks of oars; as, an Athenian quinquereme.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquesyllable
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A word of five syllables.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquevalve
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having five valves, as a pericarp.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquevir
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of five commissioners appointed for some special object.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquina
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Peruvian bark.

qa_pairs.question: Quinquivalent
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Pentavalent.

qa_pairs.question: Quinsy
qa_pairs.answer: It means An inflammation of the throat, or parts adjacent, especially of the fauces or tonsils, attended by considerable swelling, painful and impeded deglutition, and accompanied by inflammatory fever. It sometimes creates danger of suffocation; -- called also also known as squinancy, and also known as squinzey.

qa_pairs.question: Quint
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A set or sequence of five, as in piquet.

qa_pairs.question: Quintain
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An object to be tilted at; -- called also also known as quintel.

qa_pairs.question: Quintal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A hundredweight, either 112 or 100 pounds, according to the scale used. Cf. Cental.

qa_pairs.question: Quintan
qa_pairs.answer: It means Occurring as the fifth, after four others also, occurring every fifth day, reckoning inclusively; as, a quintan fever.

qa_pairs.question: Quintel
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Quintain.

qa_pairs.question: Quintessence
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The fifth or last and highest essence or power in a natural body. See Ferment oils, under Ferment.

qa_pairs.question: Quintessence
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To distil or extract as a quintessence; to reduce to a quintessence.

qa_pairs.question: Quintessential
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of the nature of a quintessence; purest; most characteristic.

qa_pairs.question: Quintet
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A composition for five voices or instruments; also, the set of five persons who sing or play five-part music.

qa_pairs.question: Quintic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of the fifth degree or order.

qa_pairs.question: Quintile
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The aspect of planets when separated the fifth part of the zodiac, or 72<deg/.

qa_pairs.question: Quintilllion
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is According to the French notation, which is used on the Continent and in America, the cube of a million, or a unit with eighteen ciphers annexed; according to the English notation, a number produced by involving a million to the fifth power, or a unit with thirty ciphers annexed. See the Note under Numeration.

qa_pairs.question: Quintin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Quintain.

qa_pairs.question: Quintine
qa_pairs.answer: It means The embryonic sac of an ovule, sometimes regarded as an innermost fifth integument. Cf. Quartine, and Tercine.

qa_pairs.question: Quintole
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A group of five notes to be played or sung in the time of four of the same species.

qa_pairs.question: Quintroon
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The off-spring of an octoroon and a white person.

qa_pairs.question: Quintuple
qa_pairs.answer: It means Multiplied by five; increased to five times the amount; fivefold.

qa_pairs.question: Quintuple
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To make fivefold, or five times as much or many.

qa_pairs.question: Quintuplet
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A collection or combination of five of a kind.

qa_pairs.question: Quintuplets
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as five children born from one mother in a single pregnancy.

qa_pairs.question: Quintuple-nerved
qa_pairs.answer: It means The same as Quinquenerved.

qa_pairs.question: Quinzaine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The fifteenth day after a feast day, including both in the reckoning.

qa_pairs.question: Quinze
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A game at cards in which the object is to make fifteen points.

qa_pairs.question: Quip
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A smart, sarcastic turn or jest; a taunt; a severe retort; a gibe.

qa_pairs.question: Quip
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To taunt; to treat with quips.

qa_pairs.question: Quip
qa_pairs.answer: It means To scoff; to use taunts.

qa_pairs.question: Quipo
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Quipu.

qa_pairs.question: quipster
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A person who frequently makes quips.

qa_pairs.question: Quipu
qa_pairs.answer: It means A contrivance employed by the ancient Peruvians, Mexicans, etc., as a substitute for writing and figures, consisting of a main cord, from which hung at certain distances smaller cords of various colors, each having a special meaning, as silver, gold, corn, soldiers. etc. Single, double, and triple knots were tied in the smaller cords, representing definite numbers. It was chiefly used for arithmetical purposes, and to register important facts and events.

qa_pairs.question: Quirboilly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Leather softened by boiling so as to take any required shape. Upon drying, it becomes exceedingly hard, and hence was formerly used for armor.

qa_pairs.question: Quire
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Choir.

qa_pairs.question: Quire
qa_pairs.answer: It means To sing in concert.

qa_pairs.question: Quire
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A collection of twenty-four sheets of paper of the same size and quality, unfolded or having a single fold; one twentieth of a ream.

qa_pairs.question: Quirinal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of, pertaining to, or designating, the hill Collis Quirinalis, now Monte Quirinale (one of the seven hills of Rome), or a modern royal place situated upon it. Also used substantively.

qa_pairs.question: Quirister
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A chorister. See Chorister.

qa_pairs.question: Quiritation
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A crying for help.

qa_pairs.question: Quirite
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of the Quirites.

qa_pairs.question: Quirites
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Roman citizens.

qa_pairs.question: Quirk
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A sudden turn; a starting from the point or line; hence, an artful evasion or subterfuge; a shift; a quibble; as, the quirks of a pettifogger.

qa_pairs.question: Quirked
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having, or formed with, a quirk or quirks.

qa_pairs.question: Quirkish
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Consisting of quirks; resembling a quirk.

qa_pairs.question: Quirky
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Full of quirks; tricky; as, a quirky lawyer.

qa_pairs.question: Quirl
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Querl.

qa_pairs.question: Quirpele
qa_pairs.answer: It means The Indian ferret.

qa_pairs.question: Quirt
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A rawhide whip plaited with two thongs of buffalo hide.

qa_pairs.question: Quish
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Cuish.

qa_pairs.question: Quit
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any one of numerous species of small passerine birds native of tropical America. See Banana quit, under Banana, and Guitguit.

qa_pairs.question: Quit
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Released from obligation, charge, penalty, etc.; free; clear; absolved; acquitted.

qa_pairs.question: Quit
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To set at rest; to free, as from anything harmful or oppressive; to relieve; to clear; to liberate.

qa_pairs.question: Quit
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To go away; to depart; to stop doing a thing; to cease.

qa_pairs.question: Quitch
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Quitch grass.

qa_pairs.question: Quitch grass
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A perennial grass (Agropyrum repens) having long running rootstalks, by which it spreads rapidly and pertinaciously, and so becomes a troublesome weed. Also called also known as couch grass, also known as quack grass, also known as quick grass, also known as twitch grass. See Illustration in Appendix.

qa_pairs.question: Quitclaim
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A release or relinquishment of a claim; a deed of release; an instrument by which some right, title, interest, or claim, which one person has, or is supposed to have, in or to an estate held by himself or another, is released or relinquished, the grantor generally covenanting only against persons who claim under himself.

qa_pairs.question: Quitclaim
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To release or relinquish a claim to; to release a claim to by deed, without covenants of warranty against adverse and paramount titles.

qa_pairs.question: Quite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Quit.

qa_pairs.question: Quite
qa_pairs.answer: It means Completely; wholly; entirely; totally; perfectly; as, the work is not quite done; the object is quite accomplished; to be quite mistaken.

qa_pairs.question: Quitly
qa_pairs.answer: It means Quite.

qa_pairs.question: Quitrent
qa_pairs.answer: It means A rent reserved in grants of land, by the payment of which the tenant is quit from other service.

qa_pairs.question: Quits
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See the Note under Quit, (a.)

qa_pairs.question: Quittable
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Capable of being quitted.

qa_pairs.question: Quittal
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Return; requital; quittance.

qa_pairs.question: Quittance
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Discharge from a debt or an obligation; acquittance.

qa_pairs.question: Quittance
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To repay; to requite.

qa_pairs.question: Quitter
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who quits.

qa_pairs.question: Quittor
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A chronic abscess, or fistula of the coronet, in a horse's foot, resulting from inflammation of the tissues investing the coffin bone.

qa_pairs.question: Quitture
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A discharge; an issue.

qa_pairs.question: Quiver
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Nimble; active.

qa_pairs.question: Quiver
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To shake or move with slight and tremulous motion; to tremble; to quake; to shudder; to shiver.

qa_pairs.question: Quiver
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act or state of quivering; a tremor.

qa_pairs.question: Quiver
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A case or sheath for arrows to be carried on the person.

qa_pairs.question: Quivered
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Furnished with, or carrying, a quiver.

qa_pairs.question: Quiveringly
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as With quivering motion.

qa_pairs.question: Qui vive
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The challenge of a French sentinel, or patrol; -- used like the English challenge: <ldquo/Who comes there?<rdquo/

qa_pairs.question: Quixotic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Like Don Quixote; romantic to extravagance; prone to pursue unrealizable goals; absurdly chivalric; apt to be deluded. See also quixotism.

qa_pairs.question: Quixotically
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In a quixotic way.

qa_pairs.question: Quixotism
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is That form of delusion which leads to extravagant and absurd undertakings or sacrifices in obedience to a morbidly romantic ideal of duty or honor, as illustrated by the exploits of Don Quixote in knight-errantry. See quixotic.

qa_pairs.question: Quixotry
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Quixotism; visionary schemes.

qa_pairs.question: Quiz
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A riddle or obscure question; an enigma; a ridiculous hoax.

qa_pairs.question: Quiz
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To puzzle; to banter; to chaff or mock with pretended seriousness of discourse; to make sport of, as by obscure questions.

qa_pairs.question: Quiz
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To conduct a quiz. See Quiz, (n.), 4.

qa_pairs.question: Quizzer
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who quizzes; a quiz.

qa_pairs.question: Quizzical
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Relating to quizzing; given to quizzing; of the nature of a quiz; farcical; sportive.

qa_pairs.question: Quizzism
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The act or habit of quizzing.

qa_pairs.question: Quob
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To throb; to quiver.

qa_pairs.question: Quod
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A quadrangle or court, as of a prison; hence, a prison.

qa_pairs.question: Quod
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Quoth; said. See Quoth.

qa_pairs.question: Quod
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To put in quod, or prison; to lock up; to jug.

qa_pairs.question: Quoddies
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Herring taken and cured or smoked near Quoddy Head, Maine, or near the entrance of Passamaquoddy Bay.

qa_pairs.question: Quodlibet
qa_pairs.answer: It means A nice point; a subtilty; a debatable point.

qa_pairs.question: Quodlibetarian
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who discusses any subject at pleasure.

qa_pairs.question: Quodlibetical
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not restricted to a particular subject; discussed for curiosity or entertainment.

qa_pairs.question: Quoif
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Coif.

qa_pairs.question: Quoiffure
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Coiffure.

qa_pairs.question: Quoil
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Coil.

qa_pairs.question: Quoin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Originally, a solid exterior angle, as of a building; now, commonly, one of the selected pieces of material by which the corner is marked.

qa_pairs.question: Quoit
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A flattened ring-shaped piece of iron, to be pitched at a fixed object in play; hence, any heavy flat missile used for the same purpose, as a stone, piece of iron, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Quoit
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To throw quoits; to play at quoits.

qa_pairs.question: Quoit
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To throw; to pitch.

qa_pairs.question: Quoke
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is (imp.) of Quake.

qa_pairs.question: Quoll
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A marsupial of Australia (Dasyurus macrurus), about the size of a cat.

qa_pairs.question: Quondam
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Having been formerly; former; sometime.

qa_pairs.question: Quondam
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A person dismissed or ejected from a position.

qa_pairs.question: Quook
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as (imp.) of Quake.

qa_pairs.question: Quop
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Quob.

qa_pairs.question: Quorum
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Such a number of the officers or members of any body as is competent by law or constitution to transact business; as, a quorum of the House of Representatives; a constitutional quorum was not present.

qa_pairs.question: Quota
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A proportional part or share; the share or proportion assigned to each in a division.

qa_pairs.question: Quotable
qa_pairs.answer: It means Capable or worthy of being quoted; as, a quotable writer; a quotable sentence.

qa_pairs.question: Quotation
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The act of quoting or citing.

qa_pairs.question: Quotationist
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who makes, or is given to making, quotations.

qa_pairs.question: Quote
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To cite, as a passage from some author; to name, repeat, or adduce, as a passage from an author or speaker, by way of authority or illustration; as, to quote a passage from Homer.

qa_pairs.question: Quote
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A note upon an author.

qa_pairs.question: Quoter
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who quotes the words of another.

qa_pairs.question: Quoth
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Said; spoke; uttered; -- used only in the first and third persons in the past tenses, and always followed by its nominative, the word or words said being the object; as, quoth I, quoth he.

qa_pairs.question: Quotha
qa_pairs.answer: It means Indeed; forsooth.

qa_pairs.question: Quotidian
qa_pairs.answer: It means Occurring or returning daily; as, a quotidian fever.

qa_pairs.question: Quotidian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Anything returning daily; especially (Med.), an intermittent fever or ague which returns every day.

qa_pairs.question: Quotient
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The number resulting from the division of one number by another, and showing how often a less number is contained in a greater; thus, the quotient of twelve divided by four is three.

qa_pairs.question: Quotiety
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The relation of an object to number.

qa_pairs.question: Quotum
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Part or proportion; quota.

qa_pairs.question: Quo warranto
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A writ brought before a proper tribunal, to inquire by what warrant a person or a corporation acts, or exercises certain powers.

qa_pairs.question: Quran
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Koran.

qa_pairs.question: Y
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Y, the twenty-fifth letter of the English alphabet, at the beginning of a word or syllable, except when a prefix (see Y-), is usually a fricative vocal consonant; as a prefix, and usually in the middle or at the end of a syllable, it is a vowel. See Guide to Pronunciation, <sect/<sect/ 145, 178-9, 272.

qa_pairs.question: Y
qa_pairs.answer: It means Something shaped like the letter Y; a forked piece resembling in form the letter Y.

qa_pairs.question: Y
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as I.

qa_pairs.question: Y-
qa_pairs.answer: It means A prefix of obscure meaning, originally used with verbs, adverbs, adjectives, nouns, and pronouns. In the Middle English period, it was little employed except with verbs, being chiefly used with past participles, though occasionally with the infinitive. Ycleped, or yclept, is perhaps the only word not entirely obsolete which shows this use.

qa_pairs.question: Ya
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Yea.

qa_pairs.question: Yacare
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A South American crocodilian (Jacare sclerops) resembling the alligator in size and habits. The eye orbits are connected together, and surrounded by prominent bony ridges. Called also also known as spectacled alligator, and also known as spectacled cayman.

qa_pairs.question: Yacca
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A West Indian name for two large timber trees (Podocarpus coriaceus, and Podocarpus Purdicanus) of the Yew family. The wood, which is much used, is pale brownish with darker streaks.

qa_pairs.question: Yacht
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A light and elegantly furnished vessel, used either for private parties of pleasure, or as a vessel of state to convey distinguished persons from one place to another; a seagoing vessel used only for pleasure trips, racing, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Yacht
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To manage a yacht; to voyage in a yacht.

qa_pairs.question: Yachter
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One engaged in sailing a yacht.

qa_pairs.question: Yachting
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Sailing for pleasure in a yacht.

qa_pairs.question: Yachtman
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Yachtsman.

qa_pairs.question: Yachtsman
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who owns or sails a yacht; a yachter.

qa_pairs.question: Yaf
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Gave. See Give.

qa_pairs.question: Yaffingale
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The yaffle.

qa_pairs.question: Yaffle
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The European green woodpecker (Picus viridis syn. Genius viridis). It is noted for its loud laughlike note. Called also also known as eccle, also known as hewhole, also known as highhoe, also known as laughing bird, also known as popinjay, also known as rain bird, also known as yaffil, also known as yaffler, also known as yaffingale, also known as yappingale, also known as yackel, and also known as woodhack.

qa_pairs.question: Yager
qa_pairs.answer: It means In the German army, one belonging to a body of light infantry armed with rifles, resembling the chasseur of the French army.

qa_pairs.question: Yaguarundi
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Jaguarondi.

qa_pairs.question: yahoo
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of a race of filthy brutes resembling men but subject to the Houyhnhnms in Swift's <ldquo/Gulliver's Travels.<rdquo/ See in the Dictionary of Noted Names in Fiction.

qa_pairs.question: Yahweh
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A modern transliteration of the Hebrew word translated also known as Jehovah in the Bible; -- used by some critics to discriminate the tribal god of the ancient Hebrews from the Christian Jehovah. Yahweh or also known as Yahwe is the spelling now generally adopted by scholars.

qa_pairs.question: Yahwism
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The religion or worship of Yahweh (Jehovah), or the system of doctrines, etc., connected with it.

qa_pairs.question: Yahwist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The author of the passages of the Old Testament, esp. those of the Hexateuch, in which God is styled Yahweh, or Jehovah; the author of the Yahwistic, or Jehovistic, Prophetic Document (J); also, the document itself.

qa_pairs.question: Yajur-Veda
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Veda.

qa_pairs.question: Yak
qa_pairs.answer: It means A bovine mammal (Poephagus grunnies) native of the high plains of Central Asia. Its neck, the outer side of its legs, and its flanks, are covered with long, flowing, fine hair. Its tail is long and bushy, often white, and is valued as an ornament and for other purposes in India and China. There are several domesticated varieties, some of which lack the mane and the long hair on the flanks. Called also also known as chauri gua, also known as grunting cow, also known as grunting ox, also known as sarlac, also known as sarlik, and also known as sarluc.

qa_pairs.question: Yakamilk
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Trumpeter, 3 (a).

qa_pairs.question: Yakare
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Yacare.

qa_pairs.question: Yakin
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A large Asiatic antelope (Budorcas taxicolor) native of the higher parts of the Himalayas and other lofty mountains. Its head and neck resemble those of the ox, and its tail is like that of the goat. Called also also known as budorcas.

qa_pairs.question: Yakoots
qa_pairs.answer: It means (Ethnol.) A nomadic Mongolian tribe native of Northern Siberia, and supposed to be of Turkish stock. They are mainly pastoral in their habits.

qa_pairs.question: Yaksha
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A kind of demigod attendant on Kuvera, the god of wealth.

qa_pairs.question: Yakut
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The Turkish language of the Yakuts, a Mongolian people of northeastern Siberia, which is lingua franca over much of eastern Siberia.

qa_pairs.question: Yalah
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The oil of the mahwa tree.

qa_pairs.question: Yalu
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A river in eastern Asia, which rises in North Korea and flows southwest to Korea Bay (forming part of the border between North Korea and China).

qa_pairs.question: Yam
qa_pairs.answer: It means A large, esculent, farinaceous tuber of various climbing plants of the genus *Dioscorea*; also, the plants themselves. Mostly natives of warm climates. The plants have netted-veined, petioled leaves, and pods with three broad wings. The commonest species is Dioscorea sativa, but several others are cultivated.

qa_pairs.question: Yama
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The king of the infernal regions, corresponding to the Greek Pluto, and also the judge of departed souls. In later times he is more exclusively considered the dire judge of all, and the tormentor of the wicked. He is represented as of a green color, with red garments, having a crown on his head, his eyes inflamed, and sitting on a buffalo, with a club and noose in his hands.

qa_pairs.question: Yamen
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is In China, the official headquarters or residence of a mandarin, including court rooms, offices, gardens, prisons, etc.; the place where the business of any public department is transcated.

qa_pairs.question: Yamma
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The llama.

qa_pairs.question: Yamp
qa_pairs.answer: It means An umbelliferous plant (Carum Gairdneri); also, its small fleshy roots, which are eaten by the Indians from Idaho to California.

qa_pairs.question: Yang
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The cry of the wild goose; a honk.

qa_pairs.question: Yang
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To make the cry of the wild goose.

qa_pairs.question: yang
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of the two fundamental principles. See yin and yang.

qa_pairs.question: Yangtze
qa_pairs.answer: It means a major river of Asia, which flows into the East China Sea.

qa_pairs.question: Yank
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A jerk or twitch.

qa_pairs.question: Yank
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To twitch; to jerk.

qa_pairs.question: Yank
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An abbreviation of Yankee.

qa_pairs.question: Yankee
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A nickname for a native or citizen of New England, especially one descended from old New England stock; by extension, an inhabitant of the Northern States as distinguished from a Southerner; also, applied sometimes by foreigners to any inhabitant of the United States.

qa_pairs.question: Yankee
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to a Yankee; characteristic of the Yankees.

qa_pairs.question: Yankee-Doodle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The name of a tune adopted popularly as one of the national airs of the United States.

qa_pairs.question: Yankeeism
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A Yankee idiom, word, custom, or the like.

qa_pairs.question: Yaourt
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A fermented drink, or milk beer, made by the Turks.

qa_pairs.question: Yap
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To bark; to yelp.

qa_pairs.question: Yap
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A bark; a yelp.

qa_pairs.question: Yapock
qa_pairs.answer: It means A South American aquatic opossum (Chironectes variegatus) found in Guiana and Brazil. Its hind feet are webbed, and its fore feet do not have an opposable thumb for climbing. Called also also known as water opossum.

qa_pairs.question: Yapon
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Yaupon.

qa_pairs.question: Yarage
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The power of moving, or being managed, at sea; -- said with reference to a ship.

qa_pairs.question: Yard
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A rod; a stick; a staff.

qa_pairs.question: Yard
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An inclosure; usually, a small inclosed place in front of, or around, a house or barn; as, a courtyard; a cowyard; a barnyard.

qa_pairs.question: Yard
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To confine (cattle) to the yard; to shut up, or keep, in a yard; as, to yard cows.

qa_pairs.question: yardage
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is distance measured in yards.

qa_pairs.question: Yardarm
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Either half of a square-rigged vessel's yard{6}, from the center or mast to the end.

qa_pairs.question: Yardful
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as As much as a yard will contain; enough to fill a yard.

qa_pairs.question: yardie
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A member of an international gang of Jamaican criminals who sell drugs and violence.

qa_pairs.question: Yardland
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A measure of land of uncertain quantity, varying from fifteen to forty acres; a virgate.

qa_pairs.question: yardline
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any of the lines parallel to the goal lines indicating distance from the goal line on a football the field; as, the twenty-five yardline.

qa_pairs.question: Yardstick
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A stick three feet, or a yard, in length, used as a measure of distance, cloth, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Yardwand
qa_pairs.answer: It means A yardstick.

qa_pairs.question: yare
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Ready; dexterous; eager; lively; quick to move.

qa_pairs.question: Yare
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Soon.

qa_pairs.question: Yarely
qa_pairs.answer: It means In a yare manner.

qa_pairs.question: Yark
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To yerk.

qa_pairs.question: Yarke
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Saki.

qa_pairs.question: Yarn
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Spun wool; woolen thread; also, thread of other material, as of cotton, flax, hemp, or silk; material spun and prepared for use in weaving, knitting, manufacturing sewing thread, or the like.

qa_pairs.question: Yarnen
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Made of yarn; consisting of yarn.

qa_pairs.question: Yarnut
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Yernut.

qa_pairs.question: Yarr
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To growl or snarl as a dog.

qa_pairs.question: Yarrish
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having a rough, dry taste.

qa_pairs.question: Yarrow
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An American and European composite plant (Achillea Millefolium) with very finely dissected leaves and small white corymbed flowers. It has a strong, and somewhat aromatic, odor and taste, and is sometimes used in making beer, or is dried for smoking. Called also also known as milfoil, and also known as nosebleed.

qa_pairs.question: Yarwhip
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The European bar-tailed godwit; -- called also also known as yardkeep, and yarwhelp. See Godwit.

qa_pairs.question: yashmak
qa_pairs.answer: It means the face veil worn by Muslim women.

qa_pairs.question: Yataghan
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A long knife, or short saber, common among Mohammedan nations, usually having a double curve, sometimes nearly straight.

qa_pairs.question: Yate
qa_pairs.answer: It means A gate. See 1st Gate.

qa_pairs.question: Yaud
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Yawd.

qa_pairs.question: Yaul
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Yawl.

qa_pairs.question: Yaulp
qa_pairs.answer: It means To yaup.

qa_pairs.question: Yaup
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To cry out like a child; to yelp.

qa_pairs.question: Yaup
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A cry of distress, rage, or the like, as the cry of a sickly bird, or of a child in pain.

qa_pairs.question: Yauper
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One who, or that which, yaups.

qa_pairs.question: Yaupon
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A shrub (Ilex Cassine) of the Holly family, native from Virginia to Florida. The smooth elliptical leaves are used as a substitute for tea, and were formerly used in preparing the black drink of the Indians of North Carolina. Called also also known as South-Sea tea.

qa_pairs.question: Yautia
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In Puerto Rico, any of several araceous plants or their starchy edible roots, which are cooked and eaten like yams or potatoes, as the taro.

qa_pairs.question: Yaw
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To rise in blisters, breaking in white froth, as cane juice in the clarifiers in sugar works.

qa_pairs.question: Yaw
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To steer wild, or out of the line of her course; to deviate from her course, as when struck by a heavy sea; -- said of a ship.

qa_pairs.question: Yaw
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A movement of a vessel by which she temporarily alters her course; a deviation from a straight course in steering.

qa_pairs.question: yawd
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A jade; an old horse or mare.

qa_pairs.question: yawl
qa_pairs.answer: It means A small ship's boat, usually rowed by four or six oars.

qa_pairs.question: Yawl
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To cry out like a dog or cat; to howl; to yell.

qa_pairs.question: Yawl-rigged
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having two masts with fore-and-aft sails, but differing from a schooner in that the after mast is very small, and stepped as far aft as possible. See Illustration in Appendix.

qa_pairs.question: Yawn
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To open the mouth involuntarily through drowsiness, dullness, or fatigue; to gape; to oscitate.

qa_pairs.question: Yawn
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An involuntary act, excited by drowsiness, etc., consisting of a deep and long inspiration following several successive attempts at inspiration, the mouth, fauces, etc., being wide open.

qa_pairs.question: Yawningly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In a yawning manner.

qa_pairs.question: Yawp
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Yaup.

qa_pairs.question: Yaws
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A disease, occurring in the Antilles and in Africa, characterized by yellowish or reddish tumors, of a contagious character, which, in shape and appearance, often resemble currants, strawberries, or raspberries. There are several varieties of this disease, variously known as framboesia, pian, verrugas, and crab-yaws.

qa_pairs.question: Yaw-weed
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A low, shrubby, rubiaceous plant (Morinda Royoc) growing along the seacoast of the West Indies. It has small, white, odorous flowers.

qa_pairs.question: Yazoo Fraud
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The grant by the State of Georgia, by Act of Jan. 7, 1795, of 35,000,000 acres of her western territory, for $500,000, to four companies known as the Yazoo Companies from the region granted ; -- commonly so called, the act being known as the Yazoo Frauds Act, because of alleged corruption of the legislature, every member but one being a shareholder in one or more of the companies. The act granting the land was repealed in 1796 by a new legislature, and the repealing provision was incorporated in the State constitution in 1798. In 1802 the territory was ceded to the United States. The claims of the purchasers, whom Georgia had refused to compensate, were sustained by the United States Supreme Court, which (1810) declared the repealing act of 1796 unconstitutional. Congress in 1814 ordered the lands sold and appropriated $5,000,000 to pay the claims.

qa_pairs.question: Ybe
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Been.

qa_pairs.question: Ycleped
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Called; named; -- obsolete, except in archaic or humorous writings.

qa_pairs.question: Y current
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The current through one branch of the star arrangement of a three-phase circuit.

qa_pairs.question: Ydo
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Done.

qa_pairs.question: Ydrad
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Dreaded.

qa_pairs.question: Y<supr>e</supr>
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is an old method of printing the article the (AS. ), the y. See The, and Thorn, (n.), 4.

qa_pairs.question: Y<eum/
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An eye.

qa_pairs.question: Ye
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The plural of the pronoun of the second person in the nominative case.

qa_pairs.question: Ye
qa_pairs.answer: It means Yea; yes.

qa_pairs.question: Yea
qa_pairs.answer: It means Yes; ay; a word expressing assent, or an affirmative, or an affirmative answer to a question, now superseded by yes. See Yes.

qa_pairs.question: Yea
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An affirmative vote; one who votes in the affirmative; as, a vote by yeas and nays.

qa_pairs.question: Yead
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Properly, a variant of the defective imperfect yode, but sometimes mistaken for a present. See the Note under Yede.

qa_pairs.question: Yean
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To bring forth young, as a goat or a sheep; to ean.

qa_pairs.question: Yeanling
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A lamb or a kid; an eanling.

qa_pairs.question: Year
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The time of the apparent revolution of the sun trough the ecliptic; the period occupied by the earth in making its revolution around the sun, called the astronomical year; also, a period more or less nearly agreeing with this, adopted by various nations as a measure of time, and called the civil year; as, the common lunar year of 354 days, still in use among the Mohammedans; the year of 360 days, etc. In common usage, the year consists of 365 days, and every fourth year (called bissextile, or leap year) of 366 days, a day being added to February on that year, on account of the excess above 365 days (see Bissextile).

qa_pairs.question: year 2000 bug
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as an error in the coding of certain computer programs in which the year portion of dates was represented by only two decimal digits, assuming that the first two digits are <ldquo/19<rdquo/. In such a program the the year 1975 is represented as <ldquo/75<rdquo/. This was a common practise in computer programming even into the 1990's, as many programmers failed to consider that their programs would be used after the year 1999. Thus, with such a program, a person born in 2000 would be considered as 101 years old in 2001; many different serious problems, as various as the programs, could be caused by such an error.

qa_pairs.question: year 2000 compliant
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as having dates fully and properly represented, and not susceptible to failure due to the year 2000 bug.

qa_pairs.question: Yeara
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The California poison oak (Rhus diversiloba). See under Poison, (a.)

qa_pairs.question: Yearbook
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A book published yearly; any annual report or summary of the statistics or facts of a year, designed to be used as a reference book; as, the Congregational Yearbook.

qa_pairs.question: Yeared
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Containing years; having existed or continued many years; aged.

qa_pairs.question: year-end
qa_pairs.answer: It means the end of a calendar year.

qa_pairs.question: year-end
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is taking place at the close of a fiscal year.

qa_pairs.question: Yearling
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An animal one year old, or in the second year of its age; -- applied chiefly to cattle, sheep, and horses.

qa_pairs.question: Yearling
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Being a year old.

qa_pairs.question: year-long
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as lasting through a year.

qa_pairs.question: Yearly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Happening, accruing, or coming every year; annual; as, a yearly income; a yearly feast.

qa_pairs.question: Yearly
qa_pairs.answer: It means Annually; once a year to year; as, blessings yearly bestowed.

qa_pairs.question: Yearn
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To pain; to grieve; to vex.

qa_pairs.question: Yearn
qa_pairs.answer: It means To be pained or distressed; to grieve; to mourn.

qa_pairs.question: Yearn
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To curdle, as milk.

qa_pairs.question: Yearn
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To be filled with longing desire; to be harassed or rendered uneasy with longing, or feeling the want of a thing; to strain with emotions of affection or tenderness; to long; to be eager.

qa_pairs.question: Yearnful
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Desirous.

qa_pairs.question: yearning
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as prolonged unfulfilled desire or need.

qa_pairs.question: yearning
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as full of longing or unfulfilled desire.

qa_pairs.question: Yearningly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as With yearning.

qa_pairs.question: Yearnings
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The maws, or stomachs, of young calves, used as a rennet for curdling milk.

qa_pairs.question: year-old
qa_pairs.answer: It means having reached an age as specified; as, a two-year-old toddler.

qa_pairs.question: year-round
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is operating or continuing throughout the year; as, a year-round resort; a year-round job. Antonym of Antonym: seasonal.

qa_pairs.question: Years purchase
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The amount that is yielded by the annual income of property; -- used in expressing the value of a thing in the number of years required for its income to yield its purchase price, in reckoning the amount to be paid for annuities, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Yearth
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The earth.

qa_pairs.question: Yeast
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The foam, or troth (top yeast), or the sediment (bottom yeast), of beer or other in fermentation, which contains the yeast plant or its spores, and under certain conditions produces fermentation in saccharine or farinaceous substances; a preparation used for raising dough for bread or cakes, and making it light and puffy; barm; ferment.

qa_pairs.question: Yeast-bitten
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A term used of beer when the froth of the yeast has reentered the body of the beer.

qa_pairs.question: Yeastiness
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The quality or state of being yeasty, or frothy.

qa_pairs.question: Yeasty
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Frothy; foamy; spumy, like yeast.

qa_pairs.question: Yedding
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The song of a minstrel; hence, any song.

qa_pairs.question: Yede
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Went. See Yode.

qa_pairs.question: Yeel
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An eel.

qa_pairs.question: Yeldhall
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Guildhall.

qa_pairs.question: Yeldrin
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The yellow-hammer; -- called also also known as yeldrock, and also known as yoldrin.

qa_pairs.question: Yelk
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Yolk.

qa_pairs.question: Yell
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To cry out, or shriek, with a hideous noise; to cry or scream as with agony or horror.

qa_pairs.question: Yell
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To utter or declare with a yell; to proclaim in a loud tone.

qa_pairs.question: Yell
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A sharp, loud, hideous outcry.

qa_pairs.question: yelling
qa_pairs.answer: It means The uttering of one or more loud inarticulate cries, as of pain or excitement.

qa_pairs.question: Yellow
qa_pairs.answer: It means Being of a bright saffronlike color; of the color of gold or brass; having the hue of that part of the rainbow, or of the solar spectrum, which is between the orange and the green.

qa_pairs.question: Yellow
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A bright golden color, reflecting more light than any other except white; the color of that part of the spectrum which is between the orange and green.

qa_pairs.question: Yellow
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To make yellow; to cause to have a yellow tinge or color; to dye yellow.

qa_pairs.question: Yellow
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To become yellow or yellower.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowammer
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Yellow-hammer.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowbill
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The American scoter.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowbird
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The American goldfinch, or thistle bird. See Goldfinch.

qa_pairs.question: Yellow Book
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In France, an official government publication bound in yellow covers.

qa_pairs.question: yellow-brown
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having a color intermediate between yellow and brown.

qa_pairs.question: Yellow-covered
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Covered or bound in yellow paper.

qa_pairs.question: Yellow-eyed
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having yellow eyes.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowfin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A large squeteague.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowfish
qa_pairs.answer: It means A rock trout (Pleurogrammus monopterygius) found on the coast of Alaska; -- called also also known as striped fish, and also known as Atka mackerel.

qa_pairs.question: Yellow-golds
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A certain plant, probably the yellow oxeye.

qa_pairs.question: yellow-green
qa_pairs.answer: It means midway between yellow and green.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowhammer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A common European finch (Emberiza citrinella). The color of the male is bright yellow on the breast, neck, and sides of the head, with the back yellow and brown, and the top of the head and the tail quills blackish. Called also also known as yellow bunting, also known as scribbling lark, and also known as writing lark.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowing
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act or process of making yellow.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowish
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Somewhat yellow; as, amber is of a yellowish color.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowlegs
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any one of several species of long-legged sandpipers of the genus *Totanus*, in which the legs are bright yellow; -- called also also known as stone snipe, also known as tattler, also known as telltale, also known as yellowshanks; and also known as yellowshins. See Tattler, 2.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowness
qa_pairs.answer: It means The quality or state of being yellow; as, the yellowness of an orange.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowroot
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any one of several plants with yellow roots.

qa_pairs.question: Yellow pages
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as a telephone book or part of a book in which the telephone numbers and often advertisements of business enterprises are listed in numerous sections, organized by the category of the business, the categories themselves being arranged alphabetically; a classified telephone directory. So called because for many years the listing thus organized was printed on yellow paper, to distinguish it from the white pages containing the names of individuals, listed alphabetically by last name. The yellow pages are usually bound together with the white pages in the telephone book distributed by the telephone company to its subscribers. The name was adopted by companies not affiliated with the telephone company, for the classified business directories that they sell.

qa_pairs.question: Yellows
qa_pairs.answer: It means A disease of the bile in horses, cattle, and sheep, causing yellowness of the eyes; jaundice.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowseed
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A kind of pepper grass (Lepidium campestre).

qa_pairs.question: Yellowshanks
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Yellolegs.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowtail
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Any one of several species of marine carangoid fishes of the genus *Seriola*; especially, the large California species (Seriola dorsalis) which sometimes weighs thirty or forty pounds, and is highly esteemed as a food fish; -- called also also known as cavasina, and also known as white salmon.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowthroat
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any one of several species of American ground warblers of the genus *Geothlypis*, esp. the Maryland yellowthroat (Geothlypis trichas), which is a very common species.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowtop
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A kind of grass, perhaps a species of *Agrostis*.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowwood
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The wood of any one of several different kinds of trees; also, any one of the trees themselves. Among the trees so called are the Cladrastis tinctoria, an American leguminous tree; the several species of prickly ash (*Xanthoxylum*); the Australian Flindersia Oxleyana, a tree related to the mahogany; certain South African species of *Podocarpus*, trees related to the yew; the East Indian Podocarpus latifolia; and the true satinwood (Chloroxylon Swietenia). All these Old World trees furnish valuable timber.

qa_pairs.question: Yellowwort
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A European yellow-flowered, gentianaceous (Chlora perfoliata). The whole plant is intensely bitter, and is sometimes used as a tonic, and also in dyeing yellow.

qa_pairs.question: Yelp
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To boast.

qa_pairs.question: Yelp
qa_pairs.answer: It means A sharp, quick cry; a bark.

qa_pairs.question: Yelper
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An animal that yelps, or makes a yelping noise.

qa_pairs.question: Yelting
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The Florida and West Indian red snapper (Lutianus aya); also, sometimes, one of certain other allied species, as Lutianus caxis.

qa_pairs.question: Yeman
qa_pairs.answer: It means A yeoman.

qa_pairs.question: Yemeni
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A native or inhabitant of Yemen .

qa_pairs.question: Yemeni
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to Yemen; as, Yemeni mountains.

qa_pairs.question: Yen
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The unit of value and account in Japan. The yen is equal to 100 sen. From Japan's adoption of the gold standard, in 1897, to about 1913 the value of the yen was about 50 cents. In 1997 and 1998 the value of the yen varied from 80 per U. S. dollar to 120 per dollar.

qa_pairs.question: Yend
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To throw; to cast.

qa_pairs.question: Yenisei
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A Russian river, flowing North into the Arctic Ocean.

qa_pairs.question: Yenite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A silicate of iron and lime occurring in black prismatic crystals; -- also called also known as ilvaite.

qa_pairs.question: Yeoman
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A common man, or one of the commonly of the first or most respectable class; a freeholder; a man free born.

qa_pairs.question: Yeomanlike
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Resembling, or suitable to, a yeoman; yeomanly.

qa_pairs.question: Yeomanly
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to a yeoman; becoming or suitable to, a yeoman; yeomanlike.

qa_pairs.question: Yeomanry
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The position or rank of a yeoman.

qa_pairs.question: Yeorling
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The European yellow-hammer.

qa_pairs.question: Yer
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Ere; before.

qa_pairs.question: Yerba
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An herb; a plant.

qa_pairs.question: Yerd
qa_pairs.answer: It means See 1st & 2d Yard.

qa_pairs.question: Yerk
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To throw or thrust with a sudden, smart movement; to kick or strike suddenly; to jerk.

qa_pairs.question: Yerk
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To throw out the heels; to kick; to jerk.

qa_pairs.question: Yerk
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A sudden or quick thrust or motion; a jerk.

qa_pairs.question: Yern
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See 3d Yearn.

qa_pairs.question: Yern
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Eager; brisk; quick; active.

qa_pairs.question: Yerne
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Eagerly; briskly; quickly.

qa_pairs.question: Yernut
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An earthnut, or groundnut. See Groundnut (d).

qa_pairs.question: Yerst
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Erst.

qa_pairs.question: Yes
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Ay; yea; -- a word which expresses affirmation or consent; -- opposed to Antonym: no.

qa_pairs.question: Yest
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Yeast.

qa_pairs.question: Yester
qa_pairs.answer: It means Last; last past; next before; of or pertaining to yesterday.

qa_pairs.question: Yesterday
qa_pairs.answer: It means The day last past; the day next before the present.

qa_pairs.question: Yesterday
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as On the day last past; on the day preceding to-day; as, the affair took place yesterday.

qa_pairs.question: Yestereve
qa_pairs.answer: It means The evening of yesterday; the evening last past.

qa_pairs.question: Yestermorn
qa_pairs.answer: It means The morning of yesterday.

qa_pairs.question: Yestern
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to yesterday; relating to the day last past.

qa_pairs.question: Yesternight
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The last night; the night last past.

qa_pairs.question: Yesternight
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is On the last night.

qa_pairs.question: Yesternoon
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The noon of yesterday; the noon last past.

qa_pairs.question: Yesterweek
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The week last past; last week.

qa_pairs.question: Yesteryear
qa_pairs.answer: It means The year last past; last year.

qa_pairs.question: Yestreen
qa_pairs.answer: It means Yester-evening; yesternight; last night.

qa_pairs.question: Yesty
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Yeasty.

qa_pairs.question: Yet
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any one of several species of large marine gastropods belonging to the genus *Yetus*, or *Cymba*; a boat shell.

qa_pairs.question: Yet
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In addition; further; besides; over and above; still.

qa_pairs.question: Yet
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Nevertheless; notwithstanding; however.

qa_pairs.question: Yeve
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To give.

qa_pairs.question: Yeven
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Given.

qa_pairs.question: Yew
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Yaw.

qa_pairs.question: Yew
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An evergreen tree (Taxus baccata) of Europe, allied to the pines, but having a peculiar berrylike fruit instead of a cone. It frequently grows in British churchyards.

qa_pairs.question: Yew
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to yew trees; made of the wood of a yew tree; as, a yew whipstock.

qa_pairs.question: Yewen
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Made of yew; as, yewen bows.

qa_pairs.question: Yex
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To hiccough.

qa_pairs.question: Yex
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A hiccough.

qa_pairs.question: Yezdegerdian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to Yezdegerd, the last Sassanian monarch of Persia, who was overthrown by the Muslims; as, the Yezdegerdian era, which began on the 16th of June, a. d. 632. The era is still used by the Parsees.

qa_pairs.question: Yezdi
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Izedi.

qa_pairs.question: Yezidee
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Izedi.

qa_pairs.question: Yfere
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Together. See Ifere.

qa_pairs.question: Ygdrasyl
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See in the Dictionary of Noted Names in Fiction.

qa_pairs.question: Yghe
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Eye.

qa_pairs.question: Ygo
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Gone.

qa_pairs.question: Yground
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is (p. p.) of Grind.

qa_pairs.question: Yholde
qa_pairs.answer: It means (p. p.) of Hold.

qa_pairs.question: Yid
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A Jew; -- now (1998) usually considered offensive or contemptuous.

qa_pairs.question: Yiddish
qa_pairs.answer: It means A language used by German and other Jews, being a Middle German dialect developed under Hebrew and Slavic influence. It is written in Hebrew characters.

qa_pairs.question: Yiddisher
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A Yid.

qa_pairs.question: Yield
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To give in return for labor expended; to produce, as payment or interest on what is expended or invested; to pay; as, money at interest yields six or seven per cent.

qa_pairs.question: Yield
qa_pairs.answer: It means To give up the contest; to submit; to surrender; to succumb.

qa_pairs.question: Yield
qa_pairs.answer: It means Amount yielded; product; -- applied especially to products resulting from growth or cultivation.

qa_pairs.question: Yieldable
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Disposed to yield or comply.

qa_pairs.question: Yieldance
qa_pairs.answer: It means The act of producing; yield; as, the yieldance of the earth.

qa_pairs.question: Yielder
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who yields.

qa_pairs.question: Yielding
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Inclined to give way, or comply; flexible; compliant; accommodating; as, a yielding temper.

qa_pairs.question: Yieldless
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Without yielding; unyielding.

qa_pairs.question: Yift
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Gift.

qa_pairs.question: Yin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A Chinese weight of 2<frac23/ pounds.

qa_pairs.question: Yin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as one of the two fundamental principles. See yin and yang.

qa_pairs.question: yin and yang
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is the two fundamental principles, one negative, dark, passive, cold, wet, and feminine (yin) and the other (yang) positive, bright, active, dry, hot and masculine. The interactions and balance of these forces in people and nature influence their behavior and fate.

qa_pairs.question: Yis
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Yes.

qa_pairs.question: Yit
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Yet.

qa_pairs.question: Yite
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The European yellow-hammer.

qa_pairs.question: Yive
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To give.

qa_pairs.question: -yl
qa_pairs.answer: It means A suffix used as a characteristic termination of chemical radicals; as in ethyl, carbonyl, hydroxyl, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Ylang-ylang
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Ihlang-ihlang.

qa_pairs.question: Yle
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Isle.

qa_pairs.question: Y level
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See under Y, (n.)

qa_pairs.question: Yliche
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Like; alike.

qa_pairs.question: Yllanraton
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The agouara.

qa_pairs.question: Ymaked
qa_pairs.answer: It means Made.

qa_pairs.question: Ymel
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Among.

qa_pairs.question: Ynambu
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A South American tinamou (Rhynchotus rufescens); -- called also also known as perdiz grande, and also known as rufous tinamou. See Illust. of Tinamou.

qa_pairs.question: Ynough
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Enough.

qa_pairs.question: Yockel
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The yaffle.

qa_pairs.question: Yode
qa_pairs.answer: It means Went; walked; proceeded.

qa_pairs.question: Yodel
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To sing in a manner common among the Swiss and Tyrolese mountaineers, by suddenly changing from the head voice, or falsetto, to the chest voice, and the contrary; to warble.

qa_pairs.question: Yodel
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A song sung by yodeling, as by the Swiss mountaineers.

qa_pairs.question: Yodler
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who yodels.

qa_pairs.question: Yoga
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A species of asceticism among the Hindoos, which consists in a complete abstraction from all worldly objects, by which the votary expects to obtain union with the universal spirit, and to acquire superhuman faculties.

qa_pairs.question: yogh
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An obsolete letter (<yogh/) of the Old English alphabet, having a pronunciation similar to the modern <ldquo/y<rdquo/.

qa_pairs.question: yoghurt
qa_pairs.answer: It means custardlike food made from curdled milk.

qa_pairs.question: Yogi
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A follower of the yoga philosophy; an ascetic.

qa_pairs.question: Yogism
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Yoga, or its practice.

qa_pairs.question: Yoicks
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A cry of encouragement to foxhounds.

qa_pairs.question: Yoit
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The European yellow-hammer.

qa_pairs.question: Yojan
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A measure of distance, varying from four to ten miles, but usually about five.

qa_pairs.question: Yoke
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A bar or frame of wood by which two oxen are joined at the heads or necks for working together.

qa_pairs.question: Yoke
qa_pairs.answer: It means To put a yoke on; to join in or with a yoke; as, to yoke oxen, or pair of oxen.

qa_pairs.question: Yoke
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To be joined or associated; to be intimately connected; to consort closely; to mate.

qa_pairs.question: Yokeage
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Rokeage.

qa_pairs.question: Yokefellow
qa_pairs.answer: It means An associate or companion in, or as in; a mate; a fellow; especially, a partner in marriage.

qa_pairs.question: Yokel
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A country bumpkin.

qa_pairs.question: Yokelet
qa_pairs.answer: It means A small farm; -- so called as requiring but one yoke of oxen to till it.

qa_pairs.question: Yokemate
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Yokefellow.

qa_pairs.question: Yoke-toed
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having two toes in front and two behind, as the trogons and woodpeckers.

qa_pairs.question: Yold
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Yielded.

qa_pairs.question: Yolden
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Yielded.

qa_pairs.question: Yolk
qa_pairs.answer: It means The yellow part of an egg; the vitellus.

qa_pairs.question: Yoll
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To yell.

qa_pairs.question: Yom
qa_pairs.answer: It means Day; -- a Hebrew word used in the names of various Jewish feast days; as, Yom Kippur, the Day of Atonement; Yom Teruah (lit., day of shouting), the Feast of Trumpets.

qa_pairs.question: Yom Kippur
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as the only fast day of the Mosaic ritual, celebrated on the tenth day of the seventh month (Tishri), according to the rites described in Leviticus xvi. Also called also known as Day of Atonement.

qa_pairs.question: Yon
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as At a distance, but within view; yonder.

qa_pairs.question: Yon
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Yonder.

qa_pairs.question: Yoncopin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A local name in parts of the Mississippi Valley for the American lotus (Nelumbo lutea).

qa_pairs.question: Yond
qa_pairs.answer: It means Furious; mad; angry; fierce.

qa_pairs.question: Yond
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Yonder.

qa_pairs.question: Yonder
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is At a distance, but within view.

qa_pairs.question: Yonder
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Being at a distance within view, or conceived of as within view; that or those there; yon.

qa_pairs.question: Yoni
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The symbol under which Sakti, or the personification of the female power in nature, is worshiped. Cf. Lingam.

qa_pairs.question: Yonker
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A young fellow; a younker.

qa_pairs.question: Yore
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In time long past; in old time; long since.

qa_pairs.question: Yorker
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A tice.

qa_pairs.question: York rite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The rite or ceremonial observed by one of the Masonic systems, deriving its name from the city of York, in England; also, the system itself, which, in England, confers only the first three degrees.

qa_pairs.question: Yorkshire
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A county in the north of England.

qa_pairs.question: York use
qa_pairs.answer: It means The one of the three printed uses of England which was followed in the north. It was based on the Sarum use. See Use, also known as n., 6.
