qa_pairs.question: Yot
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To unite closely.

qa_pairs.question: Yote
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To pour water on; to soak in, or mix with, water.

qa_pairs.question: You
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The pronoun of the second person, in the nominative, dative, and objective case, indicating the person or persons addressed. See the Note under Ye.

qa_pairs.question: Youl
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To yell; to yowl.

qa_pairs.question: Young
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Not long born; still in the first part of life; not yet arrived at adolescence, maturity, or age; not old; juvenile; -- said of animals; as, a young child; a young man; a young fawn.

qa_pairs.question: Young
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The offspring of animals, either a single animal or offspring collectively.

qa_pairs.question: young-bearing
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is being the sex that produces ova and carries the fetus to a point where it can live outside the parent; -- of animals.

qa_pairs.question: young-begetting
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces gametes (spermatozoa) that perform the fertilizing function in generation, usually male. In contradistinction to female or androgynous.

qa_pairs.question: Younger
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One who is younger; an inferior in age; a junior.

qa_pairs.question: Youngish
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Somewhat young.

qa_pairs.question: Youngling
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A young person; a youth; also, any animal in its early life.

qa_pairs.question: Youngling
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Young; youthful.

qa_pairs.question: Youngly
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Like a young person or thing; young; youthful.

qa_pairs.question: Youngly
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is In a young manner; in the period of youth; early in life.

qa_pairs.question: Young Mens Christian Association
qa_pairs.answer: It means An organization for promoting the spiritual, intellectual, social, and physical welfare of young men, founded, June 6, 1844, by George Williams (knighted therefor by Queen Victoria) in London. In 1851 it extended to the United States and Canada, and in 1855 representatives of similar organizations throughout Europe and America formed an international body. The movement has successfully expanded not only among young men in general, but also specifically among railroad men, in the army and navy, with provision for Indians and negroes, and a full duplication of all the various lines of oepration in the boys' departments. It currently (1998) maintains buildings which usually have both recreational facilities and dormitories for dwelling. It is usually called by its acronym also known as YMCA. See also the similar organizations Young Women's Christian Association and YMHA.

qa_pairs.question: Youngness
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being young.

qa_pairs.question: Young one
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A young human being; a child; also, a young animal, as a colt.

qa_pairs.question: Youngster
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A young person; a youngling; a lad.

qa_pairs.question: Youngth
qa_pairs.answer: It means Youth.

qa_pairs.question: Youngthly
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining to, or resembling, youth; youthful.

qa_pairs.question: Youngun
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A young human being; -- a contraction of young one.

qa_pairs.question: Young Womens Christian Association
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An organization for promoting the spiritual, intellectual, social, and economic welfare of young women, originating in 1855 with Lady Kinnaird's home for young women, and Miss Emma Robert's prayer union for young women,in England, which were combined in the year 1884 as a national association. Now nearly all the civilized countries, and esp. the United States, have local, national, and international organizations. See also the similar organizations Young Men's Christian Association and YMHA.

qa_pairs.question: Younker
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A young person; a stripling; a yonker.

qa_pairs.question: Youpon
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Same as Yaupon.

qa_pairs.question: Your
qa_pairs.answer: It means The form of the possessive case of the personal pronoun you.

qa_pairs.question: Yours
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See the Note under Your.

qa_pairs.question: Yourself
qa_pairs.answer: It means An emphasized or reflexive form of the pronoun of the second person; -- used as a subject commonly with you; as, you yourself shall see it; also, alone in the predicate, either in the nominative or objective case; as, you have injured yourself.

qa_pairs.question: Youth
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being young; youthfulness; juvenility.

qa_pairs.question: Youthful
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Not yet mature or aged; young.

qa_pairs.question: Youthhood
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The quality or state of being a youth; the period of youth.

qa_pairs.question: Youthly
qa_pairs.answer: It means Young; youthful.

qa_pairs.question: youth-on-age
qa_pairs.answer: It means A vigorous perennial herb (Tolmiea menziesii) with flowers in erect racemes and having young plants develop at the junction of a leaf blade and the leafstalk.

qa_pairs.question: Youthsome
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Youthful.

qa_pairs.question: Youthy
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Young.

qa_pairs.question: Youze
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The cheetah.

qa_pairs.question: Yow
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as You.

qa_pairs.question: Yowe
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A ewe.

qa_pairs.question: Yowl
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To utter a loud, long, and mournful cry, as a dog; to howl; to yell.

qa_pairs.question: Yowl
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A loud, protracted, and mournful cry, as that of a dog; a howl.

qa_pairs.question: Yowley
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The European yellow-hammer.

qa_pairs.question: Yox
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Yex.

qa_pairs.question: Ypight
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Pight.

qa_pairs.question: Ypocras
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Hippocras.

qa_pairs.question: Ypres lace
qa_pairs.answer: It means Fine bobbin lace made at Ypres in Belgium, usually exactly like Valenciennes lace.

qa_pairs.question: Ypsiliform
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Resembling the <?/ in appearance; -- said of the germinal spot in the ripe egg at one of the stages of fecundation.

qa_pairs.question: Ypsiloid
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as In the form of the letter Y; Y-shaped.

qa_pairs.question: Yraft
qa_pairs.answer: It means Bereft.

qa_pairs.question: Yren
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Iron.

qa_pairs.question: Yronne
qa_pairs.answer: It means Run.

qa_pairs.question: Ysame
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Together.

qa_pairs.question: Y<supr>t</supr>
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An old method of printing that (AS. <thorn/<ae/t, <edh/<ae/t) the <ldquo/y<rdquo/ taking the place of the old letter <ldquo/thorn<rdquo/ (<thorn/). Cf. Ye, the.

qa_pairs.question: Ythrowe
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as (p. p.) of Throw.

qa_pairs.question: Ytterbic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining to, or derived from, ytterbium; containing ytterbium.

qa_pairs.question: Ytterbium
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A rare element of the boron group, sometimes associated with yttrium or other related elements, as in euxenite and gadolinite. Symbol Yb; provisional atomic weight 173.2. Cf. Yttrium.

qa_pairs.question: Yttria
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The oxide, Y2O3, or earth, of yttrium.

qa_pairs.question: Yttric
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Pertaining to, derived from, or containing, yttrium.

qa_pairs.question: Yttriferous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Bearing or containing yttrium or the allied elements; as, gadolinite is one of the yttriferous minerals.

qa_pairs.question: Yttrious
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Yttric.

qa_pairs.question: Yttrium
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A rare metallic element of the boron-aluminium group, found in gadolinite and other rare minerals, and extracted as a dark gray powder. Symbol _Y_. Atomic number 39. Atomic weight, 88.9.

qa_pairs.question: Yttro-cerite
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A mineral of a violet-blue color, inclining to gray and white. It is a hydrous fluoride of cerium, yttrium, and calcium.

qa_pairs.question: Yttro-columbite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A tantalate of uranium, yttrium, and calcium, of a brown or black color.

qa_pairs.question: Yu
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Jade.

qa_pairs.question: Yucca
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Flicker, (n.), 2.

qa_pairs.question: Yucca
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus of American liliaceous, sometimes arborescent, plants having long, pointed, and often rigid, leaves at the top of a more or less woody stem, and bearing a large panicle of showy white blossoms.

qa_pairs.question: Yucca borer
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A California boring weevil (Yuccaborus frontalis).

qa_pairs.question: Yuck
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To itch.

qa_pairs.question: Yuck
qa_pairs.answer: It means To scratch.

qa_pairs.question: yuck
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is an interjection expressing repugnance or distaste.

qa_pairs.question: yuck
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is a laugh; also, a joke or gag; -- usually used in the plural, as, the skit got lots of yucks.

qa_pairs.question: Yuckel
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Yockel.

qa_pairs.question: yuck factor
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as a reaction of repugnance or distaste; -- used in discussion of acceptability of proposed new foods, medicines, etc. among potential consumers or patients.

qa_pairs.question: yucky
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Repugnant or distasteful.

qa_pairs.question: Yuen
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The crowned gibbon (Hylobates pileatus), native of Siam, Southern China, and the Island of Hainan. It is entirely arboreal in its habits, and has very long arms. the males are dark brown or blackish, with a caplike mass of long dark hair, and usually with a white band around the face. The females are yellowish white, with a dark spot on the breast and another on the crown. Called also also known as wooyen, and also known as wooyen ape.

qa_pairs.question: Yufts
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Russia leather.

qa_pairs.question: Yug
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any one of the four ages, Krita, or Satya, Treta, Dwapara, and Kali, into which the Hindoos divide the duration or existence of the world.

qa_pairs.question: Yugoslav
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is a native or inhabitant of Yugoslavia.

qa_pairs.question: Yugoslav
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to Yugoslavia; as, Yugoslavian wine.

qa_pairs.question: Yugoslavian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is a native or inhabitant of Yugoslavia.

qa_pairs.question: Yuke
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Yuck.

qa_pairs.question: Yulan
qa_pairs.answer: It means A species of Magnolia (Magnolia conspicua) with large white blossoms that open before the leaves. See the Note under Magnolia.

qa_pairs.question: Yule
qa_pairs.answer: It means Christmas or Christmastide; the feast of the Nativity of our Savior.

qa_pairs.question: Yuletide
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Christmas time; Christmastide; the season of Christmas.

qa_pairs.question: Yuman
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Designating, or pertaining to, an important linguistic stock of North American Indians of the southwestern United States and northwestern Mexico, nearly all agriculturists and adept potters and basket makers. Their usual dwelling is the brush wikiup, and in their native state they wear little clothing. The Yuma, Maricopa, Mohave, Walapi, and Yavapai are among the chief tribes, all of fine physique.

qa_pairs.question: Yumas
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A tribe of Indians native of Arizona and the adjacent parts of Mexico and California. They are agricultural, and cultivate corn, wheat, barley, melons, etc.

qa_pairs.question: yummy
qa_pairs.answer: It means Very pleasing or attractive; especially, pleasing to the taste; delicious; scrumptious.

qa_pairs.question: Yunca
qa_pairs.answer: It means An Indian of a linguistic stock of tribes of the Peruvian coast who had a developed agricultural civilization at the advent of the Spaniards, before which they had been conquered by the Incas. They constructed irrigation canals which are still in use, adorned their buildings with bas-reliefs and frescoes, and were skilled goldsmiths and silversmiths.

qa_pairs.question: Yunx
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of birds comprising the wrynecks.

qa_pairs.question: Yupon
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Yaupon.

qa_pairs.question: yuppie
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is an ambitious young adult, usually college-educated, living in or near a large city, with a professional career and an affluent lifestyle. The "u" in the word is sometimes interpreted as meaning <ldquo/upwardly mobile<rdquo/.

qa_pairs.question: Yux
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Yex, (n.)

qa_pairs.question: Yvel
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Evil; ill.

qa_pairs.question: Ywar
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Aware; wary.

qa_pairs.question: Ywis
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Certainly; most likely; truly; probably.

qa_pairs.question: Z
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Z, the twenty-sixth and last letter of the English alphabet, is a vocal consonant. It is taken from the Latin letter Z, which came from the Greek alphabet, this having it from a Semitic source. The ultimate origin is probably Egyptian. Etymologically, it is most closely related to s, y, and j; as in glass, glaze; E. yoke, Gr. <?/, L. yugum; E. zealous, jealous. See Guide to Pronunciation, <sect/<sect/ 273, 274.

qa_pairs.question: Za
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An old solfeggio name for B flat; the seventh harmonic, as heard in the or aeolian string; -- so called by Tartini. It was long considered a false, but is the true note of the chord of the flat seventh.

qa_pairs.question: Zabaism
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Sabianism.

qa_pairs.question: Zabian
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Sabian.

qa_pairs.question: Zacco
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Zocco.

qa_pairs.question: Zachun
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An oil pressed by the Arabs from the fruit of a small thorny tree (Balanites Aegyptiaca), and sold to piligrims for a healing ointment.

qa_pairs.question: Zaerthe
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Z<aum/rthe.

qa_pairs.question: Zaffer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A pigment obtained, usually by roasting cobalt glance with sand or quartz, as a dark earthy powder. It consists of crude cobalt oxide, or of an impure cobalt arseniate. It is used in porcelain painting, and in enameling pottery, to produce a blue color, and is often confounded with smalt, from which, however, it is distinct, as it contains no potash. The name is often loosely applied to mixtures of zaffer proper with silica, or oxides of iron, manganese, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Zaim
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A Turkish chief who supports a mounted militia bearing the same name.

qa_pairs.question: Zaimet
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A district from which a Zaim draws his revenue.

qa_pairs.question: Zain
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A horse of a dark color, neither gray nor white, and having no spots.

qa_pairs.question: Zalambdodont
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to a tribe (Zalambdodonta) of Insectivora in which the molar teeth have but one V-shaped ridge.

qa_pairs.question: Zalambdodont
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One of the Zalambdodonta. The tenrec, solenodon, and golden moles are examples.

qa_pairs.question: Zama
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as the battle in 202 BC in which Scipio decisively defeated Hannibal at the end of the second Punic War.

qa_pairs.question: zaman
qa_pairs.answer: It means A large ornamental tropical American tree (Albizia saman) with bipinnate leaves and globose clusters of flowers with crimson stamens and sweet-pulp seed pods eaten by cattle.

qa_pairs.question: Zamang
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An immense leguminous tree (Pithecolobium Saman) of Venezuela. Its branches form a hemispherical mass, often one hundred and eighty feet across. The sweet pulpy pods are used commonly for feeding cattle. Also called also known as rain tree.

qa_pairs.question: Zambian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is a native or inhabitant of Zambia.

qa_pairs.question: Zambian
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as of or pertaining to Zambia; as, Zambian cities.

qa_pairs.question: Zambo
qa_pairs.answer: It means The child of a mulatto and a negro; also, the child of an Indian and a negro; colloquially or humorously, a negro; a sambo.

qa_pairs.question: Zamia
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A genus of cycadaceous plants, having the appearance of low palms, but with exogenous wood. See Coontie, and Illust. of Strobile.

qa_pairs.question: Zamindar
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A landowner; also, a collector of land revenue; now, usually, a kind of feudatory recognized as an actual proprietor so long as he pays to the government a certain fixed revenue.

qa_pairs.question: Zamindary
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The jurisdiction of a zamindar; the land possessed by a zamindar.

qa_pairs.question: Zamite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A fossil cycad of the genus *Zamia*.

qa_pairs.question: Zamouse
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A West African buffalo (Bubalus brachyceros) having short horns depressed at the base, and large ears fringed internally with three rows of long hairs. It is destitute of a dewlap. Called also also known as short-horned buffalo, and also known as bush cow.

qa_pairs.question: Zampogna
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A sort of bagpipe formerly in use among Italian peasants. It is now almost obsolete.

qa_pairs.question: Zander
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A European pike perch (Stizostedion lucioperca) allied to the wall-eye; -- called also also known as sandari, also known as sander, also known as sannat, also known as schill, and also known as zant.

qa_pairs.question: Zandmole
qa_pairs.answer: It means The sand mole.

qa_pairs.question: Zante
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Zantewood.

qa_pairs.question: Zante currant
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A kind of seedless grape or raisin; -- so called from Zante, one of the Ionian Islands.

qa_pairs.question: Zantewood
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A yellow dyewood; fustet; -- called also also known as zante, and also known as zante fustic. See Fustet, and the Note under Fustic.

qa_pairs.question: Zantiot
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A native or inhabitant of Zante, one of the Ionian Islands.

qa_pairs.question: zany
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Comical in a clownish or buffoonish manner; whimsically comical.

qa_pairs.question: Zany
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A merry-andrew; a buffoon.

qa_pairs.question: Zany
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To mimic.

qa_pairs.question: Zanyism
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as State or character of a zany; buffoonery.

qa_pairs.question: zap
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is to shoot, destroy, or inactivate; my TV set was zapped by lightning.

qa_pairs.question: Zapas
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Army organization, above.

qa_pairs.question: Zapatera
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A cured olive which has spoiled or is on the verge of decomposition; loosely, an olive defective because of bruises, wormholes, or the like.

qa_pairs.question: Zaphara
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Zaffer.

qa_pairs.question: Zaphrentis
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An extinct genus of cyathophylloid corals common in the Paleozoic formations. It is cup-shaped with numerous septa, and with a deep pit in one side of the cup.

qa_pairs.question: Zapotilla
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Sapodilla.

qa_pairs.question: Zaptiah
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A Turkish policeman.

qa_pairs.question: Zarathustra
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The Persian name for also known as Zoroaster.

qa_pairs.question: Zarathustrian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to Zarathustra, or Zoroaster; Zoroastrian.

qa_pairs.question: Zarathustrism
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Zoroastrianism.

qa_pairs.question: Zaratite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A hydrous carbonate of nickel occurring as an emerald-green incrustation on chromite; -- called also also known as emerald nickel.

qa_pairs.question: Zareba
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An improvised stockade; especially, one made of thorn bushes, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Zarf
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A metallic cuplike stand used for holding a finjan.

qa_pairs.question: Zarnich
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Native sulphide of arsenic, including sandarach, or realgar, and orpiment.

qa_pairs.question: Z<aum/rthe
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A European bream (Abramis vimba).

qa_pairs.question: Zastrugi
qa_pairs.answer: It means Grooves or furrows formed in snow by the action of the wind, and running parallel with the direction of the wind. This formation results from the erosion of transverse waves previously formed.

qa_pairs.question: Zati
qa_pairs.answer: It means A species of macaque (Macacus pileatus) native of India and Ceylon. It has a crown of long erect hair, and tuft of radiating hairs on the back of the head. Called also also known as capped macaque.

qa_pairs.question: Zauschneria
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus of flowering plants. Zauschneria Californica is a suffrutescent perennial, with showy red flowers much resembling those of the garden fuchsia.

qa_pairs.question: Zax
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A tool for trimming and puncturing roofing slates.

qa_pairs.question: Zayat
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A public shed, or portico, for travelers, worshipers, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Zea
qa_pairs.answer: It means A genus of large grasses of which the Indian corn (Zea Mays) is the only species known. Its origin is not yet ascertained. See Maize.

qa_pairs.question: Zeal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Passionate ardor in the pursuit of anything; eagerness in favor of a person or cause; ardent and active interest; engagedness; enthusiasm; fervor.

qa_pairs.question: Zeal
qa_pairs.answer: It means To be zealous.

qa_pairs.question: Zealant
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who is zealous; a zealot; an enthusiast.

qa_pairs.question: Zealed
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Full of zeal; characterized by zeal.

qa_pairs.question: Zealful
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Full of zeal.

qa_pairs.question: Zealless
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Wanting zeal.

qa_pairs.question: Zealot
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who is zealous; one who engages warmly in any cause, and pursues his object with earnestness and ardor; especially, one who is overzealous, or carried away by his zeal; one absorbed in devotion to anything; an enthusiast; a fanatical partisan.

qa_pairs.question: Zealotical
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Like, or suitable to, a zealot; ardently zealous.

qa_pairs.question: Zealotism
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The character or conduct of a zealot; zealotry.

qa_pairs.question: Zealotist
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A zealot.

qa_pairs.question: Zealotry
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The character and behavior of a zealot; excess of zeal; fanatical devotion to a cause.

qa_pairs.question: Zealous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Filled with, or characterized by, zeal; warmly engaged, or ardent, in behalf of an object.

qa_pairs.question: Zebec
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Xebec.

qa_pairs.question: Zebra
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Any member of three species of African wild horses remarkable for having the body white or yellowish white, and conspicuously marked with dark brown or brackish bands.

qa_pairs.question: zebra-tailed lizard
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A lizard having a long tail with black bands (Callisaurus draconoides), which lives in the deserts of the southwestern U. S. and Mexico; called also also known as gridiron-tailed lizard.

qa_pairs.question: Zebrawood
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A kind of cabinet wood having beautiful black, brown, and whitish stripes, the timber of a tropical American tree (Connarus Guianensis).

qa_pairs.question: Zebrine
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or resembling, the zebra.

qa_pairs.question: Zebrinny
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A cross between a male horse and a female zebra.

qa_pairs.question: Zebrula
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A cross between a male zebra and a female horse.

qa_pairs.question: Zebu
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A bovine mammal (Ros Indicus) extensively domesticated in India, China, the East Indies, and East Africa. It usually has short horns, large pendulous ears, slender legs, a large dewlap, and a large, prominent hump over the shoulders; but these characters vary in different domestic breeds, which range in size from that of the common ox to that of a large mastiff.

qa_pairs.question: Zebub
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A large noxious fly of Abyssinia, which like the tsetse fly, is destructive to cattle.

qa_pairs.question: Zechin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Sequin.

qa_pairs.question: Zechstein
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The upper division of the Permian (Dyas) of Europe. The prevailing rock is a magnesian limestone.

qa_pairs.question: Zed
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The letter Z; -- called also also known as zee, and formerly also known as izzard.

qa_pairs.question: Zedoary
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A medicinal substance obtained in the East Indies, having a fragrant smell, and a warm, bitter, aromatic taste. It is used in medicine as a stimulant.

qa_pairs.question: Zeekoe
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A hippopotamus.

qa_pairs.question: Zeeman effect
qa_pairs.answer: It means The widening and duplication, triplication, etc., of spectral lines when the radiations emanate in a strong magnetic field, first observed in 1896 by P. Zeeman, a Dutch physicist, and regarded as an important confirmation of the electromagnetic theory of light.

qa_pairs.question: Zehner
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An Austrian silver coin equal to ten kreutzers, or about five cents.

qa_pairs.question: Zein
qa_pairs.answer: It means A nitrogenous substance of the nature of gluten, obtained from the seeds of Indian corn (Zea) as a soft, yellowish, amorphous substance.

qa_pairs.question: Zeitgeist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The spirit of the time; the general intellectual and moral state or temper characteristic of any period of time.

qa_pairs.question: Zemindar
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Zamindar.

qa_pairs.question: Zemindary
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Zamindary.

qa_pairs.question: Zemni
qa_pairs.answer: It means The blind mole rat (Spalax typhlus), native of Eastern Europe and Asia. Its eyes and ears are rudimentary, and its fur is soft and brownish, more or less tinged with gray. It constructs extensive burrows.

qa_pairs.question: Zemstvo
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In Russia, an elective local district and provincial administrative assembly. Originally it was composed of representatives elected by the peasantry, the householders of the towns, and the landed proprietors. In the reign of Alexander III. the power of the noble landowners was increased, the peasants allowed only to elect candidates from whom the governor of the province nominated the deputy, and all acts of the zemstvo subjected to the approval of the governor. Theoretically the zemstvo has large powers relating to taxation, education, public health, etc., but practically these powers are in most cases limited to the adjustment of the state taxation.

qa_pairs.question: Zenana
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The part of a dwelling appropriated to women.

qa_pairs.question: Zend
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Properly, the translation and exposition in the Huzv<acir/resh, or literary Pehlevi, language, of the Avesta, the Zoroastrian sacred writings; as commonly used, the language (an ancient Persian dialect) in which the Avesta is written.

qa_pairs.question: Zend-Avesta
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The sacred writings of the ancient Persian religion, attributed to Zoroaster, but chiefly of a later date.

qa_pairs.question: Zendik
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An atheist or unbeliever; -- name given in the East to those charged with disbelief of any revealed religion, or accused of magical heresies.

qa_pairs.question: Zenick
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A South African burrowing mammal (Suricata tetradactyla), allied to the civets. It is grayish brown, with yellowish transverse stripes on the back. Called also also known as suricat.

qa_pairs.question: Zenik
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Zenick.

qa_pairs.question: Zenith
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as That point in the visible celestial hemisphere which is vertical to the spectator; the point of the heavens directly overhead; -- opposed to Antonym: nadir.

qa_pairs.question: Zenithal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the zenith.

qa_pairs.question: Zeolite
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A term now used to designate any one of a family of minerals, hydrous silicates of alumina, with lime, soda, potash, or rarely baryta. Here are included natrolite, stilbite, analcime, chabazite, thomsonite, heulandite, and others. These species occur of secondary origin in the cavities of amygdaloid, basalt, and lava, also, less frequently, in granite and gneiss. So called because many of these species intumesce before the blowpipe.

qa_pairs.question: Zeolitic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to a zeolite; consisting of, or resembling, a zeolite.

qa_pairs.question: Zeolitiform
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having the form of a zeolite.

qa_pairs.question: Zephyr
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The west wind; poetically, any soft, gentle breeze.

qa_pairs.question: Zephyrus
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The west wind, or zephyr; -- usually personified, and made the most mild and gentle of all the sylvan deities.

qa_pairs.question: Zeppelin
qa_pairs.answer: It means A dirigible balloon of the rigid type, consisting of a cylindrical trussed and covered frame supported by internal gas cells, and provided with means of propulsion and control. It was first successfully used by Ferdinand Count von Zeppelin.

qa_pairs.question: Zequin
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Sequin.

qa_pairs.question: Zerda
qa_pairs.answer: It means The fennec.

qa_pairs.question: Zeriba
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Zareba.

qa_pairs.question: Zero
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A cipher; nothing; naught.

qa_pairs.question: Zest
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A piece of orange or lemon peel, or the aromatic oil which may be squeezed from such peel, used to give flavor to liquor, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Zest
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To cut into thin slips, as the peel of an orange, lemon, etc.; to squeeze, as peel, over the surface of anything.

qa_pairs.question: zestful
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Marked by spirited enjoyment.

qa_pairs.question: zesty
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having a pleasantly stimulating flavor. Opposite of Antonym: bland.

qa_pairs.question: Zeta
qa_pairs.answer: It means A Greek letter [<zeta/] corresponding to our _z._

qa_pairs.question: Zetetic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Seeking; proceeding by inquiry.

qa_pairs.question: Zetetic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A seeker; -- a name adopted by some of the Pyrrhonists.

qa_pairs.question: Zetetics
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A branch of algebra which relates to the direct search for unknown quantities.

qa_pairs.question: Zeuglodon
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A genus of extinct Eocene whales, remains of which have been found in the Gulf States. The species had very long and slender bodies and broad serrated teeth. See Phocodontia.

qa_pairs.question: Zeuglodont
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any species of Zeuglodonta.

qa_pairs.question: Zeuglodonta
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Phocodontia.

qa_pairs.question: Zeugma
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A figure by which an adjective or verb, which agrees with a nearer word, is, by way of supplement, referred also to another more remote; as, arma, hic currus fuit;fuit, which agrees directly with currus, is referred also to arma.

qa_pairs.question: Zeugmatic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to zeugma; characterized by zeugma.

qa_pairs.question: Zeugobranchiata
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Zygobranchia.

qa_pairs.question: Zeus
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The chief deity of the Greeks, and ruler of the upper world (cf. Hades). He was identified with Jupiter.

qa_pairs.question: Zeuzerian
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any one of a group of bombycid moths of which the genus *Zeuzera* is the type. Some of these moths are of large size. The goat moth is an example.

qa_pairs.question: Zeylanite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Ceylanite.

qa_pairs.question: Zibet
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A carnivorous mammal (Viverra zibetha) closely allied to the civet, from which it differs in having the spots on the body less distinct, the throat whiter, and the black rings on the tail more numerous.

qa_pairs.question: Ziega
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Curd produced from milk by adding acetic acid, after rennet has ceased to cause coagulation.

qa_pairs.question: Zietrisikite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A mineral wax, vert similar to ozocerite. It is found at Zietrisika, Moldavia, whence its name.

qa_pairs.question: Zif
qa_pairs.answer: It means The second month of the Jewish ecclesiastical year, corresponding to our May.

qa_pairs.question: Zigger
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Sicker.

qa_pairs.question: Ziggurat
qa_pairs.answer: It means A temple tower of the Babylonians or Assyrians, consisting of a lofty pyramidal structure, built in successive stages, with outside staircases, and a shrine at the top; -- called also also known as zikkurat.

qa_pairs.question: Zigzag
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Something that has short turns or angles.

qa_pairs.question: Zigzag
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Having short, sharp turns; running this way and that in an onward course.

qa_pairs.question: Zigzag
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is To form with short turns.

qa_pairs.question: Zigzag
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To move in a zigzag manner; also, to have a zigzag shape.

qa_pairs.question: Zigzaggery
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The quality or state of being zigzag; crookedness.

qa_pairs.question: Zigzaggy
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having sharp turns.

qa_pairs.question: Zikkurat
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A temple tower of the Babylonians or Assyrians, consisting of a lofty pyramidal structure, built in successive stages, with outside staircases, and a shrine at the top; -- called also also known as ziggurat.

qa_pairs.question: Zilla
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A low, thorny, suffrutescent, crucifeous plant (Zilla myagroides) found in the deserts of Egypt. Its leaves are boiled in water, and eaten, by the Arabs.

qa_pairs.question: Zillah
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A district or local division, as of a province.

qa_pairs.question: Zimb
qa_pairs.answer: It means A large, venomous, two-winged fly, native of Abyssinia. It is allied to the tsetse fly, and, like the latter, is destructive to cattle.

qa_pairs.question: Ziment-water
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A kind of water found in copper mines; water impregnated with copper.

qa_pairs.question: Zimocca
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A sponge (Euspongia zimocca) of flat form and fine quality, from the Adriatic, about the Greek islands, and the coast of Barbary.

qa_pairs.question: Zinc
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An abundant element of the magnesium-cadmium group, extracted principally from the minerals zinc blende, smithsonite, calamine, and franklinite, as an easily fusible bluish white metal, which is malleable, especially when heated. It is not easily oxidized in moist air, and hence is used for sheeting, coating galvanized iron, etc. It is used in making brass, britannia, and other alloys, and is also largely consumed in electric batteries. Symbol Zn. Atomic number 30. Atomic weight 65.38.

qa_pairs.question: Zinc
qa_pairs.answer: It means To coat with zinc; to galvanize.

qa_pairs.question: Zincane
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Zinc chloride.

qa_pairs.question: Zincic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Pertaining to, containing, or resembling, zinc; zincous.

qa_pairs.question: Zincide
qa_pairs.answer: It means A binary compound of zinc.

qa_pairs.question: Zinciferous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Containing or affording zinc.

qa_pairs.question: Zincification
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The act or process of applying zinc; the condition of being zincified, or covered with zinc; galvanization.

qa_pairs.question: Zincify
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To coat or impregnate with zinc.

qa_pairs.question: Zincite
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Native zinc oxide; a brittle, translucent mineral, of an orange-red color; -- called also also known as red zinc ore, and also known as red oxide of zinc.

qa_pairs.question: Zincking
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The act or process of applying zinc; galvanization.

qa_pairs.question: Zincky
qa_pairs.answer: It means Pertaining to zinc, or having its appearance.

qa_pairs.question: Zinco-
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A combining form from zinc; in chemistry, designating zinc as an element of certain double compounds. Also used adjectively.

qa_pairs.question: Zincode
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The positive electrode of an electrolytic cell; anode.

qa_pairs.question: Zincograph
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A zinc plate prepared for printing by zincography; also, a print from such a plate.

qa_pairs.question: Zincographer
qa_pairs.answer: It means An engraver on zinc.

qa_pairs.question: Zincongraphic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to zincography; as, zincographic processes.

qa_pairs.question: Zincography
qa_pairs.answer: It means The art or process of engraving or etching on zinc, in which the design is left in relief in the style of a wood cut, the rest of the ground being eaten away by acid.

qa_pairs.question: Zincoid
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or resembling, zinc; -- said of the electricity of the zincous plate in connection with a copper plate in a voltaic circle; also, designating the positive pole.

qa_pairs.question: Zinco-polar
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Electrically polarized like the surface of the zinc presented to the acid in a battery, which has zincous affinity.

qa_pairs.question: Zincous
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of, pertaining to, or containing, zinc; zincic; as, zincous salts.

qa_pairs.question: zine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A publication similar to a magazine{4} but in electronic rather than printed form, maintained as data files on a computer and accessible via the world wide web; sometimes called also known as e-zine (<ldquo/e<rdquo/ standing for _electronic_, as in e-mail.

qa_pairs.question: Zingaro
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A gypsy.

qa_pairs.question: Zingel
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A small, edible, freshwater European perch (Aspro zingel), having a round, elongated body and prominent snout.

qa_pairs.question: Zingiberaceous
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to ginger, or to a tribe (Zingibereae) of endogenous plants of the order Scitamineae. See Scitamineous.

qa_pairs.question: Zink
qa_pairs.answer: It means See Zinc.

qa_pairs.question: Zinkenite
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A steel-gray metallic mineral, a sulphide of antimony and lead.

qa_pairs.question: Zinky
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Zincky.

qa_pairs.question: Zinnia
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any plant of the composite genus *Zinnia*, Mexican herbs with opposite leaves and large gay-colored blossoms. Zinnia elegans is the commonest species in cultivation.

qa_pairs.question: Zinnwaldite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A kind of mica containing lithium, often associated with tin ore.

qa_pairs.question: Zinsang
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The delundung.

qa_pairs.question: Zinziberaceous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Zingiberaceous.

qa_pairs.question: Zion
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A hill in Jerusalem, which, after the capture of that city by the Israelites, became the royal residence of David and his successors.

qa_pairs.question: Zionism
qa_pairs.answer: It means Among the Jews, a theory, plan, or movement for colonizing their own race in Palestine, the land of Zion, or, if that is impracticable, elsewhere, either for religious or nationalizing purposes; -- called also also known as Zion movement.

qa_pairs.question: Zip
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A hissing or sibilant sound such as that made by a flying bullet.

qa_pairs.question: Zip
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as To make, or move with, a sound like a zip{1}.

qa_pairs.question: zip-fastener
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as a device for locking together two toothed edges by means of a sliding tab.

qa_pairs.question: zip + 4
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as a full nine-digit zip code. See zip code.

qa_pairs.question: zip code
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any one of a set of numbers assigned by the United States Postal Service to designate a particular postal delivery area. One or more zip codes are assigned to each post office. The numbers initially had five digits (the initial code), indicating state and post office. Later, four more optional digits were added (the expanded code) indicating the box number or delivery route. The full set of nine digits is also referred to as zip + 4. The code is appended in an address to the line bearing the city and state names, as in <ldquo/Plainfield, NJ 07062<rdquo/.

qa_pairs.question: zip-code
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is to affix a zip code to (an address or a letter).

qa_pairs.question: Ziphiidae
qa_pairs.answer: It means A natural family of cetaceans comprising the beaked whales; in some esp. former classifications included in the family Physeteridae.

qa_pairs.question: Ziphioid
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as See Xiphioid.

qa_pairs.question: zipper
qa_pairs.answer: It means a device for locking together two toothed edges by means of a sliding tab.

qa_pairs.question: zippy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as quick and energetic.

qa_pairs.question: Zirbanit
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The consort of Marduk.

qa_pairs.question: Zirco-
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A combining form (also used adjectively) designating zirconium as an element of certain double compounds; zircono-; as in zircofluoric acid, sodium zircofluoride.

qa_pairs.question: Zircofluoride
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A double fluoride of zirconium and hydrogen, or some other positive element or radical; as, zircofluoride of sodium.

qa_pairs.question: Zircon
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A mineral consisting predominantly of zirconium silicate (Zr2SiO4) occurring in tetragonal crystals, usually of a brown or gray color. It consists of silica and zirconia. A red variety, used as a gem, is called hyacinth. Colorless, pale-yellow or smoky-brown varieties from Ceylon are called jargon.

qa_pairs.question: Zircona
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Zirconia.

qa_pairs.question: Zirconate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A salt of zirconic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Zirconia
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The oxide of zirconium (ZrO2), obtained as a white powder, and possessing both acid and basic properties. On account of its infusibility, and brilliant luminosity when incandescent, it is used as an ingredient of sticks for the Drummomd light.

qa_pairs.question: Zirconic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Pertaining to, containing, or resembling, zirconium; as, zirconic oxide; zirconic compounds.

qa_pairs.question: Zirconium
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A rare element of the carbon-silicon group, intermediate between the metals and nonmetals, obtained from the mineral zircon as a dark sooty powder, or as a gray metallic crystalline substance. Symbol Zr. Atomic weight, 90.4.

qa_pairs.question: Zircon light
qa_pairs.answer: It means A light, similar to the calcium light, produced by incandescent zirconia.

qa_pairs.question: Zircono
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Zirco-.

qa_pairs.question: Zirconoid
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A double eight-sided pyramid, a form common with tetragonal crystals; -- so called because this form often occurs in crystals of zircon.

qa_pairs.question: zit
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as a pimple.

qa_pairs.question: Zither
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is An instrument of music used in Austria and Germany. It has from thirty to forty wires strung across a shallow sounding-board, which lies horizontally on a table before the performer, who uses both hands in playing on it. Note: [Not to be confounded with the old lute-shaped cittern, or cithern.]

qa_pairs.question: ziti
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A tubular pasta in short pieces.

qa_pairs.question: Zittern
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Cittern.

qa_pairs.question: Zizania
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A genus of grasses including Indian rice. See Indian rice, under Rice.

qa_pairs.question: Zizel
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The suslik.

qa_pairs.question: Zizith
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The tassels of twisted cords or threads on the corners of the upper garment worn by strict Jews. The Hebrew for this word is translated in both the Authorized and Revised Versions (Deut. xxii. 12) by the word <ldquo/fringes.<rdquo/

qa_pairs.question: Zoanthacea
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A suborder of Actinaria, including *Zoanthus* and allied genera, which are permanently attached by their bases.

qa_pairs.question: Zoantharia
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Anthozoa.

qa_pairs.question: Zoantharian
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the Zoantharia.

qa_pairs.question: Zoanthodeme
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The zooids of a compound anthozoan, collectively.

qa_pairs.question: Zoanthoid
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to the Zoanthacea.

qa_pairs.question: Zoanthropy
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A kind of monomania in which the patient believes himself transformed into one of the lower animals.

qa_pairs.question: Zoanthus
qa_pairs.answer: It means A genus of Actinaria, including numerous species, found mostly in tropical seas. The zooids or polyps resemble small, elongated actinias united together at their bases by fleshy stolons, and thus forming extensive groups. The tentacles are small and bright colored.

qa_pairs.question: Zobo
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A kind of domestic cattle reared in Asia for its flesh and milk. It is supposed to be a hybrid between the zebu and the yak.

qa_pairs.question: Zocco
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Same as Socle.

qa_pairs.question: Zocle
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Same as Socle.

qa_pairs.question: Zocor
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is a trade name for simvastatin.

qa_pairs.question: Zodiac
qa_pairs.answer: It means An imaginary belt in the heavens, 16<deg/ or 18<deg/ broad, in the middle of which is the ecliptic, or sun's path. It comprises the twelve constellations, which one constituted, and from which were named, the twelve signs of the zodiac.

qa_pairs.question: Zodiacal
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to the zodiac; situated within the zodiac; as, the zodiacal planets.

qa_pairs.question: Zo<eum/a
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A peculiar larval stage of certain decapod Crustacea, especially of crabs and certain Anomura.

qa_pairs.question: Zoetrope
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as An optical toy, in which figures made to revolve on the inside of a cylinder, and viewed through slits in its circumference, appear like a single figure passing through a series of natural motions as if animated or mechanically moved.

qa_pairs.question: Zohar
qa_pairs.answer: It means A Jewish cabalistic book attributed by tradition to Rabbi Simon ben Yochi, who lived about the end of the 1st century, a. d. Modern critics believe it to be a compilation of the 13th century.

qa_pairs.question: Zoic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to animals, or animal life.

qa_pairs.question: Zoide
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Meride.

qa_pairs.question: Zoilean
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having the characteristic of Zoilus, a bitter, envious, unjust critic, who lived about 270 years before Christ.

qa_pairs.question: Zoilism
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Resemblance to Zoilus in style or manner; carping criticism; detraction.

qa_pairs.question: Zoisite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A grayish or whitish mineral occurring in orthorhombic, prismatic crystals, also in columnar masses. It is a silicate of alumina and lime, and is allied to epidote.

qa_pairs.question: Zoism
qa_pairs.answer: It means Reverence for animal life or belief in animal powers and influences, as among savages.

qa_pairs.question: Zokor
qa_pairs.answer: It means An Asiatic burrowing rodent (Siphneus aspalax) resembling the mole rat. It is native of the Altai Mountains.

qa_pairs.question: Zolaesque
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In the style of Zola (see Zolaism).

qa_pairs.question: Zolaism
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The literary theories and practices of the French novelist Emile Zola (1840-1902); naturalism, esp. in a derogatory sense.

qa_pairs.question: Z<oum/llners lines
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Parallel lines that are made to appear convergent or divergent by means of oblique intersections.

qa_pairs.question: Zollverein
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Literally, a customs union; specifically, applied to the several customs unions successively formed under the leadership of Prussia among certain German states for establishing liberty of commerce among themselves and common tariff on imports, exports, and transit.

qa_pairs.question: Zomboruk
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Zumbooruk.

qa_pairs.question: Zona
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A zone or band; a layer.

qa_pairs.question: Zonal
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to a zone; having the form of a zone or zones.

qa_pairs.question: Zonar
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A belt or girdle which the Christians and Jews of the Levant were obliged to wear to distinguish them from Mohammedans.

qa_pairs.question: Zonaria
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A division of Mammalia in which the placenta is zonelike.

qa_pairs.question: Zonate
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Divided by parallel planes; as, zonate tetraspores, found in certain red algae.

qa_pairs.question: Zone
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A girdle; a cincture.

qa_pairs.question: Zone
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is To girdle; to encircle.

qa_pairs.question: Zoned
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Wearing a zone, or girdle.

qa_pairs.question: Zoneless
qa_pairs.answer: It means Not having a zone; ungirded.

qa_pairs.question: Zonnar
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Zonar.

qa_pairs.question: Zonular
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to a zone; zone-shaped.

qa_pairs.question: Zonule
qa_pairs.answer: It means A little zone, or girdle.

qa_pairs.question: Zonulet
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A zonule.

qa_pairs.question: Zonure
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any one of several of South African lizards of the genus *Zonura*, common in rocky situations.

qa_pairs.question: Zoo-
qa_pairs.answer: It means A combining form from Gr. zww^,n an animal, as in zoogenic, zoology, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Zoochemical
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to zoochemistry.

qa_pairs.question: Zoochemistry
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Animal chemistry; particularly, the description of the chemical compounds entering into the composition of the animal body, in distinction from biochemistry.

qa_pairs.question: Zoochemy
qa_pairs.answer: It means Animal chemistry; zoochemistry.

qa_pairs.question: Zoochlorella
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of the small green granulelike bodies found in the interior of certain stentors, hydras, and other invertebrates.

qa_pairs.question: Zoocyst
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A cyst formed by certain Protozoa and unicellular plants which the contents divide into a large number of granules, each of which becomes a germ.

qa_pairs.question: Zoocytium
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The common support, often branched, of certain species of social Infusoria.

qa_pairs.question: Zoodendrium
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The branched, and often treelike, support of the colonies of certain Infusoria.

qa_pairs.question: Zooecium
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of the cells or tubes which inclose the feeling zooids of Bryozoa. See Illust. of Sea Moss.

qa_pairs.question: Zooerythrine
qa_pairs.answer: It means A peculiar organic red coloring matter found in the feathers of various birds.

qa_pairs.question: Zoogamous
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining zoogamy.

qa_pairs.question: Zoogamy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The sexual reproduction of animals.

qa_pairs.question: Zoogenic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to zoogeny, animal production.

qa_pairs.question: Zoogeny
qa_pairs.answer: It means The doctrine of the formation of living beings.

qa_pairs.question: Zoogeographical
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to zoography.

qa_pairs.question: Zoogeography
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The study or description of the geographical distribution of animals.

qa_pairs.question: Zoogloea
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A colony or mass of bacteria imbedded in a viscous gelatinous substance. The zoogloea is characteristic of a transitory stage through which rapidly multiplying bacteria pass in the course of their evolution. Also used adjectively.

qa_pairs.question: Zoographer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who describes animals, their forms and habits.

qa_pairs.question: Zoographic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the description of animals.

qa_pairs.question: Zoographist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A zoographer.

qa_pairs.question: Zoography
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A description of animals, their forms and habits.

qa_pairs.question: Zooid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Pertaining to, or resembling, an animal.

qa_pairs.question: Zooid
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An organic body or cell having locomotion, as a spermatic cell or spermatozooid.

qa_pairs.question: Zooidal
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to a zooid; as, a zooidal form.

qa_pairs.question: Zoolatry
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The worship of animals.

qa_pairs.question: Zoologer
qa_pairs.answer: It means A Zoologist.

qa_pairs.question: Zoological
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of or pertaining to Zoology, or the science of animals.

qa_pairs.question: Zoologically
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as In a Zoological manner; according to the principles of Zoology.

qa_pairs.question: Zoologist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is One who is well versed in Zoology.

qa_pairs.question: Zoologize
qa_pairs.answer: It means To study Zoology; esp., to collect animals for study.

qa_pairs.question: Zoology
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is That part of biology which relates to the animal kingdom, including the structure, embryology, evolution, classification, habits, and distribution of all animals, both living and extinct.

qa_pairs.question: Zoomelanin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A pigment giving the black color to the feathers of many birds.

qa_pairs.question: Zoomorphic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Of or pertaining to zoomorphism.

qa_pairs.question: Zoomorphism
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The transformation of men into beasts.

qa_pairs.question: Zoon
qa_pairs.answer: It means An animal which is the sole product of a single egg; -- opposed to zooid.

qa_pairs.question: Zoonic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to animals; obtained from animal substances.

qa_pairs.question: Zoonite
qa_pairs.answer: It means One of the segments of the body of an articulate animal.

qa_pairs.question: Zoonomy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The laws of animal life, or the science which treats of the phenomena of animal life, their causes and relations.

qa_pairs.question: Zoonule
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Zoonite.

qa_pairs.question: Zoopathology
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Animal pathology.

qa_pairs.question: Zoophaga
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An artificial group comprising various carnivorous and insectivorous animals.

qa_pairs.question: Zoophagan
qa_pairs.answer: It means A animal that feeds on animal food.

qa_pairs.question: Zoophagous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Feeding on animals.

qa_pairs.question: Zoophilist
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A lover of animals.

qa_pairs.question: Zoophily
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Love of animals.

qa_pairs.question: Zoophite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A zoophyte.

qa_pairs.question: Zoophoric
qa_pairs.answer: It means Bearing or supporting the figure of an animal; as, a zoophoric column.

qa_pairs.question: Zoophorous
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The part between the architrave and cornice; the frieze; -- so called from the figures of animals carved upon it.

qa_pairs.question: Zoophyta
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An extensive artificial and heterogeneous group of animals, formerly adopted by many Zoologists. It included the c<oe/lenterates, echinoderms, sponges, Bryozoa, Protozoa, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Zoophyte
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any one of numerous species of invertebrate animals which more or less resemble plants in appearance, or mode of growth, as the corals, gorgonians, sea anemones, hydroids, bryozoans, sponges, etc., especially any of those that form compound colonies having a branched or treelike form, as many corals and hydroids.

qa_pairs.question: Zoophytic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to zoophytes.

qa_pairs.question: Zoophytoid
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Pertaining to, or resembling, a zoophyte.

qa_pairs.question: Zoophytological
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to zoophytology; as, zoophytological observations.

qa_pairs.question: Zoophytology
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The natural history zoophytes.

qa_pairs.question: Zoopraxiscope
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An instrument similar to, or the same as, the, the phenakistoscope, by means of which pictures projected upon a screen are made to exhibit the natural movements of animals, and the like.

qa_pairs.question: Zoopsychology
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Animal psychology.

qa_pairs.question: Zoosperm
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of the spermatic particles; spermatozoid.

qa_pairs.question: Zoosporangium
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A spore, or conceptacle containing zoospores.

qa_pairs.question: Zoospore
qa_pairs.answer: It means A spore provided with one or more slender cilia, by the vibration of which it swims in the water. Zoospores are produced by many green, and by some olive-brown, algae. In certain species they are divided into the larger macrozoospores and the smaller microzoospores. Called also also known as sporozoid, and also known as swarmspore.

qa_pairs.question: Zoosporic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to zoospores; of the nature of zoospores.

qa_pairs.question: Zootic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Containing the remains of organized bodies; -- said of rock or soil.

qa_pairs.question: Zootomical
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to zootomy.

qa_pairs.question: Zootomist
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One who dissects animals, or is skilled in zootomy.

qa_pairs.question: Zootomy
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The dissection or the anatomy of animals; -- distinguished from androtomy.

qa_pairs.question: Zootrophic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to the nourishment of animals.

qa_pairs.question: Zoozoo
qa_pairs.answer: It means The wood pigeon.

qa_pairs.question: Zope
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A European fresh-water bream (Abramis ballerus).

qa_pairs.question: Zopilote
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The urubu, or American black vulture.

qa_pairs.question: Zoril
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Zorilla.

qa_pairs.question: Zorilla
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Either one of two species of small African carnivores of the genus *Ictonyx* allied to the weasels and skunks.

qa_pairs.question: Zoroaster
qa_pairs.answer: It means The persian prophet also known as Zarathustra, who probably lived in the second millenium B. C. His treachings form the basis for the religion Zoroastrianism.

qa_pairs.question: Zoroastrian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to Zoroaster, or his religious system.

qa_pairs.question: Zoroastrian
qa_pairs.answer: It means A follower of Zoroaster; one who accepts Zoroastrianism.

qa_pairs.question: Zoroastrianism
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The religious system of Zoroaster, the legislator and prophet of the ancient Persians, which was the national faith of Persia; mazdeism. The system presupposes a good spirit (Ormuzd) and an opposing evil spirit (Ahriman). Cf. Fire worship, under Fire, and Parsee.

qa_pairs.question: Zoroastrism
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Zoroastrianism.

qa_pairs.question: Zoster
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Shingles.

qa_pairs.question: Zostera
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A genus of plants of the Naiadaceae, or Pondweed family. Zostera marina is commonly known as sea wrack, and eelgrass.

qa_pairs.question: Zosterops
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A genus of birds that comprises the white-eyes. See White-eye.

qa_pairs.question: Zouave
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is One of an active and hardy body of soldiers in the French service, originally Arabs, but now composed of Frenchmen who wear the Arab dress.

qa_pairs.question: Zounds
qa_pairs.answer: It means An exclamation formerly used as an oath, and an expression of anger or wonder.

qa_pairs.question: Zoutch
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as To stew, as flounders, eels, etc., with just enough or liquid to cover them.

qa_pairs.question: Zubr
qa_pairs.answer: It means The aurochs.

qa_pairs.question: Zuche
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A stump of a tree.

qa_pairs.question: Zuchetto
qa_pairs.answer: It means A skullcap covering the tonsure, worn under the berretta. The pope's is white; a cardinal's red; a bishop's purple; a priest's black.

qa_pairs.question: Zufolo
qa_pairs.answer: It means A little flute or flageolet, especially that which is used to teach birds.

qa_pairs.question: Zuisin
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The American widgeon.

qa_pairs.question: Zulu
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any member of the tribe of Zulus; a Zulu-Kaffir. See Zulus.

qa_pairs.question: Zulu-Kaffir
qa_pairs.answer: It means A member of the Bantu race comprising the Zulus and the Kaffirs.

qa_pairs.question: Zulus
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as The most important tribe belonging to the Kaffir race. They inhabit a region on the southeast coast of Africa, but formerly occupied a much more extensive country. They are noted for their warlike disposition, courage, and military skill.

qa_pairs.question: Zumbooruk
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A small cannon supported by a swiveled rest on the back of a camel, whence it is fired, -- used in the East.

qa_pairs.question: Zumic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is See Zymic, Zymological, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Zu<ntil/is
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A tribe of Pueblo Indians occupying a village in New Mexico, on the Zu River.

qa_pairs.question: Zu<ntil/ian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the Zu<ntil/is, or designating their linguistic stock.

qa_pairs.question: Zunyite
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A fluosilicate of alumina occurring in tetrahedral crystals at the Zu<ntil/i mine in Colorado.

qa_pairs.question: Zwanziger
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An Austrian silver coin equivalent to 20 kreutzers, or about 10 cents.

qa_pairs.question: Zwieback
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A kind of biscuit or rusk first baked in a loaf and afterwards cut and toasted.

qa_pairs.question: Zwinglian
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to Ulric Zwingli (1481-1531), the reformer of German Switzerland, who maintained that in the Lord's Supper the true body of Christ is present by the contemplation of faith but not in essence or reality, and that the sacrament is a memorial without mystical elements.

qa_pairs.question: Zygantrum
qa_pairs.answer: It means See under Zygosphene.

qa_pairs.question: Zygapophysis
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as One of the articular processes of a vertebra, of which there are usually four, two anterior and two posterior. See under Vertebra.

qa_pairs.question: Zygenid
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Any one of numerous species of moths of the family Zygaenidae, most of which are bright colored. The wood nymph and the vine forester are examples. Also used adjectively.

qa_pairs.question: Zygobranchia
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A division of marine gastropods in which the gills are developed on both sides of the body and the renal organs are also paired. The abalone (*Haliotis*) and the keyhole limpet (*Fissurella*) are examples.

qa_pairs.question: Zygobranchiate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of or pertaining to the Zygobranchia.

qa_pairs.question: Zygodactyl
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Any zygodactylous bird.

qa_pairs.question: Zygodactylae
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is The zygodactylous birds. In a restricted sense applied to a division of birds which includes the barbets, toucans, honey guides, and other related birds.

qa_pairs.question: Zygodactyli
qa_pairs.answer: It means Same as Scansores.

qa_pairs.question: Zygodactylic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Yoke-footed; having the toes disposed in pairs; -- applied to birds which have two toes before and two behind, as the parrot, cuckoo, woodpecker, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Zygoma
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The jugal, malar, or cheek bone.

qa_pairs.question: Zygomatic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Of, pertaining to, or in the region of, the zygoma.

qa_pairs.question: Zygomorphic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Symmetrical bilaterally; -- said of organisms, or parts of organisms, capable of division into two symmetrical halves only in a single plane.

qa_pairs.question: Zygophyllaceae
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A natural family of small trees, shrubs, and herbs of warm arid and saline regions; it is often resinous, and some are poisonous. It contains the genera *Zygophyllum*; *Tribulus*; *Guaiacum;* and *Larrea*.

qa_pairs.question: Zygophyllum
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A genus of usually tropical herbs or shrubs having ill-smelling foliage and flower buds that are used as capers: bean capers.

qa_pairs.question: Zygophyte
qa_pairs.answer: It means Any plant of a proposed class or grand division (Zygophytes, Zygophyta, or Zygosporeae), in which reproduction consists in the union of two similar cells. Cf. Oophyte.

qa_pairs.question: Zygoptera
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A suborder consisting of the damselflies.

qa_pairs.question: Zygosis
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The process of the merging of two gametes. Same as Conjugation.

qa_pairs.question: zygosity
qa_pairs.answer: It means The property of being either homogeneous or heterogeneous with respect to the allelic genes determining some hereditary trait in a diploid or polyploid organism; if homogeneous, the organism is homozygous; if heterogeneous, it is heterozygous.

qa_pairs.question: Zygosperm
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A spore formed by the union of the contents of two similar cells, either of the same or of distinct individual plants. Zygosperms are found in certain orders of algae and fungi.

qa_pairs.question: Zygosphene
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A median process on the front part of the neural arch of the vertebrae of most snakes and some lizards, which fits into a fossa, called the zygantrum, on the back part of the arch in front.

qa_pairs.question: Zygospore
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Same as Zygosperm.

qa_pairs.question: zygote
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as The cell resulting from the union of an ovum and a spermatozoon, or (broadly) the developing new organism arising from such a cell.

qa_pairs.question: zygotene
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is the second stage of the prophase of meiosis.

qa_pairs.question: zygotic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is of or pertaining to a zygote.

qa_pairs.question: Zylonite
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Celluloid.

qa_pairs.question: Zymase
qa_pairs.answer: It means A soluble ferment, or enzyme. See Enzyme.

qa_pairs.question: Zyme
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A ferment.

qa_pairs.question: Zymic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Pertaining to, or produced by, fermentation; -- formerly, by confusion, used to designate lactic acid.

qa_pairs.question: Zymogen
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A mother substance, or antecedent, of an enzyme or chemical ferment; -- applied to such substances as, not being themselves actual ferments, may by internal changes give rise to a ferment.

qa_pairs.question: Zymogene
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as One of a physiological group of globular bacteria which produces fermentations of diverse nature; -- distinguished from pathogene.

qa_pairs.question: Zymogenic
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Pertaining to, or formed by, a zymogene.

qa_pairs.question: Zymologic
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Of or pertaining to zymology.

qa_pairs.question: Zymologist
qa_pairs.answer: It means One who is skilled in zymology, or in the fermentation of liquors.

qa_pairs.question: Zymology
qa_pairs.answer: It means A treatise on the fermentation of liquors, or the doctrine of fermentation.

qa_pairs.question: Zymolysis
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is The action of enzymes, such as digestion or fermentation; also, the changes produced by such action.

qa_pairs.question: Zymome
qa_pairs.answer: It means A glutinous substance, insoluble in alcohol, resembling legumin; -- now called also known as vegetable fibrin, also known as vegetable albumin, or also known as gluten casein.

qa_pairs.question: Zymometer
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An instrument for ascertaining the degree of fermentation occasioned by the mixture of different liquids, and the degree of heat which they acquire in fermentation.

qa_pairs.question: Zymophyte
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A bacteroid ferment.

qa_pairs.question: Zymoscope
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is An apparatus for determining the fermenting power of yeast by measuring the amount of carbonic acid evolved from a given quantity of sugar.

qa_pairs.question: Zymose
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Invertin.

qa_pairs.question: Zymosis
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as A fermentation; hence, an analogous process by which an infectious disease is believed to be developed.

qa_pairs.question: Zymotic
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as Of, pertaining to, or caused by, fermentation.

qa_pairs.question: Zythem
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is See Zythum.

qa_pairs.question: Zythepsary
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A brewery.

qa_pairs.question: Zythum
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A kind of ancient malt beverage; a liquor made from malt and wheat.

qa_pairs.question: X
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as X, the twenty-fourth letter of the English alphabet, has three sounds; a compound nonvocal sound (that of ks), as in wax; a compound vocal sound (that of gz), as in example; and, at the beginning of a word, a simple vocal sound (that of _z_), as in xanthic. See Guide to Pronunciation, <sect/<sect/ 217, 270, 271.

qa_pairs.question: Xanthamide
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as An amido derivative of xanthic acid obtained as a white crystalline substance, C2H5O.CS.NH2; -- called also also known as xanthogen amide.

qa_pairs.question: Xanthate
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A salt of xanthic; a xanthogenate.

qa_pairs.question: Xanthelasma
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as See Xanthoma.

qa_pairs.question: Xanthian
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Of or pertaining to Xanthus, an ancient town on Asia Minor; -- applied especially to certain marbles found near that place, and now in the British Museum.

qa_pairs.question: Xanthic
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is Tending toward a yellow color, or to one of those colors, green being excepted, in which yellow is a constituent, as scarlet, orange, etc.

qa_pairs.question: Xanthide
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is A compound or derivative of xanthogen.

qa_pairs.question: Xanthidium
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A genus of minute unicellular algae of the desmids. These algae have a rounded shape and are armed with glochidiate or branched aculei. Several species occur in ditches, and others are found fossil in flint or hornstone.

qa_pairs.question: Xanthin
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is same as xanthine.

qa_pairs.question: Xanthine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A type of purine obtainable as a white microcrystalline powder, C5H4O2N4, present in muscle tissue, in the liver, spleen, pancreas, and other organs, and also in urine (in small quantities) and some urinary calculi, and in the juices of certain plants; -- so called because it leaves a yellow residue when evaporated to dryness with nitric acid. It is also present in guano. Xanthine is closely related to uric acid.

qa_pairs.question: Xanthinine
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A complex nitrogenous substance related to urea and uric acid, produced as a white powder; -- so called because it forms yellow salts, and because its solution forms a blue fluorescence like quinine.

qa_pairs.question: Xanthium
qa_pairs.answer: You can think of it as A genus of composite plants in which the scales of the involucre are united so as to form a kind of bur; cocklebur; clotbur.

qa_pairs.question: Xantho-
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A combining form from Gr. xanqo`s yellow; as in xanthocobaltic salts. Used also adjectively in chemistry.

qa_pairs.question: Xanthocarpous
qa_pairs.answer: You might recognize this as Having yellow fruit.

qa_pairs.question: Xanthochroi
qa_pairs.answer: One way to understand this is A division of the Caucasian races, comprising the lighter-colored members.

qa_pairs.question: Xanthochroic
qa_pairs.answer: It means Having a yellowish or fair complexion; of or pertaining to the Xanthochroi.

qa_pairs.question: Xanthochroid
qa_pairs.answer: In simple terms, this is Having a yellowish or fair complexion.

qa_pairs.question: Xanthochroism
